
-----title
泉州（晋江） (出生地)
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='6d4d54a4ad0f4e74b610ad98d933b430_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6d4d54a4ad0f4e74b610ad98d933b430");'><span id='6d4d54a4ad0f4e74b610ad98d933b430_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1008&endYear=1010')">1008-1010年</a>，1-3岁</div><div id='6d4d54a4ad0f4e74b610ad98d933b430' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1008&endYear=1008')">1008年7月2日</a>　七月二日，韩琦生于泉州。是时，其父韩国华任泉州知州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1009&endYear=1010')">1009-1010年</a>　韩琦随父母生活。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
建瓯（瓯宁）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8a23303339a74a87a0477dad83867ce5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8a23303339a74a87a0477dad83867ce5");'><span id='8a23303339a74a87a0477dad83867ce5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1011&endYear=1011')">1011年</a>，4岁</div><div id='8a23303339a74a87a0477dad83867ce5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1011&endYear=1011')">1011年</a>　韩琦父韩国华卒于建州传舍。韩琦从此开始了他年幼而孤、鞠于诸兄的年代。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
开封
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='30cb9a16ae4b49a0b94de280020ef0ac_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("30cb9a16ae4b49a0b94de280020ef0ac");'><span id='30cb9a16ae4b49a0b94de280020ef0ac_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1027&endYear=1027')">1027年</a>，20岁</div><div id='30cb9a16ae4b49a0b94de280020ef0ac' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1027&endYear=1027')">1027年</a>　是年，韩琦中进士，名在一甲第二名。授将作监丞、通判淄州。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='32cd646c5cc84d33aca706ff52b9443c_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("32cd646c5cc84d33aca706ff52b9443c");'><span id='32cd646c5cc84d33aca706ff52b9443c_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1038')">1032-1038年</a>，25-31岁</div><div id='32cd646c5cc84d33aca706ff52b9443c' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　韩琦仍丁母忧，与三兄韩琚丁忧赴阙，同在京师。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　或在开封。韩琦有《湽州知郡学士启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。此文为韩琦仁宗天圣末丁忧时作，但具体写作时地不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1164034' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164034' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164034?labeling=true' target='_blank'>淄州知郡学士启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164034")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164034_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164034'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164034'>右，某伏念昨以绝奉循陔之养，远依同气之亲，邈在淮壖，夐遥铃府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164034_comment'></div>王粲自离于荆渚，无所销忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164034_comment'></div>惠施方视于濠鱼，未能知乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164034_comment'></div>属衰麻之在疚，固鳞翼之罕凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164034_comment'></div>敢谓弗替厚怜，远颁珍诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164034_comment'></div>钦奉降挹，第极腼藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164034_comment'></div>备聆政迹推优，神襟集庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164034_comment'></div>恭以某官负宏杰之器，禀醇和之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164034_comment'></div>式縻凤署之英才，惭委虎符之重寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164034_comment'></div>杜氏以夹河为郡，交喧爱树之谣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164034_comment'></div>杨君以垂组誇乡，俯接维桑之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164034_comment'></div>惠利已凝于殊绩，庞鸿将沛于茂恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164034_comment'></div>深冀遵调，少符颙系。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1164034_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　在开封。韩琦代兄韩琚作《昭文相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。《安阳集编年笺注》有《昭文相公启》同题文二篇，此为其中一篇，首句为“某近睹进奏院状报”）</span><div id='poem_1164022' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164022' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164022?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昭文相公启<span class='inlineComment2'>（以下十启代司封兄）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164022")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164022_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164022'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164022'>右，某近睹进奏院状报，伏审某官肃奉制恩，荣加宠典，恭惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164022_comment'></div>窃以登槐鼎之任，注意斯崇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164022_comment'></div>跃龙凤之池，褒贤式重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164022_comment'></div>而况翼宣盛美，扶助神灵，昭成弼亮之勋，显对洪宁之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164022_comment'></div>骈膺异数，胥协至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164022_comment'></div>伏以某官茂德镇时，纯诚体国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164022_comment'></div>负尊主安民之业，持秉钧当轴之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164022_comment'></div>而自位冠中阶，功先上衮，三辰顺历，庆调燮以凝猷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164022_comment'></div>万物遂宜，致几康而洽咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164022_comment'></div>果见岩瞻增耸，栋用弥隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164022_comment'></div>嘉黄阁之奋庸，峻紫垣而命秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164022_comment'></div>宪侯修职，方兴礼让之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164022_comment'></div>樊仲翰邦，永著将明之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164022_comment'></div>某夙叨钧照，适系郡条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164022_comment'></div>燕贺厦以居多，徒深窃抃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164022_comment'></div>金在镕而罔间，更仰裁成。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1164022_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　在开封。韩琦代兄韩琚作《集贤相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。《安阳集编年笺注》有《集贤相公启》同题文二篇，此为其中一篇，首句为“某近睹进奏院状报”）</span><div id='poem_1164023' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164023' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164023?labeling=true' target='_blank'>集贤相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164023")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164023_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164023'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164023'>右，某近睹进奏院状报，伏审某官肃奉尧纶，再调商鼎，恭惟庆慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164023_comment'></div>窃以乾台上炳，众仰于三阶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164023_comment'></div>宰府中严，位尊乎四近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164023_comment'></div>矧复素敦体貌，动系咨诹，示注意之莫先，显奋庸之弥劭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164023_comment'></div>爰推异数，允属宗工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164023_comment'></div>伏以某官庙器渊宏，栋材隆厚，茂著直方之德，遐恢燕翼之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164023_comment'></div>向者成务机衡，均荣屏翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164023_comment'></div>九河疏润，方惠俗以凝猷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164023_comment'></div>十乘宣威，荐陪京而作镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164023_comment'></div>用能两宫疏宠，百辟具瞻，既增秩于天台，复兼荣于书殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164023_comment'></div>山甫将明之业，大宪周邦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164023_comment'></div>酂侯信谨之规，永宁汉室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164023_comment'></div>曲加台照，屡赐齿怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164023_comment'></div>疲马恋轩，莫展驰驱之效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164023_comment'></div>大钧播物，更资甄造之仁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1164023_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　冬，韩琦结束丁忧，迁太子中允，又改太常丞、直集贤院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　在开封，直集贤院时。韩琦作有《献所业上两府启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》（《四库全书》本。下同）卷三十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164011' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164011' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164011?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献所业上两府启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164011")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164011_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164011'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164011'>右，某启：某闻鬻敝帚于千金，诚乖自见；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164011_comment'></div>荐朽株于万乘，允赖先容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164011_comment'></div>其有选懦微材，崎岖末宦，久滞涸于穷路，思振拔于洿涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164011_comment'></div>而欲妄缉芜编，轻尘藻鉴，希眄睐之成饰，俟奖勖以增荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164011_comment'></div>雷门衒布鼓之音，固非量力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164011_comment'></div>沟木享牺樽之用，或预抡才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164011_comment'></div>恭惟某官名擅八区，体兼四业，含辰象之秀德，作社稷之元龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164011_comment'></div>仁表五色之云，郁为天瑞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164011_comment'></div>夏禹九州之鼎，洞察神奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164011_comment'></div>耸瑰望以熙朝，鼓懿文而纬俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164011_comment'></div>以远虑深筹宣国美，以清徽雅准镇时风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164011_comment'></div>泰阶之平六符，阴阳克顺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164011_comment'></div>洪钧之陶万类，动植无私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164011_comment'></div>而自寅亮圣明，虔恭机密，运尊主庇民之策，推怀仁辅义之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164011_comment'></div>魏相持衡，海内归于礼让；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164011_comment'></div>李膺当位，天下宗其楷模。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164011_comment'></div>睿眷致隆，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_16_1164011", 1164011, "Clauses/43/Comments/0")'>岩瞻</span>载协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164011_comment'></div>用能三精昭泰，百度熙康，赞瑶极以增辉，斡璇枢而自正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164011_comment'></div>凡居镕造，孰不倾颙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164011_comment'></div>如某者，质异湘琳，器同屈瓠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164011_comment'></div>有断断守善之诮，无超超拔俗之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164011_comment'></div>腹背之毛，岂飞翔之足用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164011_comment'></div>圈牢之物，虽视息以何为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164011_comment'></div>矧惟越在稚年，奄丁先罚，阙渐<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_1164011", 1164011, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>诗庭之训</span>，居罹磬室之贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164011_comment'></div>徒以笃志缃图，游精翰墨，念家世衣冠之后，慕门藩笔纸之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164011_comment'></div>然而擿埴易迷，滞隅多失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164011_comment'></div>见豺而战，在考实以终疲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164011_comment'></div>画虎不成，几失真而增累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164011_comment'></div>欲徇及亲之禄，弥专贱璧之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164011_comment'></div>幸以国家朝物著明，车书混一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164011_comment'></div>兴礼学而陶远，疏轩冕以崇贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164011_comment'></div>举宗周论士之科，献能式叙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164011_comment'></div>启炎汉得人之路，署行骈臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164011_comment'></div>滥充秀于神畿，获程文于禁坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164011_comment'></div>误中乙观之选，叨尘甲等之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164011_comment'></div>匠局参司，侯封赞部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164011_comment'></div>曾微连最之效，偶逭尸官之尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164011_comment'></div>方代戍瓜，倏悲风树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164011_comment'></div>既奄终于丧纪，复再齿于仕途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164011_comment'></div>所宜匿景下流，牵丝外屏，乐咏中和之职，虔修爱利之经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164011_comment'></div>伏遇某官挥沐敦仁，虚襟好善，沛商霖而作润，煦邹律以为暄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164011_comment'></div>某是以勉贽斐狂，直干钧重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164011_comment'></div>猪苓马渤，庶采掇之未遗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164011_comment'></div>虫臂鼠肝，亦生成而尽在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164011_comment'></div>傥借卿云之惠，实逾宠绂之褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164011_comment'></div>内揆僭差，徒深悚汗。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1164011_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　在开封，直集贤院时。韩琦作有《谢直集贤院启一》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164013' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164013' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164013?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢直集贤院启<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164013")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164013_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164013'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164013'>右，某启：伏奉制命，蒙恩授前件官充职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164013_comment'></div>麟殿飞緌，骤玷登瀛之列；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164013_comment'></div>鹭雍緤组，猥参鸣玉之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164013_comment'></div>荷慈渥之至优，揆孱躯而罔措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164013_comment'></div>宠灵攸暨，荣悸交深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164013_comment'></div>窃以壁府二星，灿天章而尽在；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164013_comment'></div>羲图八象，示帝籍之有开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164013_comment'></div>考遐篆之相沿，宪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1164013", 1164013, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>丰规</span>而迭绍，声明浸盛，朝物增辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164013_comment'></div>所以周法命官，志四方于外史；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164013_comment'></div>汉庭典秘，讲六艺于名儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164013_comment'></div>伯阳推藏室之贤，子云富天禄之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164013_comment'></div>逮开元之创历，启丽正以崇英。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164013_comment'></div>用能演畅鸿猷，详延硕彦，奋三长之懿誉，释四部之群疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164013_comment'></div>矧属巍焕丁辰，熙淳阐化，修应古念旧之则，备纪言书事之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164013_comment'></div>委阁盈辎，洞分于宝蕴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164013_comment'></div>怀铅抱椠，遴集于珍群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164013_comment'></div>加禄廪之载丰，峻员程而式叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164013_comment'></div>谅匪才谟博赡，器识渊宏，茂学际于天人，精思绚乎道德，叔骏之居秘省，自成十典之文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164013_comment'></div>仲恩之在宣明，克定五家之说，则曷以采奇禹穴，簉直严庐，腾蕤翰墨之林，接武红鸾之党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164013_comment'></div>茍从虚授，实浼清涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164013_comment'></div>如某者，嘉善无称，冥顽有素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164013_comment'></div>招叔夜顽疏之累，负延之隘薄之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164013_comment'></div>徒以绂冕承家，绨缃励业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164013_comment'></div>捐繻待贵，妄跂于清芬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164013_comment'></div>束发从师，常希于善教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164013_comment'></div>第坚学冶，姑务亢宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164013_comment'></div>偶嗣圣之凝图，肇临轩而策秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164013_comment'></div>四门启籥，幽陋必甄，数路得人，庶良并进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164013_comment'></div>幸升名于贡牒，获较艺于宸庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164013_comment'></div>曾微掞藻之工，误中决科之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164013_comment'></div>乐士敢先于隗始，飞声辱在于卢前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164013_comment'></div>匠监为僚，侯封赞部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164013_comment'></div>自首公而赋政，常蠲瘼以疚怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164013_comment'></div>千室鸣弦，岂布中和之颂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164013_comment'></div>一官为集，坐隳述作之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164013_comment'></div>当奉计以言旋，遂遭忧而去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164013_comment'></div>负米百里，何追顾复之恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164013_comment'></div>泣血三年，绝念宠荣之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164013_comment'></div>见韠尽伤于栾棘，穷《诗》迨废于《蓼莪》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164013_comment'></div>圭籥易迁，衣冠倏变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164013_comment'></div>暨入趋于法座，获再齿于官曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164013_comment'></div>诚欲晦迹下流，宣劳外役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164013_comment'></div>决水冀苏于涸鲋，隐情屡诮于寒蝉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164013_comment'></div>是用妄缉芜编，轻尘乙览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164013_comment'></div>遽明缗于宰府，谐给札于尚方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164013_comment'></div>玉署沉严，鳌峰遽密，奉渊题而思轧，睇俄景以魂驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164013_comment'></div>赋乞一联，岂擅凌云之气；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164013_comment'></div>诗成三刻，难偕镂月之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164013_comment'></div>矧是蒙姿，复肩郡俊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164013_comment'></div>青钱万选，互振于英辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164013_comment'></div>硕鼠五能，空呈于短技。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164013_comment'></div>在遒妍之无取，诚报罢之是宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164013_comment'></div>岂其神造曲成，文衡协正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164013_comment'></div>谓铅刀骋利，足参赤菫之精；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164013_comment'></div>瓦缶扬音，或继黄钟之韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164013_comment'></div>故得容台命秩，册府登荣，司蕝野之盛仪，玩金縢之秘牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164013_comment'></div>虽文史足用，惭无曼倩之能；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164013_comment'></div>而英俊并游，窃效枚生之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164013_comment'></div>被旌收之不次，知题拂之有因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164013_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官粉泽帝谟，埙篪睿律，霈五潢之灵润，加一字之殊褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164013_comment'></div>铩羽将沈，亟假鹏霄之翼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164013_comment'></div>寒荄未变，潜回凤律之春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164013_comment'></div>是使幽踪，叨尘膴仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164013_comment'></div>敢不编摩勖志，忠荩存诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164013_comment'></div>循考父之益恭，究黄香之未见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164013_comment'></div>献奇文于东观，力慕前修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164013_comment'></div>抽灵匮于秘宫，更精博习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164013_comment'></div>上答高深之惠，次酬奖拔之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164013_comment'></div>过此以还，未知所措。</div><div id='poem_sentence_68_1164013_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　在开封，直集贤院时。韩琦作有《谢直集贤院启二》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_495904' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495904' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495904?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495904")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495904_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495904'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495904'>育德知何宅，逢辰或见灵。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495904'>配乾虽有象，作解本无形。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495904'>浃物周寰宇，遗功在杳冥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495904'>丹青如可状，试下叶公庭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495904_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495904'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495904_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　在开封，直集贤院时。韩琦作有《凤》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_495905' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495905' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495905?labeling=true' target='_blank'>凤</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495905")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495905_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495905'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495905'>破卵应难至，闻韶定有仪。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495905_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495905'>去同君子道，来协圣人期。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495905_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495905'>苑竹多成实，宫梧几换枝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495905_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495905'>何时天阁上，巢可俯而窥。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495905_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495905'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495905_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　在开封，直集贤院时。韩琦代兄韩琚作《转运贺冬启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164025' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164025' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164025?labeling=true' target='_blank'>转运贺冬启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164025")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164025_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164025'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164025'>右，某伏以魏亚岁朝，鲁书云物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164025_comment'></div>清台考杂候之课，瑞协珠躔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164025_comment'></div>黄钟推六气之元，温来凤律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164025_comment'></div>恭惟某官才谟秀博，风宇疏凝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164025_comment'></div>隆禁坐之眷惟，奉使台之经计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164025_comment'></div>懿纲尽举，徽绩弥光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164025_comment'></div>践长方戒于灵辰，席宠行跻于近著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164025_comment'></div>某猥居庆荫，僻守陋封，修府谒以尚辽，颂神釐之益固。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1164025_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　或在开封，直集贤院时。韩琦代兄韩琚作《洪州知府学士启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。此文为韩琦仁宗天圣末作，但具体作时不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1164026' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164026' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164026?labeling=true' target='_blank'>洪州知府学士启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164026")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164026_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164026'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164026'>右，某伏念恪职方州，摇旌府署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164026_comment'></div>顾休文之薄宦，几叹崎岖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164026_comment'></div>仰彦辅之高天，阻披澄澈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164026_comment'></div>屡更芳籥，阙贡单函。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164026_comment'></div>矧旷度之斯容，谅孱踪之未弃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164026_comment'></div>缅惟布宽书而有裕，畅和液以胥宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164026_comment'></div>恭以某官器宇闳深，机灵爽迈，荐斡流钱之利，聊专分虎之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164026_comment'></div>恢牧人御众之才，适蠲众瘼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164026_comment'></div>应开德宣符之曜，行副具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164026_comment'></div>某早序后陈，正遥卿荫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164026_comment'></div>怀风企德，空驰托素之诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164026_comment'></div>弹冠振衣，翘俟褒贤之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164026_comment'></div>更冀顺兹暄律，精保粹襟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1164026_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　在开封，直集贤院时。韩琦代兄韩琚作《安抚待制启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164030' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164030' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164030?labeling=true' target='_blank'>安抚待制启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164030")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164030_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164030'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164030'>右，某伏审某官高拥使轺，远绥淮服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164030_comment'></div>徇行风俗，究民瘼以咸蠲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164030_comment'></div>宣布诏书，迪宸恩而载厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164030_comment'></div>恭惟上副穆清之念，适居蒙犯之劳，粹韵敉宁，冲祺举集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164030_comment'></div>某猥分州任，僻介江壖，企云荫以非辽，卜郊迎而在迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164030_comment'></div>更祈俯顺时令，精调寐兴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1164030_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　在开封，直集贤院时。韩琦有《详议殿承启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164033' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164033' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164033?labeling=true' target='_blank'>详议殿丞启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1032年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164033")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164033_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164033'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164033'>右，某伏念属自禁坐抡才，接荀龙之懿躅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164033_comment'></div>侯封赞守，邈于驷之高闳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164033_comment'></div>拜风格之攸疏，郁心灵而第极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164033_comment'></div>官曹是系，客素罕凭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164033_comment'></div>重以谫薄之材，屯蹶尤甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164033_comment'></div>适及戍瓜之代，遽缠风木之悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164033_comment'></div>泣血未停，凋年已逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164033_comment'></div>仰计首公暇豫，味道粹宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164033_comment'></div>伏以某官志度渊英，才谟高正，早飞蕤于膴仕，亟腾逸于亨衢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164033_comment'></div>三尺持平，务究宽赊之法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164033_comment'></div>九清沛宠，行跻显近之班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164033_comment'></div>兼审状元学士乙奏尚方，试言平乐，陟仙瀛之秘局，簉蓬署之清资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164033_comment'></div>钱万选以驰声，式钦嘉遇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164033_comment'></div>弁一弹而乐用，弥积欢悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164033_comment'></div>尚阻披承，冀加颐卫。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1164033_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1032&endYear=1032')">1032年</a>　或在开封，直集贤院时。韩琦有《故尚书都官员外郎赠工部郎中杜公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164155' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164155' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164155?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故尚书都官员外郎赠工部郎中杜公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐三年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164155")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164155_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164155'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164155'>公讳起，字齐贤，其先京兆杜陵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164155_comment'></div>曾祖合，唐末徙家蜀郡成都县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164155_comment'></div>祖祚，皆以世乱不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164155_comment'></div>父崇，幼以文行称，值孟氏据蜀，耻就伪禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164155_comment'></div>乾德三年，太祖平两川，乃尽室来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164155_comment'></div>未几，以疾亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164155_comment'></div>公登朝，累赠尚书屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164155_comment'></div>公倜傥有大志，涉猎经史，好读《左氏春秋》，孙、吴兵书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164155_comment'></div>举进士，两上，不中第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164155_comment'></div>常谓人曰：「大丈夫当学文武之道，立大功以取贵仕，章句篆刻，不足为也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164155_comment'></div>景德初，契丹犯塞，真宗皇帝议亲征，将幸澶渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164155_comment'></div>公曰：「此吾时也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164155_comment'></div>乃携所著《御戎策》诣阙以献，大抵举汉唐制虏之失，以质当今之宜，且言契丹可屈之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164155_comment'></div>上览而奇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164155_comment'></div>翌日，以褐衣诏对便殿，公又面进十奇，陈河北用兵形势，上大嗟赏，将试以官，且问其欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164155_comment'></div>公以母老，寓居寿州之寿春县，愿便于就养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164155_comment'></div>于是特赐进士第，授寿春县主簿以荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164155_comment'></div>公至县，属岁大歉，乃出家财，犒亲旧，尽率其赢以哺饥者，为诸县倡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164155_comment'></div>旁邑豪闻风，始竞纳粟，民赖以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164155_comment'></div>郡守周公绛表称其能，自以为不及，公繇是益知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164155_comment'></div>再调越州山阴尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164155_comment'></div>满岁，补舒州望江令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164155_comment'></div>县之丁版，自李氏纳土五十年间，数登者增其赋，亡者不除籍，民甚苦之，而不敢诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164155_comment'></div>公以非国家意，悉蠲除之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164155_comment'></div>又以大水害民田，流殍者众，即发县廪以赈民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164155_comment'></div>既而白州，自劾其专，州将愧而不敢诘，远近称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164155_comment'></div>秩满，授静江军节度推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164155_comment'></div>丁太夫人梁氏忧去职，服除，用文静吕公夷简荐章，改秘书省著作佐郎、知蕲州蕲春县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164155_comment'></div>在县疏治坏塘，溉田数千顷，民感其惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164155_comment'></div>县有唐史君杜公生祠，乃图公像于庙而配食焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164155_comment'></div>今上即位，迁秘书丞，赐五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164155_comment'></div>寻以谋葬寿春，请换近邑，徙知濠州定远县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164155_comment'></div>俄转太常博士、通判兴元府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164155_comment'></div>代还，进秩尚书屯田员外郎、通判宿州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164155_comment'></div>尝与郡守因议事不相合，时章献皇后临朝，中贵人过郡，知而奏之，乃与郡守两得罪，公即授海州监税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164155_comment'></div>明道改元，以恩迁尚书都官员外郎、通判信州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164155_comment'></div>途次杭州，览湖山之胜，喜谓家人曰：「吾得终焉之所矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164155_comment'></div>亟上章请老，未报感疾，终于杭州之碧波亭，享年七十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164155_comment'></div>公素负器业，以功名自许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164155_comment'></div>当草泽赐对之辰，首乞复有唐识洞韬略等科以拔异材，后卒施用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164155_comment'></div>罢山阴，又上书言和戎之利，不可以恃而安也，愿益讲武备，为长辔远驭之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164155_comment'></div>会时方承平，不克伸其志，乃屈于郡县之治，故其善政遗爱及民者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164155_comment'></div>昔汉文叹李广之才，以为当高祖世，万户侯岂足道哉，其命也夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164155_comment'></div>公娶杨氏，故礼部尚书昭俭之孙，殿中丞正之女，累封永安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164155_comment'></div>事夫治家，动有法度，后公再月而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164155_comment'></div>子昉，博学能政，初叙公致政恩补郊社斋郎，今为太子中舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164155_comment'></div>女三人：长适进士穆震；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164155_comment'></div>次适左侍禁、閤门祗候王中立；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164155_comment'></div>次适屯田员外郎于房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164155_comment'></div>孙五人：曰伟，中进士乙科，泉州清溪县尉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164155_comment'></div>曰仪，郊社斋郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164155_comment'></div>曰僎、曰伾、曰偕，悉举进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164155_comment'></div>中舍君登朝，赠公工部郎中，夫人追封天水县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164155_comment'></div>皇祐三年八月六日，中舍君自杭举公与夫人之丧归寿州，以十一月二十五日葬于寿春县仙乡张直村，从先屯田之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164155_comment'></div>葬之前，中舍君具述先烈，请铭其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164155_comment'></div>予以友婿之分，义不可让，乃为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_55_1164155'>呜呼杜公，何材业之备兮，位则不充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164155_comment'></div>岂所蕴者大兮，不时之逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164155_comment'></div>著其事于官政兮，挹循吏之高风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164155_comment'></div>有子克家兮，命则考终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164155_comment'></div>庆流厥后兮，与休声而曷穷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_59_1164155_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　在开封，直集贤院时。韩琦有《楚州知郡都官启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。《安阳集编年笺注》有《楚州知郡都官启》同题文二篇，此为其中一篇，首句为“某伏念窃吹书山”此文为仁宗明道间韩琦直集贤院时作，但具体作时不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1164047' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164047' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164047?labeling=true' target='_blank'>楚州知郡都官启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164047")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164047_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164047'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164047'>右，某伏念窃吹书山，日甚空疏之诮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164047_comment'></div>摇旌郡阁，坐违英绚之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164047_comment'></div>矧惟兰玉之亲，仍缔葭莩之援，驰诚仅阙，负刺弥兢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164047_comment'></div>恭惟观省民风，敦明治体，当砥节首公之暇，得餐和履顺之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164047_comment'></div>伏以某官性行淑均，才谟高正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164047_comment'></div>应积星之上列，持分虎之要权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164047_comment'></div>熊轼班春，已洽爱棠之咏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164047_comment'></div>凤书申宠，行膺用板之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164047_comment'></div>更祈顺韶律之惟和，迪粹襟而自重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164047_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年6月</a>　六月，韩琦监左藏库。众以为非宜，韩琦持之自若，不以为卑。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年10月</a>　韩琦鉴于左藏库出纳混乱，奏请恢复天禧旧制，设专置传宣合同一司，官物凭合同支领。旧有监称内臣一员，因失职，奏请罢去其职。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年10月</a>　在开封，监左藏库。十月，韩琦有《内臣支取库物乞仍用合同凭由奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。此文为仁宗明道间韩琦直集贤院时作，但具体作时不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163876' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163876' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163876?labeling=true' target='_blank'>内臣支取库物乞仍用合同凭由奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（明道二年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163876")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163876_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163876'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163876'>天禧中，入内内侍省置合同凭由司，凡传宣取库物，令内臣自赍合同凭由送逐处已，乃缴奏下三司出破帖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163876_comment'></div>今内臣皆先以白劄子传宣，而后降合同，其间或称禁中对换物色，及支外以馀物还库，恐有妄伪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163876_comment'></div>请自今非降合同，毋得支。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163876_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　韩琦奏请蠲免灾伤州郡所供物帛不足之额。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　在开封，监左藏库。韩琦有《代张若谷密学谢启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164019' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164019' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164019?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代张若谷密学谢启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164019")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164019_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164019'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164019'>右，某启：伏奉制命<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164019_comment'></div>禁坐推恩，曲加于散质；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164019_comment'></div>枢廷寓直，骤玷于荣资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164019_comment'></div>荷宠典之载优，抚孱躯而自愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164019_comment'></div>窃以国家顺稽古道，仰宪先猷，必登用于瑰才，俾雍容于近列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164019_comment'></div>谅匪行能纯正，业履清修，富帷幄之高谋，蕴天人之妙识，则曷以扬蕤膴仕，注意严宸，参夙夜宥密之微，预朝夕论思之末？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164019_comment'></div>苟从虚授，宜恤群言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164019_comment'></div>如某者，学昧经纶，气非宏拔，偃革幸丁于休运，飞緌久冒于清涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164019_comment'></div>平子佐时，安明于远略；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164019_comment'></div>世英补过，粗罄于勤诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164019_comment'></div>拙效自伸，殊闻莫著，屡副百城之寄，继持八使之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164019_comment'></div>贤知惠民，固乏野王之咏，澄清揽辔，徒希孟博之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164019_comment'></div>何旒扆之念庸，复江淮之领漕，未丰年蓄，俄贰计庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164019_comment'></div>析毫无言事之功，发刃寡投虚之利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164019_comment'></div>旋分汉竹，出守并门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164019_comment'></div>俯塞堠以开疆，控股肱而作镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164019_comment'></div>布中和之颂，但乐于熙朝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164019_comment'></div>宣爱利之经，宁蠲于众瘼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164019_comment'></div>暨终岁课，获觐宸闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164019_comment'></div>奉三尺以评刑，方遵审谨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164019_comment'></div>赞万机而补职，遽荷甄升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164019_comment'></div>遂得密侍清光，峻跻显著，接武瀛仙之品，耸观闺彦之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164019_comment'></div>内省寅缘，实资甄奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164019_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官阐隆萧画，翊辅尧仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164019_comment'></div>寒谷成暄，咸均于煦妪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164019_comment'></div>大钧播物，毕遂于蕃滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164019_comment'></div>是令平进之流，亦被殊常之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164019_comment'></div>敢不虔修国检，恪奉官箴，顺《礼》文造膝之规，谨《易》道失身之诫，上答云天之造，次酬槐鼎之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164019_comment'></div>过此以还，未知所措。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1164019_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　在开封，监左藏库。韩琦代兄韩琚作《中丞启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164024' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164024' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164024?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中丞启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164024")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164024_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164024'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164024'>右，某自审光膺节召，入觐帝晖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164024_comment'></div>三独坐之持纲，允归素望；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164024_comment'></div>七诤臣之命秩，骈集茂恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164024_comment'></div>顾惟滞涸之踪，适困沉迷之务，寻疏奏记，但颂得贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164024_comment'></div>恭惟执邦宪以不回，辑天祺而载厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164024_comment'></div>伏以某官材推栋干，德重缙绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164024_comment'></div>负经世之沉谋，对弥文之景运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164024_comment'></div>而自首居隽选，高视贵涂，益注意于凝严，荐奋庸于中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164024_comment'></div>尚抑燮调之任，方居弹击之司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164024_comment'></div>蹇蹇王臣，式著匪躬之节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164024_comment'></div>赫赫师尹，伫符维石之瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164024_comment'></div>内揆单平，永希甄育。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1164024_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　在开封，监左藏库。韩琦代兄韩琚作《昭文相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。《安阳集编年笺注》有《昭文相公启》同题文二篇，此为其中一篇，首句为“某伏念某僻分封宇”）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　在开封，监左藏库。韩琦代兄韩琚作《集贤相公启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。《安阳集编年笺注》有《集贤相公启》同题文二篇，此为其中一篇，首句为“伏念某邈守淮藩”）</span><div id='poem_1164028' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164028' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164028?labeling=true' target='_blank'>集贤相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164028")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164028_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164028'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164028'>右，某启：伏念某邈守淮藩，坐移春律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164028_comment'></div>旷时修问，盖惧渎尊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164028_comment'></div>以日倾心，徒知荫德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164028_comment'></div>仰计弼成天下之务，勤宣堂上之谋，中外以安，福嘏增厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164028_comment'></div>恭惟某官以文武之材臻世治，以公辅之量镇时风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164028_comment'></div>一人倚为股肱，四海望为霖雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164028_comment'></div>唯均调于寝膳，以保乂于邦家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164028_comment'></div>祷颂之诚，倍百常品。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1164028_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　在开封，监左藏库。韩琦代兄韩琚作《学士启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164029' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164029' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164029?labeling=true' target='_blank'>学士启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164029")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164029_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164029'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164029'>右，某伏念典城攸系，荫宇尚赊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164029_comment'></div>登元礼之门，早承于容接；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164029_comment'></div>阅公干之簿，方叹于沉迷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164029_comment'></div>久疏托素之仪，第积怀风之想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164029_comment'></div>仰计燕居多裕，雅履敦和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164029_comment'></div>伏以某官志度渊英，器怀沉密，袭充闾之善庆，腾历块之修涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164029_comment'></div>䌷石室之文，方凝懿效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164029_comment'></div>沛枫宸之宠，行践贵阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164029_comment'></div>更祈顺春籥之载暄，保神襟而自重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164029_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　在开封，监左藏库。韩琦代兄韩琚作《鄂州知郡郎中启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164031' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164031' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164031?labeling=true' target='_blank'>鄂州知郡郎中启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164031")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164031_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164031'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164031'>右，某伏念匪遥英范，熟听休声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164031_comment'></div>公干之簿沉迷，适嗟堆案；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164031_comment'></div>彦辅之天澄澈，莫遂披云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164031_comment'></div>岂谓猥沐降慈，荐贻芳讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164031_comment'></div>认逊勤之载厚，实兢佩以徒深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164031_comment'></div>恭惟树风爱以弥敦，固祺祥而协茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164031_comment'></div>伏以某官才谋博赡，韵宇疏凝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164031_comment'></div>枫宸夙厚于眷怀，竹使聊膺于寄任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164031_comment'></div>布六条而问俗，已浃殊闻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164031_comment'></div>走三节以奉朝，行跻近列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164031_comment'></div>顾韶妍之向慕，接谈对以尚赊，倍冀珍颐，式符虔颂。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1164031_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　在开封，监左藏库。韩琦有《明州同判屯田启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164043' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164043' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164043?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明州同判屯田启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164043")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164043_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164043'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164043'>右，某启：伏自栾棘馀生，再尘于仕籍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164043_comment'></div>菁莪善育，猥厕于英游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164043_comment'></div>顾亥豕之未分，复管库之为役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164043_comment'></div>神标邈尔，俗状纷然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164043_comment'></div>欲一致缄縢，少导悃臆，其如休直相半，出纳互繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164043_comment'></div>陈孟公之口占，胡能有意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164043_comment'></div>陶士衡之言答，岂逮如流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164043_comment'></div>矧通恕之可详，匪怠骜之加责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164043_comment'></div>恭惟中和举职，爱利及民，当九夏歊炎之辰，辑五福康宁之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164043_comment'></div>伏以某官天才开敏，气宇疏明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164043_comment'></div>暂关掌于郡条，已著闻于风迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164043_comment'></div>庖硎载发，适彰投刃之功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164043_comment'></div>汉席方虚，弥渴受釐之对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164043_comment'></div>即膺迅召，入簉近班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164043_comment'></div>川涂阻长，圭籥迁贸，首公之外，缮性是宜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1164043_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　在开封，监左藏库。韩琦有《状元正言学士启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。此文为仁宗明道二年至景祐初韩琦监左藏库时作，但具体作时不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1164046' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164046' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164046?labeling=true' target='_blank'>状元正言学士启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1033年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164046")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164046_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164046'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164046'>右，某伏念自审某官陟岵缠悲，弃官行服，怅便风之寂尔，奉慰削以阙如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164046_comment'></div>复以守藏所縻，继日鲜暇，望神标而夐越，走俗状以空疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164046_comment'></div>虽欲一致缄縢，少导悃臆，其如筦库之任，米盐甚繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164046_comment'></div>窘于五木之拘，涸若百亟之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164046_comment'></div>谅宽明之可悉，匪大骜以见尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164046_comment'></div>恭惟春律布和，家居鲜味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164046_comment'></div>虽孝思之罔极，在礼典之不踰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164046_comment'></div>伫见隙驷终祥，诏凤申渥，入践雍容之列，峻升清切之司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164046_comment'></div>川涂阻长，圭籥迁逝，善为开抑，勉自保颐。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1164046'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164046_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1033&endYear=1033')">1033年</a>　在开封，监左藏库。韩琦有《中外臣僚多干求内降挠政奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。此文为仁宗明道间韩琦直集贤院时作，但具体作时不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163878' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163878' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163878?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中外臣僚多干求内降挠政奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（明道三年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163878")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163878_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163878'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163878'>臣窃以国家祖宗以来，躬决万务，凡于赏罚任使，必与两地大臣于外朝公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163878_comment'></div>或有内中批旨，皆是出于宸衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163878_comment'></div>只在庄献明肃太后垂帘之日，遂有奔竞之辈，货赂公行，假托皇亲，因缘女谒，或于内中下表，或只口为奏求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163878_comment'></div>是致侥倖日滋，赏罚倒置，法律不能惩有罪，爵禄无以劝立功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163878_comment'></div>唐之斜封，今之内降，蠹坏纲纪，为害至深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163878_comment'></div>陛下圣德日新，厉精为治，惟此久弊，沿而未除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163878_comment'></div>愿降诏谕戒饬，及出干请者姓名，付有司治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163878_comment'></div>又闻文臣中近有进状乞充三司副使，及武臣内亦甚有进状乞加遥郡或横行使额之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163878_comment'></div>缘此任使，并是国家要近之职，必须稽合公议，选于圣衷，固非臣僚自可陈乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163878_comment'></div>此后辄上章妄求选任者，乞重置于法。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1163878_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年9月</a>　九月，韩琦徙开封府推官。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年</a>　韩琦奏请严禁陈留等七县月遣人诣禁地扰民。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年</a>　韩琦奏请蠲免灾伤诸县马食草。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年</a>　韩琦勤于理事，受开封府尹王博文赞赏器重。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1034&endYear=1034')">1034年</a>　在开封，或为开封府推官。韩琦有《相州知府学士启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。此文为韩琦仁宗景祐初作，但具体作时不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1164044' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164044' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164044?labeling=true' target='_blank'>相州知府学士启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1034年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", id='poem_sentence_1_1164044_comment'></div>歌襦载路，谅洽于民欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164044_comment'></div>仰惟化醇俗以惟和，辑纯禧而益厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164044_comment'></div>伏以某官才谋自任，强济有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164044_comment'></div>荐总要权，居成懿效。<div class='inline' href='/Writing/1163941?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞禁止遣人于陈留七县巡捕奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（景祐元年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_1163941_comment'></div>岂容奸吏，未革侵牟？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163941_comment'></div>愿申严禁止之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163941_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年</a>　在开封，为开封府推官。秋，韩琦有《代开封知府诸庙谢雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164193' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164193' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164193?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代开封知府诸庙谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1035年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164193")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164193_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164193'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164193'>维某年某月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于某神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164193_comment'></div>粤自凉秋以来，嘉澍未洽，惟宸衷之在念，顾穑事以为虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164193_comment'></div>式是灵祠，奠兹神壤，奉吉蠲而致祷，冀聪直以垂休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164193_comment'></div>而神上符宵旰之怀，下慰编齐之望，会风期于少女，驱云族于太山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164193_comment'></div>曾未崇朝，遽均和泽，壤父辍耕而相贺，祠官沾服以言旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164193_comment'></div>济旱岁以作霖，毕苏民瘵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164193_comment'></div>兆丰年而为瑞，协助圣猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164193_comment'></div>爰被诏于发中，俾涓辰而报贶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164193_comment'></div>用陈馨荐，祗答蕃釐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164193_comment'></div>谅精意之攸歆，固嘉应之斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164193_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1164193_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1035&endYear=1035')">1035年12月</a>　十二月，韩琦迁度支判官，授太常博士。奏请在京与在外丁忧至服阕月俸给见钱相同。<br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_title_1163688' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163688?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代三司谢赐内藏库绸绢表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1036年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span
