id='poem_content_495941'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495941'>脂辖行伤早，扬旌兴莫穷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495941'>水遥天色共，云细月波通。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495941'>巧舌争啼晓，香牙尽入风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495941'>纵吟殊未已，初旭放晴红。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495941_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_495942' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495942' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495942?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寒食</a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495942")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495942_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495942'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495942'>汉宫新蜡未开烟，寒食东郊跃骏天。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495942'>人面映花谁感事，客心燃火独成篇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495942'>塞鸿归渚遥书字，营柳因风强破眠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495942'>赖有目前随分景，数村如树起鞦韆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495942_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495942'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495942_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='5ef4fccc72954e1c991f1b37ed15aac5_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年</a>，31岁</div><div id='5ef4fccc72954e1c991f1b37ed15aac5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年</a>　为右司谏。韩琦作有《途中暑热忆诸同舍》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四。此诗为“接伴途中”作。）</span><div id='poem_495944' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495944' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495944?labeling=true' target='_blank'>途中暑热忆诸同舍</a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495944")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495944_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495944'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495944'>振野惊风拂面尘，赫曦流烁犯征轮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495944'>酒非逃暑虚成会，花未忘忧谩映人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495944'>绿水已伤春别旧，碧云长起暮愁新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495944'>朝来记得瀛洲梦，目断英游极怆神。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495944_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495944'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495944_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年</a>　为右司谏。韩琦作有《闻角》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四。此诗为“接伴途中”作。）</span><div id='poem_495945' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495945' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495945?labeling=true' target='_blank'>闻角</a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495945")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495945_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495945'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495945'>古堞连云暝霭收，呜呜清调起边楼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495945'>雍琴垂泪虚情恨，羌笛残梅未胜愁。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495945'>数曲伴风吹戍垒，几番侵梦入宾邮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495945'>听来便觉春心破，素发生多不待秋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495945_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495945'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495945_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年5月</a>　在开封，为右司谏。五月，韩琦有《冗费宜节奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163886' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163886' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163886?labeling=true' target='_blank'>冗费宜节奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元元年五月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163886")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163886_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163886'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163886'>臣准敕以御史王素上言，乞依贾昌朝所奏，取景德至景祐年凡百用度，靡有巨细，较计所出之数，省罢不急等事，蒙差张若谷、任中师并臣与三司同共详所奏，定夺减省闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163886_comment'></div>窃以臣先监左藏库日，朝廷亦曾差官与三司，令将咸平、景德、天圣、景祐年支费比附，其时三司已检寻天圣已前帐案不足，遂下在京诸司库务差人监勒检寻，亦是多不存在，甚为搔扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163886_comment'></div>臣辄上言，若检前项年分帐案得全，比附见今来支费数多，朝廷若不节用，乃是徒摭空文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163886_comment'></div>或勘会近年帐案，但见得冗费，即行减罢，亦不须见远年文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163886_comment'></div>蒙下三司检寻，终不齐足，只将近年帐案勘会，绝结了当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163886_comment'></div>今陛下崇恭俭之本，沛然垂诏，以经费有度，复议均节，斯乃陛下兴化致理、爱养元元之深意也，天下黎民实蒙惠福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163886_comment'></div>若又须将景德至景祐年逐月用度较计，必是依前虚有劳费，淹滞无成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163886_comment'></div>况今西鄙设备，聚财实边之费，所宜移兹冗用，以助兵须，岂可迁延岁时，不求速效？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163886_comment'></div>臣欲乞将三司逐案景德年后来帐籍及照證文字勘会，不必年分整齐，但见得官中支用显有虚费，即定夺减省闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163886_comment'></div>臣伏睹古先哲王兴俭以劝天下，必以身先，而后臣庶省分，有司率职，从上之令，犹风靡而响应之也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163886_comment'></div>虽有侥倖觊觎之徒，抑制其欲，亦不敢兴造怨语，动惑众心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163886_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163886_comment'></div>上躬行而下之所劝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163886_comment'></div>臣愚欲望陛下饬宫掖之间先务节俭，凡奢靡之饰，奇巧之玩，无名之赐，无度取索，一切罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163886_comment'></div>仍诏三司与臣等计会入内内侍省、御药院、内东门司，取先朝及今来赐予支费则例比附，酌中定夺减省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163886_comment'></div>臣等定夺之后，或有飞语流谤，断在宸衷，屏而不听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163886_comment'></div>如此则县官之用，可期充足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163886_comment'></div>且内藏、宣圣、景福等殿库，盖累蓄聚，以备非常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163886_comment'></div>今或外用既节，而不绝内帑支取，即与外库供亿縻费一同，亦望陛下深思祖宗经久之制，更务谨节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163886_comment'></div>臣又以出纳之用，各有攸司，冗费之弊，必能知悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163886_comment'></div>仍乞特降敕命下三司，委诸路转运副使、发运司，逐处知州、通判，在京诸司库务管当官员，除官吏、兵马请给则例，自来已有定制，不在起请外，如有诸般用度显有虚费，可以省减者，即具利害擘划闻奏，降下依敕定夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163886_comment'></div>三司人吏有所见，亦听经三司具状陈述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163886_comment'></div>如显然大段减省得官中钱物，其起请官吏即乞特行酬奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163886_comment'></div>臣备员谏列，误被圣选，不避众怨，罄竭上陈，唯冀裁择，早赐进用。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1163886_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年5月</a>　在开封，为右司谏。五月，韩琦有《销金定罪乞用祥符旧敕奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163957' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163957' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163957?labeling=true' target='_blank'>销金定罪乞用祥符旧敕奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元元年五月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163957")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163957_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163957'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163957'>大中祥符八年敕，犯销金者斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163957_comment'></div>比下诏申警，其捕获者固宜准敕从事，而审刑院创意定罪，止徒三年，恐坏先朝之法，启奢潜之渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163957_comment'></div>请复用祥符旧敕。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163957_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年6月</a>　在开封，为右司谏。六月，韩琦有《乞追寝葛怀敏莱州团练使奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163958' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163958' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163958?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞追寝葛怀敏莱州团练使奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元元年六月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163958")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163958_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163958'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163958'>怀敏在武臣流辈，虽粗有才干，却未尝别著劳效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163958_comment'></div>朝廷名器，理须爱重，若臣僚能显立边功，未知何以奖劝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163958_comment'></div>欲望特行追寝，以正滥赏之失。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163958_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年8月</a>　在开封，为右司谏。八月，韩琦有《乞急遣高继嵩还边奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163883' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163883' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163883?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞急遣高继嵩还边奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元元年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163883")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163883_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163883'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163883'>继嵩知环州，因军人得遗箭，系以匿名文字，言继嵩将叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163883_comment'></div>继嵩心不自安，遂乞还朝，乃差充国信副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163883_comment'></div>臣察其事之伪者有二，辨其惑者有一：继嵩久在西边，颇以勇敢闻，或为西贼所恶，设反间而去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163883_comment'></div>不然，则驭下严，而为戍卒巧计以中之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163883_comment'></div>此其伪可察二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163883_comment'></div>且继嵩背义投诚，元昊忠于朝廷，则当密奏其事，何必以遗箭达其叛状乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163883_comment'></div>此又其惑可辨一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163883_comment'></div>臣愚以谓宜急遣继嵩还边，其元告匿名文字，亦请论罪如律，外以杜黠贼行间之谋，内以破堕兵诡中之计，次坚继嵩用命之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163883_comment'></div>使边郡闻之，孰不畏朝廷之明，而厉忠义之怀乎？</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163883_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年</a>　在开封，为右司谏。韩琦有《论石龟奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163902' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163902' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163902?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论石龟奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163902")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163902_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163902'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163902'>臣闻通利军奏，卫县民得石龟一，其上镌刻谶文，略云：「道士赵永昌于显庆元年镌记，后至三百六十五年出现时，有圣君治世，皇后刘氏合有圣子绍位」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163902_comment'></div>观其文字鄙俗，固不能上惑天听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163902_comment'></div>臣窃计唐高宗显庆元年至国朝天禧四年，方及三百六十五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163902_comment'></div>盖是当年造伪人妄求恩倖，有此刊刻，后恐事迹彰败，是故隐而不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163902_comment'></div>至今又经一十八年，方为县民所获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163902_comment'></div>即于谶文，自已乖谬，陛下至明至圣，固已洞鉴其妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163902_comment'></div>即缘却降下本处军资库收附，乃是未详真伪，犹示秘藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163902_comment'></div>臣恐中外闻知，有以来欺诈之渐，欲乞特降圣旨下本军，令知军当面毁弃讫奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163902_comment'></div>所贵伪端不起，群听无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163902_comment'></div>臣以其事虽小，而于体大，故敢上言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1163902_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年</a>　在开封，为右司谏。韩琦有《乞择辅弼奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163879' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163879' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163879?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞择辅弼奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163879")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163879_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163879'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163879'>岂陛下择辅弼未得其人邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163879_comment'></div>若杜衍、范仲淹、孔道辅、宋祁、胥偃，众以为忠正之臣，可备进擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163879_comment'></div>不然，尝所用者王曾、吕夷简、蔡齐、宋绶，亦人所属望，何不图任也？</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163879_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年</a>　在开封，为右司谏。韩琦有《乞许边臣过阙朝见奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163887' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163887' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163887?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞许边臣过阙朝见奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163887")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163887_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163887'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163887'>臣窃见朝廷近来每于外任就移臣寮往沿边委寄任使，内有路由京师经过者，多是陈乞朝见，例各不蒙允许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163887_comment'></div>岂非朝廷以乞朝见者，只是欲陈乞恩泽，希求锡赐，遂一例不允其请，只令将所见入递以闻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163887_comment'></div>臣窃以臣寮久在外任，必有素蕴，冀得一望清光，开陈本末，理既周尽，事必易行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163887_comment'></div>陛下若因而勉之，责其效命，则必挺身忘死，思有以报陛下宠遇之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163887_comment'></div>若或别有陈乞，亦在朝廷详其可否，必不容其侥倖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163887_comment'></div>况今西陲设备之际，以此移赴边任臣寮，自当诏令入对，慰而遣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163887_comment'></div>岂有边臣到阙，不面天颜，使其自陈，犹行沮遏？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163887_comment'></div>甚非国家抚御将帅之术也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163887_comment'></div>臣欲今后就移边任委寄臣寮，因经过到京乞朝见者，并赐恩许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163887_comment'></div>若因此妄有陈乞，即系在朝廷，断在不行，岂可防小故而失于大体？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163887_comment'></div>臣兼闻见有新差知渭州张亢经过到京，累状陈乞朝见，未见俞旨，亦望特赐允可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163887_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年</a>　在开封，为右司谏。韩琦有《魏国夫人丧葬事奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163884' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163884' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163884?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏国夫人丧葬事奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163884")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163884_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163884'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163884'>臣昨奉使还阙，窃闻朝廷自西事以来，两次非时就宅宣召两府臣僚，在外不测事宜，人情惊骇，当时物议以谓有失持重之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163884_comment'></div>近日复知西京，谣言虚惊，烦于止遏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163884_comment'></div>昨日午后，又闻就宅宣两府臣寮入内，搢绅士庶无不忧惑，至晚方知只是魏国夫人薨谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163884_comment'></div>陛下虽隆乳母之爱，其如在礼止为缌麻三月之服，若言乎亲则非近也，若言乎尊则不崇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163884_comment'></div>此止可一中人传诏于宰臣之第，令议而奏之，何必遍宣近辅，震恐都人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163884_comment'></div>事往不追，后当为戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163884_comment'></div>臣欲望每有国家体大之议，边鄙机宜之急，合与两府臣寮商量处置者，务从审密，以安人心，不宜仓卒，以动群听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163884_comment'></div>臣又以送终之厚，前载所非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163884_comment'></div>今魏国夫人于陛下亲服既疏，葬礼亦当简俭，望陛下勿听左右张皇，过为奢侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163884_comment'></div>况国家西鄙设备，兵须未丰，正宜节用聚财之秋，不可更为无益之费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163884_comment'></div>言或可采，幸赐纳用。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163884_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年</a>　在开封，为右司谏。韩琦有《论频有灾异乞直降御札不受徽号奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163959' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163959' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163959?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论频有灾异乞直降御札不受徽号奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163959")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163959_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163959'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163959'>臣窃以陛下至德合天地，至仁越尧舜，虽徽号累百，亦无得而称焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163959_comment'></div>盖以三载一郊、陛下报本之际，臣子之心无以归美君上，故恭荐盛名，以达惓惓之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163959_comment'></div>缘近年以来，天地之变比比而发，陛下亦尝虚怀以来谠言，平刑以降罪戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163959_comment'></div>今者圆丘展祀，所宜责躬引咎，仰答天戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163959_comment'></div>其所加尊号，欲望不赐恩可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163959_comment'></div>如陛下已有圣意谦逊不从，莫若直降御札申谕宰庭，具述宸衷，使断来表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163959_comment'></div>若候章表五上，方示推拒，此乃从来俞允之例，似未协宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163959_comment'></div>此事动干典策，望圣明熟虑之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1163959_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年8月</a>　八月，韩琦以太常少卿、昭文馆直学士身份，充北朝正旦国信使。为国信副使高继嵩辩诬。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='8471a65681ac4675aa7c6c25f92ada6a_label'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>，32岁</div><div id='8471a65681ac4675aa7c6c25f92ada6a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年3月</a>　在开封，为右司谏。三月，韩琦有《乞国信及接伴使副委中书枢密选择奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163960' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163960' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163960?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞国信及接伴使副委中书枢密选择奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元二年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163960")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163960_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163960'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163960'>乞自今差国信及接伴使副，委中书、枢密选择进名，若有臣僚辄敢陈乞，望赐严断。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1163960_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年5月</a>　五月，韩琦受诏与张若谷、任中师同三司详定省罢不急。韩琦据当下实际提出省罢建议，而非依循旧例。其建议从故将相戚里及权近之家始，从宫掖之入内内侍省、御药院、内东门司始。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　韩琦奏请为解盐禁榷地，取其最长利者，议为经久之制，被朝廷采纳。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年6月</a>　在开封，为右司谏。六月，韩琦有《乞差官相度开封界盐法奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163961' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163961' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163961?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞差官相度开封府界盐法奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元二年六月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163961")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163961_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163961'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163961'>开封府界三十一处解盐禁榷地分，乞差近臣三两员，将通商、未通商新旧二法取其利最博者，以为经久之制。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1163961_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年7月</a>　七月，授韩琦起居舍人、知谏院。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年7月</a>　在开封，知谏院。韩琦有《授起居舍人自代状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163790' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163790' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163790?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授起居舍人举官自代状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163790")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163790_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163790'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163790'>右，臣伏见右正言、直集贤院吴育，学富识精，行醇德茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163790_comment'></div>陈三道之要，早膺举首之擢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163790_comment'></div>预七人之联，益见匪躬之操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163790_comment'></div>惟左右置史之重，有言动必书之法，须才而任，在选宜艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163790_comment'></div>内度己能，诚知于不逮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163790_comment'></div>外稽公议，必谓于当仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163790_comment'></div>愿回误恩，以进良士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163790_comment'></div>臣今举充自代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163790_comment'></div>干冒旒扆，</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163790_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　或在开封，知谏院。韩琦有《代中书谢岁节御筵状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。此文为韩琦景祐末至宝元初，但具体作时不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163792' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163792' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163792?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代中书谢岁节御筵状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163792")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163792_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163792'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163792'>右，臣等伏蒙圣慈<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163792_comment'></div>履岁元之序，方纳于春祺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163792_comment'></div>乘机务之闲，俄颁于宴宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163792_comment'></div>调饪曷裨于宸化，肆筵姑预于朝欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163792_comment'></div>此盖幸遇皇帝陛下恭己凝图，协时布度，庶官乐职，群物遂生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163792_comment'></div>赞阳之令惟行，湛露之恩遽及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163792_comment'></div>迩联胥集，顿光蓬荜之居；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163792_comment'></div>圣泽载滂，益荷云天之施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163792_comment'></div>唯誓倾输之报，仰酬临照之私。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163792_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　韩琦集右司谏三年所存谏稿七十余章，为三卷，名为《谏垣存稿》。自序于首，主旨为“谏主以理胜，而以至诚将之”<div id='poem_1164103' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164103' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164103?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谏垣存稿序<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历二年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164103")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164103_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164103'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164103'>夫善谏者，无讽也，无显也，主于理胜而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164103_comment'></div>故主于讽者必优柔微婉，广引譬喻，冀吾说之可行，而不知事不明辨，则忽而不听也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164103_comment'></div>主于显者，必暴扬激讦，恐以危亡，谓吾言之能动，而不知论或过当，则怒而不信也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164103_comment'></div>夫欲说而必听，言而必信，苟不以理胜之为主，难矣哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164103_comment'></div>某景祐中任三司度支判官，以族贫求外补，得舒州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164103_comment'></div>将行，而上以谏官缺，擢授右司谏而留之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164103_comment'></div>窃惟言责之重，非面折廷争之难，盖知体得宜为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164103_comment'></div>夫得通明端朴，高识博学之士，则动必中礼，日益君听；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164103_comment'></div>而使愚不肖者冒而处之，固不胜其任矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164103_comment'></div>遂两上章辞，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164103_comment'></div>乃喟然自谓曰：上之知汝任汝之意厚矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164103_comment'></div>汝之所言，当顾体酌宜，主于理胜，而以至诚将之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164103_comment'></div>兹所以报陛下而知任之之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164103_comment'></div>若知时之不可行，而徒为高论，以卖直取名，汝罪不容诛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164103_comment'></div>在职越三载，凡明得失、正纪纲、辨忠良、击权倖，时人所不敢言，必昧死论列之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164103_comment'></div>上宽而可其奏者十八九，卒免重戮，进登掖垣，实前日为诫之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164103_comment'></div>其所存稿，欲歛而焚之，以效古人谨密之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164103_comment'></div>然念诗书所载，从谏而圣，君之德也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164103_comment'></div>衮阙而补，臣之忠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164103_comment'></div>前代谏诤之臣，嘉言谠议，布在方册，使览之者知人主从善之美，致治之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164103_comment'></div>若皆削而燔之，则后世何法焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164103_comment'></div>于是存而录之，离为上、中、下三卷，命曰《谏垣存稿》，以藏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164103_comment'></div>窃志夫上之聪仁大度，自三代汉唐以来虚怀纳谏、甚盛德之主，皆所不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164103_comment'></div>复俾子孙传而阅之，知直道之无咎，忠教之有迹云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164103_comment'></div>时庆历二年三月十五日，秦亭西斋序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1164103_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，知谏院。韩琦有《次韵和子渊学士春雨》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_495908' class='_poem'><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495915'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495915'>陌闲宫古绿烟迷，惹尽春愁困拂堤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495915_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495915'>却为多情足离恨，故教沟水亦东西。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495915_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495915'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495915_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_495916' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495916' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495916?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_495916_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495916'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495916'>章街风晓起新眠，寒食轻阴未雨天。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495916_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495916'>无限青丝拂游骑，一生芳意负金鞭。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495916_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495916'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495916_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_495917' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495917' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495917?labeling=true' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495917'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495917'>淡烟<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_495917", 495917, id='poem_sentence_1_495918_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495918'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495918_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，知谏院。韩琦有《三朝圣政录序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164107' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164107' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164107?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三朝圣政录序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164107")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164107_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164107'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164107'>夫监之无愆者，先王之成宪也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164107_comment'></div>前之不忘者，后事之元龟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164107_comment'></div>昔周、汉守文之君，皆能谨行祖考之道，故神保其治，而民安其法，「闵予」之诗，「宁一」之歌，繇是而作也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164107_comment'></div>洪惟有宋之受命也，易五代之弊，规万世之策，海内休息，不睹兵革之患者，几八十年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164107_comment'></div>是盖太祖、太宗、真宗，神武之所戡定，文德之所安辑，以继以承，时用光大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164107_comment'></div>若其君人之远体，为邦之善训，固已存诸史氏之载，悉于故老之谈，宜乎开助后圣，而垂之无穷已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164107_comment'></div>权嘉州判官石介，宦学有立，志切忠义，感唐臣吴兢所撰《贞观政要》，乃谓昔之曰圣曰治之主，不世而出，顾未若我三后之绍隆谟烈之无前者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164107_comment'></div>皇帝陛下天授仁哲，孝而善继，不假远稽上古之术，以期至化，自可履祖宗之圣迹，以兴太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164107_comment'></div>然国谋之系，以万机之览，则浩而难究；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164107_comment'></div>君务之众，以一事之明，则推之寖广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164107_comment'></div>遂采记三朝以来行事见闻最详者，类而次之，为二十门，目曰《三朝圣政录》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164107_comment'></div>每篇之末，又自为之赞，以申讽谕之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164107_comment'></div>夫古人有负暄美芹，犹思自献于上，何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164107_comment'></div>己之所奉者薄，而心之所向者大也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164107_comment'></div>今介是举也，上以述列圣之美，次以达一人之听，其于奉上爱君之心，诚亦厚且大矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164107_comment'></div>唯圣主日置左右，留神观采，守此昭范，勤于奉行，以举乎政纲，以昌乎积累之丕绪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1164107_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1164107'><span class='label'>按：</span>阙文。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1164107_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年8月</a>　在开封，知谏院。八月，韩琦有《皇子诞庆五言十二韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_495958' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495958' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495958?labeling=true' target='_blank'>皇子诞庆五言十二韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495958")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_495958_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495958'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495958'>圣统垂千祀，天仁覆万方。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495958'>思贤咏场藿，兴俭缉帷囊。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495958'>宽法均疏网，忧民甚纳隍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495958'>画衣期不犯，行苇见无伤。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495958'>列庙灵潜佑，高穹意默彰。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495958'>故教生嗣晚，欲示卜年长。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495958'>帝梦前推吉，郊禖此报祥。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495958'>协辰初告望，纪节正迎商。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495958'>和气城铜律，休符集画堂。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495958'>清飙来美应，瑞旭荐荣光。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495958'>九县欢声沸，三都惠泽滂。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495958'>非才尘近掖，援笔颂无疆。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495958_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495958'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_495958_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年8月</a>　在开封，知谏院。韩琦有《代中书谢皇子降生诗奖谕状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163793' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163793' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163793?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代中书谢皇子降生诗奖谕状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163793")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163793_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163793'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163793'>右，臣等伏以灵辰既望，爽律方中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163793_comment'></div>协皇嗣之诞弥，示郊禖之吉应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163793_comment'></div>此乃宗祊锡羡，高厚储休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163793_comment'></div>流瑞福于庶邦，衍基图于万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163793_comment'></div>而臣等获庇隆治，亲睹嘉祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163793_comment'></div>形下俚之音，式宣熙事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163793_comment'></div>冒中宸之览，徒愧菲才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163793_comment'></div>岂谓天量包荒，诏函加奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163793_comment'></div>圣言温丽，日星之象交辉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163793_comment'></div>臣节倾输，葵藿之心共尽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1163793_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年8月</a>　在开封，知谏院。韩琦有《进皇子降生诗状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163794' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163794' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163794?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进皇子降生诗状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163794")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163794_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163794'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163794'>右，臣伏以佳月吉辰，皇嗣降庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163794_comment'></div>此盖陛下宝慈降俭，仁育庶邦，惠泽远流，天下蒙福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163794_comment'></div>故昊乾显鉴，宗祏默助，挺生圣子，以示无穷之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163794_comment'></div>幅员之间，既抃且舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163794_comment'></div>臣叨尘词掖，获睹盛美，辄忘愚陋，著成五言十二韵律诗一章，以继嘉颂之末。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163794_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年8月</a>　八月，韩琦以本官知制诰、知审刑院，赐三品服。奏请区别对待杀死同伙的盗贼。主动自首，有悔过之心的，宽大处理；杀死同伙而不自首、无悔过之心的，不在宽大之列。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年8月</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《授知制诰举官自代状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163791' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163791' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163791?labeling=true' target='_blank'>授知制诰举官自代状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163791")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163791_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163791'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163791'>右，臣伏睹尚书刑部郎中、直集贤院、权同纠察在京刑狱王皞，识略淹该，艺文宏赡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163791_comment'></div>怀铅书殿，素高约史之才；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163791_comment'></div>典狱都畿，甚著持平之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163791_comment'></div>傥进司于名命，必振起于时风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163791_comment'></div>愿回误恩，庶协公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163791_comment'></div>臣今举充自代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163791_comment'></div>干冒旒扆，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1163791_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年8月</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《谢知制诰表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163689' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163689' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163689?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢知制诰表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163689")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163689_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163689'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163689'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特授臣依前起居舍人、知制诰者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163689_comment'></div>青蒲献议，曾微补衮之勤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163689_comment'></div>黄闼程文，俄玷演纶之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163689_comment'></div>省谫材之无状，顾成命之已行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163689_comment'></div>荷宠兼常，抚躬增厉<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163689_comment'></div>窃以禁扃清切，居官为荣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163689_comment'></div>帝制坦明，作训攸重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163689_comment'></div>向匪机灵敏给，才辨高奇，善循四禁之规，雅擅一时之誉，则何以徊翔近掖，宣畅鸿猷，雍容侍从之联，振复典谟之体？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163689_comment'></div>宜甄时望，以协朝佥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163689_comment'></div>如臣者绪迹至孤，器姿无取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163689_comment'></div>幼奉楹书之诲，早亲童篆之工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163689_comment'></div>幸对圣明，复玷辞等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163689_comment'></div>藩条关决，罔详施教之宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163689_comment'></div>儒馆并游，寖被育材之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163689_comment'></div>擢赞尹京之治，易参司会之烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163689_comment'></div>首公则劳，稽效诚寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163689_comment'></div>庖锋不振，奚彰批窾之能？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163689_comment'></div>阮族甚贫，遂有出麾之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163689_comment'></div>辄露抗章之请，方谐为郡之行，伏遇皇帝陛下开道求言，励精修政，俾停使竹之授，留责谏囊之忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163689_comment'></div>越被恩升，力思毗益，每弗虞于禁忌，始自竭于愚驽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163689_comment'></div>物论皆危，天意无忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163689_comment'></div>逮岁劳之三易，微穴见之一长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163689_comment'></div>岂谓圣度包荒，宸襟采善，俾沿科选之旧，进居辞职之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163689_comment'></div>跃龙凤之池，亟尘清贯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163689_comment'></div>渐鸿鸾之党，荣厕龙班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163689_comment'></div>敢不磨钝忘疲，修方匪懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163689_comment'></div>诰令之出，勉追深厚之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163689_comment'></div>名节所持，靡蹈谀邪之径。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163689_comment'></div>庶尽捐躯之报，仰酬当扆之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163689_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1163689_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年8月</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《谢知制诰启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164015' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164015' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164015?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢知制诰启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164015")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164015_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164015'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164015'>某启：伏奉制命，特授前件职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164015_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1164015", 1164015, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>谏囊</span>陈事，将隳厥官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164015_comment'></div>词掖升荣，遽冒其宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164015_comment'></div>恩出非望，惧无所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164015_comment'></div>窃以朝家之光，典诰为重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164015_comment'></div>出令不复而犹汗，当谨其初；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164015_comment'></div>受命明之而如缗，贵通乎体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164015_comment'></div>向匪代推杰笔，名耸珍群，省树不言，谨而无漏，吏书将废，敏且有馀，则何以回翔清切之司，演裁深厚之训，申严百揆，鼓舞万方？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164015_comment'></div>在选之艰，非才孰称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164015_comment'></div>如某者，人评素下，门绪本孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164015_comment'></div>早承先模，得肄素业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164015_comment'></div>章句所守，大道弗明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164015_comment'></div>篆刻之为，壮夫攸耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164015_comment'></div>幸属丛云启旦，舞翟右文，与上计以偕来，预中楹之亲策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164015_comment'></div>优尘辞等，出倅郡条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164015_comment'></div>瓜戍及期，方谐受代，棘人怀痛，兹用去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164015_comment'></div>逮于终丧，勉而还职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164015_comment'></div>获践图书之秘府，旋婴管库之冗曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164015_comment'></div>越去儒英之躔，甘从俗吏之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164015_comment'></div>内史之治，式于庶邦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164015_comment'></div>司会之联，均乎众用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164015_comment'></div>继被使烦之任，皆无举最之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164015_comment'></div>犬子倦游，徒伤四壁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164015_comment'></div>仲容思出，欣假一麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164015_comment'></div>辄抗章而自陈，亟为郡而获请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164015_comment'></div>上方垂意治本，乐闻善规，讪狂必容，刍瞽尽采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164015_comment'></div>留充谏署之阙，专责官箴之勤，荷知特殊，惟死图报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164015_comment'></div>不虞摩上之过，第竭爱君之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164015_comment'></div>鲍宣之疏少文，汲黯之言甚戆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164015_comment'></div>矜其任直，谓倾愚者之忠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164015_comment'></div>恶彼用方，或陷凶人之目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164015_comment'></div>倏踰岁闰，无补朝猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164015_comment'></div>纵宽田舍之诛，宜取士师之黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164015_comment'></div>岂谓圣宸采善，贤弼推公，擢跻西省之居，重污高门之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164015_comment'></div>内循叨窃，抑有夤缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164015_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官左右昌朝，翼宣至化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164015_comment'></div>协助菁莪之育，遐资美实之和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164015_comment'></div>陶冶所宜，不私于器；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164015_comment'></div>轮辕之道，各尽其材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164015_comment'></div>是使孤生，亦尘清贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164015_comment'></div>谨当饬躬无怠，砥节自修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164015_comment'></div>祗循四禁之文，缅究三《盘》之范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164015_comment'></div>精述作之旨，虽难与于古侔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164015_comment'></div>谨操履之常，誓不牵于时变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164015_comment'></div>粗弭食浮之谤，仰酬镕造之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164015_comment'></div>过此以还，未知所措。</div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1164015_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《中书试制诏三道·边镇节度使加同平章事制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《中书试制诏三道·中书舍人除御史中丞制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《中书试制诏三道·诫励风俗浮薄制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《王尧臣除翰林学士制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163665' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163665' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163665?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王尧臣除翰林学士制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163665")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163665_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163665'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163665'>敕：王者发号裁训，所以风四方而熙众务也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163665_comment'></div>故前代赞辞视草，虽以名臣掌之，而其任未著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163665_comment'></div>唐以文治，始盛禁林之选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163665_comment'></div>我朝因旧建职，恩礼差峻，须才而召，儒者荣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163665_comment'></div>以尔具官王尧臣，冲履夷怀，清猷敏行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163665_comment'></div>言必可复，而有端士之目；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163665_comment'></div>动率由礼，而有古人之风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163665_comment'></div>向者旌其艺文，升冠多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163665_comment'></div>更集郡条之最，久陪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_1163665", 1163665, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>词馆</span>之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163665_comment'></div>使以烦而益精，语其进则无竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163665_comment'></div>而自迹其材美，擢典命书，敷余制以甚明，稽作者而奚愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163665_comment'></div>覆刑谳则轻重皆当，提京局则纲领毕修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163665_comment'></div>稔于岁劳，休厥朝论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163665_comment'></div>宜繇西省之秘，进预北门之直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163665_comment'></div>尔其蹈贤哲之范，思职业之举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163665_comment'></div>出令之始，务切于事机；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163665_comment'></div>备对之间，勿忘于毗正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163665_comment'></div>毋以文翰，专为汝能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163665_comment'></div>往服茂恩，以永来誉。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1163665'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163665_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《郭稹除刑部员外郎制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163666' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163666' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163666?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郭稹除刑部员外郎制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163666")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163666_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163666'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163666'>敕具官郭稹：中台宪曹，掌天下刑谳，分署郎属，许决众务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163666_comment'></div>今虽外领他局，然职望尤峻，非奏课之美者，未尝轻授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163666_comment'></div>以尔操尚中立，资性外和，早富艺文，实冠乡选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163666_comment'></div>逮优中辞等，随牒更仕，奉己以廉著，居官以干闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163666_comment'></div>治成均之业，而善诱后来；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163666_comment'></div>雠丽正之书，而多得前误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163666_comment'></div>出贰郡条之寄，入参邦计之烦，风力愈修，盘错尽解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163666_comment'></div>适稽官簿，当质岁成，进陪司寇之联，尚赞理财之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163666_comment'></div>祗若余命，懋哉尔勤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163666_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《魏昭昞除防御使制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163667' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163667' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163667?labeling=true' target='_blank'>魏昭炳除防御使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163667")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163667_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163667'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163667'>敕：国家严武备，治军行，参设使名，式遏于外，所以踵唐旧而奖材臣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163667_comment'></div>以尔具官魏昭炳，柔谨自将，和愿有守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163667_comment'></div>早缘戚体之爱，升预禁墀之联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163667_comment'></div>烦局所更，劳簿可录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163667_comment'></div>向嘉宣纳之美，擢司摈赞之职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163667_comment'></div>贰马政以有蕃，阅兵符而无滥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163667_comment'></div>遽形囊奏，愿假郡麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163667_comment'></div>典辅藩之雄，且稽于善教；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163667_comment'></div>申先赏之劝，宜责于后勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163667_comment'></div>往佩朝恩，毋隳世伐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1163667_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《王克基除东上阁门制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163668' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163668' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163668?labeling=true' target='_blank'>王克基除东上閤门使制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163668")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163668_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163668'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163668'>敕：汉制，谒者有仆射以统其属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163668_comment'></div>今二閤置使，通领摈赞之职，若功次为久，则序而升之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163668_comment'></div>以尔某官王克基，性顺而和，行廉而固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163668_comment'></div>早繇勋戚之绩，寝服轩墀之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163668_comment'></div>凡任于事，率能其称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163668_comment'></div>暨铨武材，益集官最，录其勤旧，优以褒迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163668_comment'></div>宜升左闼之崇，更示横班之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163668_comment'></div>勉修而效，以对朕恩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1163668_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《龙昌期等授试国子四门助教制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163669' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163669' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163669?labeling=true' target='_blank'>龙昌期等授试国子四门助教制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1163669_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163669'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163669'>敕益州进士龙昌期等：夫举高节，显儒行，使闻者知善必期报，驩然有向道之心，国之良教也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163669_comment'></div>以尔等学以为己，名不求达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163669_comment'></div>或治业有本，而尽经府之奥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163669_comment'></div>或诲人甚广，而为州塾所称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163669_comment'></div>白首无违，环堵自乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163669_comment'></div>属使轺之去复，迹乡誉以来闻，宜敦远俗之风，偕缀上庠之籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163669_comment'></div>服余甄命，以克其终。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1163669_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《夏随除观察使制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163670' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163670' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163670?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163670'>敕：古之君天下者，以幅员之广，虑耳目之所未究也，故分道遣使，举吏之臧否，候民之病利而达于上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163670_comment'></div>有唐廉察之选，盖其任也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163670_comment'></div>今职废为官，名品逾重，非简时杰，赏旧劳，则罔或命焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163670_comment'></div>以尔具官夏随，器怀沉敏，行实端方，早图世勋，阶籍崇列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163670_comment'></div>朕肇开储邸，择相宾仪，逮于纂承，亟用甄擢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163670_comment'></div>而能勤劬自谨，谦畏不矜，精力一心，局事毋旷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163670_comment'></div>掌武选则铨藻有叙，统边戍则绥御得宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163670_comment'></div>间以亲嫌，归奉朝请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163670_comment'></div>方试才而思用，爰先赏以劝功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163670_comment'></div>俾正观风之名，往莅作藩之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163670_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163670_comment'></div>衒宠则其悔必速，修政则厥庸乃丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163670_comment'></div>善宣教条，用服予训。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1163670_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《李端愿除西上阁门使制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163671' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163671_comment'></div>爰崇宫闼之秩，兼厚沁园之亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163671_comment'></div>训缉兵团，仍兹旧职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163671_comment'></div>尔其以己能思效，以忠训自修，则百辟四方，知朕不私于赏也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1163671_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_0_1163680_comment'></div>预礼蕝之员，最成来上；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163680_comment'></div>陪乡棘之议，恩陟宜优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163680_comment'></div>往践荣阶，更图尔效。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163680_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《李迪曾祖在钦赠太师制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163681' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163681' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163681?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李迪曾祖在钦赠太师制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163681")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163681_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163681'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163681'>敕：王者躬郊庙之祀，答神灵之休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163681_comment'></div>美莫敢专，以明尊上之义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163681_comment'></div>孝而能飨，盖达奉先之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163681_comment'></div>因是广恩，庶能知教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163681_comment'></div>矧惟丞弼之旧，方均左右之劳，用举徽章，贲于曾世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163681_comment'></div>具官李迪曾祖赠太师在钦，冲怀弗竞，潜德甚高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163681_comment'></div>天爵之修，遂忘于君仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163681_comment'></div>家善之积，爰启于孙谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163681_comment'></div>是生忠实之臣，荐正钧衡之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163681_comment'></div>向辞台路，往殿国藩，宜孚涣号之文，特霈宠亲之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163681_comment'></div>维师命秩，饰壤推荣，英魄想存，尚克歆荷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163681_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《李迪曾祖母潘氏追封鲁国太夫人制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163682' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163682' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163682?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163682'>敕：乃者宝元冬仲，景至协辰，有事泰坛，昭答灵贶，均庆方夏，漏泽泉壤，所以劝臣劳而敦孝治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163682_comment'></div>具官李某曾祖母潘氏，壶仪咸备，家范早修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163682_comment'></div>谨妇道以可宗，监女图而毋越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163682_comment'></div>善祥有报，良嗣聿兴，为时正人，作朕贤弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163682_comment'></div>适优贤于邦翰，属展寀于阳郊，增崇曲阜之封，姑慰幽涂之魄。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163682_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《李迪祖令珣赠中书令制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163683' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163683' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163683?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李迪祖令珣赠中书令制</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1163683_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163683'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163683'>敕：朕严祀紫坛，祗祼清庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163683_comment'></div>精意以感，故瑞福永贶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163683_comment'></div>庆泽所被，故幽明必通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163683_comment'></div>矧公台亮直之臣，宠藩翰抚绥之寄，宜褒祖德，载厚恩章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163683_comment'></div>具官李某祖赠太师令珣，志行醇深，襟怀信实，早升仕版，进服朝联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163683_comment'></div>当艺祖之开基，指僭邦而伐罪，屡陈奇策，简在圣心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163683_comment'></div>计府商功，邦财增羡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163683_comment'></div>郡条赋政，民瘼必蠲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163683_comment'></div>弥嘉异等之劳，将图不次之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163683_comment'></div>位未充量，遽叹于云亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163683_comment'></div>善及于孙，果彰于有后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163683_comment'></div>荐登爰立之任，方倚于宣之良，肆类克成，显亲有典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163683_comment'></div>式正凤池之拜，庶光马鬣之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163683_comment'></div>魂兮有知，钦此优命。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1163683_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《李迪祖母白氏追封□国太夫人制》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1163684' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163684_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163684'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163684'>敕：郊报之重，陟配有严，朝涣所均，上下咸暨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163684_comment'></div>推是及先之宠，存乎劝后之经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163684_comment'></div>具官李某祖母白氏，德禀柔明，性敦淑茂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163684_comment'></div>嫔于令族，绰有懿风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163684_comment'></div>惟慈德之流光，祐孝孙而兴绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163684_comment'></div>入为良辅，谋必尽忠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163684_comment'></div>出殿大邦，惠深及物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163684_comment'></div>祀仪方举，庆典惟行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163684_comment'></div>宜旌祖妣之贤，载易国封之大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163684_comment'></div>魂而不寐，服我恩休。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1163684_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　约在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《祈福道场白文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1164191' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164191' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164191?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祈福道场白文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164191")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164191_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164191'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164191'>伏以花雨称祥，适丁于令节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164191_comment'></div>贝文演妙，虔奉于真诠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164191_comment'></div>爰择净居，式延开士，赞佛乘之利益，助宸历之鸿长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164191_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下仁惠宅中，睿明临下，谨天经而敦治，设神理以宁人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164191_comment'></div>画象宽刑，敷协于邦教；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164191_comment'></div>斲雕兴俭，丕变于民风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164191_comment'></div>属端月之肇新，愿绵区之咸乂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164191_comment'></div>群灵俱泰，庶务交修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164191_comment'></div>思与黎氓，同均瑞福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164191_comment'></div>启法筵于绀宇，来宝施于丹闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164191_comment'></div>集此胜因，仰资盛旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164191_comment'></div>伏愿圣猷永茂，皇绪寖昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164191_comment'></div>慧日破昏，遐膺于煦育；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164191_comment'></div>慈云荫物，毕遂于蕃滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164191_comment'></div>凡居普率之间，共洽熙平之化。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1164191_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　约在开封，任知制诰。韩琦有《祈福道场功德疏文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十。）</span><div id='poem_1164192' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164192' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164192?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_1164192_comment'></div>属圣神之抚运，顾景序之方春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164192_comment'></div>庶职熙康，万灵和乐，顺兹佳节，虔礼真乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164192_comment'></div>修净供以惟严，辑善因而弥衍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164192_comment'></div>伏愿觉慈广覆，慧力周施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164192_comment'></div>锡无疆之休，增延于睿历；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164192_comment'></div>演甚盛之福，普及于蒸民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164192_comment'></div>凡在幅员，永符归飨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164192_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　利、益路大饥，韩琦为体量安抚使，前往救灾。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='bd699dcd1f7948ac936e8209ed3a9f01_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>，33岁</div><div id='bd699dcd1f7948ac936e8209ed3a9f01' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年11月</a>　十一月，在仁宗皇帝的诏促下，由夏辣主事的永兴府合议筹画攻守二策，派韩琦和尹洙携带此奏入朝，请仁宗皇帝定夺。仁宗用攻策。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年12月</a>　十二月，韩琦迁礼部郎中，不拜。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年12月</a>　或在开封，任陕西经略安抚副使。十二月，韩琦有《乞令经略判官兼参详都部署司事奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163970' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163970' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163970'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163970'>陕西经略安抚司与部署司，凡有行事，大率相通，止是经略司有判官二员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163970_comment'></div>乞令经略判官兼参详都部署司事。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163970_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　或在开封，任陕西经略安抚副使。韩琦有《韩渎学士领益漕》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_495957' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495957_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495957'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495957'>去年巴蜀失秋成，西顾饥流恻睿情。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495957'>尝忝乘轺宣渥命，更烦持节拯遐氓。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495957'>夜亭微雨多侵梦，春峡繁花少记名。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495957_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495957'>到日莫辞行部数，属城凋瘵望君生。<div
