id='poem_note_495957'><span class='label'>按：</span>以上《安阳集》卷四<br /></div><div id='poem_note_495957_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　或在开封，任陕西经略安抚副使。韩琦有《应诏举王居白堪充选擢任使状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163795' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163795' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163795?labeling=true' target='_blank'>应诏举王居白堪充选擢任使状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1040年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163795")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163795_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163795'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163795'>右，臣伏睹都官员外郎、知汉州王居白，清德懿行，外温内方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163795_comment'></div>策名效官，行越二纪，处烦无滞其用，举事必协于中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163795_comment'></div>分符远邦，众谓沉抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163795_comment'></div>幸遇朝廷选材济治，诏及下臣，愿以名闻，足备器使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163795_comment'></div>臣今保举堪充选擢繁难任使，如擢用后犯正入己赃，臣甘当同罪。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163795_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='1055a364bb9e460c8f3f569301db8f13_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("1055a364bb9e460c8f3f569301db8f13");'><span id='1055a364bb9e460c8f3f569301db8f13_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>，36岁</div><div id='1055a364bb9e460c8f3f569301db8f13' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年7月</a>　在开封。七月，韩琦就任枢密副使。上《论备御七事奏》，陈奏西、北二敌祸衅已起，而朝野泰然、不知危之将至的事实，对之深感痛心。提出备御外敌七事。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_1163914' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163914' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163914?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论备御七事奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历三年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163914")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163914_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163914'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163914'>臣闻汉文帝袭高、惠承平之后，躬行节俭，国治民富，刑措不用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163914_comment'></div>时贾谊上书言事，尚以为可「恸哭」、「太息」，岂其过哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163914_comment'></div>盖忧深思远，图长久之计，欲大汉之业垂千万世而无穷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163914_comment'></div>今陛下绍三圣之休烈，仁德远被，天下大定，民乐其生者八十馀载矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163914_comment'></div>而臣窃观时事，谓可昼夜泣血，非直「恸哭」、「太息」者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163914_comment'></div>何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163914_comment'></div>盖以西北二虏，祸衅已成，而上下泰然，不知朝廷之将危，宗社之未安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163914_comment'></div>臣今不暇广有援引，请粗陈其大概。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163914_comment'></div>切以契丹宅大漠，跨辽东，据全燕数十郡之雄，东服高丽，西臣元昊，自五代迄今垂百馀年，与中原抗衡，日益昌炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163914_comment'></div>至于典章文物，饮食服玩之盛，尽习汉风，故虏气愈骄，自以为昔时元魏之不若也，非如汉之匈奴、唐之突厥，本以夷狄自处，与中国好尚之异也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163914_comment'></div>近者复幸朝廷西方用兵，违约遣使，求关南之地，以启争端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163914_comment'></div>朝廷爱念生民，为之隐忍，岁益金币之数，且固前盟，而尚邀献纳之名，以自尊大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163914_comment'></div>其轻视中国，情可见矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163914_comment'></div>又元昊父祖以来，蓄养奸谋，招纳亡命，虽外示臣节，而内全兵力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163914_comment'></div>至元昊则好乱逞志，并甘、凉诸蕃，以拓境土，自度种落强盛，故僭号背恩，北连契丹，欲成鼎峙之势，非如继迁昔年跳梁于银、夏之间尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163914_comment'></div>元昊累岁盗边，官军屡衄，今乘定川全胜之气，遣人约和，则知其计愈深，而其事可虞也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163914_comment'></div>议者谓昨假契丹传道之力，必事无不合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163914_comment'></div>岂不思契丹既能使元昊罢兵，岂不能使元昊举兵乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163914_comment'></div>况比来辞礼骄慢，殊未屈下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163914_comment'></div>北虏之言既已无验，亦恐有合从之策，以困中原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163914_comment'></div>朝廷若轸西民之劳，暂求休养元元，且以金帛啖之，待以不臣之礼，臣恐契丹闻之，谓朝廷事力已屈，则又遣使移书，过邀尊大之称，或求朝廷不可从之事，隳其誓约，然后驱犬羊之众，直趋大河，复使元昊举兵深寇关辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163914_comment'></div>当是时，未审朝廷以何术而御之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163914_comment'></div>若委西鄙于蕃臣，专事北寇，陛下亲御六师，临澶渊以待之，即未知今之将卒事力，与环卫统帅，比真宗北征时何如？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163914_comment'></div>欲驻跸北京，以张军势，臣恐虏众由德、博度河，直趋京师，则朝廷根本之地，宗庙宫寝、府库仓廪、百官六军室家所在，而一无城守之略，陛下可拥北京之众却行而救之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163914_comment'></div>臣所以谓可昼夜泣血者，诚忧及于此，冀陛下一悟而急为拯救也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163914_comment'></div>朝廷若谓今之盟约尚可固结，则前三十年之信誓，朝廷何负二虏，而一旦违之哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163914_comment'></div>彼豺狼之心，见利而动，又可推诚以待之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163914_comment'></div>夫得于先见，预为之防，则功逸而事集；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163914_comment'></div>若变生仓卒，骇而图之，虽使良、平复生，为陛下计，亦不能及矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163914_comment'></div>臣是以夙夕思之，朝廷若不大新纪律，则必不能革时弊而弭大患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163914_comment'></div>臣辄画当今所宜先行者七事，条列以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163914_comment'></div>其大略，一曰清政本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163914_comment'></div>枢密院本兵之地，今所主多苛碎𦕈末之务，中书公事虽不预闻，恐亦类此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163914_comment'></div>谓宜诏中书、枢密院，事有例者著为法，可拟进者无面奏，其馀微琐，可悉归有司，使得从容谋议，赐对之际，专论大事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163914_comment'></div>二曰念边事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163914_comment'></div>今政府循故事，才午即出，欲稍留则恐疑众，退朝食罢，匆遽签书而去，何暇议及疆事哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163914_comment'></div>谓宜须未正方出，延此一时，以专<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1163914", 1163914, "Clauses/157/Comments/0")'>边论</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163914_comment'></div>三曰擢贤才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1163914_comment'></div>自承平以来，用人以叙迁之法，故遗才甚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1163914_comment'></div>近中书、枢密院求一武臣代郭承祐，聚议累日，不能得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1163914_comment'></div>谓宜效祖宗旧例，于武臣中不次超擢，以试其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1163914_comment'></div>四曰备河北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1163914_comment'></div>自北虏通好三十馀年，武备悉废，近慢书之至，骚然莫知所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1163914_comment'></div>谓宜选转运使二员，密授经略，责以岁月，使营守御之备，则我待之有素也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1163914_comment'></div>五曰固河东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1163914_comment'></div>前岁昊贼陷丰州，掠河外属户殆尽，麟、府势孤绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1163914_comment'></div>宜责本道帅度险要，建城堡，省转饷，为持久之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1163914_comment'></div>六曰收民心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1163914_comment'></div>祖宗置内藏库，盖备水旱兵革之用，非私畜财而充己欲也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1163914_comment'></div>自用兵以来，财用匮竭，宜稍出金帛以佐边用，民力可宽，而众心安矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1163914_comment'></div>七曰营洛邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1163914_comment'></div>今帝都无城隍之固以备非常，议兴葺则为张皇劳民，不若阴葺洛都，以为游幸之所，岁运太仓羡馀之粟以实其廪庾，则皇居壮矣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1163914_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_52_1163914'>「中书公事」至「谓宜诏」：原无，据《长编》、《国朝诸臣奏议》、《皇朝文鉴》补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1163914_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163914'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_51_1163914_0'>⑴ 《韩魏公集》卷一六。又见《韩魏王家传》卷三，《续资治通鉴长编》卷一四二，《国朝诸臣奏议》卷一三四，《国朝二百家名贤文粹》卷一六○，《皇朝文鉴》卷四四，《太平治迹统类》卷八，《历代名臣奏议》卷三二五，《经济类编》卷九，《文翰类选大成》卷一二六，《右编》卷二六，《清源文献》卷五，《经世八编》卷二八四，《四续古文奇赏》卷六，《奇赏斋古文汇编》卷一六二，《续资治通鉴》卷四五。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1163914_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。韩琦上《救弊八事奏》。于上备御先行七事后，又有继陈八事，无非兴利除弊，原则是信任辅弼，用人不疑，归结为纲纪渐振而太平可期，则二贼（辽、西夏）将不足为国家之患。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_1163977' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163977' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163977?labeling=true' target='_blank'>救弊八事奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历三年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163977")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163977_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163977'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163977'>当今救弊之术，不过选将帅，明按察，丰财利，抑挠倖，进有能之吏，退不才之官，去冗食之人，谨入官之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163977_comment'></div>然数事之举，谤必随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163977_comment'></div>愿委信辅臣，听其措置，虽有怨谤，断在不疑，则纪纲渐振，而太平可期，二敌岂足为国之患哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163977_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　仁宗诏对韩琦、范仲淹于崇政殿上，二人共上御敌和、守、攻三策。主题是以和好为权宜，以攻守为实务。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。韩琦上《论与元昊议和有三患奏》，三患是二虏可能利用议和互相勾结要挟朝廷。韩琦认为为防止此可能遗留的三患，两府在答应议和方面要慎重行事，要之无损朝廷大体。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷三；《韩魏公集》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_1163909' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163909' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163909?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论与元昊议和有三患奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历三年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163909")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163909_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163909'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163909'>今西界遣人议和，其患有三：朝廷曾达意北虏，欲令元昊纳款，其答书云：「梁适口陈夏台之事，已差右金吾卫上将军耶律祥、彰武军节度使王惟吉赍诏谕元昊，令息兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163909_comment'></div>况其先臣德昭，北朝曾封夏国王，仍许自置官属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163909_comment'></div>至元昊，亦容袭爵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163909_comment'></div>自来遣人进奉，每辞见燕会，并升坐于矮殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163909_comment'></div>今两朝事同一家，若元昊请罪，其封册礼待亦宜一如北朝」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163909_comment'></div>臣观邵良佐贼中语录，乃云「贼言朝廷议和，何必往问契丹」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163909_comment'></div>昨昊贼先遣人至保安军，言为朝廷差梁谏议适往北朝，令本国议和；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163909_comment'></div>北朝亦差耶律祥等至本国，故遣贺从勉等持书而来盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163909_comment'></div>是昊贼因北虏达意而来，及与良佐语，反不承纳，又所求称号，即与北虏书中事体相违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163909_comment'></div>此事固有疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163909_comment'></div>若朝廷且务休兵，许其不臣，契丹闻之，必然别索名分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163909_comment'></div>既不可屈，则恐因此为名，再隳誓约，此一患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163909_comment'></div>若只许册为国主，略增良佐所许岁遗之数，朝廷更不差人，只令来人赍诏而回，恐贼未副所望，则谓朝廷已与之绝，必忿而兴兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163909_comment'></div>北虏亦谓阻其来意，缘此生事，此二患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163909_comment'></div>若再遣人赍诏，谕以封册之礼不可异于北朝，更优增良佐所许之数，贼既从命，则契丹以为己功，遣使来贺，或过自尊大，或频有邀求，久则难从，此三患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163909_comment'></div>朝廷始欲假契丹以制元昊，事未可知，而三患已形，势不得已，则莫若择其轻者行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163909_comment'></div>其欲呼为吾祖及自称年号，又遣使到彼参于殿上，与陪臣为列，此终岂为便？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163909_comment'></div>望且令中书、枢密院再三论难，使朝廷得大体，契丹无争端，以此议和，庶为得策。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1163909_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='57be352b7f2f435285e69e038b1cad7d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("57be352b7f2f435285e69e038b1cad7d");'><span id='57be352b7f2f435285e69e038b1cad7d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1045')">1043-1045年</a>，36-38岁</div><div id='57be352b7f2f435285e69e038b1cad7d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　宣抚陕西回，韩琦复陈泾州置四路招讨使非便。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　韩琦建言实行范祥新盐法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　韩琦荐国子监直讲石介、青州千盛县主簿孙复。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。韩琦有《故尚书工部侍郎致仕赠工部尚书崔公行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五十。）</span><div id='poem_1164138' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164138' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164138?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故尚书工部侍郎致仕赠工部尚书崔公行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1043年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164138")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164138_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164138'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164138'>曾祖光表，右补阙、直史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164138_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1164138'>祖周度，兖州节度判官、赠秘书少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164138_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1164138'>父汝砺，左班殿直、赠尚书兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164138_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1164138'>本贯开封府鄢陵县仪凤乡凤凰里，名立，字本之，年七十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164138_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1164138'>崔出姜姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164138_comment'></div>始，齐丁公之嫡曰季子，以其国推叔乙而食采于崔，因而命氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164138_comment'></div>十六世孙业，为汉东莱侯，居清河之东武城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164138_comment'></div>至后魏殿中尚书休，始与其弟寅分大小房，休号大房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164138_comment'></div>自元魏历周、隋间，世居显仕，而至唐尤甚，与卢、李、郑三姓，遂为诸侯之望，而崔为之首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164138_comment'></div>曾祖讳光表，清河大房休之后十二世孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164138_comment'></div>后唐同光初举进士，为天下第一，终右补阙、直史馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164138_comment'></div>祖讳周度，性忠鲠敢言，周初为兖州节度判官，其帅慕容彦超叛，即以大义譬责之，复引近世逆顺祸福以为监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164138_comment'></div>不听，卒为其所害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164138_comment'></div>周祖闻而伤之，赠秘书少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164138_comment'></div>父讳汝砺，以父死节尚幼，朝廷欲优其廪给，乃以为左班殿直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164138_comment'></div>后以家世儒者，耻从武弁之列，遂弃官归鄢陵，安处先庐，不以荣利为意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164138_comment'></div>以公贵，累赠尚书兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164138_comment'></div>公讳立，字本之，侍郎之次子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164138_comment'></div>少警悟博学，而尤长于古文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164138_comment'></div>时柳公仲涂为世大儒，学者师仰，一见公文而奇之，于公卿间比比延誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164138_comment'></div>咸平二年秋举进士于开封府，试入高等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164138_comment'></div>明年春及第，补果州团练推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164138_comment'></div>郡有役卒辇官物于他州，苦其道路之险，乃率众钱雇便舟而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164138_comment'></div>其守姜从革者发其事，法官张升引率歛条，坐始谋与率钱卒三人皆当斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164138_comment'></div>公曰：「醵钱私己，与本意于公殊科，罪当杖」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164138_comment'></div>固执不断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164138_comment'></div>姜怒，乃以具狱闻，请下有司详谳，卒如公议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164138_comment'></div>姜与法官俱得罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164138_comment'></div>满岁，用是改大理寺丞、知大名府临清县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164138_comment'></div>丁侍郎忧去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164138_comment'></div>服除，知寿州安丰县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164138_comment'></div>属岁大水，坏期斯塘，民失灌溉之利者殆千馀家，公亟募工徒补塞堤障，日暴露于塘下，踰月而塘完，民以安业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164138_comment'></div>转殿中丞，徙通判广州事，改太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164138_comment'></div>岭南舶商所凑，珍货丛委，至者一为利所动，则隳其故节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164138_comment'></div>公素以清约自守，凡彼之所有，不市一钱，官满但舟贮俸缗所馀而还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164138_comment'></div>时文懿张公为本道转运使，常叹服之曰：「古之所谓廉吏者，恐无以过此」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164138_comment'></div>俄丁母延安郡太君李氏忧，去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164138_comment'></div>服阕，通判许州事，改屯田员外郎、知江阴军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164138_comment'></div>仁宗即位，以恩增秩都官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164138_comment'></div>邑有利港者，旧溉民田数千顷，岁久湮废，公谕其民开浚之，曰：「初虽少劳，而其利无穷」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164138_comment'></div>民皆乐然献力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164138_comment'></div>逮成，官无少费，而民利如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164138_comment'></div>又开横河六十里以通漕运舟楫之便，天子嘉之，两赐诏书褒美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164138_comment'></div>代还，会东都塞决河，命公提举受纳梢草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164138_comment'></div>是时所费既广，旁逮数路之民，皆被科扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164138_comment'></div>公度兴功过半，薪楗山积，而所逋之数尚数百万，皆单细之户，力不能堪者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164138_comment'></div>公独抗奏，愿一切蠲放，保无所乏，朝廷从之，众大蒙惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164138_comment'></div>迁职方员外郎、知棣州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164138_comment'></div>城中池素舄卤，民苦水泉不给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164138_comment'></div>公择衢巷要便之地，为浚百井，而间有甘洌者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164138_comment'></div>众谓公至诚之感，阖郡歌乐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164138_comment'></div>累迁都官郎中，历知汉、相、潞三州事，以明道恭谢天地恩迁职方，俄转太常少卿、知兖州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164138_comment'></div>值岁大蝗旱，民罹凶歉，公度荒政之急而为常法所拘者，一皆济以权宜，唯上所罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164138_comment'></div>又募里豪出粟数十万斛以哺饥者，所活甚众，而施浃旁境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164138_comment'></div>继徙郓、泾二州，就拜右谏议大夫，改知耀州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164138_comment'></div>耀民气豪喜讼，号难治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164138_comment'></div>始至，系囚满狱，公为区判善恶，劝沮明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164138_comment'></div>未几民服公化，境内以清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164138_comment'></div>代归，民走漆、沮二水之次，邀公呼曰：「吾之父母，今焉往」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164138_comment'></div>至群卧滩石上，使公马不得前，公为回驾，翌日繇间道乃得去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164138_comment'></div>至阙，以年渐高，筋力不强，愿补闲僻之郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164138_comment'></div>乃出知濠州事，转给事中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164138_comment'></div>年甫七十，即上书曰：「臣老矣，于国家之事力不能勉，幸乞臣骸骨，以归田里」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164138_comment'></div>上怜之，进秩工部侍郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164138_comment'></div>公既归许之私第，遂谢绝人事，治家圃，罗植松竹，中起小亭曰葆光，自号葆光子，终日怡然隐几于其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164138_comment'></div>每良辰美节，则召亲族以觞咏为娱乐，心休休然，自谓处羲皇之世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164138_comment'></div>如是者凡五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164138_comment'></div>一日，体中不佳，召诸子而谓曰：「人生得七十者为少，而吾寿已过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164138_comment'></div>又官为丞郎，汝辈皆为京寺之官，女配吉士，吾自顾无一不足者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1164138_comment'></div>夫生而死，物理之常也，汝辈但师吾忠孝，无甚悲也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1164138_comment'></div>诸子与家人皆环侍号泣不能胜，而公神色不少变而终，君子以为达性命，时庆历三年十一月三日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1164138_comment'></div>公方重沉敏，不妄喜怒，外虽严庄，而内极仁恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1164138_comment'></div>平居裣衽危坐，凛然如在官府中，家人辈皆悚戢自饬，无敢遽步于前者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1164138_comment'></div>天性至孝，二亲之亡，水浆不入口者累日，蔬食柴毁，见者嗟恻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1164138_comment'></div>事其兄中舍君尤谨顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1164138_comment'></div>诸侄少孤，皆奏以官，义均己子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1164138_comment'></div>历治十郡，所至务以约制烦，以静胜扰，而政一出于仁惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1164138_comment'></div>凡议罪有不合法意，或所诛不当其情者，则类从轻比，故民感而易化，所去殊思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1164138_comment'></div>又性本恬晦，不自夸耀，以道平进，志不可屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1164138_comment'></div>文静吕公，乃公之同年生也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1164138_comment'></div>文懿张公，乃向为监司，知公之深者也，而公足未尝一妄及其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1164138_comment'></div>常曰：「人茍公而待物，当自知我；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1164138_comment'></div>必欲求而后知，则吾岂为此」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1164138_comment'></div>当东郡之督薪刍也，内臣阎文应方为小官，与公共事，文应举或不如法，公必极言规正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1164138_comment'></div>后为入内都知，权倾中外，感公畴昔诲勖之恩，百计欲一见公而不能得，其自重如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1164138_comment'></div>前后上封言时政利害得失，凡四十事，多见施用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1164138_comment'></div>能文之外，复长于篇咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1164138_comment'></div>文正范公尝谓某曰：「余向在江阴，多见崔公诗，格清而意远，诗人之作也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1164138_comment'></div>有集二十卷，自名《巴歈集》，兹又见其谦德之高也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1164138_comment'></div>夫人冉氏，故职方员外郎宗闵之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1164138_comment'></div>淑行纯德，宗族师法，门内之助，肃然以和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1164138_comment'></div>封仁寿郡君，先公而亡，年六十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1164138_comment'></div>以其年十二月十三日，葬公与夫人于郑州之新郑县临洧乡先侍郎之墓次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1164138_comment'></div>男三人：长勉，天圣五年擢进士第，强敏能政，终大理寺丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1164138_comment'></div>次公孺，性浑厚，有高识，多闻博览，尤高名理之论，今为国子博士、签书忠武军节度判官事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1164138_comment'></div>次长孺，和雅善属文，终大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1164138_comment'></div>女四人：长适比部员外郎杜昉，次适司封员外郎、集贤校理、知陕府事赵宗道，次适大理寺丞张汝士，次即某之配也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1164138_comment'></div>故于公治官治家之迹，知之为最详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1164138_comment'></div>而辞患鄙讷，不能发扬公之清芬盛烈，使纤悉而明著之，姑举其大概，以资名德钜贤笔削之公，用垂信于后世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1164138_comment'></div>谨状<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1164138_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_100_1164138'>度：原脱，据郭本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_100_1164138_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1164138'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_99_1164138_0'>⑴ 《安阳集》卷五○。又见《永乐大典》卷二七四○，嘉靖《鄢陵志》卷八，乾隆《新郑县志》卷二五，民国《鄢陵县志》卷二七。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1164138_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年1月</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。正月，韩琦上《修水洛城不便奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_1163912' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163912' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163912?labeling=true' target='_blank'>修水洛城不便奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历四年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163912")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163912_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163912'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163912'>今朝廷未能讨伐元昊，则为守御之计，修建城寨，遇贼至，清野以待之，当不战而自困矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163912_comment'></div>臣自泾原路相视城寨，类当营葺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163912_comment'></div>然镇戎军及山外弓箭手，去年差役修城，已有劳苦之嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163912_comment'></div>若今春止令增筑所居城堡，必自无辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163912_comment'></div>如闻更修生户所献水洛城，颇为未便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163912_comment'></div>盖水洛城通秦州道路，自泾原路新修章川堡至秦州𢇲穰寨百八十里，皆生户住坐，止于其中通一径，须筑二大寨及十小堡，方可互为之援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163912_comment'></div>其土功自以百万计，仍须采山木以修敌棚、战楼、廨舍、军营及防城器用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163912_comment'></div>虽即营就，又须正兵三四千人，更岁积粮草，始能屯守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163912_comment'></div>其费若此，止求一日以通秦、原之援兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163912_comment'></div>兼去仪州黄石河路才较两驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163912_comment'></div>况刘沪昨以降水洛城一带生户，近李中和又屈伏陇城川蕃部，各补职名为熟户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163912_comment'></div>若进援兵，动不下五六千人，诸小蕃族岂敢要阻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163912_comment'></div>是则虽无水洛之援，官军亦可往来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163912_comment'></div>且近边城堡切于保聚人民，尚力有未及，何暇于孤远无益之处枉劳军民乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163912_comment'></div>请就差刘沪、李中和为泾原、秦凤路巡检，令每月互领兵于水洛、陇城川习熟所通之道，以备缓急策应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163912_comment'></div>仍乞只作朝廷指挥下陕西四路总管司、泾原路经略司，且并力修葺逐处未了堡寨，其水洛城候向去别奏听旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163912_comment'></div>如朝廷未以为然，乞选差亲信中使至泾原秦凤路询问文彦博、尹洙、狄青等，即知修水洛城于今便与未便。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1163912_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　韩琦得到皇帝悉陈当世急务的手诏，更勇于自效，抗言辨论，为仁宗所独识。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年2月</a>　二月，张子奭从西夏归，带回的消息是元昊有条件称臣。条件是朝廷每年购买他们十万斛青盐，还要增加岁币，而对宋方提出的归还延州侵地要求没有答复。韩琦上奏，认为侵地必须归还，且不和他们做青盐交易，并提出早议修复废城寨，为一路经久之计。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年2月</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。二月，韩琦有《乞不许西夏入中青盐奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_1163910' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163910' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163910?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞不许西夏入中青盐奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历四年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163910")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163910_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163910'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163910'>窃知张子奭尝谕西界，令尽还前所侵延州地，终未听从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163910_comment'></div>此于朝廷所系者大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163910_comment'></div>且栲栳、塞门、安远、黑水等寨自为贼所破，直至延州，更无障蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163910_comment'></div>其承平、长宁、南安等寨，亦当时仓卒弃之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163910_comment'></div>今若遂不修复，则斥堠至迫，而边民不敢耕殖，岂得为延州之利乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163910_comment'></div>又闻贼更欲每年入中青盐十万斛，今只以解盐半价约之，已及二十馀万贯，并所许岁币，仅四十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163910_comment'></div>此乃与北虏之数相当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163910_comment'></div>议者又欲许其入中青盐，却复所侵边地，臣窃思之，亦恐未为全计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163910_comment'></div>缘青盐只于保安军入中，必难尽易，当须官自辇置别州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163910_comment'></div>且疲弊之后，可复兴此劳役乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163910_comment'></div>自来沿边熟户与西界蕃部交通为常，大率以青盐价贱而味甘，故食解盐者殊少，边臣多务宽其禁以图安辑，惟汉户犯者坐配隶之刑，曾无虚月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163910_comment'></div>今若许入中青盐，其计官本已重，更须增价出卖，则恐沿边蕃汉尽食西界所贩青盐，无由禁止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163910_comment'></div>解盐之利日渐侵削，而陕西财用不得不屈矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163910_comment'></div>是使西贼蓄锐俟时，祸变不测，其势必然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163910_comment'></div>今急于议和者，但见目前茍且之利，而不顾贻患于国家，欲乞朝廷熟虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163910_comment'></div>今来所许岁币已厚，须是尽还延州侵地，方与约和；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163910_comment'></div>其欲入中青盐，决不可许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163910_comment'></div>若西贼缘此未肯纳款，即乞早议修复侵废城寨，为一路经久保守之计。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1163910_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年5月</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。五月，韩琦第三次上疏《陈修水洛城利害奏》，提出了十三条修水洛城不便的理由。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷三；《续资治通鉴长编》卷一四九。）</span><div id='poem_1163978' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163978' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163978?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈修水洛城利害奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历四年五月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163978")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163978_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163978'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163978'>郑戬奏乞令臣不预商量，臣常患臣僚临事多避形迹，致赏罚间或有差误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163978_comment'></div>因退思之，臣任西边及再任宣抚，首尾五年，只在泾原、秦凤两路，于水洛城事，比他人知之甚详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163978_comment'></div>今若隐而不言，复事形迹，则是臣偷安不忠，有误陛下委任之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163978_comment'></div>臣是以不避诛责，辄陈所见利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163978_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1163978'>水洛左右皆小小种落，不属大朝，今夺取其地，于彼置城，于元昊未有所损，于边亦无益，一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163978_comment'></div>缘边禁军弓箭手，连年借债修葺城寨，尚未完备，今又修此城堡，大小六七，计须二年方可得成，物力转见劳敝，二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163978_comment'></div>将来修成上件城堡，计须分屯正军不下五千人，所要粮草，并须入中和籴，所费不小，三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163978_comment'></div>自来泾原、秦凤两路通进援兵，只为未知得仪州黄石河路，所以议者多欲修水洛城一带城寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163978_comment'></div>自近岁修成黄石河路，秦凤兵往泾原，并从腹内经过，逐程有驿舍粮草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163978_comment'></div>若救静边寨，比水洛远一程；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163978_comment'></div>若救镇戎、德顺军，比水洛却近一程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163978_comment'></div>今水洛劳费如此，又多疏虞，比于黄石河腹内之路，远近所较不多，四也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163978_comment'></div>陕西四路，自来只为城寨太多，分却<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/54/Comments/0")'>兵势</span>，每路正兵不下七八万人，及守城寨之外，不过三万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163978_comment'></div>今泾原、秦凤两路，若更分兵守水洛一带城寨，则<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>兵势</span>单弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163978_comment'></div>兼元昊每来入寇，不下十馀万人，若分三四千人于山外静边、章山堡以来出没，则两路援兵自然阻绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163978_comment'></div>其城寨内<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>兵力</span>单弱，必不敢出城，不过自守而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163978_comment'></div>如此，枉费功力，临事一无所济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163978_comment'></div>况自来诸路援兵，极多不过五六千人至一万人，作节次前来，只是张得虚声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163978_comment'></div>若先为贼阨其来路，必应援不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163978_comment'></div>若自黄石河路，则贼隔陇山，不能钞截，五也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163978_comment'></div>自陇州入秦州，由故关路，山阪险隘，行两日方至清水县，清水北十里则𢇲穰寨，自清水又行山路两日，方至秦州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163978_comment'></div>由此观之，秦州远在陇关之外，最为孤绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163978_comment'></div>其东路隔限水洛城一带生户，道路不通，秦州恃之以为篱障，只备西路三都口一带贼马来路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163978_comment'></div>今若开水洛城一带道路，其城寨之外，必渐有人烟耕种，蕃部等更不敢当道住坐，奸细之人，易来窥觇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163978_comment'></div>贼若探知此路平快，将来入寇，分一道兵自𢇲穰寨，扼断故关及水洛，则援兵断绝，秦州必危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163978_comment'></div>所以秦州人闻官中开道，皆有忧虑之言，不可不知，六也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163978_comment'></div>泾原路缘边地土最为膏腴，自来常有弓箭手家人及内地浮浪之人，诣城寨官员求先刺手背，候有空闲地土摽占，谓之强人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163978_comment'></div>此辈只要官中添置城寨，夺得蕃部土地耕种，又无分毫租税，缓急西贼入寇，则和家逃入内地，事过之后，却前首身，所以人数虽多，希得其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163978_comment'></div>又商贾之徒，各务求属，于新城内射地土居住，取便与蕃部交易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163978_comment'></div>昨来刘沪下倡和修城之人，尽是此辈，于官中未见有益，七也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163978_comment'></div>泾原一路，重兵皆在渭州，自渭州至水洛城凡六程，若将来西贼以兵围胁水洛城，日夕告急，部署司不可不救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163978_comment'></div>少发兵则不能进前，多发兵则与前来葛怀敏救定川寨覆没大军事体一般。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163978_comment'></div>所以泾原路患在添置城寨者，一恐分却<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/142/Comments/0")'>兵马</span>，二恐救应转难，八也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163978_comment'></div>议者言修水洛城，不唯通两路援兵，亦要弹压彼处一带蕃部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163978_comment'></div>泾原、秦凤两路，除熟户外，其生户有蹉鹘者谷、达谷、必利城、臈家城、鸱枭城、古渭州、龛谷、洮河、兰州、叠宕州，连宗哥、青唐城一带种类，莫知其数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163978_comment'></div>然族帐分散，不相君长，故不能为中国之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163978_comment'></div>又谓元昊为草贼，素相仇雠，不肯服从，今水洛城乃其一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163978_comment'></div>朝廷若欲开拓边境，须待西北无事，财力强盛之时，当今取之，实为无用，九也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1163978_comment'></div>今修水洛城，本要通两路之兵，其陇城川等大寨，须藉秦凤差人修置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1163978_comment'></div>今秦州文彦博累有论奏，称其不便，显是妨碍，不合动移，十也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1163978_comment'></div>凡边上臣僚图实效者，在于选举将校、训练<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_40_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/176/Comments/3")'>兵马</span>、修完城寨、安集蕃汉，以备寇之至而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1163978_comment'></div>贪功之人则不然，唯务兴事求赏，不思国计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1163978_comment'></div>故昨来郑戬差许迁等部领<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/181/Comments/0")'>兵马</span>修城，又差走马承受麦知微作都大照管名目，若修城功毕，则皆是转官酬奖之人，不期与尹洙、狄青所见不同，遂致中辍，希望转官，皆不如意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1163978_comment'></div>今若水洛城复修，则陇城川等又须相继兴筑，其逐处所差官员将校，人人只望事了转官，岂肯更虑国家向后<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_43_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/193/Comments/0")'>兵马</span>粮草之费？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1163978_comment'></div>十一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1163978_comment'></div>昨者泾原路抽回许迁等<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/195/Comments/0")'>兵马</span>之时，只筑得数百步，例各二尺以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1163978_comment'></div>其刘沪凭恃郑戬，轻视本路<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/199/Comments/0")'>主帅</span>，一面兴工不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1163978_comment'></div>及至差官交割，又不听从，此狄青等所以收捉送禁，奏告朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1163978_comment'></div>今来若以刘沪全无过犯，只是狄青、尹洙可罪，乃是全不计修水洛城经久利害，只听郑戬等争气加诬，则边上使臣，自此节制不行，大害军事，十二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1163978_comment'></div>陕西四路，唯泾原一路所寄尤重，盖川平原阔，贼路最多，故朝廷委尹洙、狄青以经略之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1163978_comment'></div>近西界虽遣人议和，自杨守素回后，又经月馀，寂无<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_50_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/221/Comments/0")'>消耗</span>，环庆等路，不住有贼马入界侵掠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1163978_comment'></div>今已五月，去防秋不远，西贼奸计，大未可量，朝廷当劝逐路帅臣豫作支吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1163978_comment'></div>今乃欲以偏裨不受节制为无过，而却加罪<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1163978", 1163978, "Clauses/230/Comments/0")'>主帅</span>，实见事体未顺，十三也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1163978_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年8月</a>　八月以后，韩琦指出仁宗夜遣宦官捕赛神聚饮官员为非当。又向皇帝指责张方平、王拱辰等同力攻王益柔，意在倾正人。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年11月</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。十一月，韩琦有《庆历甲申郊礼告成五言十韵》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_495959' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495959' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495959?labeling=true' target='_blank'>庆历甲申郊礼告成五言十韵<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495959")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_495959_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_495959_0'>① 上御路寝致斋雪作，行礼日景色澄霁</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495959'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495959'>圣飨申精意，灵心察至虔。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495959'>因知斋次雪，为显祭时天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495959'>清庙陈丰洁，中坛致吉蠲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495959'>乐和来瑞物，景霁见非烟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495959'>卜日灰飞管，通祠火举权。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495959'>短茵新礼重，虚幄睟容专。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495959'>盛美推穹昊，釐祥被幅员。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495959'>庆成朝万玉，霈泽谨三钱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495959'>有幸瞻熙事，无才列奏篇。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495959'>为民祈福应，亲记德音宣<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495959'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_495959_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_495959'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_9_495959_0'>⑴ 自注：上太庙宿斋，雪霁，二府称庆，上曰此为民祈福之应也。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_495959_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年11月</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。十一月，韩琦有《章献明肃皇太后挽辞二首》（其一）<span id='poem_sentence_1_496542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496542'>宫寝延嵩月，袆褕寓洛尘。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496542_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496542_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年11月</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。十一月，韩琦有《章惠皇太后挽辞二首》（其一）<span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496543")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496543_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496543'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496543'>椒掖遗芳在，龟台别信空。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496543'>旧恩缘服重，新庙见慈同。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496543'>残月无多夜，馀花一向风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496543'>徽音从此断，忍顾洛川东。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496543_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496543'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496543_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496544' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496544' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496544?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年11月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496544_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496544'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496544'>柔顺符坤德，兴居监女箴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496544_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496544'>笥衣裙有练，殿壁带无金。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496544_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496544'>外族疏恩薄，中宸结爱深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496544_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496544'>宫娥齐饮泣，谁副祝延心。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496544_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496544'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496544_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年12月</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。十二月，韩琦上《乞别白朋党奏》，给出了朋党的标准：奸邪与挟私之人出于私利而建事补官，致使黑白不分，上蔽主听，此为朋党。忠义与好公之人出于公心的建事补官，不能称之为朋党。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷三；《韩魏公集》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_1163915' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163915' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163915?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞别白朋党奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历四年十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163915")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163915_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163915'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163915'>臣窃闻已降诏书申诫朋党，此盖陛下恢善治、劝薄俗之深意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163915_comment'></div>臣辄有管穴之见，少思开助圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163915_comment'></div>窃以自古迄今，人臣在朝，有忠贤，有奸邪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163915_comment'></div>有好公之人，有挟私之党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163915_comment'></div>既为性之不同，则各以类而相附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163915_comment'></div>大凡忠贤与好公之人，建一事，补一官，则必公其是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163915_comment'></div>盖是者言是，非者言非，惟在于公，故政化可兴而邦家是赖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163915_comment'></div>此乃善者以类而进，不可谓朋党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163915_comment'></div>若奸邪与挟私之人，建一事，补一官，则必私其是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163915_comment'></div>盖是者言非，非者言是，惟在于私，致使白黑不分，而上蔽主听者，真所谓朋党也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163915_comment'></div>在圣君审而察之，决而行之，若有此等朋党，必望陛下重加贬责，不可务宽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163915_comment'></div>俾其忠贤与好公之人以类而进，奸邪与挟私之人以党而退，则朝廷清明，朋党自息也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163915_comment'></div>若但行诏谕，未赐别白，臣恐天下搢绅自今而后，欲建一善事，称一善人，必再三思之，曰：得无涉朋党之迹乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163915_comment'></div>则中道而止矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163915_comment'></div>纵有忠义之人，不顾形迹，建一善事，称一善人，若恶之者谮于上，曰「此朋党之为耳」，则善事与善人皆废而不用矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163915_comment'></div>惟陛下孰察而必行之，天下幸甚！</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1163915_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。韩琦有《迁葬求郡谢赐批答不允表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163698' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163698' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163698?labeling=true' target='_blank'>迁葬求郡谢赐批答不允表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163698")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163698_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163698'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163698'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈以臣上表陈乞知相州，或近乡里一郡，躬亲营护坟域，特降诏旨不允，许臣襄宅有期，即当暂往者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163698_comment'></div>请郡以奉先茔，虽违素愿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163698_comment'></div>赐告以护亲葬，亦示优恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163698_comment'></div>粗安人子之诚，特出圣宸之惠<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163698_comment'></div>伏念臣向繇睿选，擢贰枢庭，方图报以尽勤，敢求安而自逸？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163698_comment'></div>盖以早从稚岁，二亲则亡，暨窃荣阶，诸兄继谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163698_comment'></div>比缘西事，久在兵间，顾封树之未谐，每肺肝之如割。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163698_comment'></div>逮尘重任，正偶利年，寻得地于故乡，已涓辰于远日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163698_comment'></div>臣尝私自省度，至于再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163698_comment'></div>视輤车而弗亲行，实孝心之不忍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163698_comment'></div>处近位而求便假，必物议之有云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163698_comment'></div>与其贪宠以抑情，孰若避贤而申志？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163698_comment'></div>是以辄由衷而露奏，冀解职以为藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163698_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下念进退之匪轻，欲公私之克济，曲颁纶诏，亲谕玉音，俾襄事之如期，即驰驺而暂往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163698_comment'></div>感深存殁，荣耀搢绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163698_comment'></div>敢不砥节愈坚，挺身思奋？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163698_comment'></div>他人之惮行者臣不惮，他人之难言者臣必言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163698_comment'></div>傥犬马之未先，誓糜捐而无避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163698_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163698_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。韩琦有《叙先考令公遗事与尹龙图书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164012' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164012' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164012?labeling=true' target='_blank'>叙先考令公遗事与尹龙图书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164012")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164012_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164012'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164012'>琦启：今岁始于相州安阳之新安村，距祖茔三十里得地吉，以明年二月奉考妣以降诸丧归葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164012_comment'></div>孝子之心，必求世之高才大笔，以志不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164012_comment'></div>惟先君官氏次叙，暨从政之迹，则有司封兄先著行状，及国史所记，不敢复述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164012_comment'></div>今载考家谍，询诸老旧，得先君之遗事，继而书之，以备论撰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164012_comment'></div>先君之先，深州博野人也，自李唐以来，世以宦学知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164012_comment'></div>曾祖昌辞皇任真定府鼓城令，祖璆皇任广晋府永济令，父构皇任太子中允、赠工部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164012_comment'></div>去年秋，琦忝贰枢筦，继以郊恩，得追宠三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164012_comment'></div>永济府君赠太子太保，夫人史氏赠北海郡夫人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164012_comment'></div>尚书赠太子太傅，夫人李氏赠赵郡太夫人，即晋相李公崧之嫡女也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164012_comment'></div>先君赠太师，夫人罗氏赠仁寿郡太夫人，即故大谏延吉之女，邺王之孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164012_comment'></div>始，太师高祖成德军节度判官、检校太子左庶子兼御史中丞乂宾，富有文行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164012_comment'></div>值唐僖宗朝，王室多故，遂优游乡里，晦道自养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164012_comment'></div>时镇帅王绍鼎知其名，厚加礼辟，起参幕之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164012_comment'></div>逮子景崇袭镇，以巢寇乱，纠檄邻道，图勤王之举，庶子尽所筹画，卒成其功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164012_comment'></div>生二子，与诸侄俱有才名，更为中令常山王镕宾属，故镕府衣冠之盛，冠于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164012_comment'></div>长子定辞，镇州观察判官、检校尚书、祠部郎中，次即鼓城府君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164012_comment'></div>祠部属文最赡，贯达古今，尝聘燕帅刘仁恭，与仁恭幕吏马彧赋诗，有「痴龙银笔」之句，当世推其博览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164012_comment'></div>鼓城早亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164012_comment'></div>真定乱，太保举族之赵郡之赞皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164012_comment'></div>笃志嗜学，尤工歌诗，镇帅范延光知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164012_comment'></div>历补深、冀属邑主簿、丞，又摄真定府衙推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164012_comment'></div>后李公崧、徐公台符，有乡曲游学之旧，皆历贵仕，以太保未达为愧，方交荐于朝，而太保病不起，故徐哀而作诗曰：「穹旻何事教埋玉，朋友无由继断金」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164012_comment'></div>足见相得之深也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164012_comment'></div>而李公以弟嶬之女归于太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164012_comment'></div>当周、晋二朝，屡从藩府之辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164012_comment'></div>长于书奏，得唐李义山之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164012_comment'></div>尝为具清河宰受署之日作条教，揭榜以谕县民，其略有「枉法扰人之事，断腕不行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164012_comment'></div>养民恤物之方，疾心是念」之语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164012_comment'></div>故子孙为吏，祖其廉爱之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164012_comment'></div>后徙家相台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164012_comment'></div>开宝末，终康州牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164012_comment'></div>太师即其第三子也，故为相州安阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164012_comment'></div>太师美须髯，状貌奇伟，立朝挺特，搢绅耸仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164012_comment'></div>外宽内恕，虽家人未尝见喜愠之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164012_comment'></div>出入衢肆，目不妄视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164012_comment'></div>在相幕时，年未壮，里人有伺其出，戏于众曰：「今日得韩公左右顾我，当为尔曹具肴酒」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164012_comment'></div>其严重如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164012_comment'></div>生平不喜任知数，与人言，必尽出肺腑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164012_comment'></div>性至孝，自幼孤，见事二亲有禄以养者，则泫然终日，痛己无及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164012_comment'></div>力绍先业，年十九登进士甲科，声称烜赫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164012_comment'></div>仕渐达，诸亲率均俸周急，不间疏近，以是家无馀财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164012_comment'></div>姑姊数人，孀且老，悉奉以归，事之甚恭，为其男女婚嫁，又与之营薄业，使足以济其终而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164012_comment'></div>训诸子，要令自取禄仕，屡经恩得任子，皆抑而不奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164012_comment'></div>仁寿或以为言，太师曰：「尔曹有官在身，便谓荣官可不劳而得，废学矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164012_comment'></div>俟其艺业有所取，奏之何晚」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164012_comment'></div>故身殁之后，三子皆白丁，法掾兄用遗奏，始得出身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164012_comment'></div>凡莅官，大抵以爱利为本，奉身廉约，于民无毫发之扰，所去人思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164012_comment'></div>罢泉南，行次建州传舍而终，泉人闻之罢市奔赴，恸泣于灵所，竞为佛事以报焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164012_comment'></div>公早以方正才敏为神宗所知，亟被柬擢，留计省凡八任，不令补外，数欲大用，为忌者所抑而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164012_comment'></div>至景德、祥符间，趣向寖与时背，又任直，与当权者不合，遂守道平进，无所屈挠，以至于亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164012_comment'></div>小子罪衅至重，幼失所天，尚不能记颜面之髣髴，治行之美，盖十不得其一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164012_comment'></div>又先君章疏文集，先为河阳法掾君所掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164012_comment'></div>及物故，嫂辛氏尽携以归其家，后失之，不复得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164012_comment'></div>故纪述之际，实多漏略，甚可痛也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164012_comment'></div>今远日有期矣，思老于文而相知深者，无出师鲁，是以不远千里，遣门人杨生奉书请铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164012_comment'></div>惟贤者鉴此，勤恳毋让。</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1164012_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1044&endYear=1044')">1044年</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。韩琦有《教阅赏赐事奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_1163979' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163979' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163979?labeling=true' target='_blank'>教阅赏赐事奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历四年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1044年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163979")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163979_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163979'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163979'>教射唯事体容及强弓，不习射亲不可以临阵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163979_comment'></div>臣至边，尝定弓弩挽强、蹠硬、射亲格，愿行诸军立赏肄习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163979_comment'></div>岁以春秋二时各一阅，诸营先上射亲吏卒之数，命近臣与殿前、马步军司阅之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163979_comment'></div>其射亲入第四至第七等，量先给赐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163979_comment'></div>入第三等以上及挽强、蹠硬中格，悉引对亲阅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163979_comment'></div>第数多者，其正副指挥使亦第赐金帛。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1163979_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年1月</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。宋夏议和之后，宋仁宗庆历五年（1045）正月，韩琦又上《论西北和议奏》，提出深谋远虑之策。是为消除潜在之三大忧，伺机获一大利。一忧是西夏虽因多年战争，断绝和市而国力大损，暂时屈服，但在得到朝廷的岁币和恢复和市之后，很快就会恢复国力，可能重新对宋朝发动战争。二忧是河北守备空虚，契丹若败盟要挟，朝廷会措手不及。三忧是朝廷给西、北二敌岁币，暂求苟安，这样加重了人民的负担，若遇水旱可能患生腹心。一利是，契丹、西夏之间矛盾重重，正是朝廷养谋待衅之时；若朝廷内辑纪纲，外练士卒，休息民力，蓄敛财用，即可坐待二虏之弊，收渔翁之利，一举收复幽、蓟、灵、夏等汉唐旧疆。为防三忧而取一利，河东、河北、陕西三边要委专人经制，范仲淹和富弼已往河东、河北经制边事。陕西四路边备更不能松懈，须选有才望近臣为陕西主帅，委之久任，防羌人翻覆之变。最后，从全局出发，从长治久安考虑，精减内地各路常兵，解决冗兵蠹财痼疾。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷三；《韩魏公集》卷一七。）</span><div id='poem_1163916' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163916' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163916?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论西北议和奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163916")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163916_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163916'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163916'>臣伏见朝廷已封册夏国，又契丹以西征回来告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163916_comment'></div>当此之时，若便为太平无事，则后必有大忧者三；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163916_comment'></div>若以前日之患虑及经远，则后必有大利者一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163916_comment'></div>请略言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163916_comment'></div>自羌人盗边以来，于今七年，小入大至，未尝挫其锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163916_comment'></div>今乘累胜之气，而与朝廷讲和者，得非凡军兴之物，悉取其国人，而所获不偿所费，又以绝在边和市，上下困乏，暂就称臣之虚名，而岁邀二十五万之厚赂，非为得计邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163916_comment'></div>且契丹势素强，而夏人尚敢与之抗衡，若使其岁享金缯及和市之利，国内充实，一旦我之边备稍弛，则必有大窥图关辅之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163916_comment'></div>此臣所谓后必有大忧者一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163916_comment'></div>契丹昨以羌人诱致边民，遽往讨伐，既不得志而还，见朝廷封册曩霄，其心必固不乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163916_comment'></div>近谍者传契丹国人语云：「往河西趋沙漠中，所得者唯牛羊耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163916_comment'></div>若议南牧，则子女玉帛，不胜其有」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163916_comment'></div>臣恐契丹异日或更有邀求，或请绝西人之和，以隳盟誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163916_comment'></div>且河北兵骄不练，忽尔奔冲，则必震动京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163916_comment'></div>此臣所谓后必有大忧者二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163916_comment'></div>又昔石晋假契丹力以得天下，岁遗缯帛三十万；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163916_comment'></div>今朝廷岁遗契丹五十万，夏国二十五万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163916_comment'></div>使二虏日以富强，而国家取之于民，日以脧削，不幸数乘水旱之灾，则患生腹心，不独在虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163916_comment'></div>此臣所谓后必有大忧者三也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163916_comment'></div>昨契丹自恃强盛，意欲并吞夏人，仓卒兴师，反成败衄，犬羊之性，切于复雠，必恐自此交兵未已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163916_comment'></div>且夷狄相攻者，中国之利，此诚朝廷养谋待衅之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163916_comment'></div>若能内葺纪纲，外练将卒，休息民力，蓄歛财用，以坐待二虏之敝，则幽蓟灵夏之地，一举而可图，振耀威灵，弹压夷夏，岂不休哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163916_comment'></div>此臣所谓后必有大利者一也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163916_comment'></div>臣愿陛下深思，去大忧而取大利，则为天下之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163916_comment'></div>今范仲淹、富弼往河东、河北经制边事，必有所陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163916_comment'></div>然臣久在陕西，敢复陈陕西措置事宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163916_comment'></div>且鄜延、环庆、泾原、秦凤四路，虽罢招讨使，而边备不可弛，请仍选有才望近臣为之主帅，特降手诏，委之久任，使其经营一方，以备羌人翻覆之变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163916_comment'></div>又四路所驻兵，十分中宜留六分在边，二分令东还，二分徙屯近里州军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163916_comment'></div>其鄜延路徙屯河中府，环庆、泾原路徙屯邠州、永兴军，秦凤路徙屯凤翔府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163916_comment'></div>逐路钤辖一员，驻泊都监二员，与逐路知州同行训练，而本路仍领之，非有事宜，不得辄抽动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163916_comment'></div>其徙屯兵马处，知州才望轻者，请选人代之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163916_comment'></div>又四路所抽就粮土兵，请委逐路帅臣相度，岁分两番，一番在边，一番放归本处，不唯减节边上粮草，兼使无久戍之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163916_comment'></div>又陕西州军经南郊赏给之后，官帑例皆空虚，今范仲淹若过陕西宣抚，则又有军间特支，徒益所费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163916_comment'></div>若臣策可行，陕西亦别无处置，不必仲淹更往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163916_comment'></div>复见诸路昨招置宣毅兵近十一万，然朝廷物力未充，何以赡给？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163916_comment'></div>况闾里窃发，自有巡检、县尉可以捕击，若防群盗，只当益屯一路都会之地，不必每州尽要防守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163916_comment'></div>其宣毅兵欲乞除河北、河东外，其京东、京西、淮南、两浙、江南、荆湖、福建等路，每指挥可减以三百人为额，后有阙即招填之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163916_comment'></div>今天下兵冗不精，轻蠹财用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163916_comment'></div>陕西、河东、河北、京东州军，已曾差官拣选，其馀路亦乞选近上内臣分往拣选，所贵冗食可蠲，而经费可给也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1163916_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='29cdecbe13274108a708d6c50dc04b7f_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("29cdecbe13274108a708d6c50dc04b7f");'><span id='29cdecbe13274108a708d6c50dc04b7f_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>，38岁</div><div id='29cdecbe13274108a708d6c50dc04b7f' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年3月</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。三月，韩琦上《乞以北事委富弼奏》，为革新派杜衍、范仲淹等人鸣不平，对于有大功于朝廷的富弼被安置于闲郡提出自己的反对意见，要求改任处于契丹边界的定州做知州，并于赴任之前给以陛对，以示优宠。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷三；《韩魏公集》卷一六。）</span><div id='poem_1163911' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163911' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163911?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞以北事委富弼奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163911")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163911_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163911'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163911'>臣伏睹前月二十九日，杜衍、范仲淹、富弼并罢政事，出补外任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163911_comment'></div>臣窃谓陛下用杜衍为宰相，方及一百二十日而罢，此必陛下见其过失，非臣敢议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163911_comment'></div>范仲淹以夏人初附，自乞保边，朝廷因而命之，固有名矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163911_comment'></div>至于富弼之出，则所损甚大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163911_comment'></div>臣始不敢容易奏陈，虑言事臣僚与缙绅高识之士，必有为陛下别白论列者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163911_comment'></div>数日观听，略无一人启口，得非惜身畏祸，人之常情？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163911_comment'></div>臣受国重恩，备位枢辅，若事有干国家之大计，惑天下之耳目，岂可偷安固禄，隐而不言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163911_comment'></div>窃见富弼大节难夺，天与忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163911_comment'></div>昨契丹领大兵压境，致谩书于朝廷，仓卒之间，命弼使虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163911_comment'></div>弼割老母之爱，蹈不测之祸，以正辩屈强虏，卒复和议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163911_comment'></div>亡身立事，古人所难，故近者李良臣自虏来归，盛言北方自虏主而下皆称重之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163911_comment'></div>陛下两命弼为枢密副使，皆弗有其功，辞避弗受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163911_comment'></div>逮抑令赴上，则不顾毁誉，动思振缉纪纲，其志欲为陛下立万世之业耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163911_comment'></div>去年秋，北虏点集大兵，声言讨伐元昊，朝廷未测虚实，弼以河朔边备未设，又自请行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163911_comment'></div>于今在外，已是半年，经久御戎之术，固已蓄于胸中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163911_comment'></div>事毕还朝，甫及都门，未得一陈于陛下之前，而责补闲郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163911_comment'></div>外人不知得罪之因，臣亦痛弼有何负于朝廷，而黜辱至此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163911_comment'></div>臣恐自此天下忠臣义士指弼为戒，孰肯为国家之用？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163911_comment'></div>所损岂细哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163911_comment'></div>臣固知朝廷成命不可追改，然尚有一策可救其失，愿陛下试加详择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163911_comment'></div>臣窃见近日李用和多疾，陛下欲召李昭亮赴阙管干本司公事，而武臣中求一代昭亮者，皆难其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163911_comment'></div>臣谓陛下不若因此改弼知定州，仍兼总管之职，遣一中使宣谕，令赴阙奏河北公事毕赴任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163911_comment'></div>俟其陛对，慰而遣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163911_comment'></div>弼素禀忠义，感此恩遇，惟思效死，岂敢更以内外职任为意，别有论列？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163911_comment'></div>如此，则是朝廷以北事专委富弼，以西事专委仲淹，使朝夕经营，以防二虏之变，朝廷实有所倚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163911_comment'></div>又北虏素知弼之威望，亦可以杜其轻发之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163911_comment'></div>若无事则弃于闲郡，有事则责令捍边，不惟措置后时，亦是国家失体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163911_comment'></div>臣所以不避朋党之疑，思一寤于圣聪者，盖以臣下朋党，本求进身；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163911_comment'></div>今臣叨窃宠任，班著已优，不能惜事寡言，随众上下，渐图进用，而救辨得罪之臣，自取祸患，臣为朋党，不亦拙乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163911_comment'></div>愿陛下察臣此心，则朋党之疑自解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163911_comment'></div>兼近日臣僚多务攻击忠良，取快私忿，非是国家之福，惟陛下久而察之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1163911_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。韩琦有《云》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。此诗作于仁宗庆历间韩琦任枢密副使时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495960' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495960' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_495967' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495967' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495967?labeling=true' target='_blank'>牡丹初芽为鸦啄之感而成咏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495967")'>韩琦</a></span><br id='poem_sentence_0_495967'>牡丹经雨发香芽，满地新红因饿鸦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495967_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495967'>利嘴可能伤国艳，只教春色入凡花。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495967_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495967'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495967_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。韩琦有《游蜂》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。此诗作于仁宗庆历间韩琦任枢密副使时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495968' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495968' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495968?labeling=true' target='_blank'>游蜂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495968")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_495968_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495968'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495968'>游蜂纷扑竞花繁，未到香须只自喧。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495968'>尽日却输蝴蝶计，闹红心里默无言。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495968_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495968'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495968_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　在开封，任枢密副使。韩琦有《新燕》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。此诗作于仁宗庆历间韩琦任枢密副使时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495969' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495969' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495969?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新燕</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495969")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_495969_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495969'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495969'>出入高堂性似驯，泥巢深稳足容身。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495969_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495969'>雕梁并宿嫌频看，巧语多应是骂人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495969_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495969'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495969_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='708a321bda124c21b8d61aa031bafad3_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("708a321bda124c21b8d61aa031bafad3");'><span id='708a321bda124c21b8d61aa031bafad3_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1062')">1056-1062年</a>，49-55岁</div><div id='708a321bda124c21b8d61aa031bafad3' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年8月</a>　七月，韩琦疾愈，召为工部尚书、三司使。还没到任，八月，除检校太傅，充枢密使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年8月</a>　在开封，枢密使任上。韩琦有《辞免枢密使札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年8月</a>　在开封，枢密使任上。韩琦有《辞免枢密使第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163807' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163807' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163807?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免枢密使第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163807")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163807_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163807'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163807'>臣近奉诏赴阙，而闻朝廷除臣充三司使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163807_comment'></div>臣向日大疾之后，精力未复，辄敢陈奏辞避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163807_comment'></div>续奉朝旨催促，臣即时治行上道，又闻降制擢臣为枢密使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163807_comment'></div>缘三司唯治钱谷，臣尚恐衰劣隳败，有误国计；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163807_comment'></div>今宥密之地，天下兵制无不总领，边防处置动系安危，当此之时，陛下宜选不世出之才，以协中外之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163807_comment'></div>如臣识虑素短，又身有宿疹，实不可玷冒恩宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163807_comment'></div>已两次具述诚恳，上渎圣听，乞早赐追寝新命，只令臣于三司供职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163807_comment'></div>臣虽疲瘵，若朝廷责以岁月之效，亦望稍给经费，未奉俞旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163807_comment'></div>臣夙夜省度，诚知大祀俯逼，君召不即奔赴，合抵严诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163807_comment'></div>然臣本以量力知分，求免重任，非有抗慢饰诈之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163807_comment'></div>若朝廷以此罪之，臣虽就戮，实无愧恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163807_comment'></div>臣见到韦城县，必俟可奏，方敢前去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163807_comment'></div>伏望特回圣意。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1163807_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年8月</a>　在开封，枢密使任上。韩琦有《辞免枢密使第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163808' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163808' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163808?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免枢密使第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163808")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163808_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163808'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163808'>臣近被召赴阙，而闻朝廷委以主计之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163808_comment'></div>臣以宿疹未复，惧不克堪，寻恳奏辞避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163808_comment'></div>续降奉圣旨，令依前降诏书，疾速发来赴阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163808_comment'></div>臣不敢再渎天听，方治行在道，又闻朝廷擢备枢辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163808_comment'></div>念臣才局素短，加之疾病衰耗，掌三司钱谷之事，尚恐不职，有误国家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163808_comment'></div>何况本兵之地，事有万微，当水为大灾，陛下侧身思政，访求谠言之际，宜得非常之才，使与丞弼之臣交相补助，以图治安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163808_comment'></div>臣之愚孱，岂能副陛下宠用之意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163808_comment'></div>伏望圣慈深惟名器之重，不可轻有付与，别选贤杰，总干机务，令臣只依前命，于三司供职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163808_comment'></div>臣当勉励疲拙，以济经用，所贵公议为允，臣诚粗宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163808_comment'></div>臣未敢即入都门，见且在路，听候朝旨。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1163808_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年8月</a>　八月，湖北溪洞蛮彭仕羲乞复通岁贡，要求宋庭送还先前逃难到宋的子孙——师宝父子二人。宰相文彦博准备一如所请，韩琦要求先约不杀师宝父子，然后许降。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　在开封，任枢密使。韩琦上章乞内中建立书院，择宗室贤才者升于内学，以为建储之选。作品：《论选宗室入内学奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1163924' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163924' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163924?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论选宗室入内学奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（嘉祐六年闰八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163924")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163924_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163924'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163924'>臣窃见近岁以来，内外忠孝之臣以陛下临御四海已四十年，而皇嗣未育，天下无所系心，不避重诛，继有论奏，乞于宗室中择幼而可教者权为嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163924_comment'></div>陛下慈仁崇俭，冠绝今古，天监至明，非晚必生圣子，以为庙社无疆之庆，至时宗室中权为嗣者优加职秩，使之退就宫邸，诚善议也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163924_comment'></div>臣愚窃怪陛下何疑而不行之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163924_comment'></div>然兹事至大，当独断于圣心，虽至亲至近之人，不可预议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163924_comment'></div>如陛下素有所属，已得其人，则望宣示中书、枢密院，使奉而行之，以慰中外之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163924_comment'></div>若谓贤愚难审，选择当谨，则臣曾乞于内中建学，取宗室中幼而谨厚、勤于为学者置于内学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163924_comment'></div>陛下每于听断之暇，或休暇之日，亲幸学舍，观其道业进退、应对长短，不年岁间，陛下必尽知其能否，然后圣虑取其可属者权而命之，则无不当矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163924_comment'></div>臣蒙陛下非次拔擢，使待罪宰相，思有以报上，而事无重于此者，故昧死尽言，惟圣度宽纳，则天下幸甚！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1163924_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　王安石有《先状上韩太尉》，回顾扬州幕府时期，对韩琦甚有仰慕之意。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年9月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。九月，同年状元、好朋友王尧臣去世，韩琦作有《祭仆射王公伯庸文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十三。）</span><div id='poem_1164179' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164179' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164179?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭仆射王公伯庸文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐元年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164179")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164179_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164179'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164179'>维嘉祐元年岁次戊戌，九月己巳朔某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故仆射王公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164179_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164179_comment'></div>仆与公交，世孰为匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164179_comment'></div>在天圣中，考士之实，上初临轩，亲按程律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164179_comment'></div>公当其选，天下第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164179_comment'></div>仆叨次公，若甲之乙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164179_comment'></div>为合之易，公纯我质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164179_comment'></div>爱则昆弟，同则胶漆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164179_comment'></div>从官西东，虽远犹密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164179_comment'></div>及佐大计，局相并邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164179_comment'></div>议必联席，食常对茵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164179_comment'></div>出入省户，辉光搢绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164179_comment'></div>公践掖垣，文追古醇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164179_comment'></div>夫何鄙材，复序后陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164179_comment'></div>更直书命，参明帝缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164179_comment'></div>公入禁林，朝称得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164179_comment'></div>仆草公制，荣无与伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164179_comment'></div>夏人扰边，沮我威武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164179_comment'></div>仆承人乏，奋命西御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164179_comment'></div>久之未效，命公来抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164179_comment'></div>公之所临，如旱而雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164179_comment'></div>繄公之略，遂振王怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164179_comment'></div>仆时帅秦，公留燕语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164179_comment'></div>独有二天，公惠之著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164179_comment'></div>疆事之宁，仆忝枢辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164179_comment'></div>公为大农，屈事泉布。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164179_comment'></div>进居公前，愧日无措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164179_comment'></div>仆斥于外，公方处中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164179_comment'></div>排攘群谗，阴存大功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164179_comment'></div>仆走二塞，身当虏冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164179_comment'></div>一纪之间，莫觌音容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164179_comment'></div>天与其幸，还趋九重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164179_comment'></div>付以旧物，本兵之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164179_comment'></div>公弼宰政，望尊德隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164179_comment'></div>而不大拜，反及愚庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164179_comment'></div>仆实无堪，惧颠厥位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164179_comment'></div>图讲大宁，赖公以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164179_comment'></div>其道之同，言无少异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164179_comment'></div>白发相亲，在古无二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164179_comment'></div>公历二府，积忧成瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164179_comment'></div>始疾之微，在告而治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164179_comment'></div>日须公出，以奉醇粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164179_comment'></div>如何浃旬，遽然永逝！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164179_comment'></div>嗟乎人生，有是不意！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164179_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164179_comment'></div>公之德业，海内胥传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164179_comment'></div>清芬雅范，则流为世法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164179_comment'></div>忠谋大节，则详于史编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164179_comment'></div>浩乎若江汉之纪地，灿然如日月之丽天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164179_comment'></div>此特叙生平之好，故举其概而不言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164179_comment'></div>唯将哀诚，一奠几筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164179_comment'></div>公固知我，终身怆然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164179_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1164179_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年9月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。九月，同年状元、好朋友王尧臣去世，韩琦作有《仆射王公挽辞三首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷四十五。）</span>《仆射王公挽辞三首》（其二）<span id='poem_title_496554_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496554'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496554'>早冠廉良选，寻专翰墨盟。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496554'>上知唯直道，人爱是纯诚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496554'>枢极权无挠，台衡论必平。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496554_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496554'>呜呼今已矣，天不为苍生。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496173'>宸心思报重，灵答匪诚难。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496173'>惠泽开秋惨，和声破晓寒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_496173_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_496173_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年9月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。九月，韩琦有《请编定禄令奏》<span
