"poem_title_1163920")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163920_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163920'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163920'>内外文武官俸入添支并将校请受，虽有品式，而每遇迁徙，须申有司检勘中覆，至有待报岁时不下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163920_comment'></div>请命近臣就三司编定为禄令。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163920_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　在开封，任枢密使。韩琦有《枢廷对竹》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。此诗作于仁宗嘉祐初韩琦任枢密使时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_496177' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496177' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496177?labeling=true' target='_blank'>枢廷对竹</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496177")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496177_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496177'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496177'>一纪前曾对此君，依然轩槛喜重亲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496177'>丹心自觉同高节，青眼相看似故人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496177'>不杂嚣尘终冷淡，饱经霜雪尚精神。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496177'>枢廷岂是琴樽伴，会约幽居称幅巾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496177_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496177'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496177_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年2月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。二月，杜衍去世，韩琦作有《祭正献杜公文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十三。）</span><div id='poem_1164180' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164180' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164180?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭正献杜公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164180")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164180_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164180'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164180'>维嘉祐二年岁次丁酉，二月丁未朔某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于司徒侍中杜公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164180_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164180_comment'></div>自公勇退，于今十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164180_comment'></div>天下日思，思公至贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164180_comment'></div>故每闻公之病也，众犹己之病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164180_comment'></div>今闻公之亡也，则相与骇而叹曰：元老之丧，天下将安所法焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164180_comment'></div>况辱公之知，世无比旃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164180_comment'></div>虽愿百殒以赎公而莫得兮，其哀深痛切，非文字之可传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164180_comment'></div>然而因奠写诚，乌可无说？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164180_comment'></div>含悲失次，举公大节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164180_comment'></div>在祥符初，文则公杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164180_comment'></div>巍取甲科，美誉四彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164180_comment'></div>自时为吏，天性精勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164180_comment'></div>驱烦判滞，明敏无伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164180_comment'></div>不施鞭扑，吏畏如神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164180_comment'></div>凡守郡邑，政胥曰循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164180_comment'></div>凡主财利，法皆近仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164180_comment'></div>中司执宪，纪律簪绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164180_comment'></div>曰雍曰并，乃国方面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164180_comment'></div>命公镇临，天子安燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164180_comment'></div>上曰公劳，来尹畿甸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164180_comment'></div>毂下亟清，枢廷是践。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164180_comment'></div>公既大任，为国图宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164180_comment'></div>力进忠良，正人汇征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164180_comment'></div>时羌之叛，与狄连衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164180_comment'></div>公谋庙堂，二垂寝兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164180_comment'></div>侥倖路塞，斜封不行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164180_comment'></div>有职颙然，坐观太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164180_comment'></div>谗邪狺狺，卒坏于成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164180_comment'></div>作相百日，彼徒益狞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164180_comment'></div>齧公于兖，公道愈明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164180_comment'></div>公则告老，上允其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164180_comment'></div>旋营厥居，处于宋京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164180_comment'></div>噫公之贵，不与众类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164180_comment'></div>不买田宅，不蓄声妓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164180_comment'></div>蔬食菜羹，缊袍布被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164180_comment'></div>奉己惟约，周人则义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164180_comment'></div>人难其常，公行独易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164180_comment'></div>至清之名，今昔无二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164180_comment'></div>噫公之退，与众复异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164180_comment'></div>棋博不亲，林泉不嗜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164180_comment'></div>枕籍百家，沉酣六艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164180_comment'></div>诗笔日新，放怀怡志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164180_comment'></div>书法日工，或草或隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164180_comment'></div>优游自娱，以卒吾岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164180_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164180_comment'></div>公官一品，位诚不卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164180_comment'></div>公寿八十，年非不耆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164180_comment'></div>在公享之良厚，何人心之甚悲？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164180_comment'></div>盖以公还事而来，精明不衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164180_comment'></div>忧国之虑，过于有政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164180_comment'></div>称善之勤，同于己为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164180_comment'></div>向使朝廷重惜公去，复公丞疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164180_comment'></div>以十馀岁之康宁，翼亿万世之丕基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164180_comment'></div>则治胡为而不唐虞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164180_comment'></div>公胡为而不皋夔？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164180_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164180_comment'></div>众愿之终戾兮，不系公而系时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164180_comment'></div>徒凭使人，酹公一卮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164180_comment'></div>公乎公乎，已而已而！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164180_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_60_1164180_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年2月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。二月，杜衍去世，韩琦作有《司徒侍中杜公挽辞三首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷四十五。）</span>《司徒侍中杜公挽辞三首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷四十五。）</span>《司徒侍中杜公挽辞三首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷四十五。）</span><div id='poem_496551' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496551' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496551?labeling=true' target='_blank'>司徒侍中杜公挽辞三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496551")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496551_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496551'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496551'>早退轻高位，孤风振昔贤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496551'>上思终不已，民望日依然。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496551'>荣宠三增秩，优游十换年。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496551'>请看良史旧，德孰似公全。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496551_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496551'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496551_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496552' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496552' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496552?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年2月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496552_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496552'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496552'>直道当年梗，清名万世师。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496552'>身閒心在国，迹退德高时。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496552'>警绝新诗雅，飞腾老笔奇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496552'>归休何所乐，持此造希夷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496552_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496552'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496552_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496553' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496553' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496553?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年2月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496553_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496553'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496553'>哲人何永逝，天理此难忱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496553'>子谨新遗札，家无旧赐金。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496553'>可传清白业，未足太平心。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496553'>讣至悲尤动，忘年顾遇深。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496553_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496553'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496553_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　春，进士及第的苏辙为求见韩琦，作有《上枢密韩太尉书》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年4月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。四月，韩琦有《祭狄相文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十三。）</span><div id='poem_1164181' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164181' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164181?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭狄相文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年四月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164181")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164181_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164181'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164181'>维嘉祐二年岁次丁酉，四月丙午朔，十六日幸酉，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故相狄公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164181_comment'></div>惟灵忠孝沉厚，出于天资；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164181_comment'></div>威名方略，耸于塞外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164181_comment'></div>入登枢府，盖旌勋劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164181_comment'></div>出殿辅藩，聊遂偃息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164181_comment'></div>何五福所钟，而不与其寿？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164181_comment'></div>一人所悼者，未尽其才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164181_comment'></div>某向处边垂，公实裨佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164181_comment'></div>自闻倾丧，日极哀怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164181_comment'></div>兹承已择良辰，权厝净宇，敢凭薄酹，少致哀诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164181_comment'></div>魂兮有知，谅垂歆监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164181_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1164181_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年8月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。八月，韩琦见当时所用编敕前后抵牾，奏请删定。作品：《乞删定编敕奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1163989' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163989' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163989?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞删定编敕奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163989")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163989_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163989'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163989'>天下见行编敕，自庆历四年以后，距今十五年，续降四千三百馀件，前后多牴牾，请加删定。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1163989_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年8月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。八月，因为此前韩琦奏请差官编录枢密院机密图书，故朝廷下诏编集枢密院机要文字，枢密副使程戡提举。作品：《乞差官编录机密图书奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1163919' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163919' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163919?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞差官编录机密图书奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和三年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163919")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163919_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163919'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163919'>历古以来，治天下者莫不以图书为急，盖万世之根本，后世之模法，不可失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163919_comment'></div>恭惟我宋受命几百年矣，凡机密图书，尽在密院，而散逸蠹朽，多所不全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163919_comment'></div>至于近岁文书，欲求證用，已不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163919_comment'></div>臣比到院，因北界争宁化军地土，令检北界朔州牒宁化军，称天池庙系属南朝，当日原牒累月检之不获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163919_comment'></div>及因西人理会麟州疆界，亦寻庆历中臣在院日与西人商议纳欸始末文案，亦已不全，以此知机要文字从来散失甚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163919_comment'></div>请差官于诸房讨寻编录，一本进内，一本留枢密院厅，以备经久之用。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1163919_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年8月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。八月，韩琦奏请诸道节镇及并、益、庆、渭四州，余州军监，委长吏选官合药，以时给散力或不能及的贫下之家。作品：《乞岁赐钱选官合药以救民疾奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1163922' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163922' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163922?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞岁赐钱选官合药以救民疾奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163922")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163922_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163922'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163922'>朝廷颁方书诸道以救民疾，而贫下之家力或不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163922_comment'></div>请自今诸道节镇及益、并、庆、渭四州岁赐二千万，馀州军监十万，委长吏选官合药，以时给散<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163922_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1163922'>年月原无，据《长编》补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163922_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163922'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163922_0'>⑴ 《韩魏公集》卷一七。又见《隆平集》卷三，《韩魏王家传》卷五，《续资治通鉴长编》卷一八六，《通鉴长编纪事本末》卷三○。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1163922_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年8月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。八月，韩琦奏请择知医书儒臣与太医参定经典医书颁行。作品：《乞校正医书颁行奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1163990' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163990' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163990?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞校正医书颁行奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163990")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163990_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163990'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163990'>医书如《灵枢》、《太素》、《甲乙经》《、广济》、《千金》、《外台秘要》之类，本多讹舛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163990_comment'></div>《神农本草》虽开宝中尝命官校定，然其编载，尚有所遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163990_comment'></div>请择知医书儒臣与太医参定颁行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163990_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年8月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。八月，韩琦有《请赈恤老幼贫疾奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1163921' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163921' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163921?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请赈恤老幼贫疾奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163921")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163921_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163921'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163921'>尝览前代，见两汉之世，其于鳏寡孤独、老眊笃癃之民，每诏郡国，则必哀怜轸恻，间有粟帛之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163921_comment'></div>故大汉之德，感人之深，不独当时之人思爱不已，至于后世，亦嗟叹而称美之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163921_comment'></div>陛下绍祖宗积累之业，至仁至慈，视天下之民犹父母保赤子，唯恐其有伤也，岂愧于二汉哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163921_comment'></div>但赈恤之事，议者有所未至耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163921_comment'></div>请罢鬻诸路户绝田，募人承佃，以秋夏所输之课，给在城老幼贫疾不能自存者。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163921_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年8月</a>　八月，根据韩琦的最初建言，置天下广惠仓。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年10月</a>　在开封，任枢密使。韩琦有《侄太常寺太祝直彦墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164145' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164145' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164145?labeling=true' target='_blank'>侄太常寺太祝直彦墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164145")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164145_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164145'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164145'>三兄司封第三子曰直彦，字师黯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164145_comment'></div>幼聪悟喜学，七岁能属文，语言动作如老成者，兄以是特爱之，异于诸子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164145_comment'></div>十一岁而兄亡，嫂李氏继卒，予抚而教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164145_comment'></div>直彦能禀训自饬，道业日修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164145_comment'></div>为人和谨通明，周悉时事，内奉亲族，外接宾友，无不得其欢心者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164145_comment'></div>予常谓兄清德纯孝，为世表式，而天不大畀其位，又夺其年，则其庆之所延，宜直彦得之，以兴吾宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164145_comment'></div>故心常泰然，知门户之可属也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164145_comment'></div>直彦始以兄荫补太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164145_comment'></div>庆历七年，予用南郊恩例，迁将作监簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164145_comment'></div>皇祐二年，大飨明堂，迁太常寺太祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164145_comment'></div>五年春，举进士及第，签署信阳军判官厅公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164145_comment'></div>时予为帅并门，直彦归，待信阳阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164145_comment'></div>明年春，以家事如京师，得疮疹，医误而早下之，毒气内畜不得发，三月二十日，卒于其姊婿秘书丞张诜之家，年二十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164145_comment'></div>余既以吾门属直彦，又痛其不得在家而亡，悲哀之积，乃得大疾，几于不可治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164145_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164145_comment'></div>余之所爱，岂私于直彦哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164145_comment'></div>盖以世家子类多不历艰难，习尚骄佚，不知其先之所得之勤，忘学肆侈，自底不令，使生者族属不能合，死者坟墓无所托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164145_comment'></div>幸而有一贤子孙出，则其尊亲之心，其爱何如也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164145_comment'></div>今吾子侄辈皆耻以门籍之荫，思自树立，茍能力行力学，动以不坠先业为意，则余之所爱，犹爱直彦之公也，岂私乎哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164145_comment'></div>妻崔氏，余妻兄大理寺丞勉之女，工部侍郎立之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164145_comment'></div>柔顺正洁，得其家法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164145_comment'></div>三子：挹，试秘书省校书郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164145_comment'></div>次高、绍，并幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164145_comment'></div>一女，直彦讣至，踰月而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164145_comment'></div>司封兄讳琚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164145_comment'></div>嫂李氏，寿春县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164145_comment'></div>以嘉祐二年十月十八日，葬直彦于相州安阳县新安村之水冶先祖令公之墓次东茔之辛穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164145_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1164145'>噫嘻乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164145_comment'></div>夫士族之兴也，不系乎子孙之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164145_comment'></div>何贤而多夭兮，不肖之比肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164145_comment'></div>谓祖宗德薄而致兮，则吾家之不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164145_comment'></div>既富尔之德，而啬其寿兮，是三子者宜昌大而克传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164145_comment'></div>若然，则善恶之报，人犹有望于天焉。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1164145'></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1164145_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　在开封，任枢密使。韩琦有《祈雪宿斋醴泉观》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_496184' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496184' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496184?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祈雪宿斋醴泉观</a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496184")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496184_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496184'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496184'>愆阳经腊恻皇情，遍走灵祠达意诚<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作情，据明刻本改）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496184'>马殆始知仙府迥，露寒如到月宫清。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496184'>甘泉既久蠲民瘼，惠泽非难涤厉萌。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496184'>日待神龙兴热窟，一吁嘉雪满寰瀛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496184_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496184'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496184_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　在开封，任枢密使。韩琦有《张汝士寺丞挽辞二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十五。）</span>《张汝士寺丞挽辞二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十五。）</span><div id='poem_496557' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496557' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496557?labeling=true' target='_blank'>张汝士寺丞挽辞二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496557")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496557_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496557'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496557'>昔与君游者，芝兰永更芳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496557_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496557'>高怀澄水月，和气燠春阳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496557_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496557'>陈迹川流远，嘉名岁景长。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496557_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496557'>平生欧尹友，尝叹善人亡。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496557_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496557'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496557_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496558' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496558' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496558?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1057年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496558_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496558'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496558'>满腹康时业，丁年未一伸。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496558_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496558'>方从中洛掾，俄掩北邙尘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496558_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496558'>有子贤荀里，登科感孟邻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496558_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496558'>新阡伊阙下，长得塞门春<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：塞门，地名。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496558_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496558'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496558_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1057&endYear=1057')">1057年</a>　在开封，任枢密使。韩琦有《屯田司于河北增展溏泊为害奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1163923' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163923' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163923?labeling=true' target='_blank'>屯田司于河北增展溏泊为害奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163923")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163923_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163923'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163923'>朝廷与北虏通好以来，屯田一司专以内臣参领，边陲无事，唯务增展溏泊以为劳绩，每岁入奏，优得转迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163923_comment'></div>相继者务广于前，兴作不已，至堰断滹沱、沙溏等九河下源，不令入海，尽灌边界，又堰徐河以潴保州西沱苑泊水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163923_comment'></div>每岁夏秋雨水之际，溏水涨溢，浸坏边民庐产，不可胜计，使生者无田可归，死者无地可葬，皆谓朝廷殊不顾藉，怨入骨髓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163923_comment'></div>又顺安军界有十洪桥、牙家港两处，是从来出泄溏水入北界三台小李村之处，近年复以硬堰闭塞，唯务溏泊渺㳽，却令北界人户皆免水患，措置颠倒，无甚于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163923_comment'></div>兼保州是宣祖皇帝乡里，彼处有宣祖皇帝先远坟茔，及民间所谓天子巷者，为溏水渰浸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163923_comment'></div>每骤雨暴涨之际，此两处人皆行船网鱼，而惧屯田司事势，无敢言者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163923_comment'></div>臣先尝遣知保州赵滋相视，颇知其利害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163923_comment'></div>愿更遣台省官，往彼同议其经久之计。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1163923_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年1月1日</a>　在开封，任枢密使。韩琦有《戊戌元日喜雪》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_496185' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496185' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496185?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戊戌元日喜雪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496185")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496185_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496185'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496185'>新元迎晓朔风凉，零落同云势渐霶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496185'>气候未春终是腊，祷祈方得合称祥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496185'>拜章粉絮迷朝佩，献寿琼花入御觞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496185'>自是三农丰岁兆，人声何必问宫商。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496185_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496185'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496185_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年6月</a>　在开封。六月，韩琦拜集贤相。有《赐免集贤第一表》作品：《辞免集贤第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163720' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163720' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163720?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免集贤第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163720")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163720_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163720'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163720'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特授臣依旧工部尚书、同中书门下平章事、集贤殿大学士，仍加食邑、食实封者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163720_comment'></div>枢筦无功，方期自劾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163720_comment'></div>疑丞有缺，骤尔叨荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163720_comment'></div>虽君恩之非常，在公议则不可，夙夕震骇，莫知所安<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163720_comment'></div>窃以王者端拱穆清，责任辅相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163720_comment'></div>内使万物无不遂，外使四夷无不恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163720_comment'></div>阴阳协于时，是曰燮和之效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163720_comment'></div>卿士得其职，斯为选择之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163720_comment'></div>天下系其安危，国体随而轻重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163720_comment'></div>所付一失，为害岂轻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163720_comment'></div>如臣者，朴学非长，孤忠自信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163720_comment'></div>早慕古人之行己，不能枉道以进身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163720_comment'></div>立朝以来，皆上所悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163720_comment'></div>自羌庭之叛命，去<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1163720", 1163720, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>词掖</span>以临师，周旋兵间，竭尽死节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163720_comment'></div>仅息塞防之警，入参机务之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163720_comment'></div>一篑障河，欲得灾而不顾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163720_comment'></div>丛轻折轴，终积毁以难胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163720_comment'></div>尚尘秘殿之资，屡忝要藩之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163720_comment'></div>疲驽将蹶，善御犹勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163720_comment'></div>更帅领于二垂，远威颜于一纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163720_comment'></div>忽婴危疾，幸假本邦，尪孱适养于馀疴，宥密亟还于旧物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163720_comment'></div>卒无他技，倏已踰年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163720_comment'></div>纵显黜之未加，亦素餐而自愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163720_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下高天广覆，厚地博容，不求备以取人，奉无私而临下，出于睿断，擢正宰司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163720_comment'></div>方今人安承平，俗尚茍简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163720_comment'></div>革弊者目为生事，谤必交兴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163720_comment'></div>擢才则指以树朋，巧焉求中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163720_comment'></div>生灵已困，而仓廪未足；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163720_comment'></div>戎狄难保，而备豫未完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163720_comment'></div>兹朝廷大有为而及时，岂浅薄不称职而可任？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163720_comment'></div>况簪绅之近列，皆栋干之美材，不此详求，岂无遗滞！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163720_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下特回圣虑，谨择高贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163720_comment'></div>使施设之一新，必太平之坐致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163720_comment'></div>如此，则使人以器，免怀过分之忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163720_comment'></div>唯君知臣，雅得量能之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163720_comment'></div>傥垂开可，更誓糜捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163720_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1163720_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年6月</a>　在开封。六月，韩琦拜集贤相。有《赐免集贤第二表》作品：《辞免集贤第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163721' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163721' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163721?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免集贤第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163721")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163721_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163721'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163721'>臣某言：伏奉制命<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云，）</span>，寻具表陈让，蒙降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163721_comment'></div>臣闻天下安而注意相，盖以仰成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163721_comment'></div>官不备而惟其人，无容叙进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163721_comment'></div>故避贤之为请，诚度德之匪堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163721_comment'></div>沥恳未俞，措躬无地<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163721_comment'></div>窃以前记之载，治道可详，虽有甚盛德之君，必择非常人之辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163721_comment'></div>所以五臣佐舜，十乱翼周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163721_comment'></div>萧、曹、魏、邴继美于汉朝，房、杜、姚、宋相辉于唐室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163721_comment'></div>固以耸风烈于万世，不独致太平于一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163721_comment'></div>岂在圣辰，所宜轻授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163721_comment'></div>伏念臣早繇科选，亟渐宠阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163721_comment'></div>天与至愚，颠沛必思于忠义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163721_comment'></div>人嗤拙宦，周旋不避于艰难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163721_comment'></div>白首三垂，鸿毛一命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163721_comment'></div>赖清衷之独照，致危迹之终全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163721_comment'></div>遂起病馀，复玷枢任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163721_comment'></div>犬马之报增激，萤烛之光几何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163721_comment'></div>坐易岁芳，日孤人望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163721_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下不遗小善，务取大方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163721_comment'></div>曲矜簪履之微，骤有鼎槐之拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163721_comment'></div>虽圣人之存旧物，特示优恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163721_comment'></div>顾贤者之抑下陈，岂无公议！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163721_comment'></div>抚躬自省，通夕如燔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163721_comment'></div>是敢再达让封，重干宸听，愿敷求于全德，俾宰正于庶工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163721_comment'></div>必能膏泽四方，广矣庶官之遂；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163721_comment'></div>丹青万化，焕然王度之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163721_comment'></div>使陛下协能官人之明，免微臣获不知量之过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163721_comment'></div>至慈垂允，舆论乃安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163721_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1163721_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年6月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。六月，韩琦拜集贤相。有《谢集贤相表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163722' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163722' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163722?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢集贤相表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1058年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163722")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163722_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163722'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163722'>臣某言：伏奉制命<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云，）</span>，寻再具表陈让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163722_comment'></div>蒙降批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163722_comment'></div>右府本兵之重，曷赞几微；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163722_comment'></div>中台象极之崇，遽叨选任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163722_comment'></div>自顾非才之及此，必非公议之所容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163722_comment'></div>荐拜让封，讫无可报；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163722_comment'></div>俯偻祗命，腼羞在颜<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163722_comment'></div>臣闻圣王不以独化为高，必置相而图治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163722_comment'></div>贤臣不以极位为乐，贵行道以济时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163722_comment'></div>上既劳于所求，下亦艰于所遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163722_comment'></div>故求之得则仰成于庶务，待以不疑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163722_comment'></div>遇之合则协力于万机，果于自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163722_comment'></div>固可以日兴颓弊，坐致太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163722_comment'></div>生灵蒙福于九围，君臣垂美于万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163722_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下尧仁舜孝，汤智禹勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163722_comment'></div>言动不谏，而未尝过为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163722_comment'></div>道德是富，而无一他好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163722_comment'></div>而犹念天下已治，而恐启于乱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163722_comment'></div>天下既安，而预防其危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163722_comment'></div>精择辅臣，以裨至化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163722_comment'></div>而臣学无根本，性多滞迂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163722_comment'></div>不知前世建治安之原，徒爱古人立忠义之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163722_comment'></div>周旋俗务，眇末常劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163722_comment'></div>尘枢府以议边，尚详梗概；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163722_comment'></div>玷鼎司而论道，何所开陈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163722_comment'></div>忝冒以来，夙夕无措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163722_comment'></div>盖以陛下有置相图治之圣，而臣非行道济时之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163722_comment'></div>何以仰副天心，俯慰人望？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163722_comment'></div>然陛下既已求臣之误，亦当待以不疑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163722_comment'></div>而臣所坚遇主之诚，唯誓果于自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163722_comment'></div>勉企前哲，动思至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163722_comment'></div>庶几民底小康，时无大沴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163722_comment'></div>少宽待旦之虑，免累知臣之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163722_comment'></div>填壑未间，期报如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163722_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1163722_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1058&endYear=1058')">1058年10月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。十月，韩琦有《祭聱隅先生文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十三。）</span><div id='poem_1164182' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164182' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164182?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭聱隅先生文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐三年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164182")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164182_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164182'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164182'>维嘉祐三年岁次戊戌，十月戊戌朔，十日丁未，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于聱隅先生黄君之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164182_comment'></div>先生以学自富，以道自贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164182_comment'></div>身居草莱，名暴天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164182_comment'></div>公卿大夫知先生之贤，荐先生之晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164182_comment'></div>老得一命，遽然而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164182_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164182_comment'></div>岂天之于人，既使其学与道之不穷也，则其身也固不可得其不穷耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164182_comment'></div>不然，何屯梗沮屈之如是乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164182_comment'></div>某忝大任，窃重禄，不能极力推挽，使先生之学之道少伸于时，而身为不穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164182_comment'></div>反咨嗟疑天，不自引咎，诚罪人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164182_comment'></div>今先生之子，能奉遗书，谨遗法，介然以不坠先业为意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164182_comment'></div>护丧南归，得舟东下，因致薄酹，一道哀愧之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164182_comment'></div>先生宜来，歆是精洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164182_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1164182_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《韩缜太博之任洋州》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_496178' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496178' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496178?labeling=true' target='_blank'>韩缜太傅之任洋州</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496178")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496178_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496178'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496178'>昔年疆场宠双旌，官寄洋州实治并。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496178'>今喜远民留上意，故求贤守绍家声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496178'>升云仙迹唐祠古，踏石春游灙水清。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496178'>时阅吏文应笑我，从前衔署只虚名。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496178_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496178'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496178_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。春，韩琦应年青时好友张唐卿之弟唐民之请，作《故将作监丞通判陕府张君墓志铭并序》作品：《故将作监丞通判陕府张君墓志铭》（并序）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164156' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164156' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164156?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故将作监丞通判陕府张君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序　嘉祐四年春）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164156")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164156_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164156'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164156'>景祐元年春三月十八日，上御崇政殿，亲试天下所贡士，命近臣较其文，而以张君唐卿为之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164156_comment'></div>越八日，上复临轩，赐君第一人及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164156_comment'></div>君素以文行为东州士人所称，又乡举与礼部试，俱在高等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164156_comment'></div>及春榜下，众论翕然，以为得人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164156_comment'></div>君时集同榜诸进士于相国佛舍处，凡动作无一不如宜者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164156_comment'></div>故虽宿儒旧学，当世知名之士，无不瞻企叹伏，甘处其下，曰：「得状元者如此，吾榜之光矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164156_comment'></div>释褐授将作监丞、通判陕府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164156_comment'></div>君才敏识高，于吏事无不通达，佐府未数月，治声四出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164156_comment'></div>时雨水害民田，君为亲按属县，得民可蠲其赋者十九，遂以状白转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164156_comment'></div>而转运使尚欲裒取，不肯如君言，君即抗疏陈其事，诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164156_comment'></div>又，民有孀母再适人而死，及葬父，而痛母之不得祔于其尊也，乃从继父圹中盗母之丧而归，与父同瘗焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164156_comment'></div>事败，时君权府事，有司请论如法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164156_comment'></div>君曰：「是特知有孝耳，乃可以常法断之耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164156_comment'></div>遂杖而释之，然后具其事以闻，朝廷是之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164156_comment'></div>其恤物平刑，多此类也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164156_comment'></div>四年春，丁父忧去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164156_comment'></div>君天性纯孝，自讣至，昼夜号恸不绝声，闻者为之感怆，终以哀毁过甚，踰月得疾，呕血而卒，年二十八，三月二十五日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164156_comment'></div>君字希元，青州人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164156_comment'></div>娶王氏，都官员外郎告之女，生一女，后君一年不育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164156_comment'></div>曾祖昂，赠职方郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164156_comment'></div>祖从，赠秘书少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164156_comment'></div>父思，终太常博士，赠度支员外郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164156_comment'></div>母王氏，赠长寿县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164156_comment'></div>君幼聪悟，喜读书，不与诸儿相戏狎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164156_comment'></div>方十岁，则语默有常节，家人仆隶率不敢以童子待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164156_comment'></div>及长，耽玩经史，殆忘寝食，每文章之出，远近为之传诵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164156_comment'></div>与石守道游，最相知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164156_comment'></div>守道尝有书遗之曰：「他日主吾道者，希元也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164156_comment'></div>天圣中，余通判淄州，君时年十七，自青州持书来访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164156_comment'></div>余观其文，雄富老重，殊不类少年者所为，亟加礼接之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164156_comment'></div>自是余常谓人曰：「张某必取高科，有盛名于天下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164156_comment'></div>君之亲友，往往记余言，以为知人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164156_comment'></div>文正范公亦知君为深，尝与余评论人物，喟然谓余曰：「凡布衣应科举，得试殿廷下，必婉辞过谨，以求中格，人情之常也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164156_comment'></div>而张某者为《积善成德论》，独言切规谏，冀以感寤人主，立朝可知矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164156_comment'></div>使今而在，必以直道为一时名臣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164156_comment'></div>其推重如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164156_comment'></div>弟秘书丞唐民，隽警有文，知名于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164156_comment'></div>丁仁寿忧，虽家甚贫，而力谋举父母与诸兄之丧，以嘉祐四年春归葬乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164156_comment'></div>将葬，以书来告曰：「公知监丞兄之深者，愿得公文以志其墓」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164156_comment'></div>乃为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_1164156'>呜呼希元！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164156_comment'></div>天地之久，人生其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164156_comment'></div>百年一瞬，何较聃、颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164156_comment'></div>唯得令名，犹穹壤然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164156_comment'></div>亘千万世，不陨不骞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164156_comment'></div>君得之矣，夫何恨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164156_comment'></div>余为斯铭，不愧其传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164156_comment'></div>呜呼希元！</div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1164156_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年10月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《袷享庆成五言二十韵》作品：《祫享庆成五言二十韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_496174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祫享庆成五言二十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496174")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_496174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496174'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496174'>大飨无先祫，精祠贵必躬。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496174'>历朝疑未讲，旷典属今崇。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496174'>良月稽冬孟，容台访礼中。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496174'>祀期当象闰，位向卒虚东。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496174'>太卜诹元日，斋诚俨法宫。<div id='poem_sentence_4_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_496174'>雕舆下丹地，琳馆荐清衷。<div id='poem_sentence_5_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_496174'>雪密人初骇，天高德自通。<div id='poem_sentence_6_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_496174'>阴云成瑞霭，凛色变和风。<div id='poem_sentence_7_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_496174'>世室休严卫，宵衣集庶工。<div id='poem_sentence_8_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_496174'>叙亲昭穆正，合食簋铏丰。<div id='poem_sentence_9_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_496174'>既祼神斯格，居歆庆已蒙。<div id='poem_sentence_10_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_496174'>欢欣流禹律，謦欬入尧聪。<div id='poem_sentence_11_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_496174'>月射千圭白，星辉万燎红。<div id='poem_sentence_12_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_496174'>茨歌将振作，晴旭渐曈昽。<div id='poem_sentence_13_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_496174'>回跸升端阙，群瞻耸上穹。<div id='poem_sentence_14_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_496174'>蕃釐均庙馂，惠泽泰民穷。<div id='poem_sentence_15_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_496174'>孝著钩钤动，恩疏贯索空。<div id='poem_sentence_16_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_496174'>致祥书可信，让美意尔冲。<div id='poem_sentence_17_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_496174'>此协亨嘉会，惭非辅翼功。<div id='poem_sentence_18_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_496174'>唯知献君寿，巍与二仪同。<div id='poem_sentence_19_496174_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年12月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。十二月，韩琦上河北牧地剩田听下户请佃得岁课事奏，乞河北牧地余田佃给下户，收取课赋。作品：《河北牧地剩田听请佃得岁课事奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1163991' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163991' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163991?labeling=true' "韩琦", "poem_title_1163991")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163991_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163991'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163991'>向曾陈监牧之弊，乞逐路坊监并诸军牧地除留放牧，其馀田听下户请佃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163991_comment'></div>河北一路诸军牧地剩田三千三百五十馀顷，得岁课斛斗一十一万七千八百二石，绢万三千二百五十一匹，草十六万一千二百三十束。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163991_comment'></div>其管勾摽括职方员外郎高访望特与堂除，虞部员外郎张越与先次。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163991_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《张吉甫殿丞宰资阳》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_496186' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163723' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163723?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免祫享加恩第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163723")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163723_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163723'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163723'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特加臣同德守正功臣并食邑、实封者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163723_comment'></div>讲<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1163723", 1163723, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>上仪</span>于宗庙，方成孝飨之能；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163723_comment'></div>广大嘏于辟公，首被庆恩之渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163723_comment'></div>冒荣为过，顾己弗安<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163723_comment'></div>伏念臣早以孱愚，误膺眷任，进历枢机之重，擢联丞辅之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163723_comment'></div>夙夜以勤，揆一心而虽至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163723_comment'></div>才谋之短，稽众论而愈喧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163723_comment'></div>属丁闰祫之期，复相亲祠之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163723_comment'></div>精纯所致，顾肸蚃以来歆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163723_comment'></div>陟降无违，在赞明而何有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163723_comment'></div>及此受釐之始，亟尘差赏之优，锡号褒功，增封衍食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163723_comment'></div>省无劳而若是，惟力让以为宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163723_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下揽二柄之公，体万机之谨，俯矜危恳，追寝命书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163723_comment'></div>如此，则维鹈在梁，免速声诗之诮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163723_comment'></div>若金用砺，更加磨切之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163723_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1163723_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《辞免袷享加恩第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163724' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163724' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163724?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免祫享加恩第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163724")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163724_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163724'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163724'>臣某言：伏奉制命<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云，）</span>，寻具表陈让，蒙降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163724_comment'></div>祭之为泽，虽有国之常经；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163724_comment'></div>赏不以劳，亦为臣之当让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163724_comment'></div>奏封斯确，诏答未俞，退自省顾，不胜忧畏<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163724_comment'></div>伏念臣进繇孤直，任玷弼谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163724_comment'></div>常待罪以弗自安，敢侥荣而不知量！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163724_comment'></div>此属钦修旷典，祗事閟宫，举历朝未行之仪，成群主合食之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163724_comment'></div>辟公咸暨，惭无显相之容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163724_comment'></div>福禄既均，首被便蕃之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163724_comment'></div>顾冒尘之可愧，敢辞避之匪诚？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163724_comment'></div>圣听莫回，愚衷愈悸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163724_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下据公以议，懋德必先，稽惟名不假之言，徇所欲必从之义，亟收误宠，明劝有功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163724_comment'></div>庶凫鹄之分获全，则犬马之心尽报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163724_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1163724_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《谢袷享加恩表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163725' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163725' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163725?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢祫享加恩表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163725")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163725_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163725'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163725'>臣某言：伏奉制命<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云，）</span>，寻再具表陈让，蒙降批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163725_comment'></div>登群主而序昭穆，甫毕亲祠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163725_comment'></div>肆大眚而均福釐，俄周率土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163725_comment'></div>忝被臣邻之列，首膺优渥之恩，避让弗俞，省循无措<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163725_comment'></div>伏念臣性直而戆，识暗且疏，徒知忠义以事君，不顾险艰而效死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163725_comment'></div>危涂屡蹶，鸿造终全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163725_comment'></div>荐司枢筦之繁，进领钧衡之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163725_comment'></div>圣主之责愚相，其可容诛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163725_comment'></div>倦令之治薄民，乌能知化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163725_comment'></div>自须明黜，免累至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163725_comment'></div>幸遇皇帝陛下守位以仁，奉先惟孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163725_comment'></div>谓郊而祀天地，虽三载之躬行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163725_comment'></div>庙以合祖宗，则历朝之未讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163725_comment'></div>此时思而举坠，属闰祫之丁辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163725_comment'></div>能飨休成，霈泽滂被。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163725_comment'></div>惟是鼎槐之近，特先纶綍之褒增；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163725_comment'></div>唐阁之美，名衍汉封之多邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163725_comment'></div>赏斯为误，义不容辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163725_comment'></div>敢不祗奉国经，勤宣上德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163725_comment'></div>协心以济，朝得众贤之和；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163725_comment'></div>弼教于中，福有庶民之锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163725_comment'></div>冀逭素餐之责，少裨旰食之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163725_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1163725_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《袷享乐章二首》作品：《袷享乐章二首·捧俎奏充安之曲》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十三。）</span>《袷享乐章二首·僖祖奏大基之曲》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十三。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《嘉祐明堂乐章一首·皇帝诣罍洗升降奏仪安之曲》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十三。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1059&endYear=1059')">1059年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《录附鼓城府君墓志石本序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164111' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164111' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164111?labeling=true' target='_blank'>录附鼓城府君墓志石本序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1059年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164111")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164111_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164111'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164111'>向阅家集，见真定主簿张度所撰四代祖鼓城府君墓铭，知曾祖令公于晋天福中葬府君于赵州赞皇县太平乡之北马村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164111_comment'></div>然值五代之乱，天下以兵相戕贼，常赵并边，复有北胡之患，子孙避地多故，于岁时洒扫荐奠，盖不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164111_comment'></div>历祀既远，遂忘所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164111_comment'></div>琦自尘禄仕，深惟祖考茔域之重，极意崇葺，而念府君之葬，幸知其州县乡里之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164111_comment'></div>虽距今百有馀年，苟得土人之耆旧可倚者，使周访之，则万一可识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164111_comment'></div>兹志未遂，不敢懈心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164111_comment'></div>嘉祐三年冬，偶故吏郑嗣宗者，自东川宰行服归赵，过都请见，问其所居，则曰赞皇之外邑也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164111_comment'></div>问北马，则曰所居之邻村也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164111_comment'></div>遂以府君坟墓托之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164111_comment'></div>嗣宗去不数月，驰来告曰：「北马有古冢岿然，里人至今呼为韩评事墓」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164111_comment'></div>乃遣男忠彦与指使殿直李延庆同往视之，且使祭而告曰：「若非开隧视铭，则无以取众之信」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164111_comment'></div>祭已，择日开隧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164111_comment'></div>先是，闻于邑，至日令尉偕至，与夫近村之老幼妇女，环而观者数千人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164111_comment'></div>才及墓，则张度所为志石在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164111_comment'></div>门颇朽缺，自外窥之，圹中一皆安然无所动，壁之丹雘尚若新涂绘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164111_comment'></div>忠彦即出志石示于众，皆惊呼嗟异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164111_comment'></div>令尉阅其文，亦相与欣叹，为忠彦贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164111_comment'></div>亟具墨蜡传其本，置石于故处，而实其隧中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164111_comment'></div>坟旁地缭以垣墙，树以松柏，得嗣宗之甥彭昂者主守之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164111_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164111_comment'></div>祖先之葬百馀年矣，数世已忘其所在，一旦求而得之，复内外完固无少犯者，实吾先积庆之感，而举世希阔之事也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164111_comment'></div>石本比家集旧文有少删略处，盖曾祖令公削其烦也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164111_comment'></div>旧文阙六代、七代祖之讳，今皆得之，谨录而载于家集府君志文之后，俾子孙传之，知吾奉事祖宗之勤，贤者必能过吾勤，而不肖者亦当师吾勤而自勉也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1164111_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《祭告四代祖鼓城府君文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164170' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164170' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164170?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭告四代祖鼓城府君文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐五年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164170")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164170_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164170'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164170'>维嘉祐五年岁次庚子，某月某朔某日，四代孙具官某，谨遣男忠彦以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于高祖鼓城府君、高祖母夫人张氏之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164170_comment'></div>琦阅家集，见真定主簿张度所撰府君墓铭，知天福二年中，与夫人同葬于赵州赞皇县东太平乡之北马村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164170_comment'></div>当五代之乱，天下兵革，子孙于岁时展祀，盖不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164170_comment'></div>逮今百有馀载，遂失访辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164170_comment'></div>琦自效官以来，志求所在，而患不得乡邑老旧之人，以询究之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164170_comment'></div>今会赞皇人前普州司理郑嗣宗行服北归，见过私第，问所谓北马村者，乃云所居之地也，遂以诚托之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164170_comment'></div>未几嗣宗复至，且言是村有韩评事墓在焉，请使家人亲验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164170_comment'></div>某窃念年祀既远，若不一视铭志，则恐后之子孙与乡邑远近之人尚有疑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164170_comment'></div>故遣男忠彦择日以告，暂开坟隧，拂拭志石，使众目视之，释然必信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164170_comment'></div>然后增益封树，以时致享，子孙承之，崇奉无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164170_comment'></div>惟灵鉴此至诚，歆此薄荐，毋以轻有犯渎而赐大咎，孝孙之幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164170_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1164170_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1060&endYear=1060')">1060年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《祭告四代祖茔土地文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164171' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164171' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164171?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭告四代祖茔土地文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐五年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164171")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164171_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164171'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164171'>维嘉祐五年岁次庚子，某月某朔某日，具官某谨遣男忠彦以清酌之奠，昭告于赞皇县太平乡北马村土地之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164171_comment'></div>高祖鼓城府君之亡，实葬兹土，子孙遭五代之乱，罔克崇葺，各走官路，久失访寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164171_comment'></div>今按文验之，乃得其所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164171_comment'></div>然年祀缅邈，人不无疑，固当开隧视铭，以取众信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164171_comment'></div>惟神聪直之禀，福善而诛恶者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164171_comment'></div>夫有人孝于其亲，不以百年之远，力思封树洒扫，以勤时享，神宜祐而助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164171_comment'></div>使如素志，不当以轻犯土地而降咎殃，则神可谓聪直之全，祸福不私者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164171_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1164171_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496171'>花簇香亭万朵开，雕舆高自九关来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496171'>轻阴阁雨迎天步，寒色留春送寿杯。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496171'>仙吹彻云终缥缈，恩鱼逢饵几徘徊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496171'>曾参二十年前会，今备台司得再陪。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496171_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496171'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496171_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年8月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。八月，韩琦拜昭文相。有《赐免昭文相第一表》作品：《辞免昭文相第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163726' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163726' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163726?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免昭文第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163726")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163726_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163726'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163726'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特授臣行刑部尚书、同中书门下平章事、昭文馆大学士、监修国史、兼译经润文使，仍加食邑、食实封者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163726_comment'></div>臣闻天之明堂，尊曰上相；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163726_comment'></div>国之冢宰，冠于六卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163726_comment'></div>七政从而后观，四海倚之均一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163726_comment'></div>建官之重，推象可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163726_comment'></div>岂容非才，遂得次补<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163726_comment'></div>伏念臣学不根道，智非逮人，徒知忠义之敢为，独荷圣明之垂谅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163726_comment'></div>向繇枢筦，擢备钧衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163726_comment'></div>幸遭时而得君，有同心之辅政，夙夜图报，岁时趣过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163726_comment'></div>经远所存，卒无近效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163726_comment'></div>竭诚之得，不免众嗤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163726_comment'></div>上误一人之知，下腾多士之诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163726_comment'></div>惟思引避，敢觊宠迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163726_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下大度包容，鸿仁广爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163726_comment'></div>悉其心之颇至，恕其才之未任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163726_comment'></div>犹矜驽孱，谓可驱策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163726_comment'></div>属此元臣之眷，忽罹寿母之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163726_comment'></div>不忍夺亲而伤恩，终听执丧而得礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163726_comment'></div>亟蒙序进，殊失佥求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163726_comment'></div>方今当极泰之时，稔积习之敝，遽然更化，则议论难齐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163726_comment'></div>徐以收功，则责望方峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163726_comment'></div>而况天时未顺，民困弗充，水旱相仍，灾异数见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163726_comment'></div>诚圣人恐惧大有为之日，顾愚臣谫薄无所取之材，恬然冒荣，罪不容戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163726_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下念祖宗至重之业，推天地大公之心，谨择时贤，稽参物论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163726_comment'></div>宜得魁杰非常之佐，以副焦劳求治之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163726_comment'></div>使百度修明，万灵和喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163726_comment'></div>则陛下高拱而揖尧舜，群臣相让而归皋夔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163726_comment'></div>如臣甚庸，愿寝成命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163726_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1163726_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年8月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。八月，韩琦拜昭文相。《赐免昭文相第二表》作品：《辞免昭文相第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163727' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163727' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163727?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免昭文第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163727")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163727_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163727'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163727'>臣某言：伏奉制命<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云，）</span>，寻具表陈让，蒙降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163727_comment'></div>冢卿之缺，乌可序迁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163727_comment'></div>众议之公，岂容非据！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163727_comment'></div>拜章以让，承诏未俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163727_comment'></div>夙夜震营，莫知所措<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163727_comment'></div>伏念臣起于孤官，粗识大忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163727_comment'></div>许国忘身，故不论其险易；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163727_comment'></div>推诚遇物，盖无别于恩仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163727_comment'></div>人嗤其拙而臣不可移，臣执是愚而上卒见信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163727_comment'></div>以至再陟枢机之重，对司钧轴之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163727_comment'></div>圣主仰成，恨无所报；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163727_comment'></div>僚贤一意，知岂不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163727_comment'></div>然而志虽广而才不能周，任既重而力终取困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163727_comment'></div>凡于施设，动得诋讥，加灾沴之荐臻，在燮和而当罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163727_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下无求速效，尚责远图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163727_comment'></div>属元宰之遭忧，亟大庭而申号，特从次补，益骇群情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163727_comment'></div>且论道者本不备而惟人，禄德者非累日而取贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163727_comment'></div>必若以资而遂进，则其于劝也诚难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163727_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下博选真贤，上裨至治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163727_comment'></div>况内有雍容侍从之列，皆杰出之材；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163727_comment'></div>外有文武屏翰之臣，悉老成之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163727_comment'></div>少精圣虑，自协佥言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163727_comment'></div>夫臣何堪，敢冒兹宠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163727_comment'></div>幸寝已行之命，庶全则哲之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163727_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1163727_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年8月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。八月，韩琦拜昭文相。《谢昭文相表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163728' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163728' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163728?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢昭文相表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163728")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163728_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163728'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163728'>臣某言：伏奉制命<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云，）</span>，寻再具表陈让，蒙降批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163728_comment'></div>大号式孚，理虽难复；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163728_comment'></div>非才自视，惧不克堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163728_comment'></div>让恳继陈，俞音卒吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163728_comment'></div>拜宠恩而斯误，质公议以何安<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163728_comment'></div>臣闻元首之任股肱，贵不隳于万事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163728_comment'></div>冢宰之佐邦国，在能正于百官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163728_comment'></div>惟朝廷之重轻，系选任之得失，择人之谨，自古为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163728_comment'></div>如臣者，朴学非长，孤忠鲜助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163728_comment'></div>自优尘于科等，耻平步于贵阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163728_comment'></div>周旋俗吏之为，慷慨壮夫之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163728_comment'></div>边囊外谨，谤箧中烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163728_comment'></div>几汩没于风波，荷照临于日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163728_comment'></div>枢庭荐陟，宰柄参持，念嘉会之亲逢，惜良时之易失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163728_comment'></div>同心交儆，众弊力蠲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163728_comment'></div>治本所先，亦粗施其一二；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163728_comment'></div>人情未厌，盖久乐于因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163728_comment'></div>毁既积而增危，任不胜而当谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163728_comment'></div>幸遇皇帝陛下高明广覆，博厚兼容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163728_comment'></div>巍然执契之尊，深得驭臣之要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163728_comment'></div>以谓任人之道，图旧所以知之详；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163728_comment'></div>劝士之方，重禄所以须其报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163728_comment'></div>故兹迁擢，遂及虚孱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163728_comment'></div>敢不博引群贤，大明众职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163728_comment'></div>跻民仁寿之域，务广圣猷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163728_comment'></div>俾后尧舜之心，勉希前哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163728_comment'></div>庶几拙效，少答君仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163728_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1163728_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年8月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。八月，时任昭文相的韩琦在上《谢昭文相表》时，又上《上仁宗论皇嗣如己有所属乞宣示中书密院奉行》疏，乞于宗室中择幼而可教者权为皇嗣，并宣示中书枢密院，使奉而行之。或于内中建学，取宗室中幼而谨厚勤于为学者，置于内学。然后圣虑取其可属者，权而命之，就可以选中合适，以此安天下人心。之后又韩琦有十余请，及其它臣僚所上有关建储的章疏，但还是没有结果。作品：《上仁宗论皇嗣如已有所属乞宣示中书密院奉行》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《宋名臣奏议》卷三十一。韩琦后所上十余奏请，《韩魏公家传》卷五提及。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年8月15日</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《辛丑中秋不见月》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_496192' id='poem_sentence_1_496192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496192'>疑有阴魔憎好事，更虞淫雨害丰盛。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496192_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "poem_title_496193")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496193_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496193'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496193'>君于荣利已恬然，此治韩城属荐贤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496193_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496193'>惠政即随春共煦，道心常与月同圆。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496193_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496193'>门疏俗客禅诠远，亭掩修篁定力坚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496193_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496193'>思退几人曾上籍，可容名记托新篇<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496193_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496193'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496193_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' 自注：君有休官簿，与君同约者则书之。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_496193_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript:
