class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496205' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496205?labeling=true' target='_blank'>崔象之宰韩城</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496205")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496205_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496205'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496205'>去年同举菊花觞，自揭清音入醉乡。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496205'>此日高秋来一别，几旬佳节负重阳。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496205'>风生古操安新治，雨彻疏茅锁旧堂<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：君治之东斋也。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496205'>民里更繁应自化，宰君心地本空王。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496205_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496205'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496205_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年9月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《辛丑秋季大飨明堂中书宿斋》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_496194' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496194' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496194?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辛丑季秋大飨明堂中书宿斋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496194")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_496194_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496194'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496194'>紫极宸居重，黄扉禁户深。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496194'>斋精严帝配，祗翼达天心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496194'>百刻延壶箭，千庐肃羽林。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496194'>秋声来易感，仙梦断难寻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496194'>小雨随云散，疏星伴月沉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_496194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_496194'>树鸡先晓唱，菊酒带香斟<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：重九日。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_496194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_496194'>寂尔潜神化，翛然适道襟。<div id='poem_sentence_6_496194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_496194'>惟馨思在德，肸蚃伫灵歆。<div id='poem_sentence_7_496194_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_496194'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_496194_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　韩琦欲借台谏官助，劝仁宗立嗣。得知司马光在并州时，曾上疏乞立皇嗣，于是调司马光知谏院，并让御史陈洙传达给司马光调他知谏院的目的。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年10月</a>　十月，由于司马光上疏立嗣，经过韩琦等人的努力，终于确定宗实（即后来的英宗）为储君。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1061&endYear=1061')">1061年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《故客省使眉州防御使赠遂州观察使张公墓志铭》（并序）（并序）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164154' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164154' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164154?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故客省使眉州防御使赠遂州观察使张公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序　嘉祐八年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1061年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164154")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164154_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164154'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164154'>故赠遂州观察使张公亢之将葬也，诸孤具公之官次与平生之施为，泣来告曰：「公曩帅西边，我先子实备将佐，其忘身捍寇，勤苦百为，固不待疏列而公知之详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164154_comment'></div>昔种侯世衡事范文正公，宣力环延，及其亡也，文正亲为文以志其墓，盖悉其故吏之劳，书之所以为劝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164154_comment'></div>我先子之事，其著如此，公忍遗而不书哉」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164154_comment'></div>予哀其诚，而义不可以辞，故为之叙曰：公字公寿，其先濮州临濮人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164154_comment'></div>曾祖裕，恬晦不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164154_comment'></div>祖居实，鄂州嘉鱼令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164154_comment'></div>父馀庆，太子右赞善大夫，赠吏部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164154_comment'></div>逮嘉鱼葬于宋，故今为宋人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164154_comment'></div>公少磊落有大志，博学能文之外，喜读诸家兵法，常慕古大夫立奇功伟节以震暴于当世，不为拘儒龊龊之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164154_comment'></div>始冠，中天禧三年甲科，任广安军判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164154_comment'></div>满岁，再调应天府推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164154_comment'></div>南都地素卑，民苦水患，公为治白沙、石梁之渠，壅者悉通，而田以岁穫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164154_comment'></div>本道转运使上其状，就改大理寺丞、知南京留守判官事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164154_comment'></div>府尹晏元献公性方严，少许可，独知公，府事无钜细皆以属之，而无不集者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164154_comment'></div>转殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164154_comment'></div>应李文定公辟，签书西京留守判官事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164154_comment'></div>籍田恩迁太常博士，改屯田员外郎，徙通判环州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164154_comment'></div>未行，改镇戎军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164154_comment'></div>公素负胆略，既得贰边政，于兵事益以究习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164154_comment'></div>揣知元昊性凶残，喜诛杀，势不可制，上书请先为之备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164154_comment'></div>又言西北二垂攻守之策，其言深切较著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164154_comment'></div>前后章数十上，于是天子知公有将帅之材，数欲用之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164154_comment'></div>会丁母忧去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164154_comment'></div>未几，契丹聚兵幽、涿，北边摇动，乃擢公为如京使、知安肃军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164154_comment'></div>诏趣之任，公不得已而起，召对便坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164154_comment'></div>公奏曰：「契丹被先帝大恩，岁享金缯之赐甚厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164154_comment'></div>今其主孱而岁歉，反疑为中国所窥，故为此耳，不足虑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164154_comment'></div>万一背约，臣请擐甲为诸军先」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164154_comment'></div>上壮而遣之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164154_comment'></div>公至，则务广恩信，前为防之过者，尽以撤去，而虏卒无他。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164154_comment'></div>迁庄宅使、知瀛州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164154_comment'></div>宝元初，元昊果反，上记公言，亟改右骐骥使、泾原路兵马钤辖兼知渭州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164154_comment'></div>泾原当寇之冲，而地殊坦平，在四路中其责尤重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164154_comment'></div>公守备严密，军政修举，贼度不可犯，乃会兵入鄜延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164154_comment'></div>大将刘平、石元孙轻薄其锋，俱为贼所擒，关内大震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164154_comment'></div>乃以公领忠州刺史，充鄜延路钤辖兼知鄜州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164154_comment'></div>未几，改西上閤门使充本路都钤辖，驻于延州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164154_comment'></div>时范文正公帅延，以国士待公，凡深谋大议，公必预焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164154_comment'></div>庆历元年秋，贼入麟、府，陷丰州，破麟、府之间诸堡寨，围府州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164154_comment'></div>事闻，乃命公为并、代都钤辖，专管勾麟、府军马公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164154_comment'></div>贼攻城几旬日不能下，引大兵出境，而留军屯府北之琉璃堡，时纵游骑四抄，二州闭垒不敢出，人情大恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164154_comment'></div>公自受命，昼夜驰至府城下，城中尚不敢启关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164154_comment'></div>公出所受敕示之，而呼曰：「我新张军马也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164154_comment'></div>众心始安，乃启关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164154_comment'></div>公入，即大启诸所塞门，纵民出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164154_comment'></div>视禁旅尚数千人，皆奔北之馀，股栗无斗志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164154_comment'></div>公乃募执役下军之敢战者，得数百人，使击贼，至暮，争持贼首以献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164154_comment'></div>公躬自犒奖，取锦袍以衣之，大誇于城中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164154_comment'></div>连数日皆获贼，如前赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164154_comment'></div>于是禁旅悉惭而奋曰：「我辈岂不如彼下军者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164154_comment'></div>愿出效死」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164154_comment'></div>公度其可使，即命击琉璃之贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164154_comment'></div>众驰至贼堡，大破之，斩首二百馀级，馀皆奔去，获牛马橐驼以千数，公尽以赏所获者，军始复振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164154_comment'></div>然自府饷麟，非兵卫不敢进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164154_comment'></div>二年正月，麟之郊赏至，上遣中使督公护送，贼果出钞夺，不能得，乃聚兵数万邀归路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164154_comment'></div>公回至柏子寨遇之，时众不满三千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164154_comment'></div>公激之曰：「汝辈皆陷死地，能前斗则生，不然则尽死」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164154_comment'></div>于是士皆感动争奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164154_comment'></div>会天大风，公乘顺风以击贼，贼遂大乱，斩首六百馀级，贼相蹂践，赴崖谷死者不胜计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164154_comment'></div>军益大振，乃修复二州之间贼所破堡寨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164154_comment'></div>有宁远寨者，据麟、府之中，最号险要，逮兴役，贼出兵争之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164154_comment'></div>公命虎翼军执万胜军旗帜为阵以挑贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164154_comment'></div>贼素知万胜新军之罢软者，果轻犯之，而虎翼军万弩齐发，短兵继前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164154_comment'></div>公又遣骁将出贼后以夹攻之，贼遂奔溃，斩首二千馀级，贼自此不敢复出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164154_comment'></div>盖不踰月，而五寨立，二州始通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164154_comment'></div>公复奏曰：「今五寨所通，麟、府往来之一径耳，旁皆空旷，无所阻防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164154_comment'></div>若更增并边诸栅以相维卫，则蕃汉之户可归，而河外安矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164154_comment'></div>议未下，而契丹渝盟，河朔大警。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164154_comment'></div>朝廷命王德用为定帅，杨崇勋为镇帅，而以公领果州团练使，为瀛帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1164154_comment'></div>王、杨皆位兼将相，而公以才望参其任，时论伟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1164154_comment'></div>居数月，契丹再议通好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1164154_comment'></div>元昊入泾原，大将葛怀敏御战死之，关内复大震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1164154_comment'></div>改公四方馆使，充泾原路经略安抚招讨等使、本路都总管兼知渭州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1164154_comment'></div>公酉时受诏，戌时上道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1164154_comment'></div>及至，渭贼去方数日，四野一空，疮痍满城，编户属羌皆逃散失业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1164154_comment'></div>公尽虑经制，殆忘寝食，曾未数月，境内以完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1164154_comment'></div>逮郑公戬来帅四路，与公处事不相合，朝廷知其不能容，乃迁引进使，徙并、代副都总管兼经略招讨副使，而御史梁坚复摭公细过论之于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1164154_comment'></div>遂起狱邠州，穷治数月，不能得公大过，犹夺引进使、充本路钤辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1164154_comment'></div>居无何，夏人与契丹有隙，大战黄河外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1164154_comment'></div>时范文正公为参知政事，被诏宣抚河东以备之，复还公引进使，为并、代路副都总管、知代州，兼河东沿边安抚事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1164154_comment'></div>范公至河外，亲按形势利害，以为不增广堡寨，则河外终不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1164154_comment'></div>乃奏用公前议，仍以公总其事，诏可之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1164154_comment'></div>经略使明公镐以谋不出于帅府，极奏言其不可，又屡以文移沮止之，公执不听，兴作如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1164154_comment'></div>不踰时而诸寨成，乃自劾违经略使节制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1164154_comment'></div>上知其利，置而不问，凡建寨十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1164154_comment'></div>于是蕃汉归者数千户，岁减戍兵万人，省转输万万计，虏不敢窥边，而河外遂无虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1164154_comment'></div>久之，复徙为高阳关路副都总管兼知瀛州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1164154_comment'></div>瀛城小而民众，边有警则自外至者无所容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1164154_comment'></div>公奏广东南关，与大城接，民大喜，争出赀以助费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1164154_comment'></div>时夏文庄公留守北都，兼河北路安抚使，以公尝在西边不附己，因奏曰：「今与虏和而广城，不可」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1164154_comment'></div>复命公止其役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1164154_comment'></div>公曰：「当俟报，不可止」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1164154_comment'></div>城几就，诏领眉州防御使，复帅泾原，而瀛城后人卒成之，众论为便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1164154_comment'></div>时渭军郊恩有赐帛，库中所有物良而估直贱，三司所给物下而估直高，公乃命增损其直，而使两均之，以便请者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1164154_comment'></div>转运使乃奏公擅减三司赏给之价，夏公时在枢密院，公遂坐此，夺所领防御使，降知磁州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1164154_comment'></div>御史宋禧不知其详，又疏公向以库银假牙吏市易得利而归己，今责尚轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1164154_comment'></div>于是又夺公引进使，为右领军卫大将军、知寿州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1164154_comment'></div>其后三司所给诸路军赐，率得更平其估。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1164154_comment'></div>而陕西转运使又奏公向假库银利悉以资牙校，而非公自取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1164154_comment'></div>公既无名被贬，不出一言以自辨，但以徙内地，不当享俸，愿复台省旧官，退治僻郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1164154_comment'></div>乃改将作监、知和州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1164154_comment'></div>坐所举官累，徙知筠州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1164154_comment'></div>始赴，上召还，复为引进使，领果州团练使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1164154_comment'></div>入朝，复眉州防御使、充真定府路副都总管，明堂恩迁客省使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1164154_comment'></div>初，公督役河外，暴露原野，为大寒所中，得足疾，久之方愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1164154_comment'></div>至是复作，求解兵任，改知卫州事，徙知怀州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1164154_comment'></div>出视河防，与邻州守相遇于境上，监司以为言，徙钤辖曹州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1164154_comment'></div>改河阳兵马总管，公辞以疾，愿还朝籍，授秘书监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1164154_comment'></div>未几，复为客省使、充徐州总管，领防御如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1164154_comment'></div>嘉祐六年六月二十九日，以疾卒，时年六十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1164154_comment'></div>御史中丞王公畴上言：「张某有再造麟、府之功，不加褒恤，无以劝天下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1164154_comment'></div>上亦恻然思其劳，故优赠以官，非常典也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1164154_comment'></div>公气貌魁杰，襟怀扩然，无贵贱一以诚接之，御军虽严明，而人悦其平恕，故每临敌，士皆愿奋而投死，未尝少挫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1164154_comment'></div>泾原属羌感公恩信，凡易地，必遮道匍匐号泣请留公，移日不能去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1164154_comment'></div>麟、府蕃汉之民几万户，得骨肉相保，生业完复，荷公之德最深，闻公之丧，皆拊膺恸哭曰：「亡吾父矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1164154_comment'></div>往往绘公像祠之，而至今不敢斥其姓，惟呼之曰「閤使」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1164154_comment'></div>公重义轻财，出于天性，赴人之急，殊无爱惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1164154_comment'></div>在边赏犒军士，牛酒必丰，公帑不充，则倾家橐以济之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1164154_comment'></div>内外亲族，贫无以资者，必分俸周给，故忌嫉之人，缘公好施，多组织疑似相挤陷，而屡遭谪官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1164154_comment'></div>然公乃怡然，未尝戚戚于怀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1164154_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1164154_comment'></div>公文武之材，可谓著矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1164154_comment'></div>自二垂有警，西之急则自北而西，北之急则自西而北，当仓卒之际，未尝不首被选任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1164154_comment'></div>公以忠义自许，不顾险艰，卒能成卓然之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1164154_comment'></div>向之处公麾下，如狄青、王信辈，皆积小劳而膺大任者，不可胜数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1164154_comment'></div>而公蹇而不偶，徘徊于横班者几二十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1164154_comment'></div>及其病也，则又弹射迁逐，曾不得有少安之地，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1164154_comment'></div>然仕患有声而无实，果有其实也，虽见抑于生前，必蒙荣于身后，兹公所以膺显赠，信前烈，传诸信史，为不可泯之光耀，识者之辨，孰得孰失？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1164154_comment'></div>公初娶尚氏，封寿阳县君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1164154_comment'></div>再娶侍其氏，封乐安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1164154_comment'></div>子男九人：杰，西头供奉官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1164154_comment'></div>樵，信州军事推官；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1164154_comment'></div>黯，右侍禁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1164154_comment'></div>焄，左侍禁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1164154_comment'></div>炋，右侍禁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1164154_comment'></div>煦，徐州滕县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1164154_comment'></div>烈，左班殿直；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1164154_comment'></div>傥，试秘书省校书郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1164154_comment'></div>默，早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1164154_comment'></div>杰、樵、烈皆先公而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1164154_comment'></div>女四人：长适殿中丞赵约之，次适著作佐郎高士纶，次适太原府阳曲县主簿荣咨道，次在室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1164154_comment'></div>八年十月十八日，其侄三司户部副使焘与公之诸孤，举公与夫人尚氏之丧，葬于宋城县长乐乡之清沟里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1164154_comment'></div>其铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_142_1164154'>惟人之禀，固罕兼备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1164154_comment'></div>志于大者，或遗其细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1164154_comment'></div>故昔任人，必随以器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1164154_comment'></div>小不之疵，众长参治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1164154_comment'></div>骐骥在绊，责以千里，欲驰而蹶，咎则谁致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1164154_comment'></div>称善御者，夫岂如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1164154_comment'></div>噫犹公兮，用终不既。</div><div id='poem_sentence_148_1164154_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年3月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《驾幸西太一宫祈雨》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十。）</span><div id='poem_496206' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496206' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496206?labeling=true' id='poem_title_496212_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496212'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496212'>知君为邑解铜章，却复先庐坐葆光。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496212_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496212'>对境风幡俱不问，安禅心法两皆忘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496212_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496212'>满庭脩竹争高节，近砌幽兰称独芳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496212_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496212'>若论厌喧遭拄杖，何如趣驾返周行。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496212_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496212'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496212_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦上《乞裁冗兵奏》，奏请诏枢密院同三司量河北、陕西、河东及三司榷货务岁入金帛之数，约可赡京师及三路兵马几何，然后以可赡之数立为定额，即根据所能筹得经费之数核见祖宗之兵，确定当今募兵之数。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_1163993' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163993' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163993?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞裁冗兵奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163993")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163993_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163993'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163993'>祖宗以兵定天下，凡有征伐则募置，事已则并，故兵日精而用不广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163993_comment'></div>今二边虽号通好，而西北屯边之兵，常若待敌之至，故竭天下之力而不能给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163993_comment'></div>不于此时先虑而豫备之，一旦边陲用兵，水旱相继，卒起而图之，不可及矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163993_comment'></div>又，三路就粮之兵，虽勇劲服习，然边储贵踊，常苦难赡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163993_comment'></div>若其数过多，复有尾大不掉之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163993_comment'></div>京师之兵虽杂且少精，然漕于东南，广而易供，设其数多，得强干弱枝之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163993_comment'></div>祖宗时，就粮之兵不甚多，边陲有事，则以京师兵益之，其虑深而其费鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163993_comment'></div>愿诏枢密院同三司量河北、陕西、河东及三司榷货务岁入金帛之数，约可赡京师及三路兵马几何，然后以可赡之数立为定额，额外罢募，阙即增补；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163993_comment'></div>额外数已尽而营畸零，则省并之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163993_comment'></div>既见定额，则可以定其路马步军一营，以若干为额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163993_comment'></div>仍请覈见开宝、至道、天禧、庆历中外兵马之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163993_comment'></div>盖开宝、至道之兵，太祖、太宗以之定天下，服四方也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163993_comment'></div>天禧之兵，真宗所以守成备豫也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163993_comment'></div>庆历之兵，西师后增置之数也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163993_comment'></div>以祖宗之兵，视今数之多少，则精冗易判，裁制无疑矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1163993_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年4月</a>　四月，英宗被仁宗过继为子已有半年了，但英宗一直不敢接受。因为事起突然，宫人宦官及许多大臣都有议论，所以英宗多次上章赐免，仁宗也犹豫起来。但韩琦认为如此大事不可以朝令夕改，让仁宗更赐以手诏，坚定英宗的信心，也给议论者一个朝廷的明确态度。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年4月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。四月，韩琦总领的《嘉祐编勅》编成，进《<嘉祐编勅>表》，详细说明了新编《嘉祐编勅》的起因、经过、意义及与旧编敕相比较所作的增删。作品：《进<嘉祐编勅>表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163729' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163729' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163729?labeling=true' target='_blank'>进嘉祐编敕表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163729")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163729_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163729'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163729'>臣某等言：恭闻古先哲王议事以制，不为刑辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163729_comment'></div>盖人情万端，法制一定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163729_comment'></div>夫以一定之法，而制万端之情，欲轻重得宜，古今无易，不其难哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163729_comment'></div>国家睿圣相继，承平百年，立法本通，务归至当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163729_comment'></div>故自建隆以来，迄于庆历之初，凡诏令所下，纲条既繁，则必建局命官，一加删定者，岂欲纷更而数变哉，亦虑乎执定制而失人情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163729_comment'></div>今之论次，所付匪轻，夙夜以思，惧不称职<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163729_comment'></div>窃以律设大法，不能委曲而生意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163729_comment'></div>国用中典，至于治平而后详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163729_comment'></div>上既极于哀矜，下无容于壅塞，凡于阙漏，皆得指陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163729_comment'></div>前书之载或疏，后令之明寖密，平亭差惑，抵牾且多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163729_comment'></div>触禁之民，几不知其所避；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163729_comment'></div>舞文之吏，足缘之而为奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163729_comment'></div>不有刊裁，讵能永久？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163729_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下法天任德，本道无为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163729_comment'></div>恢陶唐画象之仁，降天乙弛罟之惠，永维庶俗，期底大中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163729_comment'></div>谓制礼以禁未然，岂尝忘教；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163729_comment'></div>明纪而使无犯，自亦知方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163729_comment'></div>顾兹请比之文，日益烦苛之敝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163729_comment'></div>几阁之盈，难于遍睹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163729_comment'></div>锥刀之末，虞乎尽争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163729_comment'></div>时合当更，政其先务，乃诏臣等特新编葺，得尽详度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163729_comment'></div>于是取《庆历编敕》，暨嘉祐三年终以前续降条贯凡四千三十一道，求中而议，就约以书，存所便安，汰其重复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163729_comment'></div>至于名篇而附律，先例以举凡，会数敕而同一科，参旧文而发新意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163729_comment'></div>事并出则分从其类，禁当立则特为之条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163729_comment'></div>皆明著大防，稽合前式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163729_comment'></div>臣等又以四海之广，独见莫周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163729_comment'></div>虽当局之勤，谓所思之已至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163729_comment'></div>及约情而用，或在理以犹差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163729_comment'></div>必欲成本朝之善经，固当合天下之公论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163729_comment'></div>首祈博访，亟奉俞音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163729_comment'></div>果众说之毕伸，亦寸长而备采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163729_comment'></div>伏详《庆历编敕》每条之后，必书元降宣敕年月，虽云旧体，其实文烦，今并改注于目录逐条之下，以从简便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163729_comment'></div>又《刑统》所附诸敕及参详条件，凡一百三十四道，事杂前朝，率多冲改，审核之际，典者为劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163729_comment'></div>今取其见今可行者已入逐门收载外，其《刑统》内诸敕并参详条件，伏请更不行用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163729_comment'></div>应中书、枢密院圣旨、劄子、批状合行编录者，悉改为宣敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163729_comment'></div>共删修成一千八百二十四条，离为一十二卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163729_comment'></div>内有条目繁多者，即分为上、中、下，共一十八卷，总例一卷，目录五卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163729_comment'></div>凡敕内但行约束，不立刑名，事理轻者，析为《续附令敕》三卷，目录一卷，犯者止从违令之坐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1163729_comment'></div>及录到庆历四年正月一日后来赦书、德音二卷，总三十卷，合为一部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1163729_comment'></div>如得允当，即乞特降敕命，与《刑统》、《律令格式》及建隆以来赦书、德音，天圣中先编《附令敕》兼行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1163729_comment'></div>其《庆历编敕》及《庆历续附令敕》，并嘉祐三年终以前应系海行条贯，除今来已编载外，各更不行用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1163729_comment'></div>四年正月一日后续降，自为《后敕》施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1163729_comment'></div>自来榷茶之法，今已删除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1163729_comment'></div>其通商之后所立条约，自从详定茶法所条次颁降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1163729_comment'></div>应未降新《嘉祐编敕》以前已用旧敕断遣与夺过公事，不在援引新敕诉理之限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1163729_comment'></div>其一司、一务、一路、一州、一县并在京海行及三司见行条贯，自依逐处元编定及续降敕条行用外，内有系新编敕兼载、与逐司旧制不同者，并依新编敕处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1163729_comment'></div>盖以惇崇宽大，蠲涤细微，较然使其易知，钦哉本乎惟恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1163729_comment'></div>譬夫江河纪地，狎玩者诚稀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1163729_comment'></div>震曜发天，威明之共仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1163729_comment'></div>其或多方谨饬，庶务持循，临文参考于治宜，逐事深求于法意，自然讼平以息，气感而和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1163729_comment'></div>能致太平，岂独称于周礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1163729_comment'></div>终成徼倖，兹奚取于郑书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1163729_comment'></div>臣等道鄙少恩，志希无害，被诏徒知于竭虑，讫功殊愧于淹期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1163729_comment'></div>或许颁行，仍乞以《嘉祐详定编敕》为目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1163729_comment'></div>其新编敕等共三十卷，谨随表上进以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1163729_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_55_1163729_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年5月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。五月，韩琦有《祭范宽之刑部文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十三。）</span><div id='poem_1164183' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164183' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164183?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭范宽之刑部文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年五月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164183")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164183_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164183'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164183'>维嘉祐七年岁次壬寅，五月丁未朔，十五日辛酉，具官某谨遣某人以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于范郎刑部之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164183_comment'></div>君之于余，兄之子婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164183_comment'></div>而余侄女，不幸早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164183_comment'></div>亲知之深，义无少替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164183_comment'></div>垂三十年，意爱交至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164183_comment'></div>君提国宪，向领全吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164183_comment'></div>察廉之失，屡经赦书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164183_comment'></div>复久去官，攻者终诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164183_comment'></div>降漕得守，遂观濠鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164183_comment'></div>中外交章，辨君非辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164183_comment'></div>牵复甚迩，君胡遽殂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164183_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164183_comment'></div>君始得疾，殆于累月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164183_comment'></div>度不能起，尚记疏拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164183_comment'></div>请兄援毫，寓书以诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164183_comment'></div>惟草二名，亲笔余别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164183_comment'></div>余一阅之，夙夜悲咽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164183_comment'></div>其间一事，余窃为疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164183_comment'></div>云分毫恩，未尝及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164183_comment'></div>余之知君，惟道是期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164183_comment'></div>所谓恩者，有公有私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164183_comment'></div>私则结好，死焉莫移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164183_comment'></div>公敢市宠，非余之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164183_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164183_comment'></div>君之平生，志气豪迈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164183_comment'></div>临终之言，何近狭隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164183_comment'></div>得非有激，其意安在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164183_comment'></div>俾余恤孤，余安敢怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164183_comment'></div>千里致哀，惟凭薄酹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164183_comment'></div>英特之魂，宜乎不昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164183_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1164183_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年8月</a>　八月，英宗仍辞免，仁宗问韩琦。韩琦说名分正了，英宗就不好推辞，于是仁宗提出在明堂立宗实为皇嗣。后听从欧阳修的建议立为皇子。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　英宗已经立为皇子，还是坚卧请辞。仁宗问韩琦，韩琦让仁宗以家人之礼待英宗，最终使英宗顺利入对清居殿，接受了任命。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年9月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《明堂庆成五言二十韵》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。此诗作于仁宗嘉祐中，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_496175' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496175' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496175?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明堂庆成五言二十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496175")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_496175_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496175'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496175'>至矣君严父，其惟祀配天。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496175'>明堂兹有法，路寝复申虔。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496175'>礼简刊前误，图新焕昔传。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496175'>乾坤隆正位，辰火协高躔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496175'>宗德停参侑，推尊独大圆。<div id='poem_sentence_4_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_496175'>兼崇太极坐，并享总章筵。<div id='poem_sentence_5_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_496175'>节物丰秋后，斋精吉玄前。<div id='poem_sentence_6_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_496175'>既祗真馆驾，遂洁閟宫牷。<div id='poem_sentence_7_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_496175'>泛洒轻尘失，涵濡惠泽先。<div id='poem_sentence_8_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_496175'>直由诚意感，卒使祭无愆。<div id='poem_sentence_9_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_496175'>翌日回清跸，中宵俨邃延。<div id='poem_sentence_10_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_496175'>一纯通肸蚃，五室敞蟺蜎。<div id='poem_sentence_11_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_496175'>和必流金石，馨非主豆笾。<div id='poem_sentence_12_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_496175'>灵光烛窗户，飙驾触旄旃。<div id='poem_sentence_13_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_496175'>齐酌终三荐，神釐答万年。<div id='poem_sentence_14_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_496175'>欢声摇海岳，瑞色变云烟。<div id='poem_sentence_15_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_496175'>馂已均庖贱，恩思被幅员。<div id='poem_sentence_16_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_496175'>星鸡随敕竖，赦鹤下楼宣。<div id='poem_sentence_17_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_496175'>教不烦家至，民惟视德迁。<div id='poem_sentence_18_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_496175'>普天知子道，斯匪化工<span class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作之）</span>然。<div id='poem_sentence_19_496175_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_496175'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_496175_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　明堂加恩，韩琦封仪国公。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年9月</a>　在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。韩琦有《葬安国夫人祭告祖茔文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164175' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164175' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164175?labeling=true' target='_blank'>葬安国夫人祭告祖茔文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164175")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164175_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164175'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164175'>维嘉祐七年岁次壬寅，九月乙巳朔，二十三日丁卯，孝孙具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敢昭告于曾祖令公、曾祖母太夫人、烈祖令公、祖母太夫人之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164175_comment'></div>某以新妇安国夫人崔氏之亡，取仲冬之二十九日，归葬于相之安阳县丰安村祖茔西先所得之吉地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164175_comment'></div>启壤之际，洁诚以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164175_comment'></div>伏望英灵昭鉴，阴为佑助，自始兴作，讫于成役，咸得安固，永作神居，唯子唯孙，传祀无已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164175_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1164175_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。韩琦有《葬安国夫人祭告先茔文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164176' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164176' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164176?labeling=true' target='_blank'>葬安国夫人祭告先茔文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164176")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164176_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164176'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164176'>维某年某月某朔某日，第六子具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敢昭告于先考令公、先妣太夫人之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164176_comment'></div>某以新妇安国夫人崔氏之亡，考经谋葬，得百日承凶为吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164176_comment'></div>遂举侄殿中丞公彦而下诸丧，咸归葬于相之故里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164176_comment'></div>公彦则开旧圹而纳焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164176_comment'></div>侄孙试秘书省校书郎确而下，则于大茔之东，别为一域以安之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164176_comment'></div>启壤之始，洁诚以告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164176_comment'></div>伏望英灵昭鉴，阴为福助，宅兆获安，子孙世祀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164176_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1164176_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e6a36d45de824ebcacc24d388eea72c6_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e6a36d45de824ebcacc24d388eea72c6");'><span id='e6a36d45de824ebcacc24d388eea72c6_link' href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年12月23日</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。十二月二十三日，仁宗召从臣于天章阁观三朝瑞物，燕群玉殿。召昭文相韩琦至榻前，别赐一大卮，又出禁中名花，以金盘贮香药，令持以归。韩琦作有《天章阁观御飞白五言十韵》，中有诗句：“流霞仙饮罢，又赐一杯醇。”<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_496176' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496176' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496176?labeling=true' "韩琦", "poem_title_496176")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_496176_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496176'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496176'>内阁门清晓，中天对迩臣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496176'>唐虞遗典在，河洛奥书陈。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496176'>二圣勤劳旧，千龄矩法新。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496176'>帝晖方咫尺，宸翰复躬亲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496176'>鸾拂<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_8_496176'>鱼藻符亨会，蓬瀛寄此身。<div id='poem_sentence_8_496176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_496176'>流霞仙饮罢，又赐一杯醇<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：圣恩劝酒，唯臣再赐巨杯。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_496176_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_496176'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_496176_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年12月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《御制天章阁观三圣御书奉圣旨次韵》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_496172' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496172' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496172?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_3_496172'>宸毫知善断，更嗣禹邦勤。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496172_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496172'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496172_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年12月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《中书进天章阁观祖宗御集锡宴诗状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163800' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163800' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163800?labeling=true' "韩琦", "poem_title_1163800")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163800_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163800'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163800'>右，臣等伏蒙圣慈召赴天章、宝文阁，观祖宗御集、赐御飞白书，群玉殿锡宴者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163800_comment'></div>二帝在天，多文垂世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163800_comment'></div>并河洛图书之奥，极天人精祲之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163800_comment'></div>皇帝陛下祗若先猷，秘于内阁，思崇宝训，亲发瑶函。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163800_comment'></div>爰命迩臣，获窥圣作，从容便坐，挥发宸毫，咸有恩颁，又参宴集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163800_comment'></div>实睿圣非常之宠，为臣邻莫大之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163800_comment'></div>谨各赋成拙诗一首，缮写进呈，浼渎天听，臣等无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1163800_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《答定帅仲仪龙图寄示阅古堂诗刻》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。）</span><div id='poem_496179' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496179' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496179?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答定帅仲仪龙图寄示堂诗刻</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496179")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496179_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496179'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496179'>好胜时多尚己为，前人勤力必随隳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496179'>所图营葺犹如是，欲树功名即可知。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496179'>昔慕先贤形藻绘，本同来哲作箴规。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496179'>得公诗刻增光燄，定警媮风变俗漓。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496179_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496179'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496179_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年1月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。正月，韩琦奏请罢古渭州城买马。作品：《乞罢古渭城买马奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷五。英宗四月一日即位，仍用嘉祐年号至十二月。）</span><div id='poem_1163994' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163994' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163994?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞罢古渭城买马奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163994")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163994_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163994'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163994'>秦州永宁寨，元以抄市卷马之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163994_comment'></div>昨修古渭寨，绝在永宁之西，而蕃汉多互市其间，因置买马场，凡岁用缗钱十馀万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163994_comment'></div>茍荡然流入虏中，实耗国用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163994_comment'></div>请复置场于永宁，而罢古渭城买马。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163994'><span class='label'>按：</span>《宋会要辑稿》兵二二之五（第八册第七一四六页）。又见同书食货六七之一（第七册第六二五三页）。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1163994_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年2月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。二月，韩琦有《祭文潞公太夫人文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十三。）</span><div id='poem_1164184' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164184' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164184?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭文潞公太夫人文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164184")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164184_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164184'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164184'>维嘉祐八年岁次癸卯，二月某朔某日，具官某谨遣门人陈谔，以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于鲁国太夫人之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164184_comment'></div>惟灵早嫔君子，克谨妇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164184_comment'></div>闑内之训，莫匪忠孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164184_comment'></div>有子逢辰，相吾大君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164184_comment'></div>肤公盛德，世无与伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164184_comment'></div>勤哉奉亲，繄我贤相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164184_comment'></div>晨夕旨甘，得谓荣养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164184_comment'></div>享封大国，褕翟鱼轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164184_comment'></div>康宁寿考，五福之全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164184_comment'></div>相君承颜，以惧以喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164184_comment'></div>请治于洛，归来乡里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164184_comment'></div>慰我高堂，鼓钟笙簧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164184_comment'></div>大期之及，怡然而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164184_comment'></div>琦于相君，义则兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164184_comment'></div>何以致哀，是惟薄祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164184_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1164184_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《中书东厅十咏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。此十诗作于仁宗嘉祐中，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div
