ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年3月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《祭告五代祖庶子文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164172' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164172' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164172?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭告五代祖庶子文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164172")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164172_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164172'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164172'>维嘉祐八年岁次癸卯，三月某朔某日，五代孙具官某，谨遣男忠彦以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于五代祖庶子之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164172_comment'></div>惟灵历唐显官，兴起韩氏，终葬博陆，家牒具存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164172_comment'></div>某自从官以来，深惟祖先茔域之重，虽勤推访，未能辨识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164172_comment'></div>数年前，始得四代祖鼓城府君之茔于赵州之赞皇，至于开隧观铭，众始大信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164172_comment'></div>既以崇葺，则益念庶子博陆所葬之地，不当无迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164172_comment'></div>会故吏国子博士刘觐通判永宁之任，来别，遂托寻究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164172_comment'></div>未几，得觐书，以从侄弁所得二处士埋铭墨本来示，阅所叙三代，则皆庶子之弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164172_comment'></div>且言处士坟旁，岿然而高，草树蒙翳者，疑是庶子之茔也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164172_comment'></div>大用感慰，故使忠彦不远千里，躬修菲薄之荐，而请一视志文，不独取信于众人，亦俾裔孙岁岁展祀，无有疑惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164172_comment'></div>惟灵鉴此诚恳，勿以一时干动神宅而赐大戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164172_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1164172_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《祭告五代叔祖二处士文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164173' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164173' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164173?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭告五代叔祖二处士文</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164173")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164173_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164173'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164173'>维嘉祐八年岁次癸卯，某月某朔某日，五代孙具官某，谨遣男忠彦以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于五代叔祖处士、五代叔祖母夫人之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164173_comment'></div>某尝阅家谍，知五代祖而上，实葬博野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164173_comment'></div>年祀殊邈，虽勤于推访，大惧不知所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164173_comment'></div>比得从侄弁录二志铭来告，且言向葺坏坟之所得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164173_comment'></div>详所叙三代，则二处士乃某五代祖庶子之亲弟也，不胜惊叹慰喜之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164173_comment'></div>故使忠彦择良日，具薄荐，完补颓缺，再严封树，仍饬子孙岁享祀，传于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164173_comment'></div>惟灵歆而监之，以重福于来裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164173_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1164173_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《祭告永宁军先茔土地文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164174' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164174' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164174?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭告永宁军先茔土地文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164174")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164174_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164174'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164174'>维某年某月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌之奠，敢昭告于土地之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164174_comment'></div>某闻山川土地，神实主之，无名而犯，降殃可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164174_comment'></div>某之五代祖庶子，历唐美官，终葬于博野县之北原，虽距今几二百年矣，比始知其所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164174_comment'></div>若非一视铭志，则裔孙之祀孰不疑，而人孰取信哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164174_comment'></div>故遣男忠彦，择日开隧，以告于神，非无名而犯也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164174_comment'></div>惟神禀德聪直，故宜助成孝心，俾求之不谬，某决知乎神不降殃而降福也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164174_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1164174_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　三月二十九日，仁宗上仙。四月一日，韩琦指挥若定，扶英宗即位。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年4月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《中书进仁宗皇帝挽词状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163801' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163801' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163801?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中书进仁宗皇帝挽词状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163801")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163801_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163801'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163801'>右，臣等伏以大行皇帝奄弃万国，内外臣妾号恸殒绝，无有生意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163801_comment'></div>况臣等待罪二府，始终荣遇，皆愿从死于昭陵之下而不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163801_comment'></div>然欲宣盛德，述至仁，寄其悲慕之怀，以传著于无穷，惟是《蒿里》之歌，《薤露》之唱，可布写其一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163801_comment'></div>臣等忍泣抽思，各撰成大行皇帝《挽词》三首，缮写上进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163801_comment'></div>臣等无任哀摧感咽之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163801_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年4月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《仁宗皇帝挽辞三首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十五。）</span><div id='poem_496548' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496548' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496548?labeling=true' target='_blank'>英宗皇帝挽辞三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496548")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496548_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496548'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496548'>遽委飞乾运，应开出震符。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496548'>子方批凤尾，天已下龙胡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496548'>遏密思尧治，讴歌启舜图。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496548'>只留勤俭德，千古亘三无。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496548'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496548_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496549' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496549' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496549?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496549_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496549'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496549'>此日天无色，輴车下禁宸。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496549'>悲风随去仗，哀泪裛行尘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496549'>一闭皇堂夜，长閒御寝春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496549'>守陵来有几，萧索庆宁人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496549'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496549_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496550' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496550' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496550?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496550_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496550'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496550'>蜃驾虽停洛，飙舆已溯天。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496550'>空藏轩剑舄，不敢霸山川。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496550'>挽揭秋声外，旌翻夕照前。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496550'>老臣非从死，何路答知怜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496550'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496550_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《仁宗皇帝哀册文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163686' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163686' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163686?labeling=true' target='_blank'>仁宗皇帝哀册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163686")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163686_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163686'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163686'>维嘉祐八年岁次癸卯，三月癸卯朔，二十九日辛未，仁宗神文圣武明孝皇帝崩于福宁殿，旋殡于殿之西阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163686_comment'></div>粤十月戊辰朔，六日癸酉，迁坐于永昭陵，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163686_comment'></div>龙驭宾天，珠襦留殡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163686_comment'></div>万方之轨同臻，七月之期兹近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163686_comment'></div>法仗已严，灵輴未进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163686_comment'></div>风云惨郁以生悲，臣妾涕号而思殉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163686_comment'></div>孝子嗣皇帝臣曙接统承尧，念亲晞舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163686_comment'></div>徘徊象物，惊禁从以如存；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163686_comment'></div>摧慕仙游，致哀诚兮必尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163686_comment'></div>繄临奠以长辞，盖终天之永恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163686_comment'></div>乃命弼臣，以文传信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163686_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1163686'>惟宋受命，与天无疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163686_comment'></div>艺祖以武，底宁四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163686_comment'></div>神宗以文，万邦一王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163686_comment'></div>真庙绍隆，赫然其光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163686_comment'></div>逮夫仁宗，益炽而昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163686_comment'></div>厥生之初，上帝惟祜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163686_comment'></div>天日之表，振古未睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163686_comment'></div>色出圭章，步严龙虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163686_comment'></div>其俾真人，来绥下土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163686_comment'></div>元良之建，匕鬯是主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163686_comment'></div>寝门之问，惕若文、武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163686_comment'></div>嗣训之循，纂承丕绪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163686_comment'></div>左右献后，以蒙自处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163686_comment'></div>大运归乾，独化陶甄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163686_comment'></div>进良黜奸，始章圣权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163686_comment'></div>其仁如天，其广如渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163686_comment'></div>其仁伊何，得之自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163686_comment'></div>草秀而茁，虫飞而翾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163686_comment'></div>尚不忍伤，况吾民焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163686_comment'></div>惠泽之霈，滂洋幅员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163686_comment'></div>物靡不滋，四十二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163686_comment'></div>猗如天兮，化工则全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163686_comment'></div>其度伊何，汪然莫际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163686_comment'></div>巨细必容，默分诚伪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163686_comment'></div>臣在言职，不知忌讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163686_comment'></div>时肆诋讦，众嫉狂易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163686_comment'></div>圣心怡然，曰此忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1163686_comment'></div>是也吾从，过焉何戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1163686_comment'></div>猗如渊兮，是能致治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1163686_comment'></div>明谨庶狱，极于哀矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1163686_comment'></div>惟法所在，未尝妄刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1163686_comment'></div>郡邑之吏，责之详平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1163686_comment'></div>一失入罪，无阶显荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1163686_comment'></div>尊为天子，以俭为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1163686_comment'></div>崇尚清虚，屏斥纷丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1163686_comment'></div>向缘不怿，辅臣入视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1163686_comment'></div>殿幄萧然，茵衾故敝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1163686_comment'></div>率用缯素，了无文绮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1163686_comment'></div>众目惊嗟，上曰「何喟？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1163686_comment'></div>吾之受用，素止如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1163686_comment'></div>此民膏血，焉敢妄费」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1163686_comment'></div>恭事天地，孝承祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1163686_comment'></div>九见圜丘，再祗合宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1163686_comment'></div>大祫于庙，亲籍于东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1163686_comment'></div>服器精备，粢盛洁丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1163686_comment'></div>小次不御，秉圭颙颙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1163686_comment'></div>何必户晓，民胥偃风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1163686_comment'></div>取士之路，务在至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1163686_comment'></div>十二临轩，策之必躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1163686_comment'></div>隽髦尽得，岩穴几空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1163686_comment'></div>有将有相，曰功曰庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1163686_comment'></div>眇视三代，吾其比崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1163686_comment'></div>北胡之强，西夏之猘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1163686_comment'></div>时欲跳梁，恣其贪嗜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1163686_comment'></div>吾以威怀，折其凶锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1163686_comment'></div>两阶摇尾，从我羁饵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1163686_comment'></div>百蛮梯航，琛赆日至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1163686_comment'></div>礼乐具修，干戈不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1163686_comment'></div>夫惟立嗣，天下之基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1163686_comment'></div>前世令王，或牵以私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1163686_comment'></div>事不前定，滨于乱危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1163686_comment'></div>我出独断，挺然不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1163686_comment'></div>求贤于宗，唯圣是知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1163686_comment'></div>神器之重，其传有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1163686_comment'></div>庙社以安，生灵以嬉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1163686_comment'></div>迹其大公，尧舜之为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1163686_comment'></div>昔在人上，必有偏好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1163686_comment'></div>或乐驰畋，或喜征讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1163686_comment'></div>或务宴游，或专营造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1163686_comment'></div>或迩声色，或泥丹灶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1163686_comment'></div>棋弈之工，系拂之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1163686_comment'></div>有一于此，下从而效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1163686_comment'></div>噫吾仁宗，澹无所乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1163686_comment'></div>曰吾好者，在勤政道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1163686_comment'></div>日必旰昃，惟先之绍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1163686_comment'></div>间时弄翰，或隶或草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1163686_comment'></div>垩帚之挥，千奇万巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1163686_comment'></div>去冬之暮，清燕之閒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1163686_comment'></div>再辟天阁，诏呼从官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1163686_comment'></div>亲作飞白，侍臣纵观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1163686_comment'></div>心合造化，生成笔端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1163686_comment'></div>书幅踰百，大均宠颁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1163686_comment'></div>退坐群玉，行觞尽欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1163686_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1163686_comment'></div>赐墨尚湿，宸章未刊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1163686_comment'></div>植璧斯虔，遽有金縢之祷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1163686_comment'></div>缀衣遂彻，俄承玉几之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1163686_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1163686_comment'></div>大变之来，天倾地裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1163686_comment'></div>四海之恸，风号雨血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1163686_comment'></div>兆民震骇其无生，百辟冤呼而仅绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1163686_comment'></div>乘云之游兮，汗漫而自高；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1163686_comment'></div>持髯之慕兮，僵仆而徒切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1163686_comment'></div>因疑前会之非常，似与群臣之叙诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1163686_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1163686_comment'></div>候律云凛，诹辰协元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1163686_comment'></div>严蜃路以方驾，视羽幢兮始前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1163686_comment'></div>池竹摇雉，车旗饰鸾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1163686_comment'></div>背朱雀之通逵，指青龙之吉山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1163686_comment'></div>关路长兮去复去，宫车晚兮还不还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1163686_comment'></div>痛彻六宫兮莫如逝，泪洒重瞳兮胡可攀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1163686_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1163686_comment'></div>寒日昼昏，愁阴夜积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1163686_comment'></div>卷晴霓于丹旐，荡霜波于素帟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1163686_comment'></div>哀笳玄咽，六州之奏增悽；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1163686_comment'></div>骏岳前瞻，万岁之声何阒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1163686_comment'></div>大隧一扃，幽堂永寂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1163686_comment'></div>人间之恨空长，帝所之欢岂极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1163686_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1163686_comment'></div>秦汉而下，御邦子民，夐越三纪，才闻数君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1163686_comment'></div>其间治乱以相駮，否亨之不醇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1163686_comment'></div>如仁宗享国之久，而始终太平兮，彼安敢望吾之清尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1163686_comment'></div>生而无穷者厚载，健而不息者高旻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1163686_comment'></div>惟至仁盛德与高厚之俱兮，万世巍然而不泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1163686_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_125_1163686_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年4月</a>　加韩琦门下侍郎兼兵部尚书，进封卫国公。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年4月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《辞免登极覃恩第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163730' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163730' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163730?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免登极覃恩第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163730")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163730_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163730'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163730'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特授臣门下侍郎兼兵部尚书、同中书门下平章事、昭文馆大学士、监修国史、兼译经润文使、进封魏国公、加食邑、食实封者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163730_comment'></div>真主御图，普天蒙福，忝被臣邻之列，首膺进陟之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163730_comment'></div>命出非常，愧难自处<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163730_comment'></div>伏念臣早遇先帝，亟登冢司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163730_comment'></div>大政大谋，固无俾于万一；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163730_comment'></div>小才小谨，徒粗免于过尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163730_comment'></div>方沥恳以抗章，冀避贤而获请，剡牍未再，号愬莫攀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163730_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下神圣嗣昌，天人合应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163730_comment'></div>诞布维新之泽，更敦图旧之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163730_comment'></div>逮此告庭，遽先增秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163730_comment'></div>矧东台四品之重，常伯七兵之荣，既大国封，复优邑赋，使宗臣之当是宠，犹恐弗胜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163730_comment'></div>顾愚宰之无甚能，岂宜轻授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163730_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下始乾刚之断，发离正之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163730_comment'></div>深惟听览之初，动切施为之谨，悉停异数，以协公言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163730_comment'></div>如此，则不稼而取廛禾，免无功而被刺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163730_comment'></div>舍鱼而欲熊掌，誓见义而必为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163730_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1163730_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年4月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《辞免登极覃恩第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163731' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163731' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163731?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免登极覃恩第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163731")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163731_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163731'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163731'>臣某言：伏奉制命<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云，）</span>，寻具表陈让，蒙降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163731_comment'></div>大君膺历，绵宇推恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163731_comment'></div>泽逮群元，宜至微之必浃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163731_comment'></div>宠先四近，顾无状以何胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163731_comment'></div>辄上奏封，冀还渥命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163731_comment'></div>聆诏音之未可，揣愚分以难安<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163731_comment'></div>伏以先皇帝仁如高天，容则厚地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163731_comment'></div>自《诗》《书》之所载，冠今古以无前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163731_comment'></div>兴俭守文，致成康之美俗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163731_comment'></div>先知传圣，得尧舜之大公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163731_comment'></div>皇帝陛下奉若先猷，纂隆大宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163731_comment'></div>中外稔闻于圣德，讴歌允协于天心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163731_comment'></div>庆赐之行，幅员同抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163731_comment'></div>臣叨尘辅翼，素乏材谋，当听断之惟初，在赞襄而何有？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163731_comment'></div>褒荣骤及，震慄无从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163731_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下揽国权纲，新民耳目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163731_comment'></div>黜陟大柄必本于无私，左右弼臣俾全于难进，亟追误赏，以劝多方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163731_comment'></div>上化之行，必捷置邮之传命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163731_comment'></div>臣衷所报，更坚忠义以忘身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163731_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1163731_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年4月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《登极覃恩谢皇帝表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163732' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163732' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163732?labeling=true' target='_blank'>登极覃恩谢皇帝表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163732")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163732_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163732'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163732'>臣某言：伏奉制命<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云，）</span>，寻再具表陈让，蒙降批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163732_comment'></div>睿圣膺图，肇览八纮之绪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163732_comment'></div>幅员霈泽，交欢万国之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163732_comment'></div>眷惟丞辅之臣，首玷便蕃之宠，无容避免，徒极兢惭<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163732_comment'></div>窃以鸾省迩联，地亚珥貂之贵；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163732_comment'></div>天台上列，官推司马之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163732_comment'></div>爰自近年，罕尝兼拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163732_comment'></div>如臣者性惟甚戆，学不能醇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163732_comment'></div>偶熙运之寖昌，窃殊科而获仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163732_comment'></div>孤忠自立，众毁交腾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163732_comment'></div>先皇帝察惟直之无他，谓颛愚之可任，擢跻显近，力主单平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163732_comment'></div>奔走三垂，有徇国忘身之志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163732_comment'></div>周旋二府，乏佐王经远之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163732_comment'></div>逮升冢席之荣，益起素餐之诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163732_comment'></div>避贤奏牍，方上印以输诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163732_comment'></div>丧考缠悲，忽攀髯而发恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163732_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下丕承大统，光绍庆基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163732_comment'></div>盛德之新，罄万方而咸睹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163732_comment'></div>湛恩之降，浃四海以无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163732_comment'></div>故此弼臣，特先异数，俾正名于宰任，复增重于官仪，仍迁公爵之优，更益邑租之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163732_comment'></div>俯偻之辞莫遂，庸驽之分何胜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163732_comment'></div>敢不谨极冰渊，守坚金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163732_comment'></div>良时易失，惟勤拙者之为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163732_comment'></div>高位疾颠，常蹈古人之戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163732_comment'></div>少裨至治，上答殊私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163732_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1163732_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年4月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《登极覃恩谢皇太后表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十七。）</span><div id='poem_1163733' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163733' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163733?labeling=true' target='_blank'>登极覃恩谢皇太后表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163733")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163733_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163733'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163733'>臣某言：伏奉制命<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云，）</span>，寻再具表陈让，蒙降批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163733_comment'></div>龙德在天，庆一人之纂极；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163733_comment'></div>阳春布泽，浃四海以蒙休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163733_comment'></div>惟是弼臣，首膺褒典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163733_comment'></div>辞甚坚而莫遂，躬屡省以无容<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163733_comment'></div>伏念臣早窃荣科，寖阶膴仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163733_comment'></div>自信鄙夫之守，特深先帝之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163733_comment'></div>外御疆垂，五玷师权之重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163733_comment'></div>入参枢筦，再尘机务之繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163733_comment'></div>逮进陟于冢司，固取轻于人望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163733_comment'></div>适露请藩之奏，遽承凭几之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163733_comment'></div>恭遇皇太后殿下坤德居中，母仪形外，翊皇明而增焕，协圣治之有初，爰霈大恩，咸均庶位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163733_comment'></div>顾惟蒙陋，前忝龙光，峻卿列于中台，正宰名于黄闼，仍优封爵，益厚食租。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163733_comment'></div>令如汗以靡收，宠若惊而自失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163733_comment'></div>敢不任责归己，竭诚在公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163733_comment'></div>以道事君，勉著经邦之效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163733_comment'></div>无功受禄，终期上印之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163733_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1163733_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年4月</a>　方为仁宗举行祭礼，英宗因病而言语失常，韩琦果断中止仪式，扶英宗入内服药。并告诫范镇不要外泄看到的英宗情况。此事亦为欧阳修所亲见。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《上永昭陵名状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163803' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163803' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163803?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上永昭陵名状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163803")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163803_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163803'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163803'>臣奉敕撰定先帝陵名者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163803_comment'></div>兆域之图，按礼经而伊始；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163803_comment'></div>因山之故，奉大训以惟严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163803_comment'></div>宜立嘉名，上符至德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163803_comment'></div>大行皇帝仁无不浃，道极莫称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163803_comment'></div>开寿域以跻民，咸归圣治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163803_comment'></div>建善经而长世，坐致时雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163803_comment'></div>岂徒超越于百王，固以光辉于万世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163803_comment'></div>大行皇帝陵，谨请以「永昭」为名。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163803_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163803'><span class='label'>按：</span>《安阳集》卷三三。又见《宋朝事实》卷一注引。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1163803_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　英宗初即位即发病，韩琦劝英宗饮药。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　英宗病愈，韩琦请出幸寺观祷雨，向天下百姓展示新皇帝形象。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年7月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。七月，韩琦奏请吕夏卿、韩维兼实录检讨官，为修仁宗朝实录做准备。作品：《乞吕夏卿韩维兼实录检讨官奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1163995' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163995' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163995?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞吕夏卿韩维兼实录检讨官奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年七月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163995")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163995_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163995'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163995'>史院日历未修者积十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163995_comment'></div>今将修先朝实录，而日历未备，检讨阙官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163995_comment'></div>请以祠部员外郎、直秘阁吕夏卿，太子中允、秘阁校理韩维兼职。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163995_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年7月13日</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。七月十三日，韩琦有《重修五代祖茔域记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164124' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164124' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164124?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重修五代祖茔域记</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐八年七月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164124")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164124_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164124'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164124'>唐镇、冀、深、赵等州节度判官、朝议郎、检校太子左庶子兼御史中丞、赐紫金鱼袋讳乂宾，琦之五代祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164124_comment'></div>初，庶子以博学高节，晦道不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164124_comment'></div>而镇帅太傅王绍鼎雅知其名，屡加礼辟，庶子不得已而起，补节度副记室事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164124_comment'></div>绍鼎卒，其子太尉常山王景崇袭有父镇，益尊礼庶子，奏授节度掌书记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164124_comment'></div>时巢贼犯阙，僖宗幸剑南，景崇率定帅王处存，合邻道兵入关进讨，关辅以平，皆庶子谋也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164124_comment'></div>景崇卒，其子太师镕幼，嗣父位，府事一咨于庶子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164124_comment'></div>以义结邻帅，内尊王室，朝廷嘉之，故恩命累及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164124_comment'></div>以光启二年八月十四日终于镇府立义坊之私第，年七十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164124_comment'></div>庶子曾祖讳朏，沂州司户参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164124_comment'></div>祖讳沛，登州录事参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164124_comment'></div>父讳全，隐居不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164124_comment'></div>自隐居而上，世葬深州博野蠡吾乡之北原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164124_comment'></div>博野今为永宁军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164124_comment'></div>庶子以龙纪元年十月十五日，复附葬于先茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164124_comment'></div>夫人崔氏，棣州司马鲁之长女，妇道母训，为世仪法，终于天复二年七月十九日，年八十有三，其年八月十七日归祔于庶子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164124_comment'></div>生二子，长讳定辞，镇、冀、深、赵等州观察判官、检校尚书、祠部郎中兼侍御史，好学能文，无所不览。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164124_comment'></div>尝聘燕帅刘仁恭，仁恭命幕吏马彧以诗赠祠部，颇衒己学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164124_comment'></div>祠部即席酬之曰：「崇霞台上神仙客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164124_comment'></div>学辨痴龙艺最多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164124_comment'></div>盛德好将银笔述，丽辞堪与雪儿歌」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164124_comment'></div>一座爱其辞而不能解焉，大屈服，事具《北梦琐言》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164124_comment'></div>次讳昌辞，真定府鼓城令，琦之高祖也，为政有惠爱而不寿，年二十九而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164124_comment'></div>生一子讳璆，广晋府永济令，琦之曾祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164124_comment'></div>永济始自蠡吾北原徙鼓城，与夫人张氏之丧葬于赵州赞皇县太平乡之北马村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164124_comment'></div>先君令公始葬永济与夫人史氏暨琦祖太子中允、知康州讳构与夫人李氏于相州安阳县之丰安村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164124_comment'></div>自先君之亡，诸子幼而孤，长而薄宧，奔走四方，故但能时奉丰安之祀，其于北马、蠡吾之茔，则力莫能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164124_comment'></div>年世殊邈，几于不能辨识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164124_comment'></div>嘉祐三年，琦始得北马之茔，一新封植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164124_comment'></div>今年春，遣男忠彦走蠡吾，又得庶子之茔于北原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164124_comment'></div>而先域之西北隅，北距唐河数里之近，尝经霖潦暴涨，浸淫及于庶子之茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164124_comment'></div>且念神宅久安，不敢改卜，乃于嘉祐八年七月一日，遣孝彦告而启圹，自下以甓实而上，绝沮洳而止，衣衾棺柩，易而新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164124_comment'></div>然后塞隧广封，以为万世之固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164124_comment'></div>逮远祖诸茔，率加治葺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164124_comment'></div>剪其荆棘，而易以嘉木；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164124_comment'></div>缭其垣墉，而表以高闳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164124_comment'></div>既襄其事也，遂直书营缮之始末，而纳诸圹中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164124_comment'></div>且复诫于子孙曰：「夫谨家牒而心不忘于先茔者，孝之大也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164124_comment'></div>惟坟墓祭祀之有托，故以子孙不绝为重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164124_comment'></div>琦自志于学，每见祖先所为文字与家世铭志，则知宝而藏之，有遗逸者，常精意搜掇，未始少懈，时编岁缉，寖以大备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164124_comment'></div>其所志先域之所在，虽距今百有馀年，必思博访而得之，卒能不坠先业，推及先茔之八世，得以岁时奉祀，少慰庸嗣之志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164124_comment'></div>向若家谍之不谨，祖先文字之不传，虽有孝于祖先之心，欲究其宅兆而严事之，其可得乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164124_comment'></div>后世子孙不能勤而知此，则与夫世之绝也何异？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164124_comment'></div>子孙其志之！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164124_comment'></div>子孙其志之」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164124_comment'></div>时嘉祐八年七月十三日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1164124_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦上《论骄卒诬将校乞严军律奏》，乞请皇帝于平时严于治军，以备他日边境有急。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六；《历代名臣奏议》卷二百十。）</span><div id='poem_1163925' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163925' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163925?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论骄卒诬告将校乞严军律奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163925")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163925_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163925'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163925'>臣近闻虎翼长行武赟，引见日唐突告论本指挥使关元部辖严紧，及将人口上京，下军头司取责，并送开封府勘鞠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163925_comment'></div>窃如本府勘得武赟各从杖一百定断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163925_comment'></div>臣窃以军中之法，最为严重，茍从宽弛，为害匪轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163925_comment'></div>其武赟既陈告部辖将校不公，自有殿前马步军司合属去处，引见之际，咫尺天威，固非军人论事之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163925_comment'></div>及将辩讯，又多诬罔之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163925_comment'></div>盖近年兵卒骄纵，类率如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163925_comment'></div>国家屯置师旅，众踰百万，一营只委将校数员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163925_comment'></div>若钤制稍严，便即捃拾小过，于引见之际唐突论诉，朝廷不以大体断之，两皆获罪，必恐此后兵卒将校渐废阶级之制，但务姑息，以求无过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163925_comment'></div>若一旦边境有急，使其亡躯命而赴汤火，必不能为陛下用也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163925_comment'></div>陛下诚宜于泰宁之辰，深戒有司，凡百军旅之事，常以训戢为意，有违犯者，时以重法行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163925_comment'></div>其将校茍非大过，止因部辖严峻，为兵士所怨，求细事以致其罪者，亦当舍而不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163925_comment'></div>所谓惩一卒而警万众，去小恶而行大仁，惟陛下熟赐裁详，天下至幸！</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1163925_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　韩琦敦促光献太后还政英宗。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　韩琦履行诺言，劝英宗尊崇光献太后。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《次韵答子渊学士》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。《安阳集编年笺注》有《次韵答子渊学士》同题诗二首，此为其中一首，首句为“忆昔明道初”此诗作于仁宗嘉祐中，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span>《寄题西京致政张郎中静居院》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。此诗作于仁宗嘉祐中，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495893' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495893' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495893?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵答子渊学士</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495893")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495893_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495893'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495893'>忆昔明道初，穷冬极短昼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495893'>给札金銮坡，孤拙并髦秀。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495893'>诸公名世才，奋笔若神佑。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495893'>芜辞亦见收，圣造等天覆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495893'>子渊亲契深，实出同试右。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495893'>自兹接珍群，轩翼羾紫宙。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495893'>忠义必相勉，权利孰肯就。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495893'>洞照无隐情，胸臆烂辰宿。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495893'>宦路有亨塞，叨窃愧鄙陋。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495893'>何时聚德星，一慰荀陈旧。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495893_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495893'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_495893_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_495894' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495894' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495894?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寄题西京致政张郎中静居院</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495894")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495894_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495894'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495894'>休官得宴闲，理固居处静。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495894'>中或不自达，触物挠天性。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495894'>遂令优游心，反致寂寞病。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495894'>二川有耆英，识岂斯人并。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495894'>周才当要职，美誉著群听。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495894'>气体殊未衰，援礼请还政。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495894'>安车得西归，芜没治三径。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495894'>萧然绝世纷，日以道自胜。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495894'>以静名厥居，内外了相称。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495894'>君怀本清虚，复此林泉莹。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495894'>君道本和乐，况有琴樽命。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495894'>新堂辟四隅，立意尤高迥<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495894'>夷襟造真境，友益具子令。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495894'>药品稽神仙，门法尚忠正。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495894'>肌肤松菊香<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：君饵松菊已效，故云）</span>，庭砌芝兰盛。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495894'>天宜锡难老，以示君子庆。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495894_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495894'>予亦希君者，误宠窃机柄。<div ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496180")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496180_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496181' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496181?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夏暑早朝二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496181")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_496181_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496181'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496181'>凉风吹暑豁烦歊，上马迎风趁早朝。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496181'>宿雾欲开星月澹，隐然双阙在层霄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496181_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496181'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_496181_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496182' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496182' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496182?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496182_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496182'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496182'>夺热清风几快襟，禁街岑寂漏声沉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496182_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496182'>东方似动阴氛失，北斗高垂帝阙深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496182_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496182'>忧国远图深入梦，费诗闲景懒成吟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496182_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496182'>平明天外鸣鞘下，万玉颙然拱极心。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496182_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496182'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496182_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《召赴天章阁观新柑》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷九。此诗作于仁宗嘉祐中，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_496183' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496183' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496183?labeling=true' target='_blank'>召赴天章阁观新柑</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496183")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_496183_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496183'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496183'>云阁崇先重，霜柑荐瑞新。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496183_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496183'>临观纡法从，趋召独邻臣。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496183_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496183'>虹实开天意，重荣浃上人<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496183_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496183'>不随淮枳变，自比禹包珍。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496183_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496183'>庙献宸心格，亲颁圣宠均。<div id='poem_sentence_4_496183_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_496183'>从兹魁众果，仙府占长春。<div id='poem_sentence_5_496183_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_496183'></div><div id='poem_sentence_6_496183_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_496183'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_496183_0'>⑴ 自注：上宣谕，此树枯而再荣，今始结实。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_496183_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《癸卯喜雪》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十。）</span><div id='poem_496214' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496214' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496214?labeling=true' target='_blank'>癸卯喜雪<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作雨，据底本目录改）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496214")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496214_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496214'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496214'>一夜阴云匝四溟，朝来嘉雪洒寰瀛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496214_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496214'>因风絮起先春媚，剪水花飞到地轻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496214_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496214'>天际定迷琼蕊屑，世间今有玉楼成。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496214_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496214'>应时何止销民疹，直压胡沙万里清。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496214_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496214'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496214_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《文正范公奏议集序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十二。此文约仁宗嘉祐间韩琦在政府时作，但具体作时不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1164104' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164104' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164104?labeling=true' target='_blank'>文正范公奏议集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164104")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164104_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164104'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164104'>某尝谓自古国家之治否，生民之休戚，在人不在天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164104_comment'></div>人或不然之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164104_comment'></div>今于文正范公，然后知其说之胜，或者不足疑，而于教之有补也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164104_comment'></div>公以王佐之才，遇不世出之主，竭忠尽瘁，知无不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164104_comment'></div>故由小官擢谏任，危言鲠论，建明规益，身虽可绌，义则难夺，天下正人之路，始公辟之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164104_comment'></div>其后恤灾南方，捍寇西垂，贰机政，陪宰席，宏谋大策，出入仁义，朝思夕虑，条疏深切，志欲膏泽中夏，鞭笞四夷，使我宋之基，万世不拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164104_comment'></div>不幸经远而责近，识大而合寡，故其言格而未行，或行而复沮者，几十四五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164104_comment'></div>逮公之亡也，闻听所及，莫不咨嗟感恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164104_comment'></div>惜公所蕴，不克尽施于世，甚则推诸天，谓人谋之不足为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164104_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164104_comment'></div>公之所陈，用于时者，大则恢永图，小则革众弊，为不少矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164104_comment'></div>其未用者今副稿所存，烂然可究，一旦朝廷举而行之，兴起太平，如指掌之易耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164104_comment'></div>此天乎哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164104_comment'></div>必在乎人而已矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164104_comment'></div>次子寺丞君缉公遗文，得《奏议》十七卷、《政府论事》二卷，以某昔帅西兵，翊内枢，与公并任，而出处之与公同也，俾序以冠其首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164104_comment'></div>夫以公之文武兼备，乃靖王室，朝野所论，谓道之亨塞，时之重轻，率系公之用不用，则其德业之著于天下也久矣，恶假鄙文而后知哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164104_comment'></div>但以忝缘僚旧，饫公盛美，义不敢让，且慰贤嗣之意云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164104_comment'></div>具位某序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1164104_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1063&endYear=1063')">1063年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《录载五代祖庶子并其二弟墓志序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164112' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164112' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164112?labeling=true' target='_blank'>录载五代祖庶子并其二弟墓志序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164112")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164112_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164112'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164112'>琦之五代祖庶子而上，世葬于博野县蠡吾乡之北原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164112_comment'></div>庶子生祠部与鼓城府君，鼓城生永济府君，永济始自北原徙鼓城，与夫人张氏葬于赵州赞皇县太平乡之北马村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164112_comment'></div>后之子孙，奔走薄官，故于蠡吾之茔，省视不能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164112_comment'></div>天圣中，三兄司封任群牧判官，有乡贡进士韩可者，自博野赴举来京师，与司封兄相过从，且叙宗派。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164112_comment'></div>庆历八年，琦知定州，而可之子弁亦来请见，称从侄，问其祖系相承之次第，不能悉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164112_comment'></div>而可之父子，复未尝一语及先茔之所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164112_comment'></div>嘉祐三年，琦既得鼓城之坟于北马，再严封树，且念庶子之茔，虽年祀尤远，茍访之勤，亦当得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164112_comment'></div>会故吏国子博士刘觐通判永宁，遂以兹托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164112_comment'></div>已而得觐书，言弁尝补葺旧茔，得二志文，一讳文操，并以坟图来示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164112_comment'></div>详二志所载三代，则皆庶子之亲弟也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164112_comment'></div>八年春，遣男忠彦走蠡吾以详辨之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164112_comment'></div>一坟处诸茔之西北，最大而高，忠彦思若神感，谓众人曰：「此当是吾庶子之茔也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164112_comment'></div>于是祭而开圹，及晡，得其志石，视之果然，众大嗟异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164112_comment'></div>而庶子茔尝为暴水所侵，内甚沮洳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164112_comment'></div>逮远祖诸茔，皆久失治完，遂一新崇葺，事具《重修五代祖茔域记》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164112_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164112_comment'></div>琦以区区奉亲之志，而获天之报也数矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164112_comment'></div>其所以答天之意者，惟奉事先世益加其勤，至于瞑目而后已耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164112_comment'></div>吾子孙辈，视吾奉亲之志如此，而获天之报如此，可无动心而思继者哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164112_comment'></div>今录庶子与其二弟志文，附于家集，以永其传云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164112_comment'></div>鼓城志文曾祖登州录事参军当云「讳沛」，而书以高祖沂州司户府君之名者，当时填讳之误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164112_comment'></div>谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1164112_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年2月</a>　二月，韩琦提举修撰《仁宗实録》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《甲辰景灵宿斋谢雨》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十。）</span><div id='poem_496213' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496213' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496213?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲辰景灵宿斋谢雨</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年闰5月</a>　闰五月，韩琦除尚书右仆射。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年闰5月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。闰五月，韩琦有《敕赐真如禅院名额牒》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1164008' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164008'>中书、门下牒潞州：潞城奏，准勘会到系阙存留寺院，乞赐名额，候敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164008_comment'></div>取到祠部状，并系得文阙内潞城县金粟山福仙寺宜赐真如院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164008_comment'></div>牒奉敕如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164008_comment'></div>宜令本县翻录敕黄降付逐寺院，依今来敕命所定名额。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164008_comment'></div>牒至，准敕，故牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164008_comment'></div>治平元年闰五月日牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164008_comment'></div>户部侍郎、参知政事赵，兵部侍郎、参知政事欧阳，中书侍郎兼礼部尚书、平章事曾，门下侍郎兼兵部尚书、平章事韩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1164008_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164185")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164185_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164185'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164185'>维治平元年岁次甲辰，九月癸亥朔，二日甲子，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于殿丞崔君十哥之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164185_comment'></div>惟君之禀，天与和粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164185_comment'></div>大《韶》之发，听者忘味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164185_comment'></div>大圭之全，莹尔君瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164185_comment'></div>君父正臣，始终道义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164185_comment'></div>君兄节士，瑰特其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164185_comment'></div>君之渐摩，固无不备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164185_comment'></div>惟文之高，乃不中第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164185_comment'></div>惟才之敏，见于为吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164185_comment'></div>其势奔腾，譬若良骥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164185_comment'></div>千里之遥，旦暮可至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164185_comment'></div>奈何半途，遽尔颠踬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164185_comment'></div>惟余之室，君则其弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164185_comment'></div>余契之笃，实均同气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164185_comment'></div>君如京师，必馆而憩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164185_comment'></div>欢然相接，唯恐分袂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164185_comment'></div>今夏之首，君来审官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164185_comment'></div>待次得告，再归辟田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164185_comment'></div>初闻小疾，勿药当痊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164185_comment'></div>遂不裁问，日期驾旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164185_comment'></div>使忽至止，君兄惠笺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164185_comment'></div>具述君病，且忧缠绵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164185_comment'></div>余惊呼医，俾驰诣前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164185_comment'></div>医驰未达，讣来何遄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164185_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164185_comment'></div>君之德美，稔于众传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164185_comment'></div>复被馀庆，宜炽而延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164185_comment'></div>何未强壮，倏兹溘然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164185_comment'></div>命也孰诉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164185_comment'></div>噫嘻苍天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164185_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164185_comment'></div>君姊之亡，伤摧二年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164185_comment'></div>又感君戚，心如灼燃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164185_comment'></div>徒凭薄酹，致此拳拳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164185_comment'></div>哀诚千百，未能一宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164185_comment'></div>君其知乎，歆余意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164185_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1164185_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a
