target='_blank'>奏选义勇军</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平元年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163913")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163913_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163913'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163913'>臣伏以三代汉唐以来，皆籍民为兵，故其数虽多，而赡养至薄，所以维制万宇，而威服四夷，又非近所蓄冗兵可及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163913_comment'></div>唐置府兵，最为近古；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163913_comment'></div>天宝以后，废不能复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163913_comment'></div>因循至于五代，广募长征之兵，故困天下而不能给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163913_comment'></div>今之义勇，河北几十五万，河东几八万，勇悍纯实，生于天性，而有物力资产、父母妻子之所系，若稍加简练，亦唐之府兵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163913_comment'></div>陕西当西事之初，亦尝三丁选一丁为弓手，其后刺为保捷正军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163913_comment'></div>及夏国纳款，朝廷拣放，于今所存者无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163913_comment'></div>河北、河东、陕西三路，当西北控御之地，事同一体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163913_comment'></div>今若于陕西诸州亦点集义勇，止刺手背，则人知不复刺面，可无惊骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163913_comment'></div>或令永兴、河中、凤翔三府先刺，观听既安，然后次及诸郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163913_comment'></div>一时不无少扰，而终成长利。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163913_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《甲辰冬雨》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十。）</span><div id='poem_496224' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496224' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496224?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲辰冬雨</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496224")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_496224_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496224'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496224'>凛气回轻燠，凉飙绝怒号。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496224'>飞霙难自拆，细雨反如缫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496224'>惠泽非常降，祥编想共褒。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496224'>民阎清岁疠，农亩得春膏。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496224'>天意虽滂洽，人心尚郁陶。<div id='poem_sentence_4_496224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_496224'>未逢银瓮出，不见玉楼高。<div id='poem_sentence_5_496224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_496224'>酒兴来差浅，诗情病少豪。<div id='poem_sentence_6_496224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_496224'>曾看纷似絮，举白待风骚。<div id='poem_sentence_7_496224_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_496224'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_496224_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《留崔公孺国博》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十。）</span><div id='poem_496225' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496225' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496225?labeling=true' target='_blank'>留崔公孺国博</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496225")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496225_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496225'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496225'>虚亭还喜叩禅诠，顿觉襟怀鄙吝捐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496225_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496225'>陶暑屡开河朔饮，聚星看别颍川贤。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496225_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496225'>我縻东府成衰叟，君向西湖即洞天。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496225_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496225'>且缓归期时一笑，及瓜趋阙动三年。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496225_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496225'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496225_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《甲辰冬乞罢相第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163734' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163734' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163734?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲辰冬乞罢相第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163734")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163734_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163734'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163734'>臣某言：伏以四时助天，尚有为而必去；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163734_comment'></div>大臣佐国，岂不能而可居？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163734_comment'></div>兹省分以退身，幸推仁而从欲<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163734_comment'></div>伏念臣早繇科选，寖被宠甄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163734_comment'></div>不知直道之难行，徒以孤忠而自进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163734_comment'></div>仁宗皇帝矜其少戆，待以老成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163734_comment'></div>庆历之初，已赞近枢之重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163734_comment'></div>嘉祐之始，复还几务之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163734_comment'></div>亟践宰司，过膺冢任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163734_comment'></div>惟心祈报，谓时敝之可更；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163734_comment'></div>其术之疏，质人情而欲戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163734_comment'></div>方求引罢，免玷弼谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163734_comment'></div>忽悲轩驭之登天，获奉舜躬而受历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163734_comment'></div>永昭置使，既毕九虞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163734_comment'></div>长乐复权，肇新独断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163734_comment'></div>欲贡避贤之请，俄推进秩之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163734_comment'></div>面谢之辰，言陈备极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163734_comment'></div>愧冒尘之为久，加尪瘵之日增，止俟首冬，恳辞重柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163734_comment'></div>此愚诚之上叩，盖睿听之前知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163734_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下图治有初，任良为急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163734_comment'></div>引天下之才以自辅，采廷中之议而必公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163734_comment'></div>不私一臣，遂收全美，听还印绶，出守圭符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163734_comment'></div>蕞尔之躯，傥少休而未殒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163734_comment'></div>确然之守，固临事而不移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163734_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1163734_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《甲辰冬乞罢相第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163735' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163735' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163735?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲辰冬乞罢相第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163735")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163735_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163735'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163735'>臣某言：近上表乞罢相任，出辅外藩，蒙降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163735_comment'></div>辄倾愚悃，冀解冢司，承诏未俞，措躬无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163735_comment'></div>敢再披于肝膈，固莫逭于窜诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163735_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>臣闻驽马之材，驾虽十而终勉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163735_comment'></div>鼯鼠之技，能有五而遂穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163735_comment'></div>分不可踰，过之必败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163735_comment'></div>如臣者，素无远策，粗识大忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163735_comment'></div>特膺先帝之知，骤忝弼臣之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163735_comment'></div>岁芳屡易，人望日轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163735_comment'></div>廊庙之言，卒愧负薪之鄙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163735_comment'></div>功名之减，无偕治郡之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163735_comment'></div>适贡囊封，愿还柄任，遽号弓而茹痛，方奉瑁以参仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163735_comment'></div>前恳莫伸，厚颜无已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163735_comment'></div>此者恭遇皇帝陛下睿谋天发，圣断日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163735_comment'></div>宜登进于真贤，以辅成于至治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163735_comment'></div>岂容衰朽，尚尔冒尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163735_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下曲霈鸿私，与全晚节，许罢台衡之重，俾纡郡绂之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163735_comment'></div>欲竭之神，茍渐苏而复观；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163735_comment'></div>甚难之务，唯所用以无辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163735_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1163735_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《甲辰冬乞罢相第三表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163736' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163736' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163736?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲辰冬乞罢相第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163736")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163736_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163736'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163736'>臣某言：近再上表，乞罢相任，出补外藩，蒙降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163736_comment'></div>两上奏封，愿还宰柄，仰俞音而尚閟，顾衰迹以何安？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163736_comment'></div>重此披诚，终期赐可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163736_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以高位之处，古人戒乎疾颠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163736_comment'></div>大名之居，君子耻于难副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163736_comment'></div>故知而退，则全止足之分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163736_comment'></div>昧而进，则蹈危亡之机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163736_comment'></div>臣虽甚愚，敢忽斯义！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163736_comment'></div>伏念臣自尘侍从，即走疆垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163736_comment'></div>当兵戈未艾之辰，有夙夜服劳之苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163736_comment'></div>逮参枢辅，亟领藩条，继守两边，又几十稔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163736_comment'></div>比践更于二府，倏九见于周期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163736_comment'></div>以寸心而虑万微，以一身而当众责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163736_comment'></div>力虽自任，疾已交攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163736_comment'></div>傥不止于夜行，必溘先于朝露，讥咍中外，玷辱国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163736_comment'></div>矧今论道岩廊，悉皋、夔之旧德；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163736_comment'></div>宣威巨屏，皆方、召之杰臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163736_comment'></div>至于贵近之联，率富经营之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163736_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下照孤诚之不妄，矜悴质之无堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163736_comment'></div>收揽众贤，左右新政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163736_comment'></div>使臣退安便郡，获保残躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163736_comment'></div>上以彰大君含育之恩，下以息多士纷纭之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163736_comment'></div>惟坚素守，上答至仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163736_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1163736_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1064&endYear=1064')">1064年</a>　在开封。是年冬，韩琦连上五表，乞罢相，不允。作品：《甲辰冬乞罢相札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十四。）</span>《甲辰冬乞罢相第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十四。）</span>《甲辰冬乞罢相第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十四。）</span>《甲辰冬乞罢相第四札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十四。）</span>《甲辰冬乞罢相第五札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163810' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163810' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163810?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲辰冬乞罢相第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163810")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163810_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163810'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163810'>臣近以三上表乞罢相任，出补外藩，继蒙批答，未赐俞允，令断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163810_comment'></div>伏念臣自叨上相，及此累年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163810_comment'></div>任重才微，心力殚耗，日惧颠覆，不能副中外之望，贻圣哲之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163810_comment'></div>况臣周旋省循，颇甚详熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163810_comment'></div>虽知明时可恋，厚眷难逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163810_comment'></div>盖以识虑已竭，不可得而加；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163810_comment'></div>筋骸已疲，不可得而强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163810_comment'></div>方今睿明躬政，贤俊满朝，于臣当去之分，足免馀责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163810_comment'></div>是以愿从外补，庶获安全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163810_comment'></div>重念人臣之事君，其进退用舍，惟上之所令，此分义之常，不容以私而自便也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163810_comment'></div>及遭时遇主，照其至诚，爱之如父母，容之如天地，乃可以行其志而有请于上，当用而用，当止而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163810_comment'></div>今陛下爱臣容臣之德，虽天地父母，无以过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163810_comment'></div>是敢昧死陈乞，伏望圣慈深察，哀而许之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163810_comment'></div>臣以方在病告，不获一对清光，面陈悃愊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163810_comment'></div>及有旨断章，更不敢上表。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1163810_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1163811' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163811' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163811?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲辰冬乞罢相第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163811")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163811_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163811'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163811'>臣累上章求退，日俟俞旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163811_comment'></div>今月十八日，蒙降中使宣谕，令赴中书供职者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163811_comment'></div>臣窃揆圣意，必以臣历事先朝，辅翼陛下，怜其旧物，未欲遽捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163811_comment'></div>此虽陛下眷待至深，而于臣之分，诚未为得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163811_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163811_comment'></div>宰相之任，佐陛下统理天下，系一代治乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163811_comment'></div>处非其人，则取轻四夷，贻笑千古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163811_comment'></div>宠禄之过，只为灾殃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163811_comment'></div>凡爱臣之道，莫若安之全之，使不至于败覆而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163811_comment'></div>今陛下任臣于辅相之首，而岁月久甚，弗与之去，岂安全之道哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163811_comment'></div>此所谓爱之适所以害之者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163811_comment'></div>兼臣体婴宿疹，身当重责，忧思之过，有加无瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163811_comment'></div>伏遇陛下躬亲听断以来，凡所处置皆非臣下愚虑所及，天下闻风，日钦明圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163811_comment'></div>此乃宗庙垂庆，朝廷无事之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163811_comment'></div>臣固愿暂解剧烦，少休于外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163811_comment'></div>譬之驽马，平居代劳，犹能勉强，不幸力惫而生疾，则当释去衔勒，须其可用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163811_comment'></div>若尚以鞭箠临之，责其远到，则立见乎不克胜而毙矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163811_comment'></div>陛下驭臣之道，必不忍其如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163811_comment'></div>今陛下若矜臣劳旧，赐以安全，暂使臣出守乡邦，得遂休养，俾驽马之贱，年岁之间，气完而力复，陛下再有驱策，庶几奋然自效，稍备十驾之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163811_comment'></div>若坐观其负重力殚，不胜任而死，此众人所嗟，陛下岂无意而怜之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163811_comment'></div>伏望圣慈哀察，早如所请。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1163811'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1163811_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1163812' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163812' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163812?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲辰冬乞罢相第四劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163812")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163812_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163812'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163812'>臣已三上表章，三具劄子，陈乞免罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163812_comment'></div>臣诚虽罄，天听未回，须至重沥血恳，上干圣听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163812_comment'></div>臣窃谓陛下留臣之意有二，而愚臣自谓当去之道有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163812_comment'></div>臣所谓陛下留臣而弗许者，不过以臣龊龊自谨，颇历事任，谓尚可以驱策之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163812_comment'></div>或则以臣先朝所用，譬之旧物，不忍使令罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163812_comment'></div>此乃陛下爱臣之私也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163812_comment'></div>臣所以自谓当去者，盖本朝以来，祖宗所任上相，山陵事毕，即多从罢退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163812_comment'></div>考诸国史，固有典常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163812_comment'></div>向者永昭讫役，臣以陛下尚犹服药，未敢援例求去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163812_comment'></div>此者圣躬康复，亲总万务，此臣之一宜去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163812_comment'></div>况自陛下独断以来，裁决庶政，动中规矩，天下翕然欣戴，中外和肃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163812_comment'></div>虽西边近有小警，乃狂童跳梁于疆界之外，未足为患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163812_comment'></div>则臣非避多事而求免，此臣之二宜去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163812_comment'></div>凡执事之臣，所以输忠孝、罄才力以补朝廷之阙，虽臣道之所宜，然亦谓陛下持任人之法于上，蕴知人之明于中，冀卜殊知，以伸所用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163812_comment'></div>而臣智虑已竭，久当要任，蔽塞后来升进之路，罪不容戮，此臣之三宜去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163812_comment'></div>臣以忧劳所积，久成疾疹，疲薾之干，寖难支持，委之事机，必误国计，此臣之四宜去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163812_comment'></div>陛下以天地之量，知臣阙失，眷待愚臣，有异于众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163812_comment'></div>当此重柄，日觉不任，一贻人言，都丧前效，此臣之五宜去也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163812_comment'></div>臣之所陈，较然易见，冢弼之任，不敢复当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163812_comment'></div>伏望圣慈早赐许臣外补，授一乡郡，稍令休息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163812_comment'></div>异时气体复完，有边鄙重难任使，臣愿尽驽力，又安敢辞。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1163812_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1163813' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163813' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163813?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲辰冬乞罢相第五劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1064年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163813")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163813_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163813'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163813'>臣近三上表及累具劄子，乞罢相任，出守外藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163813_comment'></div>伏蒙圣慈前赐批答，令断来章；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163813_comment'></div>今又叠降诏旨，不允所奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163813_comment'></div>天眷隆厚，固非愚陋之所克堪，欲报大恩，未知死所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163813_comment'></div>然臣前后所述当去之理，已是罄竭诚恳，若一一又复披叙，恐烦圣听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163813_comment'></div>臣今再陈大略者，直以备位二府，通及九年；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163813_comment'></div>自叨首宰之任，又踰三岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163813_comment'></div>去年春初，已曾上章，乞退便私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163813_comment'></div>值先帝服药，奄至上仙，陛下嗣承大统，未敢再入文字，迁延至此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163813_comment'></div>况前来吕端、冯拯，乃真宗、仁宗即位之初首相也，踰年之后，以疾求罢，皆得如请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163813_comment'></div>盖是恩恤旧臣，以均劳逸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163813_comment'></div>次则躬政之始，务进贤杰，以示至公之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163813_comment'></div>臣之所乞，已是过时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163813_comment'></div>况陛下圣断日新，中外安帖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163813_comment'></div>臣既才识疏谬，而又体婴宿疾，若恬然在位，不思引去，乃是不知进退之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163813_comment'></div>日对清光，岂不羞愧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163813_comment'></div>外见百辟，何施面颜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163813_comment'></div>故恳恳上封，圣意终未开允；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163813_comment'></div>夙夜震惕，一身若无所容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163813_comment'></div>伏望天地之造，早赐矜许，以安愚者之分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1163813_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年1月</a>　正月，韩琦除守司空兼侍中。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年5月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。五月，韩琦有《乞议御戎之策奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1163945' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163945' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163945?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞议御戎之策奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平二年五月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163945")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163945_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163945'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163945'>庆历中，仁宗皇帝尝召臣与范仲淹对延和殿，谕以西鄙未宁，令臣等同上策画，乃退而上御戎之策有四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163945_comment'></div>既上此策，而元昊纳和，不克施用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163945_comment'></div>今谅祚狂童，固非元昊之匹，敢尔轻动，势将渝盟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163945_comment'></div>愿付臣当日之议，俾二府议为成算，付以五路之帅，小羌不足胜也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163945_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年5月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。五月，韩琦有《乞以何亮刘平议西事二策付冯京参议奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1163946' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163946' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163946?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞以何亮刘平议西事二策付冯京参议奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平二年五月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163946")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163946_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163946'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163946'>臣向收得本朝何亮、刘平议西事二策，亮言灵武不可弃，弃则西人必吞诸戎，为后大患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163946_comment'></div>当时不能用，而今悉验焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163946_comment'></div>平之所陈，虽与臣近录庆历中同仲淹所上之策稍有不同，然大概以得西人山界地土部族为甚利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163946_comment'></div>愿付京持往参议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163946_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年6月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。六月，韩琦有《乞举乐奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1163996' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163996' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163996?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞举乐奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平二年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163996")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163996_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163996'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163996'>礼立制以缘情，以终祥禫之变；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163996_comment'></div>乐象功而饬喜，宜飏金石之声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163996_comment'></div>敢援经典之常，兼述祖宗之宪，冒闻渊听，罄述群心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163996_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下睿哲在躬，钦明稽古，抚五辰而居正，凝百度而执中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163996_comment'></div>爰自轩鼎成仙，尧墙兴慕，屡改槐檀之候，荐惊霜露之濡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163996_comment'></div>至性天成，内充穷而衔恤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163996_comment'></div>小心日慎，外信默以宅忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163996_comment'></div>奄尽达丧之期，尚稽当食之举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163996_comment'></div>且复常贵乎弗过，既除遏密之哀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163996_comment'></div>将废戒于不为，庶集翕纯之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163996_comment'></div>伏望曲循往训，俯抑圣情，列《韶》奏以在庭，命夔工而率职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163996_comment'></div>将使郊丘庙祏之祭，亲奉于神欢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163996_comment'></div>会朝飨宴之容，参举于宾礼。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1163996_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年6月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。六月，韩琦有《乞下两制礼官详定合称何亲奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1163997' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163997' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163997?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞下两制礼官详定合称何亲奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平二年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163997")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163997_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163997'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163997'>臣等伏准内降翰林学士王圭等奏，崇奉濮安懿王典礼，一准先朝封赠期亲尊属故事，高官大国，极其尊荣，谯国太夫人、襄国太夫人、仙游县君亦改封大国太夫人，考之古今，实为宜称者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163997_comment'></div>伏详王圭等所奏，未见详定濮安懿王当称何亲，名与不名，欲乞下王圭等详定闻奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163997_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年6月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。六月，韩琦有《请集三省御史台官再议奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1163998' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163998' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163998?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请集三省御史台官再议奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平二年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163998")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163998_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163998'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163998'>臣等伏准内降翰林学士王圭等状，称「臣等参详国朝崇奉尊属故事，今濮安懿王于仁宗皇帝，其属为兄，于皇帝合称皇伯而不名」者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163998_comment'></div>臣等谨按《仪礼》「为人后者为其父母报」，及按今文与《五服年月敕》，并云为人后者为其所后父斩衰三年，为人后者为其父母齐衰期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163998_comment'></div>即出继之子，于所继、所生皆称父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163998_comment'></div>又汉宣帝、光武皆称其父为皇考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163998_comment'></div>今来王圭等议称皇伯，于典礼未见明有引据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163998_comment'></div>状请下尚书省，集三省、御史台官定议闻奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1163998_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳夏乞罢相第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163737' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163737' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163737?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳夏乞罢相第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163737")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163737_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163737'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163737'>臣某言：伏以王者之尊，作命存乎必信；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163737_comment'></div>人臣之分，知退本于不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163737_comment'></div>兹再避于冢司，幸前膺于圣谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163737_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣驽马之贱，任重而斯蹙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163737_comment'></div>画饼之伪，循名而则虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163737_comment'></div>徒以误知先朝，窃位二府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163737_comment'></div>自冠臣邻之重，益惭风烈之衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163737_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下躬绍宝图，独开英断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163737_comment'></div>以圣主而用愚相，曷起治功；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163737_comment'></div>不累日以进大材，固妨贤路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163737_comment'></div>矧复繁机外扰，故疾中戕，精神日极于昏疲，形貌众伤于癯瘠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163737_comment'></div>比倾血恳，上叩睿慈，冀从出守之求，少遂养疴之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163737_comment'></div>皇帝陛下以为情虽可恻，去匪其时，俟仁庙之终祥，许囊封之请罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163737_comment'></div>德音在耳，律候当期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163737_comment'></div>愿回天地之私，亟假麾符之宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163737_comment'></div>君言勿戏，剪桐之锡犹封；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163737_comment'></div>乡郡获归，衣锦之荣孰再。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163737_comment'></div>誓捐躯命，仰答恩仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163737_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163737_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳夏乞罢相第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163738' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163738' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163738?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳夏乞罢相第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163738")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163738_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163738'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163738'>臣某言：近上表乞罢相任，出守外藩，蒙降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163738_comment'></div>比披丹赤，仰叩睿明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163738_comment'></div>君命有孚，固指期而当罢；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163738_comment'></div>天衷莫测，犹可诏之未颁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163738_comment'></div>抚己以思，措躬无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163738_comment'></div>窃以嘉善而矜不能者，君人之全度；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163738_comment'></div>进贤而退不肖者，兴治之大方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163738_comment'></div>故不能与不肖者留，则下无所劝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163738_comment'></div>善者与贤者之抑，则政将甚疵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163738_comment'></div>臣虽至庸，敢害公议！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163738_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣早繇孤进，亟陟近司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163738_comment'></div>报国之心，虽竭忠而自许；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163738_comment'></div>致君之效，卒充位以无闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163738_comment'></div>包羞十稔之间，积愧众贤之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163738_comment'></div>向者幸遇皇帝陛下躬亲听断，中外乂安，尝比上于封章，愿少休于罢薾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163738_comment'></div>俄膺召对，窃记德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163738_comment'></div>兹再露于恳诚，盖前祗于训谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163738_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下不牵私爱，特示至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163738_comment'></div>知臣不能而可矜，谓臣不肖之宜退，许还相绂，俾任乡邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163738_comment'></div>马牛之力粗完，必思驱策；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163738_comment'></div>天地之恩再造，曷报生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163738_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1163738_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳夏乞罢相第三表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163739' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163739' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163739?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳夏乞罢相第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163739")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163739_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163739'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163739'>臣某言：近再上表，乞罢相任，出守外藩，蒙降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163739_comment'></div>非才决去，为渎诚烦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163739_comment'></div>优诏弗俞，示恩良厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163739_comment'></div>虽已殚穷于贱恳，不能感动于清衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163739_comment'></div>得非断以常情，谓非本志，匪过邀于圣宠，则外迫于人言，勉辞要权，苟备礼数，逮降断章之答，因为固禄之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163739_comment'></div>臣之所陈，盖不近此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163739_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣自玷二府，于今十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163739_comment'></div>窃稽累朝之任官，虽有名相之在位，得如兹例，且无数人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163739_comment'></div>况臣龊龊何能，区区自守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163739_comment'></div>庙堂之上，不过俗吏之施为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163739_comment'></div>搢绅之间，动有迂儒之闵笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163739_comment'></div>加以早膺驱策，备历艰劬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163739_comment'></div>积忧日耗于精神，奇疾潜生于脏腑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163739_comment'></div>比虽自力，寖觉难支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163739_comment'></div>故于前后之封章，备著悃诚之激切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163739_comment'></div>方斯此愬，必复上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163739_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下深惟万务之繁，特谨四邻之选，不曲全于旧物，示公进于真贤，令臣只守本官，退安散郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163739_comment'></div>名优治俗，庶希黄霸之清风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163739_comment'></div>心切报君，敢慕赤松之高蹈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163739_comment'></div>傥暂休于犬马，期再效于涓尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163739_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1163739_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳乞罢相札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《灾异待罪第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163740' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163740' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163740?labeling=true' target='_blank'>灾异待罪第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163740")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163740_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163740'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163740'>臣某言：伏以人主之操赏罚，贵乎不私；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163740_comment'></div>宰相之调阴阳，在乎无忒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163740_comment'></div>苟天时之作沴，系人事之不修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163740_comment'></div>当责其谁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163740_comment'></div>是惟冢辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163740_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣顷遭际会，遂冠臣邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163740_comment'></div>当尧舜之纂承，乏皋夔之事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163740_comment'></div>故圣心愿治，日极于咨询；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163740_comment'></div>而朴学素空，卒无于补助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163740_comment'></div>居常省分，屡已抗章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163740_comment'></div>虽引去之未容，益自知其难处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163740_comment'></div>今此仲秋之始，忽兴淫雨之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163740_comment'></div>京邑之间，日才信宿，室居之坏，十殆四三，民胥嗷然，骇无所止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163740_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下绍膺宝命，勤究永图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163740_comment'></div>言动之微，亦无过举；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163740_comment'></div>政刑之谨，必宪先猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163740_comment'></div>惟高穹之甚明，宜嘉应之遄格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163740_comment'></div>兹咎安在？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163740_comment'></div>其来有繇：盖臣充位无闻，素餐已久，众贤沈抑而不能汇进，舆情郁塞而不能上通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163740_comment'></div>既汩五行，遂隳庶务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163740_comment'></div>岂可以顽然自若，恬不知惭！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163740_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下稽合天心，申明国典，验往诰雨旸之所自，法前朝灾异之所行，敷告大廷，亟行显黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163740_comment'></div>四海之内，皆知震曜之威；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163740_comment'></div>则诸福之来，是犹桴鼓之答。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163740_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1163740_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《灾异待罪第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163741' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163741' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163741?labeling=true' target='_blank'>灾异待罪第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163741")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163741_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163741'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163741'>臣某言：近以天雨之淫，都城特甚，乞从免黜，以塞咎灾，蒙降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163741_comment'></div>窃以三公之理阴阳，冢宰之主政治，盖今首相之任，诚系四方之瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163741_comment'></div>官匪其人，变不易发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163741_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣素无他技，徒偶亨期，因缘犬马之劳，忝冒鼎槐之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163741_comment'></div>推贤避路，既未遂于愚衷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163741_comment'></div>窃位素餐，固不容于天理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163741_comment'></div>而自皇帝陛下绍承统绪，振葺纪纲，思兼三王，待旦之勤已至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163741_comment'></div>恭用五事，承天之德无差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163741_comment'></div>何兹暴霪之来，颇戾至和之应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163741_comment'></div>遇灾以惧，烦引咎之过深；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163741_comment'></div>责相之愚，幸置刑而有旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163741_comment'></div>愿正调燮之失，特申窜谪之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163741_comment'></div>如此，则风雨时而三阶平，自消民沴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163741_comment'></div>股肱良而元首起，坐见治功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163741_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1163741_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《灾异待罪第三表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163742' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163742' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163742?labeling=true' target='_blank'>灾异待罪第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163742")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163742_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163742'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163742'>臣某言：近以淫雨之灾，乞从罢免，伏蒙圣慈再降批答不允，仍断来章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163742_comment'></div>宰职不修，当明于国宪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163742_comment'></div>君恩过厚，尚损于诏音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163742_comment'></div>虽圣度之如天，欲自容而无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163742_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>臣闻古者至治之世，风雨节，阴阳和，百谷岁登，万物时遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163742_comment'></div>盖有德者进，而无德者退，有功者上，而无功者下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163742_comment'></div>人事既得，天心自符，应之善祥，是若影响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163742_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下协大横之兆，承累盛之基，即位以来，励精为治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163742_comment'></div>临朝亲决，有唐尧之聪明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163742_comment'></div>约己自修，侔夏禹之勤俭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163742_comment'></div>然犹吏多弛职，俗靡还淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163742_comment'></div>得非黜典之公不先贵近，故俾政纲之紊未振隳颓？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163742_comment'></div>今大异之所来，匪冢司而孰咎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163742_comment'></div>宜因此变，遂正彝章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163742_comment'></div>纵宽斧钺之诛，必用窜投之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163742_comment'></div>则人心自化，坐移偷薄之风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163742_comment'></div>天监弗违，日见太平之象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163742_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1163742_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年9月9日</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳重九》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十。）</span><div id='poem_496226' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496226' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496226?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳重九</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年9月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496226")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496226_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496226'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496226'>苦厌繁机少适怀，欣逢重九启宾罍。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496226'>招贤敢并翘材馆，乐事难追戏马台。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496226'>藓布乱钱乘雨出，雁排新阵拂云来。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496226'>何年得遇樽前菊，此日花随月令开。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496226_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496226'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496226_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年11月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳郊礼庆成五言二十韵》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十。）</span><div id='poem_496227' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496227' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496227?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳郊礼庆成五言二十韵</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496227")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_496227_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496227'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496227'>尧历方归圣，虞琴始就声。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496227'>不先惟帝飨，孰见事天明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496227'>谷旦诹阳复，鸿仪备吉行。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496227'>宸襟正祗谨，阴孽忽孳萌。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496227'>淫雨频兴阵，寒花几坠琼。<div id='poem_sentence_4_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_496227'>多言摇改卜，上意益专精。<div id='poem_sentence_5_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_496227'>宗社敷冥祐，穹苍答至诚。<div id='poem_sentence_6_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_496227'>斗收连日晦，并与祀时晴。<div id='poem_sentence_7_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_496227'>待晓披阊阖，凝旒下紫清。<div id='poem_sentence_8_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_496227'>真廷陈洁馔，亲庙展嘉牲。<div id='poem_sentence_9_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_496227'>爱旭辉黄道，非烟护䌽城。<div id='poem_sentence_10_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_496227'>旌旗停藻卫，铙吹起严更。<div id='poem_sentence_11_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_496227'>冕服祛繁饰，坛壝即自成。<div id='poem_sentence_12_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_496227'>晶荧奠琮璧，和雅荐英茎。<div id='poem_sentence_13_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_496227'>继志还虚次，尊神戒侧迎<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_14_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_496227'>千龄俄受胙，万乘已旋衡。<div id='poem_sentence_15_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_496227'>峣阙层霄迥，通衢众目倾。<div id='poem_sentence_16_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_496227'>疏刑空犴狱，霈泽浃寰瀛。<div id='poem_sentence_17_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_496227'>统业恢长治，生灵入太平。<div id='poem_sentence_18_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_496227'>因知却徽号，传迹固难名。<div id='poem_sentence_19_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_496227'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_496227_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_496227'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_496227_0'>⑴ 自注：时传旨公卿等传奉祠事，毋得转班迎驾。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_496227_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《次韵和崔公孺国博西亭感怀》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十。）</span><div id='poem_496228' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496228' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496228?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵和崔公孺国博西亭感怀</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496228")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496228_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496228'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496228'>常虚西馆待高贤，一见襟怀两释然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496228'>且叩真诠期进道，不论衰鬓逐凋年。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496228'>顽金在矿须当变，逸骥无鞭亦自前。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496228'>相叩屡辞虽未得，已齐朝市与林泉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496228_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496228'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496228_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳冬乞罢相第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163743' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163743' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163743?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳冬乞罢相第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163743")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163743_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163743'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163743'>臣某言：伏以佐天子、理阴阳，外镇抚四夷，内亲附百姓，使卿大夫各得任其职者，宰相之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163743_comment'></div>位高责重，为时具瞻，岂容非才，得久其地？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163743_comment'></div>今兹决去，必觊俞恩，虽获重诛，义不能已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163743_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣断断之技，无殊众人，际会先朝，遂尘冢席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163743_comment'></div>虽夙夜自竭，期有以报不次之遇，而智局浅陋，卒无云补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163743_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下绍隆圣绪，力思致平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163743_comment'></div>臣复不能恢宣远图，上助新政，徒尸厚禄，日积愧惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163743_comment'></div>故自去岁以来，凡三剖血诚，请还柄任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163743_comment'></div>章十数上，未蒙赐可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163743_comment'></div>包羞就职，愈不遑安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163743_comment'></div>盖以淫雨之灾，仍岁而发，伤害禾稼，漂摧室庐，都城之内，垫溺殊甚，连阴累月，蔽遏大明，涂巷之人，指谈时政，此可谓能理阴阳乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163743_comment'></div>西戎骄僭，为乱萌檗，时率丑类，肆扰属羌，增备益师，上烦宵旰，此可谓能镇抚四夷乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163743_comment'></div>环畿之郡，民罹岁荒，饿殍流庸，失职者众，赖天造垂恻，赈给必周，而重困之馀，遽难完复，此可谓能亲附百姓乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163743_comment'></div>滞固之识，闇于任人，不能广择群材，共熙庶务，使贤者在下，郁而未伸，此可谓卿大夫各得任其职乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163743_comment'></div>有一于此，被黜为宜，而臣众事不修，咎将孰执？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163743_comment'></div>安得不自劾无状，而恬然不退哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163743_comment'></div>今幸郊礼休成，边垂事简，臣不胜恳迫，愿罢首宰之职，避贤者路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163743_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下不牵私爱，断以大公，俾臣外补小邦，得安愚分，汇进良辅，以兴治功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163743_comment'></div>自然阴阳日和，众沴不作，四夷款服，百姓乂安，内外小大之职，皆惕然相饬，竞著成效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163743_comment'></div>此则宗社无疆之庆，苍生莫大之福，非特愚臣之幸也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163743_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1163743_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳冬乞罢相第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163744' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163744' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163744?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳冬乞罢相第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163744")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163744_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163744'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163744'>臣某言：近上表乞罢首宰之职，避贤者路，伏蒙圣慈特降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163744_comment'></div>臣闻以道事君，不能者止，大臣之操也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163744_comment'></div>无德者退，有功者上，治世之法也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163744_comment'></div>若不能而不止，无德而不退，则是不知大臣事君之道，而挠乎治世之法也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163744_comment'></div>故敢不避斧钺，再渎宸听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163744_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏惟皇帝陛下承四圣之绪，兴百年之业，宵衣旰食，垂意万务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163744_comment'></div>而臣任玷冢弼，岁月久甚，以龊龊之守，浅浅之见，固无以光大新政，而弹压天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163744_comment'></div>乃阴阳失序，戎羯弗驯，百姓未康，众职不举，四面之责，毕丛于臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163744_comment'></div>兹所以当食辍餐，通夕不寐，覆载之内，若无所容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163744_comment'></div>傥陛下未赐罪诛，使之善去，畀以小郡，与全始终，此则天地含育之鸿造，父母顾复之大恩，百殒臣身，未能报塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163744_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163744_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳冬乞罢相第三表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十八。）</span><div id='poem_1163745' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163745' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163745?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳冬乞罢相第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163745")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163745_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163745'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163745'>臣某言：此者荐倾血恳，祈罢冢司，伏蒙圣慈特降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163745_comment'></div>承命震骇，不知所处，重渎天听，继之死请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163745_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>臣闻之《易》曰：「鼎折足，覆<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1163745", 1163745, "Clauses/10/Comments/0")'>公餗</span>，其形渥，凶」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163745_comment'></div>孔子以谓德薄而位尊，智小而谋大，力少而任重，鲜不及矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163745_comment'></div>臣性椎而拙，以道独进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163745_comment'></div>先帝察其忠朴，亟被显任，两尘枢府，遂冠丞弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163745_comment'></div>在臣图报之志，虽捐躯命，而无所惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163745_comment'></div>然而德不足以服众，智不足以虑远，力不足以胜任，徒淹岁月，莫建治功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163745_comment'></div>若非省分退身，避贤者路，不独折足覆餗，自贻形渥之凶，其于国家，为害岂细也哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163745_comment'></div>故自皇帝陛下临御以来，累上奏封，愿还相印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163745_comment'></div>始陛下以未终谅闇，去匪其时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163745_comment'></div>次陛下以边事方兴，未当求罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163745_comment'></div>臣虽上体圣意，勉陪国论，其如外涉要宠不诚之迹，内怀空餐旷责之惭，出入朝廷，自无颜面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163745_comment'></div>况臣待罪首宰，调燮无状，钜异数见，淫雨连月，民用失职，罔不愁叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163745_comment'></div>今疆候无警，禋礼庆成，乃陛下采拔群贤，一新庶政，以消天变之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163745_comment'></div>臣愚不胜愧慄，伏望特举两汉灾异之法而明黜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163745_comment'></div>若以其攀附龙凤，依光日月，尘污重任，将逾十年，夙夜忧劳，故疾增剧，畀以乡郡，稍从休息，此则天地之造，屈公议而全大恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163745_comment'></div>臣非木石其心，犹冀养气而粗完，保衰而少强，矍铄奋身，以当陛下急难之用，庶效毫发，以酬至仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163745_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163745_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳冬乞罢相札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_title_1163816' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163816?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳冬乞罢相第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163816")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163816_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163816'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163816'>臣近三上表，一具劄子，乞罢相任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163816_comment'></div>伏蒙圣慈特差中使宣召，臣今日入对，又已面罄诚恳，更不敢委曲陈叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163816_comment'></div>陛下既悉臣之贱言，何惜一赐可诏，使臣出补小邦，稍遂休息，以全陛下天地父母之大恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163816_comment'></div>臣见伏私第听命，必期得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163816_comment'></div>若未降俞旨，须至累累烦渎圣听，虽获窜殛，义无所逃。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163816_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳冬乞罢相第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163817' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163817' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163817?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳冬乞罢相第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163817")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163817_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163817'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163817'>臣伏以王者执大信以示下，则号令无敢不从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163817_comment'></div>人臣任至诚而事上，则进退必当其分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163817_comment'></div>臣待罪首宰，内省无状，故自去年冬初，累表求退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163817_comment'></div>始陛下未赐开允，次乃许臣过仁庙大祥，再上文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163817_comment'></div>及今夏复干圣听，陛下则以西事为虑，不容力辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163817_comment'></div>臣不得已，遂敢再叩许去之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163817_comment'></div>承陛下面谕，候过南郊相度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163817_comment'></div>今郊礼既成矣，边事既息矣，臣区区二府，将踰十年，可谓妨贤窃位之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163817_comment'></div>大水为沴，元元失业，臣职在调燮，可以顺天戒而行罚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163817_comment'></div>臣加有胸胁之病，乘衰增剧，万务之重，实难牵强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163817_comment'></div>故今者昧死拜章，决期引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163817_comment'></div>陛下忘前所谕旨，屡降诏示，尚无可奏之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163817_comment'></div>则是大信可以轻失，而凡所号令，下安适从哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163817_comment'></div>臣既陈可去之理，明白如此，陛下留之，遂不知耻愧，复还重任，则是不能以至诚感动圣念，自乖进退之分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163817_comment'></div>君臣之间，其失两不细也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163817_comment'></div>臣固愿圣念，不以臣贱言可忽，早俞所请，庶天下知陛下号令必信，而左右有实知止足之臣，则纪纲岂得不振，而风俗岂得不劝哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163817_comment'></div>臣无任恳激俟命之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1163817_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳冬乞罢相第四札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163818' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163818' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163818?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳冬乞罢相第四劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163818")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163818_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163818'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163818'>臣此者屡干圣听，求解柄任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163818_comment'></div>其所陈可去之理，意已殚竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163818_comment'></div>唯陛下深察诚恳，与保全爱惜臣之名节，且令出补乡郡，调养宿疴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163818_comment'></div>不然，则臣至此凡三乞罢去矣，若每次累上表劄，至于十数，陛下坚不从允，则遂怀惭忍耻，黾勉复位，不唯百辟四方视臣举措如此，大为嗤笑，下至三尺童子，必皆以为妄伪可鄙也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163818_comment'></div>则臣将何面目当魁柄而辅圣治哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163818_comment'></div>臣今宁以违忤圣情得罪，受一时之戮，诚不愿为百辟四方、下至三尺童子之所嗤笑鄙薄，以贻不泯之辱也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163818_comment'></div>伏望圣慈哀怜，早赐俞旨，则臣终身幸甚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1163818_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《乙巳冬乞罢相第五札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163819' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163819' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163819?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙巳冬乞罢相第五劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163819")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163819_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163819'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163819'>臣此者以窃位之久，自处不安，叠上封章，求去重任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163819_comment'></div>伏蒙陛下天地之度，不以累干圣听，便赐重戮，昨日又获面对，细具诚恳披陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163819_comment'></div>陛下重察愚言，渐有开可之意，许于内中再加审虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163819_comment'></div>此乃睿明矜照，使全进退之分，不胜幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163819_comment'></div>臣今乞只守本官，出知相州，既获修治先茔，又得保养宿疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163819_comment'></div>异日陛下别有驱策，臣不以内外之任，期于效死，以报大恩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1163819_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《故许州观察推官曾君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164158' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164158' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164158?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故许州观察推官曾君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1065年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164158")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164158_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164158'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164158'>余庆历末作帅中山时，曾君以布衣来请见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164158_comment'></div>与之语，皆根本道义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164158_comment'></div>观其文，则典赡而可喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164158_comment'></div>余固知其远到者，遂延之公馆，使与诸子侄游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164158_comment'></div>而为学益勤，为文益工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164158_comment'></div>皇祐四年秋，与余侄直彦俱赴举京师，春预崇政试，皆登乙科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164158_comment'></div>君补安肃军司理参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164158_comment'></div>归故里，奉二亲以之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164158_comment'></div>官满，用荐者得补永州祁阳令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164158_comment'></div>寻丁母陆氏忧，服除，再调桂州临桂令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164158_comment'></div>会余为仁庙山陵使，辟掌笺奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164158_comment'></div>永昭讫事，奏其劳，擢授许州观察推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164158_comment'></div>值岁大旱，民饥疫作，州缺守而无见粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164158_comment'></div>君亟白转运使，愿得一奏牍持之至阙下，诉于执政者，宜有以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164158_comment'></div>转运使如其请，君即驰至丞相府，上其奏，其言饥馁乏食之状，不急为之救，则死者不可胜计矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164158_comment'></div>朝廷始惊，乃运京仓与江淮所漕粟往赈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164158_comment'></div>君归，而饥者聚州下无虑数万人，君日复周视之，均其廪食，病者则躬致其医药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164158_comment'></div>虽民赖以再生，而君遂为疫所中，卒不能起，年四十四，治平四年三月二十五日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164158_comment'></div>君名炳，字文伯，建昌之南丰人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164158_comment'></div>父仲舒，有道不仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164158_comment'></div>子思古、思中、思远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164158_comment'></div>以某年某月某日，葬于某县某乡某村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164158_comment'></div>将葬，诸子泣来请曰：「先子，公之门生，而素被知者，得公一铭而内之圹中，存殁之光矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164158_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1164158'>有才而不得殚其蕴，有禄而不得终其养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164158_comment'></div>虽力仁而济物兮，反自罹其天丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164158_comment'></div>兹天道之难知，而世人之共悲者，则余也岂独以门人而大怆。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1164158_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1065&endYear=1065')">1065年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《荐崔公度奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1163999' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163999' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163999?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_1163999_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1066&endYear=1066')">1066年</a>　英宗欲任命苏轼为知制诰，韩琦认为苏轼资历尚浅，应该经过一定的历练，赢得好的为官名声，才可以承担重任。苏轼认为，韩琦这样做是“古人爱人以德”，是真正对自己的爱护与期许。<br /><a href="javascript:
