ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164114")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164114_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164114'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164114'>问：李唐以前，御天下者皆寓兵于民，有事然后调发之，已而复归于农，故耕战相须，国用不屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164114_comment'></div>国家因五代之制，总天下之兵以籍于官，坐仰度支之给，兹实外慑四夷，内安亿姓之长算也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164114_comment'></div>然而殚海内之赋，尽榷酤关征之利，而不充其费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164114_comment'></div>自西师之兴，伍符日增，县官之用益窘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164114_comment'></div>今以西北二虏之盛，备豫为急，销兵之策，固不可陈之于今矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164114_comment'></div>欲民不加赋，而养兵有馀，其术如何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164114_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1164114'>问：国家养天下之兵，以制四海，其所患者，财用不充而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164114_comment'></div>昔汉氏有口赋之科，算缗之法，过更之直，卖爵之令，皆兵之所资也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164114_comment'></div>子大夫宜条举旧式可施于今者，悉著于篇，其议行之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164114_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1164114'>问：孔子曰「吾观于乡，知王道之易易焉」者，明射乡之礼，尊贤尚齿，浃乎仁恩，王者教化之大本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164114_comment'></div>而兹礼之废，历祀云远，详其制度者，盖亦稀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164114_comment'></div>本朝守臣好古，或参酌旧典，以劝于境内，众反传而嗤笑，以为不近人情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164114_comment'></div>岂礼之异世，不可复兴邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164114_comment'></div>将风俗之薄，未明其本欤？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164114_comment'></div>子大夫其条举古制，复道自汉至唐能修而行之者有几，著于篇，庶摭其可施于今者，以助治焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164114_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1164114'>问：孔子没，能传其道者，孟、荀、扬、王、韩五贤而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164114_comment'></div>其著书立言，与六经相左右，执卷者皆知之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164114_comment'></div>昌黎氏以为「孟氏醇乎醇者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164114_comment'></div>荀与扬，大醇而小疵」，后之学者，从而是之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164114_comment'></div>至于王氏当隋季，作六经《中说》以拯将坠之教，其门人之高第者，皆为唐辅相，而不能尊大师说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164114_comment'></div>昌黎氏复无一言以称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164114_comment'></div>其于孔子之道，有所未至者邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164114_comment'></div>文公去圣最远，卓然奋起，与四贤者并驱而争先，排斥佛老，而躬践其言，后世无加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164114_comment'></div>五贤之事业，于孔子之道，固其先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164114_comment'></div>子大夫明乎先圣之术，愿次其优劣，著之于篇，毋让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164114_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_1164114'>问：《中庸》曰：「自诚而明谓之性，自明而诚谓之教」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164114_comment'></div>然则诚而明，圣人之性也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164114_comment'></div>明而诚，贤者学之所至也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164114_comment'></div>夫圣人之性，果学而能至，必由何路而后及焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164114_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_1164114'>问：尚书省郎官之职，历代以来，废置不一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164114_comment'></div>至唐室而后大备，故有二十四司之目，天下之事无不总焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164114_comment'></div>五代多故，其制遂隳，今唯盐铁、度支、户部、铨筦数职，其体尚存，它皆列为闲曹，殊无吏责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164114_comment'></div>国家欲悉复唐旧，议者或谓烦而寡要，因仍五代，又曰草创非古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164114_comment'></div>揆今之治，何者为宜？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164114_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_1164114'>问：亲蚕之礼，废之久矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164114_comment'></div>今欲举而行之，则患历代沿革之仪未能折中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164114_comment'></div>愿条其当今可行者，著之于篇，庶稽参而用焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1164114_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年1月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。正月，英宗皇帝病逝，韩琦有《中书进英宗皇帝挽词状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163802' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163802' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163802?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中书进英宗皇帝挽词状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163802")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163802_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163802'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163802'>右，臣等伏以大行皇帝方图至治，奄弃群臣，四海悲摧，殆绝生理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163802_comment'></div>而臣等备位二府，圣眷特殊，虽百殒其身，固不能报恩遇之万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163802_comment'></div>今诹辰云吉，迁坐有期，臣等啜泣悼心，各著成《挽词》三首，愿假执綍者，以发扬其攀号痛慕之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163802_comment'></div>臣等无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163802_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年1月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《英宗皇帝挽辞三首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十五。）</span>《英宗皇帝挽辞三首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十五。）</span>《英宗皇帝挽辞三首》（其三）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十五。）</span><div id='poem_496548' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496548' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496548?labeling=true' target='_blank'>英宗皇帝挽辞三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496548")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496548_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496548'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496548'>遽委飞乾运，应开出震符。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496548'>子方批凤尾，天已下龙胡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496548'>遏密思尧治，讴歌启舜图。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496548'>只留勤俭德，千古亘三无。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496548_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496548'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496548_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496549' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496549' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496549?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496549_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496549'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496549'>此日天无色，輴车下禁宸。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496549'>悲风随去仗，哀泪裛行尘。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496549'>一闭皇堂夜，长閒御寝春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496549'>守陵来有几，萧索庆宁人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496549_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496549'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496549_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496550' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496550' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496550?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1063年4月）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496550_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496550'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496550'>蜃驾虽停洛，飙舆已溯天。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496550'>空藏轩剑舄，不敢霸山川。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496550'>挽揭秋声外，旌翻夕照前。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496550'>老臣非从死，何路答知怜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496550_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496550'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496550_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年1月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《英宗皇帝尊号册文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163875' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163875' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163875?labeling=true' target='_blank'>英宗皇帝尊号册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163875")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163875_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163875'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163875'>维治平四年岁次丁未，正月一日庚戌，摄太尉具官臣韩某，与内外文武百寮、诸军将校、藩卫牧伯、郡县长吏、藩夷酋长、缁黄耆艾等，再拜稽首上言：臣等闻天道育万物而不责其报，然飞走之微，必时而有荐者，以知其本也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163875_comment'></div>君德被万宇而不有其名，然臣辟之众，必崇而有号者，以献其诚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163875_comment'></div>故报虽不责，荐而知其本者，天必享；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163875_comment'></div>名虽不有，号而献其诚者，君不违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163875_comment'></div>是以上下之情通，而古今不能以易也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163875_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下自然之性，得尧之仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163875_comment'></div>不闻而式，绍文之圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163875_comment'></div>总百行而无不备，探六艺而无不达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163875_comment'></div>粤在宗邸，德充而晦，令闻莫遏，四海系心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163875_comment'></div>譬夫大明将升，光气前发，万目瞻望，不可韬戢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163875_comment'></div>及乎膺受圣托，纂隆皇绪，信默二祀，动谨先法，奉养长乐，孝惟克谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163875_comment'></div>内严宫闱，而细大必修；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163875_comment'></div>外整纪纲，而颓坠皆举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163875_comment'></div>揽威柄以归己，斡神化而独运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163875_comment'></div>下暨鳏寡，悉安其生，至于昆蚑，莫不被泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163875_comment'></div>其九族之睦也，俾先乎知道；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163875_comment'></div>其百揆之叙也，本精乎任人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163875_comment'></div>若夫延见迩臣，咨访不倦，有虞之好问也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163875_comment'></div>抑损浮费，用度日约，大禹之克俭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163875_comment'></div>缉熙光明而德行以显，周成之保邦也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163875_comment'></div>综核名实而赏罚必信，汉宣之图治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163875_comment'></div>并会众美，嗣兴太平，故自舟车所通，日月所照，皆奉顺声教，无敢弗虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163875_comment'></div>固足以恢四圣之闳休，极百王之盛节者矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163875_comment'></div>乃者肇禋吉土，始见清庙，祭而受福，庆将逮下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163875_comment'></div>下之报上，安可无述？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163875_comment'></div>臣等所以合中外之志，叩阍屡渎，请上丕称，以形容于万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163875_comment'></div>而陛下持《易》之谦，执道之契，德贯二仪而不自满，功偕八世而无所矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163875_comment'></div>冲然弗居，可诏不下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163875_comment'></div>自是舆情郁悒，更相责诮，以为睿圣之烈，赫赫如此，而不能发扬而增大之，是不若飞走知本之著也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163875_comment'></div>今三朝之吉，万玉来会，重译有贡，八音在廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163875_comment'></div>臣等幸于此时，冀毕前恳，封奏五上，莫匪倾竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163875_comment'></div>陛下犹敦谕数四，不得已而俞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163875_comment'></div>夫道济群生而不言所利，体乾也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163875_comment'></div>躬享大命而若固有之，膺历也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163875_comment'></div>化成天下而辉光日新，文也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163875_comment'></div>守在四夷而兵革不试，武也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163875_comment'></div>日用而百姓不知，圣也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163875_comment'></div>亲宁而万国以欢，孝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1163875_comment'></div>臣等不胜大愿，谨奉玉册、玉宝，上尊号曰体乾膺历文武圣孝皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1163875_comment'></div>伏惟陛下无前之迹，本忘其名；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1163875_comment'></div>徇众之欲，勉而是承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1163875_comment'></div>斯亦踵祖宗之旧，而慰乎夷夏之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1163875_comment'></div>惟持其盈以守其成，寿考万年以享其荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1163875_comment'></div>臣某等诚欢诚忭、顿首顿首，谨言。</div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1163875_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年1月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《英宗皇帝哀册文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163687' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163687' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163687?labeling=true' target='_blank'>英宗皇帝哀册文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163687")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163687_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163687'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163687'>维治平四年岁次丁未，正月庚戌朔，八日丁巳，英宗宪文肃武宣孝皇帝崩于福庆殿，旋殡于殿之西阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163687_comment'></div>粤八月丁未朔，八日甲寅，迁坐于永厚陵，礼也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163687_comment'></div>历在而帝，鼎成则仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163687_comment'></div>四海惊摧兮，犹考妣之丧也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163687_comment'></div>群臣号慕兮，有衣冠之葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163687_comment'></div>哀仗初肃，灵輴即前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163687_comment'></div>孝子嗣皇帝永念罔极，痛深所天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163687_comment'></div>睹象物兮如在，挽宫车兮莫旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163687_comment'></div>一奠之诀兮，既已悲霄壤之隔；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163687_comment'></div>万古之信兮，又将假文字之传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163687_comment'></div>乃命臣某，继之以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163687_comment'></div>其词曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1163687'>惟宋之兴，祀踰百年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163687_comment'></div>圣圣相授，前羲后轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163687_comment'></div>于穆英宗，其承赫然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163687_comment'></div>嗣世惟五，应期则千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163687_comment'></div>厥初在藩，潜德固异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163687_comment'></div>惟善吾乐，惟学吾嗜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163687_comment'></div>朝夕诗书，寤寐仁义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163687_comment'></div>颛心圣贤，举跬孝悌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163687_comment'></div>官之否臧，民之病利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163687_comment'></div>必询而得，不在康济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163687_comment'></div>明哉仁庙，知子其至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163687_comment'></div>推尧之心，乃命主器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163687_comment'></div>曰非所当，骇然恳避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163687_comment'></div>敦迫踰年，始辞邸第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163687_comment'></div>高世之行，实出文帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163687_comment'></div>既绍统业，以济以勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163687_comment'></div>欲泰天下，俭吾一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163687_comment'></div>衣必屡浣，食皆屏珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163687_comment'></div>府有馀积，赐无横缗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163687_comment'></div>损约邦用，深虞害民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163687_comment'></div>不户而化，咸归至淳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163687_comment'></div>壸内之制，有妃有嫔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163687_comment'></div>位号之等，其详可闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163687_comment'></div>吾悉不备，萧然禁宸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163687_comment'></div>侍左右者，故宫几人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163687_comment'></div>为治之本，先乎睦亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163687_comment'></div>不爱苑囿，众居以均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1163687_comment'></div>大兴学校，群心自驯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1163687_comment'></div>首善之劝，于何不臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1163687_comment'></div>荷天之休，所报惟悫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1163687_comment'></div>承先之祐，其事弥恪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1163687_comment'></div>始见郊庙，阴慝前作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1163687_comment'></div>霖霪累旬，朝位皆愕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1163687_comment'></div>谓宜改为，言者交错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1163687_comment'></div>圣心益坚，夙夜祗若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1163687_comment'></div>及期而祀，景气澄扩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1163687_comment'></div>至诚之应，老稚歌乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1163687_comment'></div>庶政思乂，万机必躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1163687_comment'></div>一令之细，惟审而后下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1163687_comment'></div>一言之善，则沛然是从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1163687_comment'></div>览四方之奏，率至于夜艾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1163687_comment'></div>访前殿之对，动踰于日中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1163687_comment'></div>协虞舜聪明之圣，尽汉宣综核之公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1163687_comment'></div>好文之盛，前无比崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1163687_comment'></div>籍兵之广，寓之在农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1163687_comment'></div>既恢隆于素教，又振宣于武功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1163687_comment'></div>于是西之悍羌，北之强貊，威德所加，望风夺魄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1163687_comment'></div>阴缮戎备，歛藏贪螫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1163687_comment'></div>奔走间者，伺吾策画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1163687_comment'></div>惟固结于盟誓，幸保全于沙碛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1163687_comment'></div>若使天锡洪休，寿钟遐历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1163687_comment'></div>则累世之敝，不数期而尽更；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1163687_comment'></div>二虏之骄，有一朝而扫迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1163687_comment'></div>奈何岁俯经于再闰，年未偕于不惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1163687_comment'></div>帝乡甚邈，遽乐白云之游；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1163687_comment'></div>路寝斯严，忽预彤裳之册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1163687_comment'></div>得非嗣圣当发，兴符有开，启闳规于厥后，俾大治于将来？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1163687_comment'></div>太平之功既遗已而不有，亿兆之众徒诉天而尽哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1163687_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1163687_comment'></div>违豫之来，忧民不替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1163687_comment'></div>蠲赋恤灾，宽刑霈惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1163687_comment'></div>亲挥宸笔，以定储位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1163687_comment'></div>明圣知之在先，俾群情之大慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1163687_comment'></div>谓勿药兮宜瘳，何与龄之终戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1163687_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1163687_comment'></div>太筮诹吉，萧辰正秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1163687_comment'></div>下广内以将旦，即大升而弗留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1163687_comment'></div>臣庶攀恸，风云惨愁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1163687_comment'></div>背紫台之业业，飏丹旐之悠悠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1163687_comment'></div>万乘衔悲，睇斜晖之莫返；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1163687_comment'></div>六宫洒泣，杂暮雨之难收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1163687_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1163687_comment'></div>荥圃宵严，汜关朝启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1163687_comment'></div>登岭道之萦回，瞰巩郊而迤逦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1163687_comment'></div>池鱼轻跃于帷㡘，《薤露》凄流于心耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1163687_comment'></div>气暝缑山，阴凝洛水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1163687_comment'></div>方开万岁之阡，已凑诸侯之轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1163687_comment'></div>姬嫱素寡，何须铜雀之为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1163687_comment'></div>珠玉弗藏，讵有金凫之侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1163687_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1163687_comment'></div>会圣临右，永昭峙旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1163687_comment'></div>侍仙游之缥缈，之帝所以轩翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1163687_comment'></div>名素在于真箓，迹空留于寿堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1163687_comment'></div>百年之间，自比轩台之畏肃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1163687_comment'></div>九疑之下，几瞻耘鸟之飞扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1163687_comment'></div>德固不朽，庆方大昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1163687_comment'></div>惟英主之号，自我而独得兮，宜与天而共长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1163687_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_98_1163687_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《上永厚陵名状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163804' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163804' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163804?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上永厚陵名状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163804")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163804_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163804'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163804'>因山而葬，将循尧帝之宏规；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163804_comment'></div>就水为名，复举汉文之故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163804_comment'></div>询于鄙陋，曷足形容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163804_comment'></div>伏以大行皇帝以上主之资，继景炎之祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163804_comment'></div>圣心欲治，方图庶事之康；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163804_comment'></div>天意难忱，不降万年之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163804_comment'></div>此方中之始竁，宜复土而有称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163804_comment'></div>夫惟盛德之无前，固与方舆而同厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163804_comment'></div>大行皇帝陵，谨请以「永厚」为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163804_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1163804_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未春辞免司空兼侍中札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未春辞免司空兼侍中第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163821' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163821' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163821?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未春辞免司空兼侍中第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163821")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163821_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163821'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163821'>臣昨日以覃恩宣制，而蒙特授司空、侍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163821_comment'></div>恩出非常，骇然不知所措之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163821_comment'></div>盖以三公之崇，与珥貂之贵，二者品秩殊重，自国朝以来，罕曾兼拜，故即时面奏不可当之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163821_comment'></div>退又具劄子敷陈，固不敢尽冀追寝新命，只乞于二官之内，许受一重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163821_comment'></div>今蒙差降中使，曲赐御劄，封还所上劄子，令即祗当，辞不可再者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163821_comment'></div>圣语丁宁，虽欲示以殊礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163821_comment'></div>愚臣内省，于义诚有不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163821_comment'></div>缘臣自右仆射改司空，已是超转，更兼侍中，即从来无有此例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163821_comment'></div>又欧阳修以降并各迁秩一等，而臣独进三官，轻重不均，胡颜自处？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163821_comment'></div>况陛下临御之始，而臣猥当首宰之任，不能爱惜国体，自知涯分，叨荣冒宠，为天下之所鄙笑，则恐大累初政，无以厌伏众心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163821_comment'></div>此事所系不轻，非是矫为辞免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163821_comment'></div>兼臣所乞只封魏国，盖欲承先人之旧，为人子之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163821_comment'></div>伏望圣慈深察，早降俞旨，下学士院贴麻施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163821_comment'></div>如此，则上不玷于大公，下免贻于清议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163821_comment'></div>犬马之报，惟誓殚竭。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1163821_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未春辞免司空兼侍中第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163822' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163822' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163822?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未春辞免司空兼侍中第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163822")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163822_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163822'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163822'>臣近以覃恩拜命，内省未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163822_comment'></div>寻具愚恳上陈，迄今未赐俞旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163822_comment'></div>早来蒙宣示张方平劄子，伏读之际，益用惕然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163822_comment'></div>若不再渎圣聪，实恐未能周悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163822_comment'></div>盖方平之说，乃是学士院一面援据，即不见得中书始以先帝登极恩例，进呈欧阳修以下并当进秩一等，寻奉诏旨施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163822_comment'></div>臣继曾面奏，若宣召学士草制，臣与曾公亮等亦乞以此除授，宠典或过，必不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163822_comment'></div>次日制下，蒙授臣司空兼侍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163822_comment'></div>推恩既异，安敢默默？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163822_comment'></div>况仁宗即位之初，丁谓自司空拜司徒兼侍中、冯拯自左仆射拜司空兼侍中、曹利用自右仆射拜左仆射兼侍中、参知政事任中正等，各迁二官，则是中书此来进拟，本循嘉祐之例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163822_comment'></div>而学士院降制，乃用乾兴之比，所以轻重不一，义难祗受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163822_comment'></div>兼臣与曾公亮恩命自亦不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163822_comment'></div>公亮则止是平迁，较臣则独为超拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163822_comment'></div>若谓王旦、吕夷简皆自右仆射进拜司空，则并仍兼门下侍郎，不曾更加侍中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163822_comment'></div>且今来庆泽周被，岂当有不均之理，非如王旦等前例，自是特恩优转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163822_comment'></div>此臣所以揣分知过，焉敢矫为避免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163822_comment'></div>欲望圣慈深垂矜照，特依前请，下学士院贴麻改正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163822_comment'></div>其所进封，亦乞只用旧国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163822_comment'></div>如此，则稍宽愚相之责，不累初政之明。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1163822_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='9b2988e8e3824449b2b1df07c78dd522_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("9b2988e8e3824449b2b1df07c78dd522");'><span id='9b2988e8e3824449b2b1df07c78dd522_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>，60岁</div><div id='9b2988e8e3824449b2b1df07c78dd522' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年闰3月</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。闰三月，韩琦有《乞下太常礼院详定宰臣押班制度奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1164000' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164000' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164000?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞下太常礼院详定宰臣押班制度奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（治平四年闰三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年闰3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164000")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164000_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164000'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164000'>近以御史中丞王陶弹奏不过文德殿押班，寻上表待罪，蒙降手诏不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164000_comment'></div>臣等先曾面奏，自来以前殿退晚，及中书聚厅见客日有急速公事商量，故不及轮往押班，已是积有岁年，即非自臣等始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164000_comment'></div>今检详有唐及五代会要，每月凡九开延英，对宰臣日，未御内殿前，便令閤门使传宣不坐，令放班朝退，则可见宰臣更不赴正衙押班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164000_comment'></div>国朝自祖宗以来，继日临朝，宰臣奏事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164000_comment'></div>祥符初，降敕令宰臣依故事赴文德殿常朝立班，当日似未曾子细讨论，故后来行之不久，渐复隳废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164000_comment'></div>若今后每遇前殿退晚，须轮宰臣赴文德殿押班，缘中书朝退后见客及商议公事，动踰时刻，必于常朝事务大有妨滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164000_comment'></div>欲乞下太常礼院检阅典故详定，议立常制，贵得永远遵行。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1164000_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1164000'><span class='label'>按：</span>《宋会要辑稿》仪制四之六。第二册第一九○一页又见《通鉴长编纪事本末》卷五七，《宋史》卷一一六《礼志》一九，《续资治通鉴》卷六五。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1164000_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未因中丞弹不赴文德殿常朝待罪第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十九。）</span><div id='poem_1163746' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163746' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163746?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163746'>臣某言：伏以朝之立制，当谨奉行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163746_comment'></div>事有从宜，寝成因习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163746_comment'></div>果被宪台之劾，敢逃刑笔之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163746_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣久玷弼谐，素惭椎钝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163746_comment'></div>每俟延英之对，动或踰时；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163746_comment'></div>故趋宣政之班，居常旷礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163746_comment'></div>自罹弹击，交切兢惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163746_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下断在至公，惩其不恪，特正慢官之罪，以清著位之联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163746_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163746_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未因中丞弹不赴文德殿常朝待罪第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十九。）</span><div id='poem_1163747' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163747' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163747?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未因中丞弹不赴文德殿常朝待罪第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163747")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163747_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163747'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163747'>臣某言：近以久废朝仪，遂招台劾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163747_comment'></div>虽拜章而引咎，顾充位以何颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163747_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以举按不避权豪，宪臣之风采；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163747_comment'></div>刑罚弗私贵近，治国之纪纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163747_comment'></div>岂容非才，而得幸免？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163747_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下主兹直道，断以大公，早议正于常科，以耸闻于庶位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163747_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1163747_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未夏乞罢相第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十九。）</span><div id='poem_1163748' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163748' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163748?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未夏乞罢相第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163748")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163748_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163748'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163748'>臣某言：天听甚高，尚应诚而必答；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163748_comment'></div>君仁至厚，固无欲之不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163748_comment'></div>矧沥恳于先朝，累避贤于冢任，比申前志，幸恻圣衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163748_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣起自孤生，早丁盛旦，无左右片言之援，居疑丞四辅之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163748_comment'></div>忠义可为，自顾微躯之草芥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163748_comment'></div>是非难一，何胜众咻之波涛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163748_comment'></div>每内惕于虚孱，日坐须于仆踣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163748_comment'></div>自仁皇嘉祐之末，逮英庙治平之间，求解四五年，凡奏数十上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163748_comment'></div>会国家之多故，蒙诏谕之弗俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163748_comment'></div>终承赐可之言，许俟及期而罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163748_comment'></div>虽德音之未远，怅仙驭之难攀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163748_comment'></div>侥幸至兹，负愧殊甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163748_comment'></div>伏遇皇帝陛下乾刚独运，离照大明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163748_comment'></div>四海翘然，耸听维新之治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163748_comment'></div>群材森若，欣为不世之逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163748_comment'></div>而臣监拔非长，设施滋懵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163748_comment'></div>天时数沴，焉能知燮理之方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163748_comment'></div>病力何堪，日以见昏疲之状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163748_comment'></div>恬然不退，众将谓何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163748_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下施厚乾坤，恩隆父母，察危悰之匪妄，矜薄技之已殚，听罢宰司，俾从州任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163748_comment'></div>形之将敝，傥粗获于安休；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163748_comment'></div>事有至难，愿再膺于驱策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163748_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1163748_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未夏乞罢相第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十九。）</span><div id='poem_1163749' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163749' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163749?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未夏乞罢相第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163749")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163749_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163749'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163749'>臣某言：近上表乞罢相任，伏蒙圣慈特降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163749_comment'></div>比倾愚欸，仰叩睿仁，窃惟引去之当然，自谓开陈之已至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163749_comment'></div>尚稽可报，弥不遑安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163749_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>臣尝历览前编，钦闻善戒，知止足者盖道家之重，瞰高明者亦神理之常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163749_comment'></div>故谦畏自持，退则享安全之福；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163749_comment'></div>满盈不惧，进而招颠覆之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163749_comment'></div>况臣本乏材谋，滥魁丞辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163749_comment'></div>三朝遇主，惟力报于圣知；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163749_comment'></div>一纪备员，固久妨于贤路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163749_comment'></div>加以病襟滋耗，宰职殊隳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163749_comment'></div>以朴厚矫时，而风俗愈偷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163749_comment'></div>以勤瘁劝功，而官曹尚茍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163749_comment'></div>既不能振纪纲之颓敝，又无以增堂陛之高严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163749_comment'></div>徒日积于罪辜，将不容于窜殛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163749_comment'></div>兹所以恳还印绶，免误国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163749_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下推大公以为心，监小慈而伤治，不以旧人而牵爱，必思新政之更张，早霈德音，许还柄任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163749_comment'></div>畀之一郡，得遂养于衰残；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163749_comment'></div>其若再生，第知归于化育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163749_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163749_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未夏乞罢相第三表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十九。）</span><div id='poem_1163750' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163750' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163750?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未夏乞罢相第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163750")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163750_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163750'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163750'>臣某言：近两上表乞罢相任，伏蒙圣慈再降批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163750_comment'></div>陈力不能，已荐倾于悃愊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163750_comment'></div>退人以礼，犹过示于恩私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163750_comment'></div>虽诏谕之频仍，揆尪疲之忝冒，不膺可报，未已哀祈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163750_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以累圣重熙，百年长楙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163750_comment'></div>顾此治安之本，诚资辅翼之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163750_comment'></div>惟隆名素望者，可以久居；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163750_comment'></div>岂多病不才者，所宜愧处？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163750_comment'></div>故臣自叨冢任，常揣孤诚，虽有俾后尧舜之心，而无跻民仁寿之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163750_comment'></div>茍坐淹于岁月，徒自取于窜诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163750_comment'></div>所以屡叩先朝，极陈愚欸，愿解台衡之重，再尘乡郡之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163750_comment'></div>宸衷有示于矜从，天下遽悲于遏密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163750_comment'></div>幸遇皇帝陛下纂隆丕祚，恢阐大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163750_comment'></div>发号令而一新，振纪纲而尽举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163750_comment'></div>日月所照，皆知圣明；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163750_comment'></div>中外之心，罔不欢喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163750_comment'></div>比率土大宁之庆，是老臣当退之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163750_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下俯谅危悰，曲成先训，特寝断章之答，亟推如请之恩，命守本邦，进登贤弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163750_comment'></div>衰骸少息，惟归感于上仁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163750_comment'></div>直道自将，誓愈坚于素节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163750_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1163750_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未秋乞罢相第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十九。）</span><div id='poem_1163751' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163751' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163751?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未秋乞罢相第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163751")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163751_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163751'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163751'>臣某言：臣闻之《易》曰：「天道亏盈而益谦，地道变盈而流谦，鬼神害盈而福谦，人道恶盈而好谦」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163751_comment'></div>是则物之盈者，天、地、神、人皆不与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163751_comment'></div>况其望实本轻，材谋素寡，窃位二府，殆将踰纪，禄厚品极，宠非其人，可谓盈之甚者也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163751_comment'></div>此而不退，祸固随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163751_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣叨遇三朝，滥都元宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163751_comment'></div>以戆愚而待物，自谓无欺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163751_comment'></div>于利欲以裁人，焉能免过？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163751_comment'></div>群言稔积，公议喧闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163751_comment'></div>加以宿沴中戕，繁机外扰，尪疲之质，寖以难支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163751_comment'></div>故自嘉祐末年以来，累贡血诚求罢，皆国家多故，不能遂请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163751_comment'></div>伏自皇帝陛下嗣承统业，躬亲听断，纪纲日振，法度日修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163751_comment'></div>而臣多病不才，略无云补，备员冢任，其久如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163751_comment'></div>所以抗章屡渎，恳辞重柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163751_comment'></div>而蒙颁降手札，委曲敦谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163751_comment'></div>趣令就职，殊未矜从，忍愧强颜，至于今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163751_comment'></div>兹者先帝山陵复土，万世以安，于臣子送往之心，粗谓无恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163751_comment'></div>若不于此时上还印绶，以避贤者，则是冥然不知进退之臣，朝廷容之，何以风劝天下？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163751_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下念祖宗所付之重，当昧旦图治之始，登用良弼，共熙新政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163751_comment'></div>俾臣退补僻郡，以宁悴躯，示明主之大公，全老臣之素节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163751_comment'></div>内惟犬马之贱，苟未填弃沟壑，犹冀养完驽力，再效分寸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163751_comment'></div>臣见于沿路至京以来，听候俞旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163751_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1163751_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未秋乞罢相第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十九。）</span><div id='poem_1163752' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163752' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163752?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未秋乞罢相第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163752")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163752_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163752'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163752'>臣某言：近上表乞解相任，蒙圣慈差中使降赐批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163752_comment'></div>臣闻老子曰：「功成名遂身退，天之道也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163752_comment'></div>若其功不足以暴当世，名不足以服天下，禄位盈极不惧而退者，岂非违天之道，而自速其祸乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163752_comment'></div>臣之无状，大过于此，义当再渎，罪亦何逭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163752_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃惟自唐至于五代，首宰之为山陵使者，事已求罢，类多得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163752_comment'></div>昨者昭陵复土，而先帝尚进药剂，故臣不敢质之前例，遽然引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163752_comment'></div>逮先帝圣躬康复，政治日新，臣前后章数十上，恳祈避位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163752_comment'></div>先帝始虽不允，郊礼之后，屡曾亲被德音，止俟期年，听臣补外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163752_comment'></div>方俯期而露奏，俄晚驾之莫攀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163752_comment'></div>皇帝陛下纂绍云初，谨奉遗诏，因山之事，俾臣复当使任，不容固辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163752_comment'></div>今幸众力输勤，反虞成礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163752_comment'></div>况臣充位殊久，宰政不修，故疾婴缠，日难牵强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163752_comment'></div>上稽天道，次察人言，内量非才，远按故事，夙夜惶恐，无一可留之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163752_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下俯回睿监，深照危悰，广覆载生成之惠，悉孤愚进退之分，许辞冢辅，畀以小邦，则多病之躯，少遂休息，妨贤之咎，免及窜诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163752_comment'></div>臣无任/<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>俯回睿监：底本、明本、郭本俱阙，据张本、库本补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1163752_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163752'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_14_1163752_0'>⑴ 云云。　《安阳集》卷二九。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1163752_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未秋乞罢相札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163751' class='_poem'><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未秋乞罢相第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163824' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163824' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163824?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未秋乞罢相第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163824")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163824_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163824'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163824'>臣近上表乞解相任，蒙降批答不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163824_comment'></div>今月十三日，已再具劄子面奏，其所叙当去之理不一，事皆明白可信，非妄言也，必谓陛下哀而怜之，亟如所请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163824_comment'></div>今乃再烦诏谕，殊未开纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163824_comment'></div>臣窃揣陛下之意，不过以臣历相三朝，攀附二圣，谓虽衰病不职，不可令其遽去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163824_comment'></div>此陛下以为待臣之意厚，愚臣反以为薄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163824_comment'></div>臣请申其前说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163824_comment'></div>且臣备位二府，行越一纪，妨贤之久，未有如臣之甚者而不去；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163824_comment'></div>身婴宿疹，日甚一日，万务之重，不可支持而不去；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163824_comment'></div>宰职隳旷，谤议丛起，人情皆欲其去而不去；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163824_comment'></div>昔之为山陵使者，事已即罢，而臣两为山陵使而不去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163824_comment'></div>而陛下特欲矜其旧物以留之，则臣有此不去之大责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163824_comment'></div>仰而惭，俯而愧，何施面目于庙堂之上哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163824_comment'></div>若俟其职事愈废，病益不支，议者交章而肆攻，然后免而逐之，得不伤陛下所厚之恩？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163824_comment'></div>此臣所以为薄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163824_comment'></div>今陛下左右辅弼之臣，皆一时名世之贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163824_comment'></div>侍从亲近之官，皆一时可用之臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163824_comment'></div>当先帝祔庙礼成之后，宜升擢汇进，使交修众职，以悦服于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163824_comment'></div>使无状老臣，补郡于外，以宁病躯，全陛下御臣终始之礼，保愚臣守道平生之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163824_comment'></div>则陛下之恩至厚也，至重也，虽天地父母之道，不能过矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163824_comment'></div>伏望深照兹恳，早降俞命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163824_comment'></div>若陛下不赐可诏，则臣渎犯圣听，决于不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163824_comment'></div>臣无任祈天俟命、待罪激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1163824_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未秋乞罢相第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163825' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163825' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163825?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未秋乞罢相第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163825")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163825_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163825'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163825'>臣近上表，乞解相任，蒙批答不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163825_comment'></div>今月十四日，再具劄子面奏，其所叙当去之理不一，事皆明白不敢妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163825_comment'></div>陛下哀其诚实，遂有开许之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163825_comment'></div>臣退而俟命，必谓俞旨旦夕而下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163825_comment'></div>乃烦再遣中使，赐以手诏，训勉加厚，未容解去，非如前陛下所赐德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163825_comment'></div>既骇且疑，夙夕不能自处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163825_comment'></div>伏惟陛下德业日隆，方以至仁至信以御天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163825_comment'></div>既哀臣前请，尽出诚实，已面有垂可之谕，则望敦仁示信，深轸衰旧，早收相绂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163825_comment'></div>俾其只守本官，外补一郡，覆载亭育，不过厚恩，终始保全，皆由圣造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163825_comment'></div>臣今更不敢赴中书，即归私第，听候朝旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163825_comment'></div>臣无任祈天俟报激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163825_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《丁未秋乞罢相第四札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163826' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163826' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163826?labeling=true' target='_blank'>丁未秋乞罢相第四劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163826")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163826_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163826'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163826'>臣近上表及累具劄子，乞早罢免，归伏私第，旦夕以俟俞旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163826_comment'></div>昨晚复蒙差降中使宣召，孤诚忧迫，须至重烦圣听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163826_comment'></div>臣今必当去者，盖以二府一纪，愚短尽以罄竭，妨贤之久，自顾难安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163826_comment'></div>而又宿疹所婴，时在假告，职业隳斁，谤议丛起，兹陛下之所稔闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163826_comment'></div>仁庙、英宗山陵，两尘使领，事讫当罢，故事甚明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163826_comment'></div>此臣所以确然请退而不已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163826_comment'></div>况陛下前赐面谕，已有开许之意，故臣粗举大概，更不敢详陈极论，喋喋于扆宁之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163826_comment'></div>惟幸圣明哀察，早令补外，使人言顿息，贤隽汇升，病躯少休，得全骸骨，乃陛下示公断而存私恩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163826_comment'></div>臣不胜区区昧死固请激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163826_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　或在开封，任同中书门下平章事。韩琦有《致政王子融侍郎挽词三首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十五。此三诗作于英宗治平年间，但具体写作时地不详，姑系于此。）</span>《致政王子融侍郎挽词三首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十五。）</span>《致政王子融侍郎挽词三首》（其三）<span
