target='_blank'>致政王子融侍郎挽辞三首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496560")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496560_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496560'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496560'>公昔求还事，年犹未纵心。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496560'>轩裳轻俗累，水月莹禅襟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496560'>乐任荒三径，閒时戏一禽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496560'>陶然踰五闰，已矣世同钦。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496560_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496560'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496560_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496561' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496561' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496561?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496561_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496561'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496561'>伯氏勋名永，繇公左右然。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496561_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496561'>贤碑求帝篆，行录广时传。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496561_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496561'>馀范光门法，遗文粲史编。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496561_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496561'>欲知天报厚，五福赐君全。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496561_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496561'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496561_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496562' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496562' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496562?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496562_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496562'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496562'>昔贰淄川政，尝依太守贤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496562'>于门钦世德，阮巷忝亲联。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496562'>仆始惭当轴，公方遂引年。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496562'>音容俄永隔，抆泣望新阡。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496562_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496562'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496562_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月</a>　九月，神宗答应韩琦辞相，特授淮南节度使、判相州。同时，“诏赐第一区于京师，擢忠彦为秘阁校理，仍授二子官”。韩琦认为秘阁校理是“文馆清职”，不可滥授，应按规定“给札试艺，合格而后除”<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《罢相辞免两镇札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《罢相辞免两镇第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163828' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163828' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163828?labeling=true' target='_blank'>罢相辞免两镇第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163828")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163828_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163828'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163828'>臣此者抗章避位，得请乡邦，而蒙陛下更进官资，兼领将相之重，此人臣之至荣极幸者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163828_comment'></div>臣愚自视，已不能堪副大恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163828_comment'></div>惟是两镇之崇，自国朝以来，臣僚未尝并授，前面对日，已曾罄极开陈，退复具劄子辞免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163828_comment'></div>伏奉诏谕，未赐俞旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163828_comment'></div>夙夜震恐，无地所能自容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163828_comment'></div>臣岂不知宠命非常，特出陛下圣意，以示眷臣之礼至隆至厚，臣虽百殒，何以报陛下不次之遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163828_comment'></div>其如祖宗旧制，惟宗室近属，方有兹拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163828_comment'></div>臣若于至荣极幸之外，复窃陛下眷礼之厚，踰越常制，不自度而处之，则是开迩臣希望僭忒之源，自臣而始，以致陛下命令为永久之误，兹臣之大不忠也，何以胜天下之责哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163828_comment'></div>欲望圣慈深监血恳，非有缘饰伪妄之辞，特诏有司贴麻，止除一镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163828_comment'></div>则上不隳朝廷典宪之旧，下以安愚臣廉介之守，中外闻听，孰曰不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163828_comment'></div>臣必望睿明早赐开可，免频冒大戮，干渎不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163828_comment'></div>臣无任昧死陈请激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1163828_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《罢相辞免两镇第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163829' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163829' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163829?labeling=true' target='_blank'>罢相辞免两镇第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163829")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163829_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163829'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163829'>臣近累辞免总帅两镇之命，诚已殚尽，日须可报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163829_comment'></div>乃烦再赐诏谕，不允所乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163829_comment'></div>荷恩量己，终不遑安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163829_comment'></div>臣窃观前世劳旧之臣，人主欲厚其礼遇，始必大推恩赏，及甚知被宠之过，愧而不敢当者，终则矜而许之，是故君臣交美，见称于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163829_comment'></div>陛下视唐郭子仪如何人哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163829_comment'></div>再造唐室，功盖天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163829_comment'></div>至除太尉，则以时多奔竞，欲身变浮俗，遂恳避不受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163829_comment'></div>后除尚书令，则以太宗昔尝为之，又复坚避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163829_comment'></div>代宗皆从而不拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163829_comment'></div>此不亦君臣之交美哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163829_comment'></div>今臣二府备位，妨贤最久，宰政无状，苟免大戮而退，陛下即以陈、邓二节，并以付臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163829_comment'></div>既臣僚未尝除授，所以屡渎圣听，不敢为僭倖之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163829_comment'></div>且臣之望子仪，固霄壤之相邈，不当轻引以为据；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163829_comment'></div>然辄举此而为陛下言者，两镇非常之命，切于辞而得请也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163829_comment'></div>伏望陛下以尧舜聪明之圣，下照愚陋，早降睿旨，改除一镇，以成微臣断断一介之志，则陛下从人之美，固光耀古今矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163829_comment'></div>臣无任昧死陈请激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1163829_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《罢相辞免两镇第四札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163830' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163830' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163830?labeling=true' target='_blank'>罢相辞免两镇第四劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163830")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163830_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163830'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163830'>臣伏蒙圣慈特差中使李友询传宣，男忠彦已依所乞令试，所有恩命及第宅，更不许辞免，令早入谢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163830_comment'></div>承命感栗，未知所报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163830_comment'></div>辞第之请，臣方欲再渎圣听，今再不敢继入文字，即具表称谢次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163830_comment'></div>其两镇之命，缘自国朝以来，臣僚未尝除授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163830_comment'></div>臣已三上劄子辞避，前面对日，亦曾恳叙不敢当之理，日望特赐俞允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163830_comment'></div>且臣今来获解柄任，既得出补乡郡，陛下乃命兼领将相，宠进官秩，长男得试馆职，次男迁官，而又有甲第之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163830_comment'></div>自近世以来，宰相罢去，未有如臣之恩礼优异者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163830_comment'></div>陛下待臣，可谓至矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163830_comment'></div>臣上体陛下眷遇之意，已俱不敢再三避免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163830_comment'></div>惟两镇之命，伏望圣明察臣于义实不可当，非是过为矫饰，早降睿旨，改除一镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163830_comment'></div>兼自来甚有贴麻体例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163830_comment'></div>臣谨伏私第，哀祈激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1163830_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《乞男忠彦召试中等与职官札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163833' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163833' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163833?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞男忠彦召试中等与馆职劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163833")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163833_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163833'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163833'>臣窃闻已有圣旨，臣长男忠彦特与馆职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163833_comment'></div>臣此来忝冒之过，夙夕未知所处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163833_comment'></div>而陛下加意眷臣，又复恩及子舍，可谓殊常而绝异矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163833_comment'></div>臣欲罄写肝膈，必期寝罢，虑陛下方推厚礼，不得悉如所乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163833_comment'></div>然在理当请，须合陈露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163833_comment'></div>伏睹前朝辅臣子弟，有得预馆殿之职者，必先召试中等，然后推恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163833_comment'></div>男忠彦欲望圣慈特令学士院校试，依试到等第施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163833_comment'></div>或不中程，即如常例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163833_comment'></div>既免滥厕美职，又协朝廷旧规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163833_comment'></div>老臣侥荣太至，日自羞愧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1163833_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年9月</a>　九月，韩琦辞相，欧阳修时在亳州，有贺启称韩琦“德业两全，谗谤自止，过于周公远矣”。王安石时知江宁府，有贺启称“贵极富溢，而无亢满之累；名遂身退，而有褒加之崇”，处变过于汉之周勃、霍光，理政过于姚崇、宋璟。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《辞免使相第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十。）</span><div id='poem_1163753' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163753' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163753?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免使相第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163753")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163753_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163753'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163753'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特授臣淮南节度使、守司徒、检校太师兼侍中、判相州，加功臣、食邑、食实封者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163753_comment'></div>冢司备位，屡陈恳去之宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163753_comment'></div>故里班条，重窃荣归之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163753_comment'></div>顾便藩之恩礼，骇中外之听闻，愧弗敢当，避期得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163753_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣忠虽自性，戆不兼材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163753_comment'></div>久尘元宰之崇，盖辱累朝之遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163753_comment'></div>正涂是辟，愚守难移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163753_comment'></div>责自任于四来，谤不虞于三至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163753_comment'></div>再幸攀鳞之际会，终逃积羽之湮沦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163753_comment'></div>加疾疹之内攻，觉尪疲之日甚，荐形剡牍，力愬妨贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163753_comment'></div>果回天地之仁，获假麾符之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163753_comment'></div>然而敷五教而分治，领于外者几希；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163753_comment'></div>建六纛以临戎，兼为相者殊重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163753_comment'></div>仍视帅臣之秩，俾充乡郡之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163753_comment'></div>仰君命之非常，质人言而可畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163753_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下谨守成之法，推懋赏之公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163753_comment'></div>谓失簪履者，虽不忘求旧之思；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163753_comment'></div>而上印绶者，岂可被无名之宠？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163753_comment'></div>亟停异数，免玷大猷，少宽忝冒之诛，更誓糜捐之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163753_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1163753_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《辞免使相第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十。）</span><div id='poem_1163754' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163754' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163754?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免使相第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163754")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163754_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163754'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163754'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特授臣淮南节度使、守司徒、检校太师兼侍中、判相州，加功臣、食邑、食实封，寻具表辞避，蒙降批答不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163754_comment'></div>出守之恩，顾衰疲之甚幸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163754_comment'></div>非常之命，徒震骇而莫当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163754_comment'></div>辞恳虽勤，诏音未可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163754_comment'></div>重兹干渎，必觊矜从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163754_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以三公之崇，固非人而不授；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163754_comment'></div>五教所叙，惟处内而是宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163754_comment'></div>矧兼真相之荣，外领元戎之重，在昔臣邻之罢去，无闻宠异之及兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163754_comment'></div>虽曰殊私，岂容清议？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163754_comment'></div>伏念臣孤忠少与，椎直近愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163754_comment'></div>自升拜于冢司，倏再踰于闰历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163754_comment'></div>有尊主庇民之志，而才不逮心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163754_comment'></div>负窃位素餐之讥，而久增其愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163754_comment'></div>屡殚诚请，求解机繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163754_comment'></div>终垂恻于上仁，得为藩于故里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163754_comment'></div>不意曲加优遇，骈锡徽章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163754_comment'></div>名器假人，必累惟新之政；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163754_comment'></div>负乘致寇，终伤恤旧之慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163754_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下开博照之明，谅危悰之尽，亟寝告廷之误，以章驭贵之公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163754_comment'></div>病宰乞骸，既免冒尘之踰分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163754_comment'></div>劳臣任力，皆知劝赏之无私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163754_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1163754_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《谢除使相判相州表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十。）</span><div id='poem_1163755' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163755' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163755?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢除使相判相州表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163755")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163755_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163755'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163755'>臣某言：近奉制命，特授臣淮南节度使、守司徒、检校太师兼侍中、判相州，加功臣、食邑、食实封，寻两具表辞免，蒙降批答不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163755_comment'></div>宰职隳功，莫副宵衣之治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163755_comment'></div>乡邦得请，重叨昼锦之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163755_comment'></div>被<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1163755", 1163755, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>恩典</span>之特优，顾人言而甚愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163755_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣早繇科第，遂玷宠荣，不图翰墨之进身，自竭涓尘而报国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163755_comment'></div>备员谏诤，几不免于窜投；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163755_comment'></div>奋命疆垂，实荐罹于艰阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163755_comment'></div>独恃圣神之眷，谁开援助之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163755_comment'></div>仁宗皇帝知其守以孤忠，谓可属之大事，庆历之始，已擢贰于枢机；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163755_comment'></div>嘉祐之中，乃进登于宰辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163755_comment'></div>俄膺冢任，益荷殊知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163755_comment'></div>当英庙之承祧，逮圣人之嗣历，稠重<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1163755", 1163755, "Clauses/33/Comments/0")'>遭会</span>，罄竭愚庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163755_comment'></div>惟知社稷之安，岂顾家宗之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163755_comment'></div>然而万微多务，一纪妨贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163755_comment'></div>为国持平，敢自私于轻重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163755_comment'></div>裁人所欲，固难免于爱憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163755_comment'></div>加疾疹之婴缠，苦形神之耗敝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163755_comment'></div>勉讫因山之礼，恳陈上印之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163755_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下念犬马之力易衰，扩日月之明为照，不罪再三之请，亟垂开可之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163755_comment'></div>进秩地官，剖符枌社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163755_comment'></div>建高牙之重，既疏淮海之封；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163755_comment'></div>增故里之光，仍袭貂蝉之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163755_comment'></div>叨尘实甚，今古畴偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163755_comment'></div>敢不思尽瘁于寝兴，泯置怀于内外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163755_comment'></div>在边在庭之责，惟驱策以当前；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163755_comment'></div>益坚益壮之心，至糜捐而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163755_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1163755_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《免册命表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十。）</span><div id='poem_1163756' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163756' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163756?labeling=true' target='_blank'>免册命表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163756")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163756_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163756'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163756'>臣某言：伏奉制命，特授臣淮南节度使、守司徒、检校太师兼侍中，令所司备礼册命者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163756_comment'></div>地官之拜，已过冒于宠私；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163756_comment'></div>册命之殊，愧重烦于优礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163756_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣素惟无状，久玷冢司，兹恳避于繁机，得出临于本郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163756_comment'></div>三公进秩，方深假器之讥；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163756_comment'></div>万乘居尊，敢屈临轩之礼？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163756_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下念国容之良重，顾邦典之非常，申饬攸司，亟停异数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163756_comment'></div>庶少安于夙夜，惟知荷于矜全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163756_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163756_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《辞避赐第札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《辞避赐第第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163832' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163832' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163832?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞避赐第第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163832")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163832_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163832'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163832'>臣近蒙圣慈差勾当御药院王中正传宣，赐臣见住居宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163832_comment'></div>臣寻具劄子上奏，辞不敢当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163832_comment'></div>窃闻已降敕付閤门，据见赁官宅间数赐臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163832_comment'></div>臣尘污冢辅，茍免罪黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163832_comment'></div>既得出补乡郡，而陛下推恩太过，臣已不能胜荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163832_comment'></div>今复锡以居第，重出意外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163832_comment'></div>臣岂不知陛下眷礼之厚，固不易得；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163832_comment'></div>然辅臣出入，乃朝廷常事，若陛下以臣之故，一开此例，恐非经久之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163832_comment'></div>臣所以规规不已，愿赐寝罢者，非自饰洁廉以欺罔陛下，盖愚虑及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163832_comment'></div>伏望睿明垂察，亟如所请，庶上全国体，而臣免负稠重叨冒之愧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1163832_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在开封，相州知州任上。韩琦有《谢赐宅表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十。）</span><div id='poem_1163757' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163757' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163757?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐宅表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163757")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163757_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163757'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163757'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈特赐臣所赁官宅一区，累具奏免，奉圣旨不许辞避者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163757_comment'></div>补郡以行，既极荣归之宠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163757_comment'></div>僦居之久，又叨即赐之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163757_comment'></div>眷遇过优，省循难处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163757_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>惟昔驭臣之法，无先懋赏之方，其畴不私，所予甚谨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163757_comment'></div>若甲第之为贶，必大功而后宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163757_comment'></div>而臣自玷冢司，讫无他效，屡贡避贤之请，方蒙从欲之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163757_comment'></div>获守本邦，何啻昔人之夸耀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163757_comment'></div>所膺异数，绝非当世之拟伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163757_comment'></div>已增积于厚颜，复就颁于美宅，稠重感幸，夙夕震兢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163757_comment'></div>敢不加治藩垣，乃情王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163757_comment'></div>居无势夺，人知上赐以常存；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163757_comment'></div>身靡家为，日愧忠言而自激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163757_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1163757_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年11月</a>　在开封。十一月，神宗令韩琦改判永兴军兼陕西路经略安抚使。韩琦上疏论边将肆意妄作，自弃誓约，取怨戎狄，开祸乱之原，请朝廷召二府大臣早决成算。作品：《论招诱横山一带蕃族疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163951' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163951' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163951?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论招诱横山一带蕃族疏</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平四年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163951")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163951_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163951'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163951'>薛向始议欲招诱横山一带蕃族，今种谔已擅据绥州，启此衅端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163951_comment'></div>朝廷急遣向往，至则主谔谋，遂檄诸路举兵牵制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163951_comment'></div>环庆李肃之领兵七千，破荡族帐，乃是举无名之兵，反杀戮横山老幼，岂招诱邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163951_comment'></div>泾原蔡挺又欲令环州兵直趋兴、灵，即是诸路帅臣肆意妄作，自弃誓约，取怨戎狄，以开祸乱之原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163951_comment'></div>臣朝夕引道非难，边事倒错如此，须禀朝廷定议，愿召二府大臣早决成算。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163951_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年11月</a>　或在开封，永兴军知军任上。十一月，韩琦有《种谔招纳蕃部属户直入西界利害疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163926' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163926' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163926?labeling=true' target='_blank'>种谔招纳蕃部属户直入西界利害奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平四年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163926")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163926_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163926'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163926'>臣元不知朝廷措置本末，昨日仓卒应对，固不详悉，盖不审投来蕃族得其壮兵几人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163926_comment'></div>种谔所领属户又复若干？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163926_comment'></div>而不令大帅知委，必无合用钱帛粮草随行，即种谔到西界内作何施设？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163926_comment'></div>且横山一带蕃部，自延州东路青涧城至西路保平军，及环、庆、原州一带，绵亘数百里，其间甚有大族酋豪，未必皆欲背谅祚而投我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163926_comment'></div>今种谔乃一城寨小臣，不容朝廷、逐路帅臣通谋，协心营致，俟其横山众族皆有顺汉之心，然更须逐路兵将夫力钱帛粮草版筑之具百事毕备，尅日齐发，方为得计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163926_comment'></div>今当陕西连岁旱灾，兼闻沿边弓箭手、蕃部等谷食既已不收，荞麦又为旱霜所害，比户正此疲困，谔乃引数族投来人户深入西界，欲成大事，朝廷若不深谋远虑，遂欲因其狂易邀功，擅兴不受节制之举，遂令逐路应接彼界亡殁之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163926_comment'></div>柰何朝廷元不曾与逐路帅臣预谋，及新经优赏之后，灾旱民困之时，未有大段钱帛粮草兵力战具准备，及开展兴修城寨，控扼要害，捍卫投汉蕃族次第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163926_comment'></div>又鄜延、环庆、秦凤三路帅臣皆是权官，转运使例亦新差，势力不加，是将劳扰关中亿万生灵，以至天下受弊，只就种谔小子一时狂易之失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163926_comment'></div>兼谅祚既闻彼边蕃族叛己，大怒边臣招纳，以为曲在朝廷，复乘我素无预备，必大集平夏诸兵收讨，更于我之诸路更互冲突，则是西边用兵战御，未有已时，臣大为朝廷忧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163926_comment'></div>兼蒙陛下谕臣候到相州三两月间，就移永兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163926_comment'></div>臣当国家急难之际，岂敢辞避？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163926_comment'></div>至彼，朝廷必以边事责臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163926_comment'></div>缘有上件阙备，利害甚多，若只以空身而往，安能少济国家？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163926_comment'></div>欲望陛下与两府大臣熟图胜策，及广出钱帛兵力以济之，免成国家大患，不可收拾。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1163926_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='ad0bcf9d12d44f5da0bffed81f494f01_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ad0bcf9d12d44f5da0bffed81f494f01");'><span id='ad0bcf9d12d44f5da0bffed81f494f01_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>，61岁</div><div id='ad0bcf9d12d44f5da0bffed81f494f01' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在祥符，相州知州任上。由永兴军赴相州途中，韩琦有《次韵答崔公孺比部至陈桥驿来别相会》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十二。）</span><div id='poem_496287' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496287' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496287?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵答崔公孺比部至陈桥驿来别相会</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496287")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496287_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496287'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496287'>永日劳君倍驿驰，相期无失见相思。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496287'>义均吕驾来千里，情过阳关书一卮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496287'>喜接禅医开道眼，愧逢诗将立降旗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496287'>此行且纵漳滨卧，免弄幽并侠少儿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496287_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496287'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496287_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在祥符，相州知州任上。由永兴军赴相州途中，韩琦有《又次韵答夜宴陈桥驿》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十二。）</span><div id='poem_496288' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496288' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496288?labeling=true' target='_blank'>又次韵答夜宴陈桥驿</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496288")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496288_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496288'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496288'>客邮聊得接交亲，夜席开谈彼此真。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496288'>薄酒不辞知易别，征车从解喜难申。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496288'>请看随分樽罍事，可是留心富贵人。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496288'>早晚共成林下约，钓潭风月有竿纶。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496288_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496288'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496288_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在祥符，相州知州任上。由永兴军赴相州途中，韩琦有《又次韵答陈桥话别》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十二。）</span><div id='poem_496289' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496289' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496289?labeling=true' target='_blank'>又次韵答陈桥话别</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496289")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496289_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496289'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496289'>欲知连日柅征车，倾盖唯忧后会赊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496289_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496289'>被顾高情非白眼，论空真理黜黄牙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496289_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496289'>还家粗喜松成径，怀印谁惊绶引花。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496289_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496289'>卧治必难逃吏责，羡君奇志托青霞。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496289_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496289'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496289_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年8月</a>　或在祥符，相州知州任上。八月，韩琦有《祭安退先生刘君文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十四。）</span><div id='poem_1164187' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164187' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164187?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭安退先生刘君文<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164187")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164187_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164187'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164187'>维熙宁元年岁次戊申，八月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故安退先生刘君之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164187_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164187_comment'></div>先生刚介之性，天下能合者有几？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164187_comment'></div>渊源之学，古人不到者甚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164187_comment'></div>愤然不少屈于世兮，遂乐穷处，唯酣杯而放歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164187_comment'></div>晚而绝谷，弃置家事，欲融怡于太和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164187_comment'></div>澹然如此，而天犹不祐兮，叹倏随于逝波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164187_comment'></div>余方罢西帅，还故邺，借号涂而亟过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164187_comment'></div>瞻先生之坟土未乾兮，不能一奠于山阿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164187_comment'></div>徒遣使指，陈薄奠以将其意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164187_comment'></div>呜乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164187_comment'></div>先生其知余之悲乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164187_comment'></div>奈何奈何！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164187_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1164187'></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1164187_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年9月9日</a>　在祥符，相州知州任上。由永兴军赴相州途中，韩琦有《重九与诸亲会别陈桥驿》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十二。）</span><div id='poem_496290' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496290' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496290?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重九与诸亲会别桥驿</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年9月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496290")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496290_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496290'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496290'>邮馆侵晨举别觞，一时佳节遇重阳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496290_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496290'>莫悲白首分行袂，且伴黄花入醉乡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496290_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496290'>旅雁带霜横寒阵，香萸和露贮宫囊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496290_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496290'>诸君送我无多念，病质将休昼锦堂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496290_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496290'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496290_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
淄川
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='841b954fcc434409b9c3dd677a623683_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("841b954fcc434409b9c3dd677a623683");'><span id='841b954fcc434409b9c3dd677a623683_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1027&endYear=1029')">1027-1029年</a>，20-22岁</div><div id='841b954fcc434409b9c3dd677a623683' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1027&endYear=1027')">1027年</a>　韩琦通判淄州时，年方十七岁的张唐卿自青州持书来访，韩琦“观其文，雄富老重，殊不类少年者所为，亟加礼接之”<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1028&endYear=1029')">1028-1029年</a>　韩琦在淄州通判任上。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
凤阳（钟离）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='41ace62bcafe4488a794e2173812fcf7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("41ace62bcafe4488a794e2173812fcf7");'><span id='41ace62bcafe4488a794e2173812fcf7_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1030&endYear=1031')">1030-1031年</a>，23-24岁</div><div id='41ace62bcafe4488a794e2173812fcf7' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1030&endYear=1030')">1030年5月</a>　五月，韩琦丁母胡太夫人忧。赴濠州依三兄韩琚。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　韩琦丁母忧。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　在钟离。韩琦有《运使郎中启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》（巴蜀书社2000年版。下同）卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164035' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164035' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164035?labeling=true' target='_blank'>运使郎中启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1031年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164035")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164035_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164035'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164035'>右，某伏念昨者执萱背之丧，因而去职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164035_comment'></div>觐棠跗之戚，久矣离群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164035_comment'></div>邈眷鱼梁，谋飞鹢棹，属扬舲于楚甸，偶按郡于海濒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164035_comment'></div>冒柴毁之容，敢修名而致谒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164035_comment'></div>扩渊回之度，俄坐传以见延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164035_comment'></div>使旆言旋，宾墉再伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164035_comment'></div>承顾眄而倍价，被奖勖以增荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164035_comment'></div>旨酒嘉肴，辱升堂而示礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164035_comment'></div>犀舟劲楫，俾破浪以无虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164035_comment'></div>荷博济之惟优，固厚铭而斯极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164035_comment'></div>茹荼攸切，奏记有稽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164035_comment'></div>恭以某官球序融辉，岳神钟秀，对文物葳蕤之运，挺栋梁磥砢之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164035_comment'></div>聿奉帝俞，出分邦漕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164035_comment'></div>范滂以登车揽辔，自肃提封；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164035_comment'></div>桑羊以据相运筹，行膺懋宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164035_comment'></div>更祈俯顺气序，谨调寝兴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1164035_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　在钟离。韩琦有《楚州知郡都官启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。《安阳集编年笺注》有《楚州知郡都官启》同题文二篇，此为其中一篇，首句为“某伏以昨以绝奉循陔之养”）</span><div id='poem_1164036' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164036' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164036?labeling=true' target='_blank'>楚州知郡都官启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1031年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164036")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164036_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164036'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164036'>右，某伏以昨以绝奉循陔之养，远依同气之亲，幸假道于懿藩，得趋隅于盛府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164036_comment'></div>过敦宠迓，增纪愚衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164036_comment'></div>倚庐之念方深，奏记之仪仅阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164036_comment'></div>缅计树教条而流爱，固祥履以延禧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164036_comment'></div>恭惟某官禀醇和之灵，厚宽中之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164036_comment'></div>台阁夙推于素誉，搢绅咸挹于高芬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164036_comment'></div>式奉帝俞，显分邦寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164036_comment'></div>仲宝之若有神道，必研轻重之几；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164036_comment'></div>子干以深达故宜，居存清净之务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164036_comment'></div>惠利已凝于殊绩，庞鸿将沛于茂恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164036_comment'></div>仰冀遵调，少符瞻愿。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1164036_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　在钟离。韩琦有《海州知郡都官启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　在钟离。韩琦有《宿州同判屯田启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164038' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164038' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164038?labeling=true' target='_blank'>宿州同判屯田启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1031年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164038")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164038_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164038'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164038'>右，某伏念披乐令之云天，方遥晤对；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164038_comment'></div>仰谢庭之兰玉，仍接姻联。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164038_comment'></div>属衰杖之疚怀，阙飞鳞之托讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164038_comment'></div>缅计树风多裕，履道弥冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164038_comment'></div>伏以某官理擅民宗，才经世务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164038_comment'></div>应积星之上列，赞分虎之近邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164038_comment'></div>揉木销金，聊宣于善化；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164038_comment'></div>舒绅缓佩，行陟于近司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164038_comment'></div>属夏茂之有初，冀天倪之是保。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164038_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　在钟离。韩琦有《秀才启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。此文为仁宗天圣八年至明道元年韩琦在濠州丁忧时作，但具体作时不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1164039' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164039' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164039?labeling=true' target='_blank'>秀才<span class='inlineComment2'>（杜）</span>启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1031年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164039")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164039_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164039'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164039'>某启：兰薰菊耀，久挹于高芬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164039_comment'></div>玉洁冰清，仍联于茂族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164039_comment'></div>眷美疆之甚迩，贡柔削以多疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164039_comment'></div>属在哀茕，殊非简傲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164039_comment'></div>仰计贵阴励业，毓性凝和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164039_comment'></div>秀才即状元绣组成文，圭璋范德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164039_comment'></div>早副命部之荐，尚淹抟海之程。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164039_comment'></div>矧国家巍焕宣猷，晖昌复旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164039_comment'></div>崇英逸伟，方求应务之才；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164039_comment'></div>发策决科，伫塞录贤之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164039_comment'></div>更希颐卫，式慰倾祈。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1164039_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164040_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164040'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164040'>右，某伏念迩者幸属天伦，远分郡政，方谋趣治，旋会按行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164040_comment'></div>暨获趋尘，亟承欸接，载荷优隆之赐，永铭顽固之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164040_comment'></div>仰振举于列城，谅便藩于景福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164040_comment'></div>恭惟某官才谟纬世，望实光区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164040_comment'></div>总善部于中台，干要权于外计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164040_comment'></div>聿丰经用，载洽殊闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164040_comment'></div>孟博持纲，清诏克申于雅志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164040_comment'></div>千秋作辅，富民行启于真封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164040_comment'></div>更祈顺严律之有初，迪粹襟而自重。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164040_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_sentence_1_1164041_comment'></div>窘若宦游，邈焉风会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164041_comment'></div>加以门衰祚薄，途泰命屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164041_comment'></div>合符将觐于芝庭，累衅亟延于萱背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164041_comment'></div>羁孤至此，言叙何从？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164041_comment'></div>荐易芳年，疏驰短札。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164041_comment'></div>岂谓猥蒙冲眷，遐枉珍题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164041_comment'></div>荷降挹之兼常，第刻著之惟永。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164041_comment'></div>仰计首公多裕，毓性敦官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164041_comment'></div>伏以某官德牧瑞仪，《韶英》正韵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164041_comment'></div>适分曹于棘署，聊赋政于雷封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164041_comment'></div>千室鸣弦，已布阜安之化；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164041_comment'></div>四门启籥，方延骏茂之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164041_comment'></div>希顺迪于粹襟，伫显登于贵仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164041_comment'></div>其为企颂，曷既剖陈。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1164041_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1031&endYear=1031')">1031年</a>　在钟离。韩琦有《光州知郡状元学士启》<span id='poem_content_1164042'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164042'>右，某早者寓迹中州，趋尘上馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164042_comment'></div>文畅之才具美，载挹英风；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164042_comment'></div>相如之骑甚都，继临穷巷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164042_comment'></div>暨首涂之斯迫，卜赍刺以莫遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164042_comment'></div>近审光奉绨章，显分符寄，适黄堂之视政，谅素履以敦和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164042_comment'></div>恭惟某官桂苑横飞，蓬山独步，鉴局尚于夷远，思理禀于清纯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164042_comment'></div>前贾席以问釐，方隆宠遇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164042_comment'></div>厌严庐而出守，暂遂便藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164042_comment'></div>已鸣千室之弦，亟成旬日之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164042_comment'></div>锋车趣召，行膺用板之恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164042_comment'></div>凤掖司言，伫演明缗之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164042_comment'></div>更祈冲卫，式副虔诚。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1164042_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

临西（临清）

id='poem_sentence_0_495947'>草白岗长暮驿赊，朔风终日起平沙。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495947'>寒鞭易促鄣泥跃，冷袖难胜便面遮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495947'>土囊微乞缄馀怒，留送归程任摆花。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495947_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495947'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495947_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1163783' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163783' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163783?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中京谢皮褐衣物等表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163783")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163783_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163783'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163783'>祗膺恩检，就赐珍裘，被宠兼常，抚躬增惕<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163783_comment'></div>伏念宝邻胥协，信币交修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163783_comment'></div>属冬律之方严，眷使轺而加念，式颁寒服，益示至慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163783_comment'></div>逮兹驺隶之行，亦均轻暖之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163783_comment'></div>钦承厚礼，实感丹悰。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163783_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1164068' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164068' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164068?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢馆宴状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164068")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164068_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164068'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164068'>都畿爰止，方循即馆之仪；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164068_comment'></div>牢醴具陈，亟荷宴宾之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164068_comment'></div>仰鸿私之曲被，铭丹慊以良深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164068_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1164068_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1164069' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164069' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164069?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢签赐酒食状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164069")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164069_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164069'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164069'>璧琮申聘，甫及于名都；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164069_comment'></div>肴醳均恩，俄推于厚赉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164069_comment'></div>仰钦慈渥，但激鄙悰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164069_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1164069_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1164070' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164070' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164070?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢酒果状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164070")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164070_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164070'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164070'>乘轺讲好，授馆修仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164070_comment'></div>猥荷眷仁，荐推恩赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164070_comment'></div>载挹醇醪之味，仍均芳实之珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164070_comment'></div>优礼所加，悚铭斯至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164070_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1164070_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年</a>　韩琦奏请南郊礼之前一月，降敕开封府约束强盗。从之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1038&endYear=1038')">1038年12月</a>　在中京，充北朝正旦国信使。十二月，韩琦有《论外忧始于内患奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163882' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163882' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163882?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论外忧始于内患奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元元年十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1038年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163882")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163882_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163882'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163882'>臣伏闻元昊狂谋僭命，朝贡不修，轻犯天谋，人神共忿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163882_comment'></div>陛下虽宽诏厚泽，姑务怀柔，其如逆状已然，必为边患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163882_comment'></div>今献策陈事者大抵不过欲朝廷选择将帅，训习士卒，修利戈甲，营葺城隍，广畜资粮，以待黠羌之可胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163882_comment'></div>此乃安边捍寇之切务也，然而凡人之虑，皆能及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163882_comment'></div>臣切谓此特外忧而已，虽汉唐全盛之际，岂能使四夷常自窜伏，而保不为盗哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163882_comment'></div>若乃纲纪不立，忠佞不分，赏罚不明，号令不信，浮费靡节，横赐无常，务宴安之逸游，纵宫庭之奢靡，受女谒之干请，容近昵之侥倖，此臣所谓内患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163882_comment'></div>且四夷内窥中国，必观衅而后动，故外忧之起，必始内患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163882_comment'></div>臣今为陛下计，莫若先治内患，以去外忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163882_comment'></div>内患既平，外忧自息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163882_comment'></div>譬若木之有本，未有本固而枝叶不盛者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163882_comment'></div>臣欲望陛下深惟祖宗所谓内患者，尽革而去之，则陛下威德，远畅外夷，高视于汉唐之上，元昊小丑，孰能为国家之患哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163882_comment'></div>如外忧已兆，内患更滋，臣恐国家之虑，非直元昊一凶而已，臣切为陛下忧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163882_comment'></div>臣猥备谏员，不敢循默，言涉狂直，惟陛下怜其纳忠，贷其万死。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1163882'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1163882_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　在中京。韩琦充北朝正旦国信使时，有诗。作品：《谢春盘幡胜状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十九。写给契丹官员。）</span>《谢生饩状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十九。写给契丹官员。）</span>《谢射弓筵状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十九。写给契丹官员。）</span>《谢饯筵状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十九。写给契丹官员。）</span>《回中京留守状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十九。写给契丹官员。）</span>《副使回中京留守状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十九。写给契丹官员。）</span>《谢中京留守请赴筵状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十九。写给契丹官员。）</span>《副使谢中京留守请赴筵状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十九。写给契丹官员。）</span>《谢中京留守饯送状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十九。写给契丹官员。）</span>《副使谢中京留守饯送状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷三十九。写给契丹官员。）</span>《使回戏成》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1164071' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164071' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164077'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164077'>载旃将命，方尘于隰之行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164077_comment'></div>促驾经涂，载仰维垣之重。<div id='poem_1164083' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164083' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164083?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢中京留守饯送状</a><span href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164084")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164084_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164084'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164084'>获驰介乘，钦奉邻欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164084_comment'></div>方揭节以言还，沐至郊而为饯。<div 自注：永寿，虏主生辰节名，其日以大白酌南使。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_495948_comment'></div></div><br /></div>
