广元（绵谷）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2088b13c235d4796bee9fbec28706c9d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2088b13c235d4796bee9fbec28706c9d");'><span id='2088b13c235d4796bee9fbec28706c9d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>，32岁</div><div id='2088b13c235d4796bee9fbec28706c9d' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在绵谷，为体量安抚使。韩琦有《漫天岭》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_495954' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495954' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495954?labeling=true' target='_blank'>漫天岭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495954")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_495954_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495954'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495954'>欲使行人直过难，倚江凌汉任盘盘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495954'>纡回到顶终须下，如此天高甚处漫。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495954'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495954_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>利、益路大饥，韩琦为体量安抚使，蠲免租税、募人入粟，招募壮者，刺以为厢、禁兵，较好地实行了朝廷的救灾政策和措施。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>韩琦奏请免除各郡因皇子降生进金帛为庆的扰民举动。奏请停止各州所设的市买院以低价收市上供物。逐贪残不职吏，罢冗役。为饘粥，活饥人。深受蜀人爱戴。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在昭化，为体量安抚使。韩琦有《题利州昭化驿》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_495951' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495951' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495951?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题利州昭化驿</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495951")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_495951_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495951'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495951'>嘉陵源出本朝宗，地险无因直赴东。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495951'>从此逆流归顺去，恬波遥与峡江通。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495951_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495951'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495951_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
成都
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='2d2519f714a14fa5bb0cbf569bc48862_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2d2519f714a14fa5bb0cbf569bc48862");'><span id='2d2519f714a14fa5bb0cbf569bc48862_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>，32岁</div><div id='2d2519f714a14fa5bb0cbf569bc48862' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　利、益路大饥，韩琦为体量安抚使，蠲免租税、募人入粟，招募壮者，刺以为厢、禁兵，较好地实行了朝廷的救灾政策和措施。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　韩琦奏请免除各郡因皇子降生进金帛为庆的扰民举动。奏请停止各州所设的市买院以低价收市上供物。逐贪残不职吏，罢冗役。为饘粥，活饥人。深受蜀人爱戴。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>　或在成都，为体量安抚使。韩琦有《知府密学启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。此文为仁宗宝元二年韩琦使益、利路时作，但具体作地不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1164051' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164051' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164051?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知府密学启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164051")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164051_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164051'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164051'>右，某启：某属者误被宸恩，擢司明命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164051_comment'></div>演帝纶之重，方愧空疏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164051_comment'></div>备使隰之行，遽叨简任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164051_comment'></div>其荣甚过，所贵未胜，辞避莫从，忧惕兼至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164051_comment'></div>暨治装之云迫，实裁记之未遑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164051_comment'></div>盖主上以仁治中区，惠先远俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164051_comment'></div>勤询岁旱，贻恻圣衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164051_comment'></div>虑生籍之流庸，伤物价之腾跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164051_comment'></div>虽歌襦之化，固久服于民心；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164051_comment'></div>而乘传所过，庶咸知于上意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164051_comment'></div>适兼程而虔命，将入境以倾风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164051_comment'></div>敢谓猥沐殊私，叠贻精翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164051_comment'></div>仰认履谦之德，举增为感之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164051_comment'></div>欸奉有期，赡忭无已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1164051_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年11月</a>　或在成都，为体量安抚使。十一月，韩琦有《乞定军队临阵刑法奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_1163962' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163962' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163962?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞定军队临阵刑法奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（宝元二年十一月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163962")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163962_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163962'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163962'>镇戎军昨来战贼败状，虽是主将素不经历，军员亦贵部分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163962_comment'></div>其如兵士等方布行阵，才被贼兵呼噪来逼，即已不能驻足，一概奔溃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163962_comment'></div>今若只坐主将军校之罪，虽有所动，即恐兵士等以法不加众，向去临阵战，又即依前退却，且谓自有主将被刑，复免一时锋刃之害，唯求生路，岂有斗心？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163962_comment'></div>兼闻诸路士卒往往如此，不唯胆勇将佐动为兵众所误，深虑军气不振，上损国威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163962_comment'></div>欲乞今后主兵官员与贼接战，手下兵士并令军员以下至节级依次约束，如有不用命退却之人，便令军员等于阵前处斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163962_comment'></div>若军员不能部辖，致部伍错乱，却亦令主将即时处斩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163962_comment'></div>所贵士卒畏法，以取胜功。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1163962_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
乐山（龙游）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='e84144ff9f0544c8a0823e765b59d849_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e84144ff9f0544c8a0823e765b59d849");'><span id='e84144ff9f0544c8a0823e765b59d849_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1039&endYear=1039')">1039年</a>，32岁</div><div id='e84144ff9f0544c8a0823e765b59d849' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在龙游，为体量安抚使。韩琦有《题嘉州嘉望亭》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_495955' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495955' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495955?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题嘉州嘉望亭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495955")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495955_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495955'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495955'>欲知藩境得嘉名，试策筇枝上此亭。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495955'>江色照城平似练，岚光堆槛活如屏。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495955'>好遨民阜充衢乐，出品花奇袭坐馨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495955'>使驲暂来闲寓目，几多高意在鸿冥。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495955_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495955'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495955_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在龙游，为体量安抚使。韩琦有《再赋一阕》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_495956' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495956' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495956?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再赋一阕</a><span class='authorDate'>（1039年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495956")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_495956_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495956'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495956'>槛外风光触处奇，岭头金像对巍巍。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495956'>主人偏恋南犍乐，只恐瓜时示肯归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495956_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495956'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495956_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
西安（长安）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='09289890fc8541079308a1ad7c908608_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("09289890fc8541079308a1ad7c908608");'><span id='09289890fc8541079308a1ad7c908608_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>，33岁</div><div id='09289890fc8541079308a1ad7c908608' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　春，韩琦临危受命，安抚陕西。视察边防，责令限期修浚城池，以河北为法修楼橹，制备守御器械，度远近设烽隧。奏请铸铁钱解决财用匿乏的经济状况。奏请留任尽瘁边事、为郡人所德的知延州、振武军节度使范雍。以身家性命担保，举时知越州的范仲淹接替范雍职务。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年2月</a>　或在长安，任陕西安抚使。韩琦有《乾元节陈乞侄景渊恩泽状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163796' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163796' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163796?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乾元节陈乞侄景渊恩泽状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1040年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163796")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163796_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163796'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163796'>右，臣亲逢盛际，获预近班。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163796_comment'></div>无似之才，久叨寄任；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163796_comment'></div>及私之请，尚觊恩荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163796_comment'></div>适丁诞圣之辰，幸均延世之赏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163796_comment'></div>臣有亲侄郊社斋郎景渊，幼亲师学，粗禀义方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163796_comment'></div>当鸣社之发祥，思亢宗而窃禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163796_comment'></div>自天之泽，固浃物以无垠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163796_comment'></div>许国之心，在捐躯而曷报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163796_comment'></div>干冒旒扆，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163796_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年2月</a>　或在长安，任陕西安抚使。二月，韩琦有《乞留范雍奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163966' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163966' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163966?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞留范雍奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163966")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163966_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163966'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163966'>雍二府旧臣，尽瘁边事，边人德之，且乞留雍，以安众心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163966_comment'></div>赵振粗勇，俾为部署可矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163966_comment'></div>若谓雍节制无状，势当必易，则宜召越州范仲淹委任之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163966_comment'></div>方陛下焦劳之际，臣岂敢避形迹不言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163966_comment'></div>若涉朋比，误国家事，当族。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163966_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年2月</a>　或在长安，任陕西安抚使。二月，韩琦有《乞优赐褒赠郭遵及录其子孙奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163967' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163967' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163967?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞优赐褒赠郭遵及录其子孙奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163967")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163967_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163967'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163967'>昨者夏虏寇延州，有西路都巡检使、侍禁、閤门祗候郭遵从刘平与贼战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163967_comment'></div>有跨马舞二剑以出，大呼云：「欲斗将者」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163967_comment'></div>平问诸将，无敢敌者，遵独请行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163967_comment'></div>因上马舞二铁简与贼格斗，贼应手脑碎，馀众遂却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163967_comment'></div>顷之，遵又横大𨧱刀率百馀人进陷虏阵，至其帐而还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163967_comment'></div>凡三出三入，所杀者几百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163967_comment'></div>遵马倒，为贼所害，闻贼中皆叹服其勇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163967_comment'></div>乞优赐褒赠，及录其子孙。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1163967_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年3月</a>　在长安，任陕西安抚使。三月，韩琦遍历边塞，及时向皇帝陈奏利害，包括敌我形势对比、边将能否、地理远近、边户向背诸多问题。作品：《周历边塞陈利害奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163888' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163888' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163888?labeling=true' target='_blank'>周历边塞陈利害奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163888")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163888_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163888'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163888'>臣素昧兵机，不经边任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163888_comment'></div>昨以寇犯延塞，陕右惊骚，陛下不以臣非才，俾用安集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163888_comment'></div>臣受命引道，径趋西陲，昼则奔走长途，夜则评遣局事，凡至边郡，率须宴犒，故经度廉采，不能纤悉究知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163888_comment'></div>然前语以谓口说不如亲逢，耳闻不如目见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163888_comment'></div>今既周历疆鄙，管见所得，粗有一二，思欲归觐之日面陈旒扆之前，又虑后于事机，先合敷奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163888_comment'></div>臣窃以昊贼包藏逆志，积有岁年，朝廷待之不疑，养成凶慝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163888_comment'></div>今甲马雄盛，金帛富饶，诱纳亡命之徒，助成狡计，与贼迁跳梁之日，事势其实百倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163888_comment'></div>故敢驱胁丑类，直扰延安，破寨逼城，号三十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163888_comment'></div>且朝廷命刘平统兵三路，盖极一时之选，石元孙委任次焉，已并为之擒矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163888_comment'></div>偏裨之勇鸷者，如郭遵、万俟政、孟方、张异者，又为俘馘矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163888_comment'></div>藩篱熟户李士彬、米之顺、李思忠之族，亦为之降且虏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163888_comment'></div>戍卒陷殁者，盖不啻万人，诸路闻风，惕然丧气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163888_comment'></div>彼贼气焰，从而可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163888_comment'></div>范雍缘此降移，已有赵振为代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163888_comment'></div>今延州之民兵虽益，而未补于旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163888_comment'></div>若范雍之策虑弹压，刘平之谋勇有望，裨将郭遵辈之骁悍敢斗，后来者未闻过之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163888_comment'></div>所存熟户既难以自保，不无去就之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163888_comment'></div>而又鄜州去延安止二小程，其城周围二十四里，跨二土山在其中，正当狗道岭贼马来路，川原坦阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163888_comment'></div>昨来张守诲应卒缮营，甚未固备，制度低小，木植细弱，其垂钟板尽以人户独扇门为之，至今无材料修换。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163888_comment'></div>王德基到任后，再行计度，人工材木万数甚多，转运司又无可应副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163888_comment'></div>近知张亢交替，便有物力营葺，亦须冬末了毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163888_comment'></div>况在城所屯兵马，不满三千之数，万一贼计不测，直攻鄜州，但恐即日备御未能固守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163888_comment'></div>鄜州既不能守，则延州城寨非朝廷之有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163888_comment'></div>况鄜延一带，系昊贼纳款之时出入道路，山川险易，尽曾涉历，而复咫尺银夏，便于巢穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163888_comment'></div>臣窃虑出其不意，再来奔突，故捍御之备，宜以鄜延为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163888_comment'></div>鄜延若有重兵，必无深入之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163888_comment'></div>其次则环州最逼贼境，新用刘兴知州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163888_comment'></div>庆州久缺部署，高继隆、张崇俊虽有心力，不经行阵，未可全然倚任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163888_comment'></div>驻泊都监之内，亦无得力之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163888_comment'></div>夏竦节制泾原等路，复用葛怀敏副之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163888_comment'></div>若取其谋智，则怀敏非夏竦之比；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163888_comment'></div>若籍其勇战，则怀敏平生未识偏伍，亦与一书生无异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163888_comment'></div>鄜延、泾原本设经略使二员，分护诸将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163888_comment'></div>自范雍得罪之后，更不选人，经略一司已明无用，是徒使夏竦惧而求免，岂能成功？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163888_comment'></div>唯秦凤一路去贼甚远，比之别路，未足多虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163888_comment'></div>同州、河中府与鄜延不遥，宿兵策应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163888_comment'></div>魏昭炳、王克基未尝出离京阙，便使领众御戎，昨来暂至延州，皆已破胆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163888_comment'></div>加以诸路城寨，军屯势分，大抵一州之兵半守诸寨，边臣因旧重改，不达时变，谋及废置，率皆异同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1163888_comment'></div>殊不知承平之时边臣无事，竞务增置寨栅，以邀赏恩，止为熟户防家，于国家实有何益！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1163888_comment'></div>至今孤囚军旅，蓄聚资粮，犬羊众来，举以遗寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1163888_comment'></div>所在将帅，例复失和，妒能害功，动致矛盾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1163888_comment'></div>东兵骄而好走，内臣战则失利，此方今之大弊也，臣深为朝廷忧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1163888_comment'></div>兼逐处主兵臣寮多为不益得兵马，无不恐怯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1163888_comment'></div>朝廷又举昔年之数，止绝陈乞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1163888_comment'></div>臣窃料剧贼果复倾竭种落，并侵一路，彼众我寡，战必败亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1163888_comment'></div>所至婴城避其锋锐，因而长驱关辅，人户惊逃，大邑富居，任其屠掠，都辇之下，岂不动摇？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1163888_comment'></div>陛下宜访帷幄之嘉谋，审攻守之良算，早图平殄，以安生灵，盖非臣浅虑所及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1163888_comment'></div>臣今为陛下计者，莫若差锐兵三五千，或于同州、河中府等处分减，进屯鄜州，选才望大臣一员，复本路经略之任，兼知鄜州，处置边事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1163888_comment'></div>令张亢就充本路钤辖，于鄜州驻泊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1163888_comment'></div>用朱观知环州，就差葛怀敏充环庆部署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1163888_comment'></div>如朝廷必以经略一司更不合置，即乞专于鄜州益兵，使葛怀敏知泾州，充替夏竦，自然事体均一，不挠边臣之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1163888_comment'></div>早赐选差才勇帅臣充环庆部署，令秦州曹琮兼管干泾原路兵马公事，准备分擘秦凤闲兵，互相策应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1163888_comment'></div>其沿边堡寨，除自来系大寨广屯兵马之处外，其馀孤小寨栅，断自朝廷，专委经略部署司，须得移那兵马，分食旧积粮草，无使馀羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1163888_comment'></div>然后并兵入城，只留人员兵士三二十人，以为斥候，量事更差弓箭手防护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1163888_comment'></div>所在沿边路分都监、都巡检等阙额，即于诸班新换右职臣僚内选差催发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1163888_comment'></div>其河中府、同州部署、钤辖，别差稍知边事臣僚充替魏昭炳、王克基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1163888_comment'></div>所有沿边州军招置蕃落、保捷等指挥，多是本土勇悍之人，只为拘定等杖，失人甚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1163888_comment'></div>亦乞速降指挥，催促招收，但以人材壮勇、堪任披带者充，今后更不拘等杖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1163888_comment'></div>愚短所见，愿早裁择。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_58_1163888'></div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1163888_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年4月</a>　在长安，任陕西安抚使。四月，韩琦为总管刘平辩诬伸冤，使平妻子得推恩。为死事之臣请赙赠。作品：《总管刘平忠勇奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163937' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163937' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163937?labeling=true' target='_blank'>总管刘平忠勇奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年四月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163937")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163937_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163937'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163937'>平以疲兵数千，敌贼十馀万众，昼夜力战，为德和所累，既就擒，犹詈贼不已，忠勇无愧于古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163937_comment'></div>今以诬言所惑，悯忠恤孤之典未下，边臣岂不解体乎！</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163937_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年4月</a>　在长安，任陕西安抚使。四月，韩琦有《乞许富民自雇人夫修城奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163968' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163968' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163968?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞许富民自雇人夫修城奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年四月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163968")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163968_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163968'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163968'>庆、鄜、泾三州调民修城，有妨农种，复少兵士以代夫役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163968_comment'></div>今请听富民自雇人夫修筑，三万工与太庙斋郎，五万工与试监簿或同学究，七万工与簿、尉，八万工与借职，十万工与奉职。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163968_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年5月</a>　五月，韩琦以枢密直学士与范仲淹同为陕西经略安抚副使，同管干都总管公事。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　约在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。韩琦有《代张若谷密学举官自代状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163789' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163789' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163789?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代张若谷密学举官自代状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1040年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163789")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163789_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163789'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163789'>右，臣伏睹右谏议大夫、充集贤院学士任中师，器识渊通，行能淳固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163789_comment'></div>奉诤臣之职，式罄忠规；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163789_comment'></div>陪书殿之游，素精儒业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163789_comment'></div>惟是别卿之亚，实参司寇之崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163789_comment'></div>宜择干良，以重名器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163789_comment'></div>愿回误及之宠，擢兹当用之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163789_comment'></div>臣今举充自代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163789_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1163789_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年6月</a>　在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。六月，韩琦劾奏不能力战的庆州驻泊神卫军，请求由枢密院给与众遁归的右厢都指挥使刘兴以处分。作品：《乞罢免处分刘兴奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163969' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163969' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163969?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞罢免处分刘兴奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年六月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163969")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163969_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163969'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163969'>庆州驻神卫军昨随刘平救延州，战殁者才十一二，本军右厢都指挥使刘兴皆与众遁归，比令分屯邠宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163969_comment'></div>缘系近上禁军，不能力战，以致陷覆主将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163969_comment'></div>若朝廷一切不问，则无以励众心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163969_comment'></div>且欲罢归，令枢密院处分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163969_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。韩琦奏请免除科扰频仍的陕西路括市战马。作品：《乞免括陕西战马奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163965' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163965' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163965?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞免括陕西战马奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163965")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163965_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163965'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163965'>陕西科扰频仍，民不胜其困，请免括此一路，安众心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_0_1163965_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。韩琦奏请慎重增加点募强壮数，以免扰民。除商、虢二州外，其它州县见管乡村选差弓手更不差强壮，所差弓手即减税免役，要立阶级，分教习。并着为条约，使后来者有据可依。作品：《乞不点集强壮只差弓奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163963' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163963' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163963?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞不点集强壮只差弓手奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163963")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163963_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163963'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163963'>转运司及郡县尚未点集，必谨重此事，虑有惊扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163963_comment'></div>盖民情既为强壮，且忧刺以充军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163963_comment'></div>本路近尝添差弓手，耳目皆已习熟，必无疑惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163963_comment'></div>请除商、虢二州外，各于逐县见管乡村三丁以下主户内选差一名充弓手，更不差强壮，使减税，免立阶级，分番教习，著为条约甚备。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163963_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　韩琦奏请罢汰懦怯将佐，停诸州上供不急之物。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。韩琦奏请陈淑度等上书陈边防策的人徙边任，以开示朝廷诚意来人才。作品：《乞任用陈叔度等奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163964' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163964' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163964?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞任用陈叔度等奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163964")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163964_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163964'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163964'>士忠义愤懑，为国献计，虽稍取用，乃置于僻左，实羁縻之，何得自效？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163964_comment'></div>非所以开示诚意来人才也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163964_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年8月</a>　在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。八月，韩琦陈奏用兵练卒之策。诏从之。作品：《陈用兵练卒之策奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163889' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163889' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163889?labeling=true' target='_blank'>陈用兵练卒之策奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年八月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163889")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163889_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163889'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163889'>沿边总管、钤辖下，指挥、使臣甚众，每御敌皆临时分领兵马，而不经训练服习，将未知士之勇怯，士未服将之威惠，以是数致败衄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163889_comment'></div>昨诸班中选武艺优者为寨主监押，然拘于一城，未能各适其用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163889_comment'></div>欲下陕西都总管司，择所试中人，鄜延路十五员，环庆、泾原、秦凤路各十员，为逐路教押军阵，分逐州禁军，各令主之，以士卒所习精粗，御敌胜负，重行赏罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163889_comment'></div>如此，则兵之勇懦者得以悉谙，又有赏罚驱之，必各思奋身，复免主将争占精兵，专为己卫也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163889_comment'></div>自古临敌取胜，必有奇兵，若并力出攻，则所向皆溃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163889_comment'></div>今兵卒非无骁果胆力出于侪类，缘分在逐指挥，每指挥不过三二十人，与中常之兵混而为一，御敌之际，势分力寡，多为懦卒所累，虽欲挺身奋击，其可得乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163889_comment'></div>欲乞委臣与范仲淹、庞籍等分路于屯驻、驻泊并本土厢、禁军内，选马上使𨧱刀、枪、槊、铁鞭、铁简、棍棒，勇力过人者，为平羌指挥，以五百为额，其衣粮加龙卫，而立骁捷之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163889_comment'></div>鄜延、环庆、泾原、秦凤四路，各置两指挥，本路土兵一指挥，屯驻、驻泊兵士一指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163889_comment'></div>鄜延路屯延州、鄜州，环庆路屯环州、庆州，泾原路屯泾州，镇戎军、秦凤路并屯秦州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163889_comment'></div>若已请龙卫已上请受者，即以为节级；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163889_comment'></div>若后来阙人，即选试殿前马步军司龙卫以下诸指挥武艺有勇力者补填之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163889_comment'></div>本路土兵，止选于就粮指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163889_comment'></div>其选中屯驻、驻泊兵士，听三年以代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163889_comment'></div>仍令诸州军揭榜以募，投平羌者，送经略司拣试，给禁军例物外，别给钱十千、绢十疋，无马者以牡马给之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1163889_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年9月</a>　在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。九月，韩琦有《三川寨官军陷没事奏》。请求减轻对战败将领刘继宗等人的处罚，对表现特别勇猛的将官王珪免罪。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二；《韩魏公家传》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163890' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163890' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163890?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三川寨官军陷没事奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定元年九月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163890")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163890_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163890'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163890'>时泾州驻泊都监王圭屯瓦亭寨，率援兵至师子堡，贼围之数重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163890_comment'></div>圭谕军中曰：「此死地也，不可不用命」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163890_comment'></div>乃挥铁鞭进斗，贼众披靡，圭中三矢而还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163890_comment'></div>番贼留军大掠三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163890_comment'></div>知渭州、钤辖郭志高率大兵趋三川，贼乃退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163890_comment'></div>三班借职郭伦固守定州堡，得不陷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163890_comment'></div>刘璠堡本军指挥使、散直王遇，弓箭手都虞候刘用，以事急出降，遂并陷乾沟、乾河、赵福三堡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163890_comment'></div>然继宗来权本军方一日，而李纬等未曾经历行阵，仓卒出战，而士卒畏怯，遂至退衄，使黠虏恣行杀掠而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163890_comment'></div>其刘继宗、李纬、王秉望特免推鞫，不以败兵马多少计罪，但量其情之轻重，等第削官，或更移降差遣，以责后效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163890_comment'></div>王圭以孤军千馀当锋血战，所杀贼兵不少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163890_comment'></div>既被重创，次日尚求益兵出战，人皆服其勇节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163890_comment'></div>虽所亡数多，盖众寡不敌，欲望贷其败军之罪，必能敢励奋身，尽死为报。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1163890_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　韩琦乘元昊胜利疏忽之际，派大将任福奇袭白豹城，给元昊一重击。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1040&endYear=1040')">1040年</a>　在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。韩琦有《永兴招讨太尉启二》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='852262a5a29b43b08af42a57e3b58a55_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("852262a5a29b43b08af42a57e3b58a55");'><span id='852262a5a29b43b08af42a57e3b58a55_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>，34岁</div><div id='852262a5a29b43b08af42a57e3b58a55' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　或在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。春，韩琦有《任福兵败乞待罪奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。此条活动具体地点不详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1163971' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163971' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163971?labeling=true' target='_blank'>任福兵败乞待罪奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（康定二年春）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163971")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163971_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163971'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163971'>臣罄所领将士以御贼，独居孤垒之中，日俟胜捷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163971_comment'></div>而福等不依臣指纵，邀其归路，以致败亡，上挫国威，愿正显戮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163971_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年2月</a>　二月，由于前线将领意见不一，朝廷对于攻守也开始举棋不定。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年2月</a>　闻元昊阅兵，韩琦行边到镇戎军召诸将会议，部署备战。大军出发，再三告诫主将任福，持重，勿贪利而为贼诱。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年2月</a>　二月，好水川惨败，韩琦引咎待罪。得降一官处分。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年2月</a>　在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。二月，韩琦有《乞坚守攻策勿以异议沮兵奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_1163891' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163891' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163891?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞坚守攻策勿以异议沮兵奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历元年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1041年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163891")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163891_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163891'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163891'>累准诏问促令进兵，及令分析向去有何方略授与诸路，即委不误事，遂与夏竦参定攻守二策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163891_comment'></div>臣探知冬月昊贼未能举动之际，兼程赴阙求对进呈，乞赐裁择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163891_comment'></div>寻下两府大臣商议，只取攻策施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163891_comment'></div>臣屡曾面奏兹事体大，系于安危，若陛下决知可行，两府大臣主议不变，或能集事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163891_comment'></div>今臣方归本司，而横议日腾，朝听已惑，攻讨之说，比比劄下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163891_comment'></div>且朝廷举大事，主大谋，自当坚如金石，无有回易，时降诏旨，激励将士，沮军事者约束行法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163891_comment'></div>今乃深忧重虑，必谓无成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163891_comment'></div>况鄜延路范仲淹意在招纳，更不出兵，虽具奏闻，乞依元策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163891_comment'></div>假若朝廷强之使进，终是本非己谋，将佐闻之，必无锐志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163891_comment'></div>今已二月将半，渐有暑气，必难进兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163891_comment'></div>臣此来奉行成算，非是年壮气锐，虑不及远，幸而求胜，以误国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163891_comment'></div>诚以昊贼据数州之地，精兵不出四五万，馀皆老弱妇女，举族而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163891_comment'></div>陕西四路之兵虽不为少，即缘屯列城寨，势分力弱，故贼始犯延安，生擒二将，屠掠无数者，盖刘平、石元孙聚一路之兵拒之，才及九千而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163891_comment'></div>去岁秋末，复有镇戎之败，刘继宗等分兵御捍，不满万人，比援兵之至，则贼已捷归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163891_comment'></div>是则彼势常专，我力常散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163891_comment'></div>今中外不究此失，遂乃待贼太过，屯二十万重兵，只守界壕，不敢与敌，中夏之弱，自古未有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163891_comment'></div>又闻臣僚坚执守议，以为必胜之术者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163891_comment'></div>臣恐春失数寨，秋陷数堡，边障日虚，士气日丧，贼志乘此则有吞陕右之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163891_comment'></div>加以兴师以来，科歛万计，民已大困，配率不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163891_comment'></div>去年秋稔，尚窘急如此，忽有水旱，其何以堪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163891_comment'></div>臣近过邠、乾、泾、渭等州，所至人户经臣有状称为不任科率，乞行减放。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163891_comment'></div>内潘原县郭下绢丝行人十馀家，每家配借钱七十贯文，哀诉求免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163891_comment'></div>国用削弱，以至于此，缘转运司计无所出，臣是以不敢邀爱民之誉，直行放免，恐相矛盾，上烦朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163891_comment'></div>臣恐一二年间，经费益蹙，人情大骚，师老思归，及期无代，每虑至此，臣难尽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163891_comment'></div>望陛下省群言之难一，为大事之当慎，知其异议已沮师期，且令诸路置办军须，训整兵马，俟及初秋，若范仲淹招怀未见其效，则别命近臣以观贼隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163891_comment'></div>如必须讨击，即乞断在不疑，尅日降旨，则庶事已办，便可进兵。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1163891_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年</a>　在长安，任陕西经略安抚副使。韩琦有《永兴招讨太尉启一》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b866882a36264b6b9c65eef7f2dcbf1d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b866882a36264b6b9c65eef7f2dcbf1d");'><span id='b866882a36264b6b9c65eef7f2dcbf1d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>，36岁</div><div id='b866882a36264b6b9c65eef7f2dcbf1d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年8月</a>　八月，韩琦为陕西宣抚使。在陕西，擒捕群盗张海、郭藐三等，安抚关辅。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1043&endYear=1043')">1043年</a>　是年冬，韩琦在陕西赈济灾民、蠲免赋役、升能吏、黜不才，停放疲老冗兵。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='ceee1bf7764a4fb88d57bd0996c05119_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ceee1bf7764a4fb88d57bd0996c05119");'><span id='ceee1bf7764a4fb88d57bd0996c05119_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1068')">1067-1068年</a>，60-61岁</div><div id='ceee1bf7764a4fb88d57bd0996c05119' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《永兴军谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十。）</span><div id='poem_1163758' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163758' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163758?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴军谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163758")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163758_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163758'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163758'>臣某言：奉敕差判永兴军府、充陕府西路经略安抚使、兵马都总管，已于今月十一日上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163758_comment'></div>避贤而罢，方获典于乡邦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163758_comment'></div>改帅以行，复误膺于圣寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163758_comment'></div>易昼锦还家之乐，为夕冰将命之优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163758_comment'></div>虽已见于吏民，惧不胜其责任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163758_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以自陕而右，惟雍处中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163758_comment'></div>昔日用兵，尝并制于诸路；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163758_comment'></div>平时无事，遂分总于中权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163758_comment'></div>然而势不相维，事难克协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163758_comment'></div>或左有防虞，而右弗思于援助；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163758_comment'></div>或彼专严戢，而此姑尚于因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163758_comment'></div>致边备之寖隳，实议臣之同病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163758_comment'></div>欲正元戎之法，式钦睿算之精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163758_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下禀大舜之聪明，迈成汤之勇智。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163758_comment'></div>谓堂上之兵必胜，犹贵任人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163758_comment'></div>而阃外之制不专，胡能治众？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163758_comment'></div>俾悉归于节度，当谨择于材雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163758_comment'></div>而臣久冒冢司，积成衰疹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163758_comment'></div>适恳章之屡渎，得本郡以荣归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163758_comment'></div>不图乘障之臣，骤有邀功之举，一开边隙，上轸旰朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163758_comment'></div>命更领于麾符，敢幸安于桑梓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163758_comment'></div>慨然就道，遽尔之藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163758_comment'></div>心目所经，颇谙详于旧事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163758_comment'></div>精神之用，已耗竭于当年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163758_comment'></div>兹惟仗国威灵，挺身忠义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163758_comment'></div>导天声之震怒，宣上德之宽仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163758_comment'></div>外以图疆埸之亟宁，内以务编齐之无扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163758_comment'></div>关中安堵，茍粗底于小康；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163758_comment'></div>邺下养疴，愿祗还于故守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163758_comment'></div>荷谕言之无戏，期病质之少休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163758_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1163758_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年12月</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。十二月，韩琦到达长安，由于种谔在没有朝廷命令的情况下擅取绥州，因此事受到处分。碍于天朝大国的面子，朝廷打算归还西夏绥州。结果此时发生了西人诱杀杨定事件，此时韩琦已认为绥州不应放弃了。很快又是年仅二十一岁的西夏国主谅祚在“战数败、将求和”时病死，韩琦认为此时绥州更不可放弃了。而此时在中央最有发言权的枢密使文彦博、吕公弼碍于面子（耻于中变），竟然要求放弃绥州。韩琦据理条陈，刚即位的神宗最终采纳了韩琦的建议，不弃绥州。作品：《绥州不可弃奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163927' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163927' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163927?labeling=true' target='_blank'>绥州不可弃奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平四年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163927")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163927_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163927'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163927'>西贼诱害朝廷沿边知军、巡检、朝臣，不接诏匣，其贺登极与贺正人使，亦更不来过界，则是不复顾藉和好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163927_comment'></div>朝廷因而止住岁赐，令边上常作用兵之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163927_comment'></div>既两相隔绝，即彼此各择利而求胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163927_comment'></div>朝廷今已纳其降人嵬名山以下及诸首领几万人，令在折继世下御敌西贼，若尽拨在近里城寨居止，不惟无地可处，兼逐首领亦未必肯与本族下人户分作两处住坐，虑人情不安，别生它变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163927_comment'></div>况见有已修就绥州城池，及绥州州内甚有膏腴空闲地土，若令降人嵬名山与折继世等因而据之，其手下人户皆令在绥州州内相近居处，各人知其生业以久，可自存活，自然并力以捍谅祚，似合机会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163927_comment'></div>遂指挥即不得更般粮草赴绥州，亦不得留禁军、厢军在彼驻劄者，非是要久远费国家钱帛粮草，争此无用之地，盖欲以空城付之，使数万必死之兵牵制西人，常令屯守堤防，旷日持久，自当疲弊，不敢并聚凶丑，于别路作过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163927_comment'></div>及令诸路更作困挠之策，则冀其早来请命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163927_comment'></div>今已纳其降人，得城与地，而反自弃之，乃是先形自弱之势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163927_comment'></div>且兵主于势，自结隙以来，西人屡入屡败，其所获首级不少，我之兵势方振，而遽自弱之，使彼见其形而侮慢不已，向去虽欲屈就，必益骄蹇而难合也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163927_comment'></div>况朝廷前降指挥许以绥州城与嵬名山住坐，亦是全朝廷信约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163927_comment'></div>若更厚抚继世、嵬名山，使过所望，则必各尽死力，以报朝廷，是以夷狄而攻夷狄，于国用别无所耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163927_comment'></div>万一二人者他日不能抗而失之，亦不系国家边鄙利害，则谅祚所伤所损，固亦不胜其计矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163927_comment'></div>臣谓薛向、贾逵等擘画到上件事理，委是于国家即今边计为便，可以施行，非是听用轻躁庸近、邀功生事之人浅妄之说，以救全向、谔之失也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163927_comment'></div>谨遣走马承受冯德诚乘传以闻，愿早赐可。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1163927_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年12月</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。十二月，韩琦有《夏国主谅祚死尤不宜弃绥州奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163928' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163928' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163928?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夏国主谅祚死尤不宜弃绥州奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平四年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163928")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163928_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163928'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163928'>当此变故，尤非弃州之时，愿且留数月，以观虏情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163928_comment'></div>他日再许纳款，犹可为议论之端，或令别立疆界，或换易塞门旧寨，或予之，拒求降人之请，是时取舍皆在朝廷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163928_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年12月</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。十二月，韩琦有《乞定夺绥州弃否利害奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163929' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163929' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163929?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞定夺绥州弃否利害奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（治平四年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163929")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163929_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163929'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163929'>臣当职无状，上烦圣慈委曲开谕，夙夜不胜愧恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163929_comment'></div>然臣始欲留绥城，令继世与降人同处者，盖以西人与朝廷隔绝之后，欲降众有地可居，而因以抗贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163929_comment'></div>既西人来告谅祚之哀，则边事又有变易，朝廷下次必须许令复好，故乞留此绥城，只备数月之粮，差人防守，贵与商议时易为束缚，存得朝廷久远事势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163929_comment'></div>今若朝廷以臣前议为是，即乞责郭逵依此照管；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163929_comment'></div>如不系议和利害，亦乞直行弃毁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163929_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>　或在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《赐夏国主诏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_1163685' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163685' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163685?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赐夏国主诏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163685")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163685_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163685'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163685'>昨以夏国累年以来，数兴兵甲，侵犯疆陲，惊扰人民，诱迫熟户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163685_comment'></div>去秋乃复直叩大顺，围迫城寨，焚烧村落，抗敌官军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163685_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1163685", 1163685, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>边奏</span>屡闻，人情共愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163685_comment'></div>群臣皆谓夏国已违誓诏，请行拒绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163685_comment'></div>先皇帝务存含恕，且诘端由，庶观逆顺之情，以决众多之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163685_comment'></div>逮此逊章之禀命，已悲仙驭之上宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163685_comment'></div>朕纂极云初，包荒在念，仰循先志，俯谅乃诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163685_comment'></div>既自省于前辜，复愿坚于永好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163685_comment'></div>茍奏封所叙，忠信无渝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163685_comment'></div>则恩礼所加，岁时如旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163685_comment'></div>安民保福，不亦休哉！</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163685_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年2月</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。二月，韩琦有《乞再申明增立赏格奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1164001' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164001' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164001?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞再申明增立赏格奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164001")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164001_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164001'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164001'>访得延州东路都巡检燕达等败贼于怀宁，其蕃官及首领等例各以亲斫到首级论功，皆不知官员将校与蕃官首领，并统计手下人杀获与输折人数，较计赏罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164001_comment'></div>所是人员兵士杀到首级，惟得支赐，其转资者只该说临阵对贼、先锋驰入、陷阵突众为奇功，及生擒贼人、斫动贼寨之类，方得此赏，即不载主将亲见阵前效命得力及全队入贼，因而得胜，各与转资明文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164001_comment'></div>望再申明，增立赏格，下逐路经略司，庶得兵官将校与蕃官首领各知只以率众破贼，手下人都得首级计功，长行、兵士等亦以敢战效命、阵前得力、全队胜贼者各得转资，不争首级，动取胜捷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1164001_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《请宗室补外官奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163947' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163947' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163947?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请宗室补外官奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163947")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163947_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163947'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163947'>祖宗之初，本支未广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163947_comment'></div>今诸邸蕃衍，前世未有此比，而但处之诸宅，略无措置，甚非永远之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163947_comment'></div>当参酌唐制，使补外官。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163947_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《改配诸军五服内亲事奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163948' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163948' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163948?labeling=true' target='_blank'>改配诸军五服内亲事奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163948")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163948_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163948'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163948'>诸军多是弟侄子孙以父兄尊属在军，遂愿投本营同活；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163948_comment'></div>或无子孙者，即召本营人为舍婿，冀一身有托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163948_comment'></div>更有堂从疏属有服外亲充军，后有卑幼补为人员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163948_comment'></div>若一旦尽改配别指挥，恐军中人情未允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163948_comment'></div>只大名一府，禁军合移者已五十馀人，在京与诸路恐移避者人数不少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163948_comment'></div>请辖下有尊长，唯副指挥以上被转人与转移，其馀止移别都。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1163948_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《夏国乞遣使诣阙告谅祚之哀事奏》<span class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163930'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163930'>西夏自诱害杨定以来，与朝廷相绝，今遽遣使来告，即见其国内饥丧，乘此危迫，故急来赴诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163930_comment'></div>此时若来，且以彼国前后违犯誓诏之事先行诘责，及令缚送害定等人李崇贵、白供奉等归朝廷行遣，以雪数家之冤，以正国体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163930_comment'></div>俟其一一顺服，然后开纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163930_comment'></div>苟便如元昊身死之初，亟行小童册命之礼，且要无事，即恐一失机会，转难控制。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163930_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《夏国告哀人若不求议乞许兴城寨以为震慑奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163931' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163931' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163931?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夏国告哀人若不求议乞许兴城寨以为震慑奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年）</span></a><span "poem_title_1163931")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163931_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163931'><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《乞不添补河北强壮奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163943' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163943' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163943?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞不添补河北强壮奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163943")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163943_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163943'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163943'>河北强壮，自庆历二年拣刺义勇之时，下等短弱之人并退充刺负强壮，于帐内别项桩管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163943_comment'></div>至今近三十年，州县以退下人数更不差填。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163943_comment'></div>今一路久罹灾困，非是添补强壮之时，愿罢取索，以安众心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163943_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《乞修展保州关城奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163944' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163944' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163944?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞修展保州城奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163944")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163944_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163944'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163944'>保州闻欲展城，军民莫不欣喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163944_comment'></div>况雄州、高阳关皆尝修展，不闻引惹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163944_comment'></div>既非创筑，于虏势无嫌，愿亟城之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163944_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《乞筑筚栗城奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163932' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163932' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163932?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞筑筚栗城奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163932")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163932_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163932'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163932'>秦凤路沿边累为西人侵掠，西番熟户日失藩篱之固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163932_comment'></div>昨郭逵已筑治平、鸡川二寨，包入熟户疆土不少，若更脩筚栗城一两处，则西与古渭寨相接，方成外御之势。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163932_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《乞筑筚栗城利害奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163933' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163933' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163933?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论筑筚栗城利害奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163933")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163933_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163933'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163933'>窃观汉世图制匈奴，患其西兼诸国，故表河列郡，谓之断匈奴右臂，隔绝南羌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163933_comment'></div>今西夏所据，盖多得匈奴之故地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163933_comment'></div>自昔取一时之议废弃灵州以来，因失断臂之势，故德明、元昊更无忌惮，得以吞噬西番，以至甘、凉、瓜、肃诸郡，皆为贼有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163933_comment'></div>势既大，至宝元初，始敢僭号，以背朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163933_comment'></div>是时贼方与诸路边兵相攻战，故秦、渭一带西番未暇窥夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163933_comment'></div>臣庆历初曾知秦州，今二十六七年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163933_comment'></div>是时永宁、安远之北，绵亘一二百里之外，皆是西番熟户，其间有不授补职名目，官中亦不勾点彼族兵马者，则谓之生户，并与熟户交居，共为篱落，故秦州最号藩篱之壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163933_comment'></div>讫元昊纳款，未尝侵犯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163933_comment'></div>只自庆历通好后来，西人以寇抄为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163933_comment'></div>见秦、渭间西番最为繁盛，又为我之降人，献说以谓西界诸郡富贵，广有所出，可以先取西番，然后以兵扼要害，则西川诸郡亦皆得之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163933_comment'></div>遂一向攻胁，秦、渭诸番大半为其所属，浸淫直逼秦州西路城寨，比庆历中藩篱大段薄弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163933_comment'></div>近年西人复将西市城修葺，建为保泰军，于其中修盖行衙，闻甚宏壮，命伪驸马花麻总领之，只去古渭寨一百二十里，即近蔡挺与白知军者公文往来之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163933_comment'></div>去汉界之近如此，自前未有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163933_comment'></div>又秦州上丁族瞎药恕质其父斯铎心，及逃去与木征相合，木征者即唂厮啰之孙瞎毡之子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163933_comment'></div>其木征、瞎药更与自来秦州多点集不赴、广有力量青塘族相结谋，立文法，去西界所建西市城甚近，阴与夏人通款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163933_comment'></div>若渐次尽为西夏所诱，不独古渭孤危，秦州西路城寨日为贼逼，则其董毡一带至回纥以来般次尽为阻隔，秦州茶马自亦稀绝，可谓秦寨之深患也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163933_comment'></div>与臣二十六七年前在秦州时，边事变易全然不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163933_comment'></div>臣不因再忝西帅，亦不能知此仔细。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163933_comment'></div>所以久在西陲、谙知边事者，皆谓城筚栗则可与鸡川、古渭通，成外御之势，隔绝得西人吞并古渭一带诸番与瞎药、木征、青塘等族相结之患，少得前世所谓断臂之策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163933_comment'></div>兼自来麟、延、环庆、泾原等路沿边例皆以城塞包卫熟户，使诸族知有家计，则可以相为表里，号为篱落之固。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163933_comment'></div>不然，则诸族老小散居山谷田野间，去城寨稍远，西贼一来，官军既难救应，则尽为贼所杀掠，此安可谓之篱落也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163933_comment'></div>臣复见泾原路原州有明朱、灭臧、唐奴三族，广有人力，以居处恃险，从来点集不赴，屡杀官军，出入西界买卖，都无忌疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163933_comment'></div>庆历中，每西人入寇，则前为乡导，同为抄劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163933_comment'></div>后来范仲淹遂于三族之北，与西界相接处修置靖安、绥宁二寨，佛空平、耳朵城二堡，其明朱等三族于是不敢作过，听从点集，始为篱落之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163933_comment'></div>臣今所以乞城筚栗者，非好生事也，盖欲因与西人议事未复好间，乘此机会，可以城之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163933_comment'></div>既城此，则经久有臣前所陈之利；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163933_comment'></div>忽而不为，则它日有臣前所陈之害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163933_comment'></div>故城与不城，其利害实系于国家，而不系于臣，在朝廷之深算也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163933_comment'></div>若谓其修城之后，又有积兵聚粮之费，力未能给，臣以为不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163933_comment'></div>盖筚栗既城，则秦州三阳、伏羌、永宁、来远、宁远诸寨，却在近里，可以均匀抽减逐寨之兵，往彼屯泊，更有创置酒税场课利，相兼充赡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163933_comment'></div>复闻筚栗城侧近有隙地，自可招置弓箭手七八百人就使防守，则边防之势，其雄重可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163933_comment'></div>臣今画鄜延、环庆、泾原路沿边城寨对西界小纸图子，黏连在后，陛下观之，则可见今之诸路，例皆以城寨包卫熟户，非妄言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163933_comment'></div>欲望陛下更与二府大臣裁酌可否。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1163933'></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1163933_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《永兴寒食后池》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十一。）</span><div id='poem_496238' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496238' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496238?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴寒食后池</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496238")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496238_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496238'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496238'>春意阴阴百五天，小池萧索会僚贤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496238_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496238'>孤芳映水花终淡，劲竹凌轩节自全。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496238_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496238'>一阵森严林势合，万鱼跳落雨痕圆。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496238_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496238'>当筵暂弭忧边虑，且伏诗魔驾<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>酒船。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496238_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496238'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496238_comment'></div></div><div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年6月</a>　六月，由于韩琦的初始建议，朝廷任命唐代郑国公魏征的后人魏道严为同州司士参军，梁国公狄仁杰的后人前邠州观察推官狄国宾注拟陇州职官一任。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《永兴军乞移乡郡第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163835' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163835' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163835?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴军乞移乡郡第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163835")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163835_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163835'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163835'>臣再倾悃愊，仰叩睿明，天地之仁，必从所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163835_comment'></div>窃念臣自去年秋厚陵终事，即连上章，乞还宰柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163835_comment'></div>不惟以丞弼之任，久愧妨贤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163835_comment'></div>亦自顾疾病之躯，稍期均逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163835_comment'></div>陛下照其诚实，假以恩荣，命守乡邦，以安衰薾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163835_comment'></div>不谓赴任有日，骤然易此帅权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163835_comment'></div>当是时，陛下方宵旰忧边，而臣以忠义内激，不敢茍避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163835_comment'></div>慨然西来，强率昏疲，以答信任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163835_comment'></div>若狡羌肆孽未已，臣固愿以死自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163835_comment'></div>今虑雏归欸，朝廷已议开纳，使人在境，疆候即宁，乃陛下全旧恩，矜老臣，复许其息肩养疾之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163835_comment'></div>兼臣自五月后来，一向藏府不调，故疾相参，困劣殊甚，军书民务，动致滞留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163835_comment'></div>所以沥恳诉天，愿还相州旧任，少谐颐摄，实荷生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163835_comment'></div>伏望圣慈便赐开允指挥，更免累累干犯宸听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163835_comment'></div>臣不胜朝夕俟命、哀祈激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1163835_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《永兴军乞移乡郡第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163836' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163836' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163836?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴军乞移乡郡第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163836")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163836_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163836'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163836'>臣近陈乞还守相州旧任，伏蒙圣慈特降诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163836_comment'></div>愚诚已竭，必觊矜从；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163836_comment'></div>天听未回，唯知泣诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163836_comment'></div>伏念臣禀赋愚朴，既老且病，此当帅职，诚出勉强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163836_comment'></div>若边烽尚警，敢不以死而捍寇雠；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163836_comment'></div>及羌嗣已驯，亦愿养疴而存视息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163836_comment'></div>而陛下谕臣以酋渠向顺，备预于暇时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163836_comment'></div>况今鄜延等四路帅臣，皆是朝廷极选，委以经画，则地近易为处置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163836_comment'></div>臣昨来叨领一道兵寄，盖缘事出权宜，疆候即宁，理当废罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163836_comment'></div>兼臣自入仲夏，便苦积疹淹延，气体久虚，顿觉不任剧事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163836_comment'></div>且犬马有疾，犹能极声长鸣，顾望主恩，幸一宽其守御代劳之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163836_comment'></div>今臣羸惫如此，不胜犬马顾望之情，陛下岂不念之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163836_comment'></div>欲望圣慈更不赐诏答，便降俞旨，令臣还守相州旧任，免填沟壑，上累至仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163836_comment'></div>臣无任朝夕俟命、哀祈激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1163836_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《永兴军乞移乡郡第四札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163837' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163837' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163837?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴军乞移乡郡第四劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163837")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163837_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163837'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163837'>臣三上表奏，乞还守相州，一奉诏答，未蒙赐可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163837_comment'></div>岂礼数未尽，更俟哀祈？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163837_comment'></div>抑愚言甚微，不足感动？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163837_comment'></div>徊惶怵迫，弗知所从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163837_comment'></div>臣伏闻匹夫之有疾病劳苦，必呼天以自声者，安知天之必听也，其意以为洞然在上而临己，无所阂隔，苟呼之，无有不彻而应者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163837_comment'></div>若臣脱宰柄之重，而任总帅之剧，方疆埸有警，岂敢以劳苦辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163837_comment'></div>今羌酋既顺，而宿疹乘臣，乃臣疾痛自呼之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163837_comment'></div>伏况事平之后，许还旧任，大哉圣谕，犹在臣耳，岂同夫高天邈然，不可知其听否也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163837_comment'></div>凡臣声其区区切到之恳于陛下，至于三矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163837_comment'></div>而陛下不即垂听，使臣抱匹夫之疾，而呼犹未已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163837_comment'></div>陛下宁不矜怜之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163837_comment'></div>伏望圣慈察臣所陈，不是矫妄，乃职局当罢、衰病可去之时，俾还乡郡，获养旧疴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163837_comment'></div>物性既安于所宜，君言亦践于无戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163837_comment'></div>天地恩施，糜躯曷酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163837_comment'></div>臣无任祈天俟命、激切震惶之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1163837_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《永兴军乞移乡郡第五札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163838' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163838' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163838?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴军乞移乡郡第五劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163838")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163838_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163838'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163838'>臣今月十二日，男秘书丞充秘阁校理忠彦赉到诏书一道，伏蒙圣慈以臣再上劄子，乞还守相州旧任不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163838_comment'></div>一夫不安其所，尚轸睿慈；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163838_comment'></div>老臣之诉以诚，岂无恩恻？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163838_comment'></div>从而后已，罪敢逃诛！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163838_comment'></div>今诏旨谕臣特以羌变难知，边备宜谨，责臣豫虑，未容辞疾以去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163838_comment'></div>臣复思之，戎心虽未易保，然使人继至，朝廷将许其纳欸，非如训兵伐罪之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163838_comment'></div>在于此时，仅若无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163838_comment'></div>边备虽不可弛，然有诸路守帅，分制阃外，非必多病昏疲之馀，独可倚办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163838_comment'></div>且臣初辞重柄，本祈均佚，今积衰疹，愈难任剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163838_comment'></div>当疾势可治之时，陛下若念其久劳，少赐息肩之地，即异时气体稍完，犹可为陛下之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163838_comment'></div>茍此而不顾，必俟其病及膏肓，先犬马而填沟壑，始怜而信之，固已晚矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163838_comment'></div>伏望早降俞命，俾还旧守，得谐休养，实荷再生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163838_comment'></div>臣无任祈天俟命激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1163838_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《永兴军乞移乡郡第六札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163839' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163839' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163839?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴军乞移乡郡第六劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163839")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163839_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163839'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163839'>臣伏蒙圣慈以臣五上劄子，乞还守相州，特降诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163839_comment'></div>血诚已竭，而君父不为之信；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163839_comment'></div>边患将弭，而朝廷过为之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163839_comment'></div>若不重沥肺肝，必期开允，则老臣孤远，遂同无告之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163839_comment'></div>窃念臣向在近司，已婴宿疹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163839_comment'></div>然当时病根尚浅，筋力粗可支吾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163839_comment'></div>自今久疾以来，精识顿然昏悴，茍不容其治养，得遂少休，则蕞尔微躯，必致溘先朝露，长辞盛世，不尽孤忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163839_comment'></div>且当西衅之初，臣则便膺帅任，虽力效驽浅，而一无毗益，凡所指授，无不亲承庙略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163839_comment'></div>陛下傥许臣罢去，岂无奉行成算之人可继臣之后者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163839_comment'></div>况西人所议，旦夕当禀朝命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163839_comment'></div>若谓事平之后，尚须经画，则臣累陈四路之帅，闻见至近，责之备预，则必人尽所谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163839_comment'></div>当此之时，陛下何惜不早择材者代臣，使还乡任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163839_comment'></div>则臣犬马之贱，荷陛下再生，复免好权窃位、不自量力之毁；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163839_comment'></div>陛下亦无顾遇旧老，强之以疾，有伤恩礼之薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163839_comment'></div>既以保愚臣一介之节，又以彰大君全育之仁，中外闻之，孰云不可！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163839_comment'></div>臣不胜勤勤恳恳，哀祈俟命之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1163839_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《永兴军乞移乡郡第七札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163840' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163840' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163840?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴军乞移乡郡第七劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163840")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163840_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163840'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163840'>臣准枢密院相继递到诏书二道，伏蒙圣慈以臣累上劄子乞还守相州不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163840_comment'></div>呼天以诉，虽若未闻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163840_comment'></div>惟疾自量，固难中止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163840_comment'></div>缘兹得罪，是亦甘心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163840_comment'></div>窃念臣昨罢冢司，获叨乡守，诚知过幸，盖本均劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163840_comment'></div>自西事暴兴，遽然易此帅任，臣不敢辄辞老朽，义当奔赴急难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163840_comment'></div>自到任以来，夙夜经营，卒无明效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163840_comment'></div>加以宠荣之过，灾衅自生，疾病婴缠，殆涉时序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163840_comment'></div>近虽稍能牵强，其如精识顿衰，总制大权，顾尪瘵者岂容冒处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163840_comment'></div>况夏人至延州请命，议事多日，朝廷处置，大得其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163840_comment'></div>闻已许宗道暂还，谅旬浃之间，必再赍誓表过界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163840_comment'></div>则长安开府，理当先罢，以释戎心之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163840_comment'></div>其向去备豫之方，不过浚葺城池，缮完兵械，训练军马，审探事宜，此乃诸路帅臣本职当行之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163840_comment'></div>至于将佐官属，亦悉能选择保荐，又凡事自皆直禀朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163840_comment'></div>则臣之在雍，不同用兵之时，或有施为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163840_comment'></div>朝廷若且要存此虚名，即何人不能胜任？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163840_comment'></div>故臣当此之际，谓陛下可以留念旧物，少垂宽假之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163840_comment'></div>伏望矜宿疹之已深，信德音之前谕，俾臣亟还本郡，少息昏疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163840_comment'></div>则臣馀生，乃陛下所赐，此身未殒，图报可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163840_comment'></div>臣无任孤诚恳切瞻望哀祈之至。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1163840'></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1163840_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，任永兴军知军。韩琦有《永兴军乞移乡郡第八札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163841' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163841' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163841?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永兴军乞移乡郡第八劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163841")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163841_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163841'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163841'>臣男秘书丞充秘阁校理忠彦至，伏蒙圣慈特赐传宣抚谕，以臣疾病，令更自将理，所乞相州，为西事未了，不令更入文字者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163841_comment'></div>陛下遇臣，乃隆于父母之爱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163841_comment'></div>惟臣诉上，亦思尽蝼蚁之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163841_comment'></div>感泣以言，圣明当谅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163841_comment'></div>伏念臣进以孤直，不立朋援，唯知忠义，是为报国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163841_comment'></div>故当艰难险阻之事，未尝辄有辞避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163841_comment'></div>向在两府，通及一十二年，虽身有宿疹，每遇夏秋，复多为脾泄所苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163841_comment'></div>然在假告，近或三四日，远亦不曾出旬，则能出赴朝参，不妨职事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163841_comment'></div>今臣已六十一岁，涉历忧患固多，气血日衰，不能胜任疾病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163841_comment'></div>自入夏来，藏府复泄，胁气乘虚动作，逮月馀日，全然妨废视事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163841_comment'></div>近虽勉强而出，顿觉昏疲，唯是肌骸，止存皮骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163841_comment'></div>臣因自忖度，若疆事未息，且尽此残喘支吾，尚恐有误国家，无益大计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163841_comment'></div>况今羌雏送欸，遣使再叩延安，朝廷已遣韩缜等与议，始虽少有违异，终必俯服从命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163841_comment'></div>臣故于此时，深望陛下念臣攀附二圣，粗竭忠力，特垂旧恩，许臣还守乡邦，少遂休养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163841_comment'></div>况盛时难遇，真主难逢，犹幸一二年间，气体稍完，复思展效，不忍默默，甘与犬马同尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163841_comment'></div>陛下若谓事平之后，尚须处置，缘今四路帅臣所治，皆接西人境界，百闻不如一见，终是易为经营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163841_comment'></div>永兴去诸路各一十馀程，边事既难遥度，不免却牒本路详酌，只是空费文字往还，其实何益？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163841_comment'></div>又，庆历中与契丹再议通好之后，富弼自枢密副使，曾出于河北宣抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163841_comment'></div>及元昊将许封册，是时臣充枢密副使，范仲淹充参知政事，亦曾相继出往陕西、河东宣抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163841_comment'></div>今朝廷将容西人请命，若遣二府大臣，一赴西边经制，事既目睹，则朝廷易为听从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163841_comment'></div>何必责臣久病精神耗竭之馀，谓可倚任，其败事必矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163841_comment'></div>念臣男忠彦回阙，敢附此血恳，重干宸听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163841_comment'></div>伏望天地之造，早允前请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163841_comment'></div>臣不胜孤诚迫切，哀祈俟命之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1163841_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年7月</a>　七月，韩琦自永兴军复请相州以归。诏复知相州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在长安，相州知州任上。由永兴军赴相州途中，韩琦有《初发长安遇雨》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十二。）</span><div id='poem_496273' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496273' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496273?labeling=true' target='_blank'>初发长安遇雨</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496273")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496273_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496273'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496273'>九龙朝发起程初，甘泽滂然洒路衢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496273'>敢倦征途泥没踝，且观嘉谷秀垂珠。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496273'>高原直泻波头恶，弊伞平穿阵势粗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496273'>绣岭任遥须趁宿，莲花汤下洗尘躯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496273_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496273'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496273_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
天水（成纪）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='41f620ea989843178175f04f619e9baa_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("41f620ea989843178175f04f619e9baa");'><span id='41f620ea989843178175f04f619e9baa_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1042')">1041-1042年</a>，34-35岁</div><div id='41f620ea989843178175f04f619e9baa' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年4月</a>　四月，授韩琦右司谏，知秦州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1041&endYear=1041')">1041年8月</a>　在成纪，任秦州知州。韩琦有《贺皇子降生表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163697' class='_poem'><div
