class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>，38岁</div><div id='6fbc0a0522234d86a27cd918fc9e91cf' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年2月22日</a>　二月二十二，韩琦告假回家乡安阳，奉皇考太师韩国华、皇妣仁寿郡太夫人归厝于相州安阳县之新安村，以所生大宁郡太夫人侍葬。同时改葬许多人。韩琦作有多人墓志铭。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年2月22日</a>　在安阳，枢密副使任上。二月二十二，韩琦作有《长兄德清尉墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164140' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164140' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164140?labeling=true' target='_blank'>长兄德清尉墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年2月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164140")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164140_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164140'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164140'>太师长子讳球，字伯玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164140_comment'></div>少有志气，泛览经史，务究大义，不为章句之学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164140_comment'></div>每读书，见古人仗忠义、建功立事者，必抚卷感慨，慕其所为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164140_comment'></div>好拟孟郊作五字句诗，意思清远，人多称咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164140_comment'></div>初以荫补太庙斋郎，选授湖州德清尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164140_comment'></div>擿奸奉法，如老于从政者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164140_comment'></div>太师闻之，喜曰：「此儿他日必为能吏，吾家有望焉」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164140_comment'></div>太师未亡前数月，兄以疾卒，时年三十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164140_comment'></div>娶陈氏，生二子：炜，早亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164140_comment'></div>公彦，今为太常寺太祝，在官以干洁称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164140_comment'></div>庆历五年二月二十二日，以兄从太师葬于相州安阳县新安村西茔之庚位，子炜同葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164140_comment'></div>惟兄高识大器，宜副先公之言，以兴吾宗，不幸初仕而夭，可谓命矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164140_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1164140'>人无寿夭，贵乎嗣续之贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164140_comment'></div>兄今有子矣，夫何恨焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1164140_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年2月22日</a>　在安阳，枢密副使任上。二月二十二，韩琦作有《二兄监簿以下墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164141' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164141' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164141?labeling=true' target='_blank'>二兄监簿以下墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年2月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164141")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164141_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164141'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164141'>太师第二子讳瑄，字仲瑜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164141_comment'></div>性谨厚好学，不杂交游，以荫授将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164141_comment'></div>自太师之亡，兄为长，事母仁寿郡太夫人尽孝，治家有法，宗族间爱而惮之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164141_comment'></div>仁寿久寓居京师，欲徙家于许，兄往营其事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164141_comment'></div>过许田县洧河之石桥，遇水暴涨溺卒，时年二十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164141_comment'></div>太师第四子讳珫，字叔宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164141_comment'></div>美姿仪，器度淹雅，以太师遗奏，赐同学究出身，选授孟州司法参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164141_comment'></div>幼能为文章，方刻意自奋，欲决取科第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164141_comment'></div>到官才数月，以疾卒，时年二十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164141_comment'></div>娶辛氏，生一女，适楚州山阳县主簿张诜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164141_comment'></div>太师第三子司封之长子，名景融，字晦之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164141_comment'></div>生而颖悟，属文甚工，琦常爱之，谓必能绍立门户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164141_comment'></div>初用司封兄荫补郊社斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164141_comment'></div>琦任枢密直学士，遇乾元节，奏授将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164141_comment'></div>后从琦之泾州，得暴疾，数日而卒，时年十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164141_comment'></div>庆历五年二月二十二日，琦奉考妣归葬于相州安阳县之新安村。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164141_comment'></div>葬师云：司法兄无后，监簿兄与景融未娶而亡，宜同葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164141_comment'></div>遂从其言，葬于东茔之庚位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164141_comment'></div>监簿兄之灵，居南为上，司法兄次之，景融又次之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164141_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1164141'>有才而未试，早夭而无子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164141_comment'></div>此世之人共哀，矧宗族之哀！</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1164141_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年2月22日</a>　在安阳，枢密副使任上。二月二十二，韩琦作有《三兄司封行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164136' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164136' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164136?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三兄司封行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年2月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164136")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164136_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164136'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164136'>公讳琚，字子温，相州安阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164136_comment'></div>自唐以来，家世衣冠，著名河朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164136_comment'></div>曾祖璆，皇任广晋府永济令，赠太子太保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164136_comment'></div>祖构，皇任太子中允，赠太子太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164136_comment'></div>父国华，皇任右谏议大夫，赠太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164136_comment'></div>公即太师之第三子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164136_comment'></div>资性聪警，幼而能文，太师以其异于诸儿，尤爱之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164136_comment'></div>每有著撰，即召令执笔口授之，繇是尽得为文之体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164136_comment'></div>初以父任试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164136_comment'></div>大中祥符六年，调补饶州鄱阳尉，非其好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164136_comment'></div>次年遇秋赋，乃求锁厅应进士举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164136_comment'></div>时郡守江公嗣宗闻之知名，召公诣府，使独登郡阁，出《鸿雁来宾赋》题以试之，公抒思少选，援笔立就，词致清丽，深得唐贤之格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164136_comment'></div>江大奇之，即时荐送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164136_comment'></div>江左士人往往书其赋于屏幛间，而目公为「韩鸿雁」，其爱赏如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164136_comment'></div>八年春，登进士乙科，授太常寺奉礼郎，知河南府永宁县，政为畿邑之最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164136_comment'></div>府尹王嗣宗强直少许可，独以公为能，表荐之，就移通判广信州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164136_comment'></div>丁母仁寿太夫人忧去职，服除，通判赵州，改光禄寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164136_comment'></div>今上即位，迁秘书省秘书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164136_comment'></div>天圣元年，避亲嫌，移通判棣州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164136_comment'></div>公素以文自高，虽精于吏事，而笔研不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164136_comment'></div>二年代归，即以所业数十篇进御，执政多称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164136_comment'></div>卒以孤进不遂试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164136_comment'></div>与今侍读杨公偕同得记姓名，出通判虔州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164136_comment'></div>虔民轻狡好讼，至有害己子而诬人者，吏稍不审辨，率多枉误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164136_comment'></div>时郡守集贤潘公汝士卒官，公权郡踰年，大小之狱，必精心推治，尽得其情，境内以为不冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164136_comment'></div>初，公在赵州，佐武吏，独尚平恕，吏民皆得被其惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164136_comment'></div>故曹公利用稔闻乡人之论，心善之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164136_comment'></div>会群牧判官缺，荐公堪其任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164136_comment'></div>四年春，召还充职，赐绯衣银鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164136_comment'></div>是年秋，差赴太常寺试举人，较天府国庠，取士为最精，朝论多之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164136_comment'></div>文节张公知白素赏公才，又爱其治行，书公姓名置佩囊中，数欲引用，复遗公纸数十番，促令上所业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164136_comment'></div>公不得已，再以文奏御，书闻而文节薨，遂不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164136_comment'></div>后曹公被责，公坐为其所举，出通判濠州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164136_comment'></div>明道元年，归阙，迁太常博士，知黄州，以恩改屯田员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164136_comment'></div>景祐元年春，就移梓州路提点刑狱，公辞，改知泽州，转都官员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164136_comment'></div>二年，移提点京西路刑狱公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164136_comment'></div>时西京白马、天官寺僧竞营浮图，倚权臣倡导，以大其事，于是洛中暨邻道诸郡，自官吏而下，皆被裒取，民里甚扰，公抗疏罢之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164136_comment'></div>三年，改提点福建路刑狱公事，未几移广南西路转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164136_comment'></div>是岁，安化州蛮人叛，杀宜州守王世宁，朝廷遣将臣益兵进讨，委公经画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164136_comment'></div>公乃上言：「安化三州，依负险阻，犹穴鼠然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164136_comment'></div>急之则窜伏不可得，缓之则伺隙而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164136_comment'></div>飞摽药弩，发必中人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164136_comment'></div>徒跣趋丛薄中，若履平地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164136_comment'></div>又水土毒恶，戍兵久留，死者十六七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164136_comment'></div>愿以天兵逼其巢穴，俟其畏威请罪，因而抚之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164136_comment'></div>渐募土兵，屯备要害，然后罢遣戍卒，宜不能复叛」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164136_comment'></div>诏如公策，一道以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164136_comment'></div>时朝廷亟加兵广西，诸郡遐陋，素不备兵费，公度官用以饷其赢，量民力以贷其薄，故粮道以济，而远人不劳，朝廷嘉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164136_comment'></div>在职迁司封员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164136_comment'></div>代归，面赐金紫，判三司都理欠凭由司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164136_comment'></div>康定元年夏，出为两浙转运使，次润州，以疾亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164136_comment'></div>公娶李氏，乃故国子博士忠恕之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164136_comment'></div>生于名族，克谨妇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164136_comment'></div>公未亡前，以苦风痹，感公之逝，踰月亦不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164136_comment'></div>生四男、四女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164136_comment'></div>长男景融，将作监主簿，性和雅，善属文，后公三岁而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164136_comment'></div>次方彦，试秘书省校书郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164136_comment'></div>次直彦、孝彦，并太庙斋郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164136_comment'></div>长女适著作佐郎叶仲舒，次女在室亡，次适左侍禁曹测，次适殿中丞范宽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164136_comment'></div>公仁孝纯直，出于天性，介静寡合，恬于进取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164136_comment'></div>自父兄亡，即主家事，抚育弟侄，惟恐有伤薄，官中竭俸资赡，怡然无间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164136_comment'></div>时为文酒之会，以相娱乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164136_comment'></div>或作事有不如意者，亦婉辞训勖，不忍加一恶言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164136_comment'></div>弟侄感其义，竞自树立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164136_comment'></div>在官清节凛然，秋毫无私，至于夙夜兢畏，过自绳检，世称廉吏者，鲜能及之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164136_comment'></div>为政简而爱人，故所至称治，前后建白革弊益时之事，多见采纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164136_comment'></div>公官止六品，于式不预史氏之载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164136_comment'></div>惟葬有铭，所以著行实于不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164136_comment'></div>以公之德之美，而赋命不永，位未充量，纪述之际，谅无愧辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1164136_comment'></div>谨状<span class='inlineComment2'>（《安阳集》卷四六。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1164136_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_70_1164136'>篇：郭本作「轴」。</div><div id='poem_sentence_70_1164136_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年2月22日</a>　在安阳，枢密副使任上。二月二十二，韩琦作有《五兄著作墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164142' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164142' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164142?labeling=true' target='_blank'>五兄著作墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年2月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164142")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164142_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164142'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164142'>太师第五子讳璩，字子徽，于琦同母兄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164142_comment'></div>天圣五年春，擢进士高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164142_comment'></div>初任安化军节度推官，丁母大宁郡太夫人忧去官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164142_comment'></div>服除，再调权舒州团练判官，又为建昌军判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164142_comment'></div>庆历元年秋，吏部奏课最，授秘书省著作佐郎，知寿州安丰县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164142_comment'></div>二年二月十九日，以疾卒，时年四十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164142_comment'></div>娶陈氏，勋臣之裔，雅有妇德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164142_comment'></div>生一子正彦，将作监主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164142_comment'></div>四女，并在室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164142_comment'></div>兄少负隽气，聪颖过人，每读书必泯绝外虑，虽左右嚣然，如不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164142_comment'></div>以是经史百家之言，一览即能诵记，尤通《左氏春秋》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164142_comment'></div>为文敏速，初若不甚经心，及成，词壮理备，虽他人精思，有不及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164142_comment'></div>性纯易，襟量夷坦，遇人无贤愚，一以诚接之，旷然不知世路有风波陷阱之险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164142_comment'></div>有时意乐閒放，与朋友相过从，酣笑杯酒间或逾旬，兴未尽不止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164142_comment'></div>及刻志于学，则下帷闭户，以坟典自环，虽在寝食，未尝舍卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164142_comment'></div>其真率如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164142_comment'></div>当官治簿书，断狱讼，发决如神，所至以明干称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164142_comment'></div>然志气磊落，事上官未尝降礼，以强颜曲意求荐举为大耻，故久滞宾幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164142_comment'></div>兄亦寿才越强仕，不得尽其器能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164142_comment'></div>嗟乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164142_comment'></div>二年间，司封兄与兄相继而亡，唯小子独承门户之重，虽叨窃宠任，顾先生行无一存者，复何荣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164142_comment'></div>但诸孤满目，每一念至，不觉涕之无从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164142_comment'></div>今奉考妣归厝故里，以兄从葬于东茔之壬位，永怀友爱，哀不自胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164142_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1164142'>天生隽奇，当有所施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164142_comment'></div>才优宦薄，惟世孔悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164142_comment'></div>复夺之寿，天岂无知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164142_comment'></div>庆有馀者，嗣人是宜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1164142_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年2月22日</a>　在安阳，枢密副使任上。二月二十二，韩琦作有《新妇贾氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164143' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164143' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164143?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新妇贾氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年2月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164143")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164143_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164143'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164143'>惟贾氏，故韩城令昌符之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164143_comment'></div>年二十，为韩公彦之妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164143_comment'></div>中无遂，内有助。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164143_comment'></div>未踰年，疾物故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164143_comment'></div>庆历五年二月二十二日，安阳水冶获安厝，从祖、舅太师之葬也，东茔丙位实其墓。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1164143_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年2月22日</a>　在安阳，枢密副使任上。二月二十二，韩琦作有《志石盖记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164144' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164144' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164144?labeling=true' target='_blank'>志石盖记<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年2月22日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164144")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164144_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164144'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164144'>琦始谋奉考妣归葬相州，不敢远祖茔而忘故里也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164144_comment'></div>得释保聪，善地理学，遣侄公彦同往视焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164144_comment'></div>不旬日，得地于安阳县新安村之水冶为吉，乃作东西二茔，茔各三穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164144_comment'></div>西茔之壬，安皇考太师、皇妣仁寿郡太夫人、所生太宁郡太夫人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164144_comment'></div>庚，安太师长子德清尉，子炜从葬焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164144_comment'></div>丙，安太师第三子司封、夫人寿春县君李氏，长女未笄而亡，从葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164144_comment'></div>东茔之庚，安太师第二子监簿，第四子孟州司法，司封之长子监簿景融从葬焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164144_comment'></div>壬，安太师第五子著作；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164144_comment'></div>丙，安德清长子太常寺太祝公彦妻贾氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164144_comment'></div>以庆历五年二月二十二日掩圹，诸茔各有铭志，今但述安神之次叙，刻于太师志石之盖，以永终古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164144_comment'></div>子枢密副使、光禄大夫、右谏议大夫、上柱国琦谨记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1164144_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年2月23日</a>　在安阳，枢密副使任上。二月二十二，韩琦作有《太夫人胡氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164139' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164139' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164139?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太夫人胡氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年2月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164139")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164139_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164139'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164139'>庆历五年二月二十三日，琦奉皇考太师、皇妣仁寿郡太夫人归厝于相州安阳县之新安村，以所生大宁郡太夫人侍葬焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164139_comment'></div>棺椁之制，悉用降等，安神之次，却而不齐，示不敢渎也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164139_comment'></div>夫礼非天降地出，本于情而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164139_comment'></div>今夫人从太师于此域，所以慰孝心而称人情也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164139_comment'></div>夫人姓胡氏，其先蜀郡成都人，曾、高以来，世籍富贵，豪于西土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164139_comment'></div>父觉，始仕孟氏，名在朝籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164139_comment'></div>乾德三年，太祖平两川，例遣归阙，生夫人于京师，久之不得调，卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164139_comment'></div>夫人从母李氏适故秦王牙吏王庆，王被谴，左右皆得罪，家族无依，遂以夫人归于太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164139_comment'></div>夫人生而淑明，柔德备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164139_comment'></div>善书札，尤精女工，凡点酥剪䌽，拟状生物，随手万态，如出造化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164139_comment'></div>性慈仁，归信释氏，历观藏典，深达义趣，口能诵者十数经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164139_comment'></div>闺门之内，传授教诱，人人响善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164139_comment'></div>太师委以主家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164139_comment'></div>夫人上奉仁寿，下睦宗姻，内外无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164139_comment'></div>仁寿爱而礼之，相待之意，犹侄娣然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164139_comment'></div>夫人生二子，曰璩、曰琦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164139_comment'></div>璩终秘书省著作佐郎，仁寿抚之，义均所生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164139_comment'></div>在髫稚时，夫人或笞之，仁寿必奔走保救，怒，终日不与夫人语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164139_comment'></div>琦未成人，仁寿已去世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164139_comment'></div>天圣五年春，琦始与著作兄同擢进士第，䌽衣拜庆，当时为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164139_comment'></div>琦初任通判淄州，迎夫人之官下，与妇崔氏晨昏侍膳羞，奉颜色，孝养无违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164139_comment'></div>八年夏，方受代，而夫人宿疾作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164139_comment'></div>琦日讨方书，治汤剂，躬自杵药，未尝委人，祷神访医，卒不获验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164139_comment'></div>终于五月九日，享年六十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164139_comment'></div>自琦登朝，暨忝贰枢府，夫人凡三追封，至大宁郡太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164139_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164139_comment'></div>顾复之恩，如天地之大，非言可纪也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164139_comment'></div>然刻瑑徽懿，著于亡穷，亦孝子之志焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164139_comment'></div>临葬哀号，为之铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_1164139'>哀哀苍天，予有罪兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164139_comment'></div>当夭余身，何佑余以禄兮，反丧余亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164139_comment'></div>使余生不得尽其养兮，余岂荣乎鼎茵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164139_comment'></div>傥亲寿之少延兮，敢谓天之不仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164139_comment'></div>惟劬劳之恩罔以报兮，余恨终天而不泯！</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1164139_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='2cf7b46367b94ad686b81ceb5d0365ae_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("2cf7b46367b94ad686b81ceb5d0365ae");'><span id='2cf7b46367b94ad686b81ceb5d0365ae_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1056')">1055-1056年</a>，48-49岁</div><div id='2cf7b46367b94ad686b81ceb5d0365ae' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年2月23日</a>　在安阳。二月二十三日，韩琦到任相州知州，有《知相州乞罢节钺表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163719' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163719' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163719?labeling=true' target='_blank'>知相州乞罢节钺表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年2月23日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163719")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163719_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163719'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163719'>臣某言：奉敕差知相州，仍以臣累表乞守前官赴任，伏蒙圣慈降诏不允，已于今月二十三日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163719_comment'></div>守边不可以疾居，诚宜引分；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163719_comment'></div>求郡莫如于乡便，冀一均劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163719_comment'></div>所祈使钺之还，盖协帅台之罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163719_comment'></div>君仁至厚，止易地以推恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163719_comment'></div>臣宠无加，遂拥旄而归里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163719_comment'></div>荣兼今昔，义激死生<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163719_comment'></div>伏念臣自忝决科，则思陈力，非微躯独不自惜，幸明主得其亲逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163719_comment'></div>故常奔趋险艰，如履平地，顾视权利，轻于浮云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163719_comment'></div>当人之不欲为，则保完难必；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163719_comment'></div>处事之易及责，则忧患常深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163719_comment'></div>志虽不回，病已中作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163719_comment'></div>寻窃自忖，较其所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163719_comment'></div>人神之劳，过焉斯毙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163719_comment'></div>天光之蕴，定然后明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163719_comment'></div>与其勤死而无成，孰若少休而再效？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163719_comment'></div>为虑既审，露章不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163719_comment'></div>幸遇皇帝陛下德洽普天，爱存旧物，辍御医而来视，知贱疾之非常，特徇至诚，许辞重寄，不夺洋川之节，就更河亶之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163719_comment'></div>踰旬解装，行路无苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163719_comment'></div>遂得均颁牛酒，慰旧老于乡中；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163719_comment'></div>罗列旌幢，拜先臣于墓下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163719_comment'></div>不徒叹耸于当世，实足夸传于后来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163719_comment'></div>臣敢不论病以体国之宜，攻疹以及民之瘼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163719_comment'></div>怡然静守，保于至和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163719_comment'></div>茍卧漳沉痼之可痊，虽疲未弃；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163719_comment'></div>则据鞍矍铄而思用，有急当先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163719_comment'></div>誓毕馀生，仰酬洪造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163719_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_27_1163719_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　韩琦奏停相州课铁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦奏请蠲除令坊正陪纳之应河北客户之干食盐钱。作品：《乞蠲除河北坊正陪纳客户干食盐钱奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163942' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163942' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163942?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞蠲除河北坊正陪纳客户乾食盐钱奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163942")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163942_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163942'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163942'>河北诸州当榷盐之初，以官盐散坊郭主、客户，令纳见钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163942_comment'></div>及盐法通行，其盐钱遂为半额而不除，主户则尚能随屋税纳官，客户则逃移，莫知其处，但名挂簿书而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163942_comment'></div>遂差坊正五七人，直令认纳，谓之客户乾食盐钱，人皆陪钱百馀贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163942_comment'></div>歛之无名，良可矜悯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163942_comment'></div>请应河北客户乾食盐钱令坊正陪纳者，特蠲除之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163942_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年4月</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。四月，韩琦有《请募弓箭手耕代州宁化军禁地》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163918_comment'></div>岁久，为敌人侵耕，渐失疆界。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163918_comment'></div>今代州、宁化军有禁地万顷，请如草城川募弓箭手，可得四千馀户。</div><div target='_blank'>韩氏家集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164105")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164105_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164105'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164105'>某家本深州博野人也，世以宦学知名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164105_comment'></div>遭唐末乱，违难屡迁，以是家牒散而不完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164105_comment'></div>先祖令公，善继素业，深以谱系为重，乃取祖考以来墓铭所有者，集为一编，首自为序，其意欲传示子孙，永永无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164105_comment'></div>及先君令公之葬祖考也，亦亲为志，所次先烈甚备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164105_comment'></div>自先君之亡，家世文集所掌不专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164105_comment'></div>四兄为孟州司法，尽取先君文集之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164105_comment'></div>兄物故，嫂辛氏携以归，其家不能辨识，尽亡失之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164105_comment'></div>其先祖所集墓铭一编在家，又遗脱大半，存者首尾十数幅而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164105_comment'></div>某自成立，痛家集之散缺，百计访求，十稍得其一二，而所集著墓铭者，终不可得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164105_comment'></div>每自感念，未尝忘心，至于冥祷天地神祇，亦冀万一有获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164105_comment'></div>庆历三年，自陕西四路帅召为枢密副使，三代皆及赠典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164105_comment'></div>而曾祖妣忘其姓氏，阅所存墓铭，则有清河郡夫人之志，遂以张氏追封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164105_comment'></div>后再详之，张氏乃四代祖鼓城府君夫人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164105_comment'></div>虽辨其误，而无如之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164105_comment'></div>四年秋，谋先君之葬，得起居舍人、直龙图阁尹洙为志，赞善大夫薛仲孺书石，书才数行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164105_comment'></div>有宣州掌记辛有终者<span class='inlineComment2'>（即辛嫂弟。）</span>，代归来访，且云曾得先令公文二编，不敢隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164105_comment'></div>闻之惊喜，遽问其目，则曰书题草也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164105_comment'></div>次日得之，视其目，如其言，且慰且恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164105_comment'></div>乃反覆披究，则杂以他文，先祖墓志亦在焉，参考祖先事迹，益以明白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164105_comment'></div>验曾祖妣，乃史氏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164105_comment'></div>亟请书石者，独未书姓氏、郡封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164105_comment'></div>是冬，遇郊恩，即追正之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164105_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164105_comment'></div>是辛君者，若稽数日不言，亦后于事矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164105_comment'></div>孔子谓「孝悌之至，通于神明」，岂小子念亲之至，而神所报乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164105_comment'></div>后之子孙，其可怠哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164105_comment'></div>因感其事，取五代祖而下及诸宗属所为文章，编为六十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164105_comment'></div>仍以墓志、行状及授官告辞冠于首篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164105_comment'></div>命诸子侄，人录一本，以藏于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164105_comment'></div>后主之者，或不谨严，使失其传，则上天至明，祖宗至灵，是必降殃以惩不孝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164105_comment'></div>其戒之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164105_comment'></div>其戒之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164105_comment'></div>谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1164105_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《故卫尉卿赠兵部侍郎高公写真赞》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十三。）</span><div id='poem_1164134' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164134' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164134?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故卫尉卿赠兵部侍郎高公写真赞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164134")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164134_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164134'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164134'>元精之生，其禀固异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164134_comment'></div>杰才之出，在时为瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164134_comment'></div>貌正而和，气清而粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164134_comment'></div>凛然乎神，瞭然乎视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164134_comment'></div>其可绘者外也，老鹤之轩昂兮，孤峰之耸峙；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164134_comment'></div>其不可绘者内也，大《易》之渊微兮，《素书》之奥秘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164134_comment'></div>其人虽亡，其形则传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164134_comment'></div>瞻之仰之，何穷已焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1164134_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《郭固以所造车式诣阙进呈奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163988' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163988' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163988?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郭固以所造车式诣阙进呈奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和二年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163988")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163988_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163988'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163988'>固尝造车陈法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163988_comment'></div>今以固所说，就民车约古制为之，临陈遇敌，缓急易集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163988_comment'></div>其车前锐后方，上置七枪，以为前后二拒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163988_comment'></div>此马燧战车，以刺戟于后，行载兵甲，止为营阵者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163988_comment'></div>古者鹿角车，以戈戟在前，故有鹿角之号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163988_comment'></div>今前后俱插枪者拟此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163988_comment'></div>又以民车之箱，增为重箱，高四尺四寸，前后二户，高与箱等，用革挽之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163988_comment'></div>吴起所谓「革车掩户，挽轮笼毂」是也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163988_comment'></div>箱置床子弩一，车上容五人，弓二弩二，其一人击金鼓，以为一车进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163988_comment'></div>前辕置蒙䡴一，以障牵车者，古所谓陷车也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163988_comment'></div>其车周回悉覆以毡，以备矢石火箭也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163988_comment'></div>凡一车二十五人，车上五人，前挽后推十四人，执器械六人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163988_comment'></div>凡车十乘，均以步骑多少随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163988_comment'></div>三军所止，横列直布，以为寨脚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163988_comment'></div>夜则联制铁索，以撅陷地，制其两轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163988_comment'></div>两车之间，用人五十，其车相去不过五尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163988_comment'></div>行止挟辕以为驻队，所谓伍承弥缝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163988_comment'></div>唐李靖尝引汉、魏之法，五车为队，仆射一人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163988_comment'></div>十车为帅，率长一人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163988_comment'></div>凡车十乘，将吏二人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163988_comment'></div>以今法准之，则跳荡为骑兵也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163988_comment'></div>战锋队步骑相半也，驻队兼车乘而出也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163988_comment'></div>臣琦以为可用于平川之地，一则临陈以抑奔冲，二则下营以为寨脚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163988_comment'></div>今令固自赍车式诣阙进呈。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1163988_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《并益州宜复旧号奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163939' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163939' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163939?labeling=true' target='_blank'>并益州宜复旧号奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163939_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163939'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1163939_comment'></div>宜因赦恩，俾复旧号。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163939_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163940' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163940?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞复并州旧号奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和二年）</span><span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163940_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163940'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163940'>太宗皇帝以刘继元请命后时，毁太原旧城，徙其民于唐明，因降州为军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163940_comment'></div>于今州不书榜，门无楼，不立戟，至此几八十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163940_comment'></div>当时助纣之民，沦没殆尽，后之子孙奉赋役，沐圣化，于四方同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163940_comment'></div>今仪卫入境，士民欢呼，愿因此时与除降贬之迹，以慰众心。</div><div id='poem_title_496153_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496153'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496153'>溪园高致此非遐，请为公陈众所誇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496153'>流芳只有人思召，行乐何须坐有车。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496153'>不独清明资胜会，四时风月惬诗家。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496153_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496153'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496153_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《次韵答磁州王复都官》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_496154' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496154' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496154?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵答磁州王复都官</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496154")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496154_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496154'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496154'>本邦为守获邻封，民政虽殊道则同。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496154'>浃境欢然君有惠，一乡荣甚我何功。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496154'>渐濡美化规模近，珍重高篇气格雄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496154_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496154'>德薄可能胜尹诵，穆如空自愧清风。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年3月3日</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《上巳会城北新硙》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_496155' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496155' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496155?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上巳会城北新硙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年3月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496155")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496155_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496155'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496155'>谁言智者不兼仁，请看新渠激硙轮。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496155_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496155'>本为酒材宽物力，更饶春月乐乡民。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496155_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496155'>阴晴天色将寒食，狂醉人心即蜡宾。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496155_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496155'>父老他年传故事，可忘修禊起兹辰。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496155_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496155'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496155_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年3月</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。三月，韩琦建昼锦堂，修康乐园，治休逸台，有诗。作品：《昼锦堂》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。是年九月改元。）</span>《康乐园》<span showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495882?labeling=true' target='_blank'>昼锦堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495882")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495882_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495882'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495882'>古人之富贵，贵归本郡县。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495882'>譬若衣锦游，白昼自光绚。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495882'>不则如夜行，虽丽胡由见。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495882'>事累载方册，今复著俚谚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495882'>或纡太守章，或拥使者传。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495882'>歌樵忘故穷，涤器掩前贱。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495882'>所得快恩仇，爱恶任骄狷。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495882'>其志止于此，士固不足羡。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495882'>兹予来旧邦，意弗在矜衒。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495882'>以疾而量力，惧莫称方面。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495882'>抗表纳金节，假守冀乡便。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495882'>帝曰其汝俞，建纛往临殿。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495882'>行路不云非，观叹溢郊甸。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495882'>病躯谐少休，先陇遂完缮。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495882'>岁时存父老，伏腊洁亲荐。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495882'>恩<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>荣孰与偕，衰劣愧独擅。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495882'>公馀新此堂，夫岂事饮燕。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495882'>亦非张美名，轻薄诧绅弁。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495882'>重禄许安闲，顾己常竞战。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495882'>庶一视题榜，则念报主眷。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495882'>汝报能何为，进道确无倦。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_495882'>忠义耸大节，匪石乌可转。<div id='poem_sentence_21_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_495882'>虽前有鼎镬，死耳誓不变。<div id='poem_sentence_22_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_495882'>丹诚难悉陈，感泣对笔砚。<div id='poem_sentence_23_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_495882'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_495882_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_495882'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_15_495882_0'>⑴ 原作思，据明刻本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_495882_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_495883' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495883' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495883?labeling=true' target='_blank'>康乐园</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495883")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495883_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495883'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495883'>惟人生多艰，康世岂易偶。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495883'>服业罔不勤，乐事岂常有。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495883'>朝家恩泽宽，宣布在封守。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495883'>体民当有时，使得遂仁寿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495883'>时而无所适，是不守之咎。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495883'>相署虽有园，狭陋日已久。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495883'>州人岁节游，若度一筒口。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495883'>至则无足观，叠迹但虚走。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495883'>遂令欢赏心，归去成烦呕。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495883'>有圃隔牙城，广袤半百亩。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495883'>我来辟而通，高户敞轩牖。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495883'>其中完废台，雄壮卑培塿。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495883'>城野四望间，万景如在手。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495883'>疏池育莲芰，表道植杨柳。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495883'>粪壤悉反<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：平。）</span>除，桃李换葱韭。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495883'>成时寒食春，观者惟恐后。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495883'>人一变壅阏，旷若在郊薮。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495883'>或相携以歌，或相醉以酒。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495883'>知为太平民，叹语竞聚首。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495883'>曰非时之康，还得此乐不。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495883'>予因揭是名，命意安敢苟。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_495883'>凡兹屏翰贤，一境实父母。<div id='poem_sentence_21_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_495883'>必与众同乐，斯地肯藜莠。<div id='poem_sentence_22_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_495883'>作诗告来者，庶可传不朽。<div id='poem_sentence_23_495883_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_495883'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_495883_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_495884' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495884' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495884?labeling=true' target='_blank'>休逸台</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495884")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495884_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495884'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495884'>牙城之北好大圃，中有废台名抱螺。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495884'>基圆有道盘屈上，故以螺目义匪佗。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495884'>当时兴者择地审，气象爽垲形势多。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495884'>今如孤冢但荆棘，不知隳坏<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>年几何。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495884'>背城人迹既罕到，往往满岁无一过。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495884'>我来侵圃治兵库，得披榛莽登巍峨。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495884'>襟怀豁若出尘外，四视天末穷纤罗。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495884'>满城风物聚掌上，红芳绿树明交柯。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495884'>太行之下不可数，万峰起落如翻波。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495884'>北来州域尽平地，孰若旧邺襟山河。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495884'>此为游览最佳处，遂施畚筑完陂陀。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495884'>台头结宇尚简朴，台面甃甓严镌磨。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495884'>魏宫冰井久湮没，铁梁有四沦耕禾。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495884'>精刚之质不少动，俚俗传诧邻妖讹。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495884'>云有神物常默护，守令千百无敢拖。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495884'>我怜古物辇而至，为台之柱植四阿。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495884'>州人闻至极惊异，就台观者肩相摩。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495884'>榜以休逸岂独尚，与众共乐乘春和。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495884'>主人间复命宾酌，樽前随分弦且歌。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495884'>病来饮兴直衰浅，献酬勉强颜须酡。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495884'>退尝内省尔何德，尔求自逸人讥诃。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_495884'>反思吾本任忠义，日不作伪心无颇。<div id='poem_sentence_21_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_495884'>君恩至厚假乡守，正宜休此祛馀疴。<div id='poem_sentence_22_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_495884'>尪孱报国未能奋，慨然倚槛空长哦。<div id='poem_sentence_23_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_495884'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_495884_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_495884'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_495884_0'>⑴ 原作壤，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_495884_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年3月15日</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。三月十五日，韩琦作有《相州新修园池记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1164120' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164120' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164120?labeling=true' target='_blank'>相州新修园池记</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和三年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164120")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164120_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164120'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164120'>相于河朔为近藩，而地据形胜，西走镇、定之冲，屯师积谷，与边镇相左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164120_comment'></div>然当无事时，州之武备，日懈不严，至五兵不设库，散处于厅事之廊庑间，败坏堆积，莫可详阅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164120_comment'></div>郡署有后园，北逼牙城，东西几四十丈，而南北不及百尺，虽有亭榭花木，而扼束蔽密，隘陋殊甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164120_comment'></div>牙城之北，乃有官蔬之圃，纵广半夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164120_comment'></div>中有废台岿然，荆棘蒙没，州人但以其基正圆，有道回环而上，如螺壳然，故以「抱螺」名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164120_comment'></div>虽老胥宿校，不能知兴废之由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164120_comment'></div>予之来，虽以病不堪事，然犹不敢偷安自放，而忘治之所急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164120_comment'></div>于是辟牙城而北之，三分蔬圃之地，其一居新城之南，西为甲仗库，凡五十六间，由是兵械百万计，始区而别焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164120_comment'></div>以库东之馀地，通于后园，由是园之南北，始与东西均焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164120_comment'></div>又于其东前直太守之居，建大堂曰「昼锦」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164120_comment'></div>堂之东南，建射亭曰「求己」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164120_comment'></div>堂之西北，建小亭曰「广春」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164120_comment'></div>其二居新城之北，为园曰「康乐」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164120_comment'></div>直废台凿门曰「通之」；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164120_comment'></div>治台起屋曰「休逸」，得魏冰井废台铁梁四为之柱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164120_comment'></div>台北凿大池，引洹水而灌之，有莲有鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164120_comment'></div>南北二园，皆植名花杂果、松柏、杨柳所宜之木，凡数千株。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164120_comment'></div>既成而遇寒食节，州之士女，无老幼皆摩肩蹑武来游吾园。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164120_comment'></div>或遇乐而留，或择胜而饮，叹赏歌呼，至徘徊忘归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164120_comment'></div>而知天子圣仁，致时之康，太守能宣布上恩，使吾属有此一时之乐，则吾名园之意，为不诬矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164120_comment'></div>观吾堂者，知太守仗旄节来故乡，得古人衣锦昼游之美，而不知吾窃志荣幸之过，朝夕自视，思有以报吾君也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164120_comment'></div>登吾台者，西见太行之下，千山万峰，延亘南北，争奇角秀，不可绘画，朝岚暮霭，变态无穷；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164120_comment'></div>俯视郛郭之中，民阎官寺，伽蓝廥廪，与夫花颜柳色，红绿交映，灿然如指掌之上，一无遗者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164120_comment'></div>而知太守兴此，为吾属岁时休暇优逸之观，而不知吾亦自谓能勤于作德，然后处兹而休且逸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164120_comment'></div>夫予始以武备不严，不敢以疾而忘治之所急，而因得志其荣遇，以及众人之乐，则是举也，岂无益之为哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164120_comment'></div>故直书大概，并告来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164120_comment'></div>夫郡县之为政，有期而更也，政有所利，非一人能保其久也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164120_comment'></div>前倡之，后继之，推其心，以公而相照，则国家之事无不济者，况一园池之末哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164120_comment'></div>葺之废之，必有能辨其心者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164120_comment'></div>时至和三年三月十五日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_29_1164120_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《昼锦堂新赏牡丹》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷八。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《暮春康乐园》诗。<span class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495885_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495885'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495885'>魏宫之废知几春，其间万事<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>成埃尘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495885'>唯有昭阳殿瓦不可坏，埋没旷野迷荒榛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495885'>陶甄之法世莫得，但贵美璞踰方珉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495885'>数百年来取为砚，墨光烂发波成轮。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495885'>求之日盛得日少，片材无异圭璧珍。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495885'>巧工近岁知众宝，杂以假伪规钱缗。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495885'>头方面凸槩难别，千百未有三二真。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495885'>我来本邦责邺令，朝搜暮索劳精神。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495885'>遗基坏地遍坑窟，始获一瓦全元淳。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495885_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_495887' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495887?labeling=true' target='_blank'>观胡九龄员外画牛</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span
