id='poem_title_495887_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495887'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495887'>丹青之笔夺造化，能者几何登品录。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495887'>蛟龙狞恶鬼神怒，更工不接时人目。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495887'>有形之物至者稀，是否难欺众所瞩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495887'>绛台胡掾文章外，偏向画牛其好酷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495887'>海内驰名三十年，得者珍藏过金玉。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495887'>老来才始著青衫，养亲不及朝家禄。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495887'>前日野服忽相过，云访恩知走京毂。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495887'>微风入指未能画，示我蜡本数十幅。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495887'>采摭诸家百馀状，毫端古意多含蓄。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495887'>斗者取力全在角，卧者称身全在腹。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495887'>立身<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑当作者）</span>髣髴精神慢，背者分数头项促。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495887'>行者动作皆得群，乳者顾视真怜犊。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495887'>当流泅戏益自在，欲渡或疑犹蓄缩。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495887'>从容饮齧得天真，荷鞭时有童儿牧。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495887'>或横一笛坐牛角<span class='inlineComment2'>（《历代题画诗类》作背）</span>，便是无声太平曲。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495887'>江天雨云易溟濛，风势掀号摧古木。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495887'>攲斜蓑笠趁牛归，萧疏暮景烟村宿。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495887'>奇哉胡掾老笔不可到，戴叟重生须死伏。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495887'>吾观诸牛之态虽尽妙，尚有所遗思未熟。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495887'>牛于生民功最大，不画牛功牛亦辱。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495887'>胡君胡君听我言，别选轻绡成巨轴。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_495887'>写出区区耒耜勤，贵知天下由吾方食足。<div id='poem_sentence_21_495887_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_495887'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_495887_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《别镇阳监仓陈荐秘丞》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_495890' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495890' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495890?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别镇阳监仓陈荐秘丞</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495890")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495890_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495890'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495890'>一纪帅三垂，待士敢不至。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495890'>推诚以求应，百不得一二。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495890'>彦升其应者，所应由道义。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495890'>幕中六七年，始卒无少异。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495890'>严霜摧万木，老柏弥苍翠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495890'>烈火炽三日，良玉自温粹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495890'>奉亲不可留，含笑就委吏。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495890'>须代处洺邑，洁羞勤以遂。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495890'>我病来相台，去客无所觊。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495890'>彦升两见过，顾旧不顾利。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495890'>言别之远官，驽枥饲骐骥。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495890'>蹄齧慎勿较，所困非吾类。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495890'>自古贤者为，争免不肖忌。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495890'>坐待天衢亭，万里观腾辔。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495890'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_495890_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年7月</a>　七月，韩琦疾愈，召为工部尚书、三司使。还没到任，八月，除检校太傅，充枢密使。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1056&endYear=1056')">1056年7月</a>　在安阳，三司使任上。韩琦有《辞免三司使札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十四。）</span><div id='poem_1163805' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163805' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163805?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免三司使劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1056年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163805")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163805_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163805'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163805'>臣今月三日殿直杜慥至，伏蒙圣慈赐臣诏书一道，令臣交割职分公事与以次官员讫，发来赴阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163805_comment'></div>臣自违去阙廷，岁且一纪，忽膺节召，获睹天光，在于臣子之心，固不胜其喜幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163805_comment'></div>然切闻道路之说，谓朝廷将委臣以主计之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163805_comment'></div>缘臣向自并门感疾，不堪剧事，得为乡郡，实出异恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163805_comment'></div>到任方及一年，故气居常发作，百端攻治，终不痊除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163805_comment'></div>臣方欲恳上奏封，愿还旄节，冀谐满任，以保馀生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163805_comment'></div>岂谓朝廷更不体量，骤加进用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163805_comment'></div>臣粗识忠义，素不辞难，其如疾病在身，自度不能牵强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163805_comment'></div>臣若弗虞颠踣，茍冒宠荣，将来致误国家，臣则死有馀责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163805_comment'></div>况臣久叨帅任，遍历三垂，在兵旅之间，颇知一二；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163805_comment'></div>于钱谷之事，实不谙详。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163805_comment'></div>伏望睿仁，鉴此诚悃，别选晓财利、有心画近臣，使主大计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163805_comment'></div>许臣只授前官礼部侍郎，终此一任，庶兹衰劣，得遂安全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163805_comment'></div>誓竭愚忠，以报洪造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163805_comment'></div>臣见交割职分公事，未敢起发，且在本州听候朝命。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1163805_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='e0dd9c08409840749ce3ef1f6e32bc75_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("e0dd9c08409840749ce3ef1f6e32bc75");'><span id='e0dd9c08409840749ce3ef1f6e32bc75_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1062&endYear=1062')">1062年</a>，55岁</div><div id='e0dd9c08409840749ce3ef1f6e32bc75' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。十一月二十九日，韩琦葬妻崔氏于相州安阳县丰安村祖茔，作有《录夫人崔氏事迹与崔殿丞请为行状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164137' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164137' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164137?labeling=true' target='_blank'>录夫人崔氏事迹与崔殿丞请为行状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1062年11月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164137")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164137_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164137'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164137'>夫人姓崔氏，其先姜姓，齐穆伯食采于崔，因以命氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164137_comment'></div>自穆伯二十九世而至汉东莱侯业，居东武城，为清河郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164137_comment'></div>自业二十世而至后魏七兵尚书休，始号大房。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164137_comment'></div>自休十四世而至石晋左拾遗周度，佐兖州慕容彦超幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164137_comment'></div>彦超叛，死节，周度赠秘书少监，即夫人之曾祖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164137_comment'></div>祖汝砺，皇任左班殿直，赠兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164137_comment'></div>父立，皇任工部侍郎致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164137_comment'></div>直道能政，搢绅宗仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164137_comment'></div>崔氏自唐以来为衣冠甲族，与卢、李、郑数家相为婚姻，它族不得预。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164137_comment'></div>夫人曾祖母、祖母，犹皆卢、李二姓，故世高其门风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164137_comment'></div>夫人即侍郎之第五女，柔静端洁，幼有成德，女工之事，莫不臻极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164137_comment'></div>年二十一而归于韩氏，逮事琦所生秦国太夫人胡氏，能尽妇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164137_comment'></div>秦国寝疾，躬侍汤剂，夙夜不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164137_comment'></div>及其亡也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164137_comment'></div>号慕以奉几筵，讫于终丧，无一不如礼者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164137_comment'></div>韩氏内外族属多而素贫，孤遗者众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164137_comment'></div>夫人天性仁贤，义隆孝睦，极意存育，常若不及，亲为婚娶者几二十人，虽罄竭家赀而不顾也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164137_comment'></div>其于待己，则躬履俭约，恬然无欲，服用粗备，不求过饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164137_comment'></div>琦未参侍从之前，俸尚薄，久官京师，夫人虽一钗之微，未尝在首，时质缗钱，以济诸亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164137_comment'></div>琦每赈给宗族，暨周人之急，夫人必欣然赞助，惟恐不充，此天下之共知，而妇人之尤难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164137_comment'></div>又治家严明，事无细大，处治条理，皆有法度，闺门之内，犹官府然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164137_comment'></div>故琦略无私室之虑，而得专心公家者，夫人之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164137_comment'></div>凡岁时祖宗之祀，夫人必先朝严辨，纤悉精至；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164137_comment'></div>酌荐之日，礼极恭恪，如是者三十馀年，六亲师服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164137_comment'></div>父母之亡，摧毁过甚，几不能生，以至图象严事，至于终身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164137_comment'></div>与诸姊诸弟，友爱敦笃，情礼兼至，虽在颠沛，未尝忘也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164137_comment'></div>夫人始封寿安县君，进安康郡君，安康、乐安二郡夫人，安国夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164137_comment'></div>嘉祐七年春末得疾，背胁痛，卧起为梗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164137_comment'></div>医者言气血凝涩，下之当愈，故时以药宣治之，而不能去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164137_comment'></div>涉夏秋之交，变为泄注，日以沉剧，九月三日而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164137_comment'></div>上与中宫闻之，皆遣尚宫临奠，赙赠加等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164137_comment'></div>夫人介谨纯直，待人以至诚，平生无一妄言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164137_comment'></div>善书札，体法甚老，殊无妇人气格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164137_comment'></div>好读诸史氏书，概知历代兴亡治乱之事，时作篇章，有理致，然以为非妇人之事，虽至亲不得见也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164137_comment'></div>临事取舍剖断，有刚毅大丈夫所不能为者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164137_comment'></div>尝曰：「我遇小事，则胆薄多惊，若处大事，知义所在，虽死不怖也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164137_comment'></div>平居散施左右，必与下房者均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164137_comment'></div>琦尝怪问，谓宜少有差等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164137_comment'></div>夫人曰：「我性好平，不欲使人见有轻重厚薄」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164137_comment'></div>疾虽久，而视家事不倦，待宗亲益周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164137_comment'></div>琦尝劝譬之，谓非颐养之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164137_comment'></div>乃慨然曰：「此吾平生所存，岂至此可变也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164137_comment'></div>唯死然后不能为也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164137_comment'></div>其用心如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164137_comment'></div>三子：长忠彦，光禄寺丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164137_comment'></div>次端彦，太常寺太祝；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164137_comment'></div>次良彦，秘书省校书郎，早亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164137_comment'></div>五女：长不育，次适许州司户参军王景修，次二女早夭，次尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164137_comment'></div>夫人慈爱至厚，其待非所生者，过于己出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164137_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164137_comment'></div>夫人内行高绝如此之著，恐虽当世贤妇人少能偕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164137_comment'></div>今取十一月二十九日，葬于相州安阳县丰安村祖茔之次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164137_comment'></div>圹有铭，故亲笔其大概，以俟实录焉。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1164137_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。十一月二十九日，韩琦改葬长兄湖州德清尉韩球次子殿中丞韩公彦，作有《侄殿中丞公彦墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164146' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164146' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164146?labeling=true' target='_blank'>侄殿中丞公彦墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164146")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164146_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164146'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164146'>余长兄湖州德清尉、赠光禄寺丞讳球之次子曰公彦，字师道，即太子中允、赠太师、中书令兼尚书令、燕国公讳构之曾孙，右谏议大夫、赠太师、中书令兼尚书令讳国华之孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164146_comment'></div>母灵寿县太君陈氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164146_comment'></div>公彦幼失二亲，祖母魏国太夫人罗氏鞠之如子，而余三兄司封又爱而教育之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164146_comment'></div>余与公彦同年生，同时就学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164146_comment'></div>公彦始读书，为辞章甚敏，而干家事尤长，故司封兄专以门内之务责之公彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164146_comment'></div>所委必集，尝曰：「我所以能办者无他，勤而不私尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164146_comment'></div>移我此心以治吏事，宜无甚难者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164146_comment'></div>然用是颇废学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164146_comment'></div>天圣中，有诏少卿、监以上殁，于五经郊恩者，许录其子孙一人，公彦因得补郊社斋郎，调南仪州岑溪主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164146_comment'></div>岑溪风土之恶，在岭南为第一，而公彦殊不以为忧，但日与其民辨讼之枉直，而平其疾苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164146_comment'></div>逮满岁，全家安然以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164146_comment'></div>再调楚州宝应县主簿，考满，补开封县丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164146_comment'></div>康定元年秋，余任陕西经略安抚副使，奏公彦授将作监主簿、签署保静军节度判官事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164146_comment'></div>宿据汴渠之冲，事甚剧，公彦悉心赞画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164146_comment'></div>其今翰林学士王公素知其才，屡称荐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164146_comment'></div>庆历三年夏，就差知汝州叶县事，转太常寺太祝，俄改知磁州武安县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164146_comment'></div>县跨西山盗贼之薮，公彦乃籍邑之射生户者，使各占其地，遇盗发，则与当捕之吏共捕之，条其赏罚，示以必行，盗奔它境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164146_comment'></div>六年秋，改大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164146_comment'></div>七年秋，差通判怀州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164146_comment'></div>次岁河朔雨水害稼，民大饥，公彦与其守夙夜经虑，诱郡豪出粟，极力赈恤，全活甚众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164146_comment'></div>时朝廷转江淮米百万斛，由黄河下抵卫州，分给灾伤诸郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164146_comment'></div>公彦被旨，与中贵人董其事，皆如期以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164146_comment'></div>皇祐元年，改光禄寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164146_comment'></div>二年春，就移知荣州事，明堂恩迁大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164146_comment'></div>五年冬，转太子右赞善大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164146_comment'></div>郡有盐井四十馀所，昔以岁课之重，乃抑乡民以分主之，年祀既远，水泉有盈竭，户力有兴替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164146_comment'></div>得利之多者，或所主之户富；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164146_comment'></div>得利之寡者，或所主之户贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164146_comment'></div>故贫者虽岁破家不能偿官课，而富者日获其赢以肆兼并，荣民苦之久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164146_comment'></div>公彦既至，知其弊，曰：「吾境之民，皆王民也，奈何使其有幸不幸以至此而有不变之哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164146_comment'></div>乃集其众，使自疏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164146_comment'></div>于是类其井得利之多寡以相附之，量其民户等之高下以相参之，民以为均，而课入亦办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164146_comment'></div>转运使知而保奏之，事下三司，以为当朝廷嘉奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164146_comment'></div>归阙，用是升次，得知和州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164146_comment'></div>嘉祐元年冬，改殿中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164146_comment'></div>郡有宿寇，时发闾里，民以为患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164146_comment'></div>公彦乃举武安制盗之法增损之，以令其下，讫三岁无盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164146_comment'></div>归，属朝廷以瀛处边要，北道之重，通判之任，非尝为郡者不得预其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164146_comment'></div>公彦以近先域，岁时洒扫之便，欣然就之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164146_comment'></div>将赴治所而疾作，食辄不能下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164146_comment'></div>病日益，余度其难治，乃泣而谕之曰：「万一有不可讳，汝叔在，勿以儿女为虑」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164146_comment'></div>公彦曰：「是诚感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164146_comment'></div>然儿女之荣与否，公彦莫得而知之矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164146_comment'></div>色殊不动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164146_comment'></div>是夕卒，其达性命如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164146_comment'></div>四年正月四日也，时年五十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164146_comment'></div>公彦介直有守，性乐俭薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164146_comment'></div>每公退，必涉猎书史间，以诗笔自娱，斋室凝尘，怡怡如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164146_comment'></div>待遇宾佐，称礼而已，不为厨传之饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164146_comment'></div>人或讥其太约，公彦曰：「吾虽起于荫补，当吾祖考之亡，诸父未达之前，家甚窘，吾尝同历艰苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164146_comment'></div>今幸窃荣禄，敢效世家子之所为哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164146_comment'></div>虽然，尚惧吾子孙不能守法，渐陷奢放，以隳吾家」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164146_comment'></div>闻者嗟服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164146_comment'></div>素晓法令，而用心平恕，凡处谳议，茍情文相当，而上官执其异见，公彦必析理固争，虽死不可夺也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164146_comment'></div>少侍司封兄从官，见其清白过谨，志师慕之，故在官以洁己为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164146_comment'></div>闺门肃然，虽市物，一钱不得不白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164146_comment'></div>民安其无扰，去则歌思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164146_comment'></div>公彦始娶贾氏，同州韩城令昌符之女，先卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164146_comment'></div>再娶张氏，职方郎中文昌之女，封仁寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164146_comment'></div>皆柔顺以正，克成家道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164146_comment'></div>子四人：长曰确，试秘书省校书郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164146_comment'></div>次曰恺，并早亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164146_comment'></div>次曰恬，秘书省校书郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164146_comment'></div>次曰恪，尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164146_comment'></div>女五人：长适前常州武进尉孙扶，次二女早夭，次三女并幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164146_comment'></div>庆历中，余葬先考妣于相州安阳县新安村之水冶，而贾氏从葬于东茔之丙位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164146_comment'></div>嘉祐七年十一月二十九日，因余妻安国夫人崔氏之葬，乃举公彦之丧纳贾氏圹中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164146_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164146_comment'></div>公彦行完于躬，政修于官，吾门之令器也，不幸越中年而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1164146_comment'></div>余且老，失其所托，可胜其哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1164146_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_70_1164146'>噫公彦兮，行廉节劲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1164146_comment'></div>为子克家，在官能政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1164146_comment'></div>明而守法，当世谁竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1164146_comment'></div>怡然处约，众则奚评。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1164146_comment'></div>宜享也丰，嗣门之盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1164146_comment'></div>如何始衰，遽此不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1164146_comment'></div>夫子言《易》，善兮有庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1164146_comment'></div>及系辞焉，又贵知命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1164146_comment'></div>庆为教耶，命其默定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1164146_comment'></div>不然何为报之戾哉，诉于天兮孰听。</div><div id='poem_sentence_79_1164146_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。十一月二十九日，韩琦改葬韩公彦长子试秘书省校书郎韩确，作有《侄孙试秘书省校书郎确墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164147' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164147' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164147?labeling=true' target='_blank'>侄孙试秘书省校书郎确墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164147")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164147_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164147'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164147'>确字百坚，余侄殿中丞公彦之长子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164147_comment'></div>母仁寿县君张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164147_comment'></div>确性端厚沉敏，幼而喜学，为文典赡，有老成风格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164147_comment'></div>庆历六年夏，余以乾元节恩，奏确得试秘书省校书郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164147_comment'></div>嘉祐元年秋，应进士举不利，乃慨然励志，为学益苦，不幸劳而生疾，寖以羸惫，卒于三年八月二十六日，时年二十一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164147_comment'></div>妻孙氏，虞部郎中周之女，柔淑有妇德，感夫之亡，痛悼不已，未终丧亦卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164147_comment'></div>生一男曰和孙，一女，并早夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164147_comment'></div>呜呼，天之肆罚也，其甚矣乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164147_comment'></div>使夫妻盛年俱殒，而又绝其所继，此行路闻者，孰不伤骇！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164147_comment'></div>则于吾族，其哀何如哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164147_comment'></div>七年十一月二十九日，因余妻安国夫人崔氏之葬，乃于相州安阳县新安村先茔之东百步，得地以葬确，孙氏祔焉，葬者以为壬穴云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164147_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1164147'>确生吾门，是为良嗣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164147_comment'></div>如何力学，遂以勤毙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164147_comment'></div>妇执夫丧，未终而逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164147_comment'></div>亦尝生子，又不克继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164147_comment'></div>天戕善良，酷也如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164147_comment'></div>哀无穷兮，葬因以志。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1164147_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。十一月二十九日，韩琦改葬韩公彦次子恺，作有《侄孙恺墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164148' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164148' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164148?labeling=true' target='_blank'>侄孙恺墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164148")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164148_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164148'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164148'>恺字和仲，余侄殿中丞公彦之次子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164148_comment'></div>母仁寿县君张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164148_comment'></div>恺天性孝谨，幼识礼义，读书强记，而善属文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164148_comment'></div>嘉祐三年秋，方应进士举，而兄确物故，是冬其父病，恺躬进药剂，昼夜侍侧，不解带者累月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164148_comment'></div>及父之亡也，哀毁过甚，不能自抑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164148_comment'></div>既而感疾，不可治，五年四月二十三日卒，时年二十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164148_comment'></div>噫，恺之所禀，可谓粹美矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164148_comment'></div>使天稍畀以年，则其处家也，有不顺而睦乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164148_comment'></div>其得仕也，有不忠而干乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164148_comment'></div>奈何乎吾家之不幸，而赋命之短也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164148_comment'></div>七年十一月二十九日，因余妻安国夫人崔氏之葬，乃于相州安阳县新安村先茔东百步之近得吉地，用丙穴以葬恺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164148_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1164148'>秀而不实，夫子之嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164148_comment'></div>哀哉恺兮，遽如是耶！</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1164148_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。十一月二十九日，韩琦改葬四个未长成的侄孙：韩光寿，韩琦第四侄大理寺丞韩正彦子，正彦乃五兄韩璩子；韩盘奴，韩琦第五侄大理寺丞韩方彦子，方彦乃三兄韩琚次子；韩锦孙、韩密孙，为韩琦长子韩忠彦的长子和次子。作有《侄孙四殇墓记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164149' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164149' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164149?labeling=true' target='_blank'>侄孙四殇墓记</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164149")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164149_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164149'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164149'>余第四侄大理寺丞正彦，生子曰光寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164149_comment'></div>时正彦初授光禄寺丞，故以名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164149_comment'></div>余第五侄大理寺丞方彦，生子曰盘奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164149_comment'></div>时余自扬州徙知郓州，舟次淮上之磨盘口，故以名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164149_comment'></div>余之长子光禄寺丞忠彦，生子二人，长曰锦孙，时余知相州，得任故里，有昼锦之荣，故以名之；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164149_comment'></div>次曰密孙，时余始为枢密使，故以名之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164149_comment'></div>是四小孙，皆姿状秀美，慧而可爱，或仅能行立，或未免抱持，天何降灾，遂俱不育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164149_comment'></div>嘉祐七年十一月二十九日，因余妻安国夫人崔氏之葬，乃于相州安阳县新安村先茔之东百步得地，用庚穴而同瘗焉，因刻石以志之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164149_comment'></div>叔祖开府仪同三司、行刑部尚书、同中书门下平章事、昭文馆大学士、监修国史、上柱国、仪国公韩琦记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164149_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。十一月二十九日，韩琦改葬三个侄孙女：韩琦第二侄韩球子殿中丞韩公彦第二、第三女，皆生而令淑，年甫及嫁，不幸相继而卒；韩琦第五侄韩琚次子大理寺丞韩方彦一女，曰八娘，幼而不育。作有《三侄孙女墓记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164150' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164150' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164150?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三侄孙女墓记</a><span class='authorDate'>（嘉祐七年十一月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164150")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164150_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164150'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164150'>余第二侄殿中丞公彦第二、第三女，皆生而令淑，年甫及嫁，不幸相继而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164150_comment'></div>余第五侄大理寺丞方彦一女曰公娘，幼而不育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164150_comment'></div>嘉祐七年十一月二十九日，因余妻安国夫人崔氏之葬，乃于相州安阳县新安村先茔之东得地，用外丙穴以同瘗之，从葬师之言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164150_comment'></div>刻石圹中，以志其哀云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164150_comment'></div>叔祖开府仪同三司、行刑部尚书、同中书门下平章事、昭文馆大学士、监修国史、上柱国、仪国公韩琦记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1164150_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='b047d76654424db580501a812d669956_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("b047d76654424db580501a812d669956");'><span id='b047d76654424db580501a812d669956_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1067&endYear=1067')">1067年</a>，60岁</div><div id='b047d76654424db580501a812d669956' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。二月二十八日，韩琦葬五嫂故安康郡太君陈氏于相州安阳县新安村，作有《故安康郡太君陈氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十八。英宗正月卒，神宗即位仍用治平年号至十二月。）</span><div id='poem_1164159' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164159' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164159?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故安康郡太君陈氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年2月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164159")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164159_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164159'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164159'>某第五兄著作讳璩，有子尚书比部员外郎、监在京曲院正彦，援郊祀恩，赠兄尚书职方员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164159_comment'></div>熙宁三年冬，得告焚黄，因自襄邑迁其妻王氏之柩归于里中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164159_comment'></div>而母安康郡太君欲同展茔域，正彦即奉以行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164159_comment'></div>未几，正彦来报，始至相，未厝王氏，即侍母太君历拜先茔，及次新安坟所，而母太君宿疾忽作，十二月十二日终于孝亲佛舍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164159_comment'></div>某得讣骇泣，既而叹曰：「是岂偶然哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164159_comment'></div>方吾嫂康宁时，专意来展茔域，回止坟寺，而忽焉不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164159_comment'></div>具免夫道路肩挽摇顿之苦，而无甚寒极暑疲力难进之患，去吾职方兄之冢百步而近，安然以归其夫圹中，非积善之至，孰享兹福」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164159_comment'></div>嫂姓陈氏，曾祖从信，事太宗于潜邸，深晓财计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164159_comment'></div>及即位，寖被显擢，终左卫大将军、度支使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164159_comment'></div>祖惟德，以荫补卫尉寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164159_comment'></div>父士元，幼嗜学，举进士未第而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164159_comment'></div>嫂年十八，归于职方兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164159_comment'></div>天资婉淑，事其姑秦国太夫人，曲尽妇道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164159_comment'></div>当兄之未官，赀用多乏，中馈之事，怡然自力，未尝少懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164159_comment'></div>秦国亦爱而遇之，犹息女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164159_comment'></div>执秦国丧，号恸几筵，动必如礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164159_comment'></div>接内外宗党柔和自下，故皆得其欢服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164159_comment'></div>性仁慈，信奉释教，诫不害生物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164159_comment'></div>每见穷悴可怜之人，必亟自损刻而振施之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164159_comment'></div>遇尊长讳日，则先期斋洁，躬诵佛书，以严追荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164159_comment'></div>如是者三十年，益久益勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164159_comment'></div>兄方逾强仕而殁，嫂嫠居，惟正彦一子，孜孜训导，遂以成立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164159_comment'></div>而正彦亦笃孝过人，凡嫂起居之际，朝夕在傍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164159_comment'></div>侍膳则进其可食者，而去其不可食者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164159_comment'></div>以至衣之厚薄，必使宜其凉燠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164159_comment'></div>平居左右瞻仰颜色，若稍失调适则遑遽，按阅方书，裁量药剂，唯恐其意之不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164159_comment'></div>俟嫂痊复，己方少安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164159_comment'></div>嫂用是每体中有少不佳，或隐而不自言，虑其子劳轸之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164159_comment'></div>然嫂虽享年六十有八，不为不寿，而不足以副其孝养之心，甚可哀也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164159_comment'></div>四女：长适尚书职方员外郎王克存；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164159_comment'></div>次适大理寺丞王居正；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164159_comment'></div>次适太子中允、集贤校理李清臣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164159_comment'></div>次适屯田郎中成黼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164159_comment'></div>皆闻人材彦，士族钦瞩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164159_comment'></div>嫂始封保宁县君，次封保宁县太君，次封安康郡太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164159_comment'></div>一以正彦升朝，遇郊恩，馀皆某顷在宰府，陈情特封，非常例也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164159_comment'></div>以四年二月二十八日，合祔于职方兄之茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164159_comment'></div>将葬，正彦曰：「母太君平生懿行美德，无如叔知之详，叔当以铭」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164159_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1164159'>惟人之生，云何不逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164159_comment'></div>惟逝之臧，其致匪易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164159_comment'></div>噫嘻安康，终也特异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164159_comment'></div>躬来展茔，始次坟寺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164159_comment'></div>疾生莫测，遽不能治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164159_comment'></div>旁视夫穴，不劳而暨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164159_comment'></div>非福之全，事岂斯契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164159_comment'></div>庆历乙酉，实为兄志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164159_comment'></div>日月之驰，仅将及世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164159_comment'></div>今兹熙宁，辛亥之岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164159_comment'></div>又铭吾嫂，哀胡可既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164159_comment'></div>书其大方，是谓无愧。</div><div id='poem_sentence_49_1164159_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。二月二十八日，韩琦改葬第二侄殿中丞韩公彦妻张氏，作有《故仁寿县君张氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164160' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164160' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164160?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故仁寿县君张氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年2月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164160")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164160_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164160'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164160'>余第二侄殿中丞公彦妻张氏，职方郎中文昌之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164160_comment'></div>性柔静，自幼不妄语笑，惟姆训是服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164160_comment'></div>逮归韩氏，仪德益修，平居端然，以法度自处，宗亲钦式之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164160_comment'></div>公彦在官洁廉，自奉菲薄，而张氏素淳约，能内为之助，治家无一横费，故用度自给，而俸常有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164160_comment'></div>时俗所尚，于妇人服玩尤变易不常，工人每高其直，以相诱衒，往往捐故所有，甘心而趋之，惟恐其后也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164160_comment'></div>而张氏目之淡然，未尝为之少动，实闺壶之难能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164160_comment'></div>公彦遇嘉祐恭谢天地恩，封仁寿县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164160_comment'></div>四年春，公彦亡，张氏哀久成疾，八年三月十日，卒于相州感化乡之私第，年五十四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164160_comment'></div>长子曰确，试秘书省校书郎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164160_comment'></div>次曰恺，力学未仕，俱早世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164160_comment'></div>次曰恬，秘书省校书郎，尤孝而有文，张氏亡，摧毁骨立，其年冬亦卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164160_comment'></div>次曰恪，方肄进士业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164160_comment'></div>五女：长适镇潼军观察推官孙扶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164160_comment'></div>次二女俱早亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164160_comment'></div>次适新州新兴尉、监襄邑仓王恺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164160_comment'></div>次适相州司户参军陈厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164160_comment'></div>熙宁四年二月二十八日，以其叔姑安康郡太君陈氏之葬，乃举张氏之柩，纳公彦圹中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164160_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1164160'>呜呼张氏，处妇之道，静以约兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164160_comment'></div>侈丽之事，妇人所好，殊能略兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164160_comment'></div>闑内之治，宗姻以法，德云邈兮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164160_comment'></div>享年不遐，有子多丧，天乎虐兮。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1164160_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。二月二十八日，韩琦改葬第四侄尚书比部员外郎韩正彦妻王氏，作有《故寿安县君王氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164161' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164161' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164161?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故寿安县君王氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年2月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164161")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164161_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164161'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164161'>余第四侄尚书比部员外郎正彦妻王氏，故相文正公曾之孙，刑部郎中、秘阁校理绎之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164161_comment'></div>文正公以道德忠信相仁宗，以兴太平，大名重望，为诸宰之冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164161_comment'></div>而治家不失儒素，闺门肃然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164161_comment'></div>故王氏自幼已稔习其门法，婉嫕之行，不教而修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164161_comment'></div>既归韩氏，以淳约之性，职我内事，能持己，不自厚，而遇众以均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164161_comment'></div>从正彦崎岖小官，虽浣衣薄食，未尝有不满之色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164161_comment'></div>和睦内外，怡怡如也，宗党贤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164161_comment'></div>事其姑安康郡太君，年踰二纪，柔顺之道，终始不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164161_comment'></div>尝以尊幼被疾，外无良医，遂精意方书，昼夜研诵，卒通其大方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164161_comment'></div>门内病者，或自治之，多获痊已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164161_comment'></div>正彦登朝，遇郊恩，封寿安县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164161_comment'></div>熙宁二年春，正彦通判越州，代归，涂次秀州，舟中得暴疾，数日遽不可治，年三十九，二月二十一日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164161_comment'></div>五男：长曰辑，婺州司户参军；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164161_comment'></div>次曰向、曰邕、曰乔，并勤于学，未仕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164161_comment'></div>次幼未名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164161_comment'></div>三女：长适进士张元素；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164161_comment'></div>二并在室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164161_comment'></div>而辑自王氏之亡，守其柩至于终丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164161_comment'></div>四年二月二十八日，以其姑安康之葬，王氏从葬于相州安阳县新安村先茔之西南，术者云外庚穴也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164161_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1164161'>王氏之生，贤相之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164161_comment'></div>能蹈世法，不骄以夸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164161_comment'></div>德则多美，命兮不遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164161_comment'></div>福善之报，其当尔耶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1164161_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。二月二十八日，韩琦改葬长子韩忠彦妻吕氏，作有《故东平县君吕氏墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164162' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164162' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164162?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故东平县君吕氏墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年2月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164162")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164162_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164162'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164162'>余长子太常博士、秘阁校理忠彦妻吕氏，故相文靖公夷简之孙，观文殿学士、尚书吏部侍郎公弼之女也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164162_comment'></div>文靖公以王佐之才，辅相仁庙，二十年间，仁恩德泽，浃洽天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164162_comment'></div>而观文公继以隆名伟业，居右府，翼两朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164162_comment'></div>故吕氏袭其京庆，而贤明柔淑之性，邈然宜异于众也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164162_comment'></div>年十六，归韩氏，虽尚妙年，能不以贵相之家，辄自骄懈，妇道修谨，过于老成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164162_comment'></div>其姑卫国夫人崔氏，爱而抚之，谓其可教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164162_comment'></div>卫国治家谨肃，仁而好施，亲族无疏近，资恤周至，其心勤勤，唯恐不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164162_comment'></div>吕氏常在左右，朝夕师仰，禀训不怠，悉能知其薄己厚物之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164162_comment'></div>及卫国之薨，余则以家事付之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164162_comment'></div>吕氏奉其姑遗法，惕然不敢失，凡所施设，与卫国平日无少异焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164162_comment'></div>于是内外欣服，知克绍其风矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164162_comment'></div>治平二年秋，得疾淹久，数泣而谓忠彦曰：「我疾势日加，万万不可治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164162_comment'></div>我有幼妹在家，君若全旧恩以续之，必能恤我子矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164162_comment'></div>二姓之好，不绝如故，我死无恨矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164162_comment'></div>八月四日，果以其疾卒，年二十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164162_comment'></div>时观文公始擢贰枢府，悲思不已，乃为奏，得追封东平县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164162_comment'></div>生三子：长曰锦孙，次曰密孙，皆早夭；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164162_comment'></div>次曰治，太常寺太祝，聪谨嗜学，吕氏尤所钟爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164162_comment'></div>忠彦不忍违其遗言，为娶其妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164162_comment'></div>熙宁四年二月二十八日，因其伯姑安康郡太君陈氏之葬，自京迁吕氏之柩厝于相州安阳县丰安村先姑夫人之兆次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164162_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1164162'>吾得卫国，同吾壶中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164162_comment'></div>治家之法，惟平以公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164162_comment'></div>内外亲党，无恩不蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164162_comment'></div>吕氏嗣之，得其清风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164162_comment'></div>如何不幸，盛年以终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164162_comment'></div>失吾良妇，哀兮可穷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1164162_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。二月二十八日，韩琦改葬侄孙韩公彦第三子故秘书省校书郎韩恬，作有《故秘书省校书郎韩恬墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十九。）</span><div id='poem_1164163' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164163' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164163?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故秘书省校书郎韩恬墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年2月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164163")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164163_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164163'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164163'>恬字安之，余侄殿中丞公彦之第三子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164163_comment'></div>母仁寿县君张氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164163_comment'></div>幼俊迈喜学，读书强记，而为文辩速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164163_comment'></div>余尝较公彦诸子，谓恬他日必能先取科第，以才名自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164163_comment'></div>尝求补试国子监生，程文中等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164163_comment'></div>俄丁父忧，未几，其仲兄恺与二妹继亡，恬与母张氏益大悲骇，不能自宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164163_comment'></div>余遇嘉祐明堂恩，亟先奏恬，得秘书省校书郎，及为娶职方郎中董之邵之女，且以慰其母茕独之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164163_comment'></div>张氏喜甚，屡泣以诫恬，令益自修饬，以报恩鞠之厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164163_comment'></div>已而张氏复感疾，议归乡里，冀得移其故处，而遂平逾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164163_comment'></div>八年春，不幸疾久，卒不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164163_comment'></div>恬既并罹酷罚，夙夜号躄，几以殒绝，犹能手疏母之行实，请余为其墓铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164163_comment'></div>终以哀毁之过，其年十二月二十二日亦卒，时年二十二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164163_comment'></div>女二人，长曰寿女，次曰安女，并幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164163_comment'></div>后恬服除，董氏以无男子，归其父家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164163_comment'></div>寿女者，熙宁初元又不育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164163_comment'></div>呜呼，祸衅之来，未有如恬之一门相仍，穷苦如是之甚者也，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164163_comment'></div>四年二月二十八日，以其叔祖母安康郡太君之葬，乃举恬之丧，葬于相州安阳县新安村先茔东其兄确之墓次，葬师所谓穴之外庚也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164163_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1164163'>父母诸兄兮，相继亡于前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164163_comment'></div>二女之幼兮，一复夭于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164163_comment'></div>妻无以守归其家，尔独于兹瘗其柩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164163_comment'></div>何罪而当此罚耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164163_comment'></div>岂数之适相偶耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164163_comment'></div>天乎冥冥，吾安以究。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1164163_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>在安阳，同中书门下平章事任上。二月二十八日，韩琦改葬侄韩方彦幼子韩亶奴，作有《侄孙亶奴墓志》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十九。）</span><div id='poem_1164164' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164164' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164164?labeling=true' target='_blank'>侄孙亶奴墓志<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1067年2月28日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164164")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164164_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164164'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164164'>余第五侄司门员外郎、通判赵州方彦，年四十馀始有一子，以其生于相州，取河亶甲居相之义，遂名之曰亶奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164164_comment'></div>亶奴状貌绝美，语言甚慧，故方彦与其母向氏爱而视之，谓虽希代之宝，不如吾儿之贵也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164164_comment'></div>而抚育太过，易以生疾，才及五岁而夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164164_comment'></div>其母哀思不已，虽其亡逮今数年矣，而饮食衣服与夫玩好之具，犹日奠而时致之，与存者无异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164164_comment'></div>甚哉，其爱之难解也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164164_comment'></div>熙宁四年二月二十八日，以吾嫂安康郡太君之葬，因自赵州迁而瘗于先茔之东，祔从兄确之墓次，刻石以志，且慰其父母之心云。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1164164_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='301d47ca9c714e16b9c81550eb089cef_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("301d47ca9c714e16b9c81550eb089cef");'><span id='301d47ca9c714e16b9c81550eb089cef_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1069')">1068-1069年</a>，61-62岁</div><div id='301d47ca9c714e16b9c81550eb089cef' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《戊申相州谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十。）</span><div id='poem_1163759' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163759' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163759?labeling=true' target='_blank'>戊申相州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163759")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163759_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163759'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163759'>臣某言：近奉敕差判相州军州事，已于今月二十二日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163759_comment'></div>殄寇无谋，积劳生疹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163759_comment'></div>恩还乡守，衣绣免讥于夜行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163759_comment'></div>诏觐天闱，锡马屡膺于昼接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163759_comment'></div>遽辞轩陛，即见吏民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163759_comment'></div>顾忝幸以诚多，抚孤孱而自惕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163759_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以邺都之旧壤，素为河朔之近封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163759_comment'></div>民风甚淳，郡务亦简，兵粗明于纪律，地不据于要冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163759_comment'></div>他人得之，尚众称于美任；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163759_comment'></div>愚臣叨此，盖籍隶于本邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163759_comment'></div>况臣至和之中，大卤为帅，以沉疴而露奏，遂故里以分符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163759_comment'></div>比旌纛之再归，正星霜之一纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163759_comment'></div>过家上冢，宠荐极于存亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163759_comment'></div>垂组夸乡，事更光于今昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163759_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下仁侔覆载，德绍祖宗，深邻累牍之告衰，乃命怀章而均逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163759_comment'></div>帝宸赐见，俯矜憔悴之容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163759_comment'></div>北道之藩，不夺便安之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163759_comment'></div>臣谨当奉行宽诏，啬养残骸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163759_comment'></div>访身之医而念国之医，治己之病而及民之病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163759_comment'></div>膏肓可愈，茍无二子之为妖；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163759_comment'></div>忠孝所存，惟誓一门之图报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163759_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1163759_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《初拜先坟》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_496292' class='_poem'><div class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496292")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496292_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496292'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496292'>未交符竹展先坟，肃肃秋天雨半昏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496292_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496292'>荣入松楸虽动色，感深闺闑复伤魂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496292_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496292'>山川望远平如日，父老欢迎识旧恩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496292_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496292'>白昼锦衣人已骇，更留旄节宿郊村。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《再题昼锦堂》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_496293' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496293' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496293?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再题昼锦堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496293")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496293_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496293'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496293'>为郡偏荣昼锦归，再容乡任古来稀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496293'>邸人只骇新章贵，仙表谁瞻旧鹤飞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496293'>浃境士民增慰悦，一轩风物起光辉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496293'>镵诗又志君恩厚，鼎镬捐身报亦微。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496293_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496293'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496293_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《再题休逸台》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十三。）</span><div id='poem_496294' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496294' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496294?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再题休逸台</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496294")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496294_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496294'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496294'>冰井梁摧几百秋，昔移为柱立台头。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496294'>层基面垒盘蜗壳，倒影侵池侧蜃楼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496294'>拂槛落霞凌绮席，入檐初月误琼钩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496294_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496294'>芳林已合阴成茂，不见西山涌万邱。<div id='poem_sentence_4_496300_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年10月</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。十月，韩琦《祭资政吴长文文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十四。）</span><div id='poem_1164186' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164186' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164186?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭资政吴长文文<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁元年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164186")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164186_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164186'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164186'>维熙宁元年岁次戊申，十月庚子朔某日，具位某谨遣人以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于大资政吴公侍郎之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164186_comment'></div>惟公之生，得道之粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164186_comment'></div>惟公之出，为世之瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164186_comment'></div>粤在妙龄，已彰奇器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164186_comment'></div>六经深醇，诸子同异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164186_comment'></div>下逮百家，史氏所志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164186_comment'></div>经公一览，则能诵记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164186_comment'></div>学优而仕，进道益勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164186_comment'></div>遂塞诏举，大名是振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164186_comment'></div>仁庙知公，擢公谏臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164186_comment'></div>耸激忠义，渐摩圣神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164186_comment'></div>致我后德，大猷日新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164186_comment'></div>领漕东南，使烦以试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164186_comment'></div>属部一清，何止经计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164186_comment'></div>更殿钜藩，所至称治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164186_comment'></div>风绩蔼然，实冠循吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164186_comment'></div>西掖代言，北门典制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164186_comment'></div>号令文章，一时温丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164186_comment'></div>翼翼京邑，则于四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164186_comment'></div>帝曰畴尹，惟公是当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164186_comment'></div>大豪兼并，过于寇攘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164186_comment'></div>公暴其罪，投之远荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164186_comment'></div>奸盗四走，坏其橐囊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164186_comment'></div>高视前辈，为宋赵、张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164186_comment'></div>上曰公贤，替我几命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164186_comment'></div>协心忧国，大本以定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164186_comment'></div>俄执亲丧，毁几灭性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164186_comment'></div>茹蔬泣血，卒羸而病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164186_comment'></div>服除还位，亟参大政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164186_comment'></div>真儒秉钧，内外交庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164186_comment'></div>任直为辅，忘身匪艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164186_comment'></div>辨白君道，呵排大奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164186_comment'></div>义贯白日，名高太山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164186_comment'></div>退处于外，孤风孰攀？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164186_comment'></div>公往治青，余趋雍部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164186_comment'></div>遐辱惠音，道其雅素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164186_comment'></div>且曰吾疾，庸医所误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164186_comment'></div>今虽调适，未甚如故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164186_comment'></div>余病亦久，勉而作书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164186_comment'></div>驰走一介，候公起居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164186_comment'></div>回得公答，慰吾勤渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164186_comment'></div>亲翰累幅，笔精有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164186_comment'></div>余喜料公，其疹必除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164186_comment'></div>命世之佐，百灵所扶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164186_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164186_comment'></div>书来未旬，余徙乡郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164186_comment'></div>复促召车，因令入觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164186_comment'></div>道闻公讣，心臆摧震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164186_comment'></div>天乎人乎，杳默奚讯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164186_comment'></div>善人云亡，乃邦之衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164186_comment'></div>公如可赎，余义当徇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164186_comment'></div>虽百其殒，夫亦何吝？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164186_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164186_comment'></div>历代已往，如公几人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164186_comment'></div>万世在后，公名永存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164186_comment'></div>孰寿孰夭，此安足论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164186_comment'></div>惟是馀庆，宜昌子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164186_comment'></div>何以致哀，奠公一樽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164186_comment'></div>公来歆乎，公灵者魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164186_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉，尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_59_1164186_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1068&endYear=1068')">1068年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《辞免河北四路安抚使第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163844' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163844' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163844?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免河北四路安抚使第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1068年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163844")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163844_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163844'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163844'>臣伏蒙圣慈特差中使李舜举赉赐臣诏敕，及传宣抚问，就差臣判大名府，充河北路安抚使，仍听便宜从事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163844_comment'></div>臣衰病馀生，赖陛下大恩，得假守乡里，以遂调养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163844_comment'></div>甫及百日，殊未补复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163844_comment'></div>而陛下以北道继有地震、水灾之患，不以臣无状，付此重寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163844_comment'></div>臣上体圣意，丁宁训谕，当强率疲劣，不敢再有诉免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163844_comment'></div>然前者刘有方回，臣已附奏：定州、真定府、高阳关三路，唯朝廷谨择帅臣，使得专制，则事皆耳目相接，易为裁处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163844_comment'></div>故昔日程琳、陈执中任大名府，亦曾差充河北路安抚使，寻各以此辞避，遂只当大名一路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163844_comment'></div>若将来徙臣北京，亦乞如程琳、陈执中之例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163844_comment'></div>臣今却授敕充河北一路安抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163844_comment'></div>且臣昨所陈请，盖欲朝廷不崇虚名，使逐路各展实效，庶几不误朝廷处置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163844_comment'></div>兼臣自去年疾病之后，精神顿觉减耗，不类日前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163844_comment'></div>若忝窃权任，不自量力，却致旷败，虽陛下以重责加臣，何益国事！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163844_comment'></div>欲望睿明照此，别赐指挥，许臣只充大名府路安抚使，以安愚分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163844_comment'></div>臣见交割相州公事与通判讫，且在本州，候得俞旨进发。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1163844_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年1月1日</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《元日祀坟马上》诗。<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦到相州，有《癸丑相州谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十二。）</span><div id='poem_1163770' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163770' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163770?labeling=true' target='_blank'>癸丑相州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163770")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163770_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163770'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163770'>臣某言：奉敕差判相州军州事，已于今月六日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163770_comment'></div>别都再满，难力勉于残躯；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163770_comment'></div>故里三临，见恩殊于旧老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163770_comment'></div>已班条教，遍晓吏民，既知圣君博爱之仁，又慰前守复来之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163770_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣孤忠少与，他技非长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163770_comment'></div>荷累朝含育之私，玷上宰弼谐之久，向辞钧轴，冀息衰疲，会西鄙之绎骚，继北方之震溢，复当忧责，莫遂安休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163770_comment'></div>补乡邦屡得于虚名，领帅任通踰于再闰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163770_comment'></div>矧是邺京之重，素推朔部之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163770_comment'></div>事鞅掌以装怀，殊无少间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163770_comment'></div>病缠绵而仍岁，寖以不支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163770_comment'></div>及兹当代之期，辄露乞怜之诉，愿上节旄之过宠，特更桑梓之近州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163770_comment'></div>始锡温言，谕河内所留之意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163770_comment'></div>卒膺可诏，有会稽如请之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163770_comment'></div>臣尝考载籍之名臣，记本朝之达宦，凡得被典城之寄，几何谐衣锦之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163770_comment'></div>如臣稠重，振古稀阔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163770_comment'></div>展先冢而松楸动色，过里门而耇稚相欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163770_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下广覆无偏，大明必照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163770_comment'></div>顾虫鱼之细，尚惟恐于伤生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163770_comment'></div>况簪履之恩，固不忘于轸旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163770_comment'></div>乃厚曲成之造，俾延将尽之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163770_comment'></div>敢不调养病襟，激昂老节，不以乡闾而为茍且之政，不以疾疹而幸尸素之安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163770_comment'></div>气体遂完，或可备国家之用；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163770_comment'></div>筋骸益瘁，即当求田里之归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163770_comment'></div>斯犬马之所存，在君亲而何报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163770_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1163770_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《癸丑初拜先坟》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十八。此诗作于神宗熙宁间韩琦判大名府时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_496443' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496443' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a id='poem_title_496569_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496569'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496569'>要剧更中外，几微照古今。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496569'>嘉谋增国重，和气入人深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496569_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
