id='poem_note_496569'><span class='label'>按：</span>以上《安阳集》卷四五<br /></div><div id='poem_note_496569_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《故观文殿学士太子少师致仕赠太子太师欧阳公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五十。）</span><div id='poem_1164168' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164168' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164168?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故观文殿学士太子少师致仕赠太子太师欧阳公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164168")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164168_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164168'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164168'>熙宁五年闰七月二十三日，观文殿学士、太子少师致仕欧阳公薨于汝阴之私第，年六十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164168_comment'></div>上闻震怛，不视朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164168_comment'></div>赠公太子太师，恤后加赙，不与常比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164168_comment'></div>天下正人节士，知公之亡，罔不骇然相顾，痛失依仰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164168_comment'></div>其孤寺丞君，乃以枢密副使吴公所次功绪，并致治命，以墓铭为请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164168_comment'></div>窃惟当世能文之士比比出公门下，不属于彼，而独以见属，岂公素谅其愚，谓能直笔，足信后世耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164168_comment'></div>此其敢辞！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164168_comment'></div>公讳修，字永叔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164168_comment'></div>唐太子率更令询四世孙琮，尝为吉州刺史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164168_comment'></div>又八世生万复，为吉之安福令，子孙因家焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164168_comment'></div>曾祖讳郴，安福六世孙也，孝悌之行，乡里师服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164168_comment'></div>南唐为武昌令，累赠太师、中书令，曾祖妣刘氏追封楚国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164168_comment'></div>祖讳偃，强学，善属文，南唐时献所为文十馀万言，试补南京衙院判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164168_comment'></div>累赠太师、中书令兼尚书令，祖妣李氏追封吴国太夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164168_comment'></div>父讳观，性至孝，力学，咸平中擢进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164168_comment'></div>当官明而尚恕，每决重辟，尤加审谨，茍理有可脱，必平反之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164168_comment'></div>终泰州军事判官，累赠太师、中书令兼尚书令，追封郑国公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164168_comment'></div>自公祖始徙居吉水，后吉水析为永丰，今为永丰人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164168_comment'></div>公四岁而孤，母韩国太夫人郑氏守志不夺，家虽贫，力自营赡，教公为学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164168_comment'></div>公亦天资警绝，经目一览，则能诵记，为文下笔，出人意表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164168_comment'></div>及冠，声问卓然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164168_comment'></div>天圣中举进士，凡两试国子监，一试礼部，皆为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164168_comment'></div>逮崇政试，虽中甲科，人犹以不魁多士为恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164168_comment'></div>初补西京留守推官，洛尹文康王公知非常才，归荐于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164168_comment'></div>景祐初，召试，迁镇南军节度掌书记、馆阁校勘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164168_comment'></div>时文正范公权尹京邑，以直道自进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164168_comment'></div>每因奏事，必陈时政得失，大忤宰相意，斥守饶州，谏官不敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164168_comment'></div>公贻书责之，坐贬峡州夷陵令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164168_comment'></div>余安道、尹师鲁继上书，直范公，复被逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164168_comment'></div>当时天下以「四贤」称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164168_comment'></div>俄徙光化军乾德令，改武成军节度判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164168_comment'></div>康定初，召还，复馆阁校勘，迁太子中允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164168_comment'></div>预修《崇文总目》成，改集贤校理，同知太常礼院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164168_comment'></div>请外补，通判滑州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164168_comment'></div>庆历初，仁宗御天下久，周悉时敝，重以西师未解，思欲整齐众治，以完太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164168_comment'></div>登进辅臣，必取人望，收用端鲠，以增谏员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164168_comment'></div>公首被其选，擢太常丞、知谏院事，赐五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164168_comment'></div>未几，同修起居注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164168_comment'></div>公素禀忠义，遭时遇主，自任言责，无所顾忌，横身正路，风节凛然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164168_comment'></div>时正献杜公、文正范公、今司空富公皆在二府，公每劝上乘间延见，推诚咨访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164168_comment'></div>上后开天章阁，屡召诸公询究治本，长策大议，稍稍施用，纪纲日举，侥倖顿绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164168_comment'></div>小人始大不喜，相与巧诋，必期破坏，公常极力左右之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164168_comment'></div>俄拜右正言、知制诰，赐三品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164168_comment'></div>大臣有建白，请废麟州，徙其治于合河津以省馈饷者，命公亲往相视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164168_comment'></div>使回奏曰：「麟州天险，正据要害，不可废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164168_comment'></div>第减其兵驻并河诸堡，有警呼集，数舍之近耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164168_comment'></div>兵既减，粮自不乏」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164168_comment'></div>诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164168_comment'></div>又奏：「忻、代州，苛岚、火山军并边民田，始潘美为帅，患虏时入寇，徙其民以空之，遂号禁地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164168_comment'></div>自景德通好，我虽循旧，而虏人盗耕不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164168_comment'></div>请募民计顷出丁为兵，量入租粟以耕之，岁可得数百万斛，边用给矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164168_comment'></div>不然，他日必尽为虏人所有」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164168_comment'></div>时并帅耻谋不自已，沮挠久之，其后卒如公请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164168_comment'></div>凡赋歛过重，民所不堪者，又奏罢十数事，疲俗以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164168_comment'></div>四年秋，北虏盛兵云州，声言西讨，朝廷疑其有谋，议选文武材臣，密为经画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164168_comment'></div>二府请辍公以往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164168_comment'></div>即以公为龙图阁直学士、河北都转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164168_comment'></div>公至，则区别官吏，使能者尽力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164168_comment'></div>均徙财用，而边计有馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164168_comment'></div>奏广御河漕运，造锁栿船以绝侵盗，置都作院于磁、相州，一道兵械悉仰给焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164168_comment'></div>方条列北方利病，欲大为措置，会文公、范公与同时入辅者终为谗说所胜，相继罢去，一时进用者皆指之为党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164168_comment'></div>公复慨然上书，极言论救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164168_comment'></div>执政与其朋益怒，协力挤之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164168_comment'></div>初，公有妹适张龟正，龟正亡，无子，妹挈前室所生孤女以归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164168_comment'></div>及笄，公为选宗人晟以嫁之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164168_comment'></div>会张氏以失行系狱，言者乘此欲并中公，复捃张氏赀产事，遂兴诏狱穷治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164168_comment'></div>上为命内臣监劾，卒辨其诬，犹降授知制诰、知滁州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164168_comment'></div>执政意不快，摭勘官与监劾内臣细故，皆被责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164168_comment'></div>八年春，就改起居舍人、知扬州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1164168_comment'></div>踰年，徙知颍州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1164168_comment'></div>皇祐初，复龙图阁直学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1164168_comment'></div>二年秋，移知应天府、兼南京留守司事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1164168_comment'></div>历尚书礼部、吏部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1164168_comment'></div>丁太夫人忧，去职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1164168_comment'></div>服除入见，上怪公须发尽白，恻然存抚，恩意甚厚，命判吏部流内铨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1164168_comment'></div>素忌公者恐将大用，乃伪为公疏请汰内臣，以激众怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1164168_comment'></div>有选人胡宗尧者，当引对改官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1164168_comment'></div>前任本州，尝以官舟假人，已而经赦去官，止得循资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1164168_comment'></div>公与判南曹官，对日取旨，上欣然令改官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1164168_comment'></div>宦者杨永德密奏曰：「宗尧，翰林学士宿之子，有司援救之，私也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1164168_comment'></div>遂出公知同州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1164168_comment'></div>物论不平，上亟开悟，留公刊修《唐书》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1164168_comment'></div>俄入翰林为学士、史馆修撰，勾当三班院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1164168_comment'></div>至和二年夏，请郡，改侍读学士、知蔡州事，留不行，复除翰林学士、判太常寺兼礼仪事，迁右谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1164168_comment'></div>嘉祐三年夏，兼龙图阁直学士、权知开封府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1164168_comment'></div>前尹孝肃包公以威严得名，都下震恐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1164168_comment'></div>而公动必循理，不求赫赫之誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1164168_comment'></div>或以少风采为言，公曰：「人材性各有短长，吾之长止于此，恶可勉其所短以徇人邪」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1164168_comment'></div>既而京师亦治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1164168_comment'></div>四年春，请罢府事，改给事中，充群牧使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1164168_comment'></div>《唐书》成，拜礼部侍郎，俄兼翰林侍读学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1164168_comment'></div>五年冬，以本官为枢密副使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1164168_comment'></div>明年秋，参知政事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1164168_comment'></div>英宗登极，迁户部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1164168_comment'></div>治平初，特转吏部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1164168_comment'></div>今上嗣位，改尚书左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1164168_comment'></div>公自处二府，益思报称，毅然守正，不为富贵易节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1164168_comment'></div>凡大谋议、大利害，与同官论辨，或在上前，必区判是否，未尝少有回屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1164168_comment'></div>文武之士，陈请百端，公常委曲开谕曰：某事可行，某事不可行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1164168_comment'></div>用是人多怨诽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1164168_comment'></div>至于台谏官论事，有不中理者，往往正色折之，其徒尤切齿，日欲求疵合攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1164168_comment'></div>公自视无他，不恤也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1164168_comment'></div>始，英庙践祚，按祖宗旧典，皇族尊属之亡者，皆赠官改封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1164168_comment'></div>濮安懿王，英庙所生父也，中书以本朝未有故事，请付有司详处其当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1164168_comment'></div>上谦恭谨重，命过仁庙大祥，下礼院与两制官同议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1164168_comment'></div>如期诏下，众乃言王当称伯，改封大国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1164168_comment'></div>中书以所生父称伯，疑无经据。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1164168_comment'></div>方再下三省议，上遽令权罢，俾有司徐求典故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1164168_comment'></div>事久不行，台官挟愤不已，遂持此斥为公主议，上章历诋，必请议定；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1164168_comment'></div>及以朝廷未尝议及之事，肆为诬说，欲惑众听，又相率纳告身以示必去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1164168_comment'></div>上数敦谕，知不可留，各以本官补外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1164168_comment'></div>后来者以风宪不胜为耻，窥伺愈急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1164168_comment'></div>今上即位初，御史蒋之奇者乃造无根之言，欲以污公，中丞彭思永乘虚助之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1164168_comment'></div>公退伏私居，力请公辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1164168_comment'></div>上照其诬罔，连诏诘问，二人者辞穷，皆坐贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1164168_comment'></div>公遂恳辞柄任，上不得已，除公观文殿学士、刑部尚书、知亳州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1164168_comment'></div>熙宁元年秋，迁兵部尚书、知青州事，充京东东路安抚使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1164168_comment'></div>时散青苗钱法初行，众议皆言不便，朝廷既伸告诫，公犹请除去二分之息，令民止纳本钱，明不取利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1164168_comment'></div>又请先罢提举管勾官，然后可以责州县不得抑配，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1164168_comment'></div>三年夏，除检校太保、宣徽南院使、判太原府、河东路经略安抚使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1164168_comment'></div>公累上章辞，丐易蔡州，大略以久疾昏耗，不任重寄，复曰时多喜新奇，而臣思守拙，众方兴功利，而臣欲循常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1164168_comment'></div>执政知终不附己，俄诏听以旧官知蔡州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1164168_comment'></div>公在亳，已六上章请致政，上眷惜之，不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1164168_comment'></div>至蔡踰年，复申前请，志益坚确。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1164168_comment'></div>上察其诚，命优改官致仕，年方六十有五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1164168_comment'></div>天下士大夫闻公勇退，无不惊叹云「近古所无也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1164168_comment'></div>公天资刚劲，见义敢为，襟怀洞然，无有城府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1164168_comment'></div>尝以平心为难，故未尝挟私以为喜怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1164168_comment'></div>奖进人物，乐善不倦，一长之得，力为称荐，故赏识之下，率为闻人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1164168_comment'></div>唯视奸邪嫉若雠敌，直前奋击，不问权贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1164168_comment'></div>后虽阴被谗逐，公以道自处，怡怡如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1164168_comment'></div>平生笃于朋友，如尹师鲁、梅圣俞、孙明复既卒，其家贫甚，公力经营之，使皆得以自给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1164168_comment'></div>又表其孤于朝，悉录以官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1164168_comment'></div>自唐室之衰，文体隳而不振，陵夷至于五代，气益卑弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1164168_comment'></div>国初柳公仲涂，一时大儒，以古道兴起之，学者卒不从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1164168_comment'></div>景祐初，公与尹师鲁专以古文相尚，而公得之自然，非学所至，超然独骛，众莫能及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1164168_comment'></div>譬夫天地之妙，造化万物，动者植者，无细与大，不见痕迹，自极其工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1164168_comment'></div>于是<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_137_1164168", 1164168, "Clauses/448/Comments/0")'>文风</span>一变，时人竞为模范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1164168_comment'></div>自汉司马迁没几千年，而唐韩愈出；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1164168_comment'></div>愈之后又数百年，而公始继之，气燄相薄，莫较高下，何其盛哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1164168_comment'></div>所治经术，务究大本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1164168_comment'></div>尝以先儒于经所得多矣，而不能无失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1164168_comment'></div>唯其说或有未通，公始为辨正，不过求圣人之意以立异论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1164168_comment'></div>嘉祐初，权知贡举，时举者务为险怪之语，号「太学体」，公一切黜去，取其平澹造理者即预奏名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1164168_comment'></div>初虽怨讟纷纭，而文格终以复故者，公之力也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1164168_comment'></div>笔翰遒劲，自成一家，人有得其片幅，必宝藏之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1164168_comment'></div>历典大郡，以镇静为本，明不及察，宽不至纵，吏民受赐，既去追思不已，滁、扬二州皆立生祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1164168_comment'></div>尝奉使契丹，其主必遣贵臣押宴，出于常例，且谓公曰：「以公名重故耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1164168_comment'></div>其为外夷钦服如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1164168_comment'></div>至和中，陈恭公为相，欲塞商胡决河，使归横陇故道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1164168_comment'></div>公言横陇地已高仰，功大不可为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1164168_comment'></div>未几陈罢去，有李仲昌者，乃议道商胡水入六塔河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1164168_comment'></div>公复上言，六塔素隘狭，不能容大河，若为之，必溃决，害愈甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1164168_comment'></div>时执政是仲昌议，又不用公言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1164168_comment'></div>后六塔堤果坏不成，自博以下数州，皆被水患，众服公先识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1164168_comment'></div>在侍从八年，竭诚补益，前后上言百馀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1164168_comment'></div>仁宗尝曰：「如欧阳修者，何处得来」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1164168_comment'></div>故其言多所听纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1164168_comment'></div>因嘉祐水灾，凡两上疏请选立皇子，以固根本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1164168_comment'></div>及在政府，遂与诸公参定大议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1164168_comment'></div>方英庙过自谦退，未即承命，事久未决，众悉危之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1164168_comment'></div>公协心开助，忠力为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1164168_comment'></div>及即位之初，感疾未能听断，慈寿预政，事出权宜，公与诸公往来两宫，镇安内外，卒复明辟，人无间言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1164168_comment'></div>尝被诏撰《唐书》纪十卷、志五十卷、表十五卷，又自撰《五代史》七十四卷，《易童子问》三卷、《诗本义》十四卷、《居士集》五十卷、《归荣集》一卷、《外制集》三卷、《内制集》八卷、奏议十一卷、《四六集》七卷、《集古录跋尾》十卷、杂著十九卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1164168_comment'></div>公于物无他玩好，独好收古文图书，集三代以来金石铭刻为一千卷，用以校正传记讹谬，人得不疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1164168_comment'></div>晚年自号六一居士，曰：「吾《集古录》一千卷，藏书一万卷，有琴一张、有棋一局，常置酒一壶，吾老于其间，是为六一」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1164168_comment'></div>因自为传以志之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1164168_comment'></div>初娶胥氏，翰林学士偃之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1164168_comment'></div>继室杨氏，集贤院学士、谏议大夫大雅之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1164168_comment'></div>今夫人薛氏，资政殿学士、户部侍郎简肃公奎之女，累封仁寿郡夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1164168_comment'></div>男八人：长发，次奕，并光禄寺丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1164168_comment'></div>次棐，大理评事；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1164168_comment'></div>次辩，光禄寺丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1164168_comment'></div>馀皆早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1164168_comment'></div>女三人，皆早卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1164168_comment'></div>熙宁某年某月某日，诸孤奉公之丧，葬于某地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1164168_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_176_1164168'>噫公之节，其刚烈烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1164168_comment'></div>弼违斥奸，义不可折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1164168_comment'></div>噫公之文，天资不群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1164168_comment'></div>光辉古今，左右典坟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1164168_comment'></div>直道而行，屡以谗蹶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1164168_comment'></div>卒寤而知，惟帝之哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1164168_comment'></div>升赞机务，方隅以宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1164168_comment'></div>参议宰政，社稷是经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1164168_comment'></div>成此至公，大忠以效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1164168_comment'></div>德高毁及，退不吾较。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1164168_comment'></div>公之来归，既安且怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1164168_comment'></div>宜报以寿，戾也胡为？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1164168_comment'></div>公文在人，公迹在史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1164168_comment'></div>惟兹不穷，亘千万祀。</div><div id='poem_sentence_189_1164168_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163773'>臣某言：本州准枢密院劄子，奉圣旨，河北西路转运司近奏劾相州违条差壮城兵士，往诸处收买修造物色，已差磁州通判季琮取勘，并特放免者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163773_comment'></div>郡条纷冗，难逃<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1163773", 1163773, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>误失</span>之愆；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163773_comment'></div>使部按绳，当坐旷隳之责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163773_comment'></div>特荷圣明之烛隐，遽从宽贷以推恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163773_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣气劣早衰，心疲易耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163773_comment'></div>自乡闾之窃守，婴疾苦以弥年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163773_comment'></div>力不堪烦，果自贻于谴咎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163773_comment'></div>上犹加恤，俄曲示于矜容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163773_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下大度渊深，至仁天覆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163773_comment'></div>谓求诸小过，则动触于常刑；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163773_comment'></div>故眷及旧臣，使众知于优礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163773_comment'></div>方愿归于畎亩，敢少忘于国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163773_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div target='_blank'>甲寅秋乞致仕第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163774")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163774_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163774'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163774'>臣某言：知足所以不辱，道家之至言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163774_comment'></div>谢病岂必待年，先儒之高论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163774_comment'></div>顾宿疴之寖剧，嗟瘁质以难支，欲逃瞰室之灾，敢露乞骸之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163774_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣性资甚戆，学术非长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163774_comment'></div>徒被眷于三朝，悉叨荣于上宰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163774_comment'></div>力不胜任，居怀覆餗之忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163774_comment'></div>天责其盈，常困负薪之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163774_comment'></div>屡剡由衷之奏，获从补外之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163774_comment'></div>荐持西北之要权，莫副朝廷之重寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163774_comment'></div>向辞会府，还守本邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163774_comment'></div>垂组夸乡，固多荣耀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163774_comment'></div>息阴止影，少幸安休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163774_comment'></div>而臣积恙有年，良医莫辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163774_comment'></div>气攻胸胁，痛甚戈矛之所伤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163774_comment'></div>衅起膏肓，理非药石之能近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163774_comment'></div>茍尚贪于厚禄，必遄丧于馀生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163774_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下特推天地之大恩，俯念桑榆之末景，许上还于印绶，俾退处于衡茅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163774_comment'></div>则臣得以释去吏劳，保完神干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163774_comment'></div>庶获万全之灵剂，更施一溉之微功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163774_comment'></div>在圳亩以爱君，敢忘忠国；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163774_comment'></div>先犬马而填壑，是亦甘心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163774_comment'></div>傥赐矜从，仍乞只守本官致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163774_comment'></div>干冒旒扆，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1163774_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《甲寅秋乞致仕第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十二。）</span><div id='poem_1163775' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163775' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163775?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲寅秋乞致仕第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163775")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163775_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163775'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163775'>臣某言：近以衰老多病，上表乞守本官致仕，伏蒙圣慈特差中使赍赐诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163775_comment'></div>弗瘳之疾，固日极于尪疲；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163775_comment'></div>将尽之年，窃自怜于光景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163775_comment'></div>愿辞隆于将相，得归佚于林泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163775_comment'></div>未赐恩俞，再祈轸恻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163775_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以不能者止，斯为量力之宜；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163775_comment'></div>厥位惟危，岂有苟安之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163775_comment'></div>矧微生之寡祐，感奇瘵以难名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163775_comment'></div>当血气之未衰，尚任攻治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163775_comment'></div>逮筋骸之益瘁，莫可支持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163775_comment'></div>皆由臣旷责无惭，冒荣不退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163775_comment'></div>天既恶其盈满，鬼亦瞰乎高明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163775_comment'></div>致兹阴谴以何逃，独恃君仁而可诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163775_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下曲矜旧老，俯照孤诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163775_comment'></div>念臣如礼休官，止有二期而甚近；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163775_comment'></div>闵臣缠疴莅事，曾无一日之少安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163775_comment'></div>释其绊羁，遂彼刍菽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163775_comment'></div>许乞身于田里，觊延命于朝昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163775_comment'></div>漏尽而行，免贻讥于识者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163775_comment'></div>日入而息，庶同乐于耕民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163775_comment'></div>使获全于始终，惟永荷于仁圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163775_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1163775_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《甲寅秋乞致仕第三表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十二。）</span><div id='poem_1163776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163776' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163776?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲寅秋乞致仕第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163776")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163776_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163776'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163776'>臣某言：近以衰老多病，两上表乞守本官致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163776_comment'></div>伏蒙圣慈特差中使赍赐诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163776_comment'></div>窜漳之疾，久已深根；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163776_comment'></div>游岱之魂，日将去干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163776_comment'></div>茍不婴于职事，得退伏于私居，尚觊衰残，稍延视息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163776_comment'></div>仰俞恩而未下，幸哀诉以终怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163776_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以千载逢时，适其志者古实难偶；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163776_comment'></div>万钟受禄，患其失者人之常情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163776_comment'></div>况臣丁全盛之期，遇至仁之主，为郡处乡闾之便，忝官兼将相之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163776_comment'></div>岂不欲凭藉龙光，留连富贵，忍自投于闲寂，甘取诮于昏愚？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163776_comment'></div>盖臣以疾苦支离，力难勉强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163776_comment'></div>据疾颠之位，既居常而弗安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163776_comment'></div>指告劳之年，又将及而无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163776_comment'></div>叹崦嵫之渐迫，陈悃愊以再殚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163776_comment'></div>痛甚而慈亲莫闻，诚至而高穹必动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163776_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下扩天地无垠之施，闵冰炭不治之疴，贷此馀龄，矜其末路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163776_comment'></div>赐以安车之宠，息兹驽驾之疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163776_comment'></div>使朝廷有知止之臣，足光圣政；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163776_comment'></div>顾鱼鸟得遂生之乐，免负惭颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163776_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1163776_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《甲寅秋乞致仕第一表》作品：《甲寅秋乞致仕札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《甲寅秋乞致仕第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163871' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163871' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163871?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲寅秋乞致仕第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163871")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163871_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163871'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163871'>臣近以衰年多病，再上表陈乞致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163871_comment'></div>伏蒙圣慈特差入内内侍省内东头供奉官、勾当内东门司刘惟简赍赐诏书不允，及传宣抚问，以臣不同庶官，宜体朝廷眷待之意，不令更上封章，必难从者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163871_comment'></div>臣辄还君事，轻冒天威，而烦陛下两遣使人，曲加训谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163871_comment'></div>恩礼优异，事极殊常，远近叹惊，衰疲改观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163871_comment'></div>蝼蚁之贱，如何报塞！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163871_comment'></div>唯恃仁恤，重此披露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163871_comment'></div>窃以七十致政，礼之大方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163871_comment'></div>然及期而不能去者多，而未及期而能去者鲜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163871_comment'></div>盖贪权贪禄，人之常情；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163871_comment'></div>知足知退，士之高节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163871_comment'></div>臣之此举，岂欲专矫常情，而自取高节哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163871_comment'></div>诚以才微福过，天理不容，贻此身灾，频年被疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163871_comment'></div>精神日以昏耗，筋力难于勉强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163871_comment'></div>方朝廷求治有为之际，不能推行法制，少救凋残，夙夜骇忧，莫知所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163871_comment'></div>若尚晏安乡郡，不思退藏，虽陛下常赐保全，而天下之责不浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163871_comment'></div>臣所以决然告老，了不自惑者，实望陛下念臣宣力三朝，久劳多病，得于七十以前，不循常例，许臣退身田里，治养宿瘵，安然待尽，则陛下大恩，虽天地之造不过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163871_comment'></div>万世所观，足为荣耀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163871_comment'></div>一时之劝，实厚风俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163871_comment'></div>君臣之义，可谓两得矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163871_comment'></div>且陛下爱臣抚臣如此之至，而臣将再沥危恳，愿遂雅志者，岂敢故有违忤，自掇废弃哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163871_comment'></div>盖臣子以疾求退，仰诉君父，察情观过，理或可矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163871_comment'></div>必贷重诛，赐以俞命。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1163871_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《甲寅秋乞致仕第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163872' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163872' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163872?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲寅秋乞致仕第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163872")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163872_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163872'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163872'>臣近以衰老多病，三上表陈乞致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163872_comment'></div>伏蒙圣慈特差入内内侍省内东头供奉官、勾当内东门司裴昱赍赐诏书不允，及传宣抚问，令臣体认累降旨命，宜寝所乞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163872_comment'></div>老病乞骸，人臣常分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163872_comment'></div>而烦陛下三遣使指，累谕德音，训抚丁宁，不容谢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163872_comment'></div>虽簪履服御之旧，不忍遽捐；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163872_comment'></div>顾犬马疾疹之馀，何由自效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163872_comment'></div>恩深报浅，感极涕零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163872_comment'></div>臣闻所谓大臣者，以道事君，不可则止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163872_comment'></div>而臣频年以来，宿恙攻作，精神日耗，疲劣异常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163872_comment'></div>久安乡邦，坐窃厚禄，当止不止，可谓不能以道事君者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163872_comment'></div>夙夜惟省，愧不自安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163872_comment'></div>所以叠上奏封，愿归田里，庶谐治养，少保馀龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163872_comment'></div>而陛下但以老臣历辅三朝，粗竭忠力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163872_comment'></div>虽有衰髦不职，尸素无耻之罪，一皆掩而不问，荐加慰劳，未许退休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163872_comment'></div>臣上体陛下垂恤老臣礼意如此之厚，更不敢重陈悃愊，上渎圣聪，勉策疲驽，以就职事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163872_comment'></div>然沈疴内梗，日久日深，年岁之间，势必增甚，至时不免复申前请，仰叩上仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163872_comment'></div>预输哀切之诚，幸赐记怜之造。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1163872_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　是年秋，韩琦多次上章乞致仕，神宗不允。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《次韵答文侍中寄示韩晋公村田歌舞图颜鲁公跋尾乃使题于后》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_496503' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496503' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496503?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵答文侍中寄示韩晋公村田歌舞图颜鲁公跋尾仍使题于后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496503")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_496503_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496503'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496503'>韩画颜书世绝珠，铃斋时足奉驩虞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496503'>跋题应命诚羞涩，不是跳龙卧虎徒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496503_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496503'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_496503_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年8月15日</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《甲寅中秋对月二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十九。）</span>《甲寅中秋对月二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_496504' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496504' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496504?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲寅中秋对月二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年8月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496504")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496504_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496504'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496504'>七宝成轮上海东，他圆争与此时同。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496504'>须知一夜清光别，为得三秋正色中。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496504'>唐曲听回云作驾，邺园游盛盖飞鸿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496504'>古人只恨音尘阔，对赏樽樽愿一空。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496504_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496504'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496504_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496505' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496505' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496505?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年8月15日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496505_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496505'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496505'>中秋侵夕启宾罍，共看长空一鉴开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496505'>四坐雪霜清耳目，万家昆阆倚楼台。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496505'>波凉桂子从天落，阴极潮头半海来。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496505'>正好抽毫竞高唱，当筵人胜仲宣才。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496505_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496505'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496505_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《提举陈龙图迁居邢台二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十九。）</span>《提举陈龙图迁居邢台二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_496506' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496506' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496506?labeling=true' target='_blank'>提举陈龙图迁居邢台二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_496506'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496506'>乡居新葺后，归兴邈难招。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496506'>老去重离别，秋来添寂寥。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496506'>云横初送雁，渡浅未成桥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496506'>千里犹思驾，封圻幸不遥。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496506_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496506'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496506_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496507' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496507' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496507?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496507_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496507'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496507'>多病襟怀易入忧，那堪惊别复惊秋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496507'>难追刘白樽前乐，尚约松乔世外游。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496507'>花发东篱谁共酌，草荒南浦只生愁。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496507'>从兹冷落欢吟地，昼锦荣归兴狎鸥。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496507_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496507'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496507_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年9月9日</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《甲寅重九》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_496508' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496508' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496508?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲寅重九</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年9月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496508")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496508_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496508'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496508'>勉同风俗燕重阳，可惜良辰值岁荒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496508'>南亩流民方塞路，东篱嘉菊漫浮觞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496508'>虽无弦管追游乐，赖有山川气象强。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496508'>自笑当筵陶靖节，几时归去傲羲皇。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496508_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496508'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496508_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年10月1日</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《孟冬朔日祀坟二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十九。）</span>《孟冬朔日祀坟二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_496509' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496509' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496509?labeling=true' target='_blank'>孟冬朔日祀坟二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年10月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496509")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496509_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496509'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496509'>亲茔来展祀，郊野未霜严。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496509'>古道日低削，高山时仰瞻。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496509'>寒花虽在目，短谷不加镰。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496509'>多少幽闲趣，吾方事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_496509", 496509, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>退潜</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496509_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496509'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496509_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_496510' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496510' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496510?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年10月1日）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496510_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496510'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496510'>首冬斋洁款先茔，极目郊原一望清。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496510'>无限人心苏尺雨，有时天意活苍生。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496510'>遥林蓊郁霜来晚，荒陇稀疏穗不成。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496510'>何术济民归未得，愧偷官禄奉粢盛。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496510_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496510'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496510_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《祀坟马上》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十九。）</span><div id='poem_496511' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496511' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496511?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祀坟马上</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496511")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496511_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496511'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496511'>二茔逢节展松楸，因叹农畴荐不收。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496511'>高穗有时存蜀黍，善耕犹惜卖吴牛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496511'>泉乾几处闲机硙，雨过谁家用粪楼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496511'>首种渐生还自喜，尚忧难救赤春头<span class='inlineComment2'>（以上《安阳集》卷一九）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496511_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496511'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496511_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1074&endYear=1074')">1074年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《故枢密直学士礼部尚书赠左仆射张公神道碑铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五十。）</span><div id='poem_1164169' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164169' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164169?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故枢密直学士礼部尚书赠左仆射张公神道碑铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1074年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164169")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164169_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164169'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164169'>故枢密直学士、礼部尚书、赠左仆射张公，以魁奇豪杰之材，逢时自奋，智略神出，勋业赫赫，震暴当世，诚一代之伟人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164169_comment'></div>某向守大名，其孙尧夫主簿元城，一日具书来告曰：「尧夫之曾祖，昔事太宗、真宗朝，勤劳内外，有大名于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164169_comment'></div>而自葬距今，历年久矣，墓碑之刻，阙然未立，请书其实，以表神道，固祖烈之益光也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164169_comment'></div>某尝总领史局，观所载公文武大节，颇亦详矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164169_comment'></div>然其绝异之政，与夫遗爱之迹，较然著于人听者，犹未完悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164169_comment'></div>今得与钜贤论次而发扬之，以昭示于后世，诚所愿已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164169_comment'></div>公讳咏，字复之，世本邺人，后徙居澶之临黄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164169_comment'></div>及公葬其先于鄄城，故为濮之鄄城人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164169_comment'></div>曾祖讳立，祖讳铎，遭唐末与五代之乱，皆潜养德业，退处无闷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164169_comment'></div>父讳景，以儒行自富，乡里称之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164169_comment'></div>公登朝，授大理评事，累赠太常卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164169_comment'></div>公少倜傥有大志，尚气节，重然诺，为学必本仁义，不喜浮靡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164169_comment'></div>太平兴国四年秋，与忠悯寇公同赴大名举，议将首荐公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164169_comment'></div>公以同郡张覃素有文行，即率寇公上书，请以覃为冠，一府钦叹，遂如公言，士论多之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164169_comment'></div>明年春，擢进士第，授大理评事、知鄂州崇阳县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164169_comment'></div>六年，遇郊恩，改将作监丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164169_comment'></div>雍熙初，迁著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164169_comment'></div>岁满，擢太子中允、通判麟州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164169_comment'></div>端拱籍田恩，转秘书丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164169_comment'></div>代归，通判相州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164169_comment'></div>公以亲老辞，得监濮州税，俄选知开封府浚仪县事，赐五品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164169_comment'></div>时寇公与文靖李公、故枢密副使宋公湜连荐其才，擢荆湖北路转运使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164169_comment'></div>淳化初，就改太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164169_comment'></div>制置使称其能，诏褒美之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164169_comment'></div>太宗素知公可用，召还，超拜虞部郎中，赐三品服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164169_comment'></div>未逾旬，擢为枢密直学士、知通进银台司兼门下封駮事，勾当三班院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164169_comment'></div>时张永德为并、代帅，小校犯法，杖之而死，有诏按罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164169_comment'></div>公封还诏书，曰：「永德方被边寄，若责一小校遂摧辱之，臣恐帅体轻而小人慢上矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164169_comment'></div>不纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164169_comment'></div>既而果营卒胁诉其大校者，上始寤公言，面加慰劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164169_comment'></div>四年冬，东、西两川旱，民饥，吏失救恤，寇大起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164169_comment'></div>五年正月，贼首李顺陷成都府，诏遣昭宣使王继恩充招安使，率兵讨之，复命公知成都府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164169_comment'></div>五月，继恩破贼收成都，上留公至秋始遣行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164169_comment'></div>时关中率民负粮以饷川师，道路不绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164169_comment'></div>公至府，问城中所屯兵尚三万人，而无半月之食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164169_comment'></div>公访知盐价素高，而廪有馀积，乃下其估，听民得以米易盐，于是民争趋之，未踰月，得米数千万斛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164169_comment'></div>军中喜而呼曰：「前所给米，皆杂糠土，不可食，今一一精好，此翁真善干国事者」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164169_comment'></div>公闻而喜曰：「吾令可行矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164169_comment'></div>时益虽收复诸郡，馀寇尚充斥，继恩恃功骄恣，不复出兵，日以娱燕为事，军不戢，往往剽夺民财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164169_comment'></div>公于是悉擒招安司素用事吏至廷，面数其过，将尽斩之，吏皆股栗求活。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164169_comment'></div>公曰：「汝帅聚兵玩寇，不肯出，皆汝辈为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164169_comment'></div>今能亟白乃帅分其兵，尚可免死」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164169_comment'></div>吏呼曰：「唯公所命，兵不分，愿就戮」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164169_comment'></div>公释之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164169_comment'></div>继恩即日分兵邻州，当还京师者悉遣之，不数日减城中兵半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164169_comment'></div>既而诸军请食马刍粟，公命以钱给之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164169_comment'></div>继恩诟曰：「马不食钱，给钱何也」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164169_comment'></div>公闻，召继恩谓曰：「今贼馀党，所在尚多，民不敢出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164169_comment'></div>招安使顿兵城中，不即讨，刍粟民所输，今城外皆寇也，何由得之」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164169_comment'></div>继恩惧，即时出城讨贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164169_comment'></div>公计军食有二岁备，乃奏罢陕西运粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164169_comment'></div>上喜曰：「向益州日以乏粮为请，咏至方踰月，已有二岁备，此人何事不能了？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164169_comment'></div>朕无虑矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164169_comment'></div>公以顺党始皆良民，一旦为贼胁从，复其间有疲弱，偶挂盗籍者，当示以恩信，许其自新，即揭榜谕之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164169_comment'></div>已而首者相踵，公皆释其罪，使归田里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164169_comment'></div>一日，继恩械贼数十人，请公行法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164169_comment'></div>公询之，悉皆前所自首者，复纵之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164169_comment'></div>继恩恚而问公，公曰：「前日李顺胁民为贼，今日仆化贼为民，不亦可乎」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164169_comment'></div>公度继恩日横不能改，亟以状闻，愿选忠实可倚者，与继恩共事，庶不敢独任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164169_comment'></div>上乃命入内内侍省押班卫绍钦充同招安使，自是继恩凶势为屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164169_comment'></div>未几二人者皆召归，就以剑门关总管上官正为招安使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164169_comment'></div>顺之馀党，公抚安于内，正擒讨于外，再阅月而两川平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164169_comment'></div>至道二年，改兵部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164169_comment'></div>继丁父与母新昌郡太夫人谢氏忧，皆起复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164169_comment'></div>三年秋，西川都巡检使韩景祐为所部广武卒刘旴所逐，率众掠怀安军，破汉州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164169_comment'></div>公方与僚属会大慈寺，报至，饮燕如故，举城忧之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164169_comment'></div>贼又掠邛、蜀，将趋益，公适会客，报者愈急，公复不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164169_comment'></div>其夕，始召上官正谓曰：「贼始发，不三四日破数郡，势方锐，不可击。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164169_comment'></div>今人得所掠，气骄，敢逼吾城，乃送死耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1164169_comment'></div>请出兵北至方井，当遇贼，破之必矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1164169_comment'></div>正即受教，及行，公为出送于郊，激其尽力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1164169_comment'></div>正至方井，果遇贼，一战斩旴首，馀党尽平，众益服公料敌制胜，人所不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1164169_comment'></div>真宗即位，迁左谏议大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1164169_comment'></div>咸平初，召拜给事中，充户部使，改御史中丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1164169_comment'></div>承天节大臣主斋会，被酒不如礼，公弹奏之，无所惮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1164169_comment'></div>二年，与温公仲舒同知贡举，俄以工部侍郎知杭州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1164169_comment'></div>时岁饥，民冒禁贩盐，捕获者数百人，公悉宽其罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1164169_comment'></div>官属执言不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1164169_comment'></div>公曰：「钱塘十万家，饿殍如此，若盐禁益严，则聚而为盗，患益甚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1164169_comment'></div>俟秋成敢尔，当痛以法绳之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1164169_comment'></div>境内卒以无扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1164169_comment'></div>时岁满，杭人诣阙请留，有诏褒其善政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1164169_comment'></div>五年冬，改知永兴军府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1164169_comment'></div>初，公之自蜀还也，诏以谏议大夫牛冕代公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1164169_comment'></div>公闻之曰：「冕非抚御才，其能绥戢乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1164169_comment'></div>始踰年，果致神卫大校王均之乱，逐冕据益州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1164169_comment'></div>后虽讨平之，而民尚未宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1164169_comment'></div>会益守马公知节徙延安，上以公前治蜀，长于安集，威惠在人，复以公为枢密直学士，迁刑部侍郎、知益州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1164169_comment'></div>蜀民闻之，皆鼓舞相庆，如赤子久失父母，而知复来鞠我也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1164169_comment'></div>公知民信己，易严以易，凡一令之下，人情莫不慰惬，蜀部复大治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1164169_comment'></div>转运使黄观以政迹闻，赐诏加奖，就改吏部侍郎，命谢涛巡抚于蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1164169_comment'></div>上遣涛谕公曰：「得卿在蜀，朕不复有西顾之忧」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1164169_comment'></div>因诏公与涛议铸景德大铁钱于嘉、邛州，一当小铁钱十，铜钱一，于今便之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1164169_comment'></div>景德三年，召还，复掌三班院，兼判登闻检院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1164169_comment'></div>中岁，疡生于脑，不能巾栉，求知颍州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1164169_comment'></div>上以公名臣，有人望，两守益部，政无及者，不当屈于小郡，以真定府、青州皆大镇也，听公自择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1164169_comment'></div>公皆不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1164169_comment'></div>上曰：「升州可乎」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1164169_comment'></div>公即拜命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1164169_comment'></div>大中祥符元年，东封恩转尚书左丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1164169_comment'></div>时金陵多火灾，居者不安，公廉知皆奸民所为，潜捕得之，乃命先折其胫，斩之以徇，火患遂绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1164169_comment'></div>中使祠茅山还，言城中有黄雀蔽日而坠，空中闻水声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1164169_comment'></div>上视占书，主民劳，谓辅臣曰：「但守臣得人，此固无患，今咏在彼，又何虞也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1164169_comment'></div>三年春，秩满，升民请留，迁工部尚书，再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1164169_comment'></div>俄以江东旱，命兼升、宣等十州安抚使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1164169_comment'></div>祀汾阴恩，加礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1164169_comment'></div>以疡疾甚，上章求分司西京，上闵之，亟令代还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1164169_comment'></div>不能朝，恳请便郡，差知陈州事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1164169_comment'></div>终于八年八月一日，年七十。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1164169_comment'></div>上尝称公有将相器，以疾未及用，至是大痛惜之，命优赠官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1164169_comment'></div>仁宗朝追谥忠定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1164169_comment'></div>公天赋正直，济以刚果，始终挺然，无所屈挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1164169_comment'></div>自力学筮仕，则有泽及天下之心，而以富贵为薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1164169_comment'></div>逸人傅霖，高蹈之士，与公素善，公尝与夜会剧谈，时诸邻多病疟者，一夕顿愈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1164169_comment'></div>逮登第，与傅诗有「巢、由莫相笑，心不为轻肥」之句，此见公之志也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1164169_comment'></div>尝访三峰陈先生抟，一见公，厚遇之，顾谓弟子曰：「此人于名利澹然无情，达必为公卿，不达则为帝王师」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1164169_comment'></div>其为高人推重如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1164169_comment'></div>早学击剑，遂精其术，两河间人无敌者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1164169_comment'></div>生平勇于为义，遇人艰急，茍情有可哀，必极力以济，无所顾惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1164169_comment'></div>当官凡所施设，动有远识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1164169_comment'></div>始时人或不能测，其后卒有大利，民感无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1164169_comment'></div>至自奉养，逮于服玩之具，则寡薄俭陋，虽寒士不若也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1164169_comment'></div>公退辟静室，焚香燕坐，聚书万卷，往往手自校正，旁无声色之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1164169_comment'></div>临事明决，出人意外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1164169_comment'></div>凡断罪以辞者，人皆集录，于今传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1164169_comment'></div>在馀杭，有富民病将死，子方三岁，乃命其婿主其赀，而与婿遗书曰：「他日欲分财，即以十之三与子，而以七与婿」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1164169_comment'></div>子时长立，果以财为讼，婿持其遗书诣府，请如元约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1164169_comment'></div>公阅之，以酒酹地曰：「汝之妇翁，智人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1164169_comment'></div>时以子幼，故以此属汝，不然，子死汝手矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1164169_comment'></div>乃命以其财三与婿，而子与其七，皆泣谢而去，服公明断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1164169_comment'></div>前后治益，爱利之政不可悉纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1164169_comment'></div>举其大者，则公尝以蜀地素狭，游手者众，事宁之后，生齿日繁，稍遇水旱，则民必艰食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1164169_comment'></div>时米㪷直钱三十六，乃按诸邑田税，使如其价，岁折米六万斛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1164169_comment'></div>至春，籍田中细民计口给券，俾输元估籴之，奏为永制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1164169_comment'></div>逮今七十馀年，虽时有灾馑，米甚贵而益民无馁色者，公之赐也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1164169_comment'></div>蜀风尚侈，好遨乐，公从其俗，凡一岁之内，游观之所与夫饮馔之品，皆著为常法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1164169_comment'></div>后人谨而从之则治，违之则人情不安，辄以累罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1164169_comment'></div>尝写其真，自号「乖崖子」，复为赞曰：「乖则违众，崖不利物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1164169_comment'></div>乖崖之名，聊以表德」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1164169_comment'></div>及公之亡也，蜀民闻之，皆罢市号恸，得公遗像，置天庆观之仙游阁，建大斋会，事之如生，至今不懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1164169_comment'></div>昔召公分陕而治，民爱而思之，尝听讼于棠下，戒勿剪伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1164169_comment'></div>羊公在襄阳，立碑岘首，民戴遗德，过辄堕泪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1164169_comment'></div>后历千馀载，能继其风凛然如存者，独公一人而已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1164169_comment'></div>公有清鉴，善臧否人物，凡所荐辟，皆方廉恬退之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1164169_comment'></div>尝曰：「彼好奔竞者，将自得之，何假吾举」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1164169_comment'></div>益不贡士者几二十年，学校颓替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1164169_comment'></div>公察郡人张及、李畋、张逵者，皆有学行，乡里所服，遂延奖加礼，敦勉就举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1164169_comment'></div>后三人悉登科，历美官，于是两川学者知劝，文风日振，由公之诱掖也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1164169_comment'></div>文章雄健有气骨，称其为人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1164169_comment'></div>尝为《声赋》，梁公周翰览而叹曰：「二百年来不见此作矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1164169_comment'></div>有文集十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1164169_comment'></div>公以某年某月某日葬于陈州之某地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1164169_comment'></div>夫人唐氏，先公而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1164169_comment'></div>继王氏，故河阳三城节度使、同中书门下平章事显之女，封太原郡夫人，天禧三年终于陈之私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1164169_comment'></div>子从质，卫尉寺丞，公亡未踰月，哀毁而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1164169_comment'></div>一女，适故翰林学士王公禹偁子奉礼郎嘉祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1164169_comment'></div>孙几人，某为某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1164169_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_157_1164169'>太行峙朔，洪河泻天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1164169_comment'></div>河山之间，实生大贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1164169_comment'></div>贤不徒出，惟圣偶焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1164169_comment'></div>发为事业，文武之全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1164169_comment'></div>两治西蜀，荐绥南夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1164169_comment'></div>易乱以宁，即荒而化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1164169_comment'></div>夫惟管萧，尚足王霸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1164169_comment'></div>如公之才，不宰天下，而俾惠泽，止濡一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1164169_comment'></div>锡民父母，遗国栋梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1164169_comment'></div>有炜公迹，日星之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1164169_comment'></div>何假斯文，始传其芳。</div><div id='poem_sentence_167_1164169_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年1月1日</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《假窦侍郎安车元日祀坟》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十。）</span><div id='poem_496519' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496519' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496519?labeling=true' target='_blank'>假窦侍郎安车元日祀坟</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496519")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496519'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496519'>小车聊假便衰残，上冢都忘涉路难。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496519'>坐卧俏能伸手足，坚完诚可避风寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496519'>搴帷自不希前躅，凭轼时还遂一观。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496519'>暂得容身终未稳，退归乘此始为安。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496519_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496519'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496519_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年1月1日</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《元日祀坟道中》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十。）</span><div id='poem_496520' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496520' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496520?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元日祀坟道中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496520")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496520_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496520'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496520'>新元先陇遂伸虔，荒岁嗟逢众食艰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496520'>比户生涯皆墨突，几家林木似牛山。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496520'>三阳已泰春来懒，六幕虽昏雪尚悭。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496520'>道殣寖多无力救，据鞍衰叟只惭颜。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496520_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496520'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496520_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《次韵答赵少师以南京永寿禅院主僧崇祐……》诗。<span id='poem_sentence_4_496536_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《狎鸥亭同赏芍药》诗。<span class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495903' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495903?labeling=true' target='_blank'>醉白堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495903")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495903_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495903'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495903'>戆老新成池上堂，因忆乐天池上篇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495903'>乐天先识勇退早，凛凛万世清风传。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495903'>古人中求尚难拟，自顾愚者孰可肩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495903'>但举当时池上物，愧今之有殊未全。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495903'>池东无廪贮馀粟，池西无亭挥五弦。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495903'>中无高桥跨三岛，下压鳌背浮清涟。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495903'>其间合奏散序者，童妓百指皆婵娟。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495903'>平无三石展湘簟，静无双鹤翘丁仙。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495903'>雅无吴郡青版舫，游泛安便牢且坚。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495903'>吾今谋退亦易足，池南大屋藏群编。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495903'>一车岂若万籍富，子孙得以精覃研。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495903'>夹堂脩竹抱幽翠，森森拥槛竿逾千。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495903'>池中所出粗可爱，芡盘菱角红白莲。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495903'>芍药多名来江都，牡丹绝艳移洛川。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495903'>及时花发池左右，香苞烂染朝霞鲜。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495903'>戆老于此兴不浅，间会宾属陈芳筵。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495903'>妖妍姬侍目嘉卉，咿哑丝竹听<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：平。）</span>流泉。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495903'>宜城酿法亦云美，诗酒仅可追前贤。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495903'>狂吟气健薄霄汉，豪饮体放忘貂蝉。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495903'>酒酣陶陶睡席上，醉乡何有但浩然。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495903'>人生所适贵自适，斯适岂异白乐天。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495903_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
