href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《开泉》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三。此诗作于韩琦神宗熙宁六年至八年间知相州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495901' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495901' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495901?labeling=true' target='_blank'>开泉</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495901")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495901_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495901'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495901'>先茔东北隅，有泉渤而出。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495901'>奔跳若爨鼎，万眼沸不一。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495901'>始虽稍泓登，渐乃肆沕潏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495901'>吾尝展祀馀，爱玩必终日。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495901'>爰从大旱来，数岁竭如窒。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495901'>伤哉利泽源，顿尔藏于密。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495901'>吾今具畚锸，试欲疏潜屈。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495901'>开无数尺间，旧脉俄腾溢。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495901'>涓涓力尚微，势已舒沈郁。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495901'>我愿天道常，不使五行失。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495901'>均调四气和，寒燠皆从律。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495901'>宣其润下功，复得沾群物。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495901_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495901'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_495901_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《虚心堂会陈龙图》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三。此诗作于韩琦神宗熙宁六年至八年间知相州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495902' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495902' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495902?labeling=true' target='_blank'>虚心堂会陈龙图</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495902")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495902_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495902'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495902'>余尝爱此君，中虚外有节。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495902'>手植数年间，万戟竞森列。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495902'>为堂于其中，一境遂清绝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495902'>虽归临本邦，事岂免羁绁。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495902'>不得时相亲，固负好风月。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495902'>方将乞残骸，就第养衰拙。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495902'>孤怀造昆阆，直气卷金铁。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495902'>终日对婵娟，卒岁伴高洁。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495902'>春来忘芳非，夏至失炎热。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495902'>秋深凌严霜，冬暮映积雪。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495902'>居无一不宜，啸傲远尘媟。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495902'>兹乐期谁同，实系长者辙。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495902'>相从挹天真，共话到禅悦。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495902'>簪箨豸冠耸，拉笋犀株折。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495902'>乘醉卧疏影，敲玉应仙阙。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495902'>此志吁未遂，对酒勿轻别。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495902_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495902'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_495902_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《赵少师续注维摩经序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十二。此文作于韩琦神宗熙宁间知相州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1164108' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164108' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164108?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赵少师续注维摩经序</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164108")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164108_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164108'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164108'>如来以大圆觉深达实相，不以真寂自乐，而以普救众生为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164108_comment'></div>故净名长者，通达方便，现身有疾，以求众问，令得解脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164108_comment'></div>乃曰以一切众生病，是故我病；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164108_comment'></div>若一切众生病灭，则我病灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164108_comment'></div>大哉言乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164108_comment'></div>昔伊尹思天下之民，匹夫匹妇无不被尧、舜之泽者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164108_comment'></div>孟子曰：「忧以天下，乐以天下」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164108_comment'></div>是知净名慈悲之心，于吾儒仁义之道，恶有戾乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164108_comment'></div>若其演无生之法，入不二之门，雄辨神奇，独高众论，斯则大乘之极致，空籍之宗本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164108_comment'></div>至于集一盖而覆大千之界，摄广座于小室之中，假香积饭以薰众饥，取妙喜国以至佛土，有闻是说，或以为疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164108_comment'></div>曾不思凡夫一念之至，犹能以小而容大，冥近而造远；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164108_comment'></div>况如来慧照所舒，性通无阂，神变自在，譬喻深渺，又岂思议之可及哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164108_comment'></div>此经前有僧什、僧肇数家已尝注释，开发义趣，号为详博。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164108_comment'></div>然微言妙旨，犹或渊晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164108_comment'></div>今致政少师叔平公，以高才伟度，历辅三朝，功成勇退，潜志内典，燕休之暇，续为新解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164108_comment'></div>大抵省繁就约，疏奥为明，使新学菩萨，临文易晓，速證菩提。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164108_comment'></div>此又知叔平公博济之心，亦净名之心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164108_comment'></div>夫如来六德万行，无不具足，而犹不断烦恼，出入生死，御慈航于幻海中，援斯溺者，使登彼岸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164108_comment'></div>至于无量无边众生，由我度故，皆悉成佛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164108_comment'></div>而在如来，一无所得，虽欲称赞髣髴，何有穷尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164108_comment'></div>而世之学佛者，或得禅宗复性之说，便谓顿然已悟，与诸佛等，轻诋秘藏，不思践履，退而质其利他之行，则蔑尔无闻，视吾净名愈疾之心，良可哀矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164108_comment'></div>经曰：「如来为大医王，善治众病，应病与药，令得服行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164108_comment'></div>既得药矣，不服不行，吾知病本，决不能去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164108_comment'></div>兹论虽浅，宁无儆焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164108_comment'></div>某生汩尘俗，未始习佛，辱叔平公之命，勉为之辞，深于佛者，幸勿以易言为诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164108_comment'></div>谨序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1164108_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《题柳仲途天平山记后》文。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十三。此文作于神宗熙宁末韩琦知相州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_1164110' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164110' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164110?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题柳仲涂天平山记后</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164110")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164110_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164110'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164110'>林虑天平山者，天下绝胜之境也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164110_comment'></div>山有僧院曰「明教」，余三来守相，欲一观而未得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164110_comment'></div>每僚属出按县，与夫过客之好事者，悉能往而游焉，回必大诧于余曰：「是实雄伟秀拔，不可图画，虽东南诸山素有名者，皆所不及」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164110_comment'></div>余侄婿柳材者，本朝大儒仲涂公之孙也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164110_comment'></div>余尝得公所撰《游天平山记》于材家，见其所叙游览之胜，凡山之诸峰与岩洞、潭谷、涧溪、泉石之名，无不具载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164110_comment'></div>而闻今之所称，类多与公所记改易不同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164110_comment'></div>于是予益欲往周访其实，续为说以明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164110_comment'></div>而院之主僧智因者，得美石，欲先以仲涂公之文刻而传之，故余未克如其志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164110_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164110_comment'></div>公之此文，不传久矣，非余得于其家，而因师之勤如此，是必沉郁而不显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164110_comment'></div>抑公之文，固有神物所护，使卒能传之也耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164110_comment'></div>既刻石，余因举其大略，以书于后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164110_comment'></div>具位韩某题。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1164110_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　是年夏，韩琦又力请致仕。复改永兴军节度使、京兆尹再任，没有来得及辞谢而病重。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《乙卯夏乞致仕第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十二。）</span><div id='poem_1163777' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163777' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163777?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙卯夏乞致仕第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163777")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163777_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163777'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163777'>臣某言：臣闻禄者所以食功，无功则谓之虚受；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163777_comment'></div>力者以其堪事，废事则谓之空官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163777_comment'></div>深惟二者之讥，其实兼之已久，责虽未至，诚岂能安？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163777_comment'></div>愿乞垂年之骸，益降善养之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163777_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣资灵椎钝，术业枵疏，遭遇盛时，徘徊近列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163777_comment'></div>误荷三朝之注意，未尝一事以辞难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163777_comment'></div>前迹具存，大明洞照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163777_comment'></div>去岁以久婴疾恙，日耗冲和，意惰神昏，肌销骨立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163777_comment'></div>屡拜章而告老，庶得暇以营医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163777_comment'></div>累锡诏音，未容谢事，湛恩沦髓，积愧丛心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163777_comment'></div>嗟薄祐之所钟，困宿疴之愈剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163777_comment'></div>虽牵强策励，不克支在公之役；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163777_comment'></div>而语默动静，未曾忘旷职之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163777_comment'></div>满盈之屯，晨夕可待。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163777_comment'></div>况臣叨临本郡，已越再期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163777_comment'></div>欲宣力于要藩，则支离而难强；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163777_comment'></div>遂偷安于故里，实尸素以堪嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163777_comment'></div>复去从心之年，止馀周岁之近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163777_comment'></div>敢重干于天扆，期安退于田庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163777_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下留聪明睿智之仁，广遍覆包函之造，俯察豚鱼之恳，垂矜蒲柳之衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163777_comment'></div>亟推从欲之仁，俾遂归休之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163777_comment'></div>谷神闲境，傥沉痼之有瘳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163777_comment'></div>肉骨馀龄，皆圣恩之所赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163777_comment'></div>如允所请，只乞以本官致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163777_comment'></div>干冒宸严，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1163777_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《乙卯夏乞致仕第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十二。）</span><div id='poem_1163778' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163778' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163778?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙卯夏乞致仕第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163778")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163778_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163778'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163778'>臣某言：近上表陈乞致仕，伏蒙圣慈特差入内内侍省内东头供奉官、勾当内东门司刘惟简赍赐诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163778_comment'></div>衰年病久，恳乞残骸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163778_comment'></div>睿眷恩隆，曲矜旧物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163778_comment'></div>閟俞音而未下，抚瘁质以何安？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163778_comment'></div>再此冒闻，终期得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163778_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以享万钟之禄者，人情之所恋；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163778_comment'></div>被六极之疾者，天谴之有来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163778_comment'></div>盖禄过者恋之不祥，疾炽则来其示罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163778_comment'></div>茍灾生而不避，将鬼得以加诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163778_comment'></div>而臣际会三朝，周旋二府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163778_comment'></div>窃崇高之位而出临桑梓，无尺寸之效以上报国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163778_comment'></div>坐越再期，日婴宿疹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163778_comment'></div>里民为之指笑，乡老相与訾讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163778_comment'></div>谓臣筋力已疲，既不可奋当繁剧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163778_comment'></div>钟漏云迫，又不能速丐安闲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163778_comment'></div>聆群议之交喧，顾自容而无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163778_comment'></div>于何逃责，是必归休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163778_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下道广照临，恩全终始，闵老臣之无状，得危瘵而弗瘳，赐以馀龄，遂其退节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163778_comment'></div>驰心黄屋，宁忘魏阙之思；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163778_comment'></div>访道赤松，岂独汉臣之幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163778_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1163778_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《乙卯夏乞致仕第三表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十二。）</span><div id='poem_1163779' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163779' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163779?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙卯夏乞致仕第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163779")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163779_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163779'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163779'>臣某言：近上表陈乞致仕，伏蒙圣慈特差入内内侍省内东头供奉官、勾当内东门司梁从政赍赐诏书不允，及有殿直崔汝良押赐到制告、敕牒各一道，蒙恩改授臣永兴军节度使，令再任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163779_comment'></div>老病不任，方露乞骸之请；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163779_comment'></div>圣宸未谅，俄蒙换节之留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163779_comment'></div>事绝戾于本心，日不知其自处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163779_comment'></div>力当避免，卒觊哀怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163779_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>窃以君之御臣，进退不可差于礼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163779_comment'></div>臣之守分，去就不可失其宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163779_comment'></div>故礼之差，则非治国之大经；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163779_comment'></div>宜之失，则为终身之至辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163779_comment'></div>伏念臣久尸重禄，常苦宿疴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163779_comment'></div>自叨任于安闲，亦寖成于尪劣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163779_comment'></div>去岁以膏肓作疠，寒暑交攻，不惟皮骨之仅存，固已精神之并耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163779_comment'></div>屡丐归休之适，终沉赐可之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163779_comment'></div>壹郁奚伸，昏冥愈甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163779_comment'></div>此幸本邦之再岁，辄申前恳而一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163779_comment'></div>岂谓诚不上通，恩非所望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163779_comment'></div>特易帅旄之重，俾仍乡郡之优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163779_comment'></div>虽陛下求旧之私，在一时而孰拟；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163779_comment'></div>而愚臣要君之迹，纵万死以何明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163779_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下监务烛微，道先贵恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163779_comment'></div>念辞荣而受宠，理实难安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163779_comment'></div>矜积疹以垂年，许从谢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163779_comment'></div>收其涣汗，贷以馀龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163779_comment'></div>使一介之守不亏，获全终始；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163779_comment'></div>则万乘之仁至厚，曷报生成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163779_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1163779_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《乙卯夏乞致政札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《乙卯夏乞致政第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163874' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163874' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163874?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乙卯夏乞致政第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163874")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163874_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163874'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163874'>臣近再上表，陈乞致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163874_comment'></div>伏蒙圣慈特差入内内侍省内东头供奉官、勾当内东门司梁从政赍赐诏书不允，仍传宣抚问，曲谕圣意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163874_comment'></div>及有殿直崔汝良，押赐到制告、敕牒各一道，蒙恩改授臣永兴军节度使，令再任者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163874_comment'></div>以病乞骸，诚乃屡渎；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163874_comment'></div>无名加宠，义孰敢当！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163874_comment'></div>惟恃至仁，必容恳诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163874_comment'></div>伏念臣身婴宿疹，未尝少康；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163874_comment'></div>乡郡偷安，坐踰再岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163874_comment'></div>顾衰残之日甚，思勉强而不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163874_comment'></div>遂此拜章，复祈谢事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163874_comment'></div>不意特推渥命，再守本邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163874_comment'></div>求致政而得换节旄，惭尸禄而又临乡里，于臣去就之分，始末何安？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163874_comment'></div>虽陛下以簪履为思，过怜旧物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163874_comment'></div>而天下之人观臣举措，不惟自取弃薄，岂不玷累国家！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163874_comment'></div>且臣向任北都，尝因满岁，乞移近乡一郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163874_comment'></div>其时蒙朝廷有改节再任之命，臣寻累奏具陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163874_comment'></div>始因自请，乃得加恩，事涉要君，其罪至大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163874_comment'></div>终感陛下垂察，乃令缴纳告敕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163874_comment'></div>臣以北门总一路之重，圣寄匪轻，遂不敢更辞再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163874_comment'></div>今臣在相州闲僻之地，常愧素餐，因疾屡请退休，安可辄当此礼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163874_comment'></div>况臣天嫉盈满，自速身灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163874_comment'></div>近因暑气所伤，畜热在内，藏府泄利又作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163874_comment'></div>常年夏秋脾胃虚弱，调理温补太过，一旦遍身黄发，亟用凉药，驱逐踰旬，黄始渐退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163874_comment'></div>唯是饮食顿然减少，肌骸瘦瘠，更甚往时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163874_comment'></div>自料犬马残躯，不日即填沟壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163874_comment'></div>伏望陛下念臣疾苦如此，非敢矫妄，早降宸旨，俾臣上纳新命，及察臣前后诚请，许归田里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163874_comment'></div>臣既得心安无事，专意医药，则颓暮之年，或得稍延残喘，实陛下天地之大赐也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1163874_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年</a>　在安阳，任相州知州。韩琦有《乞致政上二相启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164056' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164056' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164056?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞致政上二相启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1075年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164056")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164056_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164056'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164056'>冒荣过分，得疾早衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164056_comment'></div>虽叨乡里之为州，奈苦膏肓之肆梗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164056_comment'></div>不求安退，是速阴诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164056_comment'></div>比沥血以奏封，愿赐骸而就第，愚诚已至，天意未回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164056_comment'></div>此者伏遇某官道辅唐虞，德高夔契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164056_comment'></div>以万物遂宜为至乐，以一夫不获为深忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164056_comment'></div>幸此孤孱，尝攀雅旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164056_comment'></div>敢望察其素实，闵以病躯，谓力丐于休闲，知事非于矫妄，特加公论，曲赐先容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164056_comment'></div>述真恳于上前，必垂恩可；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164056_comment'></div>救馀生于言下，实赖矜全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164056_comment'></div>内惟犬马之残年，曷报埏镕之大惠。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1164056_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1075&endYear=1075')">1075年6月24日</a>　六月二十四日，韩琦在相州任上去世，享年六十八岁。神宗“辍视朝三日，发哀于后苑”，撰写《两朝顾命定策元勋之碑》。听从宰相王安石的建议，给韩琦特赠，赠尚书令。谥忠献。<br /></div>
-----end



-----title
江都
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='5fc89720983248979dff3754859b3498_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("5fc89720983248979dff3754859b3498");'><span id='5fc89720983248979dff3754859b3498_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1047')">1045-1047年</a>，38-40岁</div><div id='5fc89720983248979dff3754859b3498' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年3月</a>　“庆历新政”失败，韩琦以资政殿学士知扬州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年4月5日</a>　到任扬州知州。韩琦有《扬州谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163699' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163699' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163699?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年4月5日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163699")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163699_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163699'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163699'>臣某言：伏蒙圣恩授臣资政殿学士、知扬州事，已于四月五日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163699_comment'></div>臣谬参枢筦，无补盛明，人言已腾，君量犹恕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163699_comment'></div>秘殿之资甚宠，广陵之寄绝优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163699_comment'></div>过尔被恩，得无怀愧<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163699_comment'></div>伏念臣朴忠守道，天赋难移，孤直任真，圣知有素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163699_comment'></div>常以亲逢亨运，早厕清涂，不宜因循，以负驱策，屡膺烦剧之任，偶逃罢软之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163699_comment'></div>自元昊僭狂，西垂震动，乃承人乏，荐领帅权，虽无成功，实尽死节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163699_comment'></div>不意曲矜久次，擢忝近司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163699_comment'></div>固让莫谐，竭愚思效，凡陈鄙议，皆出至诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163699_comment'></div>虑边计则冒朋党之疑，断国论则耻依阿之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163699_comment'></div>会憸人之肆忿，窥时事以兴诬，爰从亲葬之还，获视箧书之谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163699_comment'></div>既详矫妄，因得指陈，愿付宰枢，示于台谏，阅兹虚罔之状，即验中伤之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163699_comment'></div>臣自以叨备臣邻，乃来诋訾，不可更尘重任，有玷公朝，寻伏私居，乞行显罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163699_comment'></div>伏蒙皇帝陛下察无他过，尚录旧勤，深惟进退之间，必存堂陛之体，俾兼美职，出守便藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163699_comment'></div>舟楫安流，浃旬受署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163699_comment'></div>重念朝廷求治，疆鄙仅宁，臣内不能协赞筹帷，精讲致平之策，外不能周旋塞垒，力营预备之谋，而乃宴处名城，坐尸厚俸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163699_comment'></div>庇亲自足，临政少忧，于臣身则粗安，在臣志则未报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163699_comment'></div>敢不导宣宽诏，慰抚编氓，米盐之务必亲，狱市之繁无扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163699_comment'></div>士师当黜，固枉道以弗为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163699_comment'></div>即墨免烹，谅毁人之终辨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163699_comment'></div>誓禀不渝之操，仰酬惟睿之仁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1163699_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　四月以后，到任伊始，韩琦蠲杨行密留下的无名之敛。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。韩琦有《苦雨方霁蛙声不已》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。此诗作于仁宗庆历间韩琦任扬州知州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495971' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495971' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495971")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_495971_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495971'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495971'>暑雨朝来已厌多，蛙鸣犹更幸滂沱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495971'>虽然快尔狂跳志，争奈良田有害何。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495971_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495971'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495971_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。韩琦有《广陵大雪》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_495859' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495859' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495859?labeling=true' target='_blank'>广陵大雪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495859")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495859_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495859'><div class='poemSentence' class='inlineComment2'>（四库本作素）</span>月昏，大雪飞扬平压屋。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495859'>风力轩号助其势，摆撼琳琅摧冻木。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495859'>乘温变化雨声来，度日阶庭恣<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_495859", 495859, id='poem_sentence_6_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495859'>蛰蛙得意欲跳掷，幽鹭无情成挫辱。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495859'>罾鱼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_8_495859", 495859, "Clauses/16/Comments/0")'>江叟</span>冰透蓑，卖炭野翁泥没辐。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495859'>闾阎细民诚可哀，三市不喧游手束。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495859'>牛衣破解突无烟，饿犬声微饥子哭。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495859'>我闻上天主时泽，亦有常数滋农谷。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495859'>膏润均于一岁中，是谓年丰调玉烛。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495859'>此来盛冬<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_495859", 495859, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>过尔</span>多，却虑麦秋欠沾足。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495859'>太守忧民仰天祝，愿曙氛霾看晴旭。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495859'>望晴不晴无奈何，拥被醉眠头更缩。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495859_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495859'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_495859_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1045&endYear=1045')">1045年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。韩琦有《寿州知府学士启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164050' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164050' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164050?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寿州知府学士启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1045年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164050")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164050_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164050'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164050'>右，某伏自某官辄从剧任，荣领便藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164050_comment'></div>顾箴补之无才，日惭充位；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164050_comment'></div>仰宽明之树化，时用偃风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164050_comment'></div>催疏裁记之诚，增役离群之恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164050_comment'></div>缅计布民经而有裕，丁叶序之云初，涂诵载欢，神釐举集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164050_comment'></div>恭以某官才猷自任，端介不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164050_comment'></div>早从仙室之游，暂奉使旟之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164050_comment'></div>闭阁而治，方从偃息之怀；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164050_comment'></div>趋节以朝，行被褒优之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164050_comment'></div>伏冀俯顺气候，精加葆调。</div><div id='poem_sentence_9_1164050_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年5月</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。五月，扬州新作漏刻成，韩琦作《扬州莲花漏铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十三。）</span><div id='poem_1164125' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164125' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164125?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州莲花漏铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164125")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164125_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164125'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164125'>庆历六年五月日，扬州新作漏刻成，知军州事、资政殿学士、右谏议大夫韩某乃为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164125'>天运虽大，信则不渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164125_comment'></div>智者善作，器乃冥符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164125_comment'></div>以漏考辰，始乎渴乌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164125_comment'></div>以箭定刻，发乎金徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164125_comment'></div>覆视晷景，弗差毫铢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164125_comment'></div>节候既正，鼓钟以孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164125_comment'></div>昼访尔治，夜安尔居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164125_comment'></div>政则不怠，监哉挈壶。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1164125_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年7月</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。七月，诏罢义仓后，韩琦把已输义仓之粟全部赈济贫民。有《乞以义仓斛斗拨常平仓附帐奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163980' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163980' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163980?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞以义仓斛斗拨常平仓附帐奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历五年七月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163980")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163980_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163980'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163980'>近诏罢义仓，所有斛斗若便拨与官仓支遣，即恐未副朝廷立义仓示民以信之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163980_comment'></div>所有斛斗乞下诸处据数拨与常平仓附帐，别作一项桩管，或遇水旱灾伤，即赈济贫民。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163980_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163980'><span class='label'>按：</span>《宋会要辑稿》食货六二之二一（第七册第五九五八页）。又见同书食货五三之二○（第六册第五七二九页）。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1163980_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。夏，天大早，韩琦祈雨于圣母祠。有《扬州祭圣母祠祈雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164194' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164194' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164194?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州祭圣母祠祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164194")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164194_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164194'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164194'>维庆历六年岁次丙戌，某月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌之奠，昭告于圣母之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164194_comment'></div>某闻之于《诗》曰：「旱既太甚，靡神不宗」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164194_comment'></div>则知古人闵雨之际，不爱牲币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164194_comment'></div>凡神能福于民，而于民之所奉者，皆得索而祭焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164194_comment'></div>今岁夏季以来，境内不雨，穑人狼顾，以田为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164194_comment'></div>长民者亦尝设坛祷龙，欸祠求神，斋恪之诚，不为不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164194_comment'></div>近方灵应有答，而民望未厌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164194_comment'></div>是用陈兹薄荐，乞灵于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164194_comment'></div>神其体斯民所奉之心，示神能福之之意，广敷阴施，惠此一方，使时泽沛然，年谷大获。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164194_comment'></div>则民知神德，不谓无灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164194_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1164194_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。韩琦有《蜀葵》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。此诗作于仁宗庆历间韩琦任扬州知州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495973' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。秋，韩琦有《岁旱晚雨》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_495862' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495862' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495862?labeling=true' target='_blank'>岁旱晚雨</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495862")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495862_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495862'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495862'>庆历丙戌夏，早气蒸如焚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495862'>行路尽婴暍，居人犹中瘟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495862'>堕鸟不收喙，游鱼几烂鳞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495862'>絺绤亦难御，更值成雷蚊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495862'>骄阳断雨脉，焦熬逾五旬。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495862'>农塍坐耗裂，纵横龟灼文。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495862'>众目血坼眦，日睇西郊云。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495862'>守臣恤民病，心乱千丝棼。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495862'>祈龙割舒雁，纵阴开北门。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495862'>古法久弗验，群祠益致勤。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495862'>遍走于境内，神兮若不闻。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495862'>或时得泛洒，濛濛才湿尘。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495862'>丰年望既绝，节候俄秋分。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495862'>忽尔降大澍，霄冥连日昏。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495862'>垂空状战戟，入霤疑倾盆。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495862'>田禾十九死，强渍枯槁根。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495862'>萧稂贱易活，势茂如逢春。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495862'>蛙黾渴易满，泥跃嬉成群。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495862'>济物乃容易，应时何艰辛。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495862'>辙鲋骨已坏，徐激西江津。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495862'>谷黍霜已厚，始调邹律温。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_495862'>天意执可问，对之空气吞。<div id='poem_sentence_21_495862_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_495862'></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_495862_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。秋后，循例进行蜡祭。韩琦有《诸庙祭文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164195' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164195' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164195?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诸庙祭文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164195")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164195_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164195'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164195'>维庆历六年岁次丙戌，某月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敢致祭于某神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164195_comment'></div>古有八蜡之祭，以记四方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164195_comment'></div>若其方年不顺成，则蜡祭不通，岂特使民谨于用财，抑亦明神不茍受其报也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164195_comment'></div>今岁境内大旱，民心颙颙，有望于神，而田禾卒不救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164195_comment'></div>守臣不敢循为蜡之义，而废神之祀，是用举旧典，申薄荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164195_comment'></div>神其歆此蠲洁，无使来岁复失民望，而重为愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164195_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1164195_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。入冬，播种之后，天降大雪。韩琦作有《喜雪答赵宗道学士》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_495863' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495863' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495863?labeling=true' target='_blank'>喜雪答赵宗道学士</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495863")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495863_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495863'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495863'>去年大雪如山积，今年大旱千里赤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495863'>冻民虚死麦实少，稻子空乾无一获。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495863'>阴阳之沴已过差，物理固知当反极。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495863'>入冬和气渐融怡，霈泽时时苏土脉。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495863'>广莫朝来一阵寒，变作雪花纷乱坼。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495863'>琼树瑶台豁眼明，直疑误到神仙宅。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495863'>城中喜色与欢声，并在高楼歌舞席。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495863'>老农视之笑复啼，大言累岁遭凶厄。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495863'>太守闻之亦惨颜，造化诚哉非易测。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495863'>但愿天意悔前祸，岂使吾民常戚戚。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495863_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495863'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_495863_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　王安石离开扬州幕府，有《上扬州韩资政启》<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1046&endYear=1046')">1046年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。韩琦有《扬州谢赐历日表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163701' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163701' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163701?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州谢赐历日表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1046年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163701")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163701_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163701'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163701'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈赐臣庆历七年御制崇天万年历一卷者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163701_comment'></div>臣闻古诸侯受天子之朔，必藏诸祖庙，月用饩羊之礼，告而行之，所以谨王正而重民事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163701_comment'></div>国家统一区夏，治历惟精，以时颁宣，率土奉顺<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163701_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下则二仪而著典，协四气以行令，亲垂圣训，布于万方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163701_comment'></div>臣任忝列藩，钦承大法，敢不敷明上意，以劝境内，使民知龙见日至之次，东作西成之期，用洽和平，式符化育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163701_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1163701_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。韩琦有《春霖》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。此诗作于仁宗庆历间韩琦任扬州知州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495986' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495986' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495986?labeling=true' target='_blank'>春霖</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495986")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495986_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495986'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495986'>咫尺东郊路，春霖绝未通。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495986'>销闲生弈思，醒睡费茶功。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495986'>楼迥昏昏雾，窗寒霎霎风。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495986'>待晴桑陌上，五马恣𤧚珑。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495986_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495986'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495986_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年3月</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。三月，韩琦作《扬州厅壁题名记》，回顾唐朝藩镇割据以来扬州的战乱，认为有必要将曾经任政扬州知州的名字和政绩刻石于厅壁，以示永久。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1164121' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164121' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164121?labeling=true' target='_blank'>扬州厅壁题名记<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历七年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164121")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164121_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164121'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164121'>扬，九州之一，地总淮海，扼制吴会，前代建府之重，东南为冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164121_comment'></div>故有唐藩镇之盛，唯扬、益二州，号天下繁侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164121_comment'></div>其后高骈政失，致师铎之变，孙儒、杨行密之徒，以盗攻盗，更相据夺，郛邑残烬，遂为战冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164121_comment'></div>本朝自李重进平，必择文武材臣以领州事，民安惠养，日以完复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164121_comment'></div>庆历五年春三月，某得罢枢筦，忝被兹任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164121_comment'></div>视事之隙，因念前之为政者，尚阙传载，非以谨官守而重朝寄也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164121_comment'></div>于是参考图籍，次以年月，刻石于厅事之壁，以示永久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164121_comment'></div>后之来者，阅其官氏，推访治迹，则善恶皆有所儆云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164121_comment'></div>庆历七年三月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164121_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年3月</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。三月，韩琦转给事中，有谢表。作品：《谢转给事中表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163700' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163700' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163700?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢转给事中表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163700")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163700_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163700'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163700'>臣某言：今月二十七日，进奏院递到敕牒一道、官告一通，伏蒙圣慈授臣给事中，仍放朝谢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163700_comment'></div>官以岁稽，虽存著令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163700_comment'></div>赏非功懋，曷弭群言？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163700_comment'></div>引让则取疑于未成，受命则不胜其多愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163700_comment'></div>愓焉屡省，莫知所安<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163700_comment'></div>伏念臣幸偶圣朝，早尘科等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163700_comment'></div>常耻养高而图贵近，每愿竭节以报国家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163700_comment'></div>周旋俗吏之为，激切<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1163700", 1163700, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>谏囊</span>之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163700_comment'></div>不虞摈斥，盖恃聪仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163700_comment'></div>以至去禁掖而即边戎，舍儒冠而服武弁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163700_comment'></div>唯殚千虑，冀缓忧劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163700_comment'></div>敢有一言，辄辞危难？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163700_comment'></div>逮羌人之送欸，承召节以来朝，擢贰机繁，无容恳避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163700_comment'></div>爱上之心愈笃，忤时之咎寖彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163700_comment'></div>尚赖保全，许均优逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163700_comment'></div>自膺淮海之任，实居吴粤之冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163700_comment'></div>城闬隳残，奸讹固结，既思绳葺，必务躬亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163700_comment'></div>常人所非，则曰未详大体；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163700_comment'></div>微臣自视，可以少赎素餐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163700_comment'></div>仅涉再期，率无治状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163700_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下扩天地之量，录日月之劳，申举旧章，进升宠秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163700_comment'></div>拜于琐闼，更视深严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163700_comment'></div>刺以貊庭，重贻嗤诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163700_comment'></div>敢不动思合道，守不易方，惟忠义之所存，在始终而一致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163700_comment'></div>期于效死，庶可酬恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163700_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1163700_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。春，韩琦有《答袁陟节推游禅智寺》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_495860' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495860' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495860?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答袁陟节推游禅智寺</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495860")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495860_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495860'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495860'>春去惜馀景，偶来郊外观。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495860'>芜城千古恨，一顾殊悲酸。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495860'>荒祠枕大道，尚记吴城邗。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495860'>远近绿阴合，水衬红荚残。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495860'>陇麦齐若剪，随风卷波澜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495860'>罢农喜有望，守臣心粗宽。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495860'>萧疏禅智寺，坏址不甚完。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495860'>丛花乱芍药，篱竹摧琅玕。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495860'>空有亭亭柏，成行如笔端。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495860'>供帐具朝膳，僚寀成清欢。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495860'>小杜诗板暗，乐石曾未刊。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495860'>乘兴诣茶圃，百步登平峦。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495860'>摘焙试烹啜，甘挹零露漙。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495860'>午过倦微暑，堤路腾归鞍。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495860'>天子忧岁旱，引咎古所难。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495860'>列郡承新诏，朝夕弗敢安。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495860'>况此行春意，固不在游盘。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495860'>朝廷责吏治，莫若久其官。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495860'>政和气亦应，灾沴无由干。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495860_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495860'>愿循三载旧，庶几酬素餐。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。春，韩琦有《和袁陟节推龙兴寺芍药》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_495861' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495861' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495861?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和袁陟节推龙兴寺芍药</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495861")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495861_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495861'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495861'>广陵芍药真奇差<span class='inlineComment2'>（《全芳备祖》卷三作美）</span>，名与洛花相上天。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495861'>洛花年来品格卑，所在随人趁高价。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495861'>接头著处骋新妍，轻去本根无顾藉。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495861'>不论姚花与魏花，只供<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_495861", 495861, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>俗目</span>陪妖姹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495861'>广陵之花性绝高，得地不移归造化。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495861'>大豪人力或强迁，费尽雍<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：平。）</span>培无艳冶。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495861'>东君固是花之主，千苞万萼从荣谢。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495861'>似矫东君泛爱心，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_495861", 495861, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>枉杀</span>春风不肯嫁。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495861'>遂令天下走香名，髣髴丹青竞誇诧。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495861'>以此扬花较洛花，自合扬花推定霸。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495861'>其间绝色可粗陈，天工著意诚堪讶。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495861'>仙家冠子镂红云，金线妆治<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：平。）</span>无匹亚。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495861'>旋心体弱不胜枝，宝髻攲<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>斜犹堕马。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495861'>冰雪肌肤一缬斑，新试守宫明似赭。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495861'>双头两两最多情，象物更呈鞍面窊。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495861'>楼子亭亭欠姿媚，特有怪状堪图写。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495861'>见者方知画不真，未见直疑传者诈。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495861'>前贤大欲巧赋咏，片言未出心先怕。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495861'>天上人间少其比，不似馀芳资假借。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495861'>我来淮海涉三春，三访龙兴旧僧舍。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495861'>问得龙兴好事僧，每岁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_495861", 495861, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>看承</span>不敢暇。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_495861'>后园栽植虽甚蕃，及见花成由取舍。<div id='poem_sentence_21_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_495861'>出群标致必惊人，方徙矮坛临大厦。<div id='poem_sentence_22_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_495861'>客来只见轩槛前，国艳天姿相<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_23_495861", 495861, "Clauses/47/Comments/0")'>照射</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_495861'>因知灵种本自然，须凭精识能陶冶。<div id='poem_sentence_24_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_495861'>君子果有育材心，请视维扬种花者。<div id='poem_sentence_25_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_495861'></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_495861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_495861'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_12_495861_0'>⑴ 原作歌，据四库本改</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_495861_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。韩琦有《琼花》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷一。此诗作于韩琦仁宗庆历五年（1045）至七年（1047）知扬州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495850' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495850' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495850?labeling=true' target='_blank'>琼花</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495850")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495850_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495850'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495850'>维扬一株花，四海无同类。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495850'>年年后土祠，独比琼瑶贵。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495850'>中含散水芳，外团蝴蝶戏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495850'>酴醾不见香，芍药惭多媚。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495850'>扶疏翠盖圆，散乱真珠缀。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495850'>不从众格繁，自守幽姿粹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495850'>尝闻好事家，欲移京毂地。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495850'>既违孤洁情，终误栽培意。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495850'>洛阳红牡丹，适时名转异。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495850'>新荣托旧枝，万状呈妖丽。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495850'>天工借颜色，深淡随人智。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495850'>三春爱赏时，车马喧如市。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495850'>草木禀赋殊，得失岂轻议。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495850'>我来首见花，对花聊自醉。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495850_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495850'></div><div class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷一。此诗作于韩琦仁宗庆历五年（1045）至七年（1047）知扬州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495851' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495851' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495851?labeling=true' target='_blank'>夜合</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_495851'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495851'>俗人之爱花，重色不重香。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495851'>吾今得真赏，似矫时之常。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495851'>所爱夜合花，清芬踰众芳。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495851'>叶叶自相对，开敛随阴阳。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495851'>不惭历草滋，独擅尧阶祥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495851'>得此合欢名，忧忿诚可忘。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495851'>茸茸红白姿，百和从风飏。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495851'>沉水燎庭槛，薰陆纷缨裳。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495851'>弥月固未歇，况兹夏景长。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495851'>凡目不我贵，馥烈徒自将。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495851'>仲尼失灭明，史迁疑子房。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495851'>以貌不以行，举世同悲伤。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495851'>予欲先馨德，群艳孰可方。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495851_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' href='/Writing/495852?labeling=true' target='_blank'>蜂虿</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: id='poem_content_495852'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495852'>事小不可忽，议或戒蜂虿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495852'>蜂虿之中人，始意脱己害。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495852'>人兮怒一蠚，为报速睚眦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495852'>白昼擿危巢，夜烛穷纤介。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495852'>必获而后已，立死以为快。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495852'>彼诚畜微毒，谓己有所赖。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495852'>失于小不忍，而自取糜坏。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495852'>吁嗟阴巧徒，毒万蜂虿大。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495852'>包潜中善良，断腕未足骇。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495852'>小或一身危，甚则家族逮。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495852'>渊微如鬼神，无隙可漏败。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495852'>君子被戕贼，守道不为怪。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495852'>有时丑迹露，事或无可奈。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495852'>一旦吾道行，乃置之度外。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495852'>使其自愧缩，似不容覆载。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495852'>非力不足较，顾有盛德在。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495852_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>卜卜</span>，意若念良木。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495853'>营营求蠹心，未获空我腹。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495853'>或露一裆红，或展双翅绿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495853'>捷缘都卢橦，响弄羯鼓曲。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495853'>搜索不知疲，利嘴信摧秃。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495853'>忽尔破奸宄，种类无遗族。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495853'>直疑天意深，不使嗜粱肉。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495853'>专为众蠹仇，侍饫弗与足。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495853_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495853'>如令知庶味，恣择虫与粟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495854'>主人爱高堂，病尔如疣赘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495854_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_content_495856'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495856'>人观落叶悲，我视落叶喜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495856'>请看四序速，次第若屈指。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495856'>风霜一瞬过，望春时有几。<div
