id='poem_sentence_5_495856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495856'>否泰与消长，反复殊未已。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495856'>酿酒整笙歌，坐待新萌起。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495856_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495856'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_495856_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　在江都，任扬州知州。韩琦有《答孙植太博后园宴射》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷一。此诗作于韩琦仁宗庆历五年（1045）至七年（1047）知扬州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495858' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495858' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495858?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答孙植太博后园宴射</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495858")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495858_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495858'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495858'>花梢点红芽绿茁，宴亭爽垲堋云列。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495858'>呼宾习射次序升，体裁人人矜㔢挃。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495858'>六钧力副百中艺，由基注目老羿拽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495858'>支左屈右何大工，象弭急收如列缺。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495858'>须臾一镝入鹄心，画鼓连轰尽声喝。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495858'>后者审固意愈精，有时大呼<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：去。）</span>劈箭筈。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495858'>惜哉最是毫釐差，彩侯似动笴微撇<span class='inlineComment2'>（原作擜，据《宋诗略》改）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495858'>分明角胜各记晕，将终或为一箭夺。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495858'>当筵主筹令难犯，大白时举出正罚。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495858'>此礼自古尤所重，矍圃去留宜有别。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495858'>五善大抵主和容，不止穿杨与穿札。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495858'>因忆当年黠羌叛，非才误授将军钺。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495858'>帐下貔貅十万师，力过生犀心似铁。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495858'>大人未许覆凶巢，饬谨封垂御侵越。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495858'>悍夫猛士志待骋，贮填愤气何由泄。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495858'>正值高秋天气寒，塞场霜重严风刮。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495858'>约束偏裨整队兵，旌旗烁电戈矛雪。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495858'>驱出长郊阅奇阵，离合应麾皆有节。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495858'>次引精锐较绝技，控弦命中无虚发。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495858'>气豪马健走危坡，直下千寻未尝蹶。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495858'>收军校猎围平原，犬顺人呼鹰解绁。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_495858'>山麋冲轶犯劲矢，岗兔奔跳迷狡穴。<div id='poem_sentence_21_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_495858'>大雕盘空不轻搏，老狐仰视肝胆裂。<div id='poem_sentence_22_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_495858'>驻鞍赏获犒部曲，浪泻酒车论染血。<div id='poem_sentence_23_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_495858'>将军未酣众心醉，耳后风生鼻头热。<div id='poem_sentence_24_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_495858'>此日淮藩奉宽诏，朱轮慢辗行春辙。<div id='poem_sentence_25_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_495858'>铃索声沉讼牒稀，优游大可养疏拙。<div id='poem_sentence_26_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_495858'>斜蒿青青鲚鲙新，公醪香重醅才拨。<div id='poem_sentence_27_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_495858'>射堂对客且相娱，不妨乐事陶嘉月。<div id='poem_sentence_28_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_495858'>襟怀聊与水云閒，梦魂犹寄关山阔。<div id='poem_sentence_29_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_495858'>逢辰未立赫然勋，破的求功真琐屑。<div id='poem_sentence_30_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_495858'>欲得心如外貌欢，报国之诚尽摅豁。<div id='poem_sentence_31_495858_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_495858'></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_495858_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年5月</a>　五月，知扬州、资政殿学士、给事中韩琦为京西路安抚使、知郓州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　在江都，郓州知州任上。韩琦有《郓州赴上谢两府启》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十八。）</span><div id='poem_1164055' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164055' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164055?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郓州赴上谢两府启</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164055")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164055_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164055'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164055'>右，某启：近奉敕移知郓州军州事，已于今月五日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164055_comment'></div>淮南善地，所寄已优；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164055_comment'></div>汶上名藩，被恩弥重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164055_comment'></div>内惟过幸，诚出先容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164055_comment'></div>此盖伏遇某官以道佐时，以仁恕物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164055_comment'></div>轸其疏外，曲有借怜，致兹易地之行，实亚陪京之近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164055_comment'></div>敢不心存爱利，力服忠勤，勉师循吏之为，庶答大钧之造。</div><div id='poem_sentence_6_1164055_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
梁山（寿张）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='53a0deab550f48028a74181f690ebac5_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("53a0deab550f48028a74181f690ebac5");'><span id='53a0deab550f48028a74181f690ebac5_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>，40岁</div><div id='53a0deab550f48028a74181f690ebac5' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　韩琦从扬州知州移任郓州知州，经过梁山泊，有诗。作品：《过梁山泊》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_495989' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495989' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495989?labeling=true' target='_blank'>过梁山泊</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495989")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495989_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495989'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495989'>巨泽渺无际，斋船度日撑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495989'>渔人骇铙吹，水鸟背旗旌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495989'>蒲密遮如港，山遥势似彭。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495989'>不知莲芰里，白昼苦蚊虻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495989_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495989'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495989_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
东平（须城）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='53fb6741c2e14583b08bde134b9a7630_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("53fb6741c2e14583b08bde134b9a7630");'><span id='53fb6741c2e14583b08bde134b9a7630_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>，40岁</div><div id='53fb6741c2e14583b08bde134b9a7630' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　在须城。韩琦到知郓州任。有《郓州谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163703' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163703' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163703?labeling=true' target='_blank'>郓州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163703")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163703_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163703'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163703'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈就差臣知郓州军州事，已于今月五日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163703_comment'></div>须句重地，为国东屏，宜择名臣宿望，委之镇临，轻付匪才，惧不胜任<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163703_comment'></div>臣闻人之所禀也，非大贤哲不得其全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163703_comment'></div>故黄霸长于治人，及入为辅弼，则风烈衰焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163703_comment'></div>何则？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163703_comment'></div>材有所偏，而用有所适也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163703_comment'></div>是以圣王在上，驭臣布职，必以器而使之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163703_comment'></div>伏念臣朴戆鄙陋，无一可取，徒识忠义，自谓难夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163703_comment'></div>乃者处烦剧，备边琐，效死以报，或有尘露之益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163703_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下特加怜察，谓可倚任，擢在枢府，与闻国议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163703_comment'></div>臣不敢渝其所守，愈思自竭，而识闇才拙，动取乖忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163703_comment'></div>宜从摈斥，复荷矜全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163703_comment'></div>治扬二年，乃免过咎，尚承恩记，移此便藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163703_comment'></div>臣已举家乘舟，由清河路，不一月日，直抵城下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163703_comment'></div>虽冒大暑，不知其劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163703_comment'></div>土风甚淳，官事亦简，在臣所得，为幸实多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163703_comment'></div>昔贤治人之长，非臣敢及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163703_comment'></div>庶能宣朝廷宽大之诏，令百姓知上意慈仁，不使贪苛之吏，外渎风化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163703_comment'></div>夙夜惟念，以勤抚恤，冀有补助，少赎素餐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163703_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1163703_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年5月</a>　在须城，任郓州知州。五月，韩琦作有《贺鸿庆宫奉安三圣御容礼毕表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163702' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163702' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163702?labeling=true' target='_blank'>贺鸿庆宫奉安三圣御容礼毕表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163702")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163702_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163702'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163702'>臣某言；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163702_comment'></div>伏睹南京鸿庆宫奉安三圣御容礼毕者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163702_comment'></div>商丘之地，王业所兴，乃迹旧规，以新原庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163702_comment'></div>图三后颙昂之表，申四时怵惕之怀，熙事克成，普天同抃<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163702_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下以唐尧之仁睦亲族，以虞舜之孝事祖宗，道格至平，民知大顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163702_comment'></div>而犹虑列圣之游，有所未奉，尽物之荐，有所未虔，经制或隳，清衷是念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163702_comment'></div>乃眷别京之重，实惟开国之基，靖馆夙严，晬容攸宅，再谋崇葺，式示钦承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163702_comment'></div>僝功之初，展礼咸备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163702_comment'></div>事遵简约，本达于至诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163702_comment'></div>天之监临，宜辅于盛德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163702_comment'></div>臣限拘官守，不获奔赴阙庭，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163702_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年5月</a>　五月，韩琦改京东捕盗之法，效果显着，着为天下法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　在须城，任郓州知州。韩琦有《次韵和兖州王待制过汶上见寄》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_495994' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495994' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495994?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵和兖州王待制过汶上见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495994")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495994_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495994'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495994'>浅局虽难继大才，溪堂佳致亦添来。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495994'>奇花并蒂宜新种<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，芳树连柯得旧栽<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑵</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495994'>良执假途形咏叹，邻封为治惜淹徊。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495994'>想君醉问歌人处，不向风前酹一杯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495994'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495994_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_495994'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_495994_0'>⑴ 自注：琦自广陵取芍药数种，植于溪堂之南，皆冠髻、双头之品。</div></div><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_1_495994_0'>⑵ 自注：某移连理厅于溪堂之南，偶得连理林檎，树之新厅之前。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_495994_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年8月15日</a>　在须城，任郓州知州。韩琦有《中秋不见月》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_495995' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495995' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495995?labeling=true' target='_blank'>中秋不见月</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年8月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495995")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_495995_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495995'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495995'>中秋宜月不教晴，人倚危楼意未平。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495995'>任是他时圆更好，争如今夜略分明。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495995'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_495995_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_495995'><span class='label'>按：</span>以上《安阳集》卷五<br /></div><div id='poem_note_495995_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年8月</a>　在须城，任郓州知州。八月，韩琦有《三兄司封荆玉集后序》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164106' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164106' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164106?labeling=true' target='_blank'>三司封荆玉集后序<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历七年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164106")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164106_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164106'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164106'>某天圣八年自淄州通判罢，丁大宁太夫人忧，时三兄司封通判濠州，得在左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164106_comment'></div>手编兄文，成十五卷，尝作序，以《荆玉》为集名，且志兄有才而不遇也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164106_comment'></div>后十年，兄终于两浙转运使，遗文残稿，又散于巾橐间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164106_comment'></div>大惧亡失，不永其传，乃命其少子直彦，复集为若干卷，题曰《荆玉后集》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164106_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164106_comment'></div>兄之状貌语言，今不得而见之矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164106_comment'></div>其得见者，生平所为文章耳，诸子辈得不宝而惜之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164106_comment'></div>事备前序，兹敢以略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164106_comment'></div>时庆历七年八月日，东平郡斋序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164106_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
正定（真定）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='dc784e4d665949d6b8d5d5b590f7e6ab_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("dc784e4d665949d6b8d5d5b590f7e6ab");'><span id='dc784e4d665949d6b8d5d5b590f7e6ab_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1048')">1047-1048年</a>，40-41岁</div><div id='dc784e4d665949d6b8d5d5b590f7e6ab' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年12月</a>　十二月，韩琦徙成德军。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年12月3日</a>　在真定。十二月三日，韩琦到任成德军，有《成德军谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163704' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163704' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163704?labeling=true' target='_blank'>成德军谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年12月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163704")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163704_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163704'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163704'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈就差臣知成德军府事，已于今月三日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163704_comment'></div>东藩五月，粗举政条，北道一麾，亟更守任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163704_comment'></div>以忠则忘奔走之苦，以才则误寄责之深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163704_comment'></div>抚己一思，悸汗交集<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163704_comment'></div>伏念臣从官素拙，立朝至孤，独膺圣知，遂玷枢近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163704_comment'></div>向谐补郡之逸，益懋首公之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163704_comment'></div>而自满岁淮南，改州汶上，顾日月之未几，亦吏民之颇安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163704_comment'></div>弗遑定居，骤尔易地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163704_comment'></div>此盖伏遇皇帝陛下轸守方之念，推任旧之诚，乃眷常山之雄，实握全赵之胜，将帅未明于纪律，士卒或稔于惰骄，付以懦庸，俾之振葺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163704_comment'></div>狡兔未死，再图猎犬之劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163704_comment'></div>谤虎本无，已判市人之妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163704_comment'></div>敢不究绥靖之理，裁训戢之宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163704_comment'></div>塞柝外严，不忘于备豫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163704_comment'></div>边囊入奏，动审于事机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163704_comment'></div>少分宵旰之忧，庶有尘露之益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163704_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1163704_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　在真定，任成德军知军。韩琦有《已授宣补将校军员乞不移易奏》，意在安定军心和民心。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163981' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163981' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163981?labeling=true' target='_blank'>已受宣补将校军员乞不移易奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历七年十二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163981")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163981_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163981'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163981'>今兵骄易摇，当镇静以弹压，茍动有疑畏，则上下不宁矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163981_comment'></div>列校就职已安，不可纷然迁徙，愿如旧以安众心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163981_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　韩琦解禁边界山林，听任百姓采伐。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　在真定，任成德军知军。韩琦有《移帅真定次韵答执政杜公》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_495990' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495990' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495990?labeling=true' target='_blank'>移帅真定次韵答致政杜公</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495990")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495990_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495990'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495990'>常山画野直天街，寄重如何付不才。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495990_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495990'>跃马敢辞奔命去，捍羌曾是奋身来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495990_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495990'>军中纪律劳人葺，林下樽罍得意开。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495990_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495990'>引领恩轩无路到，几临风月独徘徊。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495990_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495990'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495990_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　或在真定，任成德军知军。韩琦有《与文正范公论师鲁行状书》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164010' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164010' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164010?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与文正范公论师鲁行状书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164010")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164010_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164010'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164010'>某启：辱教示及之翰所撰《师鲁行状》，俾附永叔作志文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164010_comment'></div>读之思其人，悲咽不能胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164010_comment'></div>观所载事，又有与闻见殊不相合者，大以为疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164010_comment'></div>及阅尹氏侄子辨列，则皆某之疑者，于是释然无所恨，而喜尹氏有人矣，甚善！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164010_comment'></div>某忆公前书道师鲁将亡时，公亟往而谓曰：「师鲁平生节行，当请欧阳永叔与相知者为文字，垂于不朽」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164010_comment'></div>师鲁举手叩头曰：「尽矣，某复何言」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164010_comment'></div>某又尝接师鲁言，以为天下相知之深者，无如之翰，则于纪述之际，宜如何哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164010_comment'></div>今所误书，若不先由之翰刊正，遂寄永叔，彼果能斥其说，皆以实书之，则《行状》与《墓铭》二文相戾，不独惑于今世，且惑后世，是岂公许死者之意果可不朽耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164010_comment'></div>之翰果尽相知之诚，不负良友耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164010_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164010_comment'></div>师鲁有经济之才，生不得尽所蕴，谪非其罪而死，又为平生相知者所诬，以恶书之，是必不瞑于地下矣，实善人之重不幸也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164010_comment'></div>且前贤行状，必求故人故吏为之者，不徒详其家世事迹而已，亦欲掩疵扬善，以安孝子之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164010_comment'></div>况无假于掩而反诬之乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164010_comment'></div>夫生则卖友以买直，死则加恶以避党，此固庸人之不忍为，岂之翰之心哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164010_comment'></div>但恐不知其详耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164010_comment'></div>然不知其详而轻书之，以贻今世后世之惑，使师鲁不瞑于地下，为交友者，不得无过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164010_comment'></div>今闻之翰领江南漕，必已离安陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164010_comment'></div>愿公不以千里之远，速以《行状》附还，使详尹侄之说，悉刊其误，然后以寄永叔，必能推而广之，使师鲁之行实传之光显，垂于无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164010_comment'></div>则公之许死者，是谓践其言，天下忠义之人，皆有所劝，公之名德益重于世矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164010_comment'></div>幸甚幸甚！</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1164010_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1047&endYear=1047')">1047年</a>　或在真定，任成德军知军。韩琦有《祭龙图尹公师鲁文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十三。）</span><div id='poem_1164177' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164177' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164177?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭龙图尹公师鲁文<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历七年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1047年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164177")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164177_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164177'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164177'>维庆历七年某月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故龙图舍人尹公师鲁之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164177_comment'></div>呜呼师鲁！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164177_comment'></div>惟君之生，天与英奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164177_comment'></div>如鉴之明，无隐不窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164177_comment'></div>如材之美，无用不宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164177_comment'></div>仁义之勇，过于虎罴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164177_comment'></div>疑昧之决，审乎蓍龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164177_comment'></div>首倡古文，三代是追。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164177_comment'></div>学者翕从，圣道乃夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164177_comment'></div>名重天下，无人不知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164177_comment'></div>知之深者，非余而谁？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164177_comment'></div>伊昔夏人，扰于西垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164177_comment'></div>余忝兵任，君实同之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164177_comment'></div>周旋塞上，余往君随，昼筹夜画，忍睡忍饥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164177_comment'></div>星霜矢石，劳苦艰巇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164177_comment'></div>凡四五年，心惫形羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164177_comment'></div>退而视君，志不少衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164177_comment'></div>上嘉君勤，进督渭师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164177_comment'></div>怀敏之后，破坏创痍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164177_comment'></div>君能尽力，补缀撑持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164177_comment'></div>曰兵曰民，以治以绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164177_comment'></div>如得父母，众心熙熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164177_comment'></div>保边务实，耻于妄为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164177_comment'></div>不合小人，乃启祸基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164177_comment'></div>易庆、晋、潞，奔命何疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164177_comment'></div>输忠抗论，伺者乘危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164177_comment'></div>君前在渭，属防秋时，以公廨缗，贷其偏裨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164177_comment'></div>俾偿宿负，免于典彝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164177_comment'></div>月取其俸，送官勿亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164177_comment'></div>且责效命，投死无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164177_comment'></div>职此抵罪，窜斥沦胥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164177_comment'></div>众谓之冤，君甘如饴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164177_comment'></div>自随徙均，帝方念兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164177_comment'></div>奈何穷山，感疾无医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164177_comment'></div>君决不起，指邓而驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164177_comment'></div>范公大贤，来托孤遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164177_comment'></div>谓无怛化，言色怡怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164177_comment'></div>忽整衣冠，盥涤庄祗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164177_comment'></div>凭几而逝，众皆叹悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164177_comment'></div>范公之书，其说如斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164177_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164177_comment'></div>彼苍冥冥，莫可究推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164177_comment'></div>贤者胡恶，动与屯奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164177_comment'></div>不肖胡祐，坐来福禧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164177_comment'></div>以道而屯，死为人思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164177_comment'></div>以幸而福，生为人嗤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164177_comment'></div>在君所得，何必期颐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164177_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164177_comment'></div>余之与君，义虽朋执，情则埙篪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164177_comment'></div>葬不执绋，奠不捧卮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164177_comment'></div>使我大恨，痛切肝脾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164177_comment'></div>徒凭薄祭，一写哀辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164177_comment'></div>琴不鼓矣，呜呼子期！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164177_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_53_1164177_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　在真定，任成德军知军。韩琦有《常山出郊马上口占》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷五。）</span><div id='poem_495991' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495991' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495991?labeling=true' target='_blank'>常山出郊马上口占</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495991")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495991_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495991'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495991'>麦含丰泽催齐秀，蚕饱柔桑起大眠。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495991'>守帅勉希廉与蔺，九重高枕不忧边。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495991_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495991'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495991_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　在真定，任成德军知军。韩琦有《登西大悲阁》诗。<span id='poem_sentence_1_495992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495992'>城迥云连堞，烽闲草蔽台。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495992'>谁知太守意，不为纳凉来。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495992_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495992'></div><div -----title
定州（安喜）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7ecc43c2079a42528dd926dea77199ef_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7ecc43c2079a42528dd926dea77199ef");'><span id='7ecc43c2079a42528dd926dea77199ef_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>，41岁</div><div id='7ecc43c2079a42528dd926dea77199ef' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年4月</a>　在安喜。四月，韩琦以定州路安抚使、都总管、知定州，有《定州谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163705' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163705' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163705?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163705")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163705_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163705'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163705'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈就差臣充定州路都部署兼安抚使、兼知定州军州事，仍降诏旨不许辞免，已于今月十四日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163705_comment'></div>窃以中山控边，素号雄重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163705_comment'></div>地形坦易，无坂泽之阻，先时虏骑入寇，必趋是途，故国家常聚重兵、择名将以制其冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163705_comment'></div>自约和以来，不忘备预，至于守帅之任，未尝轻以属人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163705_comment'></div>然而敝稔于因循，兵骄于闲放，圣虑经远，赫然改图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163705_comment'></div>当此之时，臣谓宜得文武兼备之才，使抚靖而训辑之，不意猥以及臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163705_comment'></div>臣退自省度，惧不能副朝廷寄责之重，避让莫获，无所措躬<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163705_comment'></div>伏念臣徒守朴忠，无他绩效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163705_comment'></div>一辞枢柄，三易郡符，兢兢营职，茍脱罪咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163705_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下天地之度，爱而全之，念求旧以惟人，不使人而求备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163705_comment'></div>于北道更制之始，首膺选用，荷恩诚厚，量力固忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163705_comment'></div>况今狄人讲欢，务敦大信，经画之任，最为难处，凡百措置，不可默然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163705_comment'></div>而或必振颓纲，则张皇之沮及；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163705_comment'></div>遂仍故态，则宴安之患深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163705_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下究易调之原，察理绳之渐，少宽衔策，俾尽驱驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163705_comment'></div>事或建明，特加裁察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163705_comment'></div>臣敢不外图捍蔽，中戢营屯，动存机虑之先，或有万一之补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163705_comment'></div>忘身徇国，此臣夙心。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1163705_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　韩琦修明军政，刬除宿弊。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　韩琦乞请用旧法，恢复土兵进迁之阶。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　韩琦奏乞“诸军在缘边而亡命者”免于徙其家于内地。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　韩琦考李卫公遗法，为方、圆、锐三阵以教兵，军声震河朔。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　韩琦替换由京师发往保州的龙猛卒。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　韩琦先礼后兵，以暴制暴，解决了契丹不断入界劫掠居民的问题。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　七月，河北大水岁饥，韩琦竭力救灾，招集流民，募其壮者，修治城隍。受到皇帝优诏褒美。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。十二月，韩琦上表谢赐禁中银救济饥民。作品：《谢赐禁中银救济饥民表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163706' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163706' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163706?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐禁中银救济饥民表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163706")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163706_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163706'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163706'>臣某言：入内供奉官高怀政赍敕到州，伏蒙圣慈支赐禁中银五千两，令变转救济阙食人民者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163706_comment'></div>天运难测，固有流行之灾；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163706_comment'></div>民食弗充，上贻宵旰之虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163706_comment'></div>不责大农之给，特疏中禁之财，济此殣荒，出乎仁恻<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163706_comment'></div>臣闻尧水汤旱，非政之使然；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163706_comment'></div>金穰木饥，乃岁有常次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163706_comment'></div>故王者能察时艰阨，闵俗困虚，心裁救恤之宜，遂亡捐瘠之苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163706_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下以忧勤嗣大业，以约俭恢永图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163706_comment'></div>德无远而不柔，惠虽微而必浃，宜膺敷锡，以格太宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163706_comment'></div>而涉夏以来，苦雨为沴，唯兹北道，最失西成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163706_comment'></div>纳隍深轸于圣怀，振廪重侵于经费，即驰使指，远谕宸慈，且颁内府之珍，以续翳桑之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163706_comment'></div>天之肆害，方不堪其怨咨；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163706_comment'></div>上所施恩，已顿宽于饿殍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163706_comment'></div>臣才非通敏，任忝抚绥，奉诏札之丁宁，痛农畴之乏绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163706_comment'></div>敢不恭宣睿旨，申诫属封，期共拯于疲羸，使咸知于爱育。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163706_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1163706_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　韩琦取消市米出门禁令。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='3fada04a719a4f12937638792206655d_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("3fada04a719a4f12937638792206655d");'><span id='3fada04a719a4f12937638792206655d_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1053')">1048-1053年</a>，41-46岁</div><div id='3fada04a719a4f12937638792206655d' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《喜雪》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。《安阳集编年笺注》有《喜雪》同题诗四首，此为其中一首，首句为“朔雪飞残腊”）</span><div id='poem_495997' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495997' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495997?labeling=true' target='_blank'>喜雪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495997")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_495997_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495997'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495997'>朔雪飞残腊，融和变凛严。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495997'>徐来花出在，骤急霰声兼。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495997'>数住天应惜，争繁酒易添。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495997'>积深函久润，济大略微嫌。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495997'>雅意明书幌，多情入宴帘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495997'>舞腰难学转，峰顶尚饶尖。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495997'>露蕊仙盘挹，风毛鬣囿燖。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495997'>宫墙胡粉画，梅梗蜀酥黏。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495997'>影澹三春絮，光寒八月蟾。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495997'>垣涂谁复辨，巨壑有何厌。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495997'>狂助诗毫逸，清驱厉气潜。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495997'>欢谣腾紫塞，喜色上彤幨。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495997'>凝霤收冰乳，堆庭镂<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_495997", 495997, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>虎盐</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495997'>吾民无足虑，丰岁可前占。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495997_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495997'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_495997_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《定州厅壁题名记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1164122' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164122' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164122?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州厅壁题名记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164122")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164122_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164122'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164122'>郡县守长，有记于厅事之壁，前代无闻，唐始盛焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164122_comment'></div>当时名儒所述，则谓壁记，非古也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164122_comment'></div>若原地理，条物宜，陈山川之形胜，与风俗之好尚，则图谍存焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164122_comment'></div>其所取者，在乎彰善而志恶，名氏迁次，亦云末也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164122_comment'></div>夫能推名氏以见善恶，谨迁次以遵王命，亦《春秋》之事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164122_comment'></div>虽于古未著，而今可废乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164122_comment'></div>河朔并边之郡以十数，而定宿大兵，据战地，故朝廷所寄之重，不与他比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164122_comment'></div>庆历八年夏五月，始诏魏、瀛、镇、定四路帅各兼安抚之职，定之帅领定、保、深、祁四州，广信、安肃、顺安、永宁四军，凡兵民之政悉主之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164122_comment'></div>首是任者，非得文武兼备之才不可居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164122_comment'></div>而误及愚者，故临治以来，惕焉自勉，以思报称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164122_comment'></div>幸时既久，吏民军旅，率相信顺，事日简，得以补缀阙漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164122_comment'></div>因访国朝以来为州者之次序，将刻石以传焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164122_comment'></div>而吏曹狃于武事，不以图籍为急，败坏忘缺，卒不可究。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164122_comment'></div>若但取近年可记者书之，则又义无所本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164122_comment'></div>今故以朝廷更制之始为首，尊睿图而勤新治也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164122_comment'></div>夫己之为政是否，固不可以自明，必俟后人迹其行事，然后善恶详焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164122_comment'></div>则予与来者既镵其名氏，揭诸听断之所，朝夕视之，思不愧于后人座右之诫也，可不谨乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164122_comment'></div>某谨记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1164122_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《乞罢差里正衙前奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163917' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163917' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163917?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞罢差里正衙前奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历八年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163917")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163917_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163917'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163917'>州县生民之苦，无重于里正衙前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163917_comment'></div>自兵兴以来，残剥尤甚，至有孀母改嫁，亲族分居，或弃田与人以免上等，或非命求死以就单丁，规图百端，以茍脱沟壑之患，殊可痛伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163917_comment'></div>国朝初置里正，主催税及预县中差役之事，号为脂膏，遂令役满更人，重难衙前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163917_comment'></div>承平以来，科禁渐密，凡差户役，皆令佐亲阅簿书，里正止令代纳逃户税租及应无名科率；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163917_comment'></div>亦有未曾催税，已勾集上州主管纲运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163917_comment'></div>又每乡被差疏密与物力高下不均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163917_comment'></div>假有一县甲乙二乡，甲乡有第一等十五户，每户物力及三千贯，乙乡有第一等五户，每户物力及五百贯，番休递役，即甲乡十五年一役，乙乡五年一役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163917_comment'></div>富者休息有馀，贫者败亡相继，岂朝廷为民父母之意乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163917_comment'></div>请自今罢差里正衙前，只差乡户衙前，令转运司将逐州军见勾到里正衙前人数立为定额，令本县令佐将五等簿于一县诸乡中第一等选一户物力最高者为之，如更差人，亦仿此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163917_comment'></div>若甲县户少而役蕃，即权许于乙县户多而役稀处差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163917_comment'></div>簿书未尽实，而愿抉取他户者亦听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163917_comment'></div>其税赋只令户长催输，以二年一替。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1163917_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《论河东税外和籴粮草奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163949' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163949' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163949?labeling=true' target='_blank'>论河东税外和籴粮草奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历八年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163949")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163949_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163949'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163949'>河东一十四军州诸县人户，税外每年更有额定和籴粮草万数浩瀚，民间不胜其苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163949_comment'></div>自来官中每米一硕，支钱三百文省，作四停支遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163949_comment'></div>内一停见钱七十五文，三停支茶二百二十五文，约实卖得三十七文五分，每石实得一百一十二文五分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163949_comment'></div>每草十束，支钱一百，一停见钱二十五文，三停支茶七十五文，约实卖得钱一十二文五分，每十束得钱三十七文五分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163949_comment'></div>人户所得至微，钱茶零碎，又每次直候差衙前于晋、潞等州般到茶货，多是隔年方行支散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163949_comment'></div>人户各有农业，不能一一等候，亦不能计旁纽算钱茶分数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163949_comment'></div>递年尽为豪贩之家就贱收买，却作人户交钞，赴官请茶，却将往晋、潞州人中算请攀引，又获厚利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163949_comment'></div>人户所得，十无一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163949_comment'></div>上件税外额定粮草，虽名和籴，其实白配人户。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163949_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年1月</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。正月，韩琦有《乞补严政为三班差使殿试奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163982' /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年1月15日</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《上元罢灯》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_495998' id='poem_sentence_0_495998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495998'>民心无奈郁，春意有谁开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495998_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496002'>蓬山曾许挹浮邱，踰纪光阴一瞬休。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496002'>朔塞风霜人易老，申湖歌舞景长留。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496002_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496002'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496002_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《再答》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年3月</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。三月，针对杨怀敏禁止边民采伐近边山林的禁令，韩琦上《别定禁伐山林事奏》，请求非禁地，任百姓采伐。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163983' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163983' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163983?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别定禁伐山林事奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐元年三月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163983")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163983_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163983'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163983'>比朝廷欲禁近边山林，不许斩伐，以杜戎人入寇之路，当时并近里浅山耕种之地概行禁止，致边民遽然失业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163983_comment'></div>今薪炭翔贵，翻令敌人乘时以取厚利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163983_comment'></div>臣尝遣官行视，可禁之处去敌尚五六十里，亦可广为防蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163983_comment'></div>已别定可禁之地揭榜谕民，非令所禁者任采伐之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163983_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年6月</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《北岳祈雨文一》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年7月</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。七月，韩琦因为救灾有功，受到诏书奖谕。有《谢赐诏书奖谕表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163694' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163694' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163694?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢赐诏书示谕表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1042年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163694")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163694_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163694'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163694'>臣某言：枢密院递到诏书一道，伏蒙圣慈谕臣已除本州观察使，且从廪秩之优，益慰戎行之望者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163694_comment'></div>成命之行，庶乎开晓；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163694_comment'></div>温言以及，贲若龙光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163694_comment'></div>惟素志之所存，惧清衷之未悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163694_comment'></div>敢兹陈露，良切震兢<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163694_comment'></div>伏念臣早以艺文，妄干禄仕，幸遇皇帝陛下首临轩陛，优擢科名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163694_comment'></div>序进之阶，前规尽在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163694_comment'></div>而臣乃情吏事，尽力公家，自结圣知，了无私援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163694_comment'></div>一昨羌酋背义，帅府须才，误置选中，即驰塞下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163694_comment'></div>经画迁徙，通踰三期，为国之谋，固无云补，在臣之分，亦用倾竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163694_comment'></div>向膺督护之任，已明委注之隆，不期霈恩，又出非望，骤易枢廷之直，俾分连帅之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163694_comment'></div>臣授宠无名，抚躬自度，不敢远稽典故，上渎睿聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163694_comment'></div>窃记陛下纂极以来，此例甚少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163694_comment'></div>李维、李士衡，以老疾荣俸，陈尧咨以侈性尚豪，并遭遇承平，各充其欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163694_comment'></div>故议者惜臣兹授，谓匪美迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163694_comment'></div>臣但以处不避污，事上之节；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163694_comment'></div>让而就贱，守道之常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163694_comment'></div>当朝廷忧边之秋，非臣下择官之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163694_comment'></div>辞之则有可疑之迹，掇希求进用之嫌；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163694_comment'></div>受之则有从权之名，协军旅称呼之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163694_comment'></div>况国家推公兴治，任人有次，必不令臣永沉武列，老于疆垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163694_comment'></div>或薄效之可甄，宜旧物之来复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163694_comment'></div>臣是以难于拒免，泰然居职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163694_comment'></div>今承诏谕之意，专示廪秩之优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163694_comment'></div>缘臣清白奉身，出于门法；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163694_comment'></div>岂牵豢养之厚，自损名节之高？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163694_comment'></div>兹为伍于冗流，冀同心于外御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163694_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下考劝功之法，扩知臣之明，察臣甘去近联，主于恭顺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163694_comment'></div>谓臣即当重禄，靡在贪饕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163694_comment'></div>倘一辨于愚诚，誓愈坚于忠报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163694_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1163694_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年7月</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。七月，韩琦除资政殿大学士，上两表辞免，辞免不得，才上谢表。作品：《辞免资政殿大学士第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span>《辞免资政殿大学士第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span>《谢授资政殿大学士表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163708' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163708' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163708?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免资政殿大学士第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163708")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163708_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163708'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163708'>臣某言：今月二十四日，三班借职刘仲举赍到官诰、敕牒各一道，伏蒙圣慈授臣依前官、资政殿大学士，仍赐对衣、金腰带、鞍辔马者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163708_comment'></div>圣人求旧，时则推恩；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163708_comment'></div>臣子叨荣，固宜审分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163708_comment'></div>礼当必让，罪亦何逃<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163708_comment'></div>伏念臣立于朝廷，粗有本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163708_comment'></div>徒以朴忠而自信，不虞世俗之多违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163708_comment'></div>自迩清光，暨参密辅，出一语则思于助治，无一事有涉于进身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163708_comment'></div>宠禄未安，每愧焉而恳避；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163708_comment'></div>艰危所任，必奋然而愿行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163708_comment'></div>唯圣则知，非臣敢妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163708_comment'></div>而况朅来朔塞，仅越岁期，敌可虑而为策且迂，民大歉而所活能几？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163708_comment'></div>上孤寄委，日益羞惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163708_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下道贵函容，爱深体貌，特峻殿宸之职，俾图疆埸之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163708_comment'></div>虽君赏所加，欲示眷怀之厚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163708_comment'></div>而臣功何在，岂无廉耻之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163708_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下俯照孤心，与全素节，亟追成命，以协至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163708_comment'></div>如此则执二柄以御邦，无伤劝沮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163708_comment'></div>存一心而报上，更誓糜捐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163708_comment'></div>其告、敕等，见令差来使臣收管，听候指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163708_comment'></div>干冒宸严，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1163708_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1163709' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163709' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163709?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免资政殿大学士第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163709")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163709_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163709'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163709'>臣某言：近者伏蒙圣恩授臣资政殿大学士，寻上表陈让，今准中书劄子，奉圣旨不许辞让者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163709_comment'></div>赏出无名，让期得请；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163709_comment'></div>臣诚至激，诏意未俞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163709_comment'></div>敢再犯于严诛，冀必如于素志<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163709_comment'></div>伏念臣逢辰已幸，图报且轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163709_comment'></div>茍在上知其用心，使得尽力；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163709_comment'></div>虽终身处以旧禄，固足为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163709_comment'></div>况此守边，仅方踰岁，都无绩效，可副旌畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163709_comment'></div>窃惟河朔之间，时乃馑灾之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163709_comment'></div>天之祐圣，有意以寤于国家；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163709_comment'></div>圣以答天，最大者明乎赏罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163709_comment'></div>倘容叨越，是紊经常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163709_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下道本无私，治先有劝，不以一臣之小爱，而伤四海之大公，特寝误恩，以符清议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163709_comment'></div>使饰伪者闻风而自沮，守道者知分而获安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163709_comment'></div>则疆埸虽劳，是甘于白首；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163709_comment'></div>雪霜更厉，不变于丹心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163709_comment'></div>其所赐告、敕，今附递进纳，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1163709_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1163710' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163710' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163710?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢授资政殿大学士表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163710")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163710_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163710'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163710'>臣某言：三班借职刘仲举赍到官告、敕牒各一道，伏蒙圣慈授臣资政殿大学士，仍赐对衣、金腰带、鞍辔马，及奉圣旨不许辞让者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163710_comment'></div>赏既优而未谕，盖省无劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163710_comment'></div>让虽至而复当，固非获已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163710_comment'></div>惟进退之难处，在斯须而弗安<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163710_comment'></div>伏念臣才本无他，志期有立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163710_comment'></div>尝览古人之忠义，以至于涕零；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163710_comment'></div>矧逢真主之圣明，是坚于死报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163710_comment'></div>山海之大何益，犬马之诚则然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163710_comment'></div>故入赞枢机，必乃情于万务；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163710_comment'></div>出居屏翰，亦尽力于一方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163710_comment'></div>图富贵岂臣之本心，窃禄位是臣之深耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163710_comment'></div>惟兹守塞，仅甫踰年，徒能革兵之堕骄，无以救民之刓敝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163710_comment'></div>过为之虑，动则几于阔疏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163710_comment'></div>茍幸其安，日可须于罪黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163710_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下天地之度，尧舜其仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163710_comment'></div>谓内外虽殊，孰差于轻重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163710_comment'></div>簪履至贱，尚惜于坠遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163710_comment'></div>乃眷旧臣，咸均宠数；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163710_comment'></div>不图庸近，亦玷褒荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163710_comment'></div>重跻秘殿之联，实骇愚儒之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163710_comment'></div>避焉而弗获其请，受焉而莫得其名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163710_comment'></div>再叩慈宸，则有饰伪背时之谤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163710_comment'></div>遂尘美职，则有无功冒进之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163710_comment'></div>与其违众而取嫌，曷若被恩而思效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163710_comment'></div>伛偻承命，惭羞在颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163710_comment'></div>臣敢不服夙夜之勤，副国家之遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163710_comment'></div>方垂无事，奚由奋勇以答君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163710_comment'></div>鼎镬在前，誓不临危而变节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163710_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1163710_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　八月之前，韩琦建成阅古堂，乃摭前代良守将之事实，可载诸图而为人法者，凡六十条。绘于堂之左右壁。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦作有《阅古堂》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见《安阳集》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_495864' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495864' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495864?labeling=true' target='_blank'>阅古堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495864")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495864_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495864'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495864'>仲尼大圣人，文武亦云学。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495864'>况其下者乎，而不事砻琢。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495864'>伊予之逢辰，进本任愚朴。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495864'>今辱寄中山，地重扼幽朔。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495864'>日惧不克堪，误上所简擢。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495864'>古之良守帅，功业甚奇卓。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495864'>思以救空疏，志慕极坚确。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495864'>后圃新吾堂，左右谨图模。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495864'>公馀时纵观，大可儆龊龊。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495864'>奔雷发聋聩，皎日破昏浊。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495864'>苟能奉规矩，曷愧大匠斲。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495864'>或此贤宾僚，指顾便扬攉。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495864'>四座企清风，耳目外优乐。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495864'>子好虚名哉，事实出诚悫。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495864'>庶几得涓尘，聊以助海岳。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495864'>唯有大忠心，不在先觉觉。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495864_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495864'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_495864_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦作有《定州阅古堂记》。大意是，以古代良守帅为榜样，学习古人为政、治军之方。不单有益于己，也有益于人。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1164118' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164118' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164118?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州阅古堂记<span class='inlineComment2'>（庆历八年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164118")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164118_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164118'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164118'>庆历八年夏五月，天子以河朔地大兵雄，而节制不专，非择帅分治而并抚其民不可，始诏魏、瀛、镇、定四路，悉用儒帅兼本道安抚使，而定以不肖辱其选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164118_comment'></div>既让不获命，至则竭愚修职，尚惧不能称上所以付与之意，退而思迹古名臣之轨躅，以自策励，且患其汩于多务而志之弗虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164118_comment'></div>会郡圃有坏亭，岁久不葺，于是广之为堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164118_comment'></div>既成，乃摭前代良守将之事实可载诸图而为人法者，凡六十条，绘于堂之左右壁，而以「阅古」为堂名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164118_comment'></div>夫古犹今也，古之人为屏翰、授鈇钺，而能成异政、立奇功，而今或不能者，何也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164118_comment'></div>盖其待己也必贤而足，其报禄也必利而安，持是以望政成而功立，不其难哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164118_comment'></div>如曰古人能之，予反不能之，日夜以勉焉，又安有不至者耶！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164118_comment'></div>今予之所为也，诚以己之道未充，而君之禄殊厚，任重涂远，惟仆踣之是虞，故在燕处之间，必将监古以自勉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164118_comment'></div>其未至也，则虽纷肴觞，竞笳吹，四时之景交见于前，予方仰而愧，俯而忧，孰知夫乐之为乐哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164118_comment'></div>其少进也，则虽吏文之扰怀，边责之在己，予固得其道而处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164118_comment'></div>至于幅巾坐啸，恬然终日，予之所乐，恶有既乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164118_comment'></div>若其宾客之于斯，僚属之于斯，不离几席，如阅旧史，俾人人知为治者莫先于教化，用兵者莫贵于权谋，而俱本之于忠义，功名一立，不独身享富贵，而庆流家宗，其馀风遗烈，可以被于旂常，传于简策，邈于万世，而凛然如存，咸有耸慕之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164118_comment'></div>不以酣歌优笑之为乐，而以是为乐，则予也岂徒己之为益，是将有益于人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164118_comment'></div>知我者，其以我为喜爽垲、遂娱赏而已乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164118_comment'></div>后来之贤，与吾同志，必爱尚而增葺之，宜免夫毁圮圬墁之患矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164118_comment'></div>谨记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1164118_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《依韵和机宜陈荐请游城北池馆二首》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_496009' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496009' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496009?labeling=true' id='poem_title_496017_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496017'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496017'>无劳迁职此何名，只有惭羞敢自荣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496017'>邱山莫副推恩重，铢两唯忧效死轻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496017_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496017'>高句不须期任旧，已求三载奏官成<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：近已上奏乞终三年。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496017_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496017'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496017_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《依前韵再答》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_496018' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496018' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496018?labeling=true' target='_blank'>依前韵再答</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496018")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496018_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496018'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496018'>不与皇家致太平，康宁时节便遗荣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496018_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496018'>寰中自乐乔彭寿，海内空流邴魏声。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496018_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496018'>一品坐来恩固重，万钟抛去禄何轻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496018_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496018'>朝廷欲继姬周盛，会向磻溪问老成。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496018_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496018'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496018_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《雪》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_496020' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496020' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496020?labeling=true' target='_blank'>雪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1049年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496020")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496020_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496020'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496020'>六花来应腊，望岁一开颜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496020_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496020'>歌舞喧侯第，风沙杂戍关。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496020_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496020'>馀芳留草树，清兴入江山。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496020_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496020'>后夜高楼月，萧然昆阆间。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496020_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496020'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496020_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《定州重修北岳庙记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1164115' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164115' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164115?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州重修北岳庙记</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐元年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164115")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164115_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164115'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164115'>天下之岳五，独北之常方，人目为大茂山，而岳名不著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164115_comment'></div>岳有祠，不知废于何代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164115_comment'></div>今庙于曲阳县之西附城，距岳百馀里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164115_comment'></div>考有唐以来记刻，皆不载废迁之由，故非质于图志，人或不知岳之所在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164115_comment'></div>于礼，祀莫大于天地，而五岳次之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164115_comment'></div>古者天子坛以祀四望，若时巡至其所，既柴，然后秩而望祀之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164115_comment'></div>庙而祭焉，非古也，其后世之文乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164115_comment'></div>然则为之者，诚有意焉耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164115_comment'></div>夫崭然而石，坳然而谷，泉焉而百派别，林焉而万干擢，岳之形也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164115_comment'></div>倏霁忽冥，伏珍见祥，喜焉而风雨时，怒焉而雷雹发，岳之神也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164115_comment'></div>人狎其形而易之也，薪于是，畋于是，安知其所以为神哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164115_comment'></div>君人者患民之不知也，于是庙而像之，以警民之耳目，致其严奉之心，使违祸而趋福，虽文非古，其于教也固益明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164115_comment'></div>若其视察之品，则三代以降，皆以公，有唐以王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164115_comment'></div>我朝抚有天下，驯致太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164115_comment'></div>真宗皇帝绍祖宗之隆，以建皇极，封泰山，祀后土，旷绝之礼，无所不讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164115_comment'></div>由是尊五岳而帝之，复以「安天元圣」之号，表于我神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164115_comment'></div>惧世人之未详也，又制《奉神述》以明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164115_comment'></div>盖爱民之意深，则报神之礼重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164115_comment'></div>斯诚也，虽万世可知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164115_comment'></div>故庙宫之制，崇饬宏大，惟礼之称，著于定令，以时缮修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164115_comment'></div>历年既长，吏职废怠，日风月雨，以圮以漏，功大费广，人焉不葺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164115_comment'></div>每岁立冬，天子之所署祀册，就遣守臣，以祗祀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164115_comment'></div>至则罗其笾豆洗酌之具，与执事者升降于颓垣坏庑之间，退而安然，罔以为恤，慢神渎礼，莫斯为甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164115_comment'></div>庆历八年夏六月，某获领州事，得居岳镇之下，知庙之未完也，由市材弗给，役徒弗充，而民罹水灾，岁以大歉，凡厥用度，弗敢为扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164115_comment'></div>会有诏毁乡民之擅为祠者，得取其材以济之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164115_comment'></div>益兵暨工，责成于邑吏，而旷时不集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164115_comment'></div>通判军州事、屯田员外郎游君开，谨于其事，愿尽力焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164115_comment'></div>率其县主簿李奕，留庙所百馀日，悦使其众，而已焉弗懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164115_comment'></div>于是弊陋朽挠之迹，焕然一新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164115_comment'></div>又于其庭起士民荐献之宇，俾勿亵于神，而神益以尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164115_comment'></div>彩绘涂塈，罔不精极，宜神之喜，肸蚃来宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164115_comment'></div>皇祐元年冬十月某日，以讫功来告，僚属请以鄙文志于庙石，而弗克让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164115_comment'></div>夫吏之为政也，有善恶焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164115_comment'></div>神之为鉴也，有祸福焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164115_comment'></div>善焉而以福，恶焉而以祸，神理之宜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164115_comment'></div>或反是焉，则非人之所知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164115_comment'></div>守臣当谨天子之命，而治神之居，洁神之祀，修己以爱其民，人唯神之所以祸福而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164115_comment'></div>谨记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_37_1164115_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1164115'><span class='label'>按：</span>《重修曲阳县志》载此碑原题《大宋重修北岳庙记》，题后署：「推诚保德功臣、资政殿大学士、光禄大夫、行给事中、充定州路都部署兼安抚使、兼知定州军州事及管内制置营田劝农使、上柱国、南阳郡开国公、食邑一千户、食实封四百户韩琦撰并书。」末行上题「朝奉郎、太常博士、通判定州军州兼制置营田及管内劝农事、上骑都尉、借绯钱贻范篆额」，下大书「皇祐二年正月十九日立」，末角署「常山郭庆□谏刻字」。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1164115_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1049&endYear=1049')">1049年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《乞祷祝祈雨奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163984' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163984' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163984?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞祷祝祈雨奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐元年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163984")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163984_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163984'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163984'>河朔久不雨，请祈无所应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163984_comment'></div>若出自圣怀，祷于天地山川，宜获嘉泽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1163984_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦授礼部侍郎。上《谢转礼部侍郎表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163711' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163711' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163711?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢转礼部侍郎表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163711")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163711_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163711'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163711'>臣某言：今月十六日，进奏院递到敕牒一道、官告一通，蒙圣慈授臣尚书礼部侍郎、加食邑五百户，仍放朝谢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163711_comment'></div>礼成合宫，泽被率土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163711_comment'></div>盖兴久坠之典，则有非常之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163711_comment'></div>凡在庶工，皆踰素望<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163711_comment'></div>恭惟皇帝陛下法古尧舜，致时成康。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163711_comment'></div>以大孝奉乎祖宗，以至诚答乎天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163711_comment'></div>旷绝之仪罔不讲，吉蠲之荐罔不躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163711_comment'></div>而犹虑孝有所未申，诚有所未达，乃访总章之旧，式因路寝之严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163711_comment'></div>享太微之精，兼尽报天之意；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163711_comment'></div>配文考之圣，参修事祖之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163711_comment'></div>逮讫明禋，亟覃殊庆，第锡官师之宠，且推福祚之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163711_comment'></div>而臣窃守边遐，荐罹岁馑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163711_comment'></div>骏奔率职，既莫助于国容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163711_comment'></div>爱利及人，曾未宽于上顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163711_comment'></div>不谓均禧之始，亦膺进秩之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163711_comment'></div>当有位之交欢，理难独让；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163711_comment'></div>揣无功而自讼，内实多惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163711_comment'></div>敢不益励朴忠，勉驱驽猥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163711_comment'></div>疆垂效力，虽终老以无辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163711_comment'></div>旒扆知臣，在殒生而孰报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163711_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云。　《安阳集》卷二五。）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1163711_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《发白有感》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_496021' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496021' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496021?labeling=true' target='_blank'>发白有感</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496021")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_496021_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496021'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496021'>区区边朔有何成，三失流年只自惊。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496021'>无一事来头尚白，白人头处岂堪行。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496021_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496021'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_496021_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《晚步后园觉有春色》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_496022' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496022' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496022?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晚步后园觉有春色</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496022")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496022_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496022'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496022'>桃李知春意，阳和到嫩萌。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496022_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496022'>风霜谁自困，莺蝶始多情。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496022_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496022'>终入芳菲赏，休论早晚荣。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496022_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496022'>穷边何所负，轰鼓醉金觥。<div
