id='poem_title_496023' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496023?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北楼望春</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496023")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_496023_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496023'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496023'>良畴芳圃汩飞埃，生意颙颙望震雷。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496023'>北岭有云空自绕，几时为雨出山来。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496023_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496023'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_496023_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《寒食》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。《安阳集编年笺注》有《寒食》同题诗二首，此为其中一首，首句为“塞上逢寒食”）</span><div id='poem_496024' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496024' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496024?labeling=true' target='_blank'>寒食</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496024")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496024_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496024'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496024'>塞上逢寒食，郊园此重临。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496024_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496024'>一时行乐意，万室欲春心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496024_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496024'>节物随人好，风光得处深。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496024_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496024'>只思民尽适，守鬓忘霜侵。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496024_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496024'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496024_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年3月</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《北岳祈雨文二》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164197' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164197' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164197?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北岳祈雨文<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164197")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164197_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164197'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164197'>维皇祐二年岁次庚寅，三月戊子朔，五日壬辰，具官某谨以清酌之奠，敢昭告于北岳安天元圣帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164197_comment'></div>某闻天之为道也，惟民善恶而祸福之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164197_comment'></div>然推其仁于福，则所任者；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164197_comment'></div>多于祸，则有所不忍焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164197_comment'></div>神之为灵也，能谨其所以祸福，而协天之仁者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164197_comment'></div>比岁以来，河朔之民罹大饥馑，幸而全者无几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164197_comment'></div>某为治祠下，行二期矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164197_comment'></div>夙夜祗慄，不敢慢其政以干神祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164197_comment'></div>每春夏之交，水旱萌沴，穑人骇忧，必请救于神，而神应之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164197_comment'></div>夫岂守臣一冥祷而能感于神哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164197_comment'></div>诚蚩蚩之民，无大罪恶，天与神哀其穷，不忍终其祸而致然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164197_comment'></div>今岁方春，而群阴用事，霾风昼昏，阳气迫而未宣，雨意兆而复收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164197_comment'></div>农力于田，惟岁是虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164197_comment'></div>岂天与神仁于任福，而不忍祸之之意邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164197_comment'></div>神其驱叱疠妖，奋示威德，霈然施泽，俾遂有年，则民知神休，孰不思报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164197_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1164197_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年5月</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。五月，韩琦命礼宾使、定州路驻泊都监张僎扩建庙学。有《定州新建州学记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1164116' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164116' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164116?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州新建州学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164116")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164116_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164116'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164116'>天与人性不一，圣人欲率焉而一之于善，非学不能也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164116_comment'></div>夫子之言性有三，曰上智、曰下愚、曰中人，谓智愚则不移矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164116_comment'></div>然而中人之可以上下者，由学与不学乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164116_comment'></div>昌黎文公曰：「上之性就学而愈明，下之性畏威而寡罪」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164116_comment'></div>夫智者之欲益明，愚者使知其可畏，又必在乎学而已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164116_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164116_comment'></div>文公之言性，可谓能广圣人之道而所劝多矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164116_comment'></div>故三代之兴也，自国家以达乎乡党，必有学以教其民人，导其性使一之于善，以明乎君君、臣臣、父父、子子、兄兄、弟弟、夫夫、妇妇之道，然后人安其分，而享国永长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164116_comment'></div>大矣哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164116_comment'></div>学之有功于治也如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164116_comment'></div>上之二十有二年，图讲万化，益究元本，思迹三代所治之道，以仁寿其民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164116_comment'></div>始诏州郡皆立学，差赋以田，俾资其用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164116_comment'></div>守臣从风，竞自崇饰，冀有以副天子首善之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164116_comment'></div>而定处北边，承诏者不知其本，以为用武之地，学非吾事也，独慢而寝焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164116_comment'></div>又四年，某忝命来守，未几仲秋之上丁，始躬行释奠礼于夫子之庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164116_comment'></div>阅旧记，始唐大中末，州帅卢公简求以庙本会昌所废天佑佛祠，其制犹若浮屠氏所居，乃更而大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164116_comment'></div>至天祐中王公处直、本朝开宝中祁公廷义，祥符初李公允正，皆能于兵寇之馀，因其极废而复兴焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164116_comment'></div>后之为此者，不能继四人者之用心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164116_comment'></div>故日复隳削，至是室宇垣墉，颓坏垂尽，由阈以内，鞠为污莱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164116_comment'></div>独夫子之堂，以巨材坚壮，不能摧挠，而<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1164116", 1164116, "Clauses/65/Comments/0")'>上覆</span>穿敝，泄落风雨，升降荐献，仅无所容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164116_comment'></div>属岁方大饥，诏停土木之役，退而叹愤，志期必葺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164116_comment'></div>后二年，农里屡丰，边陲无事，乃命礼宾使、定州路驻泊都监张君僎，选督工徒，以新庙宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164116_comment'></div>功费之大，实均改作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164116_comment'></div>凡再踰月而庙完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164116_comment'></div>于是即庙建学，市垣北之地，通而广之，以规以度，不陋不侈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164116_comment'></div>讲授有堂，肄习有斋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164116_comment'></div>庖厨井匽，生生之具无不备足，较其功费，复倍庙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164116_comment'></div>又再踰月而学成，乃以七月十九日甲辰，具牢醴，率僚属以告于先圣，而延诸生焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164116_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164116_comment'></div>夫子之教，天地也，凡为人者孰不戴履之，舍天地将安之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164116_comment'></div>故文武一道也，恶有二焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164116_comment'></div>昔夫子亦尝学焉，而后识其大者，故曰「我战则克」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164116_comment'></div>晋，列国也，犹用诗书礼乐之帅，卒伯诸侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164116_comment'></div>是知为儒而不知兵，为将而不知书，一旦用之，则茫然不知其所以克之之道，而败辱随之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164116_comment'></div>其所谓用武之地、学非吾事者，是真不知其本者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164116_comment'></div>今上之广学也，将养育天下士之秀者，使各正其性，以明乎三代教之之道，内充于己以待用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164116_comment'></div>故或取之为公卿大夫、郡县守长、百执事，皆能以其道佐吾君，宜吾民，交修乎小大之职，以至于海内大治，而上得以高拱而无为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164116_comment'></div>如未用也，则使宗族称其孝，乡党推其贤，朋友服其忠信，乐天知命，守死善道而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164116_comment'></div>若其破碎经史，掎摭声病，专以篆刻之技，茍窃仕进，不思富己之道，时而发之，则非天子所欲迹三代所治之道，以仁寿吾民之本意，学者其勉之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164116_comment'></div>谨记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1164116_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《感事》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_496025' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496025' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496025?labeling=true' target='_blank'>感事</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496025")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496025_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496025'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496025'>一来<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_496025", 496025, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>边障</span>地，走马过三秋。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496025_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496025'>万绪事常扰，九分春又休。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496025_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496025'>莺花谁在目，霜雪只侵头。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496025_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496025'>从得风光住，风光可奈忧。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496025_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496025'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496025_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年9月</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《明堂陈乞妻甥杜仪恩泽状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十三。）</span><div id='poem_1163799' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163799' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163799?labeling=true' target='_blank'>明堂陈乞妻甥杜仪恩泽状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163799")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163799_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163799'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163799'>右，臣伏以错事合宫，式昭能飨，均禧率土，咸被沾恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163799_comment'></div>辄循保任之规，仰渎睿明之听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163799_comment'></div>臣有妻甥进士杜仪，幼而志学，长以克家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163799_comment'></div>属严配之展仪，实上下之交福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163799_comment'></div>躬疆埸之事，虽莫奉于祭容；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163799_comment'></div>念葭莩之亲，尚窃援于荫格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163799_comment'></div>傥特从于人欲，誓力报于君仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163799_comment'></div>其杜仪仍乞于文资内安排。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163799_comment'></div>干冒宸严，臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1163799_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年12月</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《北岳祈雪文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。《安阳集编年笺注》有《北岳祈雪文》同题文二篇，此为其中一篇，首句为“维皇祐二年岁次庚寅”）</span><div id='poem_1164198' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164198' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164198?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北岳祈雪文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164198")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164198_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164198'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164198'>维皇祐二年岁次庚寅，十二月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌之奠，敢昭告于北岳安天元圣帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164198_comment'></div>大河之北，比岁不登，神知之矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164198_comment'></div>今又入冬以来，雪不时降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164198_comment'></div>果数之然耶，则否泰宜有以相返；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164198_comment'></div>政之致耶，则蚩蚩之民何罪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164198_comment'></div>此人之所以疑天与神不预人事者，正谓是也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164198_comment'></div>惟神作镇于北，助天成化，宜发天之德，示神之明，早霈时泽，慰民望而销沴萌，以释人之所疑，诚大惠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164198_comment'></div>不然，北道之民，全其生者无几矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164198_comment'></div>天昼夜而不息，胡为哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164198_comment'></div>神之祀孰供乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164198_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1164198_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《祷雪有感》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_496060' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496060' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496060?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祷雪有感</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496060")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496060_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496060'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496060'>灵岳祠宫尚未回，六花随祷下琼瑰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496060_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496060'>只忧风力狂无定，最喜云容重不开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496060_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496060'>但得馀滋周畎亩，敢求娇意助樽罍。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496060_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496060'>夜深犹使家人探，平地依稀几寸来。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496060_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496060'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496060_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《北岳谢雪文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。《安阳集编年笺注》有《北岳谢雪文》同题文二篇，此为其中一篇，首句为“维某年某月某朔某日”）</span><div id='poem_1164199' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164199' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164199?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北岳谢雪文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164199")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164199_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164199'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164199'>维某年某月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于北岳安天元圣帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164199_comment'></div>近以冬候将终，时雪不降，重困之民，比屋愁叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164199_comment'></div>守臣惭政之缺，察民无罪，辄遣属吏走祠下，合众心之所忧，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_2_1164199", 1164199, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>上诉</span>于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164199_comment'></div>神恻然怜之，翌日降雪，阖境之内，无不允洽，愁叹之民，以抃以舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164199_comment'></div>夫神之化冥冥然，民固有疑之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164199_comment'></div>及其应之昭也，则靡然归之无疑矣，况尤影响之速乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164199_comment'></div>宜其望而祀，庙而食，有国尊奉，与天无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164199_comment'></div>谨择良日，具牲醪以修报，惟神始怜之，终成之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164199_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164199_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1050&endYear=1050')">1050年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《谢转礼部员外郎充天章阁待制表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163784' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163784' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163784?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢转礼部员外郎充天章阁待制表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1050年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163784")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163784_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163784'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163784'>涣渥自天，震惶无地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163784_comment'></div>改中台之华序，进内阁之清班，尽出高明，殊登秘近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163784_comment'></div>窃念臣发自颜巷，宾于舜门，一第为荣，四方无效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163784_comment'></div>爰自书林预选，桂籍升华，耻汩没以怀安，或感激而论事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163784_comment'></div>惟慕古人之节，讵希英主之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163784_comment'></div>伏惟尊号皇帝陛下禀帝尧之聪明，加汉高之豁达，坦圣怀而虚受，期鸿化以感孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163784_comment'></div>念三圣之艰难而成丕业，求士人之蹇谔以补大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163784_comment'></div>臣犹愧非才，首当清问，危言多犯，孤立自持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163784_comment'></div>斧钺居前，雷霆在上，敢避枢机之祸，终乖药石之良。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163784_comment'></div>陛下日月垂光，江海敦量，恕其万死，假之一麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163784_comment'></div>望已绝于青云，咎未更于鸿霈，俄易藩宣之寄，宁分旰昃之忧！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163784_comment'></div>忽降纶章，荐加宠数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163784_comment'></div>而况辟图书之府，叨处于深严；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163784_comment'></div>践云龙之庭，当备于顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163784_comment'></div>非名儒而不称，岂曲士之能堪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163784_comment'></div>矧簉清曹，仍居旧治，辉荣大集，志愿何求！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163784_comment'></div>敢不内守朴忠，外修景行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163784_comment'></div>进退惟道，遵圣贤视履之方；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163784_comment'></div>始终一心，副君父育材之造。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163784'><span class='label'>按：</span>《古今事文类聚》遗集卷二，影印文渊阁四库全书本。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1163784_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年3月</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《北岳谢雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164200' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164200' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164200?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北岳谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164200")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164200_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164200'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164200'>维皇祐三年岁次辛卯，三月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于北岳安天元圣帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164200_comment'></div>某览载籍，见尧、汤水旱之事，而说者多归之天数，以为雩禜之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164200_comment'></div>盖有国家者，徇民志而安下情，其实不可求也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164200_comment'></div>乃有一守令自暴，一御史决狱，而能上动天意，应时注雨，则于二者之说，不能无惑焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164200_comment'></div>今则判然无惑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164200_comment'></div>某自承诏来定，会河朔岁灾比年，雨不时降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164200_comment'></div>为民之守，察民之穷而无所诉也，则必走僚属乞灵于岳祠之下，或三日至五日，神应响答，甘泽大洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164200_comment'></div>故北道歉殣，而定独小康，神贶多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164200_comment'></div>今岁自正月至三月不雨，民复震骇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164200_comment'></div>顾蚩蚩者无告，独神之有以诉也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164200_comment'></div>于是载加精祷，幸纾民患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164200_comment'></div>既而云容聚散，连日昼阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164200_comment'></div>至七日，雷电始发，一雨告足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164200_comment'></div>则知至诚者必能感神，而神必能为民之福也，又何惑焉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164200_comment'></div>谨择日具牢酒以为报，惟神荫佑，终赐有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164200_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1164200_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　韩琦前后上十章，言四税三税之法不便，终使朝廷下诏：河北沿边入中粮草，复行见钱之法。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《定州众春园记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1164117' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164117' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164117?labeling=true' target='_blank'>定州众春园记</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐三年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164117")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164117_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164117'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164117'>天下郡县无远迩小大，位署之外，必有园池台榭观游之所，以通四时之乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164117_comment'></div>前人勤而兴之，后辄废焉者，盖私于其心，惟己之利者之所为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164117_comment'></div>彼私而利者，不过曰：「吾之所治，传舍焉耳，满岁则委之而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164117_comment'></div>苟前之所为，尚足以容吾寝食、饮笑于其间可矣，何必劳而葺之，以利后人，而使好事者以为勤人而务不急，徒取戾焉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164117_comment'></div>吾不为也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164117_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164117_comment'></div>彼专一人之私以自利，宜其所见者隘而弗为也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164117_comment'></div>公于其心，而达众之情者则不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164117_comment'></div>夫官之修职，农之服田，工之治器，商之通货，早暮汲汲以忧其业，皆所以奉助公上而养其室家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164117_comment'></div>当良辰佳节，岂无一日之适以休其心乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164117_comment'></div>孔子曰「百日之蜡，一日之泽」，子贡且犹不知，况私而自利者哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164117_comment'></div>中山之地，自唐天宝失御，盗据戎猾，兵革残困，民不知为生之乐者百有馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164117_comment'></div>至我朝而后始见太平，亭障一清，生类蕃息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164117_comment'></div>不有时序观游之所，俾是四民间有一日之适，以乐太平之事，而知累圣仁育之深者，守臣之过也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164117_comment'></div>非公于其心，而达众之情者，又安及此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164117_comment'></div>郡城东北隅，潴水为塘，广百馀亩，植柳数万本，亭榭花卉之盛，冠于北垂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164117_comment'></div>盖今宣徽李公昭亮始兴之，后实废焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164117_comment'></div>予之来，惧陷其心于不公也，复完而兴之，凡栋宇、树蓺前所未备者，一从新意，罔有漏缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164117_comment'></div>又治长堤，凿门西南隅，以便游者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164117_comment'></div>于是园池之胜，益倍畴昔，总而名之曰「众春园」，庶乎良辰丽节，太守得与吏民同一日之适，游览其间，以通乎圣时无事之乐，此其意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164117_comment'></div>后之人视园之废兴，其知为政者之用心焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164117_comment'></div>皇祐三年正月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1164117_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《众春园》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_495865' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495865' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495865?labeling=true' target='_blank'>众春园</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495865")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495865_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495865'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495865'>中山雄北边，地得要害扼。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495865'>烽警昔未彻，民日困兵革。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495865'>一从无事来，历祀且半百。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495865'>戈矛既钱镈，比屋遂仁宅。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495865'>人生亦自劳，营业鲜暇隙。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495865'>诚哉百日勤，固愿一日适。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495865'>为政本人情，三代所不易。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495865'>汉吏称循良，在宣布恩泽。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495865'>兹吾治废园，大揭众春额。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495865'>庶乎时节游，使见太平迹。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495865'>园中何所有，风物难具籍。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495865'>方塘百亩馀，遥派逗寒碧。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495865'>虚亭跨彩桥，孤屿耸幽石。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495865'>环堤柳万株，无时张翠帟。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495865'>移得江南天，不觉万里隔。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495865'>芳林灼灼花，次第锦绣坼。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495865'>三春烂熳时，为民开宴席。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495865'>观者如堵墙，士女杂城陌。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495865'>野态得天真，靓妆非俗格。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495865'>惟意任所如，去来何络绎。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495865'>多欢知有今，胜致骇非昔。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_495865'>如登老氏台，怀抱罔不释。<div id='poem_sentence_21_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_495865'>既以休吾民，又足奉嘉客。<div id='poem_sentence_22_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_495865'>清暑暨凉秋，池景尤可惜。<div id='poem_sentence_23_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_495865'>红蕖四照香，风送入絺绤。<div id='poem_sentence_24_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_495865'>乘兴命轻舟，纵赏缓<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_495865", 495865, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>撑刺</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_25_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_495865'>芳饵须鲙资，绿房欣手摘。<div id='poem_sentence_26_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_495865'>就饮圆荷中，一当数大白。<div id='poem_sentence_27_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_495865'>时见群鸥飞，惊此红袖拍。<div id='poem_sentence_28_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_495865'>献酬如未快，申令喜相搦。<div id='poem_sentence_29_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_495865'>或见大敌怯，便可遗巾帼。<div id='poem_sentence_30_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_495865'>酣战方气振<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：平。）</span>，俄景忽晡夕。<div id='poem_sentence_31_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_495865'>人笑山公归，酩酊倒巾帻。<div id='poem_sentence_32_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_495865'>谁知酩酊心，自有制胜策。<div id='poem_sentence_33_495865_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_495865'></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_495865_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《览资政富公新诗》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_495866' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495866?labeling=true' target='_blank'>览资政富公新诗</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495866")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495866_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495866'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495866'>贤辅于朝廷，中外唯所用。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495866'>中则翊万枢，天业日以重。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495866'>外则泰一方，君治亦云共。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495866'>公今得淮康，大厦辍隆栋。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495866'>惠政聊一施，万室绝愁痛。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495866'>狱讼不复烦，甘脆诚足奉。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495866'>优游为文章，六义本规讽。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495866'>长篇灿臣轴，邮驿邈见送。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495866'>发函捧琼瑰，再拜喜吟诵。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495866'>高调既古雅，奇格复豪纵。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495866'>钧天张广乐，累夕骇谷梦。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495866'>宛马历夷途，万里不可控。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495866'>李杜若复生，屈伏事非恐。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495866'>况夫浅浅流，固莫测源洞。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495866'>何时衮衣归，瞻望慰民众。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495866'>事业追夔龙，风烈陋姚宋。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495866'>曰赓元首歌，间助薰琴弄。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495866'>休闻狼跋诗，万世发长恸。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495866_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《谢资政富公再以近诗见寄》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷一。）</span><div id='poem_495867' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495867' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495867?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢资政富公再以近诗见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_495867_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495867'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495867'>惟公之所存，致后协二典。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495867'>当入相天子，贤业遂大展。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495867_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163712")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163712_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163712'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163712'>臣某言：今月二十五日，侄男太常寺太祝正彦赍到官告、敕牒各一道，伏蒙圣慈授臣依前行尚书礼部侍郎、充观文殿学士，仍令再任及放朝谢者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163712_comment'></div>满岁复留，已示寄边之重；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163712_comment'></div>议功无实，何胜进职之优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163712_comment'></div>荷信任则义不可辞，拜光宠则愧无容地<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163712_comment'></div>伏念臣赋性专朴，遭时盛明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163712_comment'></div>过蒙仁圣之误知，惟恐忠义之不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163712_comment'></div>二垂所效，一纪于兹，挺然思报于国家，倏尔已成于衰病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163712_comment'></div>究疆埸之事，几寝食之俱忘；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163712_comment'></div>于进取之心，固梦寤之无及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163712_comment'></div>矧此中山之会，最居北狄之冲，自分道而新睿图，以非才而叨帅任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163712_comment'></div>当兵卒横骄之后，乘岁时凶歉之馀，得不世出之贤，犹难训治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163712_comment'></div>使甚愚者之虑，奚足戢安？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163712_comment'></div>遽越代期，分甘公黜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163712_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下天无不覆，器之使人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163712_comment'></div>念考绩之踰时，贵守方之有法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163712_comment'></div>深惟古制，莫重久官，将垂经远之规，寝革数迁之敝，特申褒典，更责后勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163712_comment'></div>仕不辞难，盖推诚之所激；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163712_comment'></div>让非中理，虽冒赏以无嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163712_comment'></div>敢不益谨备虞，动存绥靖，俾吏民之愈信，致师旅之增和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163712_comment'></div>生入玉关，可诮前人之隳志；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163712_comment'></div>心居魏阙，不忘疏迹之爱君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163712_comment'></div>苟未挂于吏文，终有裨于庙胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163712_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1163712_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年9月9日</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《北塘重九》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_496058' class='_poem'><div id='poem_1164201' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164201' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164201?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北岳祈雪文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164201")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164201_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164201'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164201'>维某年某月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌之奠，敢昭告于北岳安天元圣帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164201_comment'></div>某闻四方之民，水旱丰穰，皆系守政之善否，某常信是说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164201_comment'></div>至定而后，知不独系于政，乃有岳镇之神，阴主一方，能驱斥灾沴，而降民之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164201_comment'></div>某非才，守定行五岁矣，政之不善，宜有以动天变而及斯民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164201_comment'></div>何乃北道比岁大灾，而定独小康，得非守政虽不善，而神能佑民而福之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164201_comment'></div>昭昭矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164201_comment'></div>今岁农畴大穰，比户嬉乐，而时雪过期，未有嘉应，此守臣所以思政而自惧，神所以爱民而施福之时也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164201_comment'></div>神其宣扬威灵，振激和气，使盈尺之瑞，早慰民望，则民心归向，不在他祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164201_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_8_1164201_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《北岳谢雪文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。《安阳集编年笺注》有《北岳谢雪文》同题文二篇，此为其中一篇，首句为“维皇祐三年岁次辛卯”）</span><div id='poem_1164202' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164202' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164202?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北岳谢雪文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1051年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164202")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164202_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164202'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164202'>维皇祐三年岁次辛卯，十二月戊寅朔，二十六日癸卯，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于北岳安天元圣帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164202_comment'></div>近以时雪稍愆，未充岁望，咎政之失，惟民是虞，亟祷于神，尚期鉴佑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164202_comment'></div>果蒙灵答，若响应声，虽农亩尚冀沾霈，而民心大已开释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164202_comment'></div>谨遣大理寺丞、签署节度判官厅公事夏倚，躬致菲薄，以修报礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164202_comment'></div>惟神念此一方，素垂荫护，更施惠泽，以永神休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164202_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1164202_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1051&endYear=1051')">1051年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《北岳再祈雪文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164203' id='poem_sentence_0_1164203'>维某年某月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌之奠，敢昭告于北岳安天元圣帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164203_comment'></div>近以入冬以来，时雪未洽，累遣掾属，乞灵于神，亦既踰旬，尚稽报佑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164203_comment'></div>岂守臣爱民之心未至，而事神之意弗虔乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164203_comment'></div>夙夜究思，罔克自处。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496070'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496070'>一守中山四载馀，栽成芳树满郊衢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496070_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496071'>众里鞦韆应是騃，岸边鸥鸟却忘机。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496071_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_content_244790'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_244790'>尽室林塘涤暑烦，旷然如不在尘寰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_244790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_244790'>谁人敢议清风价，无乐能过白日閒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_244790_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_244790'>水鸟得鱼长自足，岭云含雨只空还。<div id='poem_title_1164178' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164178?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭文正范公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1052年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164178")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164178_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164178'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164178'>维某年某月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于资政范公之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164178_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164178_comment'></div>上天生公，固为吾宋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164178_comment'></div>以尧舜佐吾君兮，既忘身而忠国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164178_comment'></div>以成康期吾俗兮，又竭思而仁众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164178_comment'></div>升赞枢宰，孰云不用？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164178_comment'></div>殿抚藩服，孰云不重？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164178_comment'></div>何太平之策噤而不得施兮，委经纶于一梦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164178_comment'></div>此一人所震嗟，而天下之所深痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164178_comment'></div>岂止乎平生之交，得讣音而长恸！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164178_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164178_comment'></div>仆始立朝，接公尚疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164178_comment'></div>道同气合，千里相符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164178_comment'></div>忝帅于西，乃与公俱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164178_comment'></div>协心毕力，誓剪凶渠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164178_comment'></div>义切王室，情均友于。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164178_comment'></div>虽千艰而万险，仗忠信而如无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164178_comment'></div>仆之望公，公骥仆驽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164178_comment'></div>十驾未逮，敢拟齐驱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164178_comment'></div>人胡不辨，遂连公呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164178_comment'></div>自顾无有，愧常汗珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164178_comment'></div>繄公是托，终履夷涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164178_comment'></div>叛羌来附，一节同趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164178_comment'></div>与公并命，参翊万枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164178_comment'></div>凡有大事，为国远图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164178_comment'></div>争而后已，欢言如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164178_comment'></div>指之为党，果如是乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164178_comment'></div>道卒与于时戾，谓公迂而仆愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164178_comment'></div>相缘补外，谤毁崎岖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164178_comment'></div>感公之知，谓死不渝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164178_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164178_comment'></div>定之去青，不遐驿置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164178_comment'></div>自公之东，信问时至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164178_comment'></div>爱顾益深，交朋莫二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164178_comment'></div>蝇头细书，以时为寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164178_comment'></div>珠贝累幅，气严法备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164178_comment'></div>自云矍铄，以将厚意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164178_comment'></div>谓公康宁，日保纯粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164178_comment'></div>忽以疾闻，求医往视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164178_comment'></div>矍然遣使，候公鉴寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164178_comment'></div>会公得颍，肩舆赴治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164178_comment'></div>尚烦公答，亲笔数字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164178_comment'></div>意公小痊，粗以为慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164178_comment'></div>方具书药，诣公所憩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164178_comment'></div>得元规报，云公永逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164178_comment'></div>读之骇然，手足俱废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164178_comment'></div>气填满膺，食不知味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164178_comment'></div>惟公事君之大端，固始终而一致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164178_comment'></div>有生即有死兮，虽圣智其安避？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164178_comment'></div>所惜者国家待贤而后乂，天胡不仁而不憖遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164178_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164178_comment'></div>公之所存，履夔蹈卨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164178_comment'></div>高文奇谋，大忠伟节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164178_comment'></div>充塞宇宙，照耀日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164178_comment'></div>前不愧于古人，后可师于来哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164178_comment'></div>固有良史直书，海内公说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164178_comment'></div>亘亿万载，不可磨灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164178_comment'></div>此为夭而为寿兮，信识者之能别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164178_comment'></div>岂于一奠之间，可尽公之德烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164178_comment'></div>惟是冥然而思，默然而悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164178_comment'></div>此生未殒，曾无已时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_495857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495857'>周平东迁鲁君隐，王纲坏裂勿复联。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495857_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495870_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='authorDate'>（1053年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163713")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163713_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163713'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163713'>臣某言：今月日，某官赍到告敕，伏蒙圣慈授臣武康军节度使、知并州、河东路经略安抚使兼并代等路兵马都总管者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163713_comment'></div>守边再闰，久实何功？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163713_comment'></div>申命广朝，宠斯为误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163713_comment'></div>矧元戎之寄重，兼大卤之地雄，骤付匪才，其如清议<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163713_comment'></div>伏念臣守惟任拙，性不通时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163713_comment'></div>徒知忠义之可为，虽在颠危而莫夺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163713_comment'></div>而自奋身西鄙，待罪北疆，周旋一纪之间，勤苦二垂之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163713_comment'></div>积忧成瘁，由壮得衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163713_comment'></div>方欲上叩慈宸，请更便郡，庶少全于生理，愿在备于死官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163713_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙皇帝陛下度材之宜，惟旧所任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163713_comment'></div>念一临于朔部，适五及于岁期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163713_comment'></div>载惟并、晋之区，并控羌、胡之会，俾专节度，仍委抚绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163713_comment'></div>而臣素忝学儒，粗能审分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163713_comment'></div>塞防之责，既念重而难辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163713_comment'></div>旄钺之来，岂无劳之可受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163713_comment'></div>自顾犹是，群言可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163713_comment'></div>况今蛮徼未宾，王师致讨，欲人心之竞捷，在赏典之惟公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163713_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下察寸诚之不欺，究二柄之当谨，特追还于使节，止就领于帅台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163713_comment'></div>如此，则名器不可假人，免腾嗤诮；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163713_comment'></div>爵禄所以厉世，足劝勋能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163713_comment'></div>幸知臣之至明，期得请而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163713_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1163713_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在安喜。韩琦仍在知定州任上。上《辞免武康军节度使第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163714' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163714' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163714?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辞免武康军节度使第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163714")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163714_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163714'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163714'>臣某言<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163714_comment'></div>君恩一出，犹吝改于已行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163714_comment'></div>臣分再思，愿恳陈于当让。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163714_comment'></div>终期得请，是免愧心<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163714_comment'></div>伏念臣早繇书生，久服武事，岂贪愚有欲于利，盖忠愤不知其劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163714_comment'></div>兹临朔垂，再及岁闰，务益烦而虽勉，神过用而已疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163714_comment'></div>方求便安，少养衰拙，不谓误膺圣念，复责边勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163714_comment'></div>并土之控二疆，敢辞奔命；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163714_comment'></div>洋川之抗六纛，自省何功？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163714_comment'></div>较其冒宠之必殃，不若避荣而获戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163714_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下俯矜危悃，谓出至诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163714_comment'></div>俾仍帅领之权，且观来效；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163714_comment'></div>亟寝节旄之授，以待劳臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163714_comment'></div>敢不强率尪孱，愈图报塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163714_comment'></div>忧边思职，冀尽力于兵间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163714_comment'></div>窃位素餐，免致讥于天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163714_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1163714_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年2月</a>　在安喜。二月，韩琦仍在知定州任上，上《谢除武康军节度使表》。接受武康军节度使一职的任命。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163715' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163715' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163715?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢除武康军节度使表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163715")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163715_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163715'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163715'>臣某言：三月二十八日，枢密院递到诏书一道，伏蒙圣慈以臣陈让武康军节度使不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163715_comment'></div>宠若惊而自视，其实何劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163715_comment'></div>让如伪以虽诚，固难俞请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163715_comment'></div>荷诏慈之加勖，顾边责之匪轻，于义莫辞，措身无地<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163715_comment'></div>伏念臣进由孤直，知自睿明，不敢苟富贵以作身谋，唯以报国家而为己任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163715_comment'></div>服西北二疆之事，几光阴一纪之间，日有百忧，官无寸效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163715_comment'></div>不觉寒暄之易变，但惊精力之早衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163715_comment'></div>苟乘障以自安，亦未免好权之谤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163715_comment'></div>欲请藩而少便，则涉乎避事之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163715_comment'></div>夙夜以思，进退不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163715_comment'></div>岂谓伏蒙体天法道钦文聪武圣神孝德皇帝陛下大度天地，至仁陶唐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163715_comment'></div>念宿业之且勤，不责人于兼备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163715_comment'></div>就易帅台于并土，特加使纛于洋川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163715_comment'></div>荐霈德音，促当成命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163715_comment'></div>臣窃上循朝意，再揣官宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163715_comment'></div>十稔之前，尝被察廉之寄；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163715_comment'></div>三垂所次，悉专督护之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163715_comment'></div>今兹节制之行，始正营屯之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163715_comment'></div>避焉莫得，愧弗能胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163715_comment'></div>敢不力究民疵，谨修戎律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163715_comment'></div>义之所在，知熊掌之难兼；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163715_comment'></div>命或可捐，若鸿毛之甚易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163715_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1163715_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《后园寒步》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷一。此诗作于韩琦仁宗皇祐间知定州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495869?labeling=true' target='_blank'>后园寒步</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495869")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495869'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495869'>如何天地举寒令，独将杀气凌边遐。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495869'>公园跬步亦难往，试来举目成吁嗟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495869'>长空黯淡作愁色，日光似透云还遮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495869'>朔风刮面不吹雪，徒扰万窍掀黄沙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495869'>园中索寞不可状，唯视众木攒枯槎。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495869'>有如汉将肃行阵，远涉大漠平番家。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495869'>貔貅冻列树营壁，巨矛长戟何交加。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495869'>老松一二柯叶在，外皮皴裂埋僵蛇。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495869'>幽禽声好久绝听，孤城远近号饥鸦。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495869'>斋中酒热忍自酌，几何贫户无纤麻。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495869'>冥官持权因意恶，直欲万类歼阴邪。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495869'>穷严极烈势未已，不知泉底生阳芽。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495869_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495869'></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_495869_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《病鹤贻刘易》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷一。此诗作于韩琦仁宗皇祐间知定州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495871' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495871' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495871?labeling=true' target='_blank'>病鹤贻刘易</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495871")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495871_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495871'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495871'>尘寰病思苦，仙府归魂劳。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495871'>秃翼败风霰，卑栖掩蓬蒿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495871'>池圃摈时玩，鸡凫岂吾曹。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495871'>谁知牢落心，万里孤云高。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495871_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495871'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495871_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《示直彦》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷一。此诗作于韩琦仁宗皇祐间知定州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_495872' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495872' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495872?labeling=true' target='_blank'>示直彦</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495872")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495872_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495872'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495872'>人惟万物灵，各肖天地貌。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495872'>中人无贤愚，在禀父师教。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495872'>禀则道业成，奋跃出泥淖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495872'>不禀坠素风，隐身于不孝。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495872'>汝父最汝怜，五岁入学校。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495872'>文采冀日彰，谓如隐雾豹。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495872'>不见汝成人，赍恨掩泉窖。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495872'>汝兮胡不思，先矩勉而效。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495872'>奈何一夕眠，乃至巳午觉。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495872'>开口受饮食，摩腹混笑闹。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495872'>四体遂吾懒，万事绝挂挠。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495872'>习焉而忘返，纨绮事不较。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495872'>高秋八月凉，蚊蟆罢蒙罩。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495872'>燃膏继昼景，著撰勤节抄。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495872'>诏举有前期，富贵孰不乐。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495872'>忍捐卿相科，甘坐阅醯酵。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495872'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_495872_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_495872'><span class='label'>按：</span>以上《安阳集》卷一<br /></div><div id='poem_note_495872_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在安喜，任定州知州。韩琦有《题览胜亭》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。此诗作于仁宗皇祐间韩琦知定州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_496004' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496004' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496004?labeling=true' target='_blank'>题览胜亭<span class='inlineComment2'>（在北城上）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496004")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496004_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496004'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496004'>极目知何胜，东西矗万岑。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496004'>天虽限夷夏，人自失喉襟。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496004'>远木已秋色，乱云犹夕阴。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496004_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_preface_1164131'>文正王公葬郑州新郑县之临洧乡，而与郑相子产、唐相裴度之冢相左右。其弟刑部侍郎致仕子融乃绘三相之像，置于坟之僧院，而属余以辞，故为《三贤赞》云。</div><div id='poem_preface_1164131_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164131'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164131'>猗欤国氏，惟郑卿臣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1164131_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在安喜，并州知州任上。受命知并州时，韩琦有《次韵答致政杜公以加节见寄》诗。作品：《次韵答留台春卿侍郎以加节见寄二首》（其二）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。此诗作于仁宗皇祐间韩琦知定州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。省副，为三司副使简称。）</span><div id='poem_496079' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496079' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496079?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵答留台春卿侍郎以加节见寄二首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496079")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496079_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496079'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496079'>洛下安然塞下劳，公持霜简我持旄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496079'>忧无虚日三垂重，闲入芳春万事高。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496079'>病虎厌风摧汉节，卧龙悭雨涩吴刀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496079_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496079'>遥知啸傲烟霞外，肯把仙袍换战袍。<div -----title
曲阳
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='299e41956c2040148772626003ae6287_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("299e41956c2040148772626003ae6287");'><span id='299e41956c2040148772626003ae6287_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>，41岁</div><div id='299e41956c2040148772626003ae6287' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1048&endYear=1048')">1048年</a>　在曲阳，任定州知州。韩琦有《北岳》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷六。）</span><div id='poem_495996' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495996' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495996?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北岳</a><span class='authorDate'>（1048年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495996")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_495996_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495996'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495996'>四海尊方岳，常推朔镇雄。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495996'>阳为中夏胜，阴与北胡穷。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495996'>孕秀贤豪出，宣灵造化通。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495996'>斗乘天位正，乾发帝基隆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495996'>盛畜严凝气，横障广莫风。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495996'>举头瞻峻极，危坐压崆峒。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495996'>殖物资坤德，栖真固坎宫。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495996'>星躔函毕昴，祀典轶王公。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495996'>俗仰良材富，年随喜泽丰。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495996'>左肱挥渤澥，右股跨獯戎。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495996'>地险祠庭革，时平戍垒空。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495996'>岚光朝扑黛，宝色夜舒虹。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495996'>有药皆奇种，无花不异丛。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495996'>层巅健雕鹗，怪穴老罴熊。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495996'>肆觐仪虽阔，斯民望未充。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495996'>何时清大漠，封牒纪宸功。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495996_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495996'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_495996_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
获鹿
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='6f6576ba10ba46818b02c9c934df530a_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("6f6576ba10ba46818b02c9c934df530a");'><span id='6f6576ba10ba46818b02c9c934df530a_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>，46岁</div><div id='6f6576ba10ba46818b02c9c934df530a' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在获鹿，并州知州任上。赴并州途中，韩琦有《清明获鹿道中》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。此诗作于仁宗皇祐间韩琦知定州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。省副，为三司副使简称。）</span><div id='poem_496080' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496080' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496080?labeling=true' target='_blank'>清明获鹿道中</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496080")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496080_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496080'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496080'>尺雪征涂已倦行，那堪寂寞过清明。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496080'>农居近古鞦韆野，县堞成虚睥睨平。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496080'>只见靓妆矜节服，更无闲地匝春耕。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496080'>山川寓目皆形胜，可惜虚屯百万兵。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496080_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496080'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496080_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>

-----title
井陉
-----detail

平定

href='/Writing/496084?labeling=true' target='_blank'>百井路山桃盛开</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496084")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496084_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496084'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496084'>漫岭夭桃树，无人亦自开。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496084'>云霞深隐洞，锦绣远成堆。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496084'>生意惊樵斧，芳情谢宴杯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496084'>莫迷行客路，不似武陵回。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496084_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496084'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496084_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在阳曲，并州知州任上。赴并州途中，韩琦有《出山口》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。此诗作于仁宗皇祐间韩琦知定州时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。省副，为三司副使简称。）</span><div id='poem_496087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496087' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496087?labeling=true' target='_blank'>出山口</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496087")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496087_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496087'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496087'>待晓出山口，溟濛雨乍晴。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496087'>始知经尽险，终得坦然平。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496087'>草树开春意，川原豁眼明。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496087'>吏民当自信，竹马不须迎。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496087_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496087'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496087_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年3月17日</a>　在阳曲。三月十七日，韩琦到任并州知州。有《并州谢上表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十六。并州，仁宗嘉祐四年（1059）升太原府。）</span><div id='poem_1163716' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163716' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163716?labeling=true' target='_blank'>并州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年3月17日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163716")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163716_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163716'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163716'>臣某言：伏奉制敕，授臣武康军节度使、知并州、河东路经略安抚使，已于三月十七日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163716_comment'></div>国家经画三垂，实最他道，置帅大卤，独控二疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163716_comment'></div>非有将略可以摧狄心，吏术可以救民瘼，或轻而授，固不克胜<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163716_comment'></div>窃惟晋阳之提封，盖本唐尧之旧化，俗俭而家给，土豪而兵劲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163716_comment'></div>虽有水旱之沴，而无冻馁之虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163716_comment'></div>自西事之兴，屯戍兹广，人疲远饷，户及横歛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163716_comment'></div>重以和籴积欠而输窘，奸钱乱法而币轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163716_comment'></div>故今物力未甚完，罪辟日以众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163716_comment'></div>亭候无惊，而兵费犹冗；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163716_comment'></div>羌胡久附，而边吏或懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163716_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下以恩德浸诸夏，以威信柔外夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163716_comment'></div>顾兹一方，素号襟要，思择帅守，安而治之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163716_comment'></div>而臣信道虽笃，应变不长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163716_comment'></div>乘障中山，徒历再闰，讫无实效，上裨远图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163716_comment'></div>圣念矜全，未赐显黜，复加旄钺，付此重寄，诏旨敦谕，弗容避辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163716_comment'></div>臣敢不中夜以兴，当食而废，审富庶之良画，较备御之长算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163716_comment'></div>使编氓晓悉于上意，殊俗震慑于天声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163716_comment'></div>若其报君之大方，则当投死而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163716_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163716_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。三月以后，韩琦到任并州知州之初，罢前帅所兴不急之役，上《乞召还并州走马承受廖浩然奏》，奏逐上差贪恣不法的奏逐走马承受廖浩然。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷四。）</span><div id='poem_1163985' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163985' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163985?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞召还并州走马承受廖浩然奏</a><span class='authorDate'>（皇祐五年正月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163985")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163985_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163985'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163985'>臣熟察浩然所奏多不实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163985_comment'></div>朝廷近差侍禁冯靖同承受，浩然忌其廉洁，无名奏纳，亦移靖他路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163985_comment'></div>既诬逐一大帅，又望风诬逐一同职官，朝廷略不辨證，皆从其请，官吏皆忧叹不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163985_comment'></div>且浩然性贪恣，不法状甚多，愿召还，使保全，不然臣将行法矣。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1163985_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年4月22日</a>　四月二十二日，上奉太宗御容，安于并之统平殿。韩琦上章陈乞恢复并州为太原府，由于胡宿的反对，未能如所请。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　韩琦奏请隰州司户参军牛景充教授，以专学职。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　韩琦派钤辖苏安静以契丹国移文为凭据，讨回天池庙地。并在黄搜山麓堑地立石为限。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　韩琦委钤辖苏安静、窦舜卿与两通判，召募强壮之民为弓箭手，给田。得四千户，恳边田九千六百顷。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　韩琦奏请除麟州酒禁，诏从之。又请弛府州酒禁，无果。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　韩琦奏里正衙前之弊，乞请罢之。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《送门人曾宏秘校登第南归》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_496088' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496088' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496088?labeling=true' target='_blank'>送门人曾宏秘校登第南归</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496088")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496088_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496088'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496088'>十载辞乡志，登科一旦伸。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496088'>青纶归养客，白发倚门人。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496088'>家酿难禁蟹，江鲈正得莼。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496088'>之官如自立，吾馆有贤宾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496088_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496088'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496088_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《吕景初殿院被召归阙》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_496089' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496089' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496089?labeling=true' target='_blank'>吕景初殿院被召归阙</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496089")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496089_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496089'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496089'>迩臣清举世推公，驿召归驰御史骢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496089'>不独危言开正道，更将高节激颓风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496089'>严霜透骨寒威重，健鹘盘空杀气雄。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496089'>朝选虽精知尚薄，济时才业满胸中。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496089_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496089'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496089_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《初伏柳溪》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_496090' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496090' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496090?labeling=true' target='_blank'>初伏柳溪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496090")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496090_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496090'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496090'>万柳笼溪借碧涟，涤烦高会喜僚贤。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496090'>人间酷暑病庚伏，世外清风有洞天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496090'>一枕易醒西峤雨，满筵思醉北池莲。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496090'>棠阴讼阒边烽静，谁信榆关作地仙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496090_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496090'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496090_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年闰7月</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《太原诸庙祈雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164204' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164204' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164204?labeling=true' target='_blank'>太原诸庙祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年闰7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164204")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164204_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164204'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164204'>维皇祐五年岁次癸巳，闰七月戊辰朔某日，具官某谨遣某官，以清酌之奠，致祷于某神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164204_comment'></div>某闻天道之主于仁，不则人何以保其生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164204_comment'></div>神之道亦主于仁，不则人何以通其诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164204_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164204_comment'></div>天与神之道皆主于仁矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164204_comment'></div>何一方霜旱之后，既俾其田大茂，垂及有年，而反枯槁之、蝥蠈之，使民终日哀祈叫呼，冀一施其仁，寂然莫应邪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164204_comment'></div>某治并始数月，虽然，为政一日不合于民，宜为天气之病，顾民是何罪哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164204_comment'></div>是用斋戒省咎，将民意以有告于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164204_comment'></div>惟神助天化育，功在祀典，哀民之诚，迫切如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164204_comment'></div>亟驱风云，沛然下雨，扫涤疠气，销弭虫孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164204_comment'></div>则千里之内，神一施其仁，而瘁死之苗，起为<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_10_1164204", 1164204, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>丰颖</span>，咨嗟之叹，转为欢谣，民归神之心何如哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164204_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1164204_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《诸庙谢雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164205' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164205' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164205?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诸庙谢雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164205")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164205_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164205'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164205'>维皇祐五年岁次癸巳，某月某朔某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于某神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164205_comment'></div>近以秋稼甫成，旱蝗萌孽，吏民骇议，唯神是归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164205_comment'></div>守臣斋诚，亟祷祠下，朝奠未缩，暮澍已洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164205_comment'></div>灵应之速，实犹影响，合境之内，鼓舞欢呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164205_comment'></div>知神之仁，益用钦向，谨择良日，具馨荐以修报礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164205_comment'></div>惟神冥佑兹土，功德至大，亦既拯民之将殒，则当俾岁之大穫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164205_comment'></div>守臣何答，惟是忠信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164205_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1164205_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1053&endYear=1053')">1053年9月9日</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《重九以疾不能主席因成小诗劝北园诸官饮》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_496091' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496091' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496091?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重九以疾不能主席因成小诗劝北园诸官饮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1053年9月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦",
