class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164206")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164206_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164206'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164206'>维皇祐五年岁次癸巳，十二月丙申朔，二十一日丙辰，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，敢昭告于蒙山之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164206_comment'></div>某闻前代良守长，以其部旱暵之为沴也，必求境内有闻之神祈祷之，而与神约，过期不雨，则举祠燔之，雨则葺之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164206_comment'></div>某谓不必然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164206_comment'></div>今环晋之境，数千里之广，岁将穷而未雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164206_comment'></div>守臣同民之忧，遍祷群祠，逾月弗应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164206_comment'></div>闻蒙山晋望也，古有祠，俯瞰灵渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164206_comment'></div>自唐以来，崇奉祈报，民实蒙福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164206_comment'></div>今隳圮垂尽，而故址岿然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164206_comment'></div>夫祠虽不存，山川之神岂尝亡耶？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164206_comment'></div>谨遣某官，即坏祠具肴酒以告，夫将己意以达于神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164206_comment'></div>神祠之坏，而必完之，皆守臣之职也，答之与否，不敢慢神而废职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164206_comment'></div>然神能奋起潜德，亟沛惠泽，以警一方久不信之民，则宜远迩归向，易怠为恭，神之威尊，与山巍峨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164206_comment'></div>不然，且惧祠虽完而复废也，神听之乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164206_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1164206_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年1月</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《诸庙祈雨文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十二。）</span><div id='poem_1164207' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164207' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164207?labeling=true' target='_blank'>诸庙祈雨文</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164207")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164207_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164207'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164207'>维皇祐六年岁次甲午，正月丙寅朔，二十七日壬辰，具官某谨遣某官，以清酌庶羞之奠，有祷于某神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164207_comment'></div>去岁历秋冬逮今，雨雪不时降，细民骇嗟，以田为忧者，实半天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164207_comment'></div>天子惕然引咎，斋戒祈祷，无所不至，而卒未大应。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164207_comment'></div>今复时疫暴作，民中其疾者十有八九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164207_comment'></div>虽星分所次，流灾有常，而天子慈仁爱民，夙夜焦劳，守土之臣，皆奉命修职，不敢有苛刻之政，上病天气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164207_comment'></div>天忍极肆其酷，冥然而不顾哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164207_comment'></div>天道高远，区区草芥之诚，固不足以达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164207_comment'></div>赖吾境有灵德之神，开发天意，转祸为福，洒甘泽以沃枯壤，鼓和气而驱疠妖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164207_comment'></div>使农及耕耘，民安里闬，上纾天子旰食之虑，下俾守土之臣省过勤政，自新不怠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164207_comment'></div>则天施未畅，繄神而启迪之，宜民不怨天而信于神，神之功茂矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164207_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1164207_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《次韵和都运崔谏议寄示立春前一日宿岚谷山程》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_496106' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496106' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496106?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵和都运崔谏议寄示立春前一日宿岚谷山程</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496106")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496106_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496106'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496106'>绝塞风霜正树威，不知韶律起从微。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496106_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496106'>十千酒且迎春酌，五九寒须半腊归。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496106_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496106'>破屐好山连日上，费诗娇雪著人飞。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496106_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496106'>属封所过皆蒙惠，民吏应如挟纩衣。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496106_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496106'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496106_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年3月3日</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《上巳柳溪席上次韵答机宜张吉甫判官劝饮》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_496103' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496103' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496103?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上巳柳溪席上次韵答机宜张吉甫判官劝饮</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年3月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496103")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496103_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496103'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496103'>天意如何未应人，蛟龙犹得戢乖鳞。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496103'>民间望极经时雨，塞上寒深几日春。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496103'>麦脚埋尘难自展，柳眉低水只乾匀。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496103'>西溪不在浮觞乐，且慰群心祓禊辰。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496103_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496103'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496103_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　韩琦奏乞罢“防狄”之兵。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　韩琦请于三路兵春、秋大阅时，选武艺绝伦者免役，并优先补缺。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　韩琦请权停大通监西冶兴扇五七年，以苏民困。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　韩琦移风易俗，下令禁火葬，为贫者买田近郊，建立公墓。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦以久病，奏乞太医齐士明来并州治病，获恩准。乞知相州，有《乞知相州第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163717' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163717' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163717?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞知相州第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163717")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163717_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163717'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163717'>臣某言：臣闻从事独贤，诗人所以兴叹；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163717_comment'></div>不能者止，臣子所以知难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163717_comment'></div>今引疾以诉天，幸均劳而赐可<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163717_comment'></div>伏念臣天与忠义，仕逢圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163717_comment'></div>常行己存必至之心，谓当时无难了之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163717_comment'></div>期以一身任天下之责，九殒报君上之知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163717_comment'></div>见义必为，所冀公家之可济；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163717_comment'></div>其愚莫及，不知世务之无涯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163717_comment'></div>故兹一纪之馀，更帅三垂之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163717_comment'></div>或过中而食未及口，或达旦而坐不得眠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163717_comment'></div>唯忧材力之弗胜，上孤眷倚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163717_comment'></div>不顾形神之过用，易及衰疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163717_comment'></div>以至思苦伤肝，气留在胁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163717_comment'></div>自中年之甫及，觉积疢之易摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163717_comment'></div>比岁以来，乘隙屡作，每妄攻而肆毒，实无意以求生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163717_comment'></div>此者幸遇皇帝陛下临遣国医，诊知病本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163717_comment'></div>虽万金药剂之美，稍复支离；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163717_comment'></div>而一道节制之繁，诚难总决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163717_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下广天地至仁之造，怜簪履旧物之微，知臣以忧职缠疴，念臣以过劳至惫，许上武康之节，退临河亶之封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163717_comment'></div>深惟冒宠之灾身，愿复亚卿之旧列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163717_comment'></div>使臣释去重负，全养至和，访经而卫生，阅谱而调药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163717_comment'></div>庶二三年之保摄，得神干之复完，则西北边之重难，惟圣意之所任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163717_comment'></div>由衷所切，得请是愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163717_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1163717_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦上《乞知相州第二表》。乞知相州的原因是利于养病。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163718' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163718' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163718?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞知相州第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163718")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163718_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163718'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163718'>臣某言：臣近以疾病上表，乞守前官知相州一次，伏蒙圣慈赐诏不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163718_comment'></div>病质图安，辄露辞烦之请；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163718_comment'></div>诏音加恤，未垂可奏之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163718_comment'></div>兹不避于重诛，愿再倾于危恳<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163718_comment'></div>伏念臣早尘科等，亟践禁联，知忠义可以报君，历艰险未尝辞命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163718_comment'></div>故一纪之当三路，由壮及衰；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163718_comment'></div>寸心之虑万端，因劳致疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163718_comment'></div>若非神犹昏劣，事不支持，则安忍舍平生尽瘁之勤，掇茍且自容之谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163718_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下大明委照，洪覆推仁，不令可治之疴，遂绝必生之望，特还旧秩，俾治本邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163718_comment'></div>如此，则宿疹易攻，庶未先于犬马；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163718_comment'></div>微躯所效，复思死于封疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163718_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1163718_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。秋，韩琦“驰使东鲁，得仙源庙图像冠服之实，买民庙北地。命崇仪使、并代州营内兵马钤辖张僎，右侍禁、兵马监押王守恩”，专事新修庙学，做《并州新修庙学记》，叙述了新修庙学的原因、经过和意义。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1164119' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164119' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164119?labeling=true' target='_blank'>并州新修庙学记</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和元年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164119")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164119_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164119'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164119'>三才各有主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164119_comment'></div>四时大运主乎天，万物大生主乎地，人伦大化主于夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164119_comment'></div>曰：于道何主？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164119_comment'></div>曰：主其中者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164119_comment'></div>然天地之主，或不能常焉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164119_comment'></div>而吾夫子之主，虽终天地而不变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164119_comment'></div>凡为人君、为人臣、为人子者，能勉而及吾夫子之主，则其国治焉，其家保焉，其身安焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164119_comment'></div>虽天地之主有时而戾，固无预乎吾之所及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164119_comment'></div>然则人之道孰先乎吾主哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164119_comment'></div>有天下国家者，可不知其本乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164119_comment'></div>先儒称夫子者多矣，独杜牧之谓自古称夫子之德，莫如孟子；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164119_comment'></div>称夫子之尊，莫如韩吏部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164119_comment'></div>盖言尧、舜莫贤其德，而社稷莫偕其尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164119_comment'></div>诚哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164119_comment'></div>后之学者虽欲极言而增大之，又孰加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164119_comment'></div>唯郡县守长得施其教者，能兴学以恢其德，崇庙以称其尊，斯可以达其本者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164119_comment'></div>太平兴国四年，太宗皇帝平伪刘，一天下，坏太原故城，徙州榆次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164119_comment'></div>又三年，复迁于唐明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164119_comment'></div>当时经始者，乘用武之后，虑弗及远，不知并据都会，异日为一道之本，凡城隍官府，门户衢陌之制，一从茍简，不中程度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164119_comment'></div>视夫子之庙，尤为不急，置城之东南隅，体陋而削，仅有祠所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164119_comment'></div>景祐中，康靖李公若谷首即庙建学，得赐田赡学徒，而人始乐教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164119_comment'></div>庆历初，文烈明公镐又建礼堂于夫子之殿北，而讲始有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164119_comment'></div>然皆因仍故基，地愈偪隘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164119_comment'></div>其后生员寖广，至圬东西序所图诸弟子室而处之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164119_comment'></div>二时释奠，三献从祀，官与学生执事者，不能遍列于庭，半立庙门之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164119_comment'></div>皇祐五年春，某忝被州寄，受署来谒，知于礼之渎，而未遑改作，始奏隰州司户参军牛景充教授，以专学职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164119_comment'></div>明年秋，大穰，民安事简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164119_comment'></div>于是驰使东鲁，得仙源庙图像冠服之实，买民庙北地，命崇仪使、并代州管内兵马钤辖张僎，右侍禁、兵马监押王守恩，集工视役，彻其旧而一新之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164119_comment'></div>然后广殿耽然而雄，睟容俨然而尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164119_comment'></div>颜氏以降诸弟子，孟氏以降诸大儒，或像而侍，或图而列，次序于堂庑之间，焕然大备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164119_comment'></div>复徙庙东州兵之居以置学，南书楼，北讲堂，东西斋舍，庙学异门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164119_comment'></div>又设射侯于庙学之间，以备男子之习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164119_comment'></div>至于起居饮食之事，必严其所，俾称是焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164119_comment'></div>自始事底讫功，凡度材治基，逮涂茨丹雘之细，一须官用，无及民者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164119_comment'></div>夫庙学之新，其于为治之道，窃有志达其本者，而诸生其达学之本乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164119_comment'></div>今饰公斋，萃公书，洁公食，日授经，月课文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164119_comment'></div>昧其教者茍曰：此欲吾艺之精，取进士科，富且贵而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164119_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164119_comment'></div>如是，则吾学乃教人窃禄之地，非有望于诸生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164119_comment'></div>夫精艺而求仕，末也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164119_comment'></div>得仕而行道，本也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164119_comment'></div>然不由其末，则不得施其本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164119_comment'></div>故由末而仕，其末不可用而本或不存焉，非窃禄何哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164119_comment'></div>且晋之俗，陶唐氏之俗也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164119_comment'></div>吾夫子之道，二帝三王之道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164119_comment'></div>岂习俗之易，而习道之难哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164119_comment'></div>盖习俗易者，其法传；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164119_comment'></div>习道难者，其学废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164119_comment'></div>今学兴矣，处吾学者，其务外勤于艺，而内志于道，一旦由兹而仕也，则思以其道为陶唐氏之臣，心陶唐乎其君，心陶唐乎其民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164119_comment'></div>能如是，吾始谓之达其本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164119_comment'></div>至和元年月日记。</div><div id='poem_sentence_50_1164119_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦作《五贤赞》(并序)，阐述自己对儒业的看法，志在排斥异端，维护儒道正统，以利于国泰民安。作品：《五贤赞·孟子》(并序)<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十三。）</span>《五贤赞·荀子》(并序)<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十三。）</span>《五贤赞·扬子》(并序)<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十三。）</span>《五贤赞·文中子》(并序)<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十三。）</span>《五贤赞·文公》(并序)<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见《安阳集》卷二十三。）</span><div id='poem_1164126' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164126' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164126?labeling=true' target='_blank'>五贤赞<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span>孟子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164126")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1164126_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1164126'>余既新夫子之宫，乃绘诸弟子及左氏而下释经诸儒于东西序。又图孟、荀、扬、王、韩五贤于书楼之北壁。遣人自国庠得前人所撰孔子弟子暨释经诸儒之赞，署于其侧。独五贤者无赞焉。诸生欲其速备也，亟请鄙文以补之。余惜其缺，诺焉而不敢让。既而叹曰：夫五贤者，圣人之亚，学者之师，诸生姑欲速一时之备，使余不暇求当世能文者为之辞，而辄易言之。世且讥我，诸生岂爱我哉！虽然，孔孟之道，尧舜之德，而涂巷之人亦能称诵之，同推其善而已矣，知我者其恕焉。</div><div id='poem_preface_1164126_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164126'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164126'>昔周之衰，仲尼已矣。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1164126'>战国相图，唯利之喜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1164126'>诸子纷纷，乘弊而起。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1164126'>圣道之塞，实生荆枳。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1164126'>其谁辟之，独我孟氏。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1164126'>尧舜吾吭，仁义吾齿。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1164126'>芟杨剪墨，路平如砥。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1164126'>驱彼后觉，一趋圣轨。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1164126'>惟先文公，盛道其美。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1164126'>存而醇者，孟氏而止。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1164126'>欲观圣人，必自孟始。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1164126'>较其大功，盖禹之比。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1164126'>呜呼贤哉，道孰可拟。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1164126'>孔子之后，一人而已。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1164126_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1164126'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1164126_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1164127' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164127' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164127?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其二 </span>荀子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1164127_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164127'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164127'>诸子之兴，实自周季。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1164127'>各持其言，求售于世。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1164127'>六国好权，遂甘其说。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1164127'>或嵬而师，或琐而位。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1164127'>吾道日昏，斯文将坠。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1164127'>时则荀卿，力攘众伪。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1164127'>述数万言，以见其志。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1164127'>区判儒墨，统维仁义。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1164127'>时或用焉，至王则易。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1164127'>文公之篇，论亦云至。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1164127'>始考其辞，若不醇粹。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1164127'>及其要归，鲜与孔异。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1164127'>虽小疵焉，道则奚累。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1164127'>轲、雄之间，在我无愧。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1164127_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1164127'></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1164127_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1164128' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164128' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164128?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其三 </span>扬子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1164128_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164128'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164128'>书煨于秦，郁而未光。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1164128'>在汉之武，始焉表章。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1164128'>去圣云邈，微言孰详？<div id='poem_sentence_2_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1164128'>人各名家，尚迷大方。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1164128'>及其季也，篆刻相攘。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1164128'>贤乎子云，翼然高翔。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1164128'>学通天地，道该帝皇。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1164128'>笔之于书，德音洋洋。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1164128'>周孔之法，弛而再张。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1164128'>鄙哉史坚，而不自量。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1164128'>非圣作经，引为谤伤。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1164128'>经者伊何？乃道之常。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1164128'>茍能明道，胡用不臧。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1164128'>岂比吴楚，僭号称王。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1164128'>一时之訾，万世之长。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1164128'>故嗣孔孟，曰荀曰扬。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1164128_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1164128'></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1164128_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1164129' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164129' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164129?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其四 </span>文中子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1164129_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164129'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164129'>炎刘既终，天下幅裂。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1164129'>扰焉及隋，人命将绝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1164129'>时亦有文，甚乎剽窃。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1164129'>人不知非，万涂一辙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1164129'>大道之郁，几乎息灭。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1164129'>伊我仲淹，独参圣哲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1164129'>遭世未夷，教其可阙。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1164129'>乃举大法，备于《中说》。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1164129'>续彼六经，绍孔之烈。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1164129'>斯昔师荀，实相秦孽。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1164129'>叛师之言，儒坑书爇。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1164129'>胡为房、魏，佐唐称杰。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1164129'>达不称师，惟德之劣。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1164129'>彼诚可罪，在我奚缺？<div id='poem_sentence_13_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1164129'>荀之非孟，恣其毁媟。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1164129'>终孟之道，与孔并列。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1164129'>文公不言，是非孰别？<div id='poem_sentence_16_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1164129'>学者之疑，兹焉可决。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1164129'>皮子之碑，司空之碣。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1164129'>恶可诬哉，万古昭晰。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1164129_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1164129'></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1164129_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1164130' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164130' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164130?labeling=true' target='_blank'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其五 </span>文公</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1164130_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164130'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164130'>有唐之隆，天下一宇。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1164130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1164130'>滞焉以兴，弊焉以补。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1164130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1164130'>独时之文，荡无所主。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1164130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1164130'>不沦沈、谢，则入徐、庾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1164130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1164130'>其徒实繁，罔不自许。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1164130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1164130'>独吾文公，惟圣是矩。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1164130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1164130'>挺然一变，而至于古。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1164130_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1164130'>道古之道，语古之语。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《甲午冬阅》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_496098' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496098' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496098?labeling=true' target='_blank'>甲午冬阅</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496098")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_496098_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496098'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496098'>练士当时阅，临高共一观。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496098'>势凭朝气锐，令入晓霜寒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496098'>事重三军国，形存八阵滩。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496098'>烧烘旗帜动，雷吼鼓鼙乾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496098'>画守谁能犯，循环莫见端。<div id='poem_sentence_4_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_496098'>赴溪驱稚子，飘石走惊湍。<div id='poem_sentence_5_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_496098'>弹压提封静，周旋四野宽。<div id='poem_sentence_6_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_496098'>机深天地秘，知少古今难。<div id='poem_sentence_7_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_496098'>寨巧花齐出，营新月未圆。<div id='poem_sentence_8_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_496098'>全师充国慎，坚卧亚夫安。<div id='poem_sentence_9_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_496098'>鹅鹳行虽卷，貔貅伎要殚。<div id='poem_sentence_10_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_496098'>撒缰驰铁骑，叠箭取银盘。<div id='poem_sentence_11_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_496098'>避槊身藏镫，扬尘足挂鞍。<div id='poem_sentence_12_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_496098'>弩飞三刃剑，炮掷百星丸。<div id='poem_sentence_13_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_496098'>铙管喧归队，肴觞足犒餐。<div id='poem_sentence_14_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_496098'>父兄人自卫，凫藻众胥欢。<div id='poem_sentence_15_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_496098'>有志铭燕石，无劳误汉坛。<div id='poem_sentence_16_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_496098'>壮心徒内激，神武正胜残。<div id='poem_sentence_17_496098_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_496098'></div><div id='poem_sentence_18_496098_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《故崇信军节度副使检校尚书工部员外郎尹公墓表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164151' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164151' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164151?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故崇信军节度副使检校尚书工部员外郎尹公墓表</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和元年十二月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164151")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164151_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164151'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164151'>公讳洙，字师鲁，其先太原人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164151_comment'></div>曾祖谊，以道晦乱世不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164151_comment'></div>祖文化，始以材行兴其家，官至都官郎中，赠刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164151_comment'></div>父仲宣，举明经，累长郡邑，廉恕明决，所至以循吏称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164151_comment'></div>终虞部员外郎，以公贵，赠工部郎中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164151_comment'></div>刑部葬其父河南，今为河南人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164151_comment'></div>公幼聪敏喜学，无所不通，尤长于《春秋》，善议论，参质古今，开判凝滞，闻者欣服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164151_comment'></div>天圣二年登进士第，授绛州正平县主簿，历河南府户曹参军、邵武军判官，举书判拔萃，迁山南东道节度掌书记，知河南府伊阳县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164151_comment'></div>时天下无事，政阙不讲，以兵言者为妄人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164151_comment'></div>公乃著《叙燕》、《息戍》等十数篇，以斥时弊，时人服其有经世之才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164151_comment'></div>文康王公知而荐之，召试，充馆阁校勘，迁太子中允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164151_comment'></div>时文正范公治开封府，每奏事，见上论时政，指丞相过失，贬知饶州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164151_comment'></div>余公安道上疏论救，坐以朋党，贬监筠州酒税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164151_comment'></div>公慨然上书曰：「臣以仲淹忠谅有素，义兼师友，以靖比臣，臣当从坐」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164151_comment'></div>贬崇信军节度掌书记，监郢州商税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164151_comment'></div>欧阳公永叔移书让谏官不言，又贬夷陵令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164151_comment'></div>当是时，天下称为四贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164151_comment'></div>徙唐州，丁父忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164151_comment'></div>服除，复得太子中允、知河南府长水县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164151_comment'></div>赵元昊反，康定元年春，寇延州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164151_comment'></div>大将刘平逆战陷虏，天子乃命文庄夏公都部署陕西之兵，开府永兴军以经略招讨之，予与范公为之副，公为判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164151_comment'></div>未几，上遣翰林学士晁公宗悫、入内都知王守忠督出兵攻贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164151_comment'></div>合府议，奏曰：「今将兴兵，尚未习练，愿谨边防，期以岁月平之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164151_comment'></div>使还，而贼复寇镇戎军，部将刘继宗御之，为贼所败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164151_comment'></div>诏下切责，俾以进兵月日来上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164151_comment'></div>府中复议曰：「将在军，虽得以自便，然攻守大计，当禀算于朝廷」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164151_comment'></div>乃画攻守二策，余与公诣阙奏之，唯上所择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164151_comment'></div>诏取攻策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164151_comment'></div>已而难之，事方寝，贼复遣人以书叩延州伪请和，而大举兵寇泾原之山外，杀部署任福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164151_comment'></div>公时在庆州，得泾原求援书，即移文庆帅，率其部将刘政锐兵数千人，便道走镇戎，未至，贼引去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164151_comment'></div>夏公奏为专，徙通判濠州，又改秦州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164151_comment'></div>迁知泾州，徙渭州，兼管勾泾原路经略部署司事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164151_comment'></div>泾原乘葛帅怀敏覆军之后，伤夷残缺，千罅百漏，公夙夜抚葺，一道以完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164151_comment'></div>时宣徽使郑公为陕西四路帅，主静边寨主刘沪议，遣其属官著作佐郎董士廉，与沪于章川堡南入诸羌中，开道二百里，修水洛城，以通秦之援兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164151_comment'></div>公曰：「贼数犯塞，必并兵一道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164151_comment'></div>五路帅之战兵，尝不登二万人，而当贼昊举国之众，吾兵所以屡为贼困者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164151_comment'></div>由黄石河路来援，虽远水洛路二日，而援师安然以济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164151_comment'></div>今无故夺诸羌田二百里，列堡屯师，坐耗刍粮不胜计，以冀秦援一二日之速，则吾兵愈分而边用不给矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164151_comment'></div>乃奏罢之便，诏从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164151_comment'></div>会郑以府罢，改知永兴军，乃署前帅牒，饬沪等督役如初，二人者遂不奉诏，兴作不已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164151_comment'></div>公遣人召沪者再，不至，乃命瓦亭寨主张忠代沪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164151_comment'></div>沪复不受代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164151_comment'></div>部署狄公于是亲至德顺军，摄沪、士廉下狱，差官按问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164151_comment'></div>而郑比奏本道沮沪等功，朝廷卒薄沪等罪，徙公庆州，而城水洛焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164151_comment'></div>会庆帅孙公请终任，改知晋州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164151_comment'></div>庆历四年，契丹遣使报西戎元昊，诏河、陕三路要郡皆择人，徒知潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164151_comment'></div>当范公之在二府也，余安道、欧阳永叔辈，并为谏官，天下属望，诸公日竭忠献纳，不避权贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164151_comment'></div>而公方勤劳塞上，迹远朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164151_comment'></div>暨诸公相继罢去，向天下目之为贤者，执政指之为党，皆欲因事斥逐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164151_comment'></div>士廉者即诣阙上书，以水洛事讼公，且诬公在渭有盗赃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164151_comment'></div>制使承风指，按验百端，不能得一毫以污公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164151_comment'></div>有部将孙用者，出于军校，尝自京取民息钱，至官贫不能偿，公与狄公惜其材，乃分假公使钱俾偿其民，而月取其俸偿于官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164151_comment'></div>逮按问，而钱先已输官矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164151_comment'></div>坐此贬公崇信军节度副使，徙监均州酒税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164151_comment'></div>得疾，沿牒至南阳访医药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164151_comment'></div>疾革，对宾客、妻子无一戚言，整冠带，盥濯，怡然隐几而卒，时年四十七，庆历七年四月十日也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164151_comment'></div>公天性慈仁，内刚外和，凡事有小而可矜者，必恻然不忍，发见颜貌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164151_comment'></div>及临大节，断大事，则心如金石，虽鼎镬前列，不可变也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164151_comment'></div>在军谦勤爱士，虽悍夫冗列，皆降意容接，故人人愿尽其力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164151_comment'></div>所至郡邑，修设条教，务以实惠及下，去则人思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164151_comment'></div>文章自唐衰，历五代日沦浅俗，寖以大敝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164151_comment'></div>本朝柳公仲涂始以古道发明之，后卒不能振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164151_comment'></div>天圣初，公独与穆参军伯长矫时所尚，力以古文为主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164151_comment'></div>次得欧阳永叔以雄词鼓动之，于是后学大悟，文风一变，使我宋之文章，将踰唐汉而蹑三代者，公之功为最多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164151_comment'></div>初，朝廷之将用攻策也，命葛怀敏出鄜延道，勒兵绥、宥间，攻贼积聚，招怀种族，夺其要害而保障之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164151_comment'></div>贼知朝廷之威，必翻然来服，则久而易制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164151_comment'></div>公曰：「是行也，不患将卒无勇，患应敌寡谋耳」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164151_comment'></div>乃自请参议怀敏行营军事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164151_comment'></div>有诏如请，而事中罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1164151_comment'></div>今夫文武之士，平居议论慷慨，自谓忠义勇决，世无及者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1164151_comment'></div>一旦遇急难而试之，往往魄丧气夺，百计避脱，虽以富贵诱之，犹掉臂而不顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1164151_comment'></div>余居边久，阅人多矣，如公挺然忘身以为国家者，天下不知有几人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1164151_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1164151_comment'></div>以公文武之才，荦荦然震暴天下之如是，曾不得一纾所蕴于公卿之位，辅致太平之业，而反遭罹谗毁，遂终贬官，此当世守道之士所以仰天叹呼，疑为善而得祸，而中人者引以为监，思择利而自安也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1164151_comment'></div>然上以聪明仁恕御天下，一细民之枉必矜而获辨，如公以文致其罪，未有抑而不申者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1164151_comment'></div>故当时指以党而排去者，不四三年间，皆复显官，处大任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1164151_comment'></div>使公年且及此，其进擢可量哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1164151_comment'></div>奈何乎天不与公之寿也，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1164151_comment'></div>公累迁官至起居舍人、直龙图阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1164151_comment'></div>娶张氏，鹿邑县君，以顺以慈，克正家道，后公七年而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1164151_comment'></div>兄源，太常博士，亦以文行称于世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1164151_comment'></div>弟湘，三班奉职；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1164151_comment'></div>冲，秀州华亭县主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1164151_comment'></div>涛、泳，未仕，并先公而卒；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1164151_comment'></div>沂，资性淳茂，动谨门法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1164151_comment'></div>子男四人：长曰朴，奇隽博学，有父风，其二未名，俱早世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1164151_comment'></div>其幼曰构，今方十岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1164151_comment'></div>女五人：长适虞部员外郎张景宪，次继适张氏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1164151_comment'></div>次适太常寺太祝谢景平；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1164151_comment'></div>次二人未嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1164151_comment'></div>侄材，文学器识，足以嗣公，而敦尚名节，无仕进意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1164151_comment'></div>至和元年十二月日，沂、材举公、夫人之丧，葬于缑氏县某乡之某原，从吉卜也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1164151_comment'></div>范公尝以书谓余曰：「世之知师鲁者莫如公，余已为其集序矣，墓有表，请公文以信后世」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1164151_comment'></div>余应之曰：「余实知师鲁者，又得其进斥本末为最详，其敢以辞」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1164151_comment'></div>既实书其事矣，又考性命之说，而表于墓曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_94_1164151'>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1164151_comment'></div>自古圣贤，必推性命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1164151_comment'></div>如公之文武杰立，而贯以忠义兮，此天之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1164151_comment'></div>位不大显，遭谗而跌，且不寿兮，此天之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1164151_comment'></div>虽孔孟不能以兼适兮，尚一归于默定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1164151_comment'></div>昧者不思而妄求兮，徒自奔于邪径。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1164151_comment'></div>故公临祸福生死而曾不少变兮，是能安性命而归正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1164151_comment'></div>唯大名赫然日月之光兮，亘万古而增莹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1164151_comment'></div>吾闻善人者天必报其后兮，宜嗣人之蒙庆<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_102_1164151'></div><div id='poem_sentence_102_1164151_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1164151'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_102_1164151_0'>⑴ 《安阳集》卷四七。又见《河南先生文集》附录，《名臣碑传琬琰集》上集卷一六，乾隆《河南府志》卷八九，《偃师金石遗文补录》卷九，嘉庆《孟津县志》卷一一。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1164151_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《故卫尉卿致仕高公墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164152' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164152' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164152?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故卫尉卿致仕高公墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（至和元年十月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164152")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164152_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164152'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164152'>公讳志宁，字宗儒，其先渤海蓨人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164152_comment'></div>唐末乱，远祖避地泽、潞而迁洛，遂为河南洛阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164152_comment'></div>曾祖逵，祖潜，值五代多故，皆以儒术自富，不求闻达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164152_comment'></div>父素，能世其学，而喜黄老言，高放不仕，以公贵，累赠尚书刑部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164152_comment'></div>公幼沈敏，博学强记，未冠已能通六经，尤深于大《易》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164152_comment'></div>尝得疾至笃，忽梦神人以兵略授之，寤而疾顿愈，因取诸家兵法读之，了如夙习，尽得微奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164152_comment'></div>于是益览子、史及阴阳谶纬之书，究古今治乱成败之迹，慨然以功名自任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164152_comment'></div>咸平中，举明经，授邛州安仁尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164152_comment'></div>丁刑部忧，服除，再调鄠县主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164152_comment'></div>时真宗方复唐六科以待魁杰之士，公乃上所著《平燕论》，应识洞韬略运筹决胜科，京兆守向公闻于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164152_comment'></div>秩满，复上书论事，召对龙图阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164152_comment'></div>公极陈用兵方略，且言事莫备于《师卦》，因讲其卦于上前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164152_comment'></div>真宗大悦，亲谕公曰：「他日勿愁好官，朕将贵汝」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164152_comment'></div>寻免策试，特授大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164152_comment'></div>屡乘间赐对，必移刻，执政恶之，讽有司出公知越州萧山县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164152_comment'></div>改卫尉寺丞，徙知浔州，转大理寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164152_comment'></div>丁母南阳县太君井氏忧，服除赴阙，复数召对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164152_comment'></div>真宗尝谕二府大臣曰：「高某事业才识不可得，卿等宜善任之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164152_comment'></div>既而面赐五品服，通判潞州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164152_comment'></div>岁馀，复自言应才识兼茂明于体用科，召赴阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164152_comment'></div>执政以制举非其时，罢之，特改太子左赞善大夫，换供备库副使、知祁州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164152_comment'></div>居顷之，真宗不豫，公拜章请觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164152_comment'></div>及对，密奏今上德业日新，愿早建东宫以安天下之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164152_comment'></div>真宗大寤，面赐黄金五十两，还所治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164152_comment'></div>乃诏公凡所奏事，许附入内内侍省通进，无关银台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164152_comment'></div>代还，改西京作坊副使、知赵州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164152_comment'></div>真宗疾甚，公又拜疏，请东宫监国，以释万物之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164152_comment'></div>今上登极，转北京副使，改知沧州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164152_comment'></div>天圣中，河北大雨，伤民田，坏三十馀城，召归，为体量安抚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164152_comment'></div>公悉心经画，先赈恤而后力役，已而民安城完，天子以为称职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164152_comment'></div>改东染院使，充益利路兵马钤辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164152_comment'></div>岁馀召还，转崇仪使，充河北沿边安抚副使，改内园使，知赵州，徙霸州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164152_comment'></div>景祐初，上以公先朝屡陈建储监国之议，特受宫苑使、达州刺史，以旌其忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164152_comment'></div>继徙深、洛、隰三州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164152_comment'></div>赵元昊初反，公自隰上言，请乘贼未发，选骁将锐兵，分道急趋，覆其巢穴，所谓疾雷不及掩耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164152_comment'></div>章十数上，不报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164152_comment'></div>徙知贝州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164152_comment'></div>及元昊举兵寇延州，刘平、石元孙陷于贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164152_comment'></div>公叹曰：「前策不可复用矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164152_comment'></div>朝廷始思公言，亟召至阙，问今宜何为策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164152_comment'></div>公曰：「今将不达权谋，而兵未识法制，故败」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164152_comment'></div>乃请禁兵五百，以古阵法教之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164152_comment'></div>既成，上临试之，复下禁卫诸帅议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164152_comment'></div>诸帅皆出行伍，不达古法，乃曰与今所习异，不肯用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164152_comment'></div>公又言元昊北与契丹通，宜为备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164152_comment'></div>即命公为河北诸州安抚使，以经略之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164152_comment'></div>本道有嫉公之统制者，言于朝曰：「今特置使以启虏疑，不若俾兼他职而阴主其事」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164152_comment'></div>改授西上閤门使、知沧州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164152_comment'></div>未几，虏果背约，以书要关南旧地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164152_comment'></div>徙知定州，改镇定路钤辖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164152_comment'></div>公始以得时，自喜曰：「虏果敢先发，吾以术致其师，当一战以破之」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164152_comment'></div>日训饬士众，以期立功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164152_comment'></div>会朝廷遣使复通虏好，公雅志卒不遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164152_comment'></div>即上章告老，诏以右领军卫大将军致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164152_comment'></div>公既得谢，乃与邓国张公、太子少师任公暨休官诸老，凡九人，放怀林泉间，以诗酒相娱乐，追唐白傅九老之会，京洛好事家多图写而传之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164152_comment'></div>庆历五年中，天子思公，命就第访以边计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164152_comment'></div>公即以前在河北致敌取胜之画，及别陈制虏上、中、下三策上之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164152_comment'></div>朝廷嘉纳，赐以缣帛，复从其请，特改殿中监致仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164152_comment'></div>享明堂恩，转卫尉卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164152_comment'></div>皇祐五年四月十一日，无疾而终，享寿八十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164152_comment'></div>临终复出书一通，授诸子曰：「吾生无以报国，死而不言，其恨无穷」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164152_comment'></div>书奏，所言皆国家大务，天子怜之，录其三孙焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164152_comment'></div>公少有大志，达权变，善论兵，而未尝轻与人言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164152_comment'></div>特为真宗所知，亟被进擢，不由荐引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164152_comment'></div>其后有所施设，而多为当涂者沮挠，故常自比淮阴、武乡侯，而谓不遇萧何、徐庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164152_comment'></div>人虽异其言，而朝廷不能果于信用，使功业不大见于世，时论惜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164152_comment'></div>然历守河北边要诸州，及继领兵钤安抚之任，朝廷以北事倚公，其重如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164152_comment'></div>则其驭边经远之术，用于时者，可胜载哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164152_comment'></div>公于民政，专以仁惠为本，北人被公之化者，至今歌思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1164152_comment'></div>所著《皇王治统》、《文武经纬》、《太平助化策》《、儒将前议》、《兵机总要》、《周易化源图》，总名之为《阃外书》，行于世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1164152_comment'></div>公四娶：陶氏，丹阳县君；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1164152_comment'></div>边氏，未及封；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1164152_comment'></div>韩氏，长安县君，皆以淑行柔德，宗党贤之，并先公而亡；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1164152_comment'></div>马氏，今封京兆郡君，追往抚孤，义隆慈笃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1164152_comment'></div>子八人：损、巽、贲、震，蒙，大理寺丞，皆早世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1164152_comment'></div>复，前权抚州军事判官，天性孝谨，治父学，善议论；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1164152_comment'></div>渐，蔡州平舆县令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1164152_comment'></div>涣，西头供奉官，皆自树立，志兴其宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1164152_comment'></div>女二人，长适兵部员外郎王田，次适右谏议大夫、天章阁待制赵及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1164152_comment'></div>孙男八人，孙女九人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1164152_comment'></div>至和元年十月十九日，渐、涣举公及三夫人之丧，葬于河南县县南乡某原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1164152_comment'></div>前葬，复泣来请铭，归而暴卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1164152_comment'></div>公，余姊婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1164152_comment'></div>既悉其生平出处大节，又感复勤孝而死于义，当铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1164152_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_84_1164152'>天下之难，莫如用兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1164152_comment'></div>国之安危，士之死生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1164152_comment'></div>公得之神，学而易明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1164152_comment'></div>时果吾用，功其决成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1164152_comment'></div>意公之策，大疑小行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1164152_comment'></div>志卒不遂，归老于卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1164152_comment'></div>昔遇真皇，言从计听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1164152_comment'></div>储副之议，发于至诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1164152_comment'></div>惟天所锡，寿考安荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1164152_comment'></div>诸子皆孝，力事所茔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1164152_comment'></div>山东而安，伊西而清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1164152_comment'></div>此藏公骨，不藏公名。</div><div id='poem_sentence_95_1164152_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《故太常博士通判应天府赠光禄少卿孙公墓志铭》（并序）（并序）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164153' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164153' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164153?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故太常博士通判应天府赠光禄少卿孙公墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（并序　至和元年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164153")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164153_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164153'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164153'>公讳侑，字有可，祖先汝阳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164153_comment'></div>家世儒学，自唐以来，为冠冕名族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164153_comment'></div>曾祖真，祖镒，生五代间，恬晦不仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164153_comment'></div>父庸，太祖朝上书言当世大务，擢补开封掾，终殿中丞，赠刑部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164153_comment'></div>尚书徙居颍川，今为颍川人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164153_comment'></div>尚书深古学，聚书数千卷，以教诸子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164153_comment'></div>长子何，次子仅，遂以文学有大名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164153_comment'></div>公为少子，独倜傥任侠，好击剑，习兵法，慕古人立大功奇节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164153_comment'></div>始未肯勤阅父书，暨二兄举进士，继为天下第一，于是刻意为学，而天性警拔，不数年，能踵二兄之业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164153_comment'></div>咸平三年，复一上中进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164153_comment'></div>时契丹尚扰北边，赴调者皆择官东南以自便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164153_comment'></div>公独请补威虏军判官，冀乘时自奋，以见功业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164153_comment'></div>已而契丹讲和，公志不就，再调虢州军事推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164153_comment'></div>用知己荐，授大理寺丞、知同州白水县，次改开封府封丘县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164153_comment'></div>真宗幸亳，三司使丁谓为顿递使，表公知襄邑县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164153_comment'></div>驾还职办，特转殿中丞，迁太常博士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164153_comment'></div>文惠王公随出知应天府，辟公通判府事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164153_comment'></div>王公政尚宽易，而公以严决济之，庶务称治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164153_comment'></div>天禧元年八月十一日，以疾卒，时年四十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164153_comment'></div>公性阔达持重，然每闻人之善，喜如己出；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164153_comment'></div>见非义者，甚于世仇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164153_comment'></div>处身俭约，而施惠及人，及亡，几无以为葬具，士以此称服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164153_comment'></div>所莅郡邑，强明而不苛，吏民畏爱焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164153_comment'></div>夫一盛一衰，其天道之常乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164153_comment'></div>当淳化、咸平中，公二兄连举冠多士，而公次举，复登科，天下耸慕，皆目孙氏为大小状元家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164153_comment'></div>至于父兄之训子弟，必举孙氏以为劝，唯恨其不及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164153_comment'></div>不二十年间，公与二兄相继而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164153_comment'></div>而公二兄之后，今衰薾不振，仅存嗣续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164153_comment'></div>独公子周为比部员外郎、知同州，端介有吏干，诸孙皆谨厚向学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164153_comment'></div>天顾孙氏，而俾复兴者，其公之裔乎！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164153_comment'></div>公娶韩氏，柔顺有贤德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164153_comment'></div>比部登朝，累赠公光禄少卿，母夫人追封陈留县太君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164153_comment'></div>男二人：长曰咸，终太子中舍；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164153_comment'></div>次，比部也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164153_comment'></div>女四人：长适彬州军事判官姜羲，次适大理寺丞楚元卿，其二人幼为尼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164153_comment'></div>孙男五人，孙女五人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164153_comment'></div>以至和元年十月七日，葬于河南府河南县太尉乡上官里先尚书之墓侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164153_comment'></div>将葬，比部以书来告曰：「周不幸少而孤，先君行己在官之迹，十不能记一二，得舅抚大概以铭之，斯不朽矣」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164153_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_1164153'>猗公之为，超然远驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164153_comment'></div>始慕古人，功名自期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164153_comment'></div>志兮可尚，逢也非时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164153_comment'></div>卒继伯仲，以文发基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164153_comment'></div>试才郡邑，吏惴民熙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164153_comment'></div>寿啬于天，用不大施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164153_comment'></div>惟公之宗，始盛中衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164153_comment'></div>衰而复兴，在公本支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164153_comment'></div>在子能孝，卜兆龟符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164153_comment'></div>祔公先茔，神兮安之。</div><div id='poem_sentence_47_1164153_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1054&endYear=1054')">1054年</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《故河南尹君墓志铭》（并序）（并序）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十七。）</span><div id='poem_1164157' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164157' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164157?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故河南尹君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1054年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164157")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164157_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164157'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164157'>河南尹君名朴，字处厚，师鲁之长子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164157_comment'></div>幼博学能文，通《春秋》，知古今，议论根蒂经史，明白是非，虽先达父友，皆竦然屈服，不敢以齿少遇之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164157_comment'></div>师鲁高文大节，当世师仰，居家未尝不以古圣贤之道诲其子弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164157_comment'></div>故处厚不独天性超绝，以承父之教，薰炙渐渍，而至于大成焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164157_comment'></div>尝一举进士，误为有司所绌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164157_comment'></div>反笑曰：「是岂足以尽吾才耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164157_comment'></div>师鲁勉以应制举，于是所记益广，所举益深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164157_comment'></div>师鲁每叹曰：「吾道之克传，吾门之所寄，在此儿也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164157_comment'></div>庆历中，余与今枢密副使田公元均奉诏宣抚陕西，时搢绅草泽上书以方略言者数百人，余请田公第其高下，而独取布衣赵仁济者为第一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164157_comment'></div>然怪其所论特奇，疑非仁济言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164157_comment'></div>既而知处厚代为之，田公惊而谓余曰：「尹氏有子矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164157_comment'></div>尹氏有子矣」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164157_comment'></div>自是余常称于公卿间，谓其学必能继师鲁，其才必为朝廷所用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164157_comment'></div>不幸年二十五而亡，良可哀已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164157_comment'></div>师鲁讳洙，官至起居舍人、直龙图阁，以谗贬崇信军节度副使，未起而卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164157_comment'></div>处厚娶王氏，再娶宗氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164157_comment'></div>一男曰涣，一女尚幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164157_comment'></div>处厚将从师鲁之丧，葬于缑氏也，其从弟材来告曰：「伯父以公之知处厚也，尝属材曰，异日当请铭于公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164157_comment'></div>今葬矣，敢以伯父之言告」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164157_comment'></div>乃为铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1164157'>维寿维夭，达者一焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164157_comment'></div>愚寿而灭，贤夭而传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164157_comment'></div>呜呼处厚，孰短孰延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164157_comment'></div>吾疑祸福，不主于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164157_comment'></div>恶兮不折，善兮不年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164157_comment'></div>天果主耶，胡为而然？</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1164157_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年1月1日</a>　在阳曲，任并州知州。韩琦有《至和乙未元日立春》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_496116' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_0_496124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496124'>闲观景物辞终巧，意到安恬格自高。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496124_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年2月</a>　二月，韩琦由并州以节度使徙知相州。并人不舍，环泣相送。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在阳曲，相州知州任上。改知相州时，韩琦有《次韵谢宫师杜公惠诗庆富公为代》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷八。）</span><div id='poem_496125' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496125' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496125?labeling=true' target='_blank'>次韵谢宫师杜公惠诗庆富公为代</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496125")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496125_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496125'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496125'>彦国贤推不世奇，两谐交政辱公诗。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496125'>如褎事契诚多幸，欲并才名敢固辞。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496125'>疏傅退来光汉史，周公归已静淮夷<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：彦国今已入相。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496125'>须知病守荣非浅，日对乡枌拥郡麾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496125_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496125'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496125_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在阳曲，相州知州任上。自并州至相州途中，韩琦有《谢宫师杜公寄惠草书》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_495873' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495873' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495873?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢宫师杜公寄惠草书</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495873")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495873_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495873'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495873'>公之德业天下重，四海万物思坏垆。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495873'>太平之策未全发，先朝请老叩帝居。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495873'>天子只欲励薄俗，不惜一夔从二疏。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495873'>公持俭节出天性，下建万世清风孤。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495873'>归卜睢阳旋营第，栋宇仅足容妻孥。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495873'>自此閒燕何所乐，非丝非竹非歌壶。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495873'>经史日与圣贤遇，参以吟咏为自娱。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495873'>兴来弄翰尤得意，真楷之外精草书。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495873'>因书乞得字数幅，伯英筋肉羲之肤。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495873'>字体真浑远到古，神马初见八卦图。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495873'>精神熠熠欲飞动，鸾凤鼓舞龙蛇摅。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495873'>天姿瘦硬斥俗软，狂藤束缠岩松枯。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495873'>中含婉媚更可爱，十葩万萼争春敷。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495873'>开合向背一皆好，造化欲衒天工夫。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495873'>张旭虽颠怀素逸，较以年力非公徒。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495873'>公今眉寿俯八十，老笔劲健自古无。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495873'>固知大贤不世出，百福来萃相所扶。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495873'>公之佳婿苏子美，得公一二名已沽。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495873'>矜奇恃俊颇自放，质之公法惭豪粗。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495873'>乘欢捧以示僚属，一坐耸骇叹且呼。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495873'>便欲刻石传不朽，荒边匠拙无人模。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_495873'>归来一一戒儿侄，秘重世与家谍俱。<div id='poem_sentence_21_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_495873'>重巾密橐置吾室，宝护直比骊颔珠。<div id='poem_sentence_22_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_495873'>神物孰敢容易探，电雹霹雳来须臾。<div id='poem_sentence_23_495873_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_495873'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_495873_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在阳曲，相州知州任上。自并州至相州途中，韩琦有《游开化寺》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_495874' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495874' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495874?labeling=true' "poem_title_495874")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495874_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495874'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495874'>突然数百尺，较力陋禹凿。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495874'>峰峦翠环合，与寺为郛郭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495874'>烟霞无四时，为我张<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：去。）</span>幄幕。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495874'>飞泉乘空来，直在庭砌落。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495874'>松柏森成行，斗状蛟龙恶。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495874'>如整万人阵，偏伍不敢错。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495874'>春芳难悉名，红紫竞灼灼。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495874'>距城才一舍，旷绝类霄堮。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495874'>噫吾何自劳，日窘吏事缚。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495874'>精庐始一登，百虑已澄扩。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_495874'>徘徊延宾僚，开席盛燕酌。<div id='poem_sentence_16_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_495874'>歌留岭上云，吹乱风前铎。<div id='poem_sentence_17_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_495874'>勿讥清赏累，粗继东山乐。<div id='poem_sentence_18_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_495874'>数刻方暂欢，俄景忽西薄。<div id='poem_sentence_19_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_495874'>归鞅下危岑，眷恋心欲却。<div id='poem_sentence_20_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_495874'>何处无林泉，隔阂牵宠爵。<div id='poem_sentence_21_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_495874'>归来解朝绅，放意任衡霍。<div id='poem_sentence_24_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_495874'>吾寿此其全，何必不死药。<div id='poem_sentence_27_495874_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_495874'></div><div id='poem_sentence_28_495874_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在阳曲，相州知州任上。自并州至相州途中，韩琦有《再赋》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。《安阳集编年笺注》有《再赋》同题诗二首，此为其中一首，首句为“蒙山崦里藏禅宫”）</span><div id='poem_495875' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495875' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495875?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再赋</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495875")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_495875_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495875'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495875'>蒙山崦里藏禅宫，朝苍暮翠岚光浓。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495875_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495875'>枯松老柏竞丑怪，危峦峻岭相弥缝。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495875_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495875'>剑峡路岐唯少栈，榆关气象全无烽。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495875_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495875_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在阳曲，相州知州任上。自并州至相州途中，韩琦有《离并州至晋祠次韵答宣徽富公》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。）</span>《途次答宣徽富公书意》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_495880' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495880' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495880?labeling=true' target='_blank'>离并州至晋祠次韵答宣徽富公</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495880")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495880_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495880'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495880'>公名杰出天下贤，终身师慕常颛颛。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495880_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495880'>十年一面数日别，行行不忍移归軿。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495880_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495880'>刚肠出泪收还注，感公知己难违去。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495880_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495880'>黄昏病作宿荒城，离绪不堪纷似雨。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495880_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495880'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_495880_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_495881' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495881' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495881?labeling=true' target='_blank'>涂次答宣徽富公书意</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495881")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495881_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495881'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495881'>临并踰二期，病戚居其半。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495881'>虽以志自勉，精识奈耗乱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495881'>故于一道事，十六七不干。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495881'>贪权莫即乱，罪大孰可逭。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495881'>纳节求本邦，所幸脱诛窜。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495881'>君仁恻至诚，亟俾贤者换。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495881'>与公同心人，金固其利断。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495881'>张瑟久不调，易调犹未断。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495881'>非才辱公知，处道诚一贯。<div id='poem_sentence_10_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495881'>至于措置间，在理有殊判。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_495881'>不当牵以私，经画误远算。<div id='poem_sentence_12_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_495881'>愿公新政条，布若星日灿。<div id='poem_sentence_13_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_495881'>害边者刬除，垢俗者涤浣。<div id='poem_sentence_14_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_495881'>使兹全晋民，比屋竞耸观。<div id='poem_sentence_15_495881_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在阳曲，相州知州任上。自并州至相州途中，韩琦有《晋祠鱼池》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_495876' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495876' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495876?labeling=true' target='_blank'>晋祠鱼池</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495876")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495876_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495876'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495876'>女郎祠下池，清莹薄山脚。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495876'>游鳞明鉴中，素恃神可托。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495876'>群嬉不畏人，似得天真乐。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495876'>祠者常见怜，投食任争绰。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495876'>且疑神佑之，纵嚵安敢摸。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495876'>达者时公攘，羹鲙陷烹斫。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495876'>神乎所保扶，未免挫阴恶。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495876'>何如致君人，其道本宏博。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495876'>天下日唐虞，声教尽薰灼。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495876'>推此及微类，鱼鳖得咸若。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495876_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495876'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_495876_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>　在阳曲，相州知州任上。自并州至相州途中，韩琦有《难老泉》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二。）</span><div id='poem_495877' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495877' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495877?labeling=true' target='_blank'>难老泉</a><span class='authorDate'>（1055年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_495877")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_495877_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_495877'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_495877'>晋源发滥觞，勃勃涨春绿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_495877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_495877'>泓然一鉴閒，俯视神意肃。<div id='poem_sentence_1_495877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495877'>游鯈何太繁，戢戢闹如粥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_495877'>乌能污吾清，更足示容蓄。<div id='poem_sentence_3_495877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_495877'>中或起蛟龙，威怒鼓天福。<div id='poem_sentence_4_495877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_495877'>膏泽被九区，灵德潜山麓。<div id='poem_sentence_5_495877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_495877'>平时任疏达，所存终海渎。<div id='poem_sentence_6_495877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_495877'>常丰沃稻粱，馀润沾花木。<div id='poem_sentence_7_495877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_495877'>伊予临此泉，自得仁人勖。<div id='poem_sentence_8_495877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_495877'>奚专智者心，奔走无停躅。<div id='poem_sentence_9_495877_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495877'></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_495877_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
山西（未详）
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='37d45da86e0944e58b82e8fa61ad4527_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("37d45da86e0944e58b82e8fa61ad4527");'><span id='37d45da86e0944e58b82e8fa61ad4527_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1055&endYear=1055')">1055年</a>，48岁</div><div id='37d45da86e0944e58b82e8fa61ad4527' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; class='authorDate'>（1069年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164002")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164002_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164002'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164002'>今岁兵夫数少，而金堤两埽，修上下约甚急，深进马头，欲夺大河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164002_comment'></div>缘二股及嫩滩旧阔千一百步，是以可容涨水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164002_comment'></div>今截去八百步有馀，则将束大河于二百馀步之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164002_comment'></div>下流既壅，上流蹙遏湍怒，又无兵夫修护堤岸，其冲决必矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164002_comment'></div>况自德至沧，皆二股下流，既无堤防，必侵民田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164002_comment'></div>设若河门<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_1164002", 1164002, "Clauses/17/Comments/0")'>束狭</span>，不能容纳涨水，上下约随流而脱，则二股与北流为一，其患愈大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164002_comment'></div>又恩、深州所创生堤，其东则大河西来，其西则西山诸水东注，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1164002", 1164002, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>腹背</span>受水，两难捍御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164002_comment'></div>望选近臣速至河所，与在外官合议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1164002_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163842'>臣昨奉敕提举编修《仁宗皇帝实录》，近已了毕，见抄录进呈次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163842_comment'></div>臣窃以仁宗临御天下四十二年，其间事迹至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163842_comment'></div>兼目前有中书、枢密院《时政记》并日历所各积压下十馀年文字，未曾编修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163842_comment'></div>昨来遂旋伺候了当，方行撰次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163842_comment'></div>及散下诸路取索臣僚墓志行状，多以年祀之远，难于寻究，以至经历年岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163842_comment'></div>若非修撰官王圭等与检讨官员多方检證，殚极闻见，究心纂集，则不能成此大典，使焕然详备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163842_comment'></div>臣虽有提举之名，缘补外已久，未尝少施分寸之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163842_comment'></div>窃见宰臣李沆、吕夷简，曾提举编修《太宗实录》及三朝国史，并曾陈请书成更不推恩，皆蒙朝廷俞允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163842_comment'></div>兼臣昨赴陕西日，已曾面奏将来书成，乞依李沆、吕夷简之例，亦蒙恩许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163842_comment'></div>欲望圣慈只以修撰官王圭以下，有累年编削之劳，各赐优加赏典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163842_comment'></div>臣守藩在外，但有提举名目，殊无他效，许从李沆、吕夷简之例施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163842_comment'></div>若朝廷将来误有推恩，臣至时必不避干渎睿听，恳以死请，得如奏而后已。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1163842_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年7月15日</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《己酉中元》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_496328' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496328' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496328?labeling=true' target='_blank'>己酉中元</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年7月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496328")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496328_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496328'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496328'>烦蒸求得到中元，馀酷侵人尚鲜欢。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496328'>病塞不能冲酒堰，气清终已倒盂兰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496328'>陈编就榻将开懒，危阁凌风欲下难。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496328'>闻道禾弮尽踰尺，日西偏喜夕霞丹。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496328_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496328'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496328_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年7月</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。七月，韩琦有《上仁宗实录表》<span
