id='poem_sentence_0_1163785_comment'></div>夙愧多闻，缪尘圣选，不能昭星斗之观，副金匮之藏，昧死奏编，经营失次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163785_comment'></div>其所修《仁宗实录》二百卷、《事目》十卷上进。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163785_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163785'><span class='label'>按：</span>《古今源流至论》前集卷四。又见《翰苑新书》后集卷一四。（以上祝尚书点校）<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1163785_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年8月15日</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《中秋席上》诗。<span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年12月</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《己酉岁除夜雪》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_496335' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496335' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496335?labeling=true' target='_blank'>己酉岁除夜雪</a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496335")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496335_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496335'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496335'>故历将除夜未晨，暖风轻送六霙匀。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496335_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496335'>及时皆喜逢三白，伺晓何妨具五辛。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496335_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496335'>一箭尚留终在腊，万花潜发欲惊春。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496335_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496335'>藏阄令恶传杯速，欢杀红炉守岁人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496335_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496335'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496335_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1069&endYear=1069')">1069年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《延州事宜疏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163952' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163952' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163952?labeling=true' target='_blank'>延州事宜疏<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁二年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1069年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163952")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163952_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163952'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163952'>比蒙陛下累次宣谕以延州事宜，欲令臣西去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163952_comment'></div>忠义感激，岂敢拒违圣意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163952_comment'></div>然再思之，昨王陶斥臣强臣跋扈，又谓六卿分晋、三家弱鲁之事，人臣岂可当此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163952_comment'></div>今乃以陕西五路兵柄付臣，虽自顾无它虑，复有效陶语以相倾者，臣诛族奚惮，恐于国事有害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163952_comment'></div>愿更熟虑，未行间，尚可改议。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163952_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年1月</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦上奏乞罢河北四路安抚使，只充大名府安抚使，获准。作品：《再乞只充大名府路安抚使札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span>《再乞只充大名府路安抚使第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十五。）</span><div id='poem_1163846' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163846' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163846?labeling=true' target='_blank'>再乞只充大名府路安抚使第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163846")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163846_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163846'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163846'>臣伏蒙圣慈以臣陈乞只充大名府路安抚使，特赐诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163846_comment'></div>愚衷所诉，盖居职之匪安；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163846_comment'></div>圣意未俞，敢贪权而遂默。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163846_comment'></div>窃以臣前年冬奉敕就差判大名府兼河北路安抚使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163846_comment'></div>其时当地震、水灾之后，民流失业，臣犹以为定州、真定府、高阳关路各有帅臣，自可抚绥所部，若更置河北路安抚使，则徒翻空文，使列郡愈难承禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163846_comment'></div>凡三曾具此奏免，即非今日始有辞避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163846_comment'></div>况河朔自去年以来，继获丰稔，编户安复，逐路守帅，皆得时才经画，边垂安静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163846_comment'></div>臣于此时，尤不当冒处兹职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163846_comment'></div>不惟陈执中、程琳前有成例，请更以近事明之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163846_comment'></div>昨西边以绥城衅作，朝廷命臣判永兴军府、兼陕西经略安抚使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163846_comment'></div>后以羌雏请命，事宜渐息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163846_comment'></div>臣以久病移去，朝廷遂只差钱明逸充永兴军一路安抚使，其鄜延、环庆、秦凤路帅臣，得以各修职事，至此有何妨阙？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163846_comment'></div>兼臣向以多疾，获罢宰任，本冀稍休僻郡，以养残躯，不意连当事至繁、责至重之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163846_comment'></div>故臣宿疾之作，无暇摄治，缠绵累岁，肌骸益以尪瘠，识虑益以昏耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163846_comment'></div>幸此无事之际，诚望陛下垂恻老臣驽蹇力殚，使少宽负载之劳，特降指挥，令只充大名府路安抚使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163846_comment'></div>不独国家因事处置，不失其当；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163846_comment'></div>而于愚臣以义去就，亦安其分。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1163846_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年1月</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。正月，韩琦有《河朔诸州不宜差夫服河役奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1164005' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164005' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164005?labeling=true' target='_blank'>河朔诸州不宜差夫服河役奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁三年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164005")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164005_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164005'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164005'>河朔屡经灾伤，虽得去年夏秋一稔，疮痍未复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164005_comment'></div>而六州之人奔走河役，远者十一二程，近者不下七八程，比常岁劳费过倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164005_comment'></div>兼镇、赵两州，旧以次边，未尝差夫，一旦调发，人心不安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164005_comment'></div>又于寒食后入役，比满一月，正妨农务。</div><div id='poem_sentence_3_1164005_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《安正堂》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三。）</span><div id='poem_495898' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_495898' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/495898?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_1_495898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_495898'>全魏今别都，地总北道胜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_495898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_495898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_495898'>乘闲新此堂，庶用安吾正。<div id='poem_sentence_11_495898_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496342' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496342?labeling=true' target='_blank'>康戌二月十六日寒食会雅集堂</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年2月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496342")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496342_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496342'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496342'>百五嘉辰此命筵，中分春色极芳妍。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496342_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496342'>花遗嫩靥饶风地，云坼轻阴半雨天。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496342_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496342'>淑景万容妆节物，胜游千路入神仙。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496342_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496342'>酣杯莫顾归时夜，藏火难逢月尚圆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496342_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496342'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496342_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年2月</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。二月，韩琦有《乞罢青苗及诸路提举官奏》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163936' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163936' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163936?labeling=true' target='_blank'>乞罢青苗及诸路提举官奏<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁三年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163936")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163936_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163936'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163936'>制置三司条例司奏，今欲将常平、广惠仓见在斛斗，遇贵量减市价出粜，就贱量增市价收籴，仍以见钱依陕西青苗钱例，取人户情愿预行支给，令随税送纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163936_comment'></div>斛斗内有愿请本色斛斗，或纳时价贵，愿纳见钱者，皆许从便，务在优民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163936_comment'></div>如遇灾伤，亦许于次熟日送纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163936_comment'></div>若此行之，非唯足以待凶荒之患，又民既受贷，则于田作之时不虑阙食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163936_comment'></div>盖人困乏常在新陈不接之际，兼并之家乘其急以邀倍息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163936_comment'></div>今通一路之有无，贵发贱歛，以广蓄积，平物价，皆以为民，而公家无以利其入，是亦先王散惠兴利而抑民豪夺之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163936_comment'></div>仍乞且于京东、淮南、河北三路先行此法，俟成次第，即令诸路依此施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163936_comment'></div>奉敕依奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163936_comment'></div>续准敕节文，常平、广惠仓见钱许依陕西出俵青苗钱例，每于夏秋未熟以前，约逐处收成时酌中物价，立定预支每斗价例，出晓示召人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163936_comment'></div>情愿请领者，十户为一保，即不拘户等高下；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163936_comment'></div>不愿请领者，不得抑配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163936_comment'></div>若客户愿请，即与主户合保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163936_comment'></div>若约度物数支与乡村人户有剩，即亦许准上法支俵与坊郭有物力抵当人户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163936_comment'></div>如纳时斛斗价贵，愿纳见钱者，亦听，仍相度量减时价送纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163936_comment'></div>夏料于正月三十日以前、秋料于五月三十日以前支俵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163936_comment'></div>又准转运常平广惠仓司牒，支俵青苗价钱，每十户以上结成一保，须第三等以上有物力人充甲头。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163936_comment'></div>第五等并客户，每户不得过一贯五百文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163936_comment'></div>第四等每户不得过三贯文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163936_comment'></div>第三等，每户不得过六贯文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163936_comment'></div>第二等，每户不得过十贯文；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163936_comment'></div>第一等，每户不得过十五贯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163936_comment'></div>如所支钱外，更有剩数，其第三等以上人户委本县量度物力，于今来所定钱数外，更添数支给。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163936_comment'></div>若更有剩钱，如坊郭人户实有自己物业可充抵当、愿借请官钱者，仍五家以上结为一保，依乡村青苗例支借，不得过抵当物业所值价钱之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163936_comment'></div>其逐县不得避免逐时出纳之烦，致令诸色人扇摇人户，却称不愿请领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163936_comment'></div>仰逐县官吏用心晓告人户，如不愿请领，即具结罪文状入马递申赴当司，以凭选差清强官往彼晓谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163936_comment'></div>人户如却愿请领，其本县干系人必定别作行遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163936_comment'></div>如事理稍重，必具事由申奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163936_comment'></div>应夏秋收成，合纳所请过价钱斛斗，如物价稍贵，愿纳见钱者，当议于市价上减扑钱数，仍比附元请价钱，十分不得过三分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163936_comment'></div>假令二户请过钱一贯文，如送纳见钱，即不得过一贯三百文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163936_comment'></div>臣窃以国之颁号令，立法制，必信其言，而使民受实惠，则四方观听，孰不欣服？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163936_comment'></div>伏详元降敕语，务在优民，不使兼并之家乘其急以邀倍息，皆以为民，而公家无以利其入，谓合先王散惠兴利、抑民豪夺之意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163936_comment'></div>今乃乡村自第一等而下，皆立借钱贯佰，其第三等以上人户更许添数支纳，坊郭人户有自己物业可充抵当、愿借请官钱，依青苗例支借，不得过抵当物业价值之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163936_comment'></div>乡村上三等并坊郭有物业人户，乃从来兼并之家也，今皆多得借钱，每借一贯令纳一贯三百文，则是官放息钱也，与元敕抑兼并、济困乏之意绝相违戾，欲民信服，不可得也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163936_comment'></div>又乡村每保须第三等以上有力人充甲头，虽云不得抑勒，而上等之户既有物力，必不愿请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163936_comment'></div>官吏既防保内近下贫户不能送纳，岂免差充甲头，以备代陪也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163936_comment'></div>复峻责逐县，如人户不愿请领，即令结罪申报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163936_comment'></div>若选官晓谕却有愿请者，则干系人别作行遣，或具申奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163936_comment'></div>官吏惧提举司势可升黜，又防选官晓谕之时，岂无贫下浮浪愿请之人？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1163936_comment'></div>苟免捃拾，则其势须行散配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1163936_comment'></div>且贫下人户见官中散钱，谁不愿请？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1163936_comment'></div>然本户夏秋各有税赋，又有预买及转运司和买两色䌷绢，积年倚阁借贷钱粮、麦种钱之类，名目甚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1163936_comment'></div>今添纳此一重出利青苗钱，愚民一时借请则甚易，至纳时则甚难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1163936_comment'></div>故自敕下以来，一路州县上下惶惑，皆谓若不抑散，上户不愿请领，只据近下等第与无业客户愿请者支俵，则实难催纳，将来必有行刑督索及勒干系书手、典押、耆户长、同保人等均陪之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1163936_comment'></div>大凡兼并所放息钱，虽取利稍厚，缘有逋欠，官中不许受理，往往旧债未偿其半，早以续得贷钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1163936_comment'></div>兼并者既有资本，故能使相因岁月，渐而取之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1163936_comment'></div>今官贷青苗钱则不然，须是夏秋随税送纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1163936_comment'></div>如人户灾伤及五分以上，方许次科催还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1163936_comment'></div>若连两科灾伤，则必官无本钱接续支俵，而官本因而寖有失陷也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1163936_comment'></div>其害明白如此，更有缘此烦费虚扰之事，不敢具述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1163936_comment'></div>兼去岁河朔丰熟，常平仓所籴白米，每斗不过七十五文至八十五文省以来，自前年分少有似此价贱之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1163936_comment'></div>若乘时收歛，遇向去价贵出粜，不唯合于古制，而无失陷之弊，兼民实被惠，亦足收其羡赢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1163936_comment'></div>今诸仓方有籴入，而提举司亟令住止，盖尽要散充青苗钱，指望三分之利，而遂收为己功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1163936_comment'></div>县邑小官，敢不奉行，岂暇更恤贻民久远之患哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1163936_comment'></div>诸路所行事体，必料大率如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1163936_comment'></div>朝廷若谓陕西尝放青苗钱，官有所得，而民以为便，此乃转运司因军储有阙，遇自冬涉春雨雪及时，麦苗滋盛，决见成熟，行于一时则可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1163936_comment'></div>今乃差官置司，为每岁春夏常行之法，而取利三分，又岂陕西权宜之比也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1163936_comment'></div>兼元敕明言且于京东、淮南、河北三路先行此法，俟成次第，即令诸路依此施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1163936_comment'></div>今此三路自睹新制，州县方忧不能奉行，而遽于诸路遍差提举官员，以至西川、广南亦皆置使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1163936_comment'></div>伏惟陛下自临御以来，夙夜忧劳，励精求治，况承祖宗百年仁政之后，民浸德泽，唯知宽恤，而未尝过扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1163936_comment'></div>若但躬行节俭，以先天下，常节浮费，渐汰冗食，自然国用不乏，何必使兴利之臣纷纷四出，以致远近之疑哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1163936_comment'></div>臣职当安抚，日闻一路官吏所论，皆云散钱不便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1163936_comment'></div>转运司明知侵挠利权，不可经久，尚皆不敢陈说，而小臣畏罪，孰敢言者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1163936_comment'></div>臣若顾避形迹，从而默默，大惧有误陛下委寄之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1163936_comment'></div>欲望圣慈矜臣愚直，更赐博访，若臣言不妄，即乞尽罢诸路提举之官，只委逐路提点刑狱臣僚依常平旧法施行，以安众心，天下幸甚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_63_1163936_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163936'><span class='label'>按：</span>《韩魏王家传》卷八，《皇朝文鉴》卷四四，《东都事略》卷六九，《国朝诸臣奏议》卷一一一，《太平治迹统类》卷二二，《通鉴长编纪事本末》卷五九、六三，《九朝编年备要》卷二○，《宋史》卷一七六《食货志》上四，《历代名臣奏议》卷二六五，《宋元通鉴》卷三二，《经济类编》卷三六，《宋史纪事本末》卷三七，《古今图书集成》食货典卷一四八，《续资治通鉴》卷六七）。
青：原无，据右引补。<br /><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_63_1163936_0'>⑴ 《韩魏公集》卷二○。又见《宋会要辑稿》食货四之一九。第五册第四八五五页</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1163936_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《会压沙寺观梨花》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_496343' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496343' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496343?labeling=true' target='_blank'>会压沙寺观梨花</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_1_496343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496343'>风急几翻云影乱，殿深全掩玉毫光。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496343'>朝来经雨低含泪，竞写真妃寂寞妆<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：前夕降雨。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496343_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496343'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496343_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: id='poem_title_496344_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496344'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496344'>天知人意喜春娱，故作轻云捲复舒。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496344_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496344'>风撼花飞铺宴席，雨平沙稳助流车。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496344_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496344'>蛾颦嫩叶初眠柳，马茁柔椿未荐蔬。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496344_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496344'>何必笙歌喧坐上，且延欢伯侍香裾。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496344_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496344'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496344_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《过全福寺》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十四。）</span><div id='poem_496345' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496345' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496345?labeling=true' target='_blank'>过全福寺</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496345")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496345_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496345'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496345'>伊昔豪英袭将牙，更崇因果欲何加。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496345'>精蓝世自传缁服，绘像尘谁障碧纱。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496345'>诗好盈编堆锦组，字奇随笔走龙蛇。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496345'>空馀旧史高风在，衰替嗟吾外氏家。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496345'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496345_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_496345'><span class='label'>按：</span>以上《安阳集》卷一四<br /></div><div id='poem_note_496345_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《北京乞就移徐州札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《北京乞就移徐州第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163848' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163848' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163848?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京乞就移徐州第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163848")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163848_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163848'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163848'>臣近以连岁以来，夏秋多病，今一路无事，乞就移徐州，伏蒙圣慈特降诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163848_comment'></div>尪疲所诉，莫非至诚；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163848_comment'></div>眷谕有加，未垂恩可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163848_comment'></div>重兹哀叩，必觊矜从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163848_comment'></div>窃念臣历辅三朝，惟殚一节，以孤忠而自进，承累圣之误知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163848_comment'></div>向以备位冢司，久妨贤路，恳求补外，以治宿疴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163848_comment'></div>陛下始命均逸乡邦，而亟使当西北繁重之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163848_comment'></div>臣虽衰朽，尚且力自牵勉，以副陛下宵旰之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163848_comment'></div>今幸北道岁丰，兵农安谧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163848_comment'></div>而臣积年抱疾，根本日深，每至夏秋，则其势增剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163848_comment'></div>大名冲会之地，其实不能支持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163848_comment'></div>譬夫马牛，已竭力耕代劳之用，老且病矣，而且旦暮驱之，不使休息，则恐有伤豢育之恩，不得无将死沟壑之叹也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163848_comment'></div>欲望睿仁加恻，早赐就移臣徐州一任，俾羸驽之质，稍从刍秣之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163848_comment'></div>岁月差久，肤革粗完，则其区区报主之心，固不敢忘。</div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1163848_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《北京乞就移徐州第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163849' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163849' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163849?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京乞就移徐州第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163849")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163849_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163849'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163849'>臣伏蒙圣慈以臣再乞就移徐州，特赐诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163849_comment'></div>臣窃以被疾而辞剧，人臣量力而知退也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163849_comment'></div>推恩以从欲，圣主察诚而贵恕也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163849_comment'></div>故量其力当退而不退，则必速贪权之祸；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163849_comment'></div>察其诚当恕而不恕，则有伤御下之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163849_comment'></div>兹臣所以不避重诛，固以诚请至于再三者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163849_comment'></div>惟陛下察而恕之，不伤至仁，使免趋于祸败也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163849_comment'></div>重念臣犬马之疾，留伏胸胁，积成大孽，根柢已深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163849_comment'></div>加以仍岁以来，脾胃顿弱，自夏涉秋，泄注不止，精力耗劣，不能自持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163849_comment'></div>向遇朝廷有急难驱策，尚且勉强承命，然责任既重，思虑益劳，宿疹因而乘之，内戕日甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163849_comment'></div>今幸一方安帖，农亩屡登，至于边垂，寂无警候。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163849_comment'></div>陛下不于此时容一多病老臣，俾脱去冲要，付之事简之地，稍从治养；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163849_comment'></div>必俟其膏肓之衅，危不可解，填弃沟壑，期在旦暮，然后怜其所诉，盖无及矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163849_comment'></div>欲望陛下矜臣迫切之恳，谓非矫妄，早降睿旨，许从前请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163849_comment'></div>傥蝼蚁之命知可保于馀生，则天地之恩固不忘于再造。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1163849_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《北京乞就移徐州第四札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163850' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163850' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163850?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京乞就移徐州第四劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163850")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163850_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163850'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163850'>臣近三上章，乞就移徐州，伏蒙圣慈特差入内供奉官、勾当御药院李舜举赍赐诏书，不允所乞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163850_comment'></div>恩礼之重，非衰朽之所克胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163850_comment'></div>睿训矜存，感深以泣，固当上禀圣谕，以免一时违忤之罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163850_comment'></div>然于去就之分，理有未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163850_comment'></div>君父至仁，而怀情不尽，亦岂免异日隳败之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163850_comment'></div>何者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163850_comment'></div>盖自北道地震水灾，民流去贯，方朝廷以四路绥御之柄，全以属臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163850_comment'></div>当此之时，臣势有可辞，而不以为辞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163850_comment'></div>今灾震既息，流徙既复，民和岁穰，几至无事，而又去三路之烦，而就一道之简，可以无辞矣而辞之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163850_comment'></div>由外而观，臣则有若所为倒错，而图安已甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163850_comment'></div>在臣自省，则以为前日之不辞者，力犹可勉；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163850_comment'></div>今日之必辞者，疲不任剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163850_comment'></div>而犹贪冒权任，势将颠踣，则上不能勤宣陛下利泽，下不能深究兵民疾苦，中不能完养老臣久衰之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163850_comment'></div>是朝廷重易臣一州，而俾臣负三不能之患，恐非陛下所以厚仁恩、念旧物之本意也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163850_comment'></div>臣识具材术固无足过人，如天性所得之多、而私心自信之笃者，唯至诚朴忠耳！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163850_comment'></div>今臣以朴愚之诚叩陛下，傥陛下垂听而哀怜之，使养疾僻州，避远要剧，物性得所，则疾平可望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163850_comment'></div>兼臣尚有馀恳，谨附李舜举面奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163850_comment'></div>孤危之迹，夙夜彷徨，幸陛下早赐安全，则天地之恩，臣虽九殒，不能上报。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1163850_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年3月3日</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《上巳会许公亭二首》（其一）<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十五。）</span>《上巳会许公亭二首》（其二）<span target='_blank'>又论罢青苗疏<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁三年三月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163953")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163953_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163953'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163953'>臣近以河北路差官置司，春夏放青苗钱与乡村坊郭人户，明取三分之利，每保须要第三等以上有物力人充甲头，督促峻责，逐县支俵，有伤国体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163953_comment'></div>一路官吏，上下皆知不便，而以制置条例司是大臣主领，但人人腹非，而不敢公言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163953_comment'></div>臣被顾三朝，而又职当安抚，实不忍雷同默默，遂详陈利害本末，乞更加博访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163953_comment'></div>若臣言不妄，即乞尽罢诸路提举之官，只委逐路提点刑狱臣僚依常平旧法施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163953_comment'></div>所冀陛下洒然开悟，亟赐更改，使天下歌舞圣明，不为盛德之累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163953_comment'></div>老臣献忠之心，岂有它也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163953_comment'></div>今准都进奏院牒，却蒙制置司以臣言皆为不当，条件疏驳，乞申敕诸路，及直令进奏官张士程指挥本院，将晓谕中书劄子颁行天下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163953_comment'></div>臣详制置司疏驳事件，即将臣元奏要切之语多从删去，唯举其大概，用偏辞曲为沮难，及引《周礼》国服为息之说，文其谬妄，上以欺罔圣听，下以愚弄天下之人，将使无复敢言其非者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163953_comment'></div>臣不胜痛愤，须至再有辩列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163953_comment'></div>欲望圣慈特纾亲览，然后降付中书、枢密看详，送御史台集百官定议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163953_comment'></div>如臣所言不当，即甘从窜殛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163953_comment'></div>若是制置司处置乖方，天下必受其弊，即乞依臣前奏，尽罢诸路提举官，只委提点刑狱臣僚依常平旧法施行，以慰众心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163953_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1163953'>一、臣前奏以元降敕语务在优民，不使兼并之家乘其急以邀倍息，而公家无以利其入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163953_comment'></div>今乃乡村自第一等而下，皆立借钱贯百，其第三等以上人户更添数支给，坊郭人户有自己物业可充抵当、愿借请官钱者，依青苗例支借，不得过抵当物业价直之半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163953_comment'></div>且乡村上三等并坊郭有物业人户，乃从来兼并之家也，今皆多得借钱，每得一贯令纳一贯三百文，则是官放息钱也，与元敕「抑兼并、济困乏」之意，绝相违戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163953_comment'></div>今制置条例司疏驳云：「言者以谓元降敕命云『公家无所利其入』，今河北提举官乃令取息三分，是与元敕绝相违戾，失信于百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163953_comment'></div>本司今按《周礼》泉府之官，民之贷者取息有至二十而五，国之财用取具焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163953_comment'></div>今常平新法预俵青苗价钱，但约熟时酌中物价；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163953_comment'></div>若熟时物贵，即许量减市价纳钱，即是未定合纳实数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163953_comment'></div>故河北提举官则约束州县，若情愿纳钱，不得过三分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163953_comment'></div>至于京西、陕西等路提举官，则大抵约束不得过二分而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163953_comment'></div>此盖为量减时价指挥未有约定实数，恐遇纳时斛斗价例倍贵，州县量减钱数不多，却致亏损百姓，所以有此约束，即非法外擅为侵刻也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163953_comment'></div>就诸路提举所纳，惟河北所约分数最多，然云不过三分之息，定取三分之息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163953_comment'></div>若物价低平，即有合纳本色，不收其息；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163953_comment'></div>或只收一二分息之时，多少相补，比《周礼》贷民取息立定分数，已不为多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163953_comment'></div>近降指挥，又令诸路预俵价钱，若遇物价极贵，亦不得过二分，即比《周礼》所取尤少」者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163953_comment'></div>臣窃以既立太平之法，必无剥民取利之理，但汉儒以去圣之远，解释或有异同耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163953_comment'></div>按《周礼》：「泉府掌以市之征布，歛市之不售、货之滞于民用者，以其价买之物揭而书之，以待不时而买者，各从其抵」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163953_comment'></div>郑众释云：「书其价，揭著其物也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163953_comment'></div>不时买者，谓急求者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163953_comment'></div>抵，故价也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163953_comment'></div>臣谓周制，民有货在市而无人买，或有积滞而妨用者，则官以时价买之，书其物价以示民，若有急求者，则以官元买价与之，此所谓王道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163953_comment'></div>经又云：「凡赊者，祭祀无过旬日，丧纪无过三月」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163953_comment'></div>郑众释云：「赊，贳也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163953_comment'></div>以祭祀、丧纪，故从官贳买物」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163953_comment'></div>唐贾公彦疏云：「赊与民不取利也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163953_comment'></div>经又云：「凡民之贷，与其有司辨之，以国服为之息」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163953_comment'></div>郑众释云：「贷者，谓从官借本贾也，故有息，使民弗利，以其所贾之国所出为息也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1163953_comment'></div>此所谓王道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1163953_comment'></div>而郑康成释云：「以其于国服事之税为息也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1163953_comment'></div>于国事受园廛之田而贷万泉者，则期出息五百」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1163953_comment'></div>臣谓《周礼》园廛二十而税一，近郊十一，远郊二十而三，甸稍县都皆无过十二，惟其漆林之征二十而五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1163953_comment'></div>漆林，自然而生，非人力所作，故税重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1163953_comment'></div>康成乃约此法，谓从官贷钱若受园廛之地，贷万钱者出息五百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1163953_comment'></div>公彦因而疏解，谓「近郊十一者，万钱期出息一千；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1163953_comment'></div>远郊二十而三者，万钱期出息一千五百；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1163953_comment'></div>甸稍县都之民，万钱期出息二千」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1163953_comment'></div>臣谓如此则须漆林之户取贷，方出息二千五百也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1163953_comment'></div>然当时未必如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1163953_comment'></div>今放青苗钱，凡春贷十千，半年之内使令纳利二千；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1163953_comment'></div>秋再放十千，至年终又令纳利二千，则是贷万钱不问远近之地，岁令出息四千也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1163953_comment'></div>《周礼》至远之地止出息二千，今青苗取利尚过《周礼》一倍，则制置司所言「比《周礼》贷民取息，立定分数已不为多」，亦是欺罔圣听，自谓天下之人皆不能辨也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1163953_comment'></div>且今古异制，贵于便时，《周礼》所载有不可施于今者，其事非一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1163953_comment'></div>若谓「泉府」一职今可施行，则上言以官钱买在市不售及民间积滞之货，候民急求则依元买价与之，民有祭祀、丧纪，就官中借物，限旬日、三月还官，而不取其利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1163953_comment'></div>制置司何不将此周公太平已试之法，尽申明而行？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1163953_comment'></div>岂可独举注疏贷钱取息之利事，以诋天下之公言哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1163953_comment'></div>郑康成又注云：「王莽时，贷以治产业者，但计赢所得受息，无过岁什一」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1163953_comment'></div>公彦疏解云：「王莽时虽计本多少为定，及其催科，惟所赢多少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1163953_comment'></div>假令万泉岁赢万泉，催一千；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1163953_comment'></div>赢五千，催五百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1163953_comment'></div>馀皆据利催什一」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1163953_comment'></div>臣谓王莽时官贷本万钱，岁终赢得万钱，只令纳一千；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1163953_comment'></div>若所赢钱更少，则纳息更薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1163953_comment'></div>比今于青苗钱取利，尤为宽少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1163953_comment'></div>而王莽之后，上自两汉，下及有唐，更不闻有贷钱取利之法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1163953_comment'></div>今制置司遇尧舜之主，不以二帝三王之道上裨圣政，而贷钱取利，更过王莽之时，此天下不得不指以为非，而老臣不可以不辩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1163953_comment'></div>况今天下田税已重，固非《周礼》什一之法，则又随亩更有农具、牛皮、盐钱、曲钱、鞋钱之类，凡十馀名件，谓之杂钱，每遇夏秋起纳官中，更将䌷绢斛斗低估价例，令民将此杂钱折纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1163953_comment'></div>又，每岁将官盐散与人户，谓之蚕盐，令民折纳绢帛，更有预买、转运司和买两色䌷绢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1163953_comment'></div>如此之类，不可悉举，皆《周礼》田税什一之外加歛之物，取利已厚，伤农已深，柰何更引《周礼》国服为息之说，谓放青苗钱取利，乃周公太平已试之法？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1163953_comment'></div>此则诬污圣典，蔽惑睿明，老臣得不太息而恸哭也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1163953_comment'></div>又，制置司所云「提举官约束州县，纳钱不得过三分、二分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1163953_comment'></div>盖为量减时价指挥未有约定实数，恐遇纳时斛斗价例倍贵，州县量减钱数不多，却致亏损百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1163953_comment'></div>若物价低平，即合纳本色，不收其息」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1163953_comment'></div>臣亦谓此论之不实也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1163953_comment'></div>缘小麦最为不耐停蓄之物，自来常平仓不籴，盖恐积留损坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1163953_comment'></div>今岁诸路雨雪及时，二麦有望，麦价必贱，提举官必不肯令人户送纳本色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1163953_comment'></div>盖纳下本色，则无由变转。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1163953_comment'></div>若于转运司兑换价钱，则诸处军粮支麦绝少，必难兑换。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1163953_comment'></div>既难兑换，则占压本钱，下次却无钱散与人户。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1163953_comment'></div>臣以此知制置司与提举官本无令人户送纳斛斗之意，故开此许纳见钱一门，将来只令言人户情愿送纳本色，则人户须至粜麦纳钱，岂不殃害百姓？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1163953_comment'></div>惟陛下早悟臣言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1163953_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_81_1163953'>一、制置司云：「言者以谓三等户及城郭有物力户，即从来兼并之家，今乃立定贯百，许之贷借，即非抵兼并之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1163953_comment'></div>又，河北提举官，每保须要上三等户一名，即上等人户，必不愿请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1163953_comment'></div>官吏既防贫户不能送纳，岂免差充甲头，以备代陪？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1163953_comment'></div>又，河北提举官乃峻责州县，如人不愿请领，即结罪申报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1163953_comment'></div>若选官晓谕，人户却情愿请领，即当别作行遣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1163953_comment'></div>若选官晓谕，茍免捃拾，岂无贫下浮浪愿请之人，或须行散配？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1163953_comment'></div>本司今按：乡村上三等及城郭有物业户内，亦有阙乏之人，就人取债，岂皆是兼并之家？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1163953_comment'></div>今贷贫民有馀，则以俵此等人户，免令就私家取一倍之息，乃是元敕抑兼并之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1163953_comment'></div>河北提举官每保须要上三等户一名者，盖为关防浮浪之人请去，将来难为催纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1163953_comment'></div>若有上等户肯与同保，即非浮浪之人，自不须忧难为催纳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1163953_comment'></div>若无上三等户肯与同保，即自依准提举官公文，不许支俵，何须更行散配？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1163953_comment'></div>若谓上三等必不肯请领，须是差作甲头，即自是抑勒，有违前法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1163953_comment'></div>况今年开封诸县已经俵散，甚有上三等户情愿请领，即非官吏抑勒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1163953_comment'></div>以近验远，事理可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1163953_comment'></div>至于提举司约束官吏，如无人情愿请领，即结罪申报，别选官晓谕，乃只是关防因循避事坏法之人，即非迫胁官吏，须令抑配百姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1163953_comment'></div>若提举官急于功利，讽令州县抑配与人，即诸路各有安抚、转运、提刑，其为朝廷委任，皆在提举之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1163953_comment'></div>若有州县官员故欲隳坏新法，曲徇提举官抑勒百姓，自当纠举，依法施行，并具事状闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1163953_comment'></div>岂宜以官吏违法之故，遂欲废法」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1163953_comment'></div>臣窃以乡村上三等及城郭有物业人户，非臣独知是从来兼并之家，此天下之人共知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1163953_comment'></div>今制置司以为不是兼并之家者，只要多散青苗钱与之，而得利亦多也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1163953_comment'></div>其如元降敕意，本务拯济困乏，却将钱散与此等人户，则天下明知朝廷专以取利为意，实伤国体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1163953_comment'></div>制置司若谓《周官》有贷民之法，取之以道，于理无嫌，则今兼并之家例开质库，置课场；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1163953_comment'></div>若恐取民倍息，以伤贫细，则所在皆可官自开置，以抑兼并。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1163953_comment'></div>然自前世以来，恶其太近衰削，不忍为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1163953_comment'></div>今青苗钱一事，无近于此乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1163953_comment'></div>又云「每保须要上三等户一名者，盖关防浮浪之人请去，难为催纳」，此则抑勒之势，不假臣言而自明矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1163953_comment'></div>又云「若谓上三等人户必不肯请领，须至差作甲头，即自是抑勒，有违前法」，此又殊不察事势人情，有不得已而为之者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1163953_comment'></div>且青苗之法，内有大臣力主，事在必行；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1163953_comment'></div>外有专差之官，惟以散多为职办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1163953_comment'></div>州县官吏往往变抑勒而为情愿者，盖事势不得不惧，而人情不得不从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1163953_comment'></div>监司之官，其于事势人情，亦何异此？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1163953_comment'></div>九重高远，岂得尽知？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1163953_comment'></div>唯陛下早赐辨察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1163953_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_114_1163953'>一、制置司云：「言者以谓躬行节俭，常节浮费，自然国用不乏，何必使兴利之臣四出，以致使远近之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1163953_comment'></div>本司今按：先王之政，未尝不以食货为始，张官置吏，大抵多为农事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1163953_comment'></div>近世以来，农人尤为困苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1163953_comment'></div>若朝廷但有徭役加之，初无岁时补助之法，自京畿陂防沟洫，多有不治，乃至都城侧近，绵地数百里，弃为污莱，父子夫妇，流离失业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1163953_comment'></div>四方遐僻，不可周知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1163953_comment'></div>一方水旱，则饿死者相枕藉，而流移者填道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1163953_comment'></div>如前岁河北一饥，不免漕江淮之米以救之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1163953_comment'></div>然于人之流亡饿殍，未有补也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1163953_comment'></div>至于非泛用度，或不免就等第人户强借钱物，百姓典卖田产物业，以供暴令，此亦可谓国用之失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1163953_comment'></div>至于差役，困苦农民，使之失职，则士大夫之所共见，不待论说而后可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1163953_comment'></div>故陛下即位诏书，丁宁以务农、理财、免人役为政事之急诫，方今宜忧，为在此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1163953_comment'></div>今置提举常平广惠仓官兼管干农田水利差役事者，凡以为此而已，固非使之朘削百姓，以佐人主私费，亦岂得谓之兴利之臣，而以为致远近之疑」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1163953_comment'></div>臣详制置司所言提举常平仓官员不是兴利，今既明举贷钱取利之法，谓取之以道，于理无嫌，则非兴利而何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1163953_comment'></div>至于东南所差均输之官，亦皆兴利之臣也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1163953_comment'></div>且西川四路乡村，民多大姓，每一姓所有客户，动是三五百家，自来衣食贷借，仰以为生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1163953_comment'></div>今若差官置司，更以青苗钱与之，则客于主户处从来借贷既不可免，又须出此一重官中利息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1163953_comment'></div>其它大姓，则固不愿请领苗钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1163953_comment'></div>又广南东西路，土旷人稀，水乡之俗，粗足生计，今亦置官司贷钱取利。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1163953_comment'></div>故于远民，尤为不便，岂得不谓之以致远近之疑也？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1163953_comment'></div>国家幅员至广，一方之有水旱，时所不免，然朝廷未尝不假贷粮种，尽救荒之政以济恤之，故得饥馑者复苏，流离者复安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1163953_comment'></div>自祖宗以来，可谓仁政充洽矣，而未尝曾就等第人户处强借钱物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1163953_comment'></div>唯是英宗皇帝及陛下即位之初，天下各有优赏，朝廷自京师应副未及，间有三两路州军曾于坊郭富民处权暂支借者，然亦即时辇还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1163953_comment'></div>今制置司指为「暴令」，以颁布天下，是唯知主张青苗之法，而不顾毁讟之甚，诚可骇也！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1163953_comment'></div>唯陛下早赐省察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1163953_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_138_1163953'>一、制置司云：「言者以为坊郭人户既无青苗，不可贷借。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1163953_comment'></div>本司今按常平旧法，亦粜与坊郭之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1163953_comment'></div>今若俵散农民有馀，仍不许坊郭之人贷借，是令常平有滞积馀藏，而坊郭之人独不被赈救乏绝之恩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1163953_comment'></div>《周礼》设贷民之法，即无都邑鄙野之限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1163953_comment'></div>今新法乃约《周礼》太平已试之法，即非专用陕西青苗条贯也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1163953_comment'></div>臣详制置司此说尤为不实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1163953_comment'></div>盖自来常平仓遇岁年不稔、物价稍高、合减元价出粜之时，其乡村则逐处多下诸县取逐乡近下等第户姓名，印给关子，令收执赴仓，每户粜与三石，或两石以来；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1163953_comment'></div>所是坊郭，则每日零细粜与浮居人户，每口五升，或一㪷以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1163953_comment'></div>故民受实惠，甚济饥乏，即未曾坊郭有物业人户，乃来零粜常平仓斛斗者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1163953_comment'></div>此盖制置司以青苗为名，欲剩借钱与坊郭有物业之人，以望得利之多，假称《周礼》太平已试之法，以谓无都邑鄙野之限，以文其曲说，惟陛下深详其妄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1163953_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_148_1163953'>一、臣近准真定府路安抚使司公文，称：准河北都转运常平广惠仓司牒真定府，准制置条例司劄子，据河北都转运常平广惠仓司状，准朝旨于内藏库支到山东绢二十万疋，充常平本钱，寻分擘与诸州县出卖，必是破贷不了。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1163953_comment'></div>欲将绢分作两等，上等每疋作一贯三百五十文省，次等每疋作一贯三百文省，召人户情愿依青苗见钱法请领。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1163953_comment'></div>仰更切相度，如依减定价例，委是人户情愿，即依所申施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1163953_comment'></div>如坊郭人户情愿请领者，亦听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1163953_comment'></div>常平司差帖殿侍康承丙称，自京般来绢二十万疋，唯有真定府未曾差人赴恩州请般。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1163953_comment'></div>帖康承丙疾速往真定府管下县分，遍行催促，火急和雇脚乘，赴恩州请般，趁时支俵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1163953_comment'></div>勘会真定府于恩州支下绢三万疋，虽未般到，缘系准备充秋科青苗价钱，即不阙钱支用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1163953_comment'></div>若更差使臣下州府县分催促支散，及取索文字，深属张皇搔扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1163953_comment'></div>牒臣本司请照会者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1163953_comment'></div>臣遂备录闻奏，庶朝廷见其为害之深，乞察臣前奏散青苗钱不便事理，早赐施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1163953_comment'></div>却准中书劄子，奉圣旨，康承丙元系皮公弼等乞差充差使干当，兼累降指挥，令提刑司常切觉察，所散青苗钱，召人情愿，不得抑勒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1163953_comment'></div>或有抑配俵散，便令止绝，当职官员具姓名闻奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1163953_comment'></div>劄与臣知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1163953_comment'></div>臣勘会转运司昨将山东绢配卖与诸州军坊郭等第人户，每一疋估钱一贯五百三十文至一贯六百文以来，限半年纳钱，尚犹近下等第人户有破卖家财，方能贴陪送纳了当者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1163953_comment'></div>今常平提举官将山东绢二十万疋，上等者作一贯三百五十文，每一贯利二分，每疋已是一贯六百五十文省；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1163953_comment'></div>下等者每疋作一贯三百文，并利亦是一贯六百文省，并随税只是百馀日省限纳足，与转运司配卖与坊郭人户价例全不相远，即于农民岂不为害？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1163953_comment'></div>更差使臣督迫支俵，公文内动是火急之言，则州县小官唯是应命，茍免过咎，将抑配以为情愿，何处更可辨明？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1163953_comment'></div>且制置三司条例司虽大臣主领，然终是定夺之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1163953_comment'></div>今将绢二十万疋直行指挥，许散与乡村人户，依青苗法纳钱，及令坊郭人户愿请者亦听，则自来未见有定夺之司，事不关中书、枢密院，不奉圣旨，直可施行者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1163953_comment'></div>如此，则是中书外又有一中书也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1163953_comment'></div>然中书凡事亦须进呈，或候画可，方敢施行，未尝直便处分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1163953_comment'></div>唯陛下察其专也如此，则在外守职臣僚，其谁敢不禀从？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1163953_comment'></div>望早赐辨察，使事归政府，庶于国体为便。</div><div id='poem_sentence_170_1163953_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163953'><span class='label'>按：</span>《韩魏公集》卷二一。又见《宋会要辑稿》食货四之二五。第五册第四八五八页《韩魏王家传》卷九，《国朝诸臣奏议》卷一一二（题作《上神宗论条例司画一申明青苗事》），《通鉴长编纪事本末》卷六三、六八，《宋史》卷一七六《食货志》上四，《历代名臣奏议》卷二六五。<br /></div><div id='poem_note_1163953_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《西园初暑》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十五。）</span><div id='poem_496353' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496353' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496353?labeling=true' "poem_title_496353")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496353_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496353'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496353'>可爱西园夏景长，南来风好拂襟凉。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496353'>楼台轩豁年殊旧，池沼乾枯雨未滂。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496353'>群鸟护雏时起斗，众花成子几堪尝。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496353'>欲知逃暑芳樽味，似过林禽玉溜浆。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496353_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496353'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496353_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《寄西台子渊赵学士》诗。<span "poem_title_496354")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496354_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496354'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496354'>昔年瀛馆接仙才，官路升沈孰可猜。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496354'>直使庸驽叨上笏，却教贤杰老西台。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496354'>莫悲居处荒三径，且把功名寄一杯。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496354'>应笑位高归去晚，谤多终日怒蚊雷。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496354_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496354'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496354_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《苦热未雨》诗。<span "poem_title_496355")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496355_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496355'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496355'>骄阳为虐极烦歊，万物如焚望沃焦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496355_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496355'>举世不能逃酷吏，几时还得快凉飙。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496355_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496355'>精祈拟责泥龙效，大索谁诛旱魃妖。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496355_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496355'>翘首岱云肤寸起，四方膏泽尽良苗。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496355_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496355'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496355_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《雨足晚晴》诗。<span id='poem_sentence_0_496356'>掣电搜龙发怒雷，欲驱时旱涤民灾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496356'>四溟滂泽三农足，万宇愁襟一夕开。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496356'>虹影渐从天外散，蝉声初到枕边来。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496356'>高楼小酌清风满，不胜当年避暑杯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496356_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496356'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496356_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《庚戌秋分》诗。<span target='_blank'>庚戌秋分</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496357")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496357_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496357'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496357'>淅淅风清叶未凋，秋分残景自萧条。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496357'>禾头无耳时微旱，蚊嘴生花毒渐消。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496357'>钱迸嫩苔陈阁静，字横宾雁楚天遥。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496357'>西园宴集偏宜夜，坐看圆蟾过丽谯。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496357_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496357'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496357_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《新修晋太尉嵇公庙记》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷二十一。）</span><div id='poem_1164123' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164123' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164123?labeling=true' target='_blank'>新修晋太尉嵇公庙记<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁三年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164123")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164123_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164123'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164123'>夫以忠事君，人臣之常分也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164123_comment'></div>然遭大变，临大节，或心无所主，为祸福所动，以苟一时之生，而贻万世之戮者多矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164123_comment'></div>若其鼎镬在前，锋刃加己，能挺然知义之所在，分固当尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164123_comment'></div>轻其命若鸿毛然，卒死而不顾者，几何人哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164123_comment'></div>惟晋侍中、赠太尉忠穆嵇公，则其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164123_comment'></div>方惠帝昏弱，诸王肆乱，各萌僭夺，以相屠害。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164123_comment'></div>故帝之北征也，公驰赴行在，力当国难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164123_comment'></div>而成都王颖以兵犯乘舆，卫从奔散，独公端冕侍侧，以身捍帝，至血溅御衣而殒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164123_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164123_comment'></div>公之知义明分，可谓处得其死而不为难也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164123_comment'></div>故其大忠伟节，赫然与日月争光，崒然与山岳争高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164123_comment'></div>天地知不可穷，而公之名亦不可穷矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164123_comment'></div>宜乎百世之下，有国家者钦遗风，想馀烈，置祠奉祀，永永而不绝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164123_comment'></div>相之荡阴，即公死难之地，其庙在焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164123_comment'></div>前之为邑者，不知追显忠义，为政所先，因循不葺，底于大坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164123_comment'></div>今令张君楙至，则首拜祠下，睹其隳敝之甚，惊而叹曰：「兹不职之大者也」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164123_comment'></div>亟举公事迹，与夫朝廷崇祀之意谕于邑民，民皆欣然愿共力以完之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164123_comment'></div>令乃宽与之约，听自营办。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164123_comment'></div>不数月而祠宇一新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164123_comment'></div>于是民益知夫大贤之忠于国者，虽死于不幸，后世必载祀典，严庙貌，奉事尊仰之如此，皆思勉而为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164123_comment'></div>自一邑而推一郡，繇一郡而推诸四方，则其为劝也，岂小补哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164123_comment'></div>庙完，具书来告，以余尝两守乡邦，愿志本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164123_comment'></div>噫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164123_comment'></div>忠义之心，人皆有之，但勉而不力，执之不固，遂不至于古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164123_comment'></div>余亦勉而执之者，跂忠穆之风，尤寤寐以自激。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164123_comment'></div>文虽甚陋，恶敢吝而不书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164123_comment'></div>时熙宁三年八月十五日，具位韩某记并书。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1164123_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年8月15日</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《中秋遇雨》诗。<span id='poem_sentence_1_496362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496362'>管喧银字凌歌席，菊碎金铃上醉钟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496362_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' target='_blank'>韩氏参用古今家祭式序<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁三年十月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年10月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164109")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164109_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164109'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164109'>自唐末至于五代，兵革相仍，礼乐废缺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164109_comment'></div>故公卿大夫之家，岁时祠飨，皆因循便俗，不能以近古制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164109_comment'></div>国家运祚隆赫，承平有年，旷绝之典，无所不讲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164109_comment'></div>庆历初元，始诏文武官并许依旧式创立家庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164109_comment'></div>事下礼官裁处，而迄今不闻定议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164109_comment'></div>某自主祭以来，恪谨时荐，罄极诚悫，而常患夏秋之祭，阙而不备，从俗之事，未有折中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164109_comment'></div>因得秘阁所有御史郑正则《祠享仪》、御史孟诜《家祭礼》、殿中御史范传式《寝堂时享仪》、汝南周元阳《祭录》、京兆武功尉贾氏顼《家荐仪》，金吾卫、仓曹参军徐闰《家祭仪》、检校散骑常侍孙日用《仲享仪》凡七家，研详累月，粗究大方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164109_comment'></div>于是采前说之可行，酌今俗之难废者，以人情断之，成十三篇，名曰《韩氏参用古今家祭式》。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164109_comment'></div>昔郑御史以年六十三，久疾羸顿，遂著《祠享仪》以示后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164109_comment'></div>而某年之与病，与郑适同，遂感而为此，将使子孙奉而行之，非敢传于外也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164109_comment'></div>若其岁时之享，以新仪从事，虽甚疲老，敢不自力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164109_comment'></div>他日朝廷颁下家祭礼，自当谨遵定制云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164109_comment'></div>时熙宁庚戌岁十月十五日，北京望宸阁序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1164109_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《压沙寺梨》诗。<span id='poem_sentence_3_496372'>铃斋长寂得吏隐，便是道家虚白堂。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496372_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496372'></div><div id='poem_title_496376_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496376'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496376'>处暗频惊掷夜光，千金高价恨难偿。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496376'>蟠桃入口知仙味，钧奏醒魂认帝乡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496376'>辩解重围思亹亹，战逢强阵怯堂堂。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496376'>怀归自是衰疲甚，不为吾刚挫旧肠。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496376_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496376'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496376_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496377' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496377?labeling=true' target='_blank'>又次韵答</a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496377")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_496377_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496377'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496377'>故人怜旧政，褒惜一何深。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496377'>营葺推勤治，优闲称道心。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496377'>池台资胜事，风月入高吟。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496377'>酒户虽难角，诗盟已屡寻。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496377'>词豪甘自屈，气锐敢轻侵。<div id='poem_sentence_4_496377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_496377'>奇变云霞烂，冥搜海岳阴。<div id='poem_sentence_5_496377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_496377'>暄和生嶰律，淡泊寄陶琴。<div id='poem_sentence_6_496377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_496377'>但愧衰聋耳，安能别大音。<div id='poem_sentence_7_496377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_496377'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_496377_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_496377'><span class='label'>按：</span>以上《安阳集》卷一五<br /></div><div id='poem_note_496377_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏二年乞移邢相州札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏二年乞移邢相州二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏二年乞移邢相州三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏二年乞移邢相州四札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1070&endYear=1070')">1070年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《答诏问河北事》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163934' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163934' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163934?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答诏问河北事<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁三年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1070年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163934")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163934_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163934'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163934'>此见陛下临御以来，忧边求治，日谨一日，居安虑危，思患预防之深意也，天下幸甚！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163934_comment'></div>然臣窃谓国家自景德岁与狄人讲和，边鄙无事，而于御备之计，未尝不以河朔为急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163934_comment'></div>至于守臣将吏，亦皆尽一时之选；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163934_comment'></div>其在任者，唯以练士卒、利器械、修城垒、治楼橹为职业，往往曲生新意，自衒能绩，以求胜取名者多矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163934_comment'></div>积此六十馀年，治葺之功，可谓坚固犀利，数倍景德之前矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163934_comment'></div>去年秋，偶以地震、水灾颓圮处，多赖朝廷究心，随已复故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163934_comment'></div>唯是霸州、信安军数处，以功料稍大，经冬息役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163934_comment'></div>今则兵力已集，土场尽出，不三数月间，亦见成就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163934_comment'></div>臣窃谓平时守备，与用兵御贼，急缓之势，固有不同，盖平时守备则当为之有渐，使不劳而易集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163934_comment'></div>况兵法曰「百楼不攻」，今河朔诸城待敌之具，何止百楼哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163934_comment'></div>而朝旨令十分营葺外，更以三分木植，为之准备，是过计也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163934_comment'></div>且贼至城下，则城内公私所有一木一石，皆可为城守之用，较之三分之备，不亦多乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163934_comment'></div>夫以平时守备，而为用兵御贼之计，臣恐财用先屈，而民力不胜其敝矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163934_comment'></div>臣愿朝廷加意选择一路守臣、将官，若寖得其人，则不在日加约束，月降号令，自然备预之事，益以修举也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163934_comment'></div>诏旨谓「畜马虽众而未精」者，臣睹近年朝廷讲求马政，最为首务，河南、河北分置牧使，以总治牧事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163934_comment'></div>又各有干当公事官三数员，更出巡视，编降新制，条目甚多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163934_comment'></div>臣愿朝廷责以岁年，则可见其效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163934_comment'></div>诏旨谓「堤防决坏，沟洫湮废」者，自去秋黄河决溢，恩、深等州悉被水患，朝廷累遣近臣，与都水监官员经度，已于二股河进约，分减大河之势，西治生堤，以防漫溢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163934_comment'></div>臣亦尝以众议未一，辄有论列，已蒙朝廷遣司马光等集议条奏，事已施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163934_comment'></div>若得向去大河水势均调，于今冬来春，自可再图其便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163934_comment'></div>诏旨谓「赋歛不节，徭役无时，民力困于累年，军储匮于列郡」，此见陛下轸及一道生灵罹此重困，思欲慰安抚养，俾尽适再生之路，甚大幸也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163934_comment'></div>臣窃见本路今夏蚕麦尽登，流庸渐复，此乃上天垂鉴陛下旰昃忧民之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163934_comment'></div>乘此之时，臣固愿陛下深思邦本之重，责臣与诸路守帅专务宽恤，凡守御之事悉令渐为之备，无得烦劳，使其疮痏日安，生业加厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163934_comment'></div>纵遇边陲有警，不得已而取之，则民力可胜而乐输于公上矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163934_comment'></div>矧狄人大势少衰，固惜盟好，制胜之道，亦当先料敌情，不可亟自纷更，翻令虏所窥测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163934_comment'></div>至若军政之弛张，则朝廷方下教阅新法，诸路皆谨于奉行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163934_comment'></div>将吏之能否，则臣常加体访，茍有不职，即当具迹状以闻，不敢懈也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163934_comment'></div>出入之险易，则河朔地皆平坦，别无障塞，虽有溏泊之阻，而盛冬冰合，或可平度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163934_comment'></div>又定、保州、广信、安肃军等处，皆旁接西山，川口平阔，是从来北虏大兵出入之地，不可遮限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163934_comment'></div>当用兵之际，或先据险要，或设奇邀击，此皆系临时将略，不可预言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163934_comment'></div>守御之利害，则臣前论颇详，不敢烦述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163934_comment'></div>虽然，臣仰膺圣谕丁宁如此，谨当力疾自勉，夙夜究访，管见或有所得，容臣继以条上，不敢遽然塞命，妄进瞽言，以误陛下倚任询采之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163934_comment'></div>无任兢惶待罪之至。</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_1163934'></div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1163934_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《祭崔公孺比部文》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十四。）</span><div id='poem_1164188' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164188' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164188?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭崔公孺比部文<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164188")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164188_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164188'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164188'>维熙宁四年岁次辛亥，某月某日，具官某谨以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故崔君比部九哥之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164188_comment'></div>余初及冠，作婿君门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164188_comment'></div>君时妙年，德性已尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164188_comment'></div>不事彫琢，归乎质浑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164188_comment'></div>博览经史，富于艺文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164188_comment'></div>耻在荫籍，思同后群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164188_comment'></div>射策不偶，遂遗世纷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164188_comment'></div>西竺大法，南京秘源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164188_comment'></div>旁逮庄、老，虚无之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164188_comment'></div>沉酣贯穿，洞其本根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164188_comment'></div>顾视轩冕，淡如浮云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164188_comment'></div>勉而为吏，非志所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164188_comment'></div>粗以庇族，仁风是敦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164188_comment'></div>间常诣我，情均弟昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164188_comment'></div>酒会欢密，诗豪放奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164188_comment'></div>时擿道奥，开聋破昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164188_comment'></div>益我多矣，如莸附薰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164188_comment'></div>余视君为，期诸古人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164188_comment'></div>如何奄忽，遽罹大屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164188_comment'></div>善良至此，天也宁论！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164188_comment'></div>泣驰使指，奠酹一樽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164188_comment'></div>君乎来歆，惟灵者魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164188_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1164188_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月</a>　二月，韩琦任职河北已二年，乞邢、相一郡。得改永兴军节度使再任。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《北京辞免加节再任札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《北京辞免加节再任第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163856' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163856' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163856?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京辞免加节再任第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163856")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163856_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163856'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163856'>臣近上章，辞免加恩再任，乞如前请，就移邢、相一郡，伏蒙圣慈降诏不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163856_comment'></div>君命虽严，臣诚当审，有不敢免，势难复陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163856_comment'></div>其合必辞，辄罄愚说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163856_comment'></div>伏念臣自解政柄，曾不得少均劳逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163856_comment'></div>连当西北重寄，首尾五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163856_comment'></div>今守邺都，幸越再岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163856_comment'></div>久疾衰惫，日不能支，所以力丐闲州，稍图治养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163856_comment'></div>陛下不以驽蹇疲顿，谓可胜任，一遣使指，三降诏谕，丁宁开晓，欲其必从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163856_comment'></div>臣窃思之，臣老病加剧，屡以诚诉，陛下未加轸恻，且使再司留钥，不过勉强颠踣，负愧犹浅；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163856_comment'></div>若加恩换节，则理不可当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163856_comment'></div>盖臣之委质，惟上所使，岂有先推宠典，然后期以受命？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163856_comment'></div>事君若此，臣独何颜！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163856_comment'></div>况臣名品已重，分量已溢，辞隆戒满，尚恐招悔，更兹叨窃，其实难处，臣所以义当坚避，必得请而后已也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163856_comment'></div>伏望陛下俯回鉴照，特追新渥，许仍旧节，俾之再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163856_comment'></div>徇一夫必至之恳，全老臣自处之分，免隳素节，期报大恩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1163856_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《北京辞免加节再任第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163857' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163857' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163857?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京辞免加节再任第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163857")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163857_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163857'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163857'>臣近再上劄子，辞免恩命，乞仍旧节，俾之再任，伏蒙圣慈特降诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163857_comment'></div>血恳已殚，宸慈未谅，敢冒诛窜，终期开允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163857_comment'></div>窃念臣本以婴缠久疾，不堪剧事，幸兹再岁，辄以诚请，觊得闲僻之地，少安衰朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163857_comment'></div>天高听远，不能感动，而乃特加恩典，委以再任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163857_comment'></div>臣既屡辞不获，更不敢以病躯自顾，愿效犬马，虽卒致僵仆，无所憾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163857_comment'></div>亦望陛下推父母之爱，委曲全护，无使臣尽瘁许国，而晚涉邀宠之迹，亟追换节之命，不为收汗之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163857_comment'></div>则授受之间，上下两得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163857_comment'></div>此圣语所谓君使臣以礼，而臣事君以忠也。</div><div id='poem_sentence_7_1163857_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《纳北京再任加恩告敕并支赐申状》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1164009' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164009' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164009?labeling=true' target='_blank'>纳北京再任加恩告敕并支赐申状</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164009")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164009_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164009'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164009'>近蒙降到敕告一道，改授永兴军节度使、判大名府，令再任，并递中承领得支赐中书劄子一道，寻并牒送大名府于左藏库寄纳，具劄子辞免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164009_comment'></div>今月六日，蒙赐诏书，已允所乞，并别降到敕一道令再任，已祗受讫者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164009_comment'></div>右，具如前，所有上件加恩敕告，并支赐中书劄子各一道，令差随行使臣奉职张世昌赴中书投纳，谨具状申中书门下，谨录状上。</div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1164009_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年2月15日</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《辛亥二月十五日》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_496378' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496378' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496378?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辛亥二月十五日</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年2月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496378")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496378_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496378'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496378'>倏忽韶光一半过，寒威犹尚压暄和。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496378'>故摧春色欢终减，屡失花期日旋那。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496378'>病骨不禁风料峭，衰悰难遏醉吟哦。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496378'>凭栏更为芳菲惜，重取轻苫拥旧科。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496378_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496378'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496378_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《辛亥寒食》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_496379' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496379' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496379?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辛亥寒食</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_496379_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496379'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496379'>寒食春城是处花，唐贤诗好此难加。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496379_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496379'>柳眉拖雾舒还皱，日脚萦云绽复遮。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496379_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496379'>扢抓喜随膏雨解<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>，鞦韆闲任䌽绳斜。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496379_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496379'>芳辰只愧樽前淡，妓版停歌不振牙。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496379_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496379'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496379_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_496379'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_2_496379_0'>⑴ 自注：自去冬雪后至此方雨，农人谓之解扢抓。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_496379_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《清明会压沙寺》诗。<span target='_blank'>清明会压沙寺</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", id='poem_sentence_0_496380'>时节清明府事閒，压沙高会敞禅关。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496380_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496380'>妓歌沈席摧莺舌<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：不听乐。）</span>，花影摇樽衒粉颜。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496380_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496380'>春色满添膏泽后，人心和入醉游间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496380_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496380'>坐中尤觉风来好，白雪飞香混博山。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496380_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496380'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496380_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《同赏梨花》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十六。《安阳集编年笺注》有《同赏梨花》同题诗二首，此为其中一首，首句为“兴福梨珍号素封”）</span><div id='poem_496381' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496381' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496381?labeling=true' target='_blank'>同赏梨花</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496381")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496381_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496381'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496381'>蝶舞只疑残靥坠，月明唯觉异香浓。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496381'>寻春已恨来伤晚，莫厌频挥潋滟钟。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496381_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496381'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496381_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《同赏梨花·又一阕》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_496383' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496383' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496383?labeling=true' id='poem_sentence_0_496383'>修禊园林枕御津，宴亭轩豁足娱宾。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496383_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496383'>羲皇治世舒长日，昆阆仙风烂熳春。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496383_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496383'>脱俗且将诗送酒<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：不听乐。）</span>，纵吟须仗笔争神。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496383_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496383'>会馀俯仰皆陈迹，不醉山阴定笑人。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496383_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_1163769' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163769?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京河决待罪表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年7月7日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163769")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163769_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163769'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163769'>臣某言：大河所次，全魏居冲，茍先备之不严，固守臣之常咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163769_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣衰疲日甚，寄任过优，虽驽力之强扶，实病心之久耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163769_comment'></div>惟兹经渎，爰设巨防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163769_comment'></div>于旧而无用之间，失预作不虞之计，一罹淫雨，遂致横流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163769_comment'></div>矧此属寮，率皆尽瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163769_comment'></div>于耳目之难及，素倚攸司；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163769_comment'></div>在几案之所勤，日常不暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163769_comment'></div>悉由臣恬无远虑，昏不过忧，早图营缮之方，上轸宵旰之念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163769_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下申明彝宪，训饬多方，不徇一臣之私恩，而屈四海之公论，特加窜黜，以谢伤痍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163769_comment'></div>其本府通判、职官等，从来实不关预，抹溢后来，皆奔走救捍，备见夙夜用心，乞并从宽贷，臣独甘重责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163769_comment'></div>无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163769_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: target='_blank'>祭致政学士赵君子渊文<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年八月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164189'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164189'>维熙宁四年岁次辛亥，八月癸丑朔某日，具官某谨遣三班奉职、随行指使张世昌，以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于故致政学士赵君子渊之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164189_comment'></div>呜呼！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164189_comment'></div>仆与君交，心照莫二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164189_comment'></div>论契之深，同门之婿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164189_comment'></div>在明道初，禁林并试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164189_comment'></div>联陟道山，日亲高谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164189_comment'></div>直则同舍，分则同气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164189_comment'></div>譬若骥騄，方驾平地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164189_comment'></div>欲骋千里，自当齐至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164189_comment'></div>如何迟速，半涂而异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164189_comment'></div>君知命者，未始较计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164189_comment'></div>嗟君之才，畜不大施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164189_comment'></div>历殿藩府，所在循吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164189_comment'></div>晚求西台，亟谢君事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164189_comment'></div>惟洛之都，有完者第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164189_comment'></div>方期优游，遂我高志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164189_comment'></div>不虞安休，乃失颐卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164189_comment'></div>使人远来，谕我疾势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164189_comment'></div>骇而驰医，往道勤意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164189_comment'></div>医才及门，而君已逝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164189_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164189_comment'></div>年踰七十，寿足为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164189_comment'></div>诸子宦达，实昌而炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164189_comment'></div>进扬令名，退绝纤累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164189_comment'></div>君之始终，可谓无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164189_comment'></div>而余悲者，义切亲懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164189_comment'></div>声颜永绝，翰墨徒秘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164189_comment'></div>绋不亲执，奠不躬致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164189_comment'></div>临风长号，涕泗交坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164189_comment'></div>惟凭一介，具此薄祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164189_comment'></div>冥冥有知，为我来暨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164189_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1164189_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年8月15日</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《中秋饮散始微见月》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十六。）</span><div id='poem_496401'
