target='_blank'>判大名府三年乞闲郡第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163760")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163760_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163760'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163760'>臣某言：窃以骥老而责千里，固何益以驰驱；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163760_comment'></div>鼯技之有五能，已自殚于短拙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163760_comment'></div>辄披诚而取喻，觊恤隐以推慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163760_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣素乏材谋，粗持忠朴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163760_comment'></div>惟幸三朝之际会，寖叨极品之光荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163760_comment'></div>自移守于邺都，适三周于岁律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163760_comment'></div>事既剧而心虽欲勉，病所困而力不能堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163760_comment'></div>今复风入四支，日加挛痛；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163760_comment'></div>气留两胁，内极攻戕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163760_comment'></div>盖臣享厚禄而不知踰涯，故天与沉疴，而俾以自省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163760_comment'></div>思茍逃于凶折，当上叩于聪仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163760_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下隆天覆之恩，念云从之旧，矜其久疾，贷以馀生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163760_comment'></div>许辞将相之重权，就易麾符于僻郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163760_comment'></div>高明少抑，免深鬼瞰之忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163760_comment'></div>钟漏向残，犹有夜行之愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163760_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1163760_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《判大名府三年乞闲郡第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163761' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163761' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163761?labeling=true' target='_blank'>判大名府三年乞闲郡第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163761")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163761_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163761'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163761'>臣某言：近以久疾，乞辞将相重权，就移僻郡，伏蒙圣慈特赐诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163761_comment'></div>臣诚已至，本深知分以辞劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163761_comment'></div>君听未回，尚惜推恩而赐可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163761_comment'></div>荐敷危悃，决俟俞音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163761_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣四纪逢亨，三朝窃宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163761_comment'></div>良自无功而厚禄，遂罹多病以久衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163761_comment'></div>一辞东府之钧衡，再领北门之筦钥，莫非强勉，以济剧烦，心虽云劳，力有不逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163761_comment'></div>然犹徘徊岁月，偃息朝昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163761_comment'></div>庶几小康，翻觉筋骸之愈惫；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163761_comment'></div>若曰微效，讫无毫发之足称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163761_comment'></div>虽恃圣仁，实虞阴谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163761_comment'></div>茍尚留于要地，将不保于馀生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163761_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下特轸孤臣，曲全旧物，许罢貂蝉之秩，并收旄钺之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163761_comment'></div>简静小邦，俾获亲于医药；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163761_comment'></div>支离瘁质，或未至于膏肓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163761_comment'></div>愿垂从欲之慈，敢忘糜躯之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163761_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1163761_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《判大名府三年乞闲郡第三表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163762' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163762' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163762?labeling=true' target='_blank'>判大名府三年乞闲郡第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163762")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163762_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163762'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163762'>臣某言：伏蒙圣慈以臣上表，乞早俞前请，就移邢、相一郡，特赐诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163762_comment'></div>疾虽自力，盖当止于不能；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163762_comment'></div>听未及卑，尚莫从其所欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163762_comment'></div>惧即填于沟壑，敢再犯于雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163762_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣生对盛世，早尘显服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163762_comment'></div>惟虑国家之难报，岂知才智之易殚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163762_comment'></div>逮处近司，寖罹多病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163762_comment'></div>向辞上宰，本图劳逸之稍均；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163762_comment'></div>暨尹别京，翻困剧烦之滋甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163762_comment'></div>矧流年之三易，当疾疹之久攻，庶务纠纷，一身勉强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163762_comment'></div>生有涯而足怆，神太用以几亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163762_comment'></div>若将相之荣，茍坐恬于尸素；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163762_comment'></div>则寒暑之疹，将遽及于膏肓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163762_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下感动至仁，矜全旧物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163762_comment'></div>回圣后烛幽之照，察老臣知退之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163762_comment'></div>许上戎旃，免司留钥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163762_comment'></div>付之闲郡，息肩俾遂于少休；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163762_comment'></div>顾此馀生，没齿难忘于再造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163762_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163762_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《判大名府三年乞闲郡第四表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163763' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163763' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163763?labeling=true' target='_blank'>判大名府三年乞闲郡第四表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163763")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163763_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163763'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163763'>臣某言：近三上表，愿上戎旃，免司留钥，付之闲郡，俾遂少休，伏蒙圣慈特降诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163763_comment'></div>罔功纳节，以疾请麾，三尝自陈，一切未许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163763_comment'></div>行恐馀生之莫保，敢干万死以有闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163763_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣中实枵然，生而戆甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163763_comment'></div>宠荣欲报，勇于遇事而辄为；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163763_comment'></div>筋力既衰，失在知难而未止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163763_comment'></div>比救将颠之质，叠倾必至之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163763_comment'></div>厚禄戒贪，愿止淮南之旄钺；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163763_comment'></div>小藩乞守，免当河朔之喉襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163763_comment'></div>尚未矜从，尤激危惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163763_comment'></div>盖残躯不息，渐归沟壑之为邻；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163763_comment'></div>空食寖深，转暴涓埃之无补。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163763_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下特回天听，俯徇物宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163763_comment'></div>不遗蝼蚁之微情，各任鹪鹏之常分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163763_comment'></div>有民人足以为政，畀支郡以养疴；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163763_comment'></div>虽将相许其辞隆，绝公朝之假宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163763_comment'></div>既完素守，仍息久劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163763_comment'></div>恩施难名，报偿何有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163763_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163763_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《判大名府三年乞闲郡第五表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163764' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163764' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163764?labeling=true' target='_blank'>判大名府三年乞闲郡第五表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163764")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163764_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163764'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163764'>臣某言：近四上表，以久疾不堪剧事，到任已越三年，愿纳麾节，就移邢、相一郡，伏蒙圣慈特降诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163764_comment'></div>病难任剧，职合辞隆，开可不时，颠挤无日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163764_comment'></div>危迫敢殚于血恳，哀怜愿轸于皇情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163764_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣起自孤生，初无远业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163764_comment'></div>禄常过量，宠荣最早于他人；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163764_comment'></div>福不胜灾，疾疹遂缠于今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163764_comment'></div>所以悫还将相之印，力避兵民之权，庶就闲州，以舒瘁质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163764_comment'></div>私计已决，愚诚不移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163764_comment'></div>虽委寄误深，不谓三年之已久；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163764_comment'></div>而衰疲待报，翻嗟一日之为长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163764_comment'></div>矧是戎旃，固非虚器，无功以领，于义未安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163764_comment'></div>使老臣两失于寸心，岂仁主曲全之本意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163764_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下特回天鉴，俯遂物宜，就更麾符，许上旄节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163764_comment'></div>驱驰驽足，免令滨死以未休；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163764_comment'></div>治养残骸，或冀馀生之可保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163764_comment'></div>大恩难状，丹抱奚论。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1163764_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《谢令男忠彦抚谕札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163858' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163858' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163858?labeling=true' target='_blank'>谢令男忠彦抚谕劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1163858_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163858'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163858'>臣今月二十三日，男忠彦奉使契丹过府，具道朝辞日面奉圣旨，令到北京特加抚谕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163858_comment'></div>臣老拙无状，日极衰疲，惟惧旷隳，有孤寄任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163858_comment'></div>岂意陛下不遗旧物，尚赐记存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163858_comment'></div>兼臣男忠彦，才不过人，历事尚浅，亟被选擢，将币虏境，往来由臣治所，众论以为至荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163858_comment'></div>父子遭会圣明，优异如此，惟坚忠孝之大节，少酬天地之殊私。</div><div id='poem_sentence_4_1163858_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏三年乞纳节移邢相札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏三年乞纳节移邢相第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163860' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163860' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163860?labeling=true' target='_blank'>到魏三年乞纳节移邢相第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163860")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163860_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163860'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163860'>臣近三上表，愿纳旄节，就移邢相一郡，伏蒙圣慈特降诏书不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163860_comment'></div>臣窃以父母之视其子，唯疾则为忧；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163860_comment'></div>臣子之事于君，不能而后已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163860_comment'></div>今大名当冲会之地，事务至繁，复兼一路安抚之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163860_comment'></div>而臣抱疾累年，积成沉痼，以至形骸尪瘠，精神耗瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163860_comment'></div>幸而罄此驽劣，已越二年，自度残躯，更难勉强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163860_comment'></div>所以屡倾悃愊，上叩仁圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163860_comment'></div>愿解将相之重，易处闲郡，少期休息，以便医药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163860_comment'></div>而天高听远，尚未有恻然开允之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163860_comment'></div>则是子疾已甚，而父母不为之恤；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163860_comment'></div>臣力不逮，而君上不容其退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163860_comment'></div>非填弃于沟壑，则蒙被于罪诛，必然之理也，不胜夙夜危迫之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163860_comment'></div>伏望陛下推父母忧疾之心，察臣子知止之分，更不赐以诏答，早降俞旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163860_comment'></div>蝼蚁微命，庶几保全；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163860_comment'></div>天地大恩，如何报塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163860_comment'></div>臣无任哀祈激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1163860_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏三年乞纳节移邢相第三札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163861' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163861' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163861?labeling=true' target='_blank'>到魏三年乞纳节移邢相第三劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163861")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163861_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163861'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163861'>臣近四上表，以连年被疾，不堪剧事，愿还旄节，就移邢、相一郡，伏蒙圣慈特降诏答不允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163861_comment'></div>臣便合仰遵训谕，勉效所职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163861_comment'></div>然遇陛下不遗旧老，恩恤素隆，故敢不避重诛，重得申其悃愊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163861_comment'></div>窃念臣犬马之齿，今已六十有五，前去七十，止有五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163861_comment'></div>而宿疹日深，困劣殊甚，桑榆之景，指刻颓落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163861_comment'></div>北都临控冲要，牵强朽拙，已踰考绩之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163861_comment'></div>所以屡剖血诚，冀得一闲僻之地，治养残骸，不使纷冗之务日夕攻戕，枉殄生理，则蝼蚁微命，陛下之再生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163861_comment'></div>若陛下以未至僵仆，本容量力，直俟驽蹇委弃于沟壑之下，始加怜恻，盖无及矣！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163861_comment'></div>伏望稍回圣念，早俞前请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163861_comment'></div>辞意重复，渎过再三，未赐矜从，终难自已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163861_comment'></div>臣无任哀祈激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163861_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏三年乞纳节移邢相第四札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163862' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163862' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163862?labeling=true' target='_blank'>到魏三年乞纳节移邢相第四劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163862")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163862_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163862'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163862'>臣伏奉诏书，以臣久病，乞纳节换郡，蝼蚁之恳，未垂矜照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163862_comment'></div>窃念臣之积疹，稔在睿听，至蒙遣使，近赐传问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163862_comment'></div>谨因其复命，辄再具劄子附闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163862_comment'></div>若其自当要剧，实满三年，衰病之躯，不能勉强，固已详陈之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163862_comment'></div>陛下仁性尧舜，一尘省览，虽北道独臣可倚，犹将哀怜而听其去；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163862_comment'></div>矧方今耆哲俊德任于外者不一，皆可擢以代臣，有足宽陛下北顾之虑，何特强尪劣不堪之馀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163862_comment'></div>窃疑前奏未获上达，故有今诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163862_comment'></div>伏望陛下天地父母，涵育爱恤，察臣前陈危悃，许移邢、相一郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163862_comment'></div>臣之馀生残质，可保与否，系陛下今日德音一发尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163862_comment'></div>虽然，臣决知陛下不忍置臣于不可保之地也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163862_comment'></div>臣无任虔祈激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163862_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163863")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163863_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163863'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163863'>臣近累上表，以久疾不堪剧事，到任已越三年，恳还将相之印，庶就闲州，少安瘁质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163863_comment'></div>伏蒙圣慈特降诏书不允，仍断来章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163863_comment'></div>此见陛下眷倚之意至隆至厚，自顾犬马，何以为报？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163863_comment'></div>然臣孤诚迫切，所诉已烦，窃惟睿明，无幽不烛，而独臣有若未照者，所以不避萧斧之戮，复此披露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163863_comment'></div>伏念臣早辞宰任，得从外补，本觊少均劳逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163863_comment'></div>而迄今首尾六年，连处西北要剧之地，寄责殊重，忧劳日深，宿疹乘之，未尝少宁适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163863_comment'></div>幸而大名之任，已越三期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163863_comment'></div>方朝廷进擢群材，日新百度之际，当得精敏明健之臣，推行恩诏，以济治功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163863_comment'></div>而臣疾病累年，心力殚耗，众务丛委，动觉不能勉强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163863_comment'></div>傥陛下此时俾臣还上旄节，改守邢、相一郡，庶可以亲近医药，完养衰残，岁年之间，或能再备驱策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163863_comment'></div>必若不矜老朽，未许息肩，虽丐请频仍，一切不回天听，俟其职事隳败，昏谬有迹，监司明纠，朝议公行，陛下虽欲救臣，不可及也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163863_comment'></div>上以损陛下不忘旧臣之惠，下以丧愚臣知止易退之节，始终之义，恐非两得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163863_comment'></div>况圣诏谓久劳者当处以逸，陛下既知驭臣之道，理当然矣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163863_comment'></div>岂忍不少假老臣蝼蚁之命，践而行之哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163863_comment'></div>伏望深垂轸察，检会臣累奏，早降俞旨施行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163863_comment'></div>臣以有旨断章，更不敢上表。</div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1163863_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦《到魏三年乞纳节移邢相第六札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163864' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163864' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163864?labeling=true' target='_blank'>到魏三年乞纳节移邢相第六劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163864")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163864_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163864'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163864'>臣近以犬马多病，不堪剧事，愿纳旄节，改治假郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163864_comment'></div>伏蒙圣慈特差入内供奉官李宪赍赐诏书、汤药，曲加抚谕；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163864_comment'></div>矜臣臂痛发作，如要医官陈易简，可即奏来，不令再上文字者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163864_comment'></div>此见陛下覆育之意，过于天地，隆于父母，感极以泣，未知所报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163864_comment'></div>然臣有危切之恳，因得冒闻圣听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163864_comment'></div>窃念臣禀气素劣，宿疹已深，藏府累年未尝宁适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163864_comment'></div>纵烦国医诊视，且非急遽可治之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163864_comment'></div>若得于事少地偏之处，以岁月调养，犹有痊复之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163864_comment'></div>今大名并废外，尚一十五县，民务至冗，河防多虑，使传交驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163864_comment'></div>而臣以衰病之躯，当此烦重，故形骸日悴，精神俱竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163864_comment'></div>况兹勉强，实满三年，此时陛下若不特加恩恻，俾遂息肩，则填弃沟壑，指期可俟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163864_comment'></div>伏望睿明深察，早俞前请，许臣只守本官，就移邢、相一郡，免罹阴谴，尽荷圣仁。</div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1163864_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏三年乞纳节移邢相第七札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163865' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163865' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163865?labeling=true' target='_blank'>到魏三年乞纳节移邢相第七劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163865")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163865_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163865'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163865'>臣近上劄子，以累上表，愿还将相之印，庶就闲州，少安瘁质，乞早降俞旨，伏蒙圣慈特降诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163865_comment'></div>驽力不任，终归毙踣；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163865_comment'></div>危诚屡渎，亦速窜诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163865_comment'></div>惟等死以难逃，幸盖高之或听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163865_comment'></div>伏念臣积气留胁，久成大疴，藏府累年未尝宁适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163865_comment'></div>残躯日以枯瘠，众人之所见知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163865_comment'></div>今岁入夏以来，病已发作，近尝加艾数百，卒无小瘳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163865_comment'></div>大名当国北门，庶务繁总，虽欲勉强，实戕生理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163865_comment'></div>所以累形奏牍，上叩睿仁，冀易闲州，少谐治养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163865_comment'></div>而老臣孤远，虽罄竭肝膈，终未能感动圣衷，夙夜震忧，愈无所措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163865_comment'></div>臣窃见韩绛在邓，以素有先茔之誓，恳乞休退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163865_comment'></div>陛下虽未即如请，亟命移领许昌，俾从乡里之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163865_comment'></div>况臣守魏，已越三岁，抱疾殊久，大明在上，必无偏照，慈亲之爱，岂有不均？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163865_comment'></div>但恐宵旰所劳，思未及此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163865_comment'></div>伏望陛下念臣虽衰朽无状，然累朝旧物，粗输忠力，直以老病，不能当剧，投诉君父，少加怜察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163865_comment'></div>特依近例，许臣还上节旄，就易邢、相一郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163865_comment'></div>天心从欲，茍贷馀生；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163865_comment'></div>神理害盈，免贻阴谴。</div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1163865_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《北京乞纳节移邢相札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163866' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163866' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163866?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京乞纳节移邢相劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163866")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163866_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163866'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163866'>臣罄剖血诚，不避烦渎天听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163866_comment'></div>念臣早以犬马多疾，久冒宰职，恳求补外，冀便调养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163866_comment'></div>不意连当西北重任，事益烦委。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163866_comment'></div>臣受国恩深，敢不尽力！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163866_comment'></div>奈何臣婴缠宿疹，日甚一日，气攻两胁，发作无时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163866_comment'></div>近复流注手足，右臂艰于举动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163866_comment'></div>去岁藏府直至终冬，尚不坚固，将来入夏，必至转难支持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163866_comment'></div>皆由臣窃禄过优，故身被此灾谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163866_comment'></div>大名处北道襟要，庶务纷冗，自度衰劣，不能勉强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163866_comment'></div>臣已上表，乞纳旄节，改治闲僻之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163866_comment'></div>伏望陛下推天地父母之仁，曲轸旧物，察其老病，不堪剧事，许臣只守本官，就移邢、相一郡，幸其事简，得近医药，俾延残喘，实荷再生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163866_comment'></div>臣无任虔祈激切之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163866_comment'></div>取进止。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1163866_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《故尚书祠部郎中集贤校理致仕赵君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十九。）</span><div id='poem_1164166' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164166' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164166?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故尚书祠部郎中集贤校理致仕赵君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁四年十一月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164166")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164166_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164166'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164166'>熙宁四年夏六月，赵君子渊自管勾西京留司御史台引年得谢，退处于修善坊之私第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164166_comment'></div>未几，病且逾月，度必不起，遽取笔自书，命其子咸以志文属余。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164166_comment'></div>七月二十九日果卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164166_comment'></div>咸亟遣人持其所书，号诉来请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164166_comment'></div>余泣而视之，知子渊所以属余者，以友婿之分，又悉其平生操守施设，使书其实，足信于后世，此奚可辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164166_comment'></div>子渊讳宗道，开封封丘人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164166_comment'></div>给事中、赠司空贺之子，赠左卫上将军正德之孙，赠左屯卫将军瑨之曾孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164166_comment'></div>司空在仁宗朝，更任显要，为时名臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164166_comment'></div>子渊幼警拔自立，力学能文，屡举进士不利，始从父任补将作监主簿，监舒州盐酒税，汝州稻田务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164166_comment'></div>执政荐其材，召试学士院，得馆阁校勘，改集贤校理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164166_comment'></div>累迁大理寺丞，主宗正寺簿，通判河阳，以太子中允同判登闻鼓院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164166_comment'></div>丁司空忧，服除，同知太常礼院，出知宣州，改太常丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164166_comment'></div>子渊为政，知所先后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164166_comment'></div>下车首兴学校，招广生员，起市桥屋，取资以充其用，又选良师以讲劝之，人人乐于为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164166_comment'></div>宣民素尚巫鬼，病者不医，以事祈禳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164166_comment'></div>子渊为择方书之验者，刻石示之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164166_comment'></div>复出公帑缗为药剂，以时拯救，民脱横夭，因变其俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164166_comment'></div>泾邑豪刘氏殴死人，厚用赂，冀以死者缘他疾获免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164166_comment'></div>子渊察其奸，卒置于法，吏受赂者悉黥窜之，一郡肃然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164166_comment'></div>岁满，得郭辅之者求代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164166_comment'></div>始，辅之以所迓兵舟不如意，及至郡，会子渊居式假不能出，遂大忿恚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164166_comment'></div>子渊去，搜剔玼累，穷极纤悉，无所得，因摭疑似之事，缘饰以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164166_comment'></div>子渊不堪其诬，即奏辨之，朝廷为置司推究，事尽白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164166_comment'></div>犹以奏牍中一二语差，在律，以身事诉，止坐杖，法官深文，以诈不实论，夺一官，落职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164166_comment'></div>既而御史中丞鱼公周询极陈其冤，得复中允，监亳州酒税，物论犹不平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164166_comment'></div>继得今太子少师赵公槩暨两禁台宪官十数人交章荐雪，始还官与职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164166_comment'></div>知宗正丞事、兼判登闻鼓院，知滨州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164166_comment'></div>会河决六塔，郡界有遥堤，监司欲决以酾其流，子渊执不可，虽督之愈急愈不夺，民赖以全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164166_comment'></div>又立保法检制奸盗，比户以安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164166_comment'></div>代归，为群牧判官，迁太常博士、权开封府推官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164166_comment'></div>嘉祐四年，京西大饥，转运使请择列郡守以济灾馑，子渊被选知颍州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164166_comment'></div>子渊于救荒之术，素已经虑，赈给存劳，无所不至，寇盗屏息，流庸以复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164166_comment'></div>俄权三司户部判官，出知晋州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164166_comment'></div>时营奉永昭，方中诸郡皆严期赋民，物价翔而费益倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164166_comment'></div>子渊独取帑中物，官自营致，使民徐偿之，境内寂然无所扰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164166_comment'></div>民既饱其德惠，相率走阙下请留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164166_comment'></div>朝廷知其能，就徙陕州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164166_comment'></div>晋人号呼遮道，子渊不得前，为驻留弥日，得间道驰去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164166_comment'></div>陕素以土厚，水脉深，不为井，唯橐山泉贯城中以资众用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164166_comment'></div>岁雨数坏堤，渠绝流，则民汲于永定涧，既远且劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164166_comment'></div>子渊曰：「今边州岩堡，往往皆井，此平地反不可耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164166_comment'></div>亟选匠者相庐巷便民之所，浚三十井，皆未数仞得美泉，民歌喜之未足，与甘棠同永其思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164166_comment'></div>子渊自博士四迁尚书祠部郎中，知蔡州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164166_comment'></div>郡城北直门东西有二桥，跨汝水上，岸高峻，非得巨材不能立，数岁辄坏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164166_comment'></div>每一易，费民赀几万缗，俚谚目为「害民桥」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164166_comment'></div>子渊恤其久弊，思力去之，募工取确山石，先易其东者，众论嚣然难之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164166_comment'></div>子渊不听，至闻于朝，有诏问状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164166_comment'></div>子渊别白利害，保于必成，朝廷从之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164166_comment'></div>已而桥成，患绝，为利无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164166_comment'></div>子渊自年及从心，日思退去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164166_comment'></div>会秩满，恳求西台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164166_comment'></div>既得请，须期岁馀，新第完美，日谈笑其间，无复以轩冕为意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164166_comment'></div>未踰时即还君事，方且放怀林泉，以造羲皇之域，而天啬遐福，遽夺之年，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164166_comment'></div>子渊性方重，不妄进止，外嶷嶷若不可犯，而内极乐易，即之益温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164166_comment'></div>与人交，笃于风谊，澹泊寡欲，至老无声色之惑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164166_comment'></div>为政详敏，得其纲要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164166_comment'></div>当事剧讼挐，他人虽劳精竭虑不能判者，子渊视若閒暇，处之无不中理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164166_comment'></div>善笔札，长于诗弈，公退必引宾属以此为乐，其他不好也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164166_comment'></div>庆历中，杜正献公、范文正公与诸贤以忠义并进，天子方虚心仰成，诸公亦锐于为报，而俱知子渊之才，未及荐擢，为侥倖者所沮，相继罢去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164166_comment'></div>子渊义之所激，时上书开陈得失，当涂者闻而恶之，故辅之因得希合奇中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164166_comment'></div>事虽获辨，而淹回者十年，不得乘时奋其所长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164166_comment'></div>子渊亦明于义命，居常泰然，未尝少动其心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164166_comment'></div>事二亲孝，执丧过毁，几不能生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164166_comment'></div>同宗五世族大，爱周内外，疏属孤无依者，必收鞠成人，为毕婚嫁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164166_comment'></div>先茔在封丘，地颇卑下，会邻有葬者，穿地未及寻而泉已出，子渊视之大惊曰：「近岁京师雨水多，沮洳使然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164166_comment'></div>吾亲葬此，岂得安耶」？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164166_comment'></div>于是专意改卜，卒得地于伊阙之府下村，遂迁祖考二世之丧以安厝之，决谋居洛，以便子孙之奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164166_comment'></div>前后奏疏，论说时事，多见采纳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164166_comment'></div>如与皇族结亲，必取三代告身按验，以绝富民妄冒之弊；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1164166_comment'></div>经科增对大义；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1164166_comment'></div>弛茶禁通商；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1164166_comment'></div>流外官不为县令；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1164166_comment'></div>编论政体书，资训鉴之益，皆自子渊发之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1164166_comment'></div>子渊年七十三，娶崔氏，尚书工部侍郎立之女，封安平县君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1164166_comment'></div>事舅姑尽孝，睦宗族尽勤，柔懿之行，亲党称之，先子渊而亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1164166_comment'></div>五男：长曰随，将作监主簿；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1164166_comment'></div>次未名，俱早世；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1164166_comment'></div>次鼎，太子中舍、知江阴军江阴县；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1164166_comment'></div>次咸，大理寺丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1164166_comment'></div>次济，太子中允、权发遣淮南同提点刑狱公事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1164166_comment'></div>皆谨蹈门法，以材自奋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1164166_comment'></div>而咸向任三司编修令式，恳请宰邑河南，以便亲养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1164166_comment'></div>子渊疾，得朝夕省侍，奉遗语，干后事，罔不如素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1164166_comment'></div>三女：长适尚书屯田员外郎张仲松，次适尚书比部员外郎吕昌晖，次适赞善大夫张德源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1164166_comment'></div>以其年十一月五日，诸子举子渊之丧，葬于司空之兆次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1164166_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_85_1164166'>夫惟有才，始可言命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1164166_comment'></div>吾蕴有馀，用焉弗罄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1164166_comment'></div>系偶不偶，命也谁竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1164166_comment'></div>己或无有，奚取命證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1164166_comment'></div>噫嘻子渊，其才孰肩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1164166_comment'></div>畜不大发，匪命胡然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1164166_comment'></div>少施郡治，功畴与先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1164166_comment'></div>进平退勇，始终茂焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1164166_comment'></div>伊洛之间，地环胜势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1164166_comment'></div>既安祖考，遂我素志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1164166_comment'></div>今兹卜宅，又从而竁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1164166_comment'></div>敦椁虽藏，令名不閟。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1164166_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1071&endYear=1071')">1071年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《故太常博士周君墓志铭》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷四十九。）</span><div id='poem_1164167' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164167' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164167?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故太常博士周君墓志铭<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁五年正月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1071年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164167")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164167_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164167'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164167'>太常博士周君，熙宁四年十一月二十五日以疾卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164167_comment'></div>其子尚书屯田郎中革，号诉于余曰：「革尝从事于幕府，而先君素游门下，今不幸弃孝养，将卜明年正月二十六日，葬于相州安阳县感化乡祖茔之次，得公一二言以铭其墓，存殁之荣也」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164167_comment'></div>余安得以辞？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164167_comment'></div>君讳孝恭，字宥之，其先真定府藁城人，四世祖徙于赵郡之平棘，今为平棘人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164167_comment'></div>父文举，博学善推步，有人伦之识，以长子尚书比部郎中孝孙登朝，累赠卫尉卿，尝谓比部君他日当自取美宦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164167_comment'></div>君次子也，而曰：「汝虽不及禄仕，乃吾保家之主」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164167_comment'></div>后皆果然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164167_comment'></div>君幼聪警，尽得其父学，至于天文、地理、阴阳、谶纬之书，无不究习，臻其奥妙，而未尝辄言也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164167_comment'></div>累应明经，不中第，感父昔言，遂忘怀轩冕，以恬晦自高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164167_comment'></div>平居接高僧，从善友，相与研究内典，辨析精义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164167_comment'></div>于是禅宗、律学，焕然大通，持此为乐，终老不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164167_comment'></div>晚好道家之言，益自明悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164167_comment'></div>天资仁恕，不害生物，每出衢路，见贫弱可怜者，必尽所有以济之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164167_comment'></div>而自处俭薄，虽资用不给，怡怡如也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164167_comment'></div>事比部兄极于悌顺，与之治生业，营室居，不惮寒暑，卒能成就，推而不有，其后诸侄皆蒙赖焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164167_comment'></div>与人言，务尽诚悫，义主规劝，闻者欣服之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164167_comment'></div>都官君奉养至孝，闻听所悉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164167_comment'></div>顷自河北监牧使擢提点本路刑狱公事，以职在巡按，时去庭闱，恳辞不就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164167_comment'></div>已而君得疾，衣不解带，朝夕省侍，访医药，事祈禳，无所不至，卒弗获验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164167_comment'></div>然享年八十有一，在人子之心，犹为不足，质于五福，几得其全，斯亦积善之效也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164167_comment'></div>君始以都官君登朝，援明堂恩，授大理评事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164167_comment'></div>英庙登极，迁光禄寺丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164167_comment'></div>治平郊恩，改秘书省著作佐郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164167_comment'></div>今上即位，转太子中允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164167_comment'></div>都官君恩赐五品服，又回授之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164167_comment'></div>两迁太常博士，皆以郊飨推恩也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164167_comment'></div>次子鼎未仕，一女适保州司理参军毛楷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164167_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_1164167'>天相善人，宜乎得寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164167_comment'></div>子极孝养，斯为有后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164167_comment'></div>节行之懿，孰传之久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164167_comment'></div>吾铭而藏，是谓不朽。</div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1164167_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　韩琦在大名府安抚使任上，上七章请邢、相一郡，不许。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《北京谢再任表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163765' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163765' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163765?labeling=true' target='_blank'>北京谢再任表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163765")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163765_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163765'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163765'>此表又见《祠部集》卷一五，乃强至代笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163765_comment'></div>本书收入强至文中，此处存目删文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163765_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1163765_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《御河舟中》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_496410' class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496410_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496410'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496410'>过虑先河备，轻舟造惬山。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496410_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496410'>惊鸥情自动，流水意长闲。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496410_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496410'>村落多丰外，寒温不定间。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496410_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496410'>如何援民溺，搔首只空还。<div id='poem_title_496411' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496411?labeling=true' target='_blank'>视河惬山</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496411")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496411_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496411'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496411'>河决金堤在汉成，曾推延世此经营。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496411_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496411'>安人为惬当时意，立事因垂不朽名。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496411_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496411'>谁凿故山酾御水，却通新漕入都城。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496411_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496411'>一疏一塞俱称利，暂访遗踪岂易评。<div ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年1月15日</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《元宵席上》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_496413' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496413' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496413?labeling=true' target='_blank'>元宵席上</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496413")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496413_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496413'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496413'>灯烛森森万象罗，彻宵车马罢谁何。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496413'>追人好月婵娟满，带雪轻寒料峭多。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496413'>佳节俯从河沴寝，群心俄逐诏音和<span class='inlineComment2'>（自注：得旨放灯。）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496413_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_1164165' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1164165' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1164165?labeling=true' target='_blank'>故尚书比部员外郎崔君墓志铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164165")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164165_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164165'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164165'>崔君象之，有道君子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164165_comment'></div>余妻虽象之之姊，然其相友也以贤，而不以亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164165_comment'></div>今之云亡，其子振孙等以墓有铭，哀号驰诉，属余以辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164165_comment'></div>余固知象之者，其可不铭？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164165_comment'></div>象之，讳公孺，后魏清河大房七兵尚书休之后，今为开封鄢陵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164165_comment'></div>曾祖周度，仕周，佐兖帅慕容彦超幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164165_comment'></div>帅叛，以大义切责，遇害，赠秘书少监。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164165_comment'></div>祖汝砺，以父死节，补右班殿直，赠尚书兵部侍郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164165_comment'></div>父立，为世名臣，终尚书工部侍郎，赠礼部尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164165_comment'></div>象之幼简重有高识，喜学，善属文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164165_comment'></div>始以父任补将作监主簿，耻在荫籍，欲自取进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164165_comment'></div>既不利有司，慨然以篆刻之技不足为，遂益究览经史百家之言，至于浮屠老子之书，无不探考，得其渊妙，视富与贵，恬然不能少动其心也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164165_comment'></div>初监许州商税，丁尚书忧，服除，监许州合流镇商税，再监许州商税。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164165_comment'></div>丁所生灵寿县太君严氏忧，服除，时丞相贾魏公镇许，荐知阳翟县事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164165_comment'></div>岁满，签书忠武军节度判官事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164165_comment'></div>用三司奏，都大管勾许、汝州石塘等河催纲，累迁尚书比部员外郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164165_comment'></div>熙宁四年正月十七日，以疾卒，年五十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164165_comment'></div>象之孝悌仁恕，出于天性，母夫人仁寿郡太君冉氏早亡，事尚书与严夫人，朝夕左右，承顺颜色，未尝少懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164165_comment'></div>其居丧也，水浆不入口者累日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164165_comment'></div>及葬，虽盛寒必跣足负土，与庸者杂作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164165_comment'></div>终丧，始复荤茹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164165_comment'></div>兄弟皆盛年物故，孤遗满室，象之极力抚养，不忍去为远官，故仕宦专以庇族为意，不复计较资品高下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164165_comment'></div>居官治民，清约不扰，见有位者，必为陈国家大计，民之疾苦，与夫所知之贤者，冀以行其言而已，未尝自有也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164165_comment'></div>正人佳士，虽未识面，推向不已；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164165_comment'></div>道或不合，虽大权重位，招之不往也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164165_comment'></div>庆历中，仁宗皇帝励精图治，象之乃诣阙上书论十事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164165_comment'></div>其目曰培根本、教宗室、择守宰、求遗逸、资孝治、御英豪、轻赋歛、省冤滞、节浮费、严武备，凡数千言，引据深切，而亦不求人知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164165_comment'></div>亡后，诸子得其稿于楮中，于是人益知夫象之虽在小官，有爱君忧国之心，而自晦其德如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164165_comment'></div>与人交，务尽诚信，以风谊自许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164165_comment'></div>有过失者，必毅然规正，无不畏而为善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164165_comment'></div>周人之急，厚自损刻，而不以为惠也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164165_comment'></div>从事许昌日，官吏断狱误引重比，同幕梁统者惧及于谴，则铨格为废人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164165_comment'></div>象之曰：「持议而误在我」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164165_comment'></div>遂请独当其罚，论者高君之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164165_comment'></div>所居东北隅有亭曰葆光，尚书之所创也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164165_comment'></div>君常处其间，默坐终日，外无一物能婴其虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164165_comment'></div>交游之至，则以文酒为乐，往往忘其鄙吝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164165_comment'></div>与处士孔宁极尤相厚善，每一过从，则闭关谈道，率踰旬不忍别去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164165_comment'></div>素乐闲退，与相知为林泉之约，愿预者辄以籍记之，已而皆背去，其籍为空，象之笑而不怪焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164165_comment'></div>然象之亦为族属所累，未能如其素志，而天又不畀其寿，悲夫！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164165_comment'></div>临终谓诸子曰：「吾神识无纤毫妄乱，来亦我来，去亦我去」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164165_comment'></div>此又见其达性命之深也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164165_comment'></div>其作诗尤工，人多赏其清丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164165_comment'></div>夫人安福县君程氏，某官某之女，柔顺而正，内治以修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164165_comment'></div>男二人：长曰振孙，大理寺丞；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164165_comment'></div>次曰保孙，试将作监主簿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164165_comment'></div>象之教子严而有法，而皆能承训自饬，当嗣其庆云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164165_comment'></div>以某年三月二十一日，葬于郑州新郑县某乡尚书之兆次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164165_comment'></div>铭曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_1164165'>既孝于家，又忠于友，惟德之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164165_comment'></div>富贵纷丽，恬不可诱，惟道之存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164165_comment'></div>死生之际，乱则何有，达性之根。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164165_comment'></div>人虽亡矣，名不朽矣，事著斯文。</div><div id='poem_sentence_51_1164165_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《舟中再赋一阕》<span target='_blank'>祭少师欧阳永叔文<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁五年）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1164190")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1164190_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1164190'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164190'>维熙宁五年岁次壬子，某月某日，具官某谨遣三班奉职、随行李圭，以清酌庶羞之奠，致祭于少师永叔之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164190_comment'></div>惟公之生，粹禀元精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164190_comment'></div>偶圣而出，逢辰以亨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164190_comment'></div>历事三朝，翼登太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164190_comment'></div>大名既遂，大功既成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164190_comment'></div>年未及老，深虞满盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164190_comment'></div>连章得谢，颍第来宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164190_comment'></div>神当畀以福禄，天宜锡之寿龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164190_comment'></div>胡不憖遗，遽尔摧倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164190_comment'></div>此冥理莫得致诘，而天下为之失声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164190_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164190_comment'></div>公之文章，独步当世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164190_comment'></div>子长、退之，伟赡闳肆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164190_comment'></div>旷无拟伦，逮公始继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164190_comment'></div>自唐之衰，文弱无气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164190_comment'></div>降及五代，愈极颓敝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164190_comment'></div>惟公振之，坐还醇粹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164190_comment'></div>复古之功，在时莫二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164190_comment'></div>公虽云亡，其传益贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164190_comment'></div>譬如天衢，森布列纬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164190_comment'></div>海内瞻仰，日高而炽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164190_comment'></div>公之谏诤，务倾大忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164190_comment'></div>在庆历初，职司帝聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164190_comment'></div>颜有必犯，阙无不缝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164190_comment'></div>正路斯辟，奸萌辄攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164190_comment'></div>气劲忘忤，行孤少同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164190_comment'></div>于穆仁庙，诚推至公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164190_comment'></div>孰好孰恶，是焉则从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164190_comment'></div>善得尽纳，治随以隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164190_comment'></div>人畏清议，知时不容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164190_comment'></div>各砺名节，恬乎处躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164190_comment'></div>二十年间，由公变风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1164190_comment'></div>公之功业，其大可记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1164190_comment'></div>屡殿藩垣，所至怀惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1164190_comment'></div>尝尹京邑，沛有馀地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1164190_comment'></div>早践西掖，晚当内制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1164190_comment'></div>凡厥代言，典谟之懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1164190_comment'></div>凡厥出令，风雷其势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1164190_comment'></div>三代炳焉，公辞无愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1164190_comment'></div>枢幄猷为，台衡弼贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1164190_comment'></div>抚御四夷，兵戈不试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1164190_comment'></div>整齐百度，官师咸治。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1164190_comment'></div>服劳一心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1164190_comment'></div>定策二帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1164190_comment'></div>中外以安，神人胥慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1164190_comment'></div>不校谗言，恳求去位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1164190_comment'></div>公之进退，远迈前贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1164190_comment'></div>合既不茍，高惟戒颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1164190_comment'></div>身虽公辅，志则林泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1164190_comment'></div>七十致政，乃先五年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1164190_comment'></div>上惜其去，公祈益坚，卒遂其请，始终克全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1164190_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1164190_comment'></div>余早接公，道同气类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1164190_comment'></div>出处虽殊，趣向何异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1164190_comment'></div>暨忝宰司，日亲高谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1164190_comment'></div>可否明白，襟怀坦易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1164190_comment'></div>事贵穷理，言无饰伪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1164190_comment'></div>或不知公，因罹谤忌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1164190_comment'></div>青蝇好点，白璧奚累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1164190_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1164190_comment'></div>自公还事，心慕神驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1164190_comment'></div>徒凭翰墨，莫挹姿仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1164190_comment'></div>公尝顾我，惠以新诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1164190_comment'></div>虽亟詶答，奈苦衰疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1164190_comment'></div>欲复为问，动已踰时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1164190_comment'></div>忽承<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_65_1164190", 1164190, "Clauses/130/Comments/0")'>讣音</span>，且骇且悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1164190_comment'></div>哀诚孰诉，肝胆几堕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1164190_comment'></div>公之逝矣，世鲜余知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1164190_comment'></div>不如从公，焉用生为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1164190_comment'></div>遐修薄荐，奠公一卮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1164190_comment'></div>魂兮有灵，其来监兹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1164190_comment'></div>尚飨！</div><div id='poem_sentence_71_1164190_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年8月15日</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《壬子中秋对月》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十七。）</span><div id='poem_496431' id='poem_content_1164135'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1164135'>唐相郑国魏公，魏之曲城人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1164135_comment'></div>以命世之才，逢不世出之主，专以仁义之道，切磨规谏，欲俾厥后坐肩唐虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1164135_comment'></div>谓守文之难，过于创业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1164135_comment'></div>帝用其说，不三四年遂兴太平，较其大功，不下房、杜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1164135_comment'></div>大名之学有乡贤堂，盖以故丞相文正王公、忠悯寇公、尚书忠定张公、侍郎王公、崇仪柳公，皆文武钜贤，出吾里中，图其仪形而尊祀之，以起生徒之志，诚盛事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1164135_comment'></div>然唐距本朝为最近，若郑公之德业闳大，超然独出，得不为乡贤之冠乎？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1164135_comment'></div>其可遗哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1164135_comment'></div>余求得其像，建堂于宣圣殿之北，乡贤堂之南，以完其美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1164135_comment'></div>昔成覸曰：「彼丈夫也，我丈夫也，吾何畏彼哉」！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1164135_comment'></div>今夫学者既得良师友，朝夕讲习开益，以进其善；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1164135_comment'></div>又观所图吾里之贤者隆名伟迹，卓然不泯之如此，岂不思曰彼能之，吾反不能哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1164135_comment'></div>亦在乎勉之而已！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1164135_comment'></div>系而为之赞曰：</div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1164135'>猗唐魏公，相于太宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1164135_comment'></div>谏勇贲育，切磨上聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1164135_comment'></div>术则仁义，道惟大中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1164135_comment'></div>尧舜我后，皋夔我躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1164135_comment'></div>遭会真主，言行计从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1164135_comment'></div>引金自况，谓公良工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1164135_comment'></div>以公喻鉴，焕乎吉凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1164135_comment'></div>君如是圣，臣如是忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1164135_comment'></div>宜不期月，亟治成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1164135_comment'></div>高视三代，谁其比隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1164135_comment'></div>惟魏之学，乡贤是崇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1164135_comment'></div>图祀者五，惟德之丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1164135_comment'></div>公实生魏，群贤之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1164135_comment'></div>尊近遗远，教斯未充。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1164135_comment'></div>吾得公像，载敞儒宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1164135_comment'></div>义一为劝，礼增有容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1164135_comment'></div>学者来视，以严以恭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1164135_comment'></div>高山景行，众发其蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1164135_comment'></div>有美魏都，大河注东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1164135_comment'></div>如公之名，滔滔不穷。</div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1164135_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《判大名府再任满乞郡第一表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163766' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163766' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163766?labeling=true' target='_blank'>判大名府再任满乞郡第一表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163766")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163766_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163766'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163766'>臣某言：臣闻陈力不能者止，斯善省躬；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163766_comment'></div>非位而居曰贪，诚为窃禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163766_comment'></div>顾衰骸之难强，加职事之不修，重竭丹愚，终期轸恻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163766_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣材资朽拙，际会休明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163766_comment'></div>十稔近司，愧涓尘之无补；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163766_comment'></div>一身多病，嗟蒲柳之易衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163766_comment'></div>向虽蒙均逸之恩，寻荐易极烦之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163766_comment'></div>惟是北门之重，正居中冀之冲，使传交驰，河防日急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163766_comment'></div>神识已昏，而治纷挐之务，筋力已惫，而躬接应之劳，愈不自胜，其谁见恤！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163766_comment'></div>顷周三岁，屡叩九阍，愿还使节之荣，复守乡邦之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163766_comment'></div>蝼蚁之诚斯至，冕旒之听莫回，黾俛弗安，尪疲孰诉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163766_comment'></div>今兹再任，实满四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163766_comment'></div>战兢而履冰渊，粗能免过；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163766_comment'></div>疾痛而呼父母，岂不加怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163766_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下念犬马之疹日深，闵桑榆之景甚迫，俯矜危恳，特示至仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163766_comment'></div>许旄印之并收，就里闾之差近，俾更偏郡，以养残躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163766_comment'></div>公干之卧漳滨，稍延视息；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163766_comment'></div>子牟之居海上，敢忘朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163766_comment'></div>斯惟洪造之曲成，虽尽馀生之曷报。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163766_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《判大名府再任满乞郡第二表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163767' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163767' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163767?labeling=true' target='_blank'>判大名府再任满乞郡第二表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163767")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163767_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163767'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163767'>臣某言：近上表，以再任实满四年，多病不胜，乞收旄印，就里闾之近，改一偏郡，以养衰残，伏蒙圣慈特赐诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163767_comment'></div>陈久疾以辞烦，盖申前请；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163767_comment'></div>锡温言而垂谕，尚閟俞音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163767_comment'></div>辄恃至仁，再倾危恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163767_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>仗念臣智能甚短，学术尤疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163767_comment'></div>误叨眷遇于三朝，徒守朴忠之一节，自勉当于都会，惟务罄于驽材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163767_comment'></div>疹积于中，实觉不支于往日；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163767_comment'></div>事纷于外，愈知难强于残年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163767_comment'></div>故前后累形于封章，而诚悃未蒙于省察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163767_comment'></div>况忝魏台之寄，四更尧历之新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163767_comment'></div>一道之重，而心不为不劳；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163767_comment'></div>连任于此，而时不为不久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163767_comment'></div>质于常典，率皆受代而有期；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163767_comment'></div>岂兹老臣，独使向隅而无诉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163767_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下推父母之深爱，开日月之至明，垂悯负薪之忧，回照覆盆之下，俾收使节，退守偏州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163767_comment'></div>庶几事简而责轻，少安悴质；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163767_comment'></div>茍得气完而神复，可保馀生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163767_comment'></div>未填沟壑之间，敢忘乾坤之报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163767_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163767_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《判大名府再任满乞郡第三表》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十一。）</span><div id='poem_1163768' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163768' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163768?labeling=true' target='_blank'>判大名府再任满乞郡第三表</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163768")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163768_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163768'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163768'>臣某言：近两上表，以再任满久疾，乞纳旄节，就移近乡一郡，伏蒙圣慈特遣中使赍赐诏书不允者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163768_comment'></div>屡引疾以诉天，愿均劳而易地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163768_comment'></div>难动盖高之听，未推从欲之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163768_comment'></div>罔避谴诛，必期矜允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163768_comment'></div>臣某<span class='inlineComment2'>（中谢。）</span>伏念臣本无他技，偶对圣时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163768_comment'></div>荷恩逾丘岳之崇，报国鲜涓尘之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163768_comment'></div>向解钧衡之重，欲苏犬马之疲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163768_comment'></div>素心忽戾于初终，重寄寻更于西北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163768_comment'></div>昔叨乡郡，优闲才数月之间；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163768_comment'></div>今任别都，荏苒已四年之久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163768_comment'></div>坐感岁时之易失，默伤齿发之寖衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163768_comment'></div>况一支近感于风挛，顾积日可忧于残废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163768_comment'></div>若使尚当冲会，必将遽及膏肓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163768_comment'></div>伏望皇帝陛下察此哀鸣，出于至恳，恤晚涂之甚迫，闵朽质之增羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163768_comment'></div>未遗簪履之微，特轸冕旒之念，趣收印钺，就假麾符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163768_comment'></div>多病不能，愿效汲生之治；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163768_comment'></div>故乡归老，渐希疏傅之行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163768_comment'></div>傥得遂于馀生，敢少忘于再造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163768_comment'></div>臣无任<span class='inlineComment2'>（云云）</span>。</div><div id='poem_sentence_18_1163768_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏四年乞移乡郡札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1072&endYear=1072')">1072年</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《到魏四年乞移乡郡第二札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163868' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163868' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163868?labeling=true' target='_blank'>到魏四年乞移乡郡第二劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1072年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163868")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163868_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163868'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163868'>臣今月二十一日，入内内侍省内东头供奉官、勾当御药院刘有方到府，伏蒙圣慈传宣抚问，以北京地重，藉臣且令在任，不须更上封章者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163868_comment'></div>圣意丁宁，谓犹可任；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163868_comment'></div>病躯勉强，实已不支。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163868_comment'></div>今方拙疹之有加，盖恃至仁而敢诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163868_comment'></div>伏念臣冒荣过量，忧职早衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163868_comment'></div>自西解于帅权，复北膺于阃寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163868_comment'></div>宿疹间作，比岁相仍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163868_comment'></div>大府当冲，无时少暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163868_comment'></div>精神坐耗，皮骨空存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163868_comment'></div>顷因再任以来，通及四年之久，遂申前请，日觊俞音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163868_comment'></div>不谓特走贵珰，亲传天语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163868_comment'></div>陛下之眷诚厚，不许辞烦；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163868_comment'></div>愚臣之意未通，唯知洒泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163868_comment'></div>况臣素餐之咎，阴谴不容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163868_comment'></div>旬日前右髀一支，骤缠风恙，虽火攻亟用，救治稍痊，而疾势不轻，去来未知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163868_comment'></div>若尚婴于冗剧，必随及于废残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163868_comment'></div>臣窃见吕公弼昨帅秦边，以疾请汝，陛下恻然垂允，遽易河桥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163868_comment'></div>既而以所患未平，又求宫观，陛下即除宫使，以便颐养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163868_comment'></div>唯臣久疴已疲，再任已满，前后恳奏，略不能感动圣聪，得非过忤之深，自取疏异？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163868_comment'></div>夙夜惟念，俞不遑处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163868_comment'></div>伏望陛下广无偏之私，推不忍之慈，勿使劳苦而屡以呼天，且矜觳觫而势将就死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163868_comment'></div>早收使节，改治方州，止期岁月之间，浸求医药之效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163868_comment'></div>则白骨更肉，尽自生成；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163868_comment'></div>赤心置人，如何报塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163868_comment'></div>臣无任感天荷圣、哀祈激切之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1163868_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年1月15日</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。韩琦有《癸丑灯夕》诗。<span class='inlineComment2'>（此诗见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷十七。此诗作于神宗熙宁间韩琦判大名府时，但具体时间未详，姑系于此。）</span><div id='poem_496441' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_496441' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/496441?labeling=true' target='_blank'>癸丑灯夕</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年1月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_496441")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_496441_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_496441'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_496441'>争放红蕖燎紫沈，胜游谁肯惜千金。<div id='poem_sentence_0_496441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_496441'>人和更有笙歌助，酒美应无巷陌深。<div id='poem_sentence_1_496441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_496441'>化国光阴方甚永，洞天风物不难寻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_496441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_496441'>如何可致吾民乐，长似熙熙此夜心<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_496441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_496441'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_496441_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_496441'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_496441_0'>⑴ 自笙歌助三字始至下首止，底本原缺，据明刻本、四库本补</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_496441_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年2月</a>　在大名，任大名府知府。二月，韩琦有《答诏问北边事宜》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》附录一《韩琦诗文补编》卷七。）</span><div id='poem_1163935' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163935' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163935?labeling=true' target='_blank'>答诏问北边事宜<span class='inlineComment2'>（熙宁六年二月）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163935")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163935_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163935'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163935'>臣伏蒙圣慈特差入内内侍省东头供奉官、干当内东门司裴昱赍赐臣手诏，以「朝廷通好北虏八十年，近岁以来生事弥甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163935_comment'></div>代北之地，素有定封，而辄开衅端，妄来诉理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163935_comment'></div>比敕官吏，同加按行，虽图籍甚明，而诡辞不伏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163935_comment'></div>今横使复至，意在必得，朕以祖宗盟好之重，固将优容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163935_comment'></div>虏情无厌，势恐未已，万一不测，何以待之？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163935_comment'></div>古人大政，必询故老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163935_comment'></div>卿夙怀忠义，历相三朝，虽尔身在外，乃心罔不在王室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163935_comment'></div>其所以待遇之要，御备之方，密具以闻」。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163935_comment'></div>臣晚年多病，心力耗殚，日欲再乞残骸，保此颓暮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163935_comment'></div>不意陛下以北虏生事，深思预防，计及孤愚，曲有询逮，敢不勉竭衰残，以塞圣问？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163935_comment'></div>臣窃以契丹与中国抗者，盖一百七十馀年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1163935_comment'></div>自石晋割地，并有汉疆，外兼诸戎，益自骄大，在祖宗朝屡尝南牧，极事凶暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1163935_comment'></div>当是时，岂不欲悉天下之力，必与虏角哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1163935_comment'></div>终以爱惜生灵，屈就和好，疆埸有所兴作，深以张皇引惹为戒，以是七十年间，二边之民各安生业，至于老死不知兵革战斗之事，至仁大惠，不可加也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1163935_comment'></div>臣观近年以来，朝廷举事则似不以大敌为恤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1163935_comment'></div>虏人素以久强之势，于我未尝少下，一旦见形生疑，必谓我有图复燕南之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1163935_comment'></div>虽虏主孱而佞佛，岂无强梁宗属，与夫谋臣策士，引先发制人之说，造此衅端？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1163935_comment'></div>故屡遣横使，以争理地界为名，观我应之之实如何耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1163935_comment'></div>所以致虏之疑者，臣试陈其大略：高丽臣属契丹，于朝廷久绝朝贡，向浙路遣人招谕而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1163935_comment'></div>且高丽小邦，岂能当契丹之盛？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1163935_comment'></div>来与不来，国家无所损益，而契丹知之，谓朝廷将以图我，此契丹之疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1163935_comment'></div>秦州古渭之西，吐蕃部族散居山野，不相君长，耕牧自足，未尝为边鄙之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1163935_comment'></div>向闻强取其地，建熙河一路，杀其老少以数万计，所费不赀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1163935_comment'></div>而河州或云地属董毡，即契丹婿也，既恐辟地未已，岂不往诉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1163935_comment'></div>而契丹闻之，当谓行将及我，此又契丹之疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1163935_comment'></div>北边地近西山，势渐高仰，不可为塘泊之处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1163935_comment'></div>向闻差官领兵，遍植榆柳，冀其成长，以制虏骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1163935_comment'></div>然兴于界首，无不知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1163935_comment'></div>昔庆历嫚书所谓「创立堤防，障塞要路」，无以异矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1163935_comment'></div>然此岂足恃以为固哉？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1163935_comment'></div>但使契丹之疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1163935_comment'></div>河朔义勇民兵，置之岁久，耳目已熟，将校甚整，教习亦精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1163935_comment'></div>而忽创团保甲，一道纷然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1163935_comment'></div>义勇旧人，十去其七，或拨入保甲，或放而归农，得增数之虚名，破可用之成法，此又徒使契丹之疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1163935_comment'></div>自虏人辨理疆界，河朔沿边与近里州郡，一例差官检计，修筑城垒，开淘壕堑，冀、北京役者尤众，敌楼战棚之类，悉加换葺，增置防城之具，率令备足，逐处兵甲器械，累次差官检视，排垛张盘，前后非一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1163935_comment'></div>又诸处创都作院，颁降新样，广谋造作，澶州等处创为战车，此皆众目所睹，谍者易窥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1163935_comment'></div>且虏人未有动作，彼无秋毫之损，而我已费财殚力，先自困弊，此又徒使契丹之疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1163935_comment'></div>近复置立河北三十七将，各专军政，州县不得关防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1163935_comment'></div>雄州地控极边，亦设将屯兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1163935_comment'></div>其随军衣物，有令兵士自办者，有令本营增置者，有令官造给付者，以至预籍上户车马骡驴，准备随行，明作出征次第，不可盖掩，此又深使契丹之疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1163935_comment'></div>夫北虏素为敌国，设施如此，则积疑生事，不得不然，亦其善自为谋者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1163935_comment'></div>今横使再至，初示偃蹇，以探朝廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1163935_comment'></div>况代北与雄州素有定界，若优容而与之，恐虏情无厌，浸淫不已，诚如圣诏所谕，固不可与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1163935_comment'></div>或因其不许，虏遂持此以为己直，纵未大举，势必渐扰诸边，卒隳盟好，盖有因缘而致此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1163935_comment'></div>乃烦明诏访以待遇备御之要，自顾老朽，夙夜思之，其将何策，上助圣算？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1163935_comment'></div>臣闻事未及而言谓之躁，言及之而不言谓之隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1163935_comment'></div>臣昔曾言散青苗钱不便事，而言者辄肆厚诬，非陛下之明，几及大戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1163935_comment'></div>自此新法之下，虽其间有未协人情者，实避嫌疑，不敢更有论列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1163935_comment'></div>今亲被诏问，事系国家安危，言及而隐，是大不忠，罪不容诛矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1163935_comment'></div>臣尝切计，始为陛下谋者，必曰自祖宗以来，纪纲法度，率多因循茍简，非变之不可也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1163935_comment'></div>治国之本，当先有富彊之术，聚财积谷，寓兵于民，则可以鞭笞四夷，尽复唐之故疆，然后制作礼乐，以文太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1163935_comment'></div>故始散青苗钱，使民出利，所得之利复以为本，但务多取，岁增本钱，无有定数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1163935_comment'></div>又为免役之法，自上等以至下户，皆令次第出钱，募人应役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1163935_comment'></div>从来上户轮当衙前重难，故其间时有破败者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1163935_comment'></div>今上户一岁出钱不过三十馀缗，安然无事，而令下户素无役者岁岁出钱，此则损下户而益上户，虽百端补救，终无善法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1163935_comment'></div>又役钱之内，每岁更纳宽剩钱，以备他用，此谓富国之术也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1163935_comment'></div>且农民送纳夏秋税赋，一年两次纳不前者始有科校之刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1163935_comment'></div>今纳青苗与役钱，已是加赋，有过限者，亦依二税法科校，则是一户一岁之中，常负六次科校，民不胜骇矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1163935_comment'></div>稍遇水旱，则逋负官钱，流移失业，是已著见，孰敢言者？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1163935_comment'></div>又内外置市易务，尽笼天下商旅之货，官自取利，主者以得利为功，圭刀必取，小商细民，遂无所措手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1163935_comment'></div>加以新制日下，更改无常，州县官吏茫然不能详记，稍有违者，坐以徒刑，虽经赦降去官，不得原免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1163935_comment'></div>监司督责，以刻为明，簿法之苛，过于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_61_1163935", 1163935, "Clauses/274/Comments/0")'>告缗</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1163935_comment'></div>故州县之间，官吏惴惴然，日茍一日，皆以得罪为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1163935_comment'></div>夫农者，国之本也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1163935_comment'></div>商者，能为国致财者也；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1163935_comment'></div>官吏者，助朝廷之教化者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1163935_comment'></div>今农者则怨于畎亩，商者则叹于道路，官吏则所在不安其职，恐陛下不能尽知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1163935_comment'></div>夫欲攘捍四夷，以兴太平，而先使邦本困摇，众心离怨，振古以来，未闻能就此功者也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1163935_comment'></div>此则陛下始谋者之大误也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1163935_comment'></div>陛下有尧舜之聪明，知其所误，能改不吝，圣人之大德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1163935_comment'></div>又今好进之人，不顾国家之利害，但谓边事将作，富贵可图，献策以干陛下者，必云虏势已衰，特外示骄慢耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1163935_comment'></div>以陛下神圣文武，若择将臣，领大兵，深入虏境，则幽蓟之地，一举可复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1163935_comment'></div>此又未之思也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1163935_comment'></div>今河朔累岁灾伤，民力大乏；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1163935_comment'></div>沿边、次边州郡，刍粮不充；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1163935_comment'></div>新选将官，例皆粗勇；<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1163935_comment'></div>保甲新点，未经训练。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1163935_comment'></div>若驱重兵顿于坚城之下，粮道不给，虏人四向来援，腹背受敌，欲退不可，其将奈何？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1163935_comment'></div>太宗时虽曹彬、米信名德宿将，犹以致岐沟之败也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1163935_comment'></div>臣愚今为陛下计，谓宜遣使往报，优致礼币，开示大信，达以至诚，具言朝廷向来兴作，乃修备之常，与北朝通好之久，自古所无，岂有他意？<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1163935_comment'></div>恐为谍者所误耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1163935_comment'></div>且疆土素定，当如旧界，请命边吏退近者侵占之地，不可持此造端，欲隳祖宗累世之好，永笃信约，两绝嫌疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1163935_comment'></div>望陛下将契丹所疑之事，如将官之类，因而罢去，以释虏疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1163935_comment'></div>万一听伏，则可迁延岁月，陛下益养民爱力，选贤任能，疏远奸谀，进用忠鲠，使天下悦服，边备日修，塞下有馀粟，帑中有羡财，俟虏果有衰乱之形，然后一振威武，恢复旧疆，快忠义不平之心，雪祖宗累朝之愤，陛下功德赫然，如日照耀无穷矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1163935_comment'></div>如其不伏，决欲背约，则河北诸州深沟高垒，足以自守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1163935_comment'></div>虏人果来入寇，所在之兵可以伺便驱逐，大将持重，以全取胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1163935_comment'></div>自此彼来我往，一胜一负，兵家之常，不可前料，即未知何时复遂休息也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1163935_comment'></div>至于清野之法，则难尽行，仓卒之际，不可率一境之民，比户将牛马糇粮尽入城郭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1163935_comment'></div>盖至时或有往保山塞者，或有挈家渡河者，或有留人看守庄舍者，或有就近入居城郭者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1163935_comment'></div>当使人得自便，方保安全，固不可按图先定，必令城郭而居，虽有严令，必不从也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1163935_comment'></div>在祖宗朝，屡经北虏之扰，乡民避寇，率亦如此，愿朝廷不须一一处置。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1163935_comment'></div>臣历事三朝，十年辅相，宦已极品，归荣故乡，万事无不足者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1163935_comment'></div>年将七十，宿疹在身，每思告老而去，庶全始终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1163935_comment'></div>此缘圣问之及，因敢一贡荩言，非嫉善也，非求进也，用是只以自信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1163935_comment'></div>今天下之人，渐不敢以直言为献，臣实不忍负累朝眷遇之恩，犹觊愚瞽，一悟圣心，为社稷之盛福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1163935_comment'></div>惟陛下加察，赐以不疑，非独老臣幸甚，天下幸甚<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>！<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1163935_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_96_1163935'>创：原无，据《邵氏闻见录》补。</div><div id='poem_sentence_96_1163935_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_1163935'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_95_1163935_0'>⑴ 《韩魏公集》卷一九。又见《韩魏王家传》卷一○，《邵氏闻见录》卷四，《少微通鉴续编节要》卷七，《续资治通鉴长编》卷二六二，《皇朝文鉴》卷四四，《东都事略》卷一二三，《太平治迹统类》卷一六，《国朝诸臣奏议》卷一三七，《三朝名臣言行录》卷一，《宋史》卷三一二《韩琦传》，《历代名臣奏议》卷三三○，《文翰类选大成》卷一二七，《右编》卷二六，《宋元通鉴》卷三五，《经济类编》卷七○，《续资治通鉴》卷七○。</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_1163935_comment'></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年2月</a>　二月，韩琦在河北任职四年，经多次乞请，终得移判相州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=1073&endYear=1073')">1073年2月</a>　在大名，相州知州任上。韩琦有《移判相州乞交割公事札子》<span class='inlineComment2'>（此文见李之亮、徐正英《安阳集编年笺注》卷三十六。）</span><div id='poem_1163869' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1163869' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1163869?labeling=true' target='_blank'>移判相州乞交割公事劄子</a><span class='authorDate'>（1073年2月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 北宋 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(34411, "北宋", "韩琦", "poem_title_1163869")'>韩琦</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1163869_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1163869'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1163869'>臣伏蒙圣慈差降中使传宣抚问，赐臣移判相州敕一道，及押医官副使陈易简诊视，臣已上表称谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1163869_comment'></div>窃念臣冒宠踰涯，连年被疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1163869_comment'></div>如近婴于风痹，实自致于身灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1163869_comment'></div>罪以不避再三，屡祈慈恻，果特回于睿眷，得还治于本邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1163869_comment'></div>惟天地施不报之仁，使蝼蚁有再生之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1163869_comment'></div>臣虽百殒，何塞万分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1163869_comment'></div>其陈易简，臣欲令详究病源，熟议合服药剂，更留三两日，即遣赴阙次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1163869_comment'></div>盖恃至仁，不胜战惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1163869_comment'></div>臣兼睹文彦博、贾昌朝、李昭亮，前在大名府移替之日，有旨并令交割公事与转运使一员，发赴本任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1163869_comment'></div>窃闻韩绛已许朝觐，既到阙见辞，恐须稽留日数，欲望检会前来体例，早降指挥，许臣只交割公事与转运使一员讫，发赴相州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1163869_comment'></div>所贵便遂养颐，上符恩恤。</div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1163869_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end
